links_reviews_title: Wore to Mardi gras ball. It was equally comfortable and beautiful. Received lots of complaints. Love
links_reviews_text: Was initially worried about the back being back-less as going bra-less or using a non-traditional bra wasn't an option. Used double-sided tape on the back of my bra to the drape and it was perfect. Highly recommend

I love this dress! I got so many compliments and felt so glamorous all night long. I was worried that the sequins could become irritating because I have experienced that with other sequined dresses but this one was very smooth. One of my favorite rentals ever
Color is to die for. Sequins aren't scratchy/itchy

Sadly I ordered too late and didn't get my size so I order a size up and down to try and cover my bases. Customer service really helped explain what I should expect when I got the dresses and how to adjust accordingly and the dress turned out a hit!
Loved everything about this dress! It fit amazing and was extremely comfortable. I received compliments all night long.

links_reviews_title: Endless sparkle and tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Wore this in an 8L for my daughter's wedding. I probably could've sized down to a 6, but I was more comfortable with it not being so fitted. I received a 10L also, and the length was VERY short compared to the 8L. The color was not as dark as I was expecting, but ended up being very pleased with this dress overall
Dress was gorgeous!! Got a ton of compliments and was a great fit. The 8 also fit, bit I chose to wear the larger one for comfort.

links_reviews_title: In room of gorgeous dresses 4 women stopped to compliment me on my dress! Comfy and stunning.
links_reviews_text: I'd recently lost 20 pounds, so wasn't sure of my size. I'm 5'3" and at that time about 165 and the 12P fit perfectly. If my shoulders weren't so broad and I'd lost a few more pounds in the middle a 10P may have also worked. The dress is stretchy, comfy and very forgiving. It also basically feels like you're wearing a nightgown! BONUS! LOL! The open back is beyond beautiful. By the end of the evening the inside of my arms were a little sore from rubbing against the sequins on the dress...but otherwise I'm a total fan. May very well get this one again in the future!

I am only 5'1" & very busty. It is nearly impossible for me to find dresses for a formal occasion. After reviewing the selections that RTR filtered down to, this gown seemed the best of the group & I am very glad I rented this one. It fit perfectly, it was very comfortable & I received many compliments. I also felt it was age appropriate. Highly recommend.
I wore this to a fire and ice gala. It was surprisingly comfortable and easy to dance in! I’m 5’3 and the regular length was perfect with 4 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black tie wedding event. It was so comfortably and made me feel great all night. ..
links_reviews_text: The dress is super comfy. It also sparkles just enough under the right lights !!! It is a little hot because of the sequence. I left amazing and it was the perfect length.

Fit like a glove. Super comfortable - not heavy, easy to move in. Got lots of complements - had complete strangers coming up and complementing me on the dress. Hit the floor perfectly in 2.5" heels, so didn't have to force higher. Wore NuBra (stickie) to accommodate the back which was perfect. Would rent again!
It has a good fit & it's well made. The dress is gorgeous.

This dress was beautiful. The 2P worked well with I'm 5,3 and 4" heels. I could have wore the size 0 but the 2P was good: if I rent in gold U will rent 0P. The material is very stretchy I could pull a couple inches to the side but it looked great and was comfortable. I weigh 110 lbs and 34dd.

This was a fabulous dress! I got a ton of compliments from strangers throughout the evening and I felt sexy and confident, but appropriately conservative for the event. The color is a beautiful blue-grey tone - something a little different than you normally see. The low back is unexpected and fun. I wore a nubra, through you could get away with a regular bra if you pinned it down. Overall a terrific dress!

Fit true to my normal dress size however as a 5'9" gal, wish the long was longer. Had to wear a shorter heel to get it looking long enough. Loved the dress and would recommend! Saw 2 other gals at the governor's inauguration Ball with the same dress but in different colors. Wasn't a big deal though! Just shows you how awesome that dress is and it looks good on everyone!

Wonderful dress for a black tie wedding. Got tons of compliments. I rented both the 12L and the 10L. The 12 fit best and was super comfortable to move/dance in. I wore 3 inch heels and it was the perfect length. Towards the end of the night, my arms were rubbed raw from the sequins but I had expected that (I'm an enthusiastic dancer).

This dress hugged my curves perfectly. It was comfortable (not too tight) so I could eat without worrying about feeling stuffed into a dress. Comfortable enough to dress in and it didn't slip down at all. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Stood out in a sea of black, red and gold dresses and received many compliments at USMC ball.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, easy to wear, sit, dance and stand in. Not as heavy as many sequined dresses. Wore my own bra amd tucked in the back piece so it wouldn't show.

So comfortable. Fit snug around the rib cage. I recommend shapewear for curvy girls. Drape in the back had to be wrapped into my bra to hide the bra and to prevent the dress lining to be exposed. I loved the fit. THIS DRESS IS AMAZING. I would like to thank the RTR Customer service agent Chase for finding this wonderful dress for me. To make a very long stressful story short, the original dress I ordered was an extreme disappointment and Chase spent 45 minutes on the phone with me to resolve the issue. Thank you, Chase for your outstanding customer service! The dress was a hit.

links_reviews_title: A great choice for fancy dress up event.
links_reviews_text: I was invited to a black tie wedding where the bride asked for us to wear glittery gowns. This was perfect. It's super comfortable, stretchy, not very heavy, and also warm! It is body hugging, so I'd recommend some shape wear if you want to help streamline your silhouette. The 6L was my backup size, and I could have even worn a 4L in this - not that it runs particularly small, it's just very forgiving.

I love the dress arrived one day before of the schedule day. I order size 8L and 6R (6L was not available) the fabric is stretchy and the open back makes the dress a little lose, so size 6 fitted better than 8. But I decide to use 8 because it was longer, 6R was to short for me. Nonetheless, it looked incredible!

Love this dress! The stretchy fabric is very comfortable, and the sequins lay flat so they won't tear up your under arms. Perfect for dancing the night away. The dress fits very true to designer size. You could size down for a more snug fit, but given the nature of the fabric and how it drapes think you could even go up a size and the dress won't look too loose. I'm 5'7'' and with four inch heels the long just brushed the floor. The back is just low enough that you'll need to wear a low backed bra, and if you wear shapeware it would need to hit at the waist (not to the rib cage). I was going to wear control top pantyhose, but opted against it since the top line was visible in this dress, since it has no waist line.
Rented for sorority convention and it was a great dress. Comfortable and stretchy for sitting in it 4 hours.
Dress was perfect!!! I was a little nervous after ordering and reading the reviews, thought I rented the wrong size. Tried the dress on and it was perfect!!!

The week of my event, the size I ordered (4) went unavailable, so I had to go a size up. The dress was stretchy and the 6 fit well. I wish the long had been available, as I’m 5’7” and had to wear flats with this dress. But I was complimented all night. This dress is easy to dance in and very comfortable. I did wear spanx underneath due to it shows every curve of your stomach, hips, and butt. I wore a stick on bra I got at target. You can’t go wrong with this dress. It’s stunning.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a PRINCESS in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I seriously felt like a princess in this dress. It was actually a last minute backup dress selection as the emerald green shorter version i had ordered was unavailable at the last minute, but i am SO happy i ended up with it! Only got the one size, the 10L as other reviews recommended to size up, and it fit like a GLOVE. I got so many compliments and ive seriously never felt more confident in a form fitting dress like this before. You will SERIOUSLY have heads turning and all eyes on you! Dont hesitate - rent this dress!

Wore this for annual cotillion ball. Comfortable enough to dance in all night because it has a lot of stretch to it. Spanx are a must, but don't think a bra would work with it, although I didn't bother trying. Would love for it to be an extra inch or so in the front (I'm 5'10") as it didn't quite hit the floor with my 2 1/2" heels; back was fine as it seems to dip back there. Everyone loved the dress, and I loved the lilac for an early spring ball.

I rented this dress but ened up not wearing it. Im bigger and the front tummy is not as forgiving. So my friend wore it instead. It was stunning on her. She was 4'11" - 5'0" and it was a but long for her. But 5'2" and it was a bit short for me when i tried it on with heels.

links_reviews_title: Sparkling, stunning back, and fit. Got many many complements.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. No cons. All pros!

This dress is so comfortable. I wore a blackless bra and a pair of spanxs and it was perfect. Rented a 12L and 14L. Went with the larger size because it highlighted my curves perfectly. Danced all night without any problems.

This was a replacement dress because my original dress was not available. I loved it! It fit great and showed off the few curves I have. I received compliments all night long in this show stopper dress. The back is stunning as well. I was able to wear it without a bra, which was perfect. The length of the petite was perfect with my height and 4-inch heels. I range between and 2 and 4 depending on the designer and this 4P fit great. I wore it to a military/black tie gala, and it was the perfect dress. I would definitely rent it again.

I rented this for a formal military event. My dress was turning heads. I absolutely needed the long and it would have looked ridiculous without it. I'm 5' 7" and wore small 2" heels. I could have worn the 10 or 12, but the 12 just felt a little more comfortable for a long night.
Absolutely love the stress, I receive so many wonderful compliments. Usually wore an 8 at the time but I had recently found out I was a few months pregnant so the back up 10 was a perfect fit!

This dress was so beautiful and sparkly. I love the exposed back detail, it brings more excitement to the gown. The only thing I disliked was the length, I am 5'8 and I would've preferred it a little longer, I was glad I chose the Long size. You will not be disappointed by this gown!

links_reviews_title: Another great wear from RTR! EXQUISITE!
links_reviews_text: I so, so loved wearing this dress! It was beautiful on and I got more compliments than I could imagine. It runs true to size. In my opinion one is unable to wear a bra, but if you are able to wear them the silicone ostrich on bra cups would be helpful. I could not attempt those this evening because it was bitter than hades well into the night and perspiration would have been my downfall as one of the silicone bra cups step out of my dress while walking -lol. Anyhow amazing dress and I would have loved to but it but maybe next time.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my junior prom and it fit perfectly with the disco theme!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 8 or 10 but I got a 12 so the dress wasn't too form-fitting. It was really hot outside while taking pictures but this dress kept me pretty cool. I had to wear a sticky bra because the dress is too thin to wear without a bra and the back is very low. The color and sequins make my figure look amazing! I got a ton of compliments! I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Felt like the most beautiful girl in the room!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a formal event and literally turned heads the entire night. It ft so comfortably and was just long enough although I wore super short heels. It didn't scratch my arms and the back came to the perfect point where I could wear spanx without anyone seeing! Wish I could wear this every day!
This dress fit like a glove, it had a bit of stretch in it too so was comfortable to wear and dance in. I wore 3" Heels so the dress did not drag but anything lower then the dress is on the floor.

links_reviews_title: Loved how this dress made me feel!
links_reviews_text: The original dress I selected was unavailable for the event date. I received notification from RTR more than a week out, which gave me plenty of time to make adjustments. Both sizes fit, but I chose to wear the 10 so that I could wear a bra. While the dress is incredibly comfortable, it does hug every curve, so I wore spanx to hold in my "mommy" belly. I had such a positive experience that I'm looking forward to renting a dress again next year.

I wore this dress for my Senior Homecoming, It was very flattering and the color was so vibrant! Im 5'5 and 175 lb I ended up wearing the 12 R size. The fit is very true to size in my opinion. This a great dress for any nonformal event!
I wore this dress for my baby shower tea party! It was perfect. I'm 5'11" and 27 weeks pregnant. I received so many compliments. Highly recommend this dress!
Perfect for a wedding and received so many compliments :) I loved it!!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress that flattered my baby bump!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 4/6 depending on the dress, but sized up to a 10 because I was 39 1/2 weeks pregnant. I wore spandex underneath the dress too and it was perfect. I got so many compliments on the dress and it made my baby bump look extra cute! Definitely a good dress to wear if you've got an event to go to and are about to pop!

links_reviews_title: My baby shower was floral themed with different shades of pink. Dress was a great fit &perfect pink.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, usually a 4/6 not pregnant, and they did not have an 8 available so I ordered a 6/10. 6 was definitely not going to fit over my bump! The 10 fit perfect almost 7 months pregnant. Great length for 5'2 and a large bump, loved that it had sleeves and covered part of the back. Didn't need to wear a bra either.

I rented this dress at 7 months pregnant for a wedding and it was a show stopper. The color is vibrant and perfect for a summer wedding. The dress material was thick and had a perfect amount of stretch to cover belly and allow me to sit and eat and even dance all night! I usually wear a 5/6 but 8 while pregnant worked perfectly. Would absolutely rent again.
This was an amazing dress! I usually wear a 16/18 and the 18 was a perfect fit. I'm 5'3 and it wasn't too long. Got so many compliments!
Received this as a back up and ended up wearing this instead. The dress is comfortable and the color was so pretty. Definitely more pink than coral. No bra necessary!
This dress was beautiful and I felt confident, even at 30 weeks pregnant. I usually wear a 0 and ended up in a 4 to accommodate my bump.
I went up a size, and it still fit comfortably while pregnant with baby #2 and a huge meal. Did not need a bra, and the arm coverage was much appreciated!
This was perfect for any summer event. I'm self conscience about my arms so this was magnificent. The material is amazing and it is really flattering

links_reviews_title: Fun color and style! Wore it to dinner and broadway in NYC
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, and looser in the hips, which is good for a curvy girl!

Perfect color for a summer "garden party" wedding (read: hot sun and humidity). I have a smaller top than bottom so wore the 4 instead of the 6 which was far too large on top; you want the cold-shoulder sleeves to hit mid-arm, not close to the elbows which looks too long and floppy. It was a great dress for photos with color contrast and no worries about being washed out by the sunshine. Definitely recommended.

I loved this dress. The color was great and the fit was perfect and comfortable. I'm in my third trimester (38 weeks) and it was not too tight on my growing bump or chest. I was worried the length would be too short after accommodating the curves but it was perfect. My preprego size is typically a 6ish but I wore a 12.

This was the first time I needed to get dressed up since having my daughter last August. I have been struggling with my body image and this dress was what I needed for a boost of confidence!! Comfortable, easy, stunning color, and perfect for a waterfront summer wedding!
I didn't end up wearing this to the wedding but thought it would have been cute! I simply had also rented another dress that I liked more!
I wore this at 30 weeks pregnant and was surprised that my true size fit! The fabric was thicker than I was expecting, but the color was gorgeous and very comfortable.
Absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this color on my skin. The size 8 fit perfectly. Received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: True to size, great for summer weddings.
Very flattering dress. Love the color.
I don’t normally wear this style dress (bright and flirty). But this one was just perfect. The length and fit were flattering without feeling flashy. Definitely recommend!
This photo does not do it justice! I love this dress! Fit is true to size and is very comfortable. Wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments. Color is gorgeous for summer. Get this dress!
I'm 5'3", 120 lbs and usually wear a 4. After reading the reviews I went with a 2 and it fit like a glove. The fabric was of fantastic quality and the color was great. I received so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect color for my baby shower!
links_reviews_text: I felt very pretty in this dress and comfortable for my baby shower, loved the color and the design, only downside was the top was a little too big and I'm a 40DD so that says a lot since I had to get a bigger size for my growing stomach. Overall would recommend though
I never wear dresses that are fitted but I actually really loved this because the top detail was flowy. Got a ton of compliments all night.

This dress was beautiful. Color stood out and was very pretty. I did not need to wear a bra which was great. It was very comfortable, and the sleeves were great for some added warmth. The only slight downside was I couldn't really raise my arms all the way up while dancing, but it wasn't a big deal. I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to opening night at Churchill Downs. Even w/o a Derby hat, I rec'd so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and true to size 12. Material was very comfortable and overall the dress looked and felt expensive. The color seemed darker than the website photo, but was still a beautiful coral. Delivery was prompt. Return easy. No cons on this one. Will definitely order again
The fit was great. Usually I wear an 18 but I think I clicked 20 by mistake. It worked out because I was able to eat and breathe with ease lol fabric wasn't too heavy and I got lots of compliments.

Wore this to a wedding when I was 7mo pregnant. Got tons of complements! The color was very pretty and the ruffle detail was so flattering. Material was stretchy which made it work for maternity. I would definitely wear again when not pregnant.
As always, perfect fit. Perfect color. Many compliments. No complaints or specific things to note.

The color of this dress is so bubbly and fun. I love the off shoulder, and that there are still straps to hold it together (and not slip down like most other off shoulder dresses). Wore this to a gala and got so many compliments!
I loved the way this stretchy (and thick) material hugged my curves and covered my insecure area (arms). This dress was a hit and gave me so much confidence. 10/10 would wear again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress and received lots of compliments! It was perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: Great material, cut, and style. Opted for a size up to give a little more tummy room. Had to pin the straps since I'm shorter. Got many compliments and loved the dress!
Loved the fit of this dress and the color for a FL beach wedding. I honestly loved this dress and thought about buying it
Perfect for a golf course summer wedding. Comfortable fit, easy to move in. Downside - if you dance with your arms in the air it kind of cuts into your shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Bright pop of coral for my twin girl baby shower!
links_reviews_text: I'm 29 weeks pregnant and felt great in this dress. Pre pregnancy I was a size 6 so opted for the 8 here. You can see it hugged my belly but it was comfortable. It rode up a little during a day of jumping between sitting, kneeling, walking around so I was happy I had maternity shaper shorts on underneath.
Beautiful dress and color. Love the material.

The dress is a perfect fit, not too large, not too tight, just perfectly snug. The length is comfortable and I'm tall 5'8". The only reason I deducted one star is because the dress runs a bit loose on the bust/ shoulder area. Other than that it fit like a glove! Will recommend.
I loved this dress! Super comfortable and easy breezy for a summer wedding!! Definitely recommend it!
Wore this when I was 8 months pregnant for my baby shower and loved it! Color pops, fit is great, received tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Good quality dress - can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: The fit around the waist is a little weird but I made it work by pulling it up and securing with a belt. Without the belt it probably wasn't the most flattering. Otherwise the ruching makes it look interesting and the cut of the bottom has lovely movement. Can be dressed up or down with sneakers for a summers day out and about.

links_reviews_title: Runs a bit small, sexy tho
links_reviews_text: Definitely size up, the waist is quite tiny and bunches up if it's too small. Love it otherwise

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Its casual and dressy at the same time.
links_reviews_text: Fit is a bit more snug than expected. Its cut on bias and with the rouching details at the front makes it for a very flattering shape. Loved the polca dot print and the slit at front of skirt. Also loved that I didn't have to wear a bra. So comfortable!

It's true to size.... BUT since I'm petite but with a larger chest, this does not fit for me... Really do like the dress and wished I could zip up. The entire dress fit but I am unable to zip the last 5 inches because my chest area is tight. This fabric has NO STRETCH so beware of that. Otherwise, it is a cute dress.

The dress fits perfectly. The waist is cinched in and really highlights the figure. Length is a little long for shorter ppl. I step on the hem sometimes when wearing flats. The material is nice and the top is fully lined - aka no need to wear a bra. It is super easy and comfortable. I even wore it on two flights.
fits true to size!
I couldn't even zip the beginning. Sizing seems off and runs 1 or 2 sizes small..
Very pretty fit. Thought I could dress it down with sneakers but looked too formal. May rent again for a special occasion.
Was unable to zip at the top so i wish I had sized up because I LOVED this dress. It looked adorable and hugged all the right places.

This definitely runs about a size smaller than your usual size. It takes some fussing to get the ruching right but once you figure that out, it's a nice dress. Didn't do all that much for my figure, though. Just ok for me.

I am an 8-10. The body fit fine but the bust was very tight. Not just tight but a small price of fabric to cover entire chest. It was loose by neck then and then bulged out. Couldn't use draw strings. Very strange fit.
Didn't end up wearing this because I couldn't get it to zip all the way. It fit everywhere else nicely but I'm a 34C and it suffocated my chest.

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Very cute style and flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: I have small breasts and was still snug on top. Fit me great and loved the style but I'd have larger breasts may size up. It is sort of adjustable which is very cool.

The 8 was uncomfortably small so I ordered the 10 and it was much too big. It did not hang properly. The drawstring acts as though it would pull the rouching to tighten the entire dress but all it did was tighten the neckline and I couldn't get the neckline to come back out. I ended up having to wear something from my closet :(.
runs small

My husband was a huge fan of this dress. Very form fitting and curve conscious. The ruching gives a little camoflage for any problem areas you might have. The top of the dress fits a little differently than any other dress I have tried so you have to play with the adjustable straps to get them situated correctly. The effort really pays off though! It's a va-va-voom moment for sure.
strange fit for fabric's weight. big but wouldn't fall right.
I rented this as a back up for a gala. My first choice worked out better. This dress is very plain but flattering. Very nice thick material wouldn't have needed to wear a bra. I rented an 8p

This dress was waayyyyyyyy too long. I'm 5'4" and with short heels a "regular" dress works well. This dress seemed extra long which made me have to carry the dress skirt all night long. However, it was beautiful so at least the pics turned out nice.

links_reviews_title: Much more flattering in person...So beautiful
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress and the fit was amazing. It's lined with satin and is so well made. Hi lights your curves and the color is amazing!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for any kind of formal event!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 4 but wore a 6 in this dress so I'd definitely say it's cut a bit on the smaller side! I got a long and regular length but honestly they seemed to be about the same length as if someone had maybe hemmed the longer one so it was a bit shorter than I would have liked (I'm 5'8 for reference). Other than that I loved this dress, it hugged all the right places and was actually incredibly comfortable!

This was my first time renting a dress for my friend's Oscar Party. When the dress arrived, the wrong size was sent. I started to panic and frantically emailed Customer Service. They responded promptly, offered a new dress which arrived before 10 AM the next day. The blue dress fit like a glove and accented my curves. It was absolutely stunning. The return process was just as easy. I would recommend RTR to anyone and I personally will be renting next year for the party! Thank-you RTR!

Rent this gown! Bold cobalt blue was gorgeous and popped in a sea of black dresses. The fit was perfect-tight but not at all uncomfortable. Material was thick and forgiving-didn't need spanx! I also didn't wear a bra and it was v neck but conservative. I'm 5'8 and got the long length-it's very long! I wore 4 inch heels and the dress still dragged a tad. Would definitely rent this again-maybe next time in the pink!
I would 100% rent again.
Even through this was a last minute change, I couldn't be happier!

Stunning dress with heavy fabric that has stretch, allowing a perfect fit even on a body like mine where my hip measurement is about 2 sizes bigger than my waist and bust measurements. Fit perfectly and was so comfortable all night long. Regular length is not very long - I'm 5'6" and could only wear a short 2 inch block heel for it to be about the right length.
Gorgeous, simple, classic dress. Not too much cleavage so great for a work event. The fabric was thick and forgiving. Would highly recommend!
Comfortable dress, nice color, flattering. Definitely too long, even for a 5'9 girl like me, so be prepared

I love this classy dress - I wore the pink version of it a few years ago and I love this blue one too. I hate wearing black to weddings. It hits the curves perfectly. I rented the regular (versus long) - I'm 5'7" ~180lbs and it was nice with 2 inch heels. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Just long enough for a tall girl.
links_reviews_text: We'll see how it photographs but I think it's a solid fit and flair with stretch in a very flattering color.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit and bright blue color.
links_reviews_text: The sheath style was definitely out of my comfort zone, but I felt amazing.
Love the overall fit and color of the dress - form fitting and flattering for my curvy athletic body type. However WAY long even with 4 inch heels, can't walk around so didn't end up wearing.

This may have not been my original dress but I'm glad I got this as a replacement! The color was the best and the fit was amazing, stretchy and snatched in the right places! I never wanted to take it off!

links_reviews_title: It made me feel gorgeous and was perfect for the "creative black tie" dress code.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great but it didn't breath much. The color really pops.

I wore this dress to one of my senior proms and it fit super well. I never thought that I would like a mermaid style body con dress but I loved it. I felt confident and got compliments all night. The only issue for me is I'm kinda short and even with 3 inch heels, the dress was a little too long. I just had to be careful not to fall!
This dress was great. Figure flattering; stretchy material that you can dance/move in; you can wear a normal bra underneath. Paired well with the army uniform.

links_reviews_title: Great for dancing and showing off strong shoulders
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully. Didn't have to wear spanx, but a shaper did make for a nice smooth silhouette. Didn't need a strapless bra, just make sure you have a skin tone one that is racerback or convertible to racerback. The blue color is gorgeous in person and a total eye grabber. Trumpet shape skirt is dressy yet easy to walk and dance.
I enjoyed this piece! It ran a little big in my opinion. I usually wear a 4 but, I was able to fit a 2 . It was very elegant and I felt pretty. Good choice !

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit & color! A winner all around!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! Fit was great overall. I’m about 5’3 so the petite might’ve been a little better for me instead of a regular as far as the length was concerned. The fabric was high quality & the color simply beautiful! This is a must rent! My favorite part was the train in the back. It was just enough to get you noticed. I would definitely rent this again!
I loved this dress. I'm petite hour glass figure. This fit perfect in al the right places. Many compliments all night.
This dress fit wonderfully but ended up wearing a red one I ordered. It is figure flattering and comfort. I am 5'5 and 140lb for reference.

links_reviews_title: Can I wear this every day???
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely gorgeous! I felt so comfortable and sexy all night. I'm typically a size 6, 5'3" / 140 lbs / 34DD and hourglass figure. I was able to wear a normal bra which was awesome, and the length was just right with a pair of heels. I would highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Second time rental- knew I had a winner
links_reviews_text: The gown is flattering and comfortable and easy to dance in. Recommend going up a size on your backup. The color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous on, skip pics of model!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. The color, material, fit. The pics on the model are terrible. The pics of real people wearing them in the reviews sold me. I sized up only because the chest area was tight in the smaller size, 2P. You might be able to get away with wearing a regular bra. I had to wear strapless but only because in the armpits, several inches of bra was showing.
This was a perfect dress for a gala. Color was fabulous and it looked amazing on.

Everything is great about this dress! The fabric is rich and flexible with great stretch. The color is brilliant and really stands out, and the cut is amazing for an hourglass figure. I felt comfortable in this dress all night to eat, have cocktails and dance the night away. Big hit!

This dress was gorgeous for a black tie wedding. I received many compliments throughout the night. It is comfortable and fits/lays nicely. I'm only 5'2" and even with heels, it's was a tad long, but nothing I couldn't walk in.

links_reviews_title: This gown made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’7” 135 lbs and the 4R fit perfectly with Spanx underneath to smooth it all out. I wore this for a white tie event and loved it. The gown is sleek and very classy without being over the top. I highly recommend! I wore flats but tried it on with 3” heels and it still covered most of my shoes, but I did not trip in the flats. Beautiful for a formal event!

Truly loved this dress. Got soo many compliments. The only thing is that it kept twisting to be uncentered on my stomach / hips. It kept moving to the left, and I had to adjust it back constantly. Besides that, it was a wonderful dress. I'm 5ft 10, but they didn't have a long so I ordered the regular length. It was about an inch off the ground in flats for me. For people my height, I'd order the long if you want to where heels.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. It fit well and was easy to dance in
links_reviews_text: Fit well with heels on.
Fit like a glove. Great quality and rich color. Can't wait to rent it in pink!
Fit like a glove!
Loved the fit Great quality However the zipper is discolored and should be replaced for the price :)
This dress fit perfectly. I'm pretty curvy and it hugged me in all the right places. It was very comfortable and not constricting at all. I got so many compliments on it. It was absolutely beautiful.

This was a back up dress since the one I wanted wasn't available 2 days before my event. After a slight freak out I picked 2 backup dresses that I wasn't crazy about. I'm glad my original order wasn't available because this dress is amazing! I felt like a million bucks, the dress was very comfortable, I was able to wear a strapless bra & received endless compliments. Highly recommended!
This dress is very forgiving and beautiful!

I wore this to a black tie wedding and it was the perfect choice! I'm 24 weeks pregnant and even though it's not a maternity dress, it's stretchy enough and very flattering to the belly. I'm 5'6" and the Regular fit just at the floor so I was able to wear flats - a pregnant woman's dream! I also didn't have to wear a bra, as the dress held my breasts up pretty well.
Great fit, hugs in all the right places.
#myRTR #workwear
I have mixed feelings. The color is great and I love the mermaid cut, but the sleeves feel a bit unbalanced.
Too big from the waist up. For reference my measurements are 36, 28, 42. Other than the sizing , I liked the dress.
Too big on top, tight in all the wrong places. The line at waist cuts mid belly and not good for pregnant bellies.
Ok
This is not a dress I wore, way to chesty for work and very tight!

I thought scarlet meant it was red but it is actually bright orange. It is good quality, lined. I wore a black bralet under it. The large was the right size for me (155 lbs). I think it is probably not appropriate for December because of the color and short sleeves, but I would recommend it in the warmer months.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! It fits me perfectly and is so cozy.
links_reviews_text: It fits perfectly. I'm 14 weeks pregnant and it hugged my growing belly perfectly, though it would fit perfectly well for a non-pregnant woman given the material is so forgivable. It's extremely soft and comfortable yet looks fancy.
Could be worn for a formal affair or work

links_reviews_title: Fabric looks more like a sweater
links_reviews_text: This dress is unique but is certainly not forgiving, would have definitely needed Spanx! Also, it is more of a sweater type material.... rented as a backup and decided not to wear.

links_reviews_title: Way too sexy and tight for work. the XL didn't even fit me and I'm typically a size 10.
links_reviews_text: too tight around the waist - too much cleavage. pretty color though.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is excellent quality and the front detail is gorgeous. The gown fit me like a glove. I was a little self conscious of how low the dress was, but with a great bra and some double side tape, I was fine. The color is vibrant and very flattering. I will absolutely rent this gown again!

I needed a packable dress to bring to a black tie wedding in Florence. I got a couple from RTR but this dress was perfect. It folded easily, was compact, light weight material (it was in the 90's there), yet held it's shape and was form fitting. Though it was low cut I didn't feel uncomfortable as I thought I would because the dress is so elegant. I've never worn a dress with the slit in the middle. This helped keep the sleek lines, yet gave the dress movement, but was not revealing. I loved this dress! Would def rent again if I had another event.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a beautiful wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for a fall wedding at a winery. I'm 5'4 and wore a 4R. Now I have a bit of a booty so it was a little tight in the backside but looser in my upper back ( I have barely any boobs to pull it in). I had to safety pin the front to pull it in a bit. If you don't want to have an accidental flashing, use double sided tape. I got so many compliments on this dress. Thanks RTR.

The color is beautiful in person. The twist in the front can give the look of a bigger midsection, but at the same time is helpful if you're looking for a dress that can hide your stomach. You definitely need fashion tape to hold he top in place. Runs large, I wear a 2 normally and wore a 0R in this dress.

links_reviews_title: "Just pin it and you'll be fine"
links_reviews_text: As you can see from the photo I tried to make this work but it took a lot of pinning. Must be meant for small chested people who can wear this with no bra because otherwise my entire bra would've been visible. I was disappointed and wore a size up so that the extra top material could be pinned as needed. Pretty long too so beware if you are short. The effect was good but it wasnt the most graceful cut.
Stretchy fabric made it very comfortable.
Dress was a perfect fit! I loved it so much I ended up buying the dress. In the photo it almost looks like pants, it’s not as you can see from the RTR photos.
The color of this dress is amazing! It was simple and sexy. Lots of compliments. I normally wear regular length but it was not available. I wore a 3" heel which helped with the length.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit of this, it was so flattering! Pretty low V, but good for small chest!
links_reviews_text: The twisted knot in midsection covers an unwanted shapes. Loved the color, got so many compliments!

Great fit and flattering in all the right places, just difficult to wear a right bra, too low for most regular bras and I can't go braless so I had to really work with some safety pins. So many compliments on the color and the dress!

Dress was perfect for a black tie gala and danced the night away! Color was a rich fuchsia color, material was thick enough to feel expensive but not too heavy and fit is super forgiving in the stomach. Fashion tape is a must for this dress especially for smaller chested women. I'm 5'2 with an athletic build and broad shoulders and the 2R fit like a glove. Slightly long, but 4" heels worked fine since the slit in the front helped to not get tripped up. Had to be careful getting in/out of cabs in order to not rip the slit any further. Received compliments all night and would highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt like it was perfect dress
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress awesome color

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning, got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on the dress and color, however beware that it is low cut and when you sit you need to maintain proper posture otherwise you may pop out of it!

links_reviews_title: The color of this dress is to die for!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly, but I'd recommend a petite if you're short. I did go up a size because the size 8 wasn't available, and I wanted to be comfortable. I'm currently 5 months pregnant, but this dress was extremely flattering to my ever-changing body.

So, all they had left were the Long sizes and I'm no long. I'm 5'5". As such, there was definitely a smidge of extra fabric in the back along the zipper for where a long person might have the torso length for this dress. I am 34 weeks pregnant with a significant change in my bust size due to that fact - I'm probably a 34-E/F. This dress was perfect. Showed the bump off nicely, while allowing me to feel like a woman and be comfortable. It had just enough stretch. I did have to pin the front. The neck line is incredibly low cut, but no big deal at all. Two safety pins. Endless compliments.

links_reviews_title: Felt great in this dress and it was a definite standout!
links_reviews_text: Fabulous color, stretchy smooth fabric, and a good length on me with heels which I was worried about with the R. Great choice for the Gala!

Very comfortable... used fashion tape to be sure no issues. Color is a bright purple fuscia... looked great with gold shoes and gold jewelry... 2R was perfect and length was perfect. I'm 5'7" and wore a 2 3/4" heel
I had to duck tape my Boobs but it all was worth it

The 2nd size of my original gown became unavailable to ship at the last minute so I had RtR send me this one as a backup. As you can see, the V is VERY deep and hit me even lower because I am short waisted. There was no containing the situation. I am 5' 1" and even in 5 inch heels the gown was draping on the floor so I feel like it is longer than most. Beautiful gown and color but not the best for short/short waisted girls with bigger chests!
Great fit dress. I did use silicon nip covers and fashion tape to prevent any slips. Comfortable wear all night.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The color worked perfectly with the theme of the gala! I ordered a 2L and I'm glad I did being 5'8 and wearing 3 inch heels with the dress. The fabric was nice and stretchy and laid perfectly in all the right places. My only issue was that the top is very low cut and I needed to use some pins to tighten it. Otherwise, no issues and I would definitely recommend this dress!

If you're looking to blend in, this dress is not for you! The color and fit are incredible and the neckline is daring. I rented both the 6R and 8R for a formal gala and went with the smaller size for a more fitted look. The gathered middle really flattered my curvy figure. I am fairly small on top and felt more comfortable securing both sides with some dress tape. I definitely reminded myself to have good posture so nothing peeked out! I would buy this dress in a heartbeat - received so many compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Lovely color, but a little too revealing for me!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a holiday party where I would meet my husband's boss and co-workers for the first time. I opted against this style because it was far too revealing for such an occasion. I can see this for an anniversary dinner or intimate occasion with your spouse though.

The dress is really, really pretty, but I opted not to wear it. The plunging neckline was a bit too extreme for me. I tried pinning it but I couldn’t get it right. Sadly I decided to wear something else.
#pureglam

Had to give myself a pep talk before walking out the door in this dress. The plunging neck line is not for the faint of heart. Tell yourself, "Yes, girl, you can rock this" and let your confidence shine through. So many complements. Pro-tip: double sided tape is your best friend. The ladies stayed put all night.

links_reviews_title: This dress was elegant & gorgeous. So many compliments received. My husband smiled at me all night.
links_reviews_text: We attended a black tie wedding and this dress made me look and feel like a movie star. It was comfortable and fit very well. The plunging neckline a bit too showy for me so I pinned it and it was perfect. I received many compliments and I I'd wear this again in a heart beat. My husband complimented me all night. Even the gorgeous bride said I looked stunning. Winner of address!

links_reviews_title: This dress was exactly what I needed.
links_reviews_text: While the dress fit, I absolutely had to pin the top. I have a short torso, long legs, so the deep cut v just sat wide open on me because of the extra length between waist and shoulder. (If I pulled up on the shoulders, it would have sat fine) Fashion tape would not have cut it, but pinning it fixed it and I got many compliments. I loved the necklace I rented to go with it as well and I wore a navy blue wrap which was great and a perfect compliment to the orchid color. From other reviews, I was expecting to use hem tape, but my tall shoes were tall enough and the dress length wasn't a problem.
This dress exceeding all my expectations! It was very flattering and I received so many compliments all night long!
I rented as a back up and ended up wearing to a black tie wedding. The color was much prettier than I was expecting. The fabric is nice and very comfortable and forgiving. Would def recommend.

links_reviews_title: I'm 19 weeks pregnant and this dress fit like a glove and flattering. Exactly as I envisioned it.
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. I'm carrying kind of small on my petite frame as it is but people kept remarking how they couldn't tell I was pregnant. The knot in the front kind of camouflaged the bump. From the side you could tell! But not straight on. The color is stunning. I'm 5'2", about 133 lbs now. The 4R length was a tad long but not bad once I had 3 inch heels on. The 2P was too snug at this point. The neckline is plunging but nothing a stitch or pin can't help with. After pinning it, I was able to wear a regular bra. And I've got a small bust. Great success overall! Thanks RTR :-)
I didn't end up wearing this to my event but it was a close second. Very comfortable but also very low cut.

links_reviews_title: Fun and sexy for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, easy to wear regular bra with! Flattering v neck, ruching in the waistline is forgiving, and I love the slit in the front, easy for dancing. I wore 4 inch heels at 5'4 and the length was perfect.

I felt beautiful in this dress! The color compliments my skin tone (olive) and it hugged me in the right places. I don't have big tatas so it was no problem not to wear a bra. I do have a big booty so it was tight in that aspect, but it was the right kind of tight!!

Dress definitely fits true to size. At 5'4 the regular was a perfect length - I wore 3" heels. Very low cut, but not inappropriate with my boobs (34C) - might be inappropriate if you are very busty. Also, because it's so low cut I couldn't wear a bra - I didn't need one though. Slit in the front was sexy. Back was high and simple - which balanced out the front - low cut, slit and bunching. I wasn't a huge fan of the bunching - although very flattering around the mid section - it left kind of a pouch directly below over the pelvic region.

Beautiful color! Wore this with aquamarine earrings. Awesome color combo. Little more cleavage than I would have wanted since this was for a gala and I was representing my company. Only part I was dissatisfied with was the front twist. Would have preferred for that part to be tighter. Felt a little like a kangaroo pouch (large exaggeration but first thing that came to mind!). Overall, would recommend!

Love love love this dress! Boob/bra tape was definitely necessary but the color was absolutely beautiful. The 6 fit but the 8 was just a little more comfortablr for walking/sitting. I wojld definitely rent it again.
Loved this dress. Its very comfortable. Very low cut i used double stick tape to try to avoid exposure.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a def eye catcher! If you want to be seen this is the dress for you!
links_reviews_text: I had reservations about it at first. I decided to go outside my bubble & go for it! It is very lowcut for sure so its best to make sure it fits correctly or have tape. I am inbetween sizes so the 8 fit perfectly up top but was a little too tight for me in the hips so I decided to wear the 10 instead. Front view I had no problem but side view, im very self conscious about my mid section & felt the way the twist laid on me brought more attention to that area, however, I wore a shaw all night to camouflage it. Overall it was a beautiful dress & I was complimented all night on it!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit great, there is a low neckline which if you have a small chest it lays beautifully
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color in a sea of black dresses

Generally I'm a size 8-10, but the 10 I barely got zipped. Luckily my order arrived a few days early and I had time to re-order the larger size which thankfully fit! I have a full B cup and a pretty wide rib cage - forewarning for the busty ladies out there, this dress may not be for you! I was a little uncomfortable with how low down the right side of the dress fell on my chest. It was a conservative wedding and I found myself pulling it up quite a bit. That being said, everything else fit wonderfully with the size 12. The length is perfect, not too modest but conservative enough for a wedding, very flowy and comfortable material. The best part was I didn't even have to wear a bra!

links_reviews_title: Baby shower hostess dress!! Got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Baby shower hostess dress!! Got lots of compliments It was a little tight under the arms

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress. Odd fit in the busy
links_reviews_text: This dress was very pretty and photographed well. But the top kept rolling down despite it being snug in the bust. If I were a bit taller this likely wouldn't have been a problem. It was light and breezy at a hot Atlanta summer wedding.

I sized up for this dress, but if you're busty you may need to go up 2 sizes. This dress is very flattering, especially if you're pear shaped like me and it will work well if you're on the taller side. I received several compliments throughout the evening. Thanks RTR for another win!

Flowy and soft dress. I will say, maybe I should have used fashion tape around the armpit area/sleeveless side- because it ran a little big for me in that area, when sitting or slouching the wrong way. Would have taped it to my bra, so there's no gap- maybe its from it being a thin/ soft material. Wore it for an early April wedding.

This dress is gorgeous! However, the cut is very strange. I originally tried on the 4 and the arm hole on the one-shoulder side was so tight that it actually caused the waistline of the dress to be crooked across my body. I wore the 6 to my event - the arm hole was still really tight but it was at least better than the 4. Unfortunately the compromise was that the bust of the dress was too big for me, so I ended up having to pull it up every few minutes. I still got loads of compliments though!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for hosting a bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Beautiful floral print, loved the off-shoulder and ruffle cut, length is longer and very modest. Fit slightly large but I would say I wouldn't have risked going down to a size 4.

The bust was proportionally bigger than the bust but overall the dress fit well! I really liked the one shoulder but a small chested girl would need fashion tape. Great flirty dress to dance the night away!!

I am usually a size 10 in dresses, and I wore a 10..i but with a price. The bodice was very tight, making it hard for me to take deep breaths throughout the night. Why did I choose to suffer, you may ask? Because I didn't like the fit of the 12; it was too large in the bodice, and because of this, the side not supported by the strap hung strangely. That being said, the fabric flowing over the bodice did hide the strain of the fabric, and I loved the skirt. It was very forgiving for my lower belly.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, was a little small but not too small!
links_reviews_text: hint- if you tuck the top of the skirt into the waistband a bit (don't know if you can tell from the picture) it will make it shorter! Stayed up through dancing and jumping!

The 6 fit my waist but there was no chance for my chest. The 8 wasn't available as a backup so I went for the 10. It was def a bit too big but I threw the belt on and it was perfect. It was super comfortable and I got a bunch of compliments. I recommend this dress 100%. It's true to size unless your bust is bigger, then go with a size up!

I rented this for my best friend's bridal shower and received many compliments. It was true to its size, however, the shoulder was a bit snug, which made it fairly difficult to reach my arm upward without feeling the material strain. It was a beautiful color and it was so fitting for a daytime event. Would certainly recommend this darling dress!

links_reviews_title: Not perfect, but a fun dress to dance the night away!
links_reviews_text: I’m a solid 2 but very busty and this dress was pretty good. A little tight underneath my chest but I was happy with the cleavage coverage. I did have to secure the strapless side to my bra because it slipped a bit, and if your arms are on the bigger side, it will be very tight on the “strap” side - my arms are pretty small and it was a wee bit tight. Overall, a cute dress that felt very feminine and was fun to dance in!!!

This was a beautiful dress and fit perfectly with botanical garden wedding location. Like most reviewers have said it was on the small side even though I sized up. The sleeve was a slight tight but I got so many compliments.
Zipper was very difficult. Also top felt large as side with no sleeve seemed to fall a bunch. Waist area and above felt a bit tight. Overall nice dress

links_reviews_title: The dress is very light and breezy which was fun.
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress - the length is about 1-2 inches longer than I would have liked but as soon as I got to the party i completely forgot about that! Wore this to a wedding shower and it was perfect for that light summer feel.

links_reviews_title: Prefect Girls Night Out Dress - Pre-Broadway Showing
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a girls night to go see the pre-broadway showing of the "Moulin Rouge Musical" in Boston. The dress was perfect! It was so light and flowy (which was needed as it was SO hot out that night!) and I felt so comfortable in it! I will say it was a little tight in my rib cage area when I went to try it on, but when I had my spanxs on, it felt fine. I will definitely be renting this again! Its my new favorite.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little small in the chest/bust area!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Both the 12 and the 14 fit, but I ended up wearing the 14 because I couldn't sit and breathe in the 12. I did have to pin the strapless side of the 14 to my bra because that part was a bit too large.
I loved this dress, it was flattering, and tight in all the right places. It was a little tight around the waist. Height wise was great! I'm 5"1 and it wasn't too long. It flows beautifully!

I loved the dress. The pattern and the cut were amazing. Length was just right. Tight around the busy area for me I'm 36DD and did 16. I'd go up a size and take advantage of that 2nd size option. I did notice it wrinkled a bit from sitting at the ceremony and dinner. I really loved it.

This dress definitely runs small. I am a solid size 8 in almost every RTR designer. I could fit into the 8, but it was tight in the rib cage and armpit area. 10 fit much better though a tiny bit big by the chest area, but my padded strapless bra filled in the space perfectly. The dress fabric and pattern is beautiful and very spring/summery. I loved the off the shoulder look. The dress was very comfortable to dance and move around in. I paired it with nude heels and pink and silver jewelry. I received several compliments on the dress. I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Danced in this beautiful summer dress all night!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a friend's wedding. This dress is gorgeous in person - beautiful flower prints, flowy, and so comfortable! They do run a little bit small though. I read other reviews and sized up but still had some trouble zipping the dress. Overall, it was an amazing dress. I highly recommend it!

I rented this dress for a friend's shower, so I wanted something flowery and trendy without standing out on her day. The top is tight if you're busty, I went through a few strapless bras before getting the right fit on top. Wasn't the most flattering for my body type, but I was still happy with it.
Really comfortable dress. Very flattering fit and easy to wear. Nice abstract floral design.

I really liked this dress. I'm 6'1'' and it hit perfectly above my knee. I'm normally a 12 and I wore a 14. The rib cage area fit perfectly but the bust was a little big(38 C). I had to use a safety pin to make sure my bra didn't peek out. I also added a belt because it needed a little something.

It was longer than I thought it would be, but I really enjoyed wearing it because I felt really pretty going to see Hamilton. The information below is my mom's information so it is not accurate, if you're looking to see how it would look on you, I'm 5' 7", 140 lbs and usually a size 4-6.

I wore this to a wedding for an east coast couple held in a barn in North Carolina; it was perfect. I needed something that wasn't black or too dressy (I make the point of the east coast crowd because it was a little dressier than most NC weddings I think) and this hit the mark. The fabric is so light and flowy and the print is so pretty. There is no stretch to the fabric so make sure you account for that. I wore the 8 (I used to be a six, so I guess I am a small 8 but I need to stop eating). That said, I thought this dress was very flattering. Also, I am only 5'1", consider myself petite, and thought this worked perfectly (I would say it was tea length on me). I wore it with neutral shoes, another rtr piece, (my Veda leather jacket that I am seriously considering buying) and beautiful Turkish earrings that I borrowed from a friend. Sorry the one shoulder wasn't visible, it was cold! I wore the dress with a strapless bra and was plenty comfortable. I would consider renting again for sure.

I needed a dress for a wedding in the Charleston October heat but would also still be a little fall and this dress was perfect. I would recommend a spanx if you're a little curvy, like me, but I did not wear bra. The length was just below my knees and the waist was a little tight, but it was good as it held everything securely . I would rent again.

Beautiful one shoulder floral dress! While this dress runs small and there is no stretch to the fabric, I would size up in this. A strapless bra should be worn due to the one shoulder cut at the top. This works best for A to C bust sizes. It is fitted in the natural waist but there is comfortable room in the hips. I would pair this with nude heels and simple earrings since there is a lot going on with the print of this dress.
The dress fit rather true to size. It was flowy and light weight. The pattern is gorgeous! I got so many compliments and felt beautiful. Couldn't ask for a better rental.
The dress was really comfortable and I got a lot of compliments but it runs small in the rib cage and chest. If you are larger in chest area, definitely size up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful look for a warm, outdoor fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: PROS: Beautiful, quality fabric and pattern. This dress worked very well for a formal outdoor wedding for a family member. It was appropriate for a family occasion, yet still a fun party dress. I received many complements and would rent it again for another occasion! CONS: Runs very small. I could barely squeeze into the size 2, and would have liked to try a size 4 for comparison. It was very tight around my chest, shoulders, and underarms but worked out okay for the evening - not uncomfortable, just very snug. I also wish it was just a tad shorter. The length was a little bit awkward on me (I'm 5'4"). The length would probably be great for someone a few inches taller.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pattern and design made for a stunning dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress has a great fitted bodice with a relaxed skirt. The material was extremely comfortable and was easy to move around it. This is a great pick if you aren't sure what size to wear as both the 4 and 6 were flattering sizes in this cut.

The print is GORGEOUS. Very comfortable for an outdoor wedding in Texas in September. Goes great with flats or heels. I wore a 0, the size 2 was unavailable for a backup size. If you're bigger in the bust, I'd definitely get a size up for your backup. It fit but it was a little tight up top, especially after eating BBQ. (I guess I was having too much fun to get a good photo :/. I managed to snag one in the bridal suite.)

I wish I would have ordered a size up! I usually wear between a 2 and 4 and the 4 was a little too snug. It was a little tight up too but the length was great. Regardless, it was still very comfortable to wear all day and was nice and flowy! Also loved the pattern.

I loved this dress for our engagement party! For me it ran a little small through the waist. I ordered the 12 and 14 and went with the 14 to be more comfortable. Print is gorgeous as well as he feel of the fabric.

If you have a large bust, order 2 sizes up and plan on using a belt. I ordered a 4 and 6. 4 is my typical size. The 6 I could barely zip without a bra. The non-shoulder side came up high enough to cover which is sometimes a problem for my bust, but it was just TIGHT. I'm a 30GG/32G. 28 inch waist and 40 inch hips. The waist was perfect, hips perfect, bust was admittedly way too small. I probably would have worn this if I had ordered an 8 (I'm literally never an 8 in anything).

links_reviews_title: very pretty pattern and lightweight fabric, the length is perfect, not short
links_reviews_text: a bit tight in the chest/upper ribcage for me
Small fit. Make sure you order 1 size bigger. It's a nice dress though.

links_reviews_title: Made for people with no rib cage or chest
links_reviews_text: This dress was TINY in the chest and rib cage. Even 2 sizes up, I could barely zip it and then had to decide between standing all night or breathing. Braless, as an A cup, it was too tight. Thank you to RTR for overnighting an alternate look. This was just not made for me. If you have a larger lower half and a tiny upper half, this would work and be flattering.

links_reviews_title: Rented for date dress, wore to work
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a fun date, when I realized the peek a boo cut out hides well I added a blazer and wore to work. Colors are fantastic. Holds you in nicely.
Great fit, super comfy and I love the cutout detail!
I wore this to a concert date night with my boyfriend. He really liked it and strangers also gave compliments. The material is very thin.

Shows every curve and color is really pretty. Has a little stretch and fabric is thin. Don't rent this for dancing/ moving a lot as the tightness in the shoulders and cut prevents lots of overhead arm movement.
Fits perfectly. Super comfortable!
Rented this for date night and received so many compliments:) the colors are beautiful for fall!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a New York Fashion Week party!
links_reviews_text: The paisley print looks looks brand new when paired with the sexy silloette and cutouts in this dress!

I love this dress so much. The material is thinner than I expected but the pattern hides anything that might normally be revealing with thin material. I was worried it was too long for my 5'3" frame but with heels it looks gorgeous, not sure a shortie like me could pull it off with flats.

Form fitting dress with lightweight fabric and funky print. I wasn't sure about this dress but I rocked it to the office and everyone seemed to like it. I covered the peep hole when I was in office to make it a little more appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Snug fit especially on the booty
links_reviews_text: I sized up usually I'm a 0 and I went with the 2 Very thin material no lined I liked this dress though it was conservative yet sexy at the same time Also loved the colors and light material!

links_reviews_title: Fitted in all the right places! Got compliments all night!!
links_reviews_text: I had a party at my synagogue, so the cut out didn't really work, but I loved the print and how it fit everywhere else, so I put a few safety pins on the inside, wore a slip, belted it, and we were off to the races! The fit is great, the fabric has a decent amount of stretch, and it is so comfortable!
Loved the sexy cut out, fall colors and stretchy material but yet fitted cut. The material was slightly itchy/irritating but manageable considering how cute it was.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: Lightweight fabric great stretch and fit

links_reviews_title: Sexy, beautiful color, perfect for athletic build
links_reviews_text: Rented for a date and showed up late. Dying to get to the next item on my unlimited list. Will definitely rent again in size 8 for a tad more comfort. The opening was placed in such a way that you could hide it for a more conservative event. Beautiful color, light fabric with lots of give. Hugged all the right curves.
This dress fit perfectly and I got so many compliments! Love love love love!!!!

After packing a carry-on sized bag for a two week city/beach/vacation/work trip, I ended up having three additional days of meetings and picked this up out of desperation. The material is a bit thin for work and the size was a little large (they only had a 4) but since I usually wear a 0 it seems to run small. I wore a cami underneath to cover the cutout but imagine it would be flattering without. It was really comfortable. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I was hosting and this dress was versatile, comfortable and sexy!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a fit body. I didn't experience the usual riding up at the skirt with my large hips.
Very flattering fit. Classy with an edge. Very happy.
Great fit super comfortable for a day at Keeneland horse races!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit; works for any occasion. The slit in the front adds just the right amount of character.
links_reviews_text: Dress ran true to size. Wore this to a New Years house gathering; wasn't too dressy or too casual. Would work perfect for any occasion.

Loved this dress for a date night in Vegas. It was super comfortable and traveled well with no wrinkling. The material is thin, but I didn't have any problems with it being sheer. Great dress! I highly recommend it.

I absolutely LOVED this dress as I wore it to my husband's work holiday party! Very form fitting but so comfortable and flattering. The slit across the upper ab area added a very sexy and trendy aspect to the dress. I have an athletic build and it hugged all of my curves- bootylicious! I wore a size 2 which is what I normally wear in dresses so it fit true to size. The fabric is soft and stretchy so I could move freely and was just extremely comfortable in this dress. I want to buy this dress that is how much I loved wearing it! I received a ton of compliments too.

links_reviews_title: Classy and Sassy at the same time
links_reviews_text: Wonderful fit. Traveled well without wrinkling. Worn to an evening affair in DC. It was conservative enough but still a bit sassy.

links_reviews_title: An awesome dinner accompanied with an awesome dress!
links_reviews_text: This is a form fitting dress with a perfectly placed cut out for someone who has an athletic chest and arms. The fabric was stretchy, light and comfortable, for someone who worries about a fitted skirt for my pear shape. I wore a size smaller (2) than normal, since my normal size 4 was not available at the store. The colors and patterns are great for a special fall occasion-I would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, but not a $90.00 rental.
links_reviews_text: I was worried about the cut out, but it was surprising modest given the sleeves and length of the dress. This dress fit well and I received compliments all night, but its not a $90.00 rental. There are better dresses to rent for that amount of money. Its unlined and too informal for an evening event. Its more suited to a casual affair.

links_reviews_title: My favorite fall dress thus far!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect ! Fall colors were amazing! I want this dress in my closet all the time! So many compliments!!!
Fits great! Thin material but has a little stretch. The cut out makes it look like a two-piece. Perfect for my birthday party!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a friends jewelry boutique opening in London. I looked extra gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 10 with size 12 backup. They did not have the 10 available so sent the 12 and a replacement dress which did not suit my body. Luckily the 12 looked amazing! I'm broad hipped and broad shouldered with a big round butt and 36C bust, I do not have slender arms- this dress complimented me extremely well. The peekaboo opening was in a great area- the dress is form fitting and the length could potentially make it a conservative dress, but the window of flesh and my height with heels made the length very sexy. Everyone raved over the dress. The pattern is unique! I paired the dress with a rent the runway glitter clutch and gold three ringed necklace. I want to own this dress in all available colors!

links_reviews_title: Loved it and received compliments for sure!
links_reviews_text: Fit very well Material is light and soft Beautiful length I'm 5'6
Super comfortable while remaining stylish and chic! I want this dress in my permanent wardrobe:-)

This is a pencil dress, just with paisley print and a cut out. It isn't that special but you don't get any unpleasant surprises. It is not lined and the fabric is thin. I generally like pencil dresses and I liked this fine. Basically if you know how you fit in a pencil dress - that's how you'll look and fit in this.

I received a lot of compliments on this dress. Great color and print. The fabric is more thin/spandex than I expected. I thought it would have been better quality fabric for the price. But the fit was nice and I liked the length also. I fit into both the 4 and the 6, but ended up wearing the 6 for the length and comfort.
I wore this both for thanksgiving and for a work event. Love the fit and the peekaboo on the ribs
The fit was snug but it was very flattering. you can pull the skirt higher to show less skin. I liked it more like a peek than a lot of tummy. Overall loved

links_reviews_title: The fit was killer - supper sexy yet still sophisticated.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a holiday party with pantyhose and black ankle booties and felt like a million bucks. Note, I am smaller chested, small waist, but large hip area and the stretch on this dress was great. The fabric is pretty thin/lightweight, so wearing hose helped me feel extra comfortable and warm enough.
The fit and print of the dress is fun but still classy. It's form-fitting and forgiving at the same time. Great dress for a party or date night out.

links_reviews_title: Thin fabric which is not as flattering without Spanx but beautiful print!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable but the thin fabric needed the undergarments. Super beautiful and the gap isn't as big as on the model. Accentuated the right curves and received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress is very flattering in all the right places
links_reviews_text: It showed just a bit of skin on me and I would say showed every curve but not in a clingy uncomfortable way. It was very comfortable. I wore it with a blazer to work one day with heels and out for a date with booties and it was amazing! I will rent this again.
Surprisingly flattering for such a curve hugging, light fabric. I did not end up wearing to my party because I had a different option that was more festive for the occasion.
I wore this dress for a date night and out with the girls. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to my secret wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress has silver embroidery on it which is just gorgeous. It has pockets which was one of my favorite things. I wore this to our secret wedding and I wish I could keep it!! I will warn you it runs really small. I'm 5'3.75" and 138 pounds and usually a 6 I had to wear a 10. I just had a baby 3 weeks ago so needed more space in the top due to breastfeeding boobies. So it runs really small up top. It's a beautiful dress!!
This is a super cute dress... but just not my style. High quality, well made, and comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: It was white Christmas theme Dress and it was perfect!!!
links_reviews_text: I usually were a 8 worn the 10 fit better !! Love it and it was Beautiful!!

I rented this dress for a last minute event and it did not disappoint. Although the fit is a bit snug in the bust the A line design is very flattering. I initially ordered the wrong size and RTR was gracious enough to send me another size overnight!

This dress has a lovely metallic sheen that doesn’t show in the photos. The only con was a stubborn zipper. I had to have my brother’s girlfriend follow me in the bathroom and struggle with the zipper. I almost thought we couldn’t escape .

It looks nice on a small waist with big hips, but I think the pockets just added extra volume to my hips that I didn't like. Rented with. Few other options for my bridal shower and I went with something else.

Wore it for the after-party of my wedding and it was the perfect compliment to my actual wedding from earlier that day. Fit was true to size. Fabric was a bit heavier than anticipated but moved and breathed well

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my wedding shower, I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Well, this funny/awful/terrifying thing happened...I spilled Taco Bell cheese sauce on it! Talk about PANIC mode. BUT, I took it right to the sink, rinsed it and it came right out! I did not expect that to happen! I couldn’t even guess what material this is but talk about AMAZING! Also, pockets!

I rented this dress for my bridal shower because it looked stunning on the photos of girls on here. I did read that it ran small so I went with my normal size and up a size. Unfortunately I found out just 24 hours before it was going to be sent out that they couldn't provide a back up size that I wanted. So I had to stay with the 4, which proved to be a little too tight and the way it sat, it made a 120 lb girl look a bit pregnant. I would have wore the 6 if it was sent to me. Other than that, it was a nice dress

Definitely runs small. The fabric is thick with no give whatsoever. I've worn both size 4s and 6s from RTR but even the 6 in this was a bit snug. The detail on the fabric is beautiful and the thread glitters. The pockets were super convenient and it was very comfortable overall. So glad I rented a dress instead of buying one! Wore a regular bra and had to keep pushing my straps out of sight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for our rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing, I was sad to ship it back! Everything about it was great- the fit, the quality of fabric, the beautiful silver sheen to the dress (photos do not do it justice.) AND the dress has pockets! Easy to move in, super fun to swirl around and overall the perfect dress for anything wedding related that the bride wants to stand out in! I would highly highly recommend! #soglamorous #weddingrehearsaldinner

links_reviews_title: Great dress for bridal shower, but runs a little small.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my bridal shower, and it ran a little small. You can see it pulls by my chest. It was slightly uncomfortable all night, and hard to do karaoke because of the tightness on my rib cage lol. I'd definitely go one size up than your usual! Otherwise, it was a great, beautiful, white dress!!!

links_reviews_title: I decided during the week of my wedding I wanted a white dress for my rehearsal & RTR saved the day!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear to my rehearsal dinner. I loved the sparkle it had and the photos I saw in other reviews. I did see how in some reviews it said it was tight in the lower bust area and that was so true. It's kind of weird the dress zipped fine and wasn't tight but the band below the bust was super tight. I loved the overall look of the dress though so I chose to wear this one and I loved it along with everyone else!

Loved the fit of this dress, material and POCKETS!! The fit was true to my size but I ordered one size up just in case. Delivery was on time and amazing. I received tons of compliments at my Bridal Shower. #HappyBride

I wore this for my bridal shower! This was a replacement dress as the one I ordered looked horrible. I should have gone with this dress to begin with! It was simple, yet elegant and fun. The flared skirt is flattering and it has pockets! The material is subtly sparkly- it's almost as if there is silver thread woven into the dress. I received so many complements. I felt very pretty in this dress and it was the perfect dress for my event.

links_reviews_title: Shimmery, but not over the top
links_reviews_text: This dress was a last-minute replacement for my bridal shower, but it wound up being a great fine! The material is not too heavy, but more formal than a sundress. It also has very subtle shine that my photo captures. The dress also has pockets which is a huge win. Lastly, the straps were wide enough that my armpit boobs were not noticeable. My only downside is that I was unable to zip it myself as the zipper didn't want to budge where the fabric orientation changed, I genuinely would not have been able to zip it without help, but once I got help it zipped no problem.

The dress did look a little dingy when putting it on but it looks nice on. The arm holes are a bit small and did rub a line into my spray tan. The bust and middle is a little tight, probably better without a bra but no thanks.

I got countless compliments on this dress. It was thick enough, so that I didn't have to worry about what I was wearing underneath. Very flattering cut. Only con was it was super fitted at the smallest part of my waist. It barely zipped and was uncomfortable through my waist. I wish I would have sized up. I'm typically between a 4 and 6.

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress that makes a figure look great
