links_reviews_text: Fit was tight, I normally wear a size 4 but had to wear 6. The dress was pretty comfortable except after about 3 hours the material around my armpits started to rub and hurt my skin.

Wow. Love this dress. It's so flattering and is true to size. It has pockets which was great for the party I rented it for on the beach because I only bought my phone with me. Super flattering and tons of compliments! I wore it with DressStrong.com's DressWeights since it was a windy beach day and the dress will definitely fly up since the hem is so flowy. They're awesome for dresses like this!

I could NOT find a dress for my (second) wedding that was worth spending money on, and after returning at least ten different maybes and with just a week till the big day, a friend recommended RTR. I found this dress and it was PERFECT. It fit amazingly well, was even more glamorous irl than in the photos (silverish thread made it feel way fancy for a short dress), and it arrived with two days to spare. Plus: pockets;) Wish I could've kept it forever.

I wore this dress at our courthouse wedding yesterday and couldn't be happier! I had to order a size smaller than usual because mine wasn't available, but it was fine. I paired it with a dark grey belt and dark grey heels and it was perfect. The details of the dress don't pick up in the photos. It's actually much nicer in person.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful texture, but runs a bit big
links_reviews_text: I found that this dress ran a little large in the top, but the waist fit well and the skirt was a good length. I'm 5'1" and it hit right above the knee on me. The fabric is beautifully textured and there is silver thread woven in throughout the fabric so it shimmers in the light. Overall it has more of a blue or grey tone than a warmer, ivory so be aware of that if you're planing to wear for wedding related events with ivory shoes or accessories. I would recommend, just giving it 4 instead of 5 for the fit and the skirt seemed to hang a little droopy from wear. Great for brides!

links_reviews_title: Well-made and luxe dress for wedding brunch
links_reviews_text: So many women have rented this dress for a wedding-related event and there is a good reason why...it's very cute, flattering, and swishes around in a fun way. The material is a thicker patterned/textured brocade, but probably could be worn any season. Felt sturdy and well-made. I accessorized with a silver belt to give the waist some definition. I more often wear a size 6 dress (on RTR and in real life too) but the size 8 fit perfectly on this, so I would say if you're between sizes order up, especially if you have a C/D+ chest. I would also use the word "demure" to describe this dress...as in, it's not a "sexy" dress but very charming for a shower or a wedding breakfast. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Super cute for my bridal shower! So much prettier in person than online. The embroidery sparkles.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove! So comfy, not too long or too short. Pockets were awesome. The zipper was a bit hard to get up because of the way it is constructed, and you can tell others had trouble with it because the finish had been worn off. I was wearing my hair down so I wasn't super concerned about it. Got a lot of compliments!

I rented this dress for my husband's very fancy work Christmas party. The pictures really don't do this dress justice, it is gorgeous and the slight silver in the fabric just makes it subtly sparkle. The pockets were amazing, I could fit my phone, keys, lipstick, and ID in there and no one was the wiser. I kid you not, I got a couple dozen complements throughout the night including a stranger yell from across the entire large hotel lobby, "OH MY GOD does that dress have POCKETS?! That is the most amazing dress I've ever seen!!' I was 4 months pregnant at the time and though people knew, I was still in that awkward "Is she just getting chubby?" stage so I wanted something to hide my mini bump. This dress was perfect! I could eat all I wanted and get bloated and no one could tell. I found it ran a bit tight. I'm normally a size 4 with a small chest but I barely squeezed in the size 6. My preggo boobs hadn't come in yet so I'm not sure I can blame them either. Besides that, this dress was what dreams are made of.

I rented this dress for a sorority date party and it was so comfortable all night! The material was really nice and the dress fit well. I ordered expecting to wear the 8, but ended up wearing the 10 because the 8 didn't have much give in the bust. After wearing it for around 4 hours it did get a little tight around the rib cage but overall a great dress!

links_reviews_title: I truly felt like a princess. Oh, and pockets!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my bridal shower and I absolutely loved it! The synched waist and the flared skirt were super flattering for my curvy figure. The silver flowers are really a beautiful, elegant touch, and help so you don't feel washed out in white. Needless to say, I did not want to change out of this dress!

The pictures do not do this dress justice. The shimmer on this was so beautiful! I wore this for my engagement party and it was very bride-y. It was extremely comfortable; I was able to easily participate in some backyard games while wearing it.

I loved this dress and was so happy to have rented it. I didn't have a need for all of these white dresses after the year of my wedding so renting was perfect. It was SO fun to spin in and I felt so glamorous

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my wedding rehearsal and dinner!
links_reviews_text: This was flattering and comfortable - and it has pockets! I could have worn the 8 but the 10 was just a little more comfortable. The evening was a little more chilly than expected so a cardigan was nice to have - other than that this dress was beautiful! Simple but still special.
I am so in love with this dress I bought it to wear to my shower as well! It is gorgeous and so flattering. I got so many compliments.

This dress was even better in person! I wore it for my bridal shower and felt like a princess. The pockets were a great extra touch. It was very comfortable. I usually go between a 4 and a 6 but this dress is a little tight in the waist so I went with the 6. I would highly recommend this for any bride!
This dress was comfortable and very appropriate for my rehearsal dinner. The silver embroidery was beautiful and a little surprising! I was very glad I picked it.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT dress for my Bridal Shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my bridal shower brunch and it was perfect in every way. The lace detail and slight shimmer is a beautiful touch and I loved having the pockets. I got so many compliments on this dress and would have purchased to own it if I could. I ordered a 4 and a 6 (normally a 4) and ended up wearing the 6. It is a little snug in the bust and waist area so size up just in case. I HIGHLY Recommend this dress.

I wore this for my bridal shower and it was PERFECT! The material is thick and excellent quality. The dress has silver threading throughout it, and it is so shimmery. The pictures do not do it justice. Everyone loved it!
It was beautiful, fit perfect, so comfortable and had pockets!! I felt amazing in it and would order again in a heart beat.

links_reviews_title: Love the texture/pattern of the dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my husband and I's second wedding anniversary. It had a bit of stretch, which was nice. And pockets, which are always a huge plus! Would be perfect for a bridal shower!
I wore for engagement brunch and it fit like a glove. Compliments galore. Pulled my hair back and like a classy ballerina! Sort of a plain design but very flattering.

This was my second choice for my bridal shower, but I'm glad it came when my first wasn't available. The dress was beautiful and perfect for a cool, rainy bridal shower. The material was heavy enough that I wasn't chilly, but appropriate enough for a May shower. I wore it with a ribbon around my waist to differentiate my waistline, but it would have been nice without it too.

links_reviews_title: Look how cute! And how short!
links_reviews_text: I first saw this dress about six years ago, and fell in love with it at first sight. I was so excited to finally get to wear it, I had the perfect shoes and the perfect accessories picked out. And then it looked so cute! It gave me a really nice shape, who was lightweight, and had a skirt that is perfect for dancing. And then I turned around. It's so short. The dress is not designed for someone who has ample bottoms. I thought about flattening the tulle myself, and realized even if I gently steamed down all the tulle, layer by layer, I still wouldn't be able to fit in more than an inch over my butt. I was so so so so so so sad. But alas, it is what it is. I will say this dress will probably flatter someone who has a bigger chest than I do, there was more than enough room and then neck line wouldn't reveal too much cleavage.
I got my usual size 4 and a 2 based on reviews. I wore the 2 and it fit perfectly. It was a bit shorter than I was expecting but not too short. Got tons of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for what I thought was my bridal shower and turned out to be a surprise bachelorette!
links_reviews_text: I have been wanting to rent this dress for years, it was my first rental from RTR and I could not happier! Y’all this dress is a dream, fits amazing, comfortable and makes you feel royal. If you’re contemplating, doooo it!
Attended a wedding in Paris and loved this dress. Highly recommend.
I loved this dress! It was a bit short on my because i have curves but not short to were I could not wear it. Loved it !

This was my emergency replacement sent to me via overnight because my original dress was delayed by UPS. Thanks for RTR Concierge for coming through! I loved the delicate lace and the fluffy tule built in petticoat! I received lots of compliments. The dress was very comfortable, the sleeves weren't too tight and I could easily move my arms in this dress.

links_reviews_title: The color and lace were perfect for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and lace on this dress. The sleeves were a bit large but not enough for it to bother me. The dress was perfect to dance in and hit right above my knees. I wore a strapless bra and didn’t have to worry about the straps showing on my shoulders or in the back as the dress is a little low cut in the back. I received many compliments wearing this dress.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress and a really nice color!
links_reviews_text: Dress is very flattering in the tummy area, since the material is a little thicker.
It fit really nicely and had a lovely silhouette. I just hated that the lace wouldn't lie flat on my chest. Sorry for the close up on cleavage but I wanted to show what I mean!
I LOVE this dress! It's light and gorgeous and delicate and perfect. I always have issues with dresses because of my full bust, and this fit perfectly!! I will definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Rustic North Carolina Wedding!
links_reviews_text: Not my typical style but what I love about renting is that you can try a little bit of everything! Super light and comfortable, the fabric was so much softer than I imagined! Dancing the night away was no problem and it made a statement without being over the top!

This dress did run a bit short per the earlier reviews (and I'm 5'2") but it fit great and was very comfortable. I wore it to a western themed fundraiser dinner dance with cowboy boots and it was perfect. Nothing ever fits me without alterations and I couldn't believe how well it worked. I'll for sure use RTR again.

links_reviews_title: The dress was very flattering, the color and cut were perfect.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a bit short, but other than that I loved it.
Perfect fit, very comfortable, great for Spring and Summer weddings!

links_reviews_title: Stood out in the crowd of red and blacks!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my school's winter formal. Got lots of compliments and it felt super soft. I would've wore the size 0 but the bottom of the dress was a bit messed up. Beautiful and easy to dance in!

links_reviews_title: Loved how comfortable, yet pretty I felt!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I am usually about a size 2. I got the 0 and the 2 and ended up wearing the 0. However, if I only had the 2, it would've worked just fine. Perfect for body types like mine; petite, athletic, and somewhat "bottom heavy". I will say that I'm smaller in the chest and it was a little snug there, so beware big booby girls! But, I got compliments all day long. It was very comfortable. Wish I could've kept it. I will be using RTR again!!

Absolutely gorgeous. I would rent it again in a heartbeat. Only thing to consider is that it’s short. My knee is bent in the photo so it doesn’t seem super short but...let’s just say I’m 5’3” and my hubby had to stand behind me to block me from flashing anyone as I got into an Uber. So as someone who is short to begin with, if I felt it was a bit too short...average height and tall women may want to consider that!! Amazing dress overall though.

links_reviews_title: I'm short so it showed off enough leg. Felt pretty. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Luckly had 2 sizes to choice from. Loved the fact that this was a dress picked out for me because they didnt have my other option. I didnt even go with the one i originally picked that i really wanted. This one was so much prettier and fit better
Fit well and was beautiful. Was short but not uncomfortably so. Received many compliments

I wasn't sure about this dress when I first tried it on but once paired with high heels I felt gorgeous and ready to party. I'm only 5' so I wanted a dress I knew wouldn't look too long. I had to be careful not to bend forward to far but otherwise it was a very comfy and fun dress.
So comfortable and fun! Loved the color, the lace, the bottom...looks great with black or nude heels/bag.
Got compliments from absolutely everyone! So comfortable and I felt so adorable in it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Homecoming Dress for a Freshman
links_reviews_text: My daughter ended up wearing the 4 which was our backup size. We had ordered the 2 because others stated it ran a little big. The 2 fit and she could have worn it but it was tight in the shoulders and didn't allow any "dance" Space. (My daughter is a swimmer so she is broad at the shoulders). She wore the back up and it was perfect. She was able to wear a regular bra which is always a plus. The color of this dress is so pretty and different from the dark blues,blacks, and reds most girls wear. She was so comfortable all night in this dress.
This dress was just perfect! It fit true to size, it was comfortable, easy to wear, easy to find what to wear underneath and was perfect for a summer wedding!

I’m a 34D, 5’0” and 120lbs. I usually wear a 4. The 2 fit perfect. I actually must have been able to wear a 0, this had a little room around the waist still, but I have bigger arms so I wouldn’t have had room in the arms to go down a size-no stretch there. The color is gorgeous, pairs well with nude shoes. I actually wore black Spanx underneath and you couldn’t tell, but this was so flattering I really didn’t need them. I wore a normal bra and the straps never showed. It was a tad more low cut than the model makes it look, but still had minimal cleavage. My favorite rental so far! I literally think every woman at the wedding, including many I didn’t even know, came up to me to compliment me on the dress!
It's a bit short, definitely not bending over! I ended up not wearing this dress, but as you can see in the photo- I did end up purchasing the Purple one out right from RTR :)
Love this dress! The fit was amazing! The lace is a bit delicate. The toile is so fun!
This dress was great but a little shorter than I had imagined. I ended up wearing a size 2 instead of a 0 for some additional length.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Comfy and cute
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wedding and I loved it. Very cute and comfortable. True to size. I am petite and this dress even feels short on me but I am ok with that

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a country themed charity event and received compliments from strangers.
links_reviews_text: I love wearing this dress! The dress is prettier in person and it was so comfortable. I would definitely rent this one again! It does run a tad small and short so keep that in mind when selecting sizes.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, a bit short for me
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress except I found it a bit short for my long legs. I felt like I was too old for this dress. Worn to a family wedding. Did the job but probably wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a really short person!
links_reviews_text: I liked the color even more than I expected and the dress fit really well. I thought it might be a little longer on me but it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Dress made me feel sexy and not self concious
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I could wear a regular bra with this dress, which was a plus. Comfortable enough to dance all night. I loved that I could have worn cowboy boots or heels with it. It was a little short, but I just had to be mindful of that. Received many compliments and loves that no one else had the same dress on as me. Only con, it was a little irritating under the arms due to the lace but not unbearable.

This was my back up dress and it was amazing! I felt super comfortable in it all day long! 100% would rent this dress again. I did use sticky tape for the fringe on the neckline to make me more comfortable. True to size fit and complimentary to my curves.

The dress fit like a glove and accentuated all the right places. It was so comfortable and I got so many compliments all night. Only issue was just making sure the tulle wasn't bunched up when I got up or used the bathroom, but otherwise perfect. Would def rent again!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the color and fabric.
links_reviews_text: It was gorgeous! Fit my body really well and comfortable to wear. Love this designer
I'm 5'6 and this dress was too short from behind... glad I tried it on at the store and got an exchange dress

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress with a great fit! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress as a backup after another became unavailable at the last minute, but I ended up LOVING this dress. Fit true to size, it has a pretty neckline and a flirty skirt to it. The skirt is a little short, so I wore spandex underneath just for peace of mind. I had so many people come up to me and tell me my dress was their favorite after the bride's!
Beautiful dress, great fit! A tad short but worked out perfectly. I did have some space in the waist area; however, a smaller size would have been too short.
I received lots of compliments on this dress, very flattering and fun.
I sized down since some reviews said the waist was baggy and it fit just right. I ended up loving this dress and hope to have a reason to rent it again.

Tons of compliments. I got a size L and it was too large around the waist, but wasn't terrible noticeable- just billowed more around the bust. Really loved this dress though, super comfortable but cute!
Didn't wear it. Fit great over all but was a little right in the hips. Just not really my vibe.
The outfit was a bit frumpy (pattern wise) and tight for what I was looking for.

links_reviews_title: A little bunchy in the middle
links_reviews_text: Absolutely adored this dress's pattern, rouching, and slit but there was a little too much fabric in the middle, so I wound up pinning it under my bust for a tighter fit. After that quick fix, it was a perfect fit! One thing a little deceiving in the photos: the slit, with the tie at the top doesn't actually tighten/heighten the slit. It's just a subtle embellishment.

I went with the XL because the L slit was too high. The XL was slightly loose in the belly area but maybe it's supposed to be like that. It made it comfortable to wear all night. The chest area had enough room for a bigger chest and I wore without a bra. The straps do adjust. We went out to dinner and a comedy show and I had people looking all night. I felt sexy in it. The slit was perfect. I put that sally Hansen tanning spray on my legs and put a body glitter on top to make that leg pop like JLO lol (i wish) but it looked much better in person than the photo. Definitely give this dress a try.
Really lovely, flattering, and fun dress. Felt so good in this dress and it really felt special. The slit is really sexy!

links_reviews_title: The perfect slit for a casual day party turned into a fancy night outing
links_reviews_text: Slit is perfect. However, I have very long legs. It may look odd or cut you off at a weird spot if you're shorter. Pattern is pretty and dress is super comfy!

links_reviews_title: Sexy, cute, and comfortable all in one.
links_reviews_text: Sexy: Up-to-there slit and tiny straps. Cute: An adorable floral patter and ribbon detail at slit. Comfortable: Adjustable straps and flowing fabric. 10/10 would recommend if you'd like to feel sexy on a night out in the summertime.

Loved the idea of this dress but it's unfortunately not very flattering on. The bunching in the middle sits very frumpy and the slit is REALLY high so be cautious! Overall did like it and wore it out and about on a Saturday but wouldn't rent again.
Such a fun dress! Perfect for petites and love all the little details. Stretchy in the middle, so great for longer wears. Adjustable straps and very flattering cut.
Was tight in stomach and the top was weird fit. Returned without wearing

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Felt so cute and flirty in it! Wore it for work and out for the night.
links_reviews_text: Fit is very flattering. I do think I could've gotten a size smaller cuz there is a bit of stretch to it.

I loved it so much i wore it twice!! I wore it for date night and then I wore it to brunch with the girls. The material was sweet (if that makes sense) and dainty. The slit took it up a notch and my thigh was like...hello!

I wore this to a wedding shower and it was very comfortable to run around for bridesmaid duties!This dress gives the appearance of a curvier figure because of the bunched waist. The waist was a little big but I was still able to wear it! Totally recommend!

Can be dressed up or down - Wore this for an Italian Street festival with flat slides and plan to wear to dinner and a show this weekend in Chicago with strappy heels. I love it, and husband really loves it! The slit is everything!

Loved this dress! I have a slim waist with big hips and this dress accentuated me in all the right places. The ruching in the belly was super flattering and I got a lot of compliments. If I had to find a complaint, it would be that I had to pull this dress down a lot as it rode up.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a bridal shower and was super cute! The print was great.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit on the larger side especially around the area where there is some extra fabric for the ruching look that made it look a bit baggier/unflattering. Wish it could have been a bit more fitted around the bust and stomach. The slit was a bit higher than I expected so be prepared for that! All in all great dress would get again in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was pretty and I wanted to love it but the fit was weird. The chest had too much fabric and I wasn't so sure about how it hanged around my stomach. But the fabric was nice (didn't wrinkle) and I liked the slit.
Loved this dress. It was so comfortable. I wore a small and I am 5'7 135. It had about 2 inches of fabric when I pinched it in the back. The roughing hides your belly really well.

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern, but not the most flattering around the core.
links_reviews_text: Loose in the stomach, but tighter on the lower back. Good dress for those who want to hide a big bust. Slit is very fun.
Wow I am obsessed with this dress and so tempted to purchase. It fits so well and the pattern is so cute. I got tons of compliments! True to size
Love the pattern, style, and slit! Runs large so size down!

links_reviews_title: I did not like this dress on me. It is a great pattern and cool concept
links_reviews_text: The dress was the perfect length, and the slit was awesome. The top part is very unflattering on me. Made me look wide
I rented a Large which was too big but pretty dress, maybe size down

Really wanted to love this dress... but only liked it. The fit is a little weird. The bust cuts very big, and I am a DD. Prefer the dress to be more on the fitted side, however, was a little baggy. Order 1 size down
Super cute dress. Easy to wear and adorable.
I should have ordered a size down. Looked good from the front but not the side.

As other reviewers have written, the sizing between top and bottom of this dress was odd. The top was very large with excess fabric, and the bottom could have worked due to the rusching but sadly didn't wear this.

links_reviews_title: Felt girly and sexy at the same time.
links_reviews_text: The straps on the dress stay in place, very nice. The slit on the side is quite revealing when you sit down. The top portion of the dress is puffy but it worked well for my large bust. I usually don't like wearing a midi dress but because of the slit, I never felt that it was a midi dress.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an outdoor summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size for the most part. A little larger in the top, slightly tighter in the hips. Straps are adjustable! The slit is sassy but not too high, perfect amount of fun. Very comfortable dress overall.
perfect fit!
This.is.the.best. If you're questioning just order it. Order one size down. It is so cute and I loved it so much I'm going to buy it. Such a cute date night outfit.
I'm a 36C with an hourglass figure and this was too large in the bust. The stomach was oddly baggy and made me appear bulkier than I am. The dress is pretty but I did not wear it due to the fit.

I loved this dress and would rent again. Fit well, I would say it may be a bit short (with the cinched slit) , but if you want to show some leg this is the dress for you! Lightweight material. Beautiful color.
Don't know who it was made for. I wear a 6 so I got a medium. The dress went all the way down to my ankles and had enough material for two of me.

links_reviews_title: It has pockets! Good for work and going out after work.
links_reviews_text: I was worried this dress would be too short and too poofy but it was neither one. It made my body look great and it is solidly made and stays in place. No tugging up or down. Love this dress.

links_reviews_title: Not really as pictured- A bit disappointing
links_reviews_text: The fabric texture is great, and it hugs the waist well. The colors are not as vibrant as in the photograph, and there's some sparkle to some of the red embroidered thread that I hadn't seen in the photographs as well. If you're busty, this dress will smash a bit in the chest, but it's otherwise true to size and flattering. As other reviewers have noted, the pockets are a nice detail.
Flattering shape, print was attractive. Fit nicely.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that I wanted to wear...
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print and fabric. The fit would have been 100% perfect except for the bust area which was just too low cut for me. This dress would be great for someone taller, but not so much for petite gals like me.
I wore this with a swingy black jacket for work and symphony date. It's nice but strangely drab, though there is red glitter in the pattern. Beautiful fabric.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress that is easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing this dress to a Cocktail party because I felt the neckline was too low cut to wear the dress to work with a jacket. I was very comfortable in the dress and the size 2 fit perfectly. The bottom of the dress flared out which provided a flattering shape. However, I wouldn't consider the dress to be a showstopper.

links_reviews_title: The structure of the dress and fit were spot on.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9 I wore flats due to I am 55 years old and thought that it might be a tad short and look shorter with a heal so I opted for a flat seeing I wanted to dress it down for work.
Very weighty dress and a bit low cut. But well made, good fabric and pockets. Runs a bit large!
Nice color

This is a matte screen printed floral fabric, not a metallic or embroidery floral. The colors in real life are muted and almost "dry" looking. Very much an older look and the style is super weighty on the hips w/ the seams and pockets. Weighs you down. Love the cut of the bodice however, which would be gorgeous in another fabric and skirt design.

links_reviews_title: Unexpectedly dowdy on my hourglass figure
links_reviews_text: Lovely fabric and the pockets are great, but it's more of a day dress or very conservative cocktail dress. I was hoping it's give me a nice shape and cleavage but it hit me all wrong. A size 2 might of been better - for reference, I'm typically between a 4 and a 6.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for pear shaped people
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Wore it twice - once to a work event and to a wedding rehearsal dinner. Dress was made really well and very heavy material - received many compliments. Only issue was the chest was really tight and the interior lining rolled out around the cleavage.

very figure flattering. love the pockets and pattern. i'm typically a 4 and found this a tiny bit large all around, wldve been better in a 2 so the top was more held in. there's a slight sheen to parts of the pattern, but nothing too dramatic. fabric a bit thicker so wld be great in the winter. great work dress
Very pretty for evening, wore it to a Kennedy Center event. Tons of compliments, great fit!
The dress is beautiful and the fabric is beyond amazing. I felt like a Million bucks!

I should have paid more attention to the reviews on how the dress fit. I would have been more comfortable in a medium, the arm holes were so large that you could see my strapless bra. I was afraid it would be tight in the chest and ordered up, but it was not. Other than the fit, the dress was a perfect weight for a hot night in the keys. The color was much prettier than in the pictures. Will most definitely rent again, in a medium.

links_reviews_title: So pretty - perfect for a beach party
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, print, and style of the dress. The fabric looked nice but felt casual enough that it wasn't overkill for a beach party. I have a bigger chest so it did bunch a little bit around the armpits, but overall it was great!
A little loose above breasts - but kept hair down to hide the small gapping created Super cute fit for maternity

Dress is ideal for an all you can eat event as it is very loose in the middle and the top portion drapes so your belly isn't hugged. That being said, it could also pass as a maternity dress so isn't exactly a flattering shape. An XS was a bit too big -- both too long and too low in the arm pits (see pic). Can only wear a strapless bra, both racerback and halter straps were visible from the front.
lose fit, but flattering
Great to wear in the warm weather, lots of compliments!
Perfect for any occasion
Dress fit well and was just the right length for me with flats. It was a little too warm for the 95 degree day I wore this dress.
Appropriate for fall in Hawaii. Fabric is on the thin side. Didnt wear a bra. Slit on the side kept it flirty with the neckline being so high.
Loops under armpits are pretty big, be careful if u are small chested. Beautiful print though, more burnt orange than peach/pink though

This dress fit me perfectly. One thing I did was pin the back underneath the top part to give the bottom "skirt" more a tighter fit. If I hadn't done that, the bottom part would've been a little shapeless. Either way though, it looked cute. I didn't have to wear a bra. The material was very breathable. I got a lot of compliments. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner in Puebla, Mexico.

I love this trendy dress by Waverly Grey. Running true to size with room in the midsection and hips, I recommend wearing your true size for you primary and going up a size for your back up. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra, so you should wear a strapless bra. At 5ft , the length hit floor length on me. The color on this dress is very pretty. Pair with a nude shoe and bracelet to complete this look!

Really enjoyed wearing this, it's nice and pretty effortless. There is a extra fabric layer along the top so your stomach area is loose fitting. Nice sized slit in the leg. Fabric does not wrinkle easily, so great to pack if you're planning to travel with it.

I ended up with the XS instead of my usual S/M but it was an incredible fit. Comfortable enough to wear to a birthday picnic but pretty enough to still stand out. And the slit on the side is the icing on the cake - keeps it breezy and shows just enough skin!

links_reviews_title: Great for summer and really flattering
links_reviews_text: Light fabric
Cute. The slit makes it easy to pick up when you're walking but it's still long. Very comfortable but should have sized down because the arm holes are big
The dress was loose and comfortable to wear.

I recommend ordering one full size smaller than your regular size. I am usually a M/L and went with the Medium, but if there had been time, I would have exchanged to a Small. Beautiful warm, terracotta color, that is a bit less orange than photo. Note, the cut at bust and underarm is very low, so you will need a narrow halter bra or a sticky bra.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty dress! Loved the pattern :)
links_reviews_text: It dips a little low on the sides - something to think about with what bra you are wearing.
Perfect for a summer rehearsal dinner. Super comfortable and breezy and not too long to walk in.

I rented this dress for an awards dinner and I'm so glad I did! The fit was perfect. I probably could have sized down, but I'm always nervous about the chest area not fitting. It was a little big, but nothing safety pins couldn't fix! I received a lot of compliments and would rent again for sure.
Pretty color - wore out and about and received many compliments. Something to be aware of - It is very long. I am 5'5 and wore it with 3 inch wedges and it still grazed the floor.

Nice idea, and pretty print, but totally shapeless. The double layer takes away any hint at a waist and just makes you look like you're wearing a shapeless sack. It's also super long - I'm 5'6" and even with heels on I was tripping on it. Not at all like the model's photo with ankle-length.
Was a little too big for me and wasn't a good fit. I didn't wear it.
Size XL was suggested for size 12. The dress was huge and definitely way too long for 5 ft.

Fit: It runs LONG! I'm 5'2" and even the XS with 2" sandals was dragging on the floor. Luckily, this dress has two layers (top and bottom as seen in the photo) so I was able to put on a belt under the top layer and fold some fabric from the bottom layer over it-- voila, instant height adjustment! This also helped cinch the waistline for a more flattering look, and made for a perfect fit! Fabric: It didn't feel like unbreathable polyester, but it wasn't a super airy cotton dress either. A great wear-to-work or brunch piece, I just wouldn't wear it out on a super hot summer's day. Style: Gorgeous, elegant, chic! Got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Not the dress, cute as it is.
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress but--and maybe I'm more sensitive to this--I felt like I was choking and decided not to wear it to what was going to be a really fun (and long) wedding because I knew I wouldn't be comfortable. Others noted that it felt scratchy at the neck. For me it was the tightness--and I don't think I have a particularly big neck. Also I noted that one reviewer pinned it to make the skirt more fitted. That actually would make it more flattering--to tailor the skirt a bit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, fit perfect. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, fit perfect. Lots of compliments!
Wore this to a friends 30th birthday during the day. So pretty and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable for a beach wedding
links_reviews_text: I highly recommend! It was great for a summer wedding on the beach

Couldn't wear this because not only was the XL huge (and plenty of other brand XLs fit me) but it was SO LONG. I'm 5'8" and was going to wear sandals, but even if I wore super high heels, it would still skim the floor. I recommend sizing down in this so it can fit like model.
This dress was really cute but it was huge on me, I'm normally a S/M i would definitely get a small

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but it definitely runs very large.
links_reviews_text: The fabric and print are fun, light and comfortable. That said, you have to be careful with the sizing. I would size down in this one. I ordered my normal size and the dress was huge on me. The arm holes nearly came down to my waist and it looked a little like I was wearing a pink potato sack.

It was just as expected. High neck and could wear strapless bra. There was plenty of room in the mid-section especially for a 5-week baby bump. The slit let the dress flow while dancing on the dance floor, too!

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated maxi for a vacation dinner out.
links_reviews_text: Very easy to wear. The fabric travelled beautifully. I am an apple shape and this was not binding at the midsection, it was very comfortable. I got the Medium as my backup to a large and ended up wearing the medium. My 5'8" 22yo tried on the large but felt her bust wasn't big enough to make the dress look right on her.

I probably could have worn a size Small, but I always size up for my backup size. I had to pin the neck so it wasn't hanging down too much, and the armholes were still pretty large. The bottom portion of the dress doesn't have any shape, so I pinned it back a little as well. The fabric is incredibly light and didn't wrinkle at all, even in an outdoor setting on an 80 degree day after being worn in the car for a couple of hours on the way.

I rented this for a wedding in Palm Springs - the color and print are very nice, but the shape was terrible! I have broad shoulders, so perhaps someone with narrow shoulders would get some definition around the hips. I just looked like I was wearing a giant colorful sack, even in the medium. Order down a size! Luckily my backup dress worked great.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress to my event
links_reviews_text: Very unflattering. The top/bodice part of the dress hit my right at my hips and with the way the skirt flares out, made me look much heavier than I am. Dress needed to be a more narrow cut to be flattering.

Super lightweight and comfy dress. Can go anywhere but runs very large. I usually wear a L /10 but had to size down to a medium and I think a small would have been better. This would be a great fit for a tall person with a long torso

I loved the color of the dress. And I liked the high to low hem that made it easy to walk and showed off your shoes. I found it to be a bit tight if you have a bigger rib cage. I didn't wear it anywhere besides for the photos because of COVID-19, but I definitely don't think it would be comfortable to wear for the night. It also had a lot of room in the bust, and I was unable to fill it out with a strapless bra because of the cutout back.
Got a ton of compliments. Was able to dance the night away in this dress.

Like everyone has said, the zipper is OBNOXIOUS. I did end up being able to zip it myself, and the wiggle room for a food belly was amazing. No need for a bra but I did opt for a stick on one for my own comfort. Had lots of compliments and it was very comfortable. Loved the pockets, but sometimes the pocket puffed out and made my hip look extra large. Would definitely wear again!

I wore this for a black tie wedding and it was a total knock out! I must've gotten 50 compliments it was crazy how much this stood out from the usual. I loved the fit, feel and look of this so much I bought it!! If I could find my best friend in a dress, it would be this one. Perfection!

This gown looks and feels like a million bucks! After reading the reviews I decided to order a 4R and 6R in case I needed more room up top. The 4R was a perfect fit and I would say this gown is true to size as I typically wear a 4. I did struggle with the zipper a bit as the pull is tiny, but with a little patience was able to zip myself without any extra assistance. I'm 5'3 with a long torso and wore this gown with 4" [100mm] pumps.
The dress was very comfortable and easy to move in. Cloth felt heavy duty and durable. The pockets were also a nice bonus! Overall a great dress and a great fit. I didn't have any major complaints!

This dress was a showstopper! Perfect for a summer wedding in Dallas - a little warm, for the outside ceremony, but very comfortable once we were inside. Pockets, no bra necessary, and super fun for the dance floor!
Ordered this dress as a backup. 2R fit well, but I liked the other dress better. I liked the pockets, high front hem, and fit/flare that hides my lower belly.

Pros: true to size. Super comfortable and elegant. It has pockets! The color and fabric are amazing. I got the 2 and 0 regular, and the 0 ended up fitting better. Cons: I am 5'3'' and I thought it was going to be a little shorter but it looked great either way. It does look a little like a rental dress ( but only you'll notice this)

The dress fit like a glove. I wear a 34 DDD and I wasn't sure we were going to get it zipped up and it was a challenge!! But I finally did and the dress fit beautifully. Did not wear a bra (and did not need one). iPad the best dress at the wedding (besides the bride) and got compliments all night. Love this dress. I am so glad I rented it
This dress runs smaller, I usually wear an 8, wore a 10 and it was a little had to zip it up, and there was some weird gap in the back. Overall it was a lovely dress with pockets.

links_reviews_title: A really fun dress for a gala event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and I received a lot of complements. It was true to size and fit really well. I was worried it was going to be too long (I'm 5'2") but with some moderate wedges, it just barely brushed the floor. I also ordered an 8 but it was a bit too tight around the collar bone though it was just slightly a better length (gave more of the hi-lo look). The material is a bit heavy but the benefits were that I did not need to wear a bra and it kept me warm for a cooler, outside event. The pockets were a fun addition. I would definitely order this style again!

I liked (not loved) this dress. Overall it worked but the narrow cut made me look quite huge in the arms/bust. The zipper is super tricky - you'll need help. I rented a similar style (sane designer) for this same event last year and was more pleased. Overall it was ok but I wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress w/pockets. No bra needed, Fits great and needed no ironing. A little warm for beach.
links_reviews_text: Comfy fit. Zipper was a 2 man job. It may be a little warn out. 4R fit great with 2 1/2” 👠. It’s shorter in front than back so that allows a little wiggle room. It was warm at my tropical event due to the layers on the skirt.

I had several wonen at the black tie wedding come up to me and comment on how beautiful the dress is! The back zip up required a bit of help but it wasn't a huge issue. Pockets are always a huge plus and the length was just shy of the floor in the front and I was wearing 3 in heels! I don't usually wear this color- if you're like me though, do yourself a favor and give it a shot!

It fit great. 5'5" 145lbs and wore 1" wedges with the 6R. With the wedges it just almost grazed the ground, in flats it drug on the ground a bit. By the end of the night the straps were digging into my neck a little, but I had been dancing hard for a couple hours. Didn't wear a bra, but it fit close enough that nothing was moving around. The pockets are amazing!

This was my backup dress. I'm 5'2" and with 4" heels it was perfect. The waist was a little snug, but since I'm short-waisted, it fit directly on my natural waist and not my ribcage. I'm a 32DD and the top fit perfectly, no bra needed. Tons of compliments and I felt great in it! Gorgeous fabric and the pockets were a plus.

I usually wear a 4. The dress runs super small. I had ordered the 6 as backup and even that fit a little snug. I loved the dress, the quality, and overall fit. Perfect for a formal event <3 #iLoveRTR #MsMo
Fit was on point, love the pockets, and floral print is perfect for winter to spring transition.

I wore this to a gala and had strangers coming up to me all night long saying they loved my dress! I usually wear a size 4 but had to size up 6 because it was tight around the rib cage and the zipper was really tough to get up - even in size 6 (that's the only negative to this dress.) But once it was on, it was so comfy and fun. I don't usually like going bra-less but totally forgot I wasn't wearing one once I got the dress on. Would rent again!
Pockets!

I absolutely LOVED this dress. I felt super glamorous. The fit was a little weird - other reviewers have noted that this dress is best if you have a very small waist and big boobs, which I completely agree with. I'm the opposite (small chest, larger rib cage) but because of the thickness of the fabric, you couldn't really tell I didn't fill out the top. I wore a 2R, which was a size too small for sure, but I got it zipped. It wasn't particularly comfortable, but it looked awesome, so for a night, I was great with it.
Dress fits very tight in the rib cage and straps were oddly a little loose but overall I still LOVED the dress. I received compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Great color, comfy fit, and pockets!
links_reviews_text: I loved this fit with the fitted waist and long flowy gown for the black tie effect. The back is nice too!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. I received too many compliments to count. Great fit, extremely flattering.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, a little tight around the ribcage as the zipper is along the side. I typically wear a size 6-8 and ended up wearing the 8 only because of how tight it was around the ribcage. This dress has pockets and is so comfortable, and gorgeous! I love this dress and would easily rent it again. I received too many compliments to count. This dress is just as gorgeous as it looks!

links_reviews_title: The dress was so beautiful and super comfy - and the pockets were the bomb!!
links_reviews_text: It was a bit long on me since I’m only 5 ft and petite, but the front hem didn’t touch the ground and I only had a slight train in the back. The waist was a bit tight like others have said, but it fit perfect on me. The back looked so beautiful and I received a ton of compliments.
Beautiful dress!!! I wore size 0 Regular. Received so many compliments and danced the night away!

I loved this dress. I wore it to a black tie wedding and it really stood out in muted colors. The 0R fit great even though I'm short (5'0) and I wore it with 3 inch heels, it just kissed the ground in the back. The fabric was warm and thick which was amazing for a very cold (25 degree) day. The only issue is the zipper, you'll definitely need someone to help you.

The fit on the lower ribs was tight but wouldn't have gotten a bigger size because it would've been too big in the bust. Overall beautiful dress and loved having pockets. Received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I received SO many compliments on my dress! From other guests to the bridesmaid and even the bride!
links_reviews_text: It fits right around the waist and looser up top! I am short and was able to wear the regular with heels and it was perfect! No bra needed as well!

links_reviews_title: Feeling like the most well dressed person at the event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful on and was very comfortable. I wanted to wear the six because it didn't gap in the back on the straps as much, but it was a little tight at the waist and comfort was more important to me. The 8 felt great and the material was thick! Plus the colors were so much more appealing than a plain black dress!
Even better than in the pictures. Worked beautifully for the photo shoot.

I love this dress so much I am hoping to get lucky and to find it on the 70% off page because I'd love to own it forever. It doesn't have any stretch but it's so fantastic it doesn't matter plus a great bonus it has pockets
Love it! Pockets! The bottom hem of looked closely was little worn, but no one saw. So pretty and comfy! Easy to hide a food-baby!

links_reviews_title: I felt wonderful in it and received many compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: The zipper took a lot kid work to get up, and it was snug right at the ribcage point. I didn't wear a bra and didn't need to as the fabric is thick enough not to see anything and it's snug enough to hold you together. But if you have a good plunging back strapless bra, it could work.

links_reviews_title: It’s a warm gown, thick material and long length was good for chilly fall day.
links_reviews_text: Fit was snug fit around waist, but not tight or uncomfortable. Bust/arms were loose. I’m a 32B and had a lot of room in the chest area. If it wasn’t a rental I would have had it tailored to fit. Zipper was a nightmare! Took me 20+ minutes to get it zipped. Neckline is higher than pictured.

I had myself and 3 children to dress for a black tie wedding all while caring for a loved one who had recently been hospitalized. With no time to shop- and a budget to stay within- I decided to try RTR. When it came time to get dressed, I had two viable options to choose between from RTR!
Lovely dress, got lots of compliments in a sea of black dresses.

I was dying to rent this dress and finally pulled the trigger. So happy I did! I wore the 2R. A tiny bit large in the chest as I am an A cup but nothing a little good posture couldn't fix. The band around the rib cage was pretty tight - the only downside to this dress. The color and print were stunning! Fabric is thick so you can go braless- I wore sticky cups.

links_reviews_title: It was my first ever gala. I haven't gotten dressed up like this since my wedding day 18 years ago
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on the cut, color, design, and fit of the dress. It was so comfortable, and fit great everywhere. I am 5'2" and was worried it might be too long and I would spend all evening carrying the front of the gown up so I didn't trip, but I wore 3.5 inch heels and it fit perfect! Not once did I even come close to getting caught in it. And it has pockets!!! Who doesn't love pockets in their dresses?!!
I didn't think this dress would have been such a hit but everyone loved it! And it was so comfortable in a full day training. Highly recommend!
Wore to my graduation, sized up based on reviews and glad I did! Very comfortable and classy

links_reviews_title: It's summer. When everyone else goes black at an evening event - go white!
links_reviews_text: As other reviewers stated, this dress arrived with some wrinkles. It has stretch, but hugs curves, so I wore the backup size 10. I was only 11 weeks postpartum and didn't want to show off my tummy! Overall, it was flattering and I got a lot of compliments. You can wear a regular bra with this dress. I recommend it.
Loved this dress! It was great for my bridal shower!

I really like this dress. The bright white really accentuates a tan, a nice rental for summer. I was just unhappy with the way the top cuts in at the shoulders, so it really puts that armpit/breast area on display. You really can't tell in the model photo but it cuts in toward the chest. I'm self conscious of that little fatty pocket which is the only reason I'm not buying this dress. If it was cut straight back like a tank I would buy this right away. I loved the high neckline and the ruffle details are subtle but pretty and flattering. The length is perfect. Totally work appropriate. I wore to work under a navy blazer and lots of people said I looked great that day. Without a blazer you'd probably need a racerback or strapless bra due to the way the dress cuts in at the shoulders - bra straps will show. It is very comfortable and fits true to size, has a little stretch to it. Needed to wear a nude bra and undies but the dress is not see-through at all. No shapewear needed either, dress is forgiving in the midsection. I would like to rent this again.
Got so many compliments as I wore this at my bridal shower in March! The ruffles were so flattering and it was very comfy!

links_reviews_title: Back up dress that stole the show.
links_reviews_text: This was a back up that was sent to me because my original choice was not available. At first glance I wasn't impressed, but once I zipped it up, I was sold. It's classy, well made and beautiful. I wore it to dinner in Italy. No bra, and the material is more than thick enough to accommodate. The detail on the front is laid out perfectly.
This was not flattering in any way. It was loose just still showed some tummy (fabric is revealing). The ruffles don't do anything for your body. Would not recommend.

Went in the NYC store when I found this, was SO surprised that this looked good on my pear shaped body, considering the tight fit body con dresses normally have on the hips/ the side ruffles (since those normally don't flatter wider hips either). Rented with a Zac Posen bag as well, was a good happy hour transition, received compliments all day.

The cut of the dress was great for an hourglass figure;plenty of room in the hips and tummy area. I like the longer length and ruffles for a feminine touch. The dress is lined and material is lightweight yet not see through.
Fit perfectly. Didn't need ironing. Easy to return! Saved me $!

I'm 5'4" 115lbs and normally wear a size 2 but this dress was a little too big. It has stretchy material so I think I could have gone down a size. Otherwise, I was happy with the design and quality of the dress.
Versatile crisp white dress. Great ruffle details. Fitted. Perfect for a work conference.
Cute dress but a little big I would have sizes down!

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress! Ruffles nicely placed. Usually love Nicole Miller.
links_reviews_text: I have a very straight body. The dress was ok for one wear but the top was almost too big and the bottom too small. Best on a more hourglass figure and fine for tall girls.

This dress fits like a dream! I'm around 160lbs and 5'5" tall: the 8 fit but the 10 was better. I got compliments all night (and by strangers). I felt bridal, and beautiful!! My fiancé was a huge fan of the dress, too, which is always a plus!! You'll be able to dress it up more for a formal occasion or dress it down for something a bit more causal. Thank you, RTR!!

I wore this to work and received a number of compliments. The dress is thick enough to not be sheer, and is long enough for taller women to wear in a professional setting. I love the simple design of the ruffles- it was very flattering. The dress did fit slightly large- i would probably size down if I rented again.
This dress is great for any summer event - it was not see-through at all, and the material is really nice. Definitely runs true to size and was such a great fit. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Looked weird on the hanger but looked great on. Got tons of compliments at my bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: Fit great but the dress kept shifting and the ruffles kept ending up in the middle in front of me, but it may have been because I had Spanx on underneath.

This dress is incredible. The fabric is soft and thick with some stretch. Nice and snug around the neckline and arms; plenty of room in the hips. I loved how new and bright white it appeared. Didn't want to return #keeper

This dress runs small. Depending on how form fitting you want it I suggest you size up. I wear a 6 and sized up to an 8. I probably could have done a 10 because the chest area was still snug in the 8. The material wrinkles very easily. It was very wrinkled when it arrived. I steamed it before I wore it. But after sitting for a small period of time it was wrinkled again (see picture). I would rent again for an event where I'd primarily be standing and not sitting.

I loved everything about this crisp white Nicole Miller dress. It fit true to size, wasn't too tight, and had a beautiful feminine detail that was complimented all night. Classic bridal shower dress, would definitely rent again.

Very cute dress, but the dresses I received (6 and 8) were more of an offwhite color than true white. Second, because of my body type (bigger but, smaller upper body), the lower part of my body fit fine but the upper part of my body was just too big. This is why I did not wear it. Hope you have better luck!
Rented for my wedding wine and food tasting down at the beach and couldn't be happier. Soft, flattering, and high quality. Obsessed.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: It was huge on me! I usually run pretty petite but this was almost 2 sizes too big on me.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly and received tons of compliments! Felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: Fit well for my athletic/curvy body

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for my bridal shower! True to size and such a great dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Was not to tight and the length was great.
Easy wearing work dress with a little flair that runs true to size. Lined.
I loved this dress. Nice, thick fabric. Great length for work.
Will probably rent again, but will consider sizing down! My normal size fit but I think it could have been a little cuter in a smaller size
Looks great on, very nice fit and classy

It was a very pretty dress. I wish it had been a little shorter. It hit me right above the knee. I selected true to size on the fit but it was a little on the loose side. I think a 6 would have been too small though. I are this for my bridal shower.

links_reviews_title: Slimming in front, loose in back
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my graduation, a simple white dress for a day-time outdoor ceremony. I loved the front, the way the top straps cut in created a slimming affect and it was well fitted but the back was loose and slightly baggy. If the back of the dress clung to my body better, this would've been perfect. But then again, those with more curves would probably fill it out better than I could!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to pair with my Kentucky Derby hat. Received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I found the fit to be perfect. Appreciated the weight of the fabric, since it was white. I wore a strapless bra so I wasn’t showing straps. The ruffles are so well placed and the cut was sporty and sexy.
The ruffles added the right amount of detail. The dress is form fitting so you might want to wear spanx to have a smooth silhouette.
Didn't like this dress as it wasn't flattering. It made my hips look wide and my armpit fat was highlighted. Didn't wear it.

I ordered this as a backup bridal shower dress, it was a little too large for me but I wore it the following day out to dinner. It's a nice thick fabric and elegant. I would have been happy wearing this for my party as well.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear this for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Ran too small. Shows off your stomach as it is very form fitting
Did not have a chance to wear this but will rent it again. Beautiful, classy dress. Form fitting.
Fits well, lots of give. I was nervous about the white looking good on my since I'm curvy. I looked and felt great, it didn't show all of my, well, everything, like I expected.

Love this dress. I'm 5' 10" and the length was perfect with a low-heeled sandal. The waist as strings that cinch on either side for the perfect waist. I wore the dress paired with a light cardigan for work. I look forward to wearing this dress again for a night out.

links_reviews_title: A little billowy but cute pattern and adjustable ties under the bust to help with fit
links_reviews_text: Overall was a nice summer maxi dress. The sleeves were flattering, fabric was pretty light, and it's always nice to have the under bust ties that help accentuate your curves
Loved this- comfortable, easy to wear, flattering. It was a perfect grab and go dress. I wore it for day, but could easily go to dinner or drinks as well.

I love this dress and would buy it if they had one for sale! The fit was perfect and I loved the ties on the side. I was able to wear one of my normal bras and it didn't show in the straps or the back. I loved the detail in the back. I also loved how there are panels under the arms to cover my sides under my arm pits. I may rent it again for another event coming up!

links_reviews_title: The dress had a nice flow
links_reviews_text: This dress was very long. The skirt was over sized. The top was tight in the chest.
Has pull ties on each sizsize for a customaizable waist fit which was great. Verycomfortable and cute .
I wore this on vacation. I wouldn't ordinarily have picked it up but it was so easy to wear and flattering. Easy to wear and cosy. Looks better on also!
Wasn't formal enough for my event but would rent it again for vacation in a warm location.

I wore this dress to work, church, and brunch and it was perfect for all occasions! The vibrant pattern can be dressed up or down. I wore it with flats and heels. I received so many compliments. The sleeves fall differently than I expected, and the ties on the sides of the waste were unexpected. But I loved it. The sides were slit above the knees, but you wouldn't notice until I was walking in the street. I really like the specific v-cut too! Would 10/10 rent again!
This dress and I almost worked out, unfortunately it was super tight in the bodice for my girls.

I am totally obsessed with this dress! The material is unbelievably comfortable and it's cut very flatteringly while still being loose. Also while it's called "Deep V," I wore it to work and did not find it to be deep or inappropriate at all. Planning on buying this when it's a bit more discounted.

Adjustable for many body types. Something to wear for comfort and not sex appeal. The cut of the top and waist ties added width to my frame. But again, comfortable and cool, so I did not mind. This was a good pick to host a wine tasting at my home with ten friends on a Friday night.
Very cute but too long on a short torso

links_reviews_title: Fun color for a tropical vacation!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable to wear and bright/fun.
Great romper for any occasion. This is low cut in the back. Luckily I had a cute bralette that worked well. This does run a little small in the bust, but I'm a DD.

links_reviews_title: Really cute romper for a hot day
links_reviews_text: I loved this romper! It was so fun and summery. The top is a little loose and so are the shorts but I loved how it flowed. Perfect for a hot day outside.

links_reviews_title: Size down and rock it out
links_reviews_text: Totally feeling myself in this romper, perfect for summer. Appropriately long for dinner with the parents (but probably not for work) so comfortable. I am a S-M but went with S.

links_reviews_title: It was just ok - it didn't help to create the illusion of curves.
links_reviews_text: I wasn't a huge fan of this - it's super orange which I loved, tropical, the straps were a little loose for me, but the length fit - I have a short torso so that worked. Overall I didn't find it flattering.
Loved this romper and have rented it multiple times. Perfect for a chill night out to dinner or during the day. Will keep renting again and again

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a musical festival and it was super comfortable and cute. Would wear it again!
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and fit nicely.

Super cute romper that's as fun as it is comfy. I am a true size 0 and this romper fit me so well, if not for a little tiny bit big in the waist. I rented this for a vacation in Vegas where I wanted something colorful and fun but not obnoxious. It was perfect!
True to size Comfortable Flirty but family appropriate:)
Pretty color. Fit nicely everywhere. Didn't feel too short or that I was having it ride up all night. Nothing to complain about but also nothing to write home about.

I really liked this romper. I will say it runs slightly big in the bust/upper chest area. I had a little trouble with it gaping on the sides under my arms, which is almost never problematic for me. That aside, it was fun to wear, super-summery, and it got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: For a girl who never swears rompers this was pretty perfect
links_reviews_text: My body had never fit into a romper until I tired this one. Super Foley and torso wasn't too short or long on, fit like a glove. Only issue I had was strap broke immediately but thankfully had a safety pin and it held up for the rest of the day. Hopefully RTR has reinforced the straps otherwise highly recommend bringing some pins just incase

links_reviews_title: Really cute romper. Cuter in person!
links_reviews_text: Normal fit. Comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I got hit on a lot, so, yeah it was great
links_reviews_text: This is very out of character for me to wear, but I loved it. It's not easy to zip up if you have big boobs, so keep that in mind if you're planning to wear it for a long time, but if I had sized up it would've been too big. I could wear it without a bra because of the adjustable straps, so that was awesome.
Loved this romper and wore it several times. Only thing I noticed is it has a tendency to bunch in the crotch area if you're walking around a lot but other than that, great!

I thought this was an adorable romper but I never found the right opportunity to wear it. I found it loose in the stomach and tight in the bust, so the fit was a little odd for me. I love the pattern and colors and I would consider reordering it to take on vacation.

Could not wait for the weather to change so that I could wear this! I loved it and found multiple occasions for it. Looks more like a dress once it's on, which I really enjoyed. Was long enough in midsection and did not pull in any areas.
Very comfortable! Wore to an outdoor concert with my kids and looked cute while also being able to chase after my kids

Loving this cute romper by Ali & Jay! I'm obsessed with the fun orange color and bright florals! Running true to size without stretch, I recommend ordering your normal size. This style is very straight and roomy throughout the chest, midsection, and hips. It works for any cup size but you will need to wear a strapless bra. At 5'3 the length hit mini to mid thigh on me. This looks so cute with sandals to go out in the summer or on vacation!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my 10 year high school reunion bar crawl.
links_reviews_text: I loved the vibrant color and print of this romper! I wore the size small and didn't order a backup. It fit well everywhere but the chest area. I normally wear a small or 4/6 in clothing, but this was a little tight on my D cup chest. I wore it anyways, but that was the only thing that bothered me. Overall I received numerous compliments and styled it with Sam Edelman palm print shoes and a bamboo purse. It was super cute! I felt confident and stood out from the crowd.
Wore this for a bachelorette day drinking event in Savannah and I blended right in!
I received so many compliments and found this to be very comfortable and flattering!
I am 5'10'' so take this with a grain of salt, but this is very short. Cute besides.

links_reviews_title: Great color and print but watch the size - runs large
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately this was much too large on me. Big around the chest and waist and a bit short for me.
Light weight, perfect for vacation, very short

links_reviews_title: Simple pull on and go, no bra required. Looked like a mini dress on. Loved so much, I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for vacation. Pull on and your done. No bra required. Comfy and felt perfect for vacation. Like so much I ended up buying it!
It was very baggy for a medium! I was really disappointed it didn't work out since it was a replacement style. The colors in it are pretty though.
I loved the fabric and color and probably could have made it work. It was long in the torso for me, so it looked a size to big. I didn't end up wearing it.
Runs small in the hips, splays out in front, looks funny unless you have a a completely flat tummy and I'm pretty close.

links_reviews_title: looks like a cute dress but is actually a romper
links_reviews_text: loved this! very beachy and comfortable. I wore this multiple times on vacation with a bathing suit. the back is super low so difficult to wear this with a bra but it worked with a low-back bathing suit or just with no bra.
It fit great and colors are really pretty. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Rented for a trip to Disney - looking for something cute, comfy and stylish.
links_reviews_text: The color and print are beautiful in person, but too short in the back when you bend over. Would be cute with a belt too.

links_reviews_title: great romper! love the flowy shorts at the bottom.
links_reviews_text: the more flowy shorts made the outfit cuter and different than a usual romper!
Beautiful colors but way too small in the chest area.
The adjustable straps make this romper very comfortable. I am usually a size small and this size small fit perfectly. It was a good length too.
Loved this for girls night out in Mexico. Great print and flattering -- only sad moment was when the strap broke as I was sitting at dinner!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Day or a Night Out
links_reviews_text: This romper worked perfectly for transitioning from happy hour to a night out dancing! My only comment would be that it fits a bit tight in the chest for someone with a large chest. I could have gotten a M if just considering that but a small fit me great elsewhere and I'm glad I didn't size up.

This was a perfect fit and easy to throw on for multiple events. I wore on vacation, to a BBQ, and to a Lake Party. Nice and light with plenty of coverage and I didn't need to wear a bra with this either .
It ran too small and was not flattering for my belly.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this romper! It was fun, flattering, and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I wore this romper a few times - out with friends, for date night, and just on a leisure day. It was perfect for all of those occasions! The fit was perfect, it was very flattering!
Wish the opposite side didn't have an arm hole, but overall it was cute and comfortable. Perfect for a date night!

I am short waisted and it was the perfect peplum length but may run short on average or long torso women. Liked that the shirt was flirty but structured well that off the shoulder was not restrictive. Received several compliments from friends who encouraged me to buy it. And the boyfriend liked it too.
Such a fun top, loved the fringe colors. Added that little something extra to an all black ensemble. Couldn't have loved this more.

Loved the multicolored fringe detail. Make sure to get your true size since it has a side zipper/not a lot of give. And I wouldn't wear it in a really windy place - the ruffles fly up and hit you in the face! Otherwise, it was great and got lots of compliments.

Very cute top, but not necessarily my style. It looks great on everyone, I got compliments and I even liked how I looked in the mirror, but it wasn’t comfortable for me at all. This could be because I’m tall and it’s already a short top. I wore it with black high waisted jeans to compensate for the length. My reservations are all personal preference, however, because the quality was great and I loved the pink fringe! Keep a steamer on hand, since this top wrinkles easily. - jasleigh
Great top, fit was perfect. Excellent option for summer concerts/festivals.

links_reviews_title: Fun shirt to go out in!
links_reviews_text: Was a little tight, but probably wouldn't size up if I got it again.
Super cute top - I have broad shoulders so am hesitant to wear off the shoulder or strapless usually but this was still cute and flattering. Comfy enough and easy to wear braless. Would rent again!

Cinco De Mayo is...well we all know it's a celebration of margaritas and tacos here in the USA. I was lucky enough to get this new piece for that exact purpose and in my excitement, I completely wore it wrong the first night so that cute little lower part was under my armpit instead of around my arm. I wised up the next day when I wore it to brunch (Don't @ me you do it too) and cried when I returned this because it made my waist look like an hourglass despite the amount of tex mex I had consumed the night before. It was as extra as the guacamole I paid for and I loved every minute of it.
It fit really small and was super uncomfortable. It's a cute design but not for me.

links_reviews_title: A fun top for a summertime date night!
links_reviews_text: I love this top so much. It was a little snug but looked good on. My only issue was that (probably because it was snug) the side zipper kept making the peplum flip up, which was aggravating. If it wasn't for that, I would have bought this top.

links_reviews_title: Love it, I bought it right away!
links_reviews_text: I was obsessed with this and the way it fit. Tight in bodice in my smallest part of waist with a little flair on bottom. Love the dramatic one sleeve

links_reviews_title: LOVED THIS. Super cute over shorts, jeans, a skirt, all of it.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Able to wear a bra underneath if you want though not necessary thanks to the ruffle.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a concert in Miami. Perfect fit super comfy and got tons of compliments! Love
links_reviews_text: Cute, good fit. Only complaint would be the arm sleeve a tad tight but I got used to it

links_reviews_title: So cute! Awkward arm fit though.
links_reviews_text: I wore this top for my 25th birthday party at an outdoor wine garden. I loved wearing this top and got lots of compliments, but the left arm hole was a little uncomfortable. I would have enjoyed wearing it more if it was just a one-shoulder top. Was sad to return this one!

links_reviews_title: different and cute for summer going out
links_reviews_text: paired well w black high wasted jeans would wear w white jeans next time

This shirt is super cute with the ruffles and fringe. However it is small and short! I'm 5'7" and it was like a crop-top on me. Which is not what a 38 year old should wear lol. I was sad because I wanted to wear this to a cinco do mayo party. If you're younger or shorter it will probably be very cute on you!
This dress fits true to size! I loved how it was sexy and conservative! I highly recommend! I'm usually a zero or a two and a two was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Romantic With A Touch Of Goth
links_reviews_text: Fit like a dream! LOVE this dress. It's definitely long on a petite frame but I've got the heels to make it work. Love this brand & would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore for black tie summer wedding. Size up A LOT
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a summer black tie wedding. I loved this dress but I'm normally a size 6 and I literally wore a 12 because otherwise it wouldn't zipper over my chest (DD's). I probably could have gotten away with wearing a 10 but it was sold out so I went with the slightly large-on-me size. Anyway, my point is: size up. Other than that, this dress is sooo comfortable and pretty. I got a lot of compliments and felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: I loved this moody frills number.
links_reviews_text: I felt like a babe. I love the details on the bust portion of this dress, and the fabric has a wonderful hand and silky quality.

I rented this dress for a wedding in November and absolutely loved it! It was super comfortable, pretty, and stylish. It actually ran a little bit big and was stretchy, so no need to size up. I think that this is partially why it was so comfortable. I'm very petite, so I was initially nervous to rent this dress as I thought it might be too long, but it wasn't. I think that this dress would be good for any height or body type. It's also very well made and felt really durable!

Thought I would give this dress a try because I was looking for something a little different for my engagement shoot. I'm so glad I gave it a shot because I loved it! It's a very flattering fit, unique and beautiful!

links_reviews_title: The chest area is too small
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wear this dress because the chest area was too small. I could not close the back. I would have needed about 4" of extra fabric there. It is a light dress, probably best for summer events.

This dress you feel unsure of but it worked. I wouldn't say it's a go out on Saturday night or a brunch dress. It's a perfect gallery opening, more Thur night wine dress. It's fashion forward and looked great. I would rent this again for the right occasion. It's a winner

links_reviews_title: This dress is everything. It's unique and flattering. I am obsessed.
links_reviews_text: It fits like a glove and I didn't need a bra! I wore Dr Martens so I could be super comfy and sexy at the same time. I will definitely rent this again one day. Loved everything about it. @jessicapaige.la

I wore this twice. Once on date night and once for my sister's graduation party. Both times it was a certifiable hit. The reviews said it ran small without any give in the waist and hips so I ordered up from my normal size 8 to a 12 and it was definitely loose but still so beautiful. I will probably rent in an 8 at some point for a more body hugging silhouette. Even though the colors are very reminiscent of fall, the color palette works for me and both times I wore it on a cool spring, and brought along a black blazer as the evening got chillier. I know everyone says this, but the outfit got a bunch of compliments and I was really pleased with my choice. You can wear it with the sleeves on your arms or closer to your body for two very different, but still very flattering looks. Paired with strappy sandals but a low black booty would have also worked.

links_reviews_title: It was a portfolio-building photo shoot. RTR dresses always elevate our shoots!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and easy to move in. Great material.

Love the style of this dress! I rented it for a party and it was a huge hit, I got compliments all night. It's romantic and not at all vulgar which was what I was looking for. My one con is that the torso was slightly off for me- there was some bunching around my waist where I wish it was tighter and more fitted- or maybe it would be better on someone with a longer torso?
