Not sure, but the proportion wasn't quite perfect. Despite this fit issue, I still wore it and it was incredibly flattering. The bunching was disguised by the print, ruffles, and dark color so I don't think it was noticeable to anyone except me. The best part of this dress is the hem. It flows beautifully when you walk or dance, and it's really easy to move in. I was also happy that the length was good on me. I'm 5'1" and a lot of dresses hit the floor in me- but not this one. It was perfect. All in all this is a fabulous dress and I'm a little sad to be sending it back today,
Wasnt sure how this would look on but I actually loved it and it conplimented my body very well!
I'm usually a size 6 sometimes an 8 and the size 6 was too small for me so I had to send this dress back. Unique dress. Love the fabric and cut.
This was my backup dress for the polo event. Received tons of compliments! I️t is a different style than what I typically wear and was glad I tried something new.
I wore it twice and got a ton of compliments each time. Love it!!
I loved every minute of wearing this dress. It's romantic yet modern and flows beautifully when you move. Wish I had more excuses to wear this again!

This dress was my back up option after being notified a few days before my event that the original dress I picked was no longer available. With not a lot of last minute options and sizes available, I picked this dress and wasn't sold even after trying it on for the first time. I was nervous about the fit after reading the reviews. It is a slightly narrow fit so I wouldn't suggest it for pear shape figures as it might feel constricting. After all is said and done, i ended up loving this dress. It is beautiful and totally unique. I received many compliments throughout the night and am glad to have rented this dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black tie work event in NYC.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit amazingly. The fabric was soft, the ruffles were light so they didn't add bulk, and the length was great - even for a short girl. It felt appropriate for a work event with coverage while still feeling fun. At an event with gorgeous dresses, strangers came up to ask about this dress. (If you are going to an event alone : ( it can be hard to zip as it goes all the way to the top giving it a great neckline. I might have pulled a muscle zipping it. But worth it)

I typically wear a 4, but this dress fit me too tightly across the chest in a 4 (it's pure silk with no stretch), so I ended up wearing the 6 and it was perfect--fitted through the top and waist and slightly looser and drapey from the waist down. I wore it to an Alice in Wonderland themed wedding and it was perfectly dramatic and whimsical withoutfeeling costume-y. It was comfortable and I got a ton of compliments. It's really unique and I felt like my outfit stood out.

links_reviews_title: A must Luxe dress for fall events
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a romantic castle/dinner in Switzerland and it was perfect! I was looking for a piece that is high up on the list of current fashion trends yet conservative as the Castle tour was a work related event for my husband. While I am fairly tall (5'7) and thin I do have a large bust & the dress still fit perfectly! Be prepared for a night of complements and questions because you will hear time and time again "I love that dress where did you get it".

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress, with non-stop compliments
links_reviews_text: I am tall and lean...it fit perfectly! I would not recommend if you have curves, bc it fits snug in the chest and lower body. I received constant compliments and felt like a movie star! I wore in my engagement photos and couldn't be more thrilled

I wore this at 23 weeks pregnant for an outdoor wedding in Idaho. The theme was "Western Wildflower," and this dress was sophisticated and PERFECT! The style feels kind of Westworld -- a bit Victorian but also modern and sexy. My usual size would have been 4R, and the 8R had the perfect cut and fit for my growing belly. Wore with knee-high Frye boots and it looked rad and I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress in lace and silk
links_reviews_text: This is such a lovely dress in lace and silk. It is so feminine and I love it fits the right curves in my body. The style is very 'in season' with the shoulder look. It is sexy and yet conservative at the same time with the webbed neckline. I love it!!!

I've become a huge fan of this brand through RTR. The fit was amazing. I loved that you could style this dress wearing the sleeves or not. Since it is a column style dress, I would not recommend this dress for girls with curves. The dark colors in this dress make it the perfection option for any fall formal affair!

links_reviews_title: Stunning one of a kind dress
links_reviews_text: I wish I had a better picture to share! This dress is a true work of art, there are so many details to love. The black lace portion is great for showing off your figure in a classy tasteful way. Very fitted, the ruffles are well placed to highlight your figure and the hemline is beautiful! I paired with black kitten heels for my event and then nude stilettos for after party cocktails with the honey.

Step out of your comfort zone! This is such a regal dress and it’s not my first go to item when browsing, but something stood out to me that made me want to try it; it’s different. The dress runs true to size so I wholeheartedly recommend going a size up as the fabric does not stretch. Works best for A to C cup sizes (fitted at bust) as well as the waist. May be worn with any standard bra, and it’s ideal for any body type to be completely honest. This is a cute dress for a gala, a charity event, or anything super formal. You can add your own dash of sass with this bold printed Amur dress. The slit in the front of the dress has t be my favorite part, it adds so much sass!
The fit is slightly small in the hips, if you have a wide hip to waist ration. The shoulder straps can easily get tucked in. But the dress is comfortable, fun and elegant with stand out details.
Take the risk this dress is well made and beautiful, runs large. I'm a 6 or 8 usually and the 8 was too tight in the hips.

links_reviews_title: I love this light weight and original design. I wore this for a wedding taking place on a farm.
links_reviews_text: It runs true to size. It is a lightweight breathable fabric. It fit nicely in my suitcase for this wedding with no wrinkling. I would recommend it for an outdoor event even in summer time despite its dark fabric color. I got many compliments the night I wore it

Maybe it would have worked if I ordered a size up instead of my normal size but I was hoping there would be a little give to it - which there was not. This was my first unlimited order and I didn't fully read reviews, so... Oh well.

Like many reviewers pointed out, this dress runs small. With that in mind, I ordered one size up, and it was still too small in the hips - so small that I could not sit! However, it was too big at the waist. I think this dress would be a great fit for lean ladies, but not for girls with round hips.

links_reviews_title: Date night at a speakeasy-style bar.
links_reviews_text: This somehow made me look shapeless. I think part of it was the ruffle in the middle. It fit in the hip and bust, but was too big in the waist (34-25-37).

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have wore it!
links_reviews_text: This is GORGEOUS. I just should have rented a different size! Zero stretch or give. It was my own fault for not reading that! I would definitely recommend this dress, even if I didn't get to wear it!

links_reviews_title: This dress is marvelously unique, beautiful fabric and wonderful fit.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'0 and it was till a perfect fit on the length, which is hard for a lot of dresses that aren't sized for petites! I got an immense amount of compliments and felt really comfortable all night. Lovely dress.
It runs small, but I would def rent again in a bigger size. The ruffles and the style is so beautiful

I would have given this 5 stars but it has a rip on the side! Definitely easy to miss and I wore it a couple times anyways! Dressed up with heels and down with boots. Would buy this in a minute if it was in good condition!

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous! Size up!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress....but if you have any kind of butt or hips size up one or two. I normally wear a 4 or 6 and could barely squeeze into an 8 .:(

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous on and very flattering and forgiving in all the right places...
links_reviews_text: Beautiful material, great pattern and very pretty dress overall. Loved the crochet black top portion and the off the shoulders portion as well. Beautiful dress overall, great fit! Definatley made a for a taller person.
Wore this beauty on vacation and it was everything I wanted! Not too heavy, adjustable straps and pockets! The fit was perfect and just screamed vacation vibe!
Super comfy and cute perfect for summer

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress but didn't get to wear it
links_reviews_text: This is a very flattering dress!! It is very fitted(borderline too tight) in the rib cage but there is space for your breasts. The dress flows nicely away from your body and the pockets are an added bonus. It was too summery for my event so I am disappointed I wasn't able to wear it but will rent again!

This dress was so comfortable, cute and the best part was that it has pockets! I was able to carry my phone and lipstick without a darn purse :) I wore it on vacation. They didn't have my size so I took the next size up but it was definitely big on me but I didn't mind. So it runs true to size
Nice dress !

This was a perfect dress for a summer party. The 6 was true to size, but with a little room. Straps are adjustable like bra straps. Fun, comfortable, and the pockets!! The cutout makes what could otherwise be a very conservative dress just a little flirty. I wore a nubra and didn't have the bust issues others did. Definitely recommend, and would rent again!
loved it, fit great

I really liked how this fit my curves. No bra needed! It does show quite a bit of cleavage, so if you're busty this dress isn't for you. It does tend to wrinkle but the colors & fit make up for that. I got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress so much I bought it new from another vendor!
links_reviews_text: In love with this mid length dress! Sexy cutout, no bra needed for me. Can be dressed up or down. Unfortunately, my RTR update rental came with a hole (that was covered by the tie/now) so I bought it from another vendor for the same price they were going to charge to buy it worn. RENT THIS!! You'll love it.

Do I even need to say the best part of this dress is the pockets?! I received so many compliments and even had a random woman on the subway take a photo of me in this dress (who I later ran into several hours later!) Perfect length for the taller ladies, and hugged in all the right places. Also great that the straps are adjustable and can easily be worn without a bra! Highly would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Fun, summery, a little sexy, and really comfortable
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a birthday celebration with friends. I was a little worried the cutout wouldn't be flattering on me, but it hit just the right part of the upper torso. The cutout made this dress a little sexy and made it stand out, but the pockets and overall length still made it feel really approachable and comfortable. Got multiple comments on how cute of a dress it was. May keep!
Amazing and cute. Strapless bra was a little tricky with the cut.

links_reviews_title: Love the Dress. Beware of the Boobs
links_reviews_text: I Love this Dress! Cut, Color; Everything! My Only Issue Were the Boobs. I'm a 34 DDD and the top was slightly lose which means I was showing more bottom cleavage than I would have liked. However we were on vacation so Cest la vie !

i wanted this dress to work but it didnt. I'm a 34C on top and my boobs were popping out of the cutout. no amount of fashion tap could fix this and you can't wear a bra with this dress. comfortable material though.
Super cute and comfortable...received compliments...no issues.

The dress is adorable and I was really hopeful that it would work with my bust, but sadly it didn't. It was a little bit tight across the bust but mostly it just didn't cover my actual breasts. I was spilling out the top and the bottom. I am usually a 12/14 but have a 36DD, this dress was a 14.

links_reviews_title: Very cute! Perfect for the birthday event! Pockets made it so I didn't need a purse!
links_reviews_text: True to size. Cutout can cause a little bit of cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfy dress worn for a day trip to Chicago
links_reviews_text: Fit well - mostly true to size. It was a very full skirt (more than I am used to anyway) but the chest/bust area fit like a glove. I'm typically between a 12 and 14 and the 14 was perfect on top. I did not wear a bra but felt supported and covered enough. For context, I've breastfed 2 babies and the girls were not saggy! I would rent this again.

This dress is stunning, great details and fits wonderfully. I almost didn't send it back! Its casual but cool. I wore with flats to walk around all day but would look great with heels because of the midi length! I did pin the tie in the middle because another girl said it was coming untied just to be safe! I usually wear a 10, ordered the 12 to have some room and I had a perfect amount for food etc.! Fits TTS

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It fit true to size. I got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The pockets are awesome and the straps are adjustable!

Wore this on vacation in Texas. It was perfect to highlight the boobs while hiding the beef rib bbq belly. I had to wear it with flip flops since we walked so much, but I want to rent it again and wear with heels!

It fits very large! I'm rarely a 4, I'm more of a 6 and the 4 fit me with a little give. It is absolutely beautiful, stand out, and feminine. I took it with me to Italy and it became very wrinkled. I did not have an iron at the Airbnb I stayed at, so I was a little disappointed but nevertheless I wore it and felt amazing in it.

This dress is the cutest! Wore it touring the botanical gardens. There is no stretch is this dress so had to size up to a 10 even though I'm a 6-8. The straps are adjustable which helped me in the chest. Great with flats or wedges
Loved this dress! Perfect fit and mix of sexy with the openings and cute with the bow!
Very cute and had a good fit EXCEPT for the rib cage area. Too tight and I have a small chest.

links_reviews_title: Stripes were cute, just didn't work for me!
links_reviews_text: Definitely felt like it fit more like a 12, I do have a bigger bust so I was anticipating this might not work! Would be super cute on someone with a smaller chest! The button detail and the flare of the dress were great!
Great for outdoor festival. Got a ton of compliments and super comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: the sweetheart neckline is so flattering.
links_reviews_text: the fabric was a little thick for the summer.
Nice enough dress but no 'wow' factor. fit true to size

links_reviews_title: The top is not meant for busty women
links_reviews_text: I'm glad I listened to the reviews on this and ordered a size up because it's very true that the top is rather tight on my 34DD chest making the cleavage on this a bit more "in your face" than in the photo. The rest of the dress is great, loose and flowy (LOVE pockets) and my husband certainly isn't complaining that the ladies are a bit more "in your face", but I'm not they would have fit in the smaller size.

Cute design, but as a few other reviews noted, the fabric is odd and was very wrinkled on arrival. I tried it on and just didn't want to deal with the wrinkling while on vacation. great for small boobs.

This is a nice beach-y dress that you can dress up or down. It's great if you have a small ribcage, chest and waist, as it accentuates it. But it can be hard to wear a bra, even a strapless one, so keep that in mind. My strapless showed a bit through the little hole. The A-line is flattering for pear shapes, but it is a bit baggy in that area - the dress has pockets (yay!) but that comes with extra material that can adds a little padding to your hips. I love how comfortable it is!

I didn't end up actually wearing this but just because the opportunity didn't present itself and then the weather has changed to fall. The top got really cute and flattering. The skirt portion was a bit more flouncy than I had imagined. But overall seemed like a great weekend dress.
Great fit! Perfect for day time event!

links_reviews_title: Size up if you have a bigger rib cage.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small in the chest. I have a broad rib cage and this dress was too tight.

links_reviews_title: Cute style and very comfortable tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: This was just a great dress to wear to any fun occasion!
This dress had a nice fit. I rented it for vacation but never got a chance to wear it. Fabric was a little heavier than I expected.
Fit true to size. Can be dressed up with wedges or down with sneakers. So cute.
Wanted it to work. But even with a size up had unflattering under boob. Love the dress. The keyhole isn't for everyone.
n/a
Not my favorite pregnancy outfit but very comfortable and a great option for pants. The neck line was very flattering. At 33 weeks pregnant I had plenty of room in the medium.

links_reviews_title: Wore for my baby shower at 32 weeks
links_reviews_text: Loved this!! Wore it at 32 weeks (first pregnancy) for my holiday themed baby shower. It's a lux velvet fabric and fits true to size, maybe a tad big since I would generally be a small but the xs fit just fine. It has a bit of stretch and a zipper in the back that made using the restroom pretty easy. I got so many compliments on it! Does not look like the cheesy maternity options that are normally out there. I still felt chic and like I wasn't wearing a tent. Just tight enough on the belly

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear due to odd fit
links_reviews_text: Looks great on the model, not so much on me. Too large in the chest area and just didn't look flattering.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a photoshoot and it was stunning!
links_reviews_text: Being 7 months pregnant I have lived in leggings and flowy dresses but needed something more sophisticated for this photoshoot as it was a business shoot. Fit like a glove but was still very comfortable. Having a larger bust, especially being pregnant, I wanted to wear a regular bra but not worry about being too 'in your face' and this hit all the boxes!

Couldn't have asked for anything better for a wedding at 33 weeks! It was cute, comfy, and even had pockets! I'm just under 5'4" and wore 3" heels and it was perfect. Would honestly consider renting this even not pregnant lol

The dress was comfortable for me at 36 weeks pregnant. I am 5’8 and currently 170lbs and I got a small, it fit well, and I liked the pockets, the velvet is very trendy and looked nice. There were a few things I didn’t like but none were deal breakers: 1-I couldn’t unzip the back without help; the zipper starts just above the butt and up the neck. When I went to the bathroom I had to find someone to help me! 2-the chest cut low and kept showing the edge of my bra- I am not very busty so I kept having to adjust the straps that ran down the front, they were also frayed so the inner fabric showed.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable, room for growing bump
links_reviews_text: I wore this for some of my maternity photos at 29 weeks. It was so comfortable and my bump had room to grow. Would be great for a wedding or holiday party. I'm a pre-pregnancy size 0 and 32B. My bust has grown with pregnancy but this was still a bit large in the chest. At 5'4 length was a little long with flats but would have been fine with a slight heel.
Loved wearing this! Very trendy as a pantsuit. A little big but I sized up.

links_reviews_title: Felt like PJs, and looked like 'em too...
links_reviews_text: The *thought* of this velvet jumpsuit was a good one, but in reality it looked like I was wearing my PJs. The top of the jumpsuit was low-cut and something seemed to be wrong with the seams. Felt frumpy so I didn't wear it.

This was SO COMFORTABLE! I'm 23 weeks pregnant with twins, and this jumpsuit was so comfy and didn't make me look or feel huge like a lot of other maternity clothes. I would totally rent this again, and might even just buy it.

links_reviews_title: Not for petites - tall women only!
links_reviews_text: If you're short, this brand isn't for you. I was swimming in the medium. I weigh 160, 5'1 and am 23 weeks pregnant. It looked awful - way too large. I don't know that the small would have worked either considering the biggest issue was the fact that it's made for someone who is at least 5'8. If you're tall, get the smaller size back-up anyway because I suspect it runs large.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a vacation or summer day
links_reviews_text: Wore this in Spain. Loved it. No stretch with the material so size up. Hits mid calf. Recommend.
Wore this on a day tour of vineyards in Portugal. The material was light and airy, with a great floral print. It was easy to move in, although it did not have much stretch to it.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all day! Figure flattering and easy
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 2 or 4, and sized down for this rental. I would say it's true to size as it was a bit tight in the arms, but fine through the rest of the torso and hips. The dress is unlined from about mid-thigh downward, so the peekaboo factor from the see-through fabric makes this tea length more fun and youthful. I would definitely rent again, and am considering buying. I had tons of complements all day wearing this -- more than most of my other rentals! This worked well on my shape which is pretty straight and narrow. The tailoring provided me with a more shaped waist than I would say that I typically have. This worked really well styled with flat sandals and then styled with heels at work.

Technically this dress fit, although it was a bit tight in the chest area. However, I found it really unflattering because of where one of the bands hit. It bunched there because the side zipper didn't lay right against the curve of my hip and caused it to bunch up and look like I have a big belly. This is not a good look. I do have a longer torso than most, so maybe it falls differently on me than most. It did come up shorter ok me than the model and most of the user photos. I tried adjusting the straps, but it didn't help because then too much of the top was showing. The straps were also a really itchy, uncomfortable fabric. I wanted to make it work so badly as the print and ruffles are cute. It just wasn't meant to be though.

I really loved that this dress fit so perfectly! I have a larger bust and didn't have to wear a bra. I wore this twice. Once to a brunch and once to dinner while on vacation. Got a lot of compliments. Felt really flirty and feminine. The length was perfect. Could easily wear with heels or sandals.

Cute, breezy, and easy-going frock that was just dressy enough for the early fall barn wedding I attended. Fit was true to size, but for some reason it was a bit loose around my midsection and hung in the way that made me look like I had a bit of a tummy.
Wore this dress to work, out to a dinner, and to a winery. Fits great, not too much fabric.

I wore this to a bridal shower. The dress is fun and versatile, I loved the flouncy tiers. I'm a small 0 though, and the torso big. I was able to pin it in the back though and the layer hid the safety pin, so no biggie. Overall, great dress!

I love this trendy dress by Rebecca Minkoff! Running small, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary and a size up for your back up. This style is tight throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra, so you should wear a strapless bra. At 5ft, the length hit tea length on me. The style of this dress is very fun and flirty. Pair with a cute sandal gold accessories to complete this look!

Perfect for a trip to Spain! Wore this quite a few times - great for travel, flattering, doesn't wrinkle (or smell). Wore it in Spain and Puerto Rico and perfect for hotter weather but I will say that RM runs a little small. This fit more like a 6 than an 8. Size up.

I rented this to wear to work, but ended up dressing it up for date night and dressing it down for a picnic in addition to wearing it to work! Very flattering (hides any problem areas). The 2R fit me perfectly (5'5, 130 lbs)

Gorgeous dress with great ruffle detail that's super flattering. I'm more pear-shaped and this was a great fit. You will need a strapless bra, or no bra if that's how you roll. I'm wearing this to a friend's birthday on a Wednesday night, but would wear to a wedding with more formal accessories. Definitely going to hang onto this one for some time.
This was a beautiful dress i wore to my sons graduation, fit perfect! Would definitely rent again.
Comfortable and flattering!!
I love this dress, so flattering and fresh.., perfect for a Sunday, day wedding or even work.
adjustable and easy
The material isn't the best to wear outside if hot-you'll definitely get sweaty. The dress is super cute and flattering!! I received a lot of compliments.
This looked a little too tight in the hip area which I found disappointing. If you are a curvy 8, this might feel on the smaller side.

Wore this to a tropical themed dinner. Form fitting around the tummy so looked best with spanx on. Loved the sheer layers at the bottom which made the dress flow beautifully! More of an orange-red color than a true red.

links_reviews_title: Easy to dress up or dress down
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 4 but I find Rebecca Minkoff dresses to run a bit small so sizing up works perfectly! dress was super cute, comfortable and great to dress up or down
Everyone loved this dress! The photo doesn't do the print justice. Very beautiful in person. Warning to busty girls, the top is tight and the fabric doesn't have any stretch.
This dress was such a cute, sexy and fun dress to wear for my birthday dinner. Would wear again!

I LOVED this dress so much I bought it. You can really dress it up or down. It's very well made and I received so many compliments on it. I think it runs a little big overall but smaller in the waist. I needed a 6 for the waist and it's a little loose in other parts but since it's a flowy maxi it doesn't matter. Highly recommend!!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to dinner and the theater.
links_reviews_text: I'd read the reviews regarding fit and ordered both my regular size and a size up. I'm glad I did as I could squeeze into the 4, but wouldn't have been able to eat or breathe! The 6 fit great and I loved it. I wish the weather had stayed warmer as I had to wear a cardigan with it and hide the beautiful back of the dress. Lots of compliments and would like to own this one!
Really beautiful dress. Just enough sexy with the bottom being sheer and well placed cut outs.

I loved this dress! I could have sized down to a 0 but it wasn't available when I ordered. But the 2 fit well still though probably a little long on me (5'0). But this dress was so pretty, light/airy, and flattering. I would definitely rent this dress again 100%!!

links_reviews_title: Beautifully simple dress that works well for a lot of different occasions. Lovely fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress, although fairly simple, is flattering and versatile.

I loved everything about this dress. The fit was so flattering. The style is on trend. With a cardigan, I was able to wear it to work. I wore it to a picnic and received many compliments. Would totally buy this.
Loved the fit and the flow of this dress.

links_reviews_title: Cute wrap dress, needed a safety pin for the chest!
links_reviews_text: This was a backup dress and I ended up wearing it to a birthday dinner. I liked it so much more on me vs. on the hanger. It was very light and airy, and FUN (which you don't always get with maternity dresses). It's a wrap dress, and the chest was definitely way too open, but one small safety pin completely solved that. I would rent it again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: I received a lot of compliments on this dress. It was a bit tight around the arms and the top was cut a bit low but overall the fit was good. I will likely rent this dress again.
You need a slip to go under this. Nice dress

I got a lot of compliments on this dress! I understand the other reviews. It does fall kind of lower on your bump but I found that tying it nice and tight helped. The dress is a complete wrap with a nice light material. I’m fairly small chested and felt comfortable the the loose fitting top. Something I did not anticipate was the slit riding up in the front when I sat down or blowing up with the wind. I am lucky to have a petite bump and don’t think this would work well late into the 3rd trimester. I’m 30w4d in the provided photos. But overall I loved the dress and felt comfortable my whole shower! PS I’m 5’5” and about 162lbs while pregnant. B-size bras pre-pregnancy and a C-size during pregnancy.
The sleeves are really tight on this and the fit is not that bump friendly - definitely made for someone larger than a C cup! Material is thin.

links_reviews_title: Looks cute in the pic but has a weird fit
links_reviews_text: Dress looks cute in theory but the fit is awkward. Was tight in the arms and back and didn't close properly.
Did not fit across the bust, will need to wear a tank or cami, but i did not like how it looked with that.
The material is a little stiff and the dress runs small.

links_reviews_title: The stitching on the arms was awkward and tight underneath
links_reviews_text: If you have a larger bust skip this dress
This dress is only for tall people.

links_reviews_title: Not convinced this is a maternity dress!
links_reviews_text: This does not have the fit of a maternity dress - it was cut like a regular wrap dress. The weird overlap didn't even come close to covering my bump. I can wear Mediums in most maternity dresses so this was a huge disappointment. Cute dress just not cut properly.

Unfortunately this dress is extremely large in the chest, and gaps, making it really hard to wear. If you size down, the chest size is still too big and the arms are too tight - and the wrap portion seems to easily come open in the wind. The fit on this dress is very strange, and I was unable to wear either a medium or large. I wouldn't recommend renting this dress.
I went with a Small as I have with all maternity wear, however I was unable to fully wrap this dress around me to close.

I rented this for a hot spring day but it felt more like a beach coverup than a dress. It was too much exposure for me. Neckline was very low cut and didn't have a snap closure. Also the high-low hem line had the effect of feeling like the wrap didn't go around enough. I held the hem whenever I walked. Perhaps I could have gotten more coverage in the next size up, but I am not so sure

links_reviews_title: Not for the curvy expectant mother
links_reviews_text: Runs small. Not for curvier women. Lots of cleavage and exposed thighs if you aren't a very skinny woman having a bump-only pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress and pattern but poor fit
links_reviews_text: It's always hard to figure out sizing with maternity clothes but brands generally say order your pre-maternity size. This dress is NOT for anyone busty, it was tiny and ill-fitting in the chest. Additionally if it is a windy or breezy day then the front will just split and fly right open. Not something I would rent again and would recommend sizing up in this brand.
This dress had only two downsides. It was very long. It also gaped in the chest, so I had to pin it so I didn't expose myself.

The fit was a little odd....it was quite large on top and the way it wraps made it so the slit in the middle is pretty open. I was unable to wear it and shipped it back right away. I'm 22-weeks pregnant, 5'4 and 140lbs. Pre-pregnancy I wear a small or size 4, so I though this would work. I'm not sure the XS would be any better than the small due to the way it fit me.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, lightweight. A bit tight on my third-trimester body.
links_reviews_text: Gaped in the boobs (and they're not that big!) and big belly caused it to open a bit in the front. I'm 5'9 and 190lbs at 30 weeks, size 8 pre-pregnancy. Would order an XL next time.
I'm pregnant and my boobs have grown, so I was spilling out of this dress. I haven't gotten used to what dresses I can wear without being too revealing and this is not one of them.
This dress was a hit. It fit perfectly and looked amazing. I usually find trouble finding dresses that fit my small chest but this dress worked perfectly!
Great, flowy dress. Perfect for a summer event. The silk material really feels nice against the skin. Beware of the pesky zipper.

I wore this dress for a summer wedding and it was perfect. I'm 5'2 and wore 4" heels and length was still a little long but nothing crazy. Fits true to size, I usually wear 6/8. And the size medium fit like a glove. Another win for RTR
I probably could have sized down but loved this regardless. Unique design with an adjustable strap. The slit made it perfect for the dance floor.
I got so many compliments! It felt amazing and was perfect for a summer evening of patio drinking out. I listened to the reviews and sized up. This was a great move because the dress fit perfectly.
Fit like a glove. Felt like a queen! Favorite rental so far!
A little bit long but beautiful dress that flowed with the wind.
I loved this dress! Didn't want to take it off. Def had to wear heels though since I'm 5'3". Picture has filter

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress but it ran small
links_reviews_text: Was a bit tight on me, despite usually fitting the size I ordered. Loved the neckline. The dress has quite a high slit. Be aware of wearing this to a place where we will be sitting. I found my very high thigh was exposed while sitting at dinner.

I rented this dress for a summer wedding on the Lake. Pros: I'm 5'2" and the dress was the perfect length for me with heels. The adjustable strap on the left shoulder allowed for the the right amount of cleavage. Favorite detail is the slit!
I loved the fit and look of this dress. Hugged a little tight around the mid section, but that gave it shape.
So casually elegant for dinner

Granted I have gained some weight around my hip area after a recent surgery this dress runs extremely small and wouldn't fit over my hips even when I sized up. Disappointing because it's a beautiful dress I may try to rent it again when I have lost some weight

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments! I wore it to a beach wedding and it fit the setting and me.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8'' and a 34 DDD bust/188 lbs (pear shape). It fit great, hid problem areas, and the length was good. I wore two-inch heels and the length worked well. No heels and it dragged a bit. I have a large bust and it was only the smallest bit too small. Definitely not a deal-breaker and I never "popped out" even when dancing all night.

It was longer than expected so I needed to pick up the skirt while walking (I'm not into heels), but other than that it was true to size for someone with average curves, and the fabric was smooth and flowy and comfortable!
Super cute, for my height must wear heels or wedges as it's long
I took a gamble on this. I loved the pattern but the dress runs small in the chest area. I did not wear this. It's not the greatest for full breasted or curvy woman.
The bodice on this dress is ridiculously small. I ordered one and two sizes up, and couldn't get either zipped. Thanks to RTR for sending replacements quickly!
I almost bought it. So flattering and unique. Lots of compliments.
The hips & skirt of the dress were so tight, it was really awkward.
Fit was too tight in the hips and butt and made the fabric bunch awkwardly at the stomach.

links_reviews_title: Runs okay should have gotten a large.
links_reviews_text: The top runs small should have gotten a large would have been a very pretty dress to wear.

Really stunning dress, the fabric feels and looks expensive and the single shoulder detail is really unique. I wore this separately to dinner and to a party and got SO many compliments! It is very flattering, has some give at the waist, and the strap is adjustable! Love it - will rent again!

links_reviews_title: I didn’t not wear because was small .
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but runs small .
Too small up top. Couldn't get zipper up

This dress looks amazing and is beautiful, but the fabric, while light, would not breathe at all and is very unforgiving. No stretch whatsoever and slides like satin, hugging every bump and imperfection. Probably would be gorgeous on someone very thin
great fit, silky material, beautiful dress
Flowy, breezy and lovely print/fit! Very low in the front, so used hair to cover and fill in since I wore it to church! Lol!

I loved this dress and received so many compliments. It was fitted through the waste and a little big in the bust (make sure to wear the right bra). However, the length is perfect and sleeves add to the flowy look.

links_reviews_title: Flowy and light dress perfect for thick arms and legs!
links_reviews_text: Would have worn this if I wasn't so bloated that morning. I will rent this again!!!
So this dress was lovely but the shoulders were a little uncomfortably tight. I think it's just the design of the dress because it fit perfectly otherwise.

I have a bit extra around the tummy and this dress disguised it perfectly. A bit low cut but fine with the right bra. I loved this dress! I don't normally like pictures of me in a dress while sitting, but this one was a winner

When I first pulled this out of the bag I thought I would hate this dress and the cut would look horrible, but it ended up being so flattering. I would have expected it! It's just an elegant little number. A tiny bit snug, but nothing bad.

Very pretty-fitted and flattering. Background is more of a muted pink not white. Good quality fully lined. Fabric flows but lining keeps the dress snug and in place. There is very little give-but it was a perfect fit and very comfortable. Neckline a tad low. Wore it twice -would definitely rent it again.

I had my fingers crossed this would work for Easter. I liked the floral pattern and airy ruffles. When I got it, I was thrilled. It's even prettier in person! The dress looks white on RTR but it was a really light pink background with beautiful drawn & painted flowers in the pattern. The construction was fantastic too. Fully lined with a thick satin, so didn't worry about lines and see through underwear. It did run small. I usually wear an 8. The 10 fit well but I had to have good posture. One thing to note - I wouldn't wear this to a wedding or any party with dancing. The way the sleeves are cut, they didn't have much give in the shoulder. Be careful with that. I will definitely rent again! Would consider buying it too.
Great fabric and lining
Way too small for me so I had to return it without wearing

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress; I ended up not needing to wear it but almost bought it.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous - beautiful and flattering. I just ended up wearing another RTR dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress to dance the night away in. Comfortable and romantic
links_reviews_text: I am a 34H chest and typically wear a 10/12 in my everyday wear. Likely could have sized down to 14, but since rentals were suspended, I went with what was available in store. I felt like the dress moved beautifully & the ruffles slimmed instead of adding bulk. The deep v was just sexy enough without being overwhelming. Only bummer was renting for 8 instead of 4 days due to RTR operational concerns.
fit great looked great

links_reviews_title: Loved the material of this dress. Easy no fuss outfit!
links_reviews_text: pro's- great flowy, not-clingy material con's - was a bit low cut

links_reviews_title: Looked good on the website, but didn't wear it when it arrived.
links_reviews_text: Liked how the dress looked on the website, but when it arrived, it felt like the layered ruffles, and large prints together looked a bit much. Husband thought the same. All in all, I didn't have the confidence to wear it. The V was also quite deep. Might look good on a slimmer person.

links_reviews_title: This fabric is amazing- I wanted to sleep in this dress! So gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful detailing from the pattern to the layers.

links_reviews_title: I liked the asymmetric ruffles, but it looked frumpy on
links_reviews_text: It was large in the bust and waist. The extra fabric made the dress look frumpy.

I wore this for my nephew's wedding and I LOVE the beautiful floral pattern on blush. I also loved the comfort. The neck line was very low so I wore a camisole top underneath so I wasn't tugging the dress up all day. I would definitely have felt exposed without it.
Not my typical style to wear due to the floral print but very pretty, well made & comfortable. The neckline is low so I ended up wearing a lace camisole.
Tight in rib area - too long in shoulders for me. Proof not everyone can order online and make it in time to a formal. Off to dress shop I go!
For me, ran small in the waist but large in the bust. Beautiful print but didn't work for my body.
This was a comfortable and flattering dress to wear. Great sleeves, very forgiving. Material is light, yet substantial and good quality. Would rent again.
A little matronly. Big up top but small around waist and hips. Not what I expected.
Loved the flow of this light floral-print fabric. The dress was incredibly comfortable.
Wore it for Palm Sunday and received many compliments. Fit in all the right place.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but too tight in sleeves
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but impossible to raise arms more than a few inches from my sides due to crazy tight seems in the sleeves
I thought it was pretty, husband said it looked like a curtain.
This was such a comfortable dress - I loved the long sleeves because I always get chilly. The dress was the perfect length for me at 5'2".
Loved! I was so tempted to buy, gorgeous!
Elegant and unique
So cute!! Fit perfectly! I received a lot of compliments, very flattering. I just had a baby, so I put on a few pounds. This dress hides all the flaws 😊 highly recommend

links_reviews_title: I felt so beautiful in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Wrap style made it very flattering. I possibly could have even gone with a 12 to reduce some of the cleavage while still keeping the fitted waistline. Received so many compliments in this dress.. I felt gorgeous the whole night.

This dress was beautiful for a winter wedding. I usually wear a 2 but I wore the 0 for this one. The length was great and there was flexibility in the sleeves. I loved the wrap dress because I could decide how I wanted the fit to look. I did have to pin the front for cleavage issues. I would definitely rent again. My husband loved it.
Fabric was gorgeous but the waist hit me too high, so didn't look great on me.

Even though this dress has been in rotation for a few years, both sizes came in beautiful condition. I went with the 6 although the sleeves on the 8 were weirdly tight at the biceps to the point of being uncomfortable so I'd agree with some of the reviews about the sleeves. I think it's just a fluke that some run small. The 6 was perfect and fit like a glove. The lace and shorter length give it some sex appeal but it's still a classy conservative dress. Was perfect for my daughter's Confirmation even though it ran above the knee almost mid thigh. (I'm 5'7) Comfortable and very forgiving. Received a ton of compliments including one from the male owner of the restaurant where we had our celebration party. Told me "that dress looks GREAT on you" loud and proud right in front of his wife lol. Someone else shot me a text in the church and told me I looked stunning. I'd say this was a home run. It's one of those rentals you'd love to own.

links_reviews_title: Photogenic dress (but tight in the arms)
links_reviews_text: If you have muscular arms, you'll definitely want to size up. I made it work, but my arms felt squeezed. Otherwise, a beautiful dress that looks great in photos

Rented for a work Gala, but it was 80 degrees and humid that day so opted for wearing to work on a cooler day. Pretty dress. A bit snug in the arms and armpits. Would consider renting again once I lose a little weight.

I loved this dress! The 12 fit but was a little tight on the arms. I wore the 14 and was able to lift my arms comfortably all night on the dance floor. The wrap dress is very flattering for my mid section problem area. I was very pleased with this dress for a formal wedding!

links_reviews_title: Incredibly comfortable and so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: There were no cons to this dress. It was absolutely perfect for a fall wedding. It's a little heavy, so I suppose if it was inside and I was dancing like a fool I may have been too hot.
5'9 157 lbs. I wore this for my sons wedding, it fit wonderfully and was very comfortable. Perfect!
Arms were a little snug (I have muscular arms), but fit perfectly other than that! Very classy dress - Would absolutely rent this again.
Fit is good. Fits true to size. Sleeves were a little tight but might just be me. Lace is gooorgeus.

This dress is beautiful - heavier fabric and great for date nights, perhaps a bit dressy for work. It is very low cut so may need to wear a cami under but I wore as is as have smaller chest and worked fine. Looks great as all DVF wrap dresses do, boyfriend loved it! I wore this for my birthday.

This flattering wrap dress was perfect for my developing baby bump (17 weeks)! This dress fit well, had a great length; not too long and not too short -- I never felt uncomfortable with the length. The chest area does have a wide opening, if you have a larger bust I highly recommend using fashion tape to secure the dress to the cups of your bra. Can't go wrong with a wrap dress, it's almost universally flattering!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was cute and fun to wear. Would fit a variety of sizes due to it being a wrap dress. It did show a lot of cleavage, but I am busty. Could have covered it up using a camisole. I would recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a wedding in the City!
links_reviews_text: Awesome fit! I’m pear shaped so a wrap dress is my go to as they are more forgiving around the thighs. Got lots of compliments! Received the 8 and 10 but chose to wear the 8 as it fit perfectly. Highly recommend - you won’t be diasappointed!

links_reviews_title: I looked fabulous but was uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I'm use to wearing my clothing loose so I probably would have been more comfortable if I got a 12 instead of a 10 as the lace on the arms has no give and I have muscular arms. It was super flirty length but everything stayed covered on the dance floor and when I sat down. I did need to use a pin to keep the top closed. I felt like the dress looked great on me and I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a small, afternoon wedding in NY.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit as expected. Not too short, not too long. Per the past reviews, I did have to pin the dress as too not assault people with cleavage. I am a full D cup and it needed a pin for sure. Other than that, it was perfect and I would rent it again. I paired it with tights, heels and a chunky pearl necklace.
This wrap dress is so flattering even though I don't have the littlest waste. You can make the cleavage what you want it and really make it sexy with a high strappy heal! My date loved it.
Rented this for a rehearsal dinner for a black tie wedding. The fit was TTS and the sleeves were perfect for the colder temps in Jan. Loved it so much that I ended up buying it :)
This dress fit perfect ! Im 5'9 - it was perfect length. Lots of compliments . Thanks RTR

If you are large busted you will need a tank underneath. I wore this to a wedding with my 2 toddlers and was very comfortable all night, great fit! I wore the 14 would have thought I was a 12- which I could have worn but the 14 was a little more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: The dress was very flattering and I got complimented for it all night!
links_reviews_text: This is a high quality, flattering dress. If you have muscular arms, I recommend ordering a size up -- the fabric does not stretch! The dress was also a little tight for me in the bust, but it resulted in a deep V-neck, which was sexy.
Wore this to a NYE party at a brewery. Sleeves were a little short on me but I am 6'1 and have long arms. I really like this wrap dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a festive holiday party for my office at a nice hotel.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size. However, I did choose to wear a black tank top underneath to keep it more conservative for in front of my work colleagues (I'm heavy chested and didn't want to worry about making sure it stayed in place all night). I got many compliments on the dress and would definitely recommend it and rent it again!

Dress fit true to size and was comfortable. I wore a cami and and pinned the front of the dress due to the plunging neck line. Tons of compliments all night long. The 12 was worn right out so I was so thankful that fit into the 10.

This dress was a runner up to my initial choice which didn't work out, but this made a great alternative! The wrap style was so flattering and I loved the unexpected yet on-trend navy & black combo. The sleeves were quite tight, but that isn't uncommon for me. I wore this to my husband's Christmas party and it was attractive yet appropriate.

I'm 4.5 months pregnant and rented this because my normal dresses don't fit. I'm an 8 pre-pregnancy so rented the 10 and 12. Neither fit in the chest... the 10 wasn't even close. I wore the 12 so it would close a bit more but still had to wear a tank top underneath. Since it's a wrap, I could have worn either size in the waist/hip area since you can tie it however tight you want. The lace is really pretty and I felt comfortable, bump included. It was a little shorter than I'd like, but I'm just shy of 5'10 so this is nothing new and I just wore black tights underneath. The sleeves were great and had plenty of room.
Conservative, yet sexy. I love the a-line, so you can eat a big dinner and still be comfortable. I recommend!

links_reviews_title: Selected, sent and such a beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wedding. I wanted a dress that was simple yet still had a little something special. This dress was absolutely perfect. It felt as if it was tailor made for me. Very well made and so so comfortable. I would rent this again, and you just can't go wrong w/ the DVF wrap dress.
Very fun and flirty. Tape required if you are small chested and short wasted. High quality fabric. Great rental!
Loved this wrap dress. Excellent quality and surprisingly comfortable. I️ was very pleased with the fit
Fit true to size, given it was a wrap I could have gone up one or down one easily! Got sooo many compliments on the dress and felt like great too!
This is a gorgeous dress! Very classy and was a hit at the party we went to! Fit very true to size. So happy I chose this dress!

This is my first experience renting with RTR. The dress fits like a dream -- it minimizes my problem areas and maximizes my assets! I'm 5'9, 150 pounds but I imagine it'd be very flattering on most body types. I got compliments all night long, and felt amazing. Great dress for dancing, medium-heavy material might not be best suited for a hot outdoor wedding but perfect for an indoor fall celebration!
Wore for Christmas celebration. Very pretty and feminine for occasion.

links_reviews_title: I got many compliments on my dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to the size. I was comfortable and I feel like the cut could be flattering on several body types. It hid my biggest flaws and I really loved it. In the right light, you can see the blue overlay but in most of the pics it looked black. I pinned the front for cleavage spill-over. Height: 5'3", Weight: 157 Bust: 38D, Build: Curvy
Darling. Loved the flippy hem! Sleeves had some volume but not too much at all - fit fine under a wrap coat.
Comfortable fit with feminine ruffle details. Flirty hem. Short.

This dress was absolutely perfect. I got so many compliments at my work Christmas party. I'm between a medium and large, so the large had a little extra room but not enough to make it look too baggy. The fabric is thick but super stretchy. The cut and ruffles are not only adorable but they're SUPER forgiving. I seriously contemplated buying this dress. For my 5'1'' frame it was the perfect length, but I could see it being too short for someone taller.
Good for work and church - black dress - pairs well with stockings and booties I didn't think it was amazing and it was loose for me - it's cute and if you like to blend in, this piece will work
I am 5'4", 125ish lbs and usually wear a size 4 or 6. The size M just fit. It was cute on, but very fitted. Take note of undergarments when getting dressed.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Little Black Dress for EVERY Occasion!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable but flirty black dress that you can dress up or down. I wore it to Hamilton, but also want to wear it for my girlfriend's birthday and my grandfather's birthday. I'm thinking of sizing down for my girlfriend's birthday since the Medium still looked amazing, but come a bit shorter, which would be perfect for the occasion, then go back to the Large for my grandfather's birthday for the extra length. Overall just such a good dress that's actually pretty affordable, so i'm thinking of keeping! Just not sure which size!
The dress was TTS, and the frills made the dress unique. Tons of compliments received.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small and no good for a short torso
links_reviews_text: Rented this with my unlimited. I ordered a small for my daughter but it did not work for her so I tried it. I am a 0/2 and could barely zip up the small. I am also petite and the fit was completely off - it bunched up in weird places and was very unflattering. I think you need a long torso to pull this off and then you need to size up at least one size. Sent it right back.

This is the perfect mix of casual (not trying to hard) comfort and flirty I wore this dress several times to various diverse occasions. This dress is so versatile, it was a perfect fit wherever I wore it, Highly recommend

The dress is fitted but has a lot of give to it. It's forgiving all over. I love that the sleeves are tight and have a nice ruffle to give it a little something extra. The length is perfect. I am 5'5" and it was a couple inches above my knee. I wore this with black sheer stockings for a work dinner but will be wearing it again to a work holiday party without stockings and a really fun necklace. Would definitely rent again!
TTS, Cute LBD
Love the sleeves and top but the zipper lands on the curve of your butt and won't lay flat which makes the entire dress look skewed from behind. I was disappointed
Rented for Maui - I paired with a belt, and it can work from day into evening. It is a bit tight, but overall, would recommend for #summer or #vacay.

links_reviews_title: Fits in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress because my original dress was suddenly not available. I was able to speak with a customer service rep to ensure I could get a new dress in time for my rehearsal dinner. It was a tad bit see through so make sure to have the proper color undergarments! It fit pretty snug, I'm typically a 4 and I had to squeeze into this one a bit. The lace is very pretty and I was pleasantly surprised at how beautiful it is- photos online don't do it justice!

links_reviews_title: My wedding shower dress was on point!!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. My only regret is that I didn't rent it longer. I felt like a princess

This is one of my favorite rentals. I wore this for a work event where I did a lot of walking in the Las Vegas summer heat. It was super comfortable and a great length. It looked cute with sandals and I couldn't walk very far without receiving a compliment. I would rent this over and over again. It could be dressed up or down easily and appropriate for a lot of different occasions!

links_reviews_title: Totally made me feel Like a princess!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is so soft and the pattern is beautiful. The fit was wonderful, but I am thankful I am so small chested else it may have been snug. I will definitely be renting this dress again, super flattering, very sheer so I wore a light slip underneath, the length was perfect and I received many compliments

links_reviews_title: Elegant and Perfect for a Summer event!
links_reviews_text: True to size! Loved it...
Sooo many compliments on this gorgeous dress!

I loved this dress because the detail on the fabric is stunning! It fits very well and has a beautiful neckline. I wore this to a daytime event, but this dress can be both dressed up with dressy heels or dressed down for a daytime brunch. The fabric is such that it can really go either way! I wore a size 2 and it reached just at my knees. I would definitely wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my son's First Communion
links_reviews_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE everything about this dress!!! It's fits perfectly & the lace is absolutely gorgeous. I got SO many compliments & felt incredible in it. I wish I could keep it but I know I can always rent it again!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful lace details and great fit
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. It fit perfectly and I definitely agree with the other reviews that the cut is very flattering. I got loads of compliments on this dress. It's lined and thick enough where I did not need a bra either
When I tried it on, it seemed to look vintage 1990's. It was very safe. I chose to wear something else for the party.
The fit was a bit too small and as such I wasn't pleased with a few areas that wrinkled and pulled but the lace was beautiful.
Fits well, straps were a little long.
Thank you
Fit perfect
A bit long in the waist for a petite. Otherwise true to size. Looked nice and people remarked on it many times. Don't understand why it would retail for so much $$$$ but I loved borrowing it!

links_reviews_title: Fits great! I just didn't like that the lace detail was a different color than the white dress
links_reviews_text: Dress fits great! Runs true to size.

this is an absolutely beautiful and delicate dress. i really cannot stress enough how beautiful it is. the design is slimming, the crossover lace in the front is stylish and conservative. this can be dressed up or down, but will look beautiful either way. i'm usually btwn a 2 and a 4 and found the 4 to be perfect. wear nude undergarments or they will show through. enough room for a meal, but not overly large. i can't wait to find a reason to get this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Memorable dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: Felt awesome in this dress and it definitely draws attention.

links_reviews_title: Really nice dress, but suck it in
links_reviews_text: Great dress. High quality and sexy yet appropriate. Got tons of compliments. Beware side profile pictures - it's not forgiving in the mid section.

Tight bottom half but has some stretch to it which was flattering. Top was a bit large. Can't adjust the two back straps unfortunately. If this was mine, I'd take it in to make the straps tighter across the back so I didn't feel like it was going to fall down. The color is amazing.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but a weird fit
links_reviews_text: Like the other reviews said, the bottom was tight while the top was looser. As a 32 D I didn't think I would have much problem with the fit of the top and while it fit for the most part, the stomach area was a little loose. If you're a gal who has a bigger bust but a flat stomach this may not be the best fit for you! The length was very flattering though and I wish it fit better

This dress was one of my fave rentals. My husband normally tells me "you look fine." When he saw this dress, he didn't want to let me out of his sight. Any dress that gets that reaction is a 5 star dress! Many compliments from other women too!
So many compliments in this dress!! Material was thick and hid any imperfections! Fit my bust perfectly. I would definitely rent again!!
Wore this out for a night in Vegas. Beautiful color and fit. Hugs curves perfectly. I have bigger hips and a fairly small chest (30-32B) and it was just a little big on the top. Perfect otherwise!
Fit tighter around my hips, but I am curvy. A little loose around my bust but not to the point i had to tug at it all night. Got a ton of compliments, loved the color!!

Dress was a perfect fit, I wore this dress to a fashion show. I was comfortable the whole night and no bra was needed. Needed a second person to help with securing the back. Would rent it again. Tons of compliments.

i wore this dress for my sorority's valentine's day function. the fit is tighter around the waist so i suggest sizing up if you are bigger at the hips than torso. the color was great- super vibrant, but looked a little more orange than i expected in certain lights. overall a great dress, though!

links_reviews_title: Great on photos! And figure flattering.
links_reviews_text: Wore it for family pics, it was great fit, a little difficult to put on by yourself. But it looked and fit great! Awesome red color. Brighter red, and has more yellow than blue.

This dress was actually a last minute backup and boy did it impress! I wore this for a work holiday party. It had just enough flair, but did not feel inappropriate. I am typically between a 4-6/S-M and I wore the 6. My hips are wider and my bust is smaller, so I did have to safety pin the two straps tighter which was a little inconvenient but afterwards it fit like a glove. I did wear this with a strapless bra and pinned the strap to it to hide, because otherwise the top would have completely fell flat, even with the supportive boning. It has plenty of room in the hips and tummy to not feel uncomfortably tight, and with the tightened top I never was having to constantly pull it up as I do with most other strapless dresses. I wish i would have ordered this dress from the get go!

I went with the 8 because after reading the reviews I knew it ran small. The size up fit great and I still had room since it was already tight fitting. Great dress and would recommend for any formal occasion!

links_reviews_title: STUNNER! But runs normal on top and small thru the bum
links_reviews_text: SIZE UP, unless you are smaller on bottom than on top. I'm pretty proportional but another girlfriend of mine who wore this warned me about the same thing - fits totally normal on top for your size, but smaller in the hips. I did not size up (whoops) and made it work but it wasn't super comfy that way. The dress is STUNNING though and I would totally wear it again. Literally felt like a rock star when I put it on.

This was actually sent as replacement for the original rental I received. I was pleasantly surprised by the beauty of it, the material was nice and substantial and the color just so vibrant! The dress overall fit great but it did manage to slip down a bit through the night and found myself tugging at it. But I'd definitely recommend this rental! I received so many compliments and since my original rental didn't work out this made up for it.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress! Fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my boyfriend's frat formal and it was so perfect for it! The dress fits like a glove and is such a great material. Got so many compliments while wearing this dress! I was honestly sad when I had to return it to rtr because it was such a great dress. I would totally rent this dress again or even buy it in the future.

The dress has a thick material, which is great! I have small boobs and a big butt, so the dress was tight on my butt. I usually wear a 2, but was so happy I had the 4. Would recommend, but it is very tight!
Perfect fit and was so comfortable!!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for my event. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I rented it for a premiere party for my job so I wanted to look hot in front of all the actors and cameras but still work appropriate. I think this dress struck the perfect chord. UPS didn't deliver the dress the day before my event as scheduled so I had to go get it the day of the event. Luckily the timing worked out but it made me more nervous that it wouldn't fit. Everything worked out great though. The dress fit perfectly. It was really flattering. I wore a spanx thong and a sticky bra with it and never worried about anything all night. I'm a 34DD but the back straps were still a little loose. It didn't fall though and was comfortable all night. Highly recommend it. The only thing I didn't like was that it came very wrinkled and there were still some visible creases even after ironing.

links_reviews_title: "That girl in the Red Dress" You will be seen...prepare to stand out!!
links_reviews_text: Sexiest dress I've rented. I am 135lbs when this was taken, the 6 was fitting okay but the 4 I chose because the dress tightness actually hugged my body better, kept more things wrapped in. Sturdy fabric. I was happy the dress looked awesome in photos, I had fun wearing something out of my usual comfort zone, and completely sexy!! I had to be careful and cognizant of my posture, not go heavy at dinner, ect. because...dress felt like it ran SMALL. I enjoyed the event regardless and was being complemented of its beauty left and right. Rent away knowing it's not for the faint of heart, if you want to be laid back and blend in where you wear it. Prepare for a fun, hot tomale red.. nice choice for an exciting event! I wore it to a fall wedding.
This dress fit amazing! It was a bright bold stunning red. Stood out in group photos! Very comfortable while being from fitting. Would definitely recommend this for dressier occasions!

Loved this dress so much! The color is beautiful and I love the front that it hides my chest and stomach a bit. It's really flattering. The back was a bit tight and chest fit just perfect- only slightly big. My back couldn't even fit in the size 8 though. Overall, extremely happy! It was a hit!

This dress was sexy and classy all in one hot little piece. I ended up wearing the 6 because I have a huge rib cage and the size 4 was a bit too short for a wedding. I received so many compliments and felt like one hot babe!

I loved the fit! I was worried that a strapless dress would mean a night filled with pulling up/adjusting the dress but it stayed put all night. It was tight, but not too tight. It made me feel like everything was secure. Very flattering and received a lot of compliments! I would give it 5 stars except one of the clasps had fallen off in transit so I had to use a safety pin since the other size would have been a bit too big.

links_reviews_title: A sexy and very comfortable dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits perfectly. It is very confortable to dance and move with.
Top was a bit large.

I would 100% recommend this dress. It was super snug around my hips but I could still move in it. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and my boyfriend loved it. My only issue was that the straps were too loose on the top. Luckily, I had safety pins and I was able to pin them tighter so it would stay up. I could not have sized down because the bottom half was snug.
Great color and fit! The top makes it fun and flirty while the skirt portion of the dress is fit and flattering. Can't wait to wear this again! I received so many compliments :)

links_reviews_title: Loved it - but needs some repair
links_reviews_text: Would be five stars, but the boning was coming out of the dress in two places and it was poking me which made it uncomfortable. I don't know what RTR policy is on this type of issue --- but it was a little disappointing. The dress other than that was excellent. I'm a huge fan of this designer and have worn several dresses by Him. The material is soft, silky, and stretchy. I always wear a size smaller than normal in his dresses (I'm usually between 4-6 and wore the 2). I am a smaller 34C and there was room in the bust area but that boning (which hurt me) also helped keep the dress in place. I did not wear a bra and didn't even try a strapless one to see if the back showed it. It was a great length - it was long enough for me at 37 years old, but short enough to still make me feel sexy. It was tight on my thighs, but I could pull it up over my hips to use the bathroom although barely (28 inch waist 38 inch hips) I wore this out in Vegas to dinner and to a lounge after and it was perfect. Honestly I would rent again even if the boning wasn't fixed but I would be more prepared ( I'm on vacation so limited on tools haha) and put some sort of barrier in between that and my skin. I think most women would feel good in this dress. My husband loved it.

links_reviews_title: The color popped, would rent again
links_reviews_text: The size 2 fit on top but was tight in the waist if you have hips, but it had a stain on it. So I wore the 4. It fit very comfortably on the bottom but the top was a bit big. If you have extra padding that helped. I would rent again. Tons of compliments and the color was so pretty

Perfect for a summer wedding. This dress was super comfortable to dance in and I didn't need to worry about wearing a bra or pulling the dress up all night. The color is even prettier in person! Highly recommend!!
Agree with other reviewers - the top runs very large compared to the bottom. That said, fashion tape helped a lot and the style, material, and color of the dress are beautiful!
Great dress! The only issue I had was that it rode up a lot while walking.
The picture is terrible quality, but this dress is super flattering! I am a 34D and loved that it was minimizing up top. It was comfortable and I loved that the color was true red.

LOVED this rental! The 0 fit me perfectly, however I initially ordered a 2 & 4 based on reviews and size guide on Jay Godfrey's website. If you're smaller busted like I am, definitely size down. The fabric on this dress is super flattering and the color is gorgeous, definitely more red than on the model. I went bra-free and wore no-show undies and it was probably one of my favorite rentals to date! Can't wait to rent this in blue!!!

So I originally had the four and it fit my small bust well but it was to small on my hips and thighs. So I had to have a size six overnighted. The six fit well on hips and thighs but was too big on the bust. I had to pull up the top all night. Fashion tape wouldn't hold it up.

Felt comfortable and confident in this gorgeous dress! I normally wear a size 4 but it felt too tight on my thighs so went with the 6. The top was a little big and had to pull it up a couple of times. The length was perfect, showing just the right amount of leg and the detail on the back gave it a little something extra. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: It was the most gorgeous and flattering dress.
links_reviews_text: I am a typical size 6, large bust with some hips and stomach and this dress was very flattering!
This dress was amazing! It stayed in place all night even after dancing! I'm 5'3" and it was a great length!

The fit was great and the material was also made of good quality for a wedding. The dress came in great condition. I usually wear a 6 in dresses depending on how high the zipper goes up the back because I'm a 36D but I was able to size down to a 4 and it fit comfortably. I didn't need a bra for this one. And I received a lot of compliments. Great dress for short girls because it's not too long and not too short. It's lined and it also has a rubber strip at the top of the dress for extra support.

Wore this to a masquerade event. It arrived extremely wrinkly, so I had to spray it a ton with downy wrinkle spray prior to wearing it. Material is very soft, spandex like (not what I was expecting, but much more comfortable!). I usually wear a size 4-6 in dresses & this fit like a glove (size 4R) with short heels. Would rent again! Very classy but still edgy with the one leg cut out!
Easy to wear, elegant but edgy

This dress is so unique and fun. I wore it to a wedding and it's great to dance in and even though it's black fabric it's light and not too warm to wear in the warmer months! It fit so well, I loved it so much!

This was my first RTR experience and I will definitely be coming back. I'm 5'7" and got a 6R and it fit me perfectly. The dress was so comfortable and stretchy. We forgot to get a picture at the party so had a fun photo shoot when we got home. Can't wait for an occasion to rent again!

I read the reviews and so I chose a size smaller, when i typically go a size larger to fit my chest. Fabric was stretchy to accommodate my chest and the fit was perfect. I loved this dress and received tons of compliments all night!!

I ordered this for a Murder Mystery Party (I was the victim as you can tell by the photo hahaha). I got lots of compliments. It was SO comfortable. I didn't have any issues with it riding up, but I wasn't doing a lot of dancing. I wore the 4... probably could have worn the 2, but the material is stretchy, so even though the 4 was probably a bit big, you couldn't tell... left lots of room for food. I am 5'6" and got the regular length and it was just a tad short - it didn't quite hit the floor without shoes on, so with heels, it was a bit short but not TOO short. Overall, LOVED it and would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for cocktails at a nice hotel, dinner and drinks followed by dancing at a club.
links_reviews_text: For reference I am 5'6" and about 145 lbs. I'm athletic but have some curves and a bit of a tummy. That being said the fit is amaaaazing. As other woman have commented, this dress is so comfortable. My only complaint is a weird little bump formed on the back when I zipped it up, but I honestly doubt anyone but me noticed. I decided to go with black boots to make it more of a badass look ;-) Whereas if you wear it with heels it looks classy AF. I wish I owned this dress and am considering making that happen!

links_reviews_title: A million compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Very flattering. Didnt hug the wrong places.
I wore this dress to a black tie wedding. I'm 5'6- ordered a 4L and wore it with heels and the dress was the perfect length. It was stunning!! Fit like a glove.

This dress was actually my free back up, but it stole the show! It was the perfect length without heels, so when I put my heels on it was a little short but probably for the best! It was modest but sexy with the leg slit, and was very flattering. It was my first time with RTR and definitely won't be my last!

Great Dress! Wish there was a 2 or 4 petite, the 2 regular still was a little long even with the highest heels I could find! This was a fun dress to wear and I loved that it was different from the dresses I have worn in the past! Material was very flattering and giving!

links_reviews_title: It was my friends' very classy and beautiful wedding!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. The fabric wasn't too thin or thick--I wore some Spanx shorts just to be safe. The only con is the short part of the skirt hikes up while you are dancing, but besides that, I really loved the whole thing. I got complimented on my outfit by another wedding guest! Would highly recommend this dress.

I loved this dress!! The tail on the back that exposes one leg is amazing. The material is really soft -- other reviews that say it feels like you're wearing pajamas are definitely accurate. I was originally concerned that the shorter under-dress would ride up, but that wasn't a problem even with dancing during the night! I loved the cut-in style of the neckline too, so flattering!
Fit was true to size, the material was incredible comfortable and flattering!

links_reviews_title: Perfect sexy dress for a formal occasion!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a black tie wedding. I got tons of compliments! The fabric is stretchy and form fitting and is a perfect fit for those with a bit of shoulder or who want a classic yet sexy look. If I could have kept it I would! Love it!

links_reviews_title: It was a figure flattering dress with 2 parts, a shorter part and a longer overlay for the back.
links_reviews_text: Very fitted, but flattering with ruching on side and stretchy, but great material. I'm 5'4" and wore high heels, but the long back still touched the ground. Great dress, will rent again!

links_reviews_title: The venue was super cool and the dress made me feel confident all night.
links_reviews_text: This dress was great! The material is nice and stretchy which made it fit like a glove and allowed for movement. The style is a bit dramatic but not over the top. You have major flexibility with shoes and accessories that you can wear since the dress is black. The cut makes the shoulders look fab. I highly recommend this dress.
I normally wear an 8 but the 6 fit perfectly! The material is super stretchy and comfortable. Wore to a gala, got a million compliments!

links_reviews_title: Made me look and feel gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6" tall and 140lbs. I ordered a size 6R and a size 4R. The 6R was a little too baggy on me, surprisingly, so I went with the 4R. It was a tiny bit snug, but I threw on a pair of spanx and I was good to go! It's much thinner material than I thought so panty lines are very visible. A thong should help with that. The length was perfect with a pair of heels. No dragging on the ground and it wasn't too short. I would definitely order this dress again. I got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, sexy but kept zipper twisting and bulged.
links_reviews_text: The fit of the dress was great, very comfortable material and perfect for those post baby kid sections. I didn't end up wearing the dress to the banquet because the zipper would lay flat and kept getting off center when I walked.

Loved the material of this dress. It was stretchy and soft, making it comfortable and forgiving. The high-low was also sexy and elegant at the same time. I got SO many compliments and felt amazing all night. I am 5'7", 134 pounds and found the 2L was perfect.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a black-tie optional wedding. It was perfect for the formal occasion!
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress! I received compliments all night while wearing it. The dress was comfortable and was long enough for me to wear with a heel (I'm 5'10"!)
