Although this was not the style I originally selected for my event, Rent The Runway worked with me to find a suitable substitute since my style was no longer available. The replacement style was a winner for sure!

I recieved this dress as a back up and did not wear it because my first option worked out. However, i loved this dresss and would love to rent it for a different occassion (felt too sexy/"look at me"to wear to a wedding, but would be great for a gala or other formal affair). This dress is stretchy and runs large (even for the busty) so size down!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - very easy to wear, comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: I am normally between sizes (4-6) and was much happier with how the 4L fit. This dress has a very soft stretchy material, so it's forgiving and easy to wear. If you are between sizes I suggest getting the smaller size. I am 5'8 and the 4L was the appropriate length - it barely hit the floor with 3" heels on.

Fit was very good, not to tight, not too loose. I just loved the dress and so did my husband. I'm a very athletically built women and the chocker cut was perfect for me. The company was also very great to work with. I had to change the rental due to a change in date of the event and they were very helpful with this.

links_reviews_title: This gown was perfect for a black and white gala.
links_reviews_text: The top was a little large so I was very self conscious about my bra showing, but overall it was a good fit.

This dress was kind of like wearing pajamas - in the BEST way! Awesome, stretchy fabric, but still looked nice. Very flattering! I would say it runs a little big, but overall great fit. I'm usually a 2/4 depending on how the dress fits and I honestly would have liked to try the 0 in this one, so size down for backup!

I made quite the entrance with this little number! So dramatic, yet super classy! It fit a tad loose but not a big deal. It was super comfy too! More comfy than my pjs I wore that night!!! Love ot and so sad to send it back!

links_reviews_title: Danced the night away in comfort
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black tie wedding and I couldn't have made a better choice. It was actually the back up dress of my back up dress (my first two choices came back too damaged and I was sent the weong dress) HOWEVER, RTR (per usual) made everything better with their amazing customer service and helped me find this BA dress. I just had a baby two months ago, so I wanted to look sexy while still trying to hide my post oartum body. This dress dis the trick. It was comfortable, sexy, and hid my "baby belly" perfectly.

I LOVED this dress! I wore it to my husband's holiday party. It was so eye-catching and the cut is very unique. It was incredibly comfortable. It had so much stretch and the material is so giving that I actually could've gone down a size. Perfect for many different occasions.

links_reviews_title: RTR came through for me on my first rental!
links_reviews_text: At the time of renting this dress, this dress had no reviews. I had rented another dress from RTR, but that dress had a hole in it. After going through all of my dress options over the phone with a consultant, this was one of the only dresses still available for the time I needed it. Honestly, it was the best "mishap" ever! This dress looked better than the original I had picked out, it had AMAZING stretch so it looked wonderful on my curves, but didn't bandage me in. Super flattering and unique dress and I got so many compliments on this dress. I'm not always one to feel super confident when dressing up, but while in Nashville, I felt like a superstar in this dress! I didn't want to take this dress off it was that comfortable (it seriously felt like I was wearing leggings the entire night). I would HIGHLY recommend this dress and the RTR Customer Service was phenomenal as they overnighted this dress to me from NYC to Nashville, TN. Get this dress for your special night, you won't regret it!

This dress was perfect to wear to a James Bond-themed gala! The asymmectrical look was eye-catching and showed off a little leg. It made me feel sophisticated and sexy! The regular length was exactly right with a pair of 3-inch heels and didn't get in the way of walking or dancing throughout the evening. The stretchy material made it super comfortable to move in, although it wasn't the best to hide tummy flaws; if you're self conscious about that area I'd definitely suggest some spanx or something underneath. The upper half and neckline were a little loose on me despite being large-chested, and the back kind of rippled along the zipper, but that's probably just the result of having a shorter torso. This dress needed to be worn with a strapless bra, since the racerback straps showed near the shoulders. This was my first rental with RTR and it could not have turned out better! Will definitely be using them again for future events!

links_reviews_title: This event was a family celebration.
links_reviews_text: This dress is comfortable to wear and show off your favorite shoes.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful wedding with lots of friends and dancing.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! It was flattering, comfortable and looked amazing. I liked that I could dress it up with a few accessories. The material was breathable through a night of dancing. I loved that it was formal, but I didn't feel over dressed at all.
This is the perfect event dress because the cut gives you the long, formal look with the ability to easily walk and dance. Plus, it shows off your amazing shoes!

The long dress portion covered the entire back of the dress and half the front, made it really helpful in terms of not worrying about things like bending over. Material was comfortable but did not seem super high end.

I'm 5'7 and 143 and 34DD I chose the 8 over the 6 as I don't like tight. I like being comfortable in my clothes even if it's formal. This dress was so comfy and I enjoyed the short/long hemline. The fabric is soft and doesn't feel like it's catching fire when the sun hits it....we all know how black can feel. To sum it up, it's a winner.

links_reviews_title: Loved this fun dress! Unique and playful!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 6L and an 8L. I was in a huge hurry and accidentally wore the 6 but it worked. Received several compliments and my husband loved it on me! I just had our second baby so my stomach is not my strong point right now but I made it work by holding tummy in as much as possible. This dress was too short to wear spank with in my opinion but I was able to wear a strapless bra. I'm a 38DD so that's a must. Overall this dress was great! At 5'7 with three inch heels this was just long enough. I was skeptical because the lack of reviews and photos but I think it's just because it's new.

links_reviews_title: A true crowd teaser and superbly sophisticated
links_reviews_text: True to size and well designed to accentuate

Rented this dress for a formal ball. The dress runs a bit large, so if you are between sizes I would go down one. The material is very stretchy and comfortable, and the shorter part of the dress did not ride up throughout the night. Very happy with this rental and loved the earrings I rented to go with it.
Cute and flattering, but girls with thick booties and thighs will definitely need to watch out.

links_reviews_title: It was extremely comfortable and an amazing renting experience

links_reviews_text: Definitely ended up keeping this one. So playful, flattering and fun. Easy to wear with a normal bra and my butt doesn't hang out which is a huge plus.

This romper is so cute that I wanted to love it, however it is not something I would ever rent again. The top was incredibly low cut and I did not feel comfortable wearing it out of the house without a cami underneath. I did not have the issues other women had with the button coming unsnapped though. The bottoms were also really short. I never felt like I was hanging out, but everything was riding up. Overall, it was really cute when I was standing still, but as soon as I started moving, it was hard to ignore how small the romper was. However, if I had a smaller chest and smaller booty, I might have felt differently.
This romper was super lightweight and fun to wear. Loved that it had a tie waist. Only downside was I needed to use some fashion tape to keep the top from falling too low/open throughout the day.
I loved this romper so much that I bought it! The material feels high quality and the fit was perfect for me. The neckline is a tad low, but I felt very comfortable in it.

This was super fun, really flattering through the waist, and a perfect spring outfit! It is pretty low cut, so I added a lace bralet to cover up some décolletage. It was snuggest through the waist but oddly, going up a size didn't remedy this much, just made it a bit saggier through the back. Loved the pockets, loved the sleeves and fabric. V flattering through the torso and bust, but not a conservative look. Even on short people, it's going to be short in the leg.
Nice but it had this little button to keep the chest closed which kept opening the whole night. Very annoying. But nice romper!

This was my first time wearing a romper and while I was originally a little skeptical I would up loving it! It does run a little short and I can imagine for anyone taller than I am or someone with a long torso it could be a problem. It definitely rode high when I was sitting but for the setting for a birthday party that wasn't as much of an issue. I got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This romper was perfect for my reunion.
links_reviews_text: Was very cute. Large in the chest but fashion tape an a safety pin made it fit.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, perfect for date night outside for live music!
links_reviews_text: It fit well for my hourglass shape. The front plunge did show a bit of décolletage, but it was classy sexy & appropriate for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my birthday dinner and it was so cute and flattering!
links_reviews_text: Like most rompers for my body type, it's a little challenging to get through my butt and it's loose on the top since I have small breasts. I used double-sided tape that's made for fabric to keep it together at the top, though it didn't last the entire night so I just accepted the looseness. I would say the romper overall fits true to size, but I labeled it as "runs large" because of the top area. Otherwise, I really loved it and it was so flattering!

links_reviews_title: I want to live in this romper!!
links_reviews_text: This romper was a perfect fit for my height/body type. It is so much cuter than the pictures. There is a little cleavage to make it sexy for a night out, but not too much that you're falling out. The short length was also great for me, but I can see how they could be short on someone taller. Great high quality material.

I really liked this romper. You could dress it up or dress it down. It does show a decent amount of cleavage. You can wear normal bra with it. It is a little difficult to unzipper by yourself but I made it work.

I probably would not rent it again. I did like it. The two reasons being it was very open in the front. Initially I applied double sided sticky tape but once you go to the bathroom it doesn't work anymore. I also found it to be short and I am short.

links_reviews_title: Very fun romper - very flattering but short!
links_reviews_text: The romper's cut is low in the front but the pre-wedding event I wore it too was later in the evening so I think it was fine. The romper is also very short - and I am only 5'3" with short legs. I really liked it though and would have kept it if I could.

I wore this on a trip to savannah and really enjoyed it. I wish that the clasp was higher up so that I didnt have to wear a tank top underneath. It was one more added thing to worry about when going to the bathroom. Otherwise good fit.

links_reviews_title: Very short and tight on the bottom!
links_reviews_text: If you're pear shaped like me, considering going up a size. The bottom half was tight. I still wore it and it was adorable but would have been more comfortable in a size up.
Very low cut.

Just like everyone said, it fits great except it's a little loose in the chest. Some fashion tape would help or wear a Cami or bandeau style bra underneath. I wore it to drive to the Hamptons (a few hours) and it was super comfy and vacay ready for when I got there.

links_reviews_title: Not for those who are body conscious!
links_reviews_text: Super cute romper but VERY short and showed a TON of cleavage. I do have long legs, but I was super self conscious of the fact that I couldn't bend over. Normal rompers aren't like this on me. I did love that this was made for petite girls, usually the leg openings of rompers are huge on me and I look like I'm swimming in them, this wasn't the case. Overall I highly recommend sizing up if you are debating sizes. It's super cute and my fiancé LOVED it, I was just a little self conscious wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Size up if you have a bit more junk in your trunk
links_reviews_text: Loved the pattern and look of this romper. The top was a bit lower than I expected and the bottoms were a bit tight in the size I ordered. If you have a bit more to your booty - love it and consider sizing up. I ended up not wearing this more than to try it on.

a WARNING for girls with a little junk in the trunk-- it can be tight getting it on! Once it was on it fit perfectly but definitely had to do a little wiggle dance to get it over my butt. I got it for vacation but ended up not wearing it because it was so low cut my bra kept showing and it was not as flattering as I would've hoped.

Once on, this romper is the cutest! Wore while out for drinks and got lots of compliments. However, getting it on and off was a challenge that was not made easier by alcohol. The zipper needed to go down probably 1 inch more to ease my fear of ripping it entirely. For reference, my body is more shaped like a pencil than a pear. So if you are blessed with a booty, beware.

links_reviews_title: Planned to wear this for a day in wine country
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this because it was too short/tight in the torso for me. I think sizing up would help. It's really pretty, light-weight and would be great for a summer day
Too short, too low cut and sleeves were too big

links_reviews_title: This romper rules - I just have bigger hips so recommend going a size up.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 26 or 27 in jeans, and a size 0 or 2 in dresses. Went for the size 2 in this romper and it was just toooo small - recommend the 4. I'm 5/3 125 lbs.

Wore this to my daughters dance competition and received a ton of compliments! I love that it has a clasp for the top so that it is not too revealing if you aren't going for that look. Perfect length for me at 5'2!
Didn't end up wearing this since it wasn't appropriate for daytime based on the fit. The waist was very tight and the neckline very revealing. Super cute but size up if you don't have a teeny waist.
Could not get it over my butt/hips. I routinely fit into BB Dakota 4s but this was impossible to get on - not meant for women with my body type.
Cheeky
L

links_reviews_title: Cute, but small and needs cami!
links_reviews_text: This is a cute romper...if you get the size right. It most definitely runs small! I was not blessed with a butt, so if I had a problem shimmying it on -- size up in order to get it over your backside! The waist sinches pretty tight post-zipper, too. Also, there is no way you can not wear a cami underneath -- a navy one looks just fine.
Im not sure what size 6 person this fits, but this may not be a US 6. Runs very small.

links_reviews_title: Cute romper with a great pattern
links_reviews_text: My torso is long, so the fit was a little off for me (5'6 / 135). I wasn't comfortable in it, so I didn't end up wearing it at all outside of my house, but I love the print. Perfect for someone with a shorter torso.

I'm 5'6" and 125 lbs and typically wear a size 2. Ordered this in size 2 and could barely get it on. Once on it was too short, both in the length of the shorts (I felt like my butt was hanging out) and in the actual length of the jumpsuit itself - I couldn't bend over. Bummer because it was really cute, but I would definitely recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear due to the cut of the bust.
links_reviews_text: I am 34DD and this would not fit across my chest; the fabric was pulling at the largest point of my bust, bifurcating them horizontally. Not cute! The stylist notes say good for full bust, but apparently not! Otherwise it would have been really cute!! Otherwise, it looked great on, but if you are in the DD club I do not recommend. Could not wear it.
I originally rented the 6 and it was too small so I was sent an 8, still too small. Super cute romper though. If I had rented the 10 it would have been too big up too.

links_reviews_title: Fun romper but not easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I liked this romper but getting in and out of it wasn't easy. The back zipper gets stuck. Perhaps consider sizing 2 up if you're on the bustier side.

This is a very figure flattering romper. I received many compliments! However, it does run quite short so if you are Tall, beware. I had to be careful not to bend over or reach up because it would show my bum. I would have kept this item but, decided to send it back because the pattern might grow old on me. Fun while it lasted!

This dress was picked out by one of the RTR stylists for me for my 30th birthday dinner. This dress was so eye catching, an awesome color, and so comfortable. The cap sleeves and scoop back were so flattering. The length came to just about the knee on me and was easy to move in. I didn't feel like I had to suck it in after dinner. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a party at 2 months postpartum
links_reviews_text: I am 2.5 months postpartum and LOVED this dress. It was extremely flattering and I felt beautiful in it which unfortunately doesn't happen often postpartum. Ran true to size and was the perfect length

I received a lot of compliments on the dress, it was true to size and fit well. There were no down sides to the dress as far as I am concerned, only the actual color is not as deeply blue as the photo on the RTR website makes it appear, so the color was not what I expected but I still liked it.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a February Ice Ball
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this dress! Flattering fit and not too short.
A great dress! Stretchy and comfortable to wear. Big sequins (only a little scratchy, as sequins always are), fabulous color

links_reviews_title: Great dress-comfortable and love the back!
links_reviews_text: I’ve rented this dress in the long version as well. It’s very comfortable and sizing is forgiving because there’s some stretch to the fabric. Thick enough that you don’t need a bra (yay!). Got lots of compliments! I’m 5’4”, 125 lbs, 34C.

This was my backup dress but when my husband saw me trying it on he said "That's your dress for tonight"! Hugged in all the right places and was surprisingly comfortable. I was even able to dance in it! Absolutely one of my favorite rentals ever.
Beautiful color, need a backless bra, tons of compliments. Neck line is very flattering. Loved this dress. Wore New Years Eve.
Fits like a glove. So comfortable. And I got a ton of compliments on it.

Turns out I'm a little smaller than I thought, but I managed to make it work. I got so many compliments and felt great. It's sequins, so after a few hours it was scratchy under my arms, but I expected that going in. I'm an F cup, but it was fitted enough that I was able to get away with just petals - would have felt even better about that choice if i had sized down, but that's life. Return process was easy as pie. I definitely plan on using RTR again!

This dress made me feel so sexy without being slutty. I didn't wear a bra since I had the low cut back and I felt fine. I can see from pictures now that I should have worn some control undergarments but never mind. That night nothing could convince me I wasn't fierce in that dress. Fit was great it wasn't too heavy, sequins were well attached and draped nicely.
I read tons of reviews and glad I chose this dress. It has lots of give and would be flattering on most. The dramatic low back is just stunning. I'm 5'2".

Rented this for a bridal party I was in. (I'm the girl on the far left of the photo). Stretchy material and I found it to be very flattering on an hourglass body. Definitely can't wear a normal bra with it (low back) so be prepared to wear nothing or have pasties.

Great fit. I have a larger chest so i pinned it in the back to hide my bra and it looked good enough. Not terribly forgiving on the belly and very scratchy on arms, lots of marks the next day. The color is beautiful and I got lots of compliments.
I loved this dress. It’s comfortable and not too heavy. It’s a great length too. I received many compliments.
Loved the color and the fit. Incredibly comfortable and not too short. Only issue is that the back is low and I wasn't prepared with the right bra. You'll need a backless bra situation.

links_reviews_title: The compliments all night! The back is so sleek and classy.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and hugged in all the right places. Everyone complimented the dress all night long! Wore it to an awards show.
really stunning

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit, felt like a superstar
links_reviews_text: This dress hugged my curves perfectly. I wore it backwards for a more revealing look for my birthday party but you totally couldn't tell. I loved the color and the sequins weren't itchy at all. I was able to dance and wear all night with no issues.

links_reviews_title: Never before did I have so many people compliment me! All the staff there told me I looked gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Dress was comfortable. I usually order 18. I ordered 18W and 20W and 18W was perfect. I loved the back and dress didn't feel too short
Love this dress, the back is gorgeous. Wore this for a NYE party. I ordered a size 6 and 8 - ended up wearing the size 6 as it does run a little big. I am 5'2" 135 lbs and I do have some curves.

Loved this dress and got so many compliments. It was perfect for a NYE party and fitted perfectly. I did have an issue with hiding the back of a bra, but nothing a little bit of a fashion tape wouldn't fix. The dress has a bit of a stretch to it, so it is super comfortable to move and dance in!
This dress is a showstopper. I love the color and the low back. Plus, it is surprisingly comfortable due to the fabric having a bit of stretch.

links_reviews_title: Killed it in my RTR! I received compliments & it was a total headturner as always!
links_reviews_text: The shoulders fit a lil oddly sits slightly off shoulder, depends on your build I presume, otherwise great dress. I didn't wear a bra that also is a personal preference I'm a 36 D it doesn't provide support but if your girls sit well and you get a fitted enough size you should be fine ;)

I ordered this dress in a 6 and 8. I felt the 8 fit my body type (5'7", 151 lbs, hourglass) better around the midsection and hips, but the top part over the shoulders was a bit large and felt like it was falling, so I opted for the 6, where it was a better fit over the shoulders. Nothing a little shaper couldn't fix! The back is an open back down to about halfway and I didn't have a low strapless or stick-on bra, so I went braless, but you couldn't really tell. I got so many compliments on the dress. It's very sparkly and reflective and I had no issues with it riding up. It stayed in place all night and was very comfortable to wear all night. Some reviewers said they had issues with the dress rubbing under the arm at the end of their night, but I didn't have any issues. I would definitely rent this dress again.
I loved wearing this, got lots of compliments. Only issue was the be is tricky. I ended up wearing those sticky pasties and they aren't that supportive but I still felt great.

Pros: I'm close to 5'10 and 180 lbs. size 10 was perfect, not too tight or loose. Length hit about 3 inches above my knees Cap sleeves hid armpit skin ruffle Very pretty blue Cons: Rubbed my arms raw Impossible to wear bra (need something backless)

I was torn between a 6 and an 8. I'm so glad I went with the 8. It was comfortable, stayed in place and was absolutely stunning! I got tons of compliments. It doesn't photograph anything like it looks in person. It is soooo sparkly from every angle and is such a pretty Ice blue color. The draping of the back is sexy yet elegant. You definitely cannot wear a regular bra with it. I wore a backless stick on bra. I absolutely loved this dress. I'm even thinking of purchasing it.

I am 5'7" and 120lbs and the 2 fit perfectly! Super comfortable. I never had to fiddle with the straps or worry that they would fall off my shoulders and make everything awkward. Te he he! Really comfortable. Really pretty. Really great decision! I will for sure use RTR again! Much better than spending the same amount on a dress a fraction of the quality that I will never wear again! Can't wait for another occasion to rent!

links_reviews_title: Celebrating a great season of the Des Moines Rugby Football Club!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Fit perfectly!

The color of this dress is beautiful and has a beautiful back. However, not very forgiving in the stomach area for those of us without our the washboard tummy. I ended up not wearing this bc of how big I looked in the bust and the stomach.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. I wore it to my grad school holiday formal and got so many compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: Fit really well! I probably could have worn a 0. I love that it's backless, and I felt alright not wearing a bra. I started the evening in Spanx but took them off part way through and I couldn't tell much of a difference.
This dress was beautiful, made me feel really great, but had to create a large duct tape bra that was a little frustrating. Double D's beware!

links_reviews_title: Pretty comfortable with just enough stretch
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a professional Gala. It was appropriate and I got compliments. The armholes were a little restricting, but not enough to really be uncomfortable.

I loved wearing this dress! I wore it out to a show and drinks in Vegas for my birthday. The fit was perfect on my frame (6'1", 180) and was super comfortable. The dolman low back adds some party in the back to the classy front. I was able to wear a low back long-line strapless bra without any problem. The dress was also long enough to wear the mid-thigh spanx. I was very happy with the length of the dress on me, and for those of you who also have broad shoulders, the cap sleeves fit just fine. It was so nice that it fit so well and didn't need to be adjusted throughout the night. After a few hours, the sequins on the edge of the armholes did start to feel rough, but not enough to make it uncomfortable. This would be a great dress for NYE, holiday parties, etc. I might rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Great fit! Wore it in Vegas for a night out and felt great in it - the dress photographs well
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, perfect length

links_reviews_title: Dancing the night away in a beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: Fantastic fit. Stunning color in person. Compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Lots of sparkles, color was unlike any other in the room!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and I received a lot of compliments on it (of course)! But you CANNOT wear a standard bra with this, the strap WILL show in the back. So plan on wearing some kind of backless bra.

This dress was perfect for a longer wear. It had some stretch to it which made it very comfortable. The back is very flattering and lays perfectly. I did not have to fidget with the dress at all once it was on! Only one minor negative, the sequins under the arms chaffed a bit by the end of the night.

This was actually my backup dress but it looked so great on that I went with it over my first choice. I usually wear an 8 and wore an 8 in this dress. It was very form-fitting, but was not too tight. Got tons of compliments and I felt very pretty.

links_reviews_title: beautiful dress, fussy and irritating to wear
links_reviews_text: It fit beautifully if I didn't have to move, continually kept readjusting the straps to avoid a Janet jackson wardrobe malfunction.

links_reviews_title: Looks great but maybe not for busty girls
links_reviews_text: It looked great except I was worried my boobs would pop out. The shoulder strap was a little bit loose so it felt very low cut. I ended up safety pinning my straps a little tighter so It wouldn't be as low cut. Overall happy with how it turned out and looked
The dress felt very comfortable. I wish I could've adjusted the straps to make them a little tighter. My husband ended up putting a hair tie in the back to make the fit snugger and it worked great

links_reviews_title: Size down... Gorgeous blue (between a cobalt and teal blue)
links_reviews_text: Thick banded fabric can work like shape wear if you size down. I wore a medium and it was loose on my tummy. The straps were also quite long so neckline went very low making it very busty. Finding a bra that worked was difficult.

This is the one, just rent it! There is a reason why these dresses cost so much money...the fabric can be worn time after time and still look like a million bucks! Most comfortable dress....the color, style, fit and fabric is beautiful! I rented this for a beach wedding and paired it with a coral colored statement piece from Kate Spade.

links_reviews_title: It makes you feel so pretty
links_reviews_text: Absolutely gorgeous dress with amazing fit
Stunning dress. Classic and gorgeous. All my girlfriends wanted to buy it and one of my friends bought it after seeing it!
This dress is a gorgeous color. It's short but not too short.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress for a cocktail-attire wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the occasion! I usually wear a size S, however, it was a little baggy and a little too long. The XS fit perfectly, and was snug and flattering. As the other reviews mention, the dress was heavier than expected, so I did have to pull it up frequently. The color was so much more beautiful than what appears on the model's picture on the website. Overall: LOVED and would definitely rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress. The color and style is gorgeous. I would definitely recommend going a size down. I chose the XS as my backup size and it fit so well I didnt even try on the small. Perfect wedding attire!

The color is gorgeous - especially with a little summer tan. The front is very low cut. I ordered the large and when I put it on it felt a little stretched out. The back up medium was a little tight but looked better because in the large, the straps were gaping. The dress is a little heavy but I danced all night and was not hot at all. Tons of compliments- and a lot of glances down the front.

The dress is a nice, comfortable and sturdy fabric which creates a very flattering fit. The fabric feels a little thick but it isn't hot at all. My one issue was that the top kept creeping down and showing my bra. The straps were kind of stretched out and therefore didn't hold the top up very well. It photographs very well and is a nice bright cerulean blue.
Heavy material so it pulls down a bit in front and requires adjusting

Best Herve dress to dance in because of the flare- so easy to move around! No need for shape wear because this was snug- the small wasn't snug enough. When I sat it slightly rolled so that was it's a reminder not to slouch. Definitely would rent again.

This is my least favorite RTR so far. It is a beautiful color and I love the thicker fabric. However, the medium was WAY too tight to be appropriate for a maid of honor. And the large was too big. I wore the large anyway and it kept gaping open at the side straps, as you can see in this picture. Just a weird fitting dress for my body type, I think
The straps are a little stretched out. Great dress.

links_reviews_title: The color and fit were a perfect mix of sexy and classy!
links_reviews_text: I wore the XS and it fit perfectly. I loved that I could wear my normal push up bra and given the cut of the dress, I didn't need spanx. The pictures don't do the color justice. I received many compliments on this dress.
This was the first Herve Leger dress I have worn and the fit was absolutely amazing. The fabric is really thick and looks very slimming. The color is bright and vibrant, perfect for a summer wedding!

I loved this dress; I felt gorgeous and my boyfriend loved it. The neckline is low, so if you're not comfortable with cleavage it's not for you. This is a slightly more relaxed fit than your average Herve. I could have worn the xs, but decided to go with the small for a slightly more modest fit. This dress also has a long waist, so if you're short waisted or just short, it might not be the fit you want/expect from an Herve. Great for tall girls because it's not too short!

Definitely would give this dress 5 stars! I ordered a small and an extra-small as back-up. They both fit, but I wound up wearing the small since it was more comfortable. Very pretty color blue! Only negative is the bust line is a cut a little low.
I wore this dress to my school formal. I am very petite on top, but this dress was nicely fitted and stayed in place without me having to pull it up constantly. The color was really nice in person.

links_reviews_title: Very well made dress. Fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8, 120 lbs and 34 D bust. It fit very nice.

This dress is even more gorgeous in person!! I was so excited when I saw how pretty the color turquoise blue color was upon arrival. I ordered a small and extra small as a backup. I ended up wearing the small. It was pretty difficult to zip around my rib cage without help (I am a 34c). However, once zippered it was comfortable all evening. The fabric was thick but cool while dancing the night away. I loved this so much it was hard to send back!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was pefect to stand out at work meetings and parties -- LOVE!
links_reviews_text: Had straps so was professional enough to show off just enough curve at work, but then sexy enough to wear at an 80s party! I'm short and have very small curves (v slender frame) and this designer always makes me look like I have a hot bod. Color was absolutely stunning -- bright turquoise color -- would look gorgeous on blondes or brunettes -- fit is totally true to size.

links_reviews_title: Has sex appeal without being over the top
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was perfect for a nice dinner out with my husband on our honeymoon. The color was beautiful and the fit and flare cut of the dress prevented it from being to sexy. My primary size of large was unable to be shipped but the medium did work. However, if you have a larger chest aim for the larger size. I am usually 8 or 10, with 36/C or 36/D bra size. This dress can be worn with no bra.

links_reviews_title: Perfect bright blue for Easter brunch
links_reviews_text: Fits like the average Herve Leger dress, sucks you in and smooths you out all while delivering a stunning silhouette. Would rent again. Highly recommend.

This dress was so vibrant in color! The material is thick, without being too heavy or stiff. I ordered the small and XS. The XS fit, but since the event we were going to had a plated meal (and a killer dessert buffet), I opted for the small. I'm 5'6" and it was a little closer to knee length than I normally wear, but I received a ton of compliments. I would order this again!

There was a little gaping in the chest (I suspect from previous renters who had much larger breasts) but it wasn't terribly noticeable. I wore a strapless bra. Otherwise, looked great on my 24-inch waist. Most dresses are way too large so it was awesome to find one that fit properly. Loved the color. Seriously considering investing in a Herve Leger of my own.
This dress was even more vibrant in person! The fit and fabric were perfect and the skirt moves well on the dance floor. Loved wearing this!
I wore this to a polo event. So fun. Classy and comfortable. Really great color

links_reviews_title: Fun and sexy dress that made me feel great post baby.
links_reviews_text: The top was sexy and the fit and flare shape was super fun for a girls night out.

I wore this for girls night and got so many compliments on it. I normally wear XS but was worried since it's a bandage dress that it would be too tight, so I got a small and it ended up being a little too big. I would definitely rent this dress again.

This dress received many complements at the beach wedding I attended. The color popped and the fit was amazing. The neckline drops low so be careful with what kind of bra you wear; I found myself hiking it up for fear of being exposed.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful. Can be dressed up or down. Fun color.
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress. In HL I can wear medium or large. I would have prefered Medium in this, it could be tighter. Great bright color. Flattering flair.

I rented this for a yearly awards dinner for work. I was getting a big award and I wanted to feel special. Best dress I've ever had. Slimming and gives you great cleavage. Not too much and not too little. I felt classy and sexy. The only time I've ever felt prettier was in my wedding day. Pet of my wanted to keep the dress just because it was so pretty! I'm 5'9 and I worried that it might be too short on me but that wasn't the case. It was just the right amount of sexy and classy. I got compliments on the dress all day. I wore this in January, which I was worried was going to be too much color for that time of year but i was pleasantly surprised. The color was a deeper blue than I expected. This was the first time I did rent the run way and I am a forever fan. It was a great experience. Easy returns and the dress came exactly the day it said that it would.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie event where turquoise was part of the theme!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the XS and S. XS ran very tight at the bust and rib cage but S was too gappy at the armpits so I went with the XS. As the night went on, it became a little looser. Also this dress shoes all your bumps but the fabric is so heavy that it smooths them out as well. I got a lot of compliments on this dress but the sizing made it hard to give this 5 stars.
This dress is supposed to fit snug so I wore the medium vs large. I am 7 months post baby and this dress squeezed me in in all the right places. Loved it

links_reviews_title: Cute dress and the color is nice
links_reviews_text: This was a cute dress but I wish it was a little shorter because I'm so short. Probably why I like another dress I wore previously by the same designer better. I like the turquoise color and even though it is very form fitting, it is really comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Most amazing dress ever!! For like a glove and got lots of complements. Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I rented a size small for a wedding and would have gotten the xs for back up but it wasn't available. I've never wore a Herve dress and from the reviews I read, a size small seemed like the right fit. I could have gone with the xs I think because after a while it was a little stretchy (the small did) but overall, It fit AMAZING and I loved it!! I didn't want to send it back. Only "con" would be that the chest does fall a little low and it occasionally showed my bra, so I had to keep pulling it up- that could also be because I have a small chest. But I read this on other reviews and it is true- the chest falls down a little bit- nothing that ruins the dress or makes me love it any less, just something to be mindful of. Loved loved loved this dress. Very slimming. Felt very beautiful and sexy all night! 100% recommend.

links_reviews_title: Easy rent and return. On time delivery. Dress true to size.
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and wears beautifully. The color is fabulous. I was afraid that it might be too long but it was right above my knees. The cut on the neck line is deep and you will need a bra with a low cut that will not show. Otherwise it will be showing, my was showing and i was constantly hiding it. That's why i gave 4 stars.
Such a comfortable dress! I'm 5'4 and wore 2-3inch heels with the 4R. So flattering!

links_reviews_title: Rent the Runway for the win!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. I am 14 weeks pregnant with my second child. It was extremely comfortable. It hugged me in all the right places and I received multiple compliments throughout the night.

Hot diggity dog did I light up the room! The dress was SUPER comfortable in every aspect. The fabric was as breathe-able & easy to move in as athletic wear. I was comfortable the entire night! The only thing I wish I had done differently was find a strapless bra that I could have worn since it's a necessity with this dresses neckline. Also, I would have gotten a petite length if it were available at the time but I made it work with a killer pair of heels. Looking to buy this dress now!

I'm 5 months pregnant and wore this to a black tie wedding. It was stretchy enough to go over my bump without looking awkward or pulling weird. I think a 10 would have fit me slightly better, but the 8 worked just fine. My normal size is 8 so I would say if you are between sizes and pregnant, go up. I also wore maternity shape wear underneath to help with lines. Normal underwear would not work under this without showing lines. Overall, amazing pick! I got compliments all night and felt amazing!

links_reviews_title: RTR got my dress here in the middle of a snowstorm.
links_reviews_text: I am not a dress person. At all. But this one was perfect. It was comfortable (for a dress) and I got compliments on it all night. I maybe could've gone down to a 2R since it's a bit stretchy, but the 4R was perfectly fine.

Love this dress fits so well is extremely comfortable. Like many others I rented this as a backup and went with it. I am 5'4 and the regular was too short with heels recommend the long if you are going to wear anything higher than 3"

links_reviews_title: Fit was perfect! Black tie event... this felt amazing!!
links_reviews_text: True to size, light fabric, ruched bodice very flattering and slimming!

links_reviews_title: It was dressy yet not too flashy. Elegant and sexy at the same time.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and hugs all the right places.
This dress fit perfectly! Was very flattering and comfortable. The quality was great.
I received several compliments!!
Length was perfect for me. I am 5'4 and wore a short wedge and the length was perfect. It also was stretchy and I enjoyed that since I was 17 weeks pregnant.

The only thing I didn't love about this dress was that it stopped at my ankle. I was under the impression that it was a floor length gown. Regardless, it was beautiful and elegant. I recurved compliments on it all night
Usually wear size 4 and wore size 2. So glad I ordered both sizes! It was comfortable and length was perfect with shoes (I'm only 5'3") everyone asked where i got it!

links_reviews_title: Classy and comfortable. A perfect black dress.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Nice material.

This dress was SO comfortable and perfect for the black tie gala I attended& worked. I got so many compliments on the asymmetrical hemline and the leg slit made walking easy. I got the petite size but even so, I had to wear minimum 4in heels for the dress to be wearable for running around all night at my height.
Little Black Dress!
Used this dress 4 days before my due date, very nice and fits like a glove. I normally wear size 0-2, I rented 4R.

links_reviews_title: The asymmetrical neckline on this classic silhouette made this the perfect selection for my gala.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Make sure undergarments are seamless as dress material is clingy.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments on this super simple but very elegant dress
links_reviews_text: Stretchy fit made this dress super comfortable. Slit is just high enough to be sexy but not uncomfortable. Definitely needed spanx since it does show every curve! Strapless bra worked perfectly. Hard to find a dress that's this elegant and comfy! Would definitely rent it again for another fundraiser!

I ordered this dress to wear to a black tie fundraiser. I was skeptical being 32 weeks pregnant, but ordered my usual size 4 and it fit good! It was a little snug around the zipper but understandable with my baby bump. Length was perfect for my 5'1&half self wearing flats. Was very comfortable and the fabric was awesome. Def recommend!

links_reviews_title: Very elegant, fits like a glow
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed this dress a lot. It was very comfortable, fit true to size, good quality material. I would wear it again

The dress fit great. Fabric had a little stretch so it was forgiving. Slit was a great way to spice the look up! I had to go with my back up only bc the 10L wasn't quite long enough with my heals. Was comfortable for the extended amount of time I had to wear it. Dress was super classy got a lot of complements. Dress didn't even need accessories it was perfect just by itself! Love the ease of renting and returning l. Came in a nice bag that didn't even wrinkle the dress! Just reserved another dress for another wedding! Will continue to be a repeat customer!

links_reviews_title: Perfect combination of sexy and elegant
links_reviews_text: This dress was soooo comfortable. It was great for dancing. Has a lot of stretch. I'm 5'5" and it was the perfect length with heels. The asymmetrical shape and slit were the perfect twist to what would have been a plain black dress.
I thought the dress was perfect for this event. Not too revealing yet still sexy! Perfect fit!

I absolutely loved this dress, I wore it for a black tie NYE wedding and I did not want to send it back! I emailed back and forth with one of the RTR stylists, Brielle, who helped me pick out this particular dress. I’m about 6mo pregnant and only 5’0” talll without heels so I needed some guidance- she pointed me to this dress because of its stretchy material (for the bump) and because it’s not as long as some other dresses. I’m usually a size 0 and I rented the 0R and 2R, both fit me great but the 2 was a little too long so I stuck with the 0. I wore 3.25” heels and probably could have worn a little higher and been able to stick with the 0. The dress itself is so comfortable and elegant- I received compliments all night. Great experience for my first RTR purchase!

links_reviews_title: Classy, elegant and hugs curves in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: No Cons. This dress was classy and sexy, perfect for company holiday party where you feel beautiful but not too risqué! Love Nicole Miller as her dresses always make the booty go WOOT! :)

I wore this dress to a New Years Eve wedding at 28 weeks pregnant. It was stretchy so plenty of room for a baby bump. I am 5'1" and ordered the petite which was a tiny bit short. I sized up 2 sizes from my normal pre-pregnancy size which worked great. Definitely would recommend for other expectant moms!

links_reviews_title: It was a standout dress to wear at 32 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: This is a non maternity dress yet given the ruching, worked perfectly to fit my belly at 32 weeks. That said, had I been 30 seconds more pregnant, it would have been too small so if you're unsure, size up a size. 2 was my pre preg size but I've gained some weight and have been a 4 throughout pregnancy so I took the risk that a 4 non maternity would work. Felt great in it all night however and loved that it was something special and not your typical boring maternity dress.

links_reviews_title: Comfy fit with lots of Compliments
links_reviews_text: This dress is awesome. It's a very comfortable fit for a curvy, full busted figure. I wore a 12P, but would have preferred a 12R were it available. The lenght was a little short for my 5'5" frame and heels. The look is very classy, with the split perfectly designed to show some leg, but also wear shapewear, if desired....which I did. Would definitely order again, but in a 12L. My only complaint is that the dress was received extremely wrinkled and with white marks on the lower body. I was able to remove the marks and knock the wrinkles out with a quick spin (no heat) in the dryer. I would suggest RTR pay more attention to the rental items before shipping them out to the customer.

The dress is edgy enough to be unique, yet sophisticated enough for a law firm black tie event. The fit is great. The material, while stretchy, is forgiving and flattering. Felt high quality. Fit my curves really well. The assemytrical top and slit showed enough skin to be sexy, but not over the top. I highly reccommend it!

I've worn Nicole Miller before and often the fabric for her body con dresses is really stiff/constrictive. This dress was very light, super comfortable and fit perfectly. The fabric isn't very thick, and is soft to the touch, so if you're looking for a more structured dress to "hold it all in" this may not be right for you. I felt comfortable and fabulous all night! I'm 5'8" and the regular felt too short with heels, but it still worked out!
This dress is so beautiful and the fabric is stretching. I received so many compliments with this dress

links_reviews_title: Very classic black dress that rises to the occasion.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a little stretchy and fit perfectly. It does tend to fit a little awkward and pull to the right. It was comfortable and easy to move around in. The slit is very high. Enjoy!

This dress was beautiful and very comfortable. It was a little thinner in material. You could see panty line if I didn't wear my smoothing shorts. I am 5'11" and the 12 long worked with 3 inch heels. It was a bit off the ground but because of the cut and slit it looked good. I had to wear a strapless bra due to the cut of the top but that wasn't an issue. I got a lot of compliments and overall it was very flattering.
Wore this dress for a gala. Needed something all Blck. The lovely shoulder detail and the rouching in the mid section provided simple and sophisticated details. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a black tie event
links_reviews_text: This dress was insanely comfortable and flattering. The ruching in the front helped mask my food belly. I paired this dress with 3in nude wedges and it made the dress barely touch the floor, it was the perfect length! Give it a try, you won't be disappointed.

I wore this dress at 30 weeks pregnant and it was perfect. I usually wear a size two so I sized up one to fit my bump and there was enough stretch to work. Compliments all night and black always hides what you don't want seen!
Rented this dress for a black-tie wedding and could not have loved it more! So elegant and comfortable! Sexy, yet classy! I received so many compliments

I usually wear a size 4 and went up to an 8 because I'm 36 weeks pregnant. There was enough stretch to fit my belly but still tight enough everywhere else to look amazing on! Loved it. I ordered it as a backup and ended up wearing it for the wedding I was in.

links_reviews_title: Simple, classy and the perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: The fit was just perfect. It hugged in all of the right places AND a standard strapless bra fit perfectly beneath (no stickie bra for the win!) I am glad I went with the long - I am 5'8 and wore 2 inch heels and the length was just right. Would definitely recommend this dress!!

This was the CUTEST Tinkerbell dress for my Halloween costume. However, the dress material has ZERO stretch. The photos made me think that the material was slightly stretchy. I read the reviews and selected the small, with the medium as a back up, and BOY am I thankful I did. I have bigger hips, and the medium was extra tight, it even pulled the slit seam out when I tried to sit (only like 2", and I was still able to wear the dress for the evening, but no sitting for me! Oops!). I have 34AA chest, so I had to wear a push-up bra and do some tinkering (pun intended) to hide the bra through the keyhole in the chest to balance everything out. I had anticipated the material to allow some stretching and accommodate my hips, while still fitting my chest, but unfortunately that didn't happen. While I was really happy with the finished product for a costume party, if you have wider hips and plan to dance for the evening, I would make another selection.

Loved this dress. Had a ribbed texture to it. The boob area was tricky since I have a small chest. I had to untie the dress and tie it again tighter so it could look better. Definitely can't wear a bra with it, boob tape did nothing too. I'm fairly tall, 5'11 and the slit was a little high when I sat down. But absolutely loved this dress. Got a lot of compliments and would rent again!
This was such a cute dress for a premiere event! Fit perfect and was comfortable to wear all night
Loved the dress but didn't love the fit on me

This dress is a thicker material and very comfortable. You can't wear a bra because of the tie in the front, but you can adjust both the tie and the straps to hold them up and no bra needed (woo!). I wore a small and I had quite a bit of room in my mid section, but it was snug in the booty/hips. Overall, great dress! The color was fabulous.
This is such a simple yet elegant dress. Perfect for a semi formal night out!
Y'all, rent this! It was so sleek yet sexy. I felt amazing in the dress. Can't wait to rent again. The green was beautiful, and unique, but so amazing.

The fabric is nice and thick which is always nice for helping you feel sucked in. I would say it fits true to size, the top is adjustable. I'm not sure how it'd work for women with a larger chest because of the placement of the cutout, but easy to go braless with a smaller chest. Color is so pretty in person- got tons of compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Much tighter than it looks in the picture
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a daytime dress for a bachelorette weekend in Charleston and it was way too tight for a daytime outfit -- would have been uncomfortably warm. The fit was also kind of funny on my chest, but would probably fit better on someone who can fill it out. Pretty summery color.

Love this dress ! Wore it to my friends wedding rehearsal dinner. The green color popped and tithe fabric is almost corduroy-ish but very light. You can't wear a bra because of the cut out in the front but that was no worries for me. Loved how it wasn't too tight and form fitting so I still felt comfortable in it.

links_reviews_title: Fabric doesn't not stretch and it was not flattering on my figure

links_reviews_text: Great fit, fun color
Love this dress the color is amazing g but runs small in the waist area , it does have a little stretch but I need to size up .

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner and loved it! The top half of the dress made it so that you don't have to wear a bra and because the material is thick, I didn't even feel that a bra was necessary. Definitely wearing this again!

I loved the colour of this dress, but the fit was weird. It seemed to accentuate my stomach, which I didn't like, but when I pulled my stomach in it was all baggy in that area. Strange fit, probably would have been better if i had got a medium and it hung a little looser but I wanted a fitted dress.
Didn't end up picking this dress but it was very flattering. Fit well all around from my waist/hips to bust. Great length.
I liked the ribbed texture of this dress - gave it a little extra dimension. It was fun and easy to wear for a night out.
Loved the dress, hated the fit. I think this one should be saved for girls without curves. The sizing seemed right, but there were odd gaps and bunching around my hourglass figure.
Has adjustable tie around bust which helps with fit

Fitted but not tight, the waist area was a tad roomy on me. For reference, I'm 5'8" 145 lbs, 32DD and normally were a size 6 dress. This dress is not for those who want to go unnoticed. It reveals leg, chest and upper body. It was perfect for a late spring date night with my husband.
Great color. The tie in the front makes it hard to wear a bra. You could see my bra under the tie in front. But a fun easy dress. Material does not stretch and it does wrinkle easily.
I wore this with white jeans and sandals and wore to an Italian restaurant for dinner. Looked great together. Felt pretty in it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my husband's birthday party with leather pants and felt very glamorous!
links_reviews_text: I got an XL as well as a Large size just in case but did not need it.. The shirt was flattering and the ruffles made it flirty and fun. I wore it with a simple strapless bra and had no problem. Definitely a great shirt to rent!

I wore this to a work holiday party and another holiday party. I love that it's navy blue and the ruffles are very pretty without being overwhelming. I felt sexy but still covered up and work appropriate. It's also roomy enough in the waist that it was forgiving with all my holiday eating.
Very versatile top great for work, parties, family gatherings. Travels well and doesn't wrinkle easily. Definitely would rent again
Loved the shape of this top. Wish they made it in a size up as it was a little tighter and shorter than I prefer. I wore with a cardigan for work, but loved it with jeans after work.
Super flattering breezy top that literally does not wrinkle. Goes great with slim dark jeans for a date night look anytime.
Love style, color, and material.
Very flattering cut and a nice navy color. Body skimming perfection.

links_reviews_title: Really liked this shirt. Great material, interesting cut. Received compliments.
links_reviews_text: Liked, but didn't love, this shirt. Great material, wonderful design, flattering for anyone with tone arms. Looks great solo or paired with a jacket. My only downside is that the color was darker than I expected - more of a midnight/navy.
I wore this beautiful navy top with some light jeans and wedges for my daughters Birthday dinner! Very Flattering!

links_reviews_title: A nice addition to my office wear for the summer
links_reviews_text: This top fits a little on the small size. I normally wear an XL but I ordered the XXL and I"m glad I did. You'll need a strapless bra (the top is satiny / silky so not the time to go without a bra). The ruffles are an unexpected soft touch. Quite nice but I don't think I'll buy it. Four stars instead of 5 because it isn't a show stopper.

links_reviews_title: Great blouse ! Wore this several times. Fit is easy and dresses up jeans or paired w/ dress pants
links_reviews_text: Love Parker. Would rent again.
Good fit, need a strapless bra
Can be dressed up or down. Perfection.
Cute top with a little ruffle
flattering style
Great fit!
Loose and flowy. Perfect to cover my curves yet sharp looking.
Wore with Jean's and a strapless bra. The ruffle lands below the pocket. Navy but looks black.
Was too tight across busy. Didn't feel comfortable wearing

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and classy top to wear out for Happy Hour, Dinner or a party.
links_reviews_text: Great top, you can wear a jacket over it while at work and out to town you go! It can be worn every day or for a special occassion. I think if you travel alot, this is a great top that is very versatile - professional or play.

links_reviews_title: great fit and super cute. i wore it with a similar pant. very comfortable for a party look.
links_reviews_text: fit is great. very flattering,especially if you have big shoulders like me. ruffle hits in a good p lace, not like some of these styles where the ruffle makes you look too wide in the bust.
Flattering and comfortable
Pro - beautiful material and color con - ran small
I normally wear 4 or 6. I ordered S and M for backup size. The material is so soft and the drape details is pretty.

links_reviews_title: This was a flattering fit and showed off my shoulders (my fave attribute). Great with dark jeans!
links_reviews_text: Flirty ruffles and the satin finish make it great for work or cocktails!

links_reviews_title: I ended up wearing more than a few times. Great fabric!
links_reviews_text: gorgeous silk top, a great length to wear with jeans or a skirt.

links_reviews_title: Super cute on. Interesting hem on top that gives it an edge.
links_reviews_text: Very fun for date night. Great top to show of arms/shoulders. LOVED this top.

It was hell finding a bra for this shirt because the outline of the strapless cups could be seen through the thin silky fabric. I used a high neck sports bra and it worked great! I received multiple compliments and would definitely rent again! I wore to work and out on the weekends. Very versatile!
The material has a shine to it which makes it appear dressy. I liked the way the cut made my shoulders look. I felt sexy and sophisticated in this top.
Great fit for a petite person- stylish and elegant

I thought this top was beautiful and very chic looking. Looked and felt expensive. Great fall (draping) and lines. I wore it with white jeans, a bit more casually, but would look good with a nice tailored pant.
Love this top. I received tons of compliments. It is very flattering and cute with white jeans and heals.
Beautiful and travels well
Beautiful color and cut! This looks gorgeous and will look fabulous with black slacks, heels, and dangling earrings. fit is perfect in a S for 34C bust.
X
Unique, fun piece that I would not normally pick out but so glad I did. Wore it to a girlfriend's birthday brunch and got tons of compliments!

I love the print on this style! It is very unique and runs true to size. I do recommend going up one size for the back up. It works well for all cup sizes. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips.

This dress is one of my favorites and made me feel like a pretty, couture Cinderella with its silk patchwork fabric and perfect asymmetrical ruching. I received so many compliments! The fit was very comfortable and easy to move about all day, although the dress is deceivingly short in a few areas- a couple random breezes blew my skirt up like Marilyn Monroe. I wore it in the daytime with sandals for a dressy-casual look and in the evening with heels. I would definitely rent again.

Loved this one! I wound up wearing it to work and then a happy hour afterwards. I paired it with a jean jacket and some white platform sneakers. One thing: the fabric is slippery and lightweight, so you'll need to be on high alert if it's a windy day.

Beautiful fabric and patterns but unfortunately an unflattering construction. Main seam is just below bust, with irregular, intentional bunching near hips. Gives the effect of a tummy when there isn't one!

I didn't end up wearing this. There is this odd gather below the waist line and above the hips every 4 inches or so around the dress. It hits in an extremely unflattering spot. That along with a lot of different prints was just a lot going on. I really read reviews thoroughly before I order anything. It was just weird.
I wore this with a blazer on top for the office and absolutely loved! Super Comfy and very interesting design. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous Fit and would work for large breast too
links_reviews_text: I wore it because I love the flowyness of it and have large hips. At 5'1'' this dress was the perfect length, however the 42 was out of stock so I ordered the 44 and other than having to pin the breast area shut so I wouldn't show my breasts to everyone this dress was amazing, (I'm at 150-160 lbs and carry my weight on my hips).
never wore this, it didn't even zip up and I don’t consider myself to be "large" - very disappointed

I loved this dress, and it fit really well but I didn't end up wearing it on vacation. The one thing that put me off a little were the gathers that added wrinkles and made it look like it wasn't fitting as well as it was, but I loved the silky fabric and colour combo- I'll rent it again when the weather warms up.
Cute, loved the fabric, and overall good fit! The v neck wasn't as modest as I was hoping for work but you could put a cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Wore it while on holiday in London & Croatia
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much that I don't want to give it back. I've worn it to the office with a jacket, to fancy dinners and around the city with a leather jacket. It gives me curves in all the right places...I think it's particularly great for someone with small boobs because it does wonders for them.
Really short. Awesome fabric!

links_reviews_title: So cool and interesting but way to big. I feel I will need to go down 2 sizes.
links_reviews_text: Very flowy and airy, which was surprising for a silk like dress.

Well made dress with nice fabric. I wore this on some very hot days and stayed very cool. The length of the hem line was short, but not too short. I could have worn a cami and worn to work, otherwise it was a bit too much cleavage for a work environment. I dressed down with some cute superga shoes, but could have easily dressed up with heels.

i messed up sizing and got the 8 instead of my usual 6 in carven so this was large on me, but i believe the 4 or 6 wldve worked. it a touch above the knee, awesome pattern. very light and airy. highly recommend
Cute but loose. Fun colors for 4th of July!
Fits well, very flattering and comfortable. Received so many compliments!
Loved the feel, fun and fabric but this dress was too short for me to wear at my age, especially for work, even in the casual summer.
never wore it

I love this dress. The fabric is dreamy, the print unique without being too flashy for everyday, and the design is made to flatter a woman's body. That said, I've previously worn Carven dresses in a size 34 - the only reason I took a 38 this time is because that's what I tried on at the RTR Georgetown location. I assumed it would be too big, but it honestly fit like a glove. If I had ordered my usual size, I doubt I'd be able to zip it in the rip/chest area. That said, I'm excited to wear this again! 10/10 recommend.

links_reviews_title: this dress was not at all flattering
links_reviews_text: there were these baggy parts all around the dress in the worst places. and the bust line was not placed well. The pattern was OK, looked cuter on line. I could not wear this dress and look good.
This runs super small. I sized up and it still would not zip up. Lovely dress and well made. Perfect for someone with a small to average chest.

links_reviews_title: Very classy, flattering fit. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an awards ceremony. The fit was true to size. Dress was very comfortable as I was able to dance for hours it in! The color is beautiful. Highly recommend!
Everything I hoped it would be and more :) This dress is as fun and cute as it looks! I received compliments all night and I hated returning it

The fit was pretty true to size. I have a small bust so it was a tiny bit large up top, but nothing a padded strapless bra couldn't fix. The pockets were perfect, and this was so comfortable. I received compliments all night. :)
Fit well. Bow is beautiful. Only complaint is the zipper, had trouble zipping on and off even while not wearing it.
I own several Kate spate dresses and always buy size 0 (even though I am usually a 2). Liked dressing this one down with a pair of white sneakers!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress- loved the bow and the color!
links_reviews_text: Make sure to wear your hair up so the bow is on full display. Received tons of compliments and so comfortable!
Perfect dress for the holiday party. If you have large breast it's a bit snug but manageable

I'm short waisted and petite on top, so the top ran slightly big. The fabric held up in a windy outdoor setting, and the dress lays beautifully in person and in pictures. The bow in back is detachable but it's a fun detail to have on there. I was able to wear a strapless bra. Overall I loved this dress and would rent again!
Fun party dress! Fit a little snug around my boobs. I'm usually a size 6 but I'm glad I went a size up

links_reviews_title: That bow is gorgeous! But runs small.
links_reviews_text: I was so excited to wear this to a wedding, it came in and the zipper made it almost impossible to zip up, it kept getting stuck in one spot and my poor husband managed to zip my skin. By the time we got it zipped up I realized it wasn't worth the struggle and it was so tight in the rib cage and chest that even though my love for the bow was so strong, it went back.
This may be my favorite dress ever rented! The color is beautiful, and the bow adds a perfect surprise of flare when twirling around the dance floor! I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments! It was so comfortable too!!!
links_reviews_text: I got the size 4 & 6. The 4 was waaaayyy to small which is odd because that's my normal size. The 6 fit better. This ran a bit tight in the upper section. A little tight around the mid section and bust area. Everything else was perfect!

links_reviews_title: The color is vibrant and beautiful! Love the bow on back!
links_reviews_text: Fit well, need help fastening back.

links_reviews_title: Great holiday dress, tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Thick material doesn't require a bra, and it stays down so you won't have a Marilyn Monroe moment.

links_reviews_title: The perfect combination between sweet and edgy!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and very comfortable. Felt a little tight at the top since it doesn't stretch but I had no problem closing the dress. The color is great too. Got many compliments for that and the cute bow in the back!

links_reviews_title: The fit and styling of this dress is perfect!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner for a wedding and I'm so glad I did! The fit, the styling and the color made it perfect! I was getting compliments all night! My favorite part was the bow in the back, but it looked flattering from the front too. Fits true to size!

This is a gorgeous red/orange color that was perfect for an early summer outdoor wedding! Being 5'1" I was a little worried that the length was going to be too long....it was longer than what I typically wear but it was perfect with the style. I received SO many compliments throughout the evening too. It has POCKETS!!! And, it is a bit in the thick/heavy side with a liner...something to consider if you plan to dance a lot! By the end of the night, I was pretty warm! Even so, the dress was one of my RTR faves. Note-the waist is not flexible....no give at all. :)
Loved loved loved!

This was seriously my favorite dress I've ever worn! I wore it to a black tie wedding and it was perfect. I'm 4'10" and was planning to use hem tape to make it shorter, but it was so flattering at this length and perfect for a more formal occasion. I got SO many compliments on how classy it was and how much it stood out. It fit like a glove and it had pockets! I'd give this 100 stars if I could.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress, wish I owned it!
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for a black tie optional event I was going to. I am 5’0 so I can’t do a long gown without alterations so this tea length dress was just the right amount of formal for the event I was attending. I am normally a 00 but since RtR doesn’t have that size I crossed my fingers and toes this one wouldn’t look too big. It fit great! I am very small chested (34AA) and it was loose in the chest but not awkwardly so. The arm holes and everything else about the dress lay just right on me! The bow was so fun and cute you didn’t need a lot of accessories! Everyone complimented me on the style. It was a total win. And it came 2 days early! Love RtR another happy rental!

links_reviews_title: The bow MAKES IT!! Crowd Favorite!
links_reviews_text: So many compliments and so comfortable with the bigger skirt because you don't have to worry about "sucking it in" and uncomfortable unders! Also loved that I could wear a regular bra with a connector to make it racer back. Was worried about the wrinkles but they really weren't bad! And I drove in the car for an hour! Just made sure to flatten it out when I sat down. So. Many. Compliments. The bow just makes it!!

This dress is incredible. Classic and simple, with a bit of flare from the bow and the bright red. I got so many compliments!! I am a true size six and it fit great. If anything...a tad tight around the rib cage, but totally manageable. Rent it! You won't regret it.
Was tight from the bust.

I was worried that this dress was going to swamp me. Although it was longer on me than what I'm sure what the designer intended, it didn't overtake my small frame and didn't make me look short! This dress is great for small/petite frames. The online pictures make the dress appear more pink. In person it's definitely more orange. But a very pretty orange. The bow was SUPER cute. The pockets were convenient. I felt just like Carrie Bradshaw circa season 6 with Alexander Petrovsky.
I wore this for my annual Kentucky Derby party. I’m normally a 4 but the 2 fit perfecrly. It was very comfortable and I loved the pockets. Many compliments!

This dress runs a little small up top. I normally wear a 0 in Kate Spade, but had to go up to a 2, could have even worn a 4 for comfort. The best feature is that it has pockets! Game changer. Length was perfect for me with heels. Very modest. So many compliments on the color, the bow, the pockets. It was a hit for sure. What I really disliked is the way the bodice fit. It was so tight and the seams hit at a weird place on my chest. I tried bra, no bra, it just didn't make a difference. As you can see in my picture, it appears as if I'm "very cold" lol. If this were fixed, I would buy this dress in every color to wear at every occasion I had to attend. I would say go up 1 maybe 2 sizes if you have anything larger than a B cup.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing the dress to an event.
links_reviews_text: This dress was too big on me and usually, 0's fit me.

links_reviews_title: Fun and fancy dress, perfect for charity gala
links_reviews_text: Pretty, girly, and fun dress, with pockets! I wore this to a charity gala. Must wear a strapless bra with the open back. A bit tricky to get into - the side zipper was difficult to close, and the bow on the back is fastened with hook and eye closures and snaps. I don't know how I would have fastened all the closures without my husbands help haha. The top fit me well but if my boobs were bigger I would have needed to go up a size.

links_reviews_title: I was in a play and rented this for opening night. I got SOOO many compliments
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size and the skirt is pretty full. You need someone to help fasten it. I was home alone and had to go ask my neighbor. I thought the color was red but it's more orange.
Perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress for a Christmas party!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my husband's work Christmas party and it was perfect. I was nervous because I'm not that tall that it would land at an awkward length for me but landed nicely below the knees and I loved the flare to the skirt. It was very comfortable, the color was was fun and it fit perfectly. Plus I loved that the dress had pockets. I got so many compliments throughout the night. It was such a fun dress and I couldn't have picked a more perfect dress for the occasion!

This dress was not only gorgeous, but comfortable! I recently gained weight. I typically wear a size 4, but with the extra weight, I ordered a size up and was really happy I did. I'm already planning on wearing this again to another wedding.

This was so comfortable to wear ! If you have a smaller busy/chest i would size down. This was tight in my chest (I'm a 34/36 b) and it was snug but the rest of dress at the waist felt like i could size down. The zipper is starting to stick and i was afraid it was going to break. The fabric doesn't wrinkle. This was the perfect dress for my work gala

Really liked the color, cut and the fact that the dress had pockets. Since I have a full bust, I went ahead and sized up (due to reading previous reviews) and I'm glad I did because it fit snug in that area. Enjoyed the pockets, I was able to keep my phone and lip gloss close by the whole time. Loved the bow detail, made the dress even better. I did have to steam it because it arrived a little wrinkled, but that wasn't too bad. Love the dress, definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Great service, fit, style, and quality
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for a spring wedding in the Northwest. I love how RTR ships in reusable packaging. I wore the size 4 but probably should have gone with the 6 for a little more breathing room. The fit wasn't that different. The dress itself is a great cut- very flattering. The clasps in the back are hard to do by yourself but I just left them undone because you can't actually tell.

This dress was amazing! So cute and elegant at the same time. It has a very old glamour to it. The bow in the back is adorable, and even with the opening in the back it comes up high enough to wear a strapless bra with it. I got tons of compliments and I felt beautiful!

This dress is adorable. The vibrant cherry red, the bow on the back, it screams Kate Spade. The waist sits higher so it would be perfect for an expecting momma. I would have totally rocked this preggers. It definitely carries a fun and young energy, and I have no doubt will have full attention. It runs a little tight in the chest, and bras are difficult bc of the cut and the open back. It's pure fun.

links_reviews_title: This dress was extremely comfortable and fit perfectly! The color is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: It definitely runs true to size and forms to the body! It will be hard to give back!

Wore this dress twice both for birthdays, one a wine dinner and the other at a dance bar. Both were great. Got sooooooo many compliments!!!!! Love the bow and the shape and any time a dress has pockets im a happy camper. Great for day or night. Im a 4-6 and the 4 fit great. If u have a wide back take that into consideration. I do for my size and it didnt bother me. Love this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and it fit perfect!
links_reviews_text: I did have to hang it up to get the wrinkles out but otherwise perfect!

The color was stunning and the lace was really pretty. The 12 was a little big on me, but the 10 wasn't available. I typically wear a size 12, but the dress runs a little big so I would go a size down. I think the 10 would have fit perfect. The dress was thick enough so you don't need to wear a bra. Perfect for a wedding.
This was everyone’s first choice until I moved and the middle bunched up, I’m sure I could have sized up to correct that, but there is nothing there to fill out the top. So, this dress went back
