Would not wear this dress again. While the color was beautiful, the dress had been worn in A LOT. The wire was cutting my arms all night and made it super uncomfortable. If getting an extra size, I recommend sizing up, as it is tight with little give. I am 5’7 ~140 pounds and wore size 6
I wore this dress for my friends wedding! It was a beautiful color! I received lots of complements. The only issue I have was the straps kept falling off my shoulders which got kinda annoying.

The dress is a gorgeous blue! It has some stretch but if you are going to be sitting for a while the boning starts to stab your sides. Classy but sexy- great fit. Only thing was I thought it was a little long ( I'm 5'4 and hit me about 3 inches below my knee) and straps where a little stretched out.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, but I'm definitely no size 2
links_reviews_text: I'm comfortably a 4, sometimes a 6, but the 2 fit really well. This dress photographs fantastically and doesn't need to be ironed or steamed before wearing! I traveled from California to England and took the dress out of my suitcase and went. My only caution would be the material around the belly. As you can see in my pic, it creates more of a chubby tummy appearance than I would prefer, but the pros outweigh the cons in this case. If you think you'd be self conscious about the belly area, I'd suggest a different dress.

The color was stunning and I really wanted to fully love this dress. I ended up wearing the 6 which was form fitting and worked well with curves. My one caveat with this dress is that you really need to be 5'5" or taller for this dress to fit properly. The straps were super long and I felt a little uncomfortable all night as they constantly fell down. Additionally, there was extra fabric in the midsection because of my height (I'm 5'2"). Taller ladies go for it! Shorties like me, beware!

I received a lot of compliments and told I was the best dressed at the wedding! I thought putting my hair up would make the dress the focus! I am sooo happy I did! Dress fit perfectly and the colors were beautiful
Beautiful dress and color. Very low back. 5'2", 120#. Fit well but straps loose. Fixed by 'tying' straps together in back with elastic band and covering with decorative hair clip.
The color of this dress is amazing. It fit snug but not too tight and I did not need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: The bridesmaids were commenting on my dress from the altar!
links_reviews_text: This picture doesn't do the contrast of the lace justice - the colors are exactly what is shown on the model. The colors are stunning and I loved the length, which hit me mid-calf. The dress is form-fitting and flattering yet easy to move in. I would absolutely rent this dress again (and will probably dream about it).

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a nice dinner for my wedding anniversary. The size 12 fit my body like a glove - I'm 5'3", bust is 36C, and I have pretty muscular thighs and butt. I think it was a bit longer on me than it's supposed to be, hitting below the knee, but it still looked great. It hugged my curves without being unflatteringly tight, and the lace was pretty forgiving of areas that might be too clingy for comfort. The only problem is that the straps were WAY too long. I used a safety pin to convert the straps into a halter. It still looked good but I could see it getting annoying at a longer event like a wedding.
I love everything about this dress! So many compliments and I will definitely be renting it again.
A little big in beast area tighter around waste. It looks amazing on though and stunning in pictures.

This is a great dress - just know that as the other reviews state, the straps are really long. I had to pin them under in the back, and during the event one kept coming undone so that was annoying. Also the back is pretty low and a regular strapless was too high, and the bust isn't tight enough to go without. That being said, the color is so pretty and I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great Color for a wedding in Hawaii by the ocean.
links_reviews_text: The overall fit it good. Rented 8 and 10, wore the 8. Forgiving material for any body self confidence issues. I felt good about myself in this dress. Only complaint was the boning thru the rib cage poked me badly. Luckily I packed bandaids and lined that area with 5 or so of them.

I rented this dress for an outside summer wedding, and it was perfect! I rented both the 0 and 2 but couldn't tell much of a difference between the two sizes. I ended up going with the 0 because the straps weren't as loose. I'm 5'3, so I was a little worried about the length of this dress, but it fell below my knees and fit great!

links_reviews_title: The picture doesn't do justice! Such a beautiful dress! Love the color and the lace detail.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit me perfectly! I'm 5'10", 165lbs and I wore a size 8. I ordered a size 10 as my backup. The 10 was not tight enough at my midsection.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and the color!
links_reviews_text: This was a gorgeous dress. I wore it for a spring wedding in the south, and it was so comfortable. The straps were a little long for me, but I just safety pinned them. I thought the neckline was so flattering, as well as the lower cut in the back. Gorgeous!

Loved this dress, perfect for a May wedding. I have to say I am 34C and usual wear a 6 or 8 but this top was a little big. Maybe just due to wear. Nothing a pair of stickies couldn't fix. Received so many compliments.

The dress was one of my favorite dresses I've worn. It was modest in length and bust, but had a lovely, sexy feel to it also. And the color; come on, so amazing. I don't have large boobs by any means but they're not small either and I have never put on a dress true to size that was loose in the chest. If I had some sort if backless bra it probably wouldn't have been an issue but going braless caused a more loose fit. It ended up being fine, but if you've got smaller/ average boobs, be sure to invest in a backless bra.

I wore this to a summer wedding and received so many compliments. The best being I reminded them of a mermaid with the beautiful blue and lace detailing. It hits right at the knee which I loved & it stayed true to fit over the course of the night! I would highly recommend this dress.

I typically wear an 8 and I wore the 8. I ordered the 10 as my back up. I didn't notice much of a difference size wise in the hips between the 8 and the 10 but noticed the bust was bigger. I thought this ran snug in the hips and true to size every where else. It still looked great though and received a bunch of compliments. It would be difficult to wear a bra with this dress but there is boning built in to help hold you up. I didn't wear a bra and I have a 34DD chest and was comfortable. I would think a small bust would have trouble wearing this dress with out a bra and would be too large. Was comfortable though and a great standout color! Just enough sex appeal while still staying classy. Would definitely rent it again!
Amazing dress definitely true to size. Had to wear a backless bra because the back was so low but it worked well. The color is amazing and it's a perfect length. So many compliments on this dress!

I normally wear an 8, but ordered both a 6 and 8. Glad I did. Size 8 just ran large everywhere. I wore a stick on strapless bra for a little more fullness up top. Received lots of compliments all evening.
Very classy & elegant, loved this dress

links_reviews_title: Dress is stunning, color is gorgeous and very nicely made!
links_reviews_text: Back is low which makes wearing a bra a challenge - because the material is pretty thick I opted to go without one instead of wrestling with a sticky bra and had zero issues. Straps weren't as tight as I would have liked but the dress has enough structure that it wasn't an issue. I received many compliments all night - I would definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this stunning dress to my niece's wedding and it was a huge hit! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I was very comfortable in this dress, impressive considering it was brutally hot. The colors of the dress were so vibrant and I only hope the pictures do it justice. I ordered the 10 as well, but the fit of the 8 was much better and allowed me to go without a bra. This was my first RTR and I cannot wait for my next opportunity... It was a great experience!
Dress was beautiful. Wore a strapless bra with it and it looked great! Very comfortable and flattering. Color comes out great in pictures.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great dress,fit true to size. Wore size 2. 34D, 5'8, 128lbs Fit like a glove. Would rent again.
This dress was feminine and bold with the color. I loved it.

Gorgeous color! The contrast with the blues really make this dress a stand out piece. Favorite feature was the cutout lace detail on the low back. I was torn between the 2 and the 4, as the 2 bunched at the waist creating a gap/wrinkle but the 4 looked overall too big. Was very loose in the top as well and the straps are long. As the night when on the straps cut into my shoulders when I sat. Overall, beautiful dress, glad I rented it but some fit and comfort issues.

Color is absolutely stunning in person. Pictures literally do not do this dress justice. It was stunning. It's a snug fit but has a thick material that hides and sucks in the areas that may normally require spanx. If you're in between two sizes, I would Recommend sizing up, as there isn't much stretch. But.. Rent this!

links_reviews_title: I loved the bright blue color. It was super flattering.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very well. I could not wear a typical strapless bra because of the lower back, but it was not a problem due to interior support.

This dress overall was great! I really needed to wear a size 4, but it was all rented. I received both the 2 & 6 and the 6 was way too big. The size 2 fit, but it was snug. Even with the snug fit the straps were way too big, but that is mostly because I am only 5'1". I got tons of compliments and can't wait to rent from RTR again, it is always a pleasure!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Summer Wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was HOT. I feel like it looked even better in person than in photos--I got a ton of compliments throughout the night. It was the perfect blend of conservative and sexy. The back was lower but the front was very conservative--not a lot of cleavage. I did not wear a bra and I am 32DD/typically a size 4 but wore a 6 in this dress and it fit like a glove. Might be an issue for straighter figures with smaller chests. Hourglass figures should size up. Overall I loved this dress and I'm sad to be sending I back.
Loved this dress! Perfect for spring and summer weddings, showers, etc. Runs true to size and is just as pictured.

I wore this dress to a retirement party. I was very nervous about this dress at first because it is not typically a color I would wear. It was a replacement for another dress I selected that was not in great condition. When the dress arrived, I could not have been more happy! First of all, it was brand new with the tags still attached! The pictures do not do justice for this dress! It was beautiful. I really loved it. The top was slightly larger than I would have liked; however, it worked out with a padded bra. It was also very comfortable! I received tons of compliments all night and I didn't want to send it back. I just LOVED it.
This dress has pretty detail, but I was looking for something with more of a punch. Chose to wear another dress.
Great form fitting dress, perfect for a Sunday baby shower
Showed a bit more cleavage then I would have liked for the occasion I wore it for but perfect from waist down. Might be better suited for under a Full C-cup woman! Beautiful nonetheless

I wore this to a warm September wedding 18 weeks pregnant. It worked well with a bit of room for my belly. I would usually wear a small and got the medium which was a bit larger on top but still worked well enough!
This maxi dress is perfect for every day and as comfortable as can be. Pair with heels for a summer evening look or flats for an easy day wear.

This dress was a perfect 10. Comfortable but sexy. The slit up the left side and fairly low cut v-neck gave me the style I wanted but yet it was still comfortable to wear. I wore a normal bra and cute summer flats because we were near the ocean on a summer evening. The dress wasn't too long preventing me from being in flats. Loved the print! I felt really happy with this dress. Almost didn't say goodbye to it!
So comfortable and silky!!! Great slit. Runs true to size

links_reviews_title: It was light, breezy and perfect for this hot weather.
links_reviews_text: The straps have some space at the top so I had to keep adjusting it. The cleavage is ALOT so be prepared to be showing alot if you're busty like me. I placed a cloth in the front to cover some of it up.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a beautiful wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove, I wore a bra but you could definitely get away with nothing. It was form fitting the waist and then beautifully flowed from there down with a nice but not too revealing slit down the side. I was in pretty hot and chilly weather later and this dress worked in both while also being very easy to dance in. Compliments for days.
Wore this on a hot day! Loved the pattern and the slit made the dress. Tight around the ribs!

links_reviews_title: Extremely flattering and comfortable -- a dream!
links_reviews_text: I've already rented this dress twice and I might buy it because it is so flattering, comfortable, and breezy. The slit in the skirt is high enough to make the dress easy to move in and to make it cool on a hot day, without being immodest. The pattern is lovely (no surprise there). I wore this dress during the day and on a date, but it could be dressed up with heels and nice jewelry. 10/10!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, moves well, very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Loving this dress today. Cut is great on top (maybe slightly low cut if you are well endowed up top, but I'm a 32B and this cut is perfect for me at the office), and the bodice fits perfectly. Light, flowy fabric with a slit that isn't too high but shows just enough leg. PERFECT for office to evening. True to size - I am usually a 2 or 4 and the XS looks like it was make for me.

I wore this to a wedding this weekend and loved it! I normally don't wear long dresses but this one looked great on me and I felt beautiful in it. It was an outdoor wedding in 90 degree heat so I was thankful for the flowy silk. It does wrinkle easily--but it's silk! (It had up for the night). I wore a swimsuit-style spanx and that worked great. I have a large bust and that was on full display in this dress so be aware of that.

This dress is beautifully made. The cut and fit are very flattering. I rented for a summer trip to the Amalfi coast in Italy and it was perfect, light, it traveled well (didn't get too wrinkly) and I just felt beautiful wearing it. Would definitely rent again!

Rented the M because the S wasn't available but was a bit loose. Had to wear a black/pink bra so when it showed it wasn't too apparent. So it probably runs true to size. Wore this with nude wedges at night and flat sandals during the day! The slit is high but reasonable. The material was great for the hot weather! The length is a bit modest, but the slit counteracts that so it's perfect!
silky elegance , cut is not to high, fits great on 29" waist, 36B(with push up), felt so elegant , want to but this one too-but RTR so tempting with all new styles every week.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great! Elegant and fun!
links_reviews_text: I wore an extra-small even though I usually would have worn a small. It was tight but that made it slimming. I loved wearing it.

Loved this from waist down. So silky smooth, great pattern, and love the slit. The bust area just didn't work for me. I ordered a medium, the large was way too big, but I think the small would have been too small. I'm a 36DD and petite and there was gapping at the armpit area and I just needed the shoulders to be pulled up so that the v wasn't so low. Overall I think this is made for a small chested person.
A bit tight in the waist, but overall a good fit
Amazing fabric, sexy slit, beautiful fit

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Comfortable and fun to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and did not find that it ran large like others mentioned. When I tried on the larger size, my chest did not fill it out and the straps were way too big. I am a 38B for reference. Overall, I loved the dress!
Great dress, would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Wanted to buy it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing! So flattering and comfortable. Not too low cut. Runs a little small. I usually wear medium in yumi Kim.
Beautiful dress and fabric. Loved the slit.
It runs extremely small. I'm generally a size 8-10 / Medium. This was an XL and for perfect. Very flattering

I loved this dress. Wore it to a baby shower and out to dinner with my husband. Too low cut for work (plus the slit made it too sexy for work), and I'm tall so it was a tad short (could have been an inch longer) took this from a 5 star to a 4 star. Fabric was very soft and comfortable. Cut was very flattering. Would rent again for the right occasion

links_reviews_title: Runs small except for the armholes
links_reviews_text: This brand runs very small because 10 is an XL. The main body of the dress fit like a dream but the armholes gaped so much that I could not wear it, even though I am busty. It was a shame because it is such a flattering dress otherwise.

The dress fit well but the top was a little baggie. I wore it with a sweater so that was less noticable. I think the L would have fit better but didn't have time to get another size. It was SO COMFORTABLE and so light!! Great dress for those sticky summer days!

I absolutely loved this dress...really contemplated buying it! I wore it twice to brunch and then a patio dinner with friends. The slit is nice and high so it makes it a bit sexy without being "too much." The fabric is a little shiny and no stretch but it fit my hourglass shape great!

links_reviews_title: Formal and perfect for an outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a black-tie optional, outdoor wedding. This was originally a backup dress but I was immediately impressed with it when I tried it on. It looks better in person. The material is nice and flowy, with a pretty flower pattern that brightens up the look. The length was perfect, I am 5'4 and I was able to get away with wearing tiny kitten heel shoes with this dress. I did use fashion tape to keep the top half of the dress from moving or coming open. The cut of the dress also made it easy to dance in. Overall it's a fun, feminine alternative to a simple black maxi dress.
Fits if you don't have boobs! But I'm a 36 DDD and yeah. Stopped zipping past my ribs. Frustrating!!!
Rented for NYE. Loved it!!! Fits very true to size and fits beautifully. I wore shapewear with it which made it look even better. Very comfortable to move around in and got many compliments.

I rented this dress for a work holiday party. I was 8 weeks pregnant and wanted something to slightly cover my midsection. While this photo doesn't show it, the right side of the jumpsuit did that perfectly. Just be cautious of side boob! :)

I loved this outfit! I wore it for a charity gala. I had so many compliments. I ended up in the medium because I couldn't even zip up the small! I went braless in this but still felt comfortable. I would definitely rent this again. Great price and great outfit!

I've never worn a large in anything, but I'm so glad I read the reviews and ordered the lg as a backup. I'm long through the torso and also have a booty. Because I wore the large, it was a little longer than I'd have liked...barely above my ankles. I absolutely loved it though and got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: perfect unexpected fit for a runway #la jolla international fashion film festival presenter.
links_reviews_text: high end off the trend as presenter for "best costume" for the event

I definitely stood out in this jumpsuit! The medium fit, but it was hard to zip up and I was worried about going to the bathroom during the night so I went with the large for more room. It fit, but when I sat down, the strap kind of slipped down because it isn't adjustable. I still loved it. I was able to wear a strapless black bra with it. I received tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Short in the torso but cute look
links_reviews_text: I sized up to account for my long torso, but it was still pretty snug lengthwise. That led to some extra fabric in the stomach/back so it definitely wasn't a super fitted look. But since the top is delicate and it's black it didn't look frumpy or ill-fitting. The back is a little low so I wore a plunge strapless (sort of like a bustier) and that worked with the cut. I liked the asymmetry of the straps, and the leg length cut well to lengthen the legs with stilettos (cropped above the ankle).

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect outfit for an office Christmas party
links_reviews_text: LOVED this jumpsuit. Fit true to size, I got lots of compliments. It was comfortable to wear also.

I loved this jumpsuit, it’s so fun with the flouncy shoulder on one side and strap on the other. Unfortunately it runs tiny. I am normally a 12 and could barely get the XL zipped. Also it would be better for someone with a longer torso, if you are short prepare to tie or safety pin the strap to shorten it.

links_reviews_title: A little tight so maybe could have gone with a small but super cute!
links_reviews_text: It was a bit tight but overall true to size. Fun look!

This jumpsuit is gorgeous and perfect for so many occasions. I wore it to a fundraising event. It can easily be dressed up or kept simple with minimal accessories. I found the length to be a bit long (although not a major issue since it is designed be a cropped leg) and I had a little room in the strap. Otherwise, the overall fit was just fine and I was able to wear it without a bra.

links_reviews_title: Loved this for a masquerade party! It was classy yet sassy!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect except that the crotch area had some extra fabric- but since it was black it was really hard to tell!
This guy is a winner! Rented it for a Billy Joel concert / dinner and were able to be comfortable and chic at the same time!

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately didn't wear bc of fit
links_reviews_text: I couldn't zip this up over my rib cage, sadly. It was a little tight all over.
The fit was great, not tight but not loose either. The length was great, and I wore it with a high chunky heel. Everyone obsessed over the jumpsuit!

Perfect length and the right amount of fun and flair to a sophisticated look. I'm a DD and the cleavage was just right! I wore it to a secret society dinner/masquerade which was a great alternative to a black dress.

The idea is cute and it looks pretty on. The issue is that it runs very small and short in the torso. I don't even have a long torso and I had a front wedgie in this. Hard to move in and definitely couldn't eat anything in it. I even went with the large to potentially avoid this. If you have thighs and a butt, this is not for you! Sad because it's very pretty.

I had originally ordered a white jumpsuit which showed up damaged. So thankful to Martín and Christine in Chicago who quickly found me this beautiful second option which now will be one of my firsts. Looks so much better on and is a unique style that brings so many compliments! Loved it.

This jumpsuit is gorgeous! It runs true to size, but I recommend sizing up for your backup. This works best for A-C cups since it is fitted. Curvier women should definitely size up because there is no stretch. I love this with gold accessories!
Didn't wear because i couldn't zip it up. Too tight in torso
Cute but couldn't wear, too small to get zipped
Cute but definitely either needed a longer torso or shorter straps. Did not work for me
Considered buying. So many compliments. rented for a bachelorette weekend. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Tight fitting in hips, butt. Could not zip around bust.
links_reviews_text: Extremely tight fitting.
This has a side zipper, so it makes it difficult to zip up. It fits too small in the chest & waist, so I was unable to wear this. Not the best fit for curvy girls.
Runs small, I couldn't even get it to zip. Disappointed.
Boobs flow out but the bottom fit great, I couldn't wear it though.
Runs small

links_reviews_title: Cute jumpsuit but sizing is off
links_reviews_text: I rented another jumpsuit and it didn't fit so this was my replacement. Such a cute outfit although it runs very small. I wore the large and the top was a little big and strap on one side was loose. I used some clothing tape to hold it in place. Overall I liked it but adjustable strap on one side would have been amazing. Also if you are shorter than 5'3, it won't be cropped pants. More ankle length.

links_reviews_title: Does not fit in the chest
links_reviews_text: Doesn't work for larger chested women.

links_reviews_title: I had to return. Runs small
links_reviews_text: Too tight in the crotch area

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for the busty or long waisted
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing. Too small. I'm an 6-8 and the large didn't work
Love the jumpsuit definitely runs small especially because has a side zipper. Will be ordering again just sizing up.

Beautiful design and fabric. Fit perfectly everywhere except the zipper wouldn't close. When I measured the area, armpit to armpit I could see why. 35 inches all around is not an XLR. It's at best a large. I would say size up except that unless you're a medium it will not matter.

links_reviews_title: So pretty but did not fit
links_reviews_text: This jumper was very pretty but I couldn't zip it all the way up. I wear a size 12 bottom and large top. I would have needed an xxl to make this work.

links_reviews_title: Was my back up choice, did not wear due to fit.
links_reviews_text: Size ran a bit tight in the hips for me and very short in the torso.
I wore this to a work Christmas party and got a ton of compliments. Fit is true to size and I styled it with a belt.
Ran very small. Did not fit. However, it is pretty and well made. I wish I could have worn it.
Too small
Would have been perfect but I couldn't fit it over my hips.

Wore this for a friend's bridal shower and got tons of compliments. Love the peek a boo back and ruffles. Definitely need a friend to help you button the back but didn't have issues with the buttons popping open or the dress once it was on. Super comfortable to be in and flattering, and works well for shorter girls like me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect to feel cute & comfortable for a casual summer event!
links_reviews_text: The cutout in the back is low enough for you to wear a bra - great for women with a fuller chest, lots of room in the front. Super flattering with the different lengths and pleats on the skirt. Does run a bit big, was surprised to comfortably fit in the S.

The back of this dress is the best detail due to the opening in the mid back area. A couple of times one of the buttons came open which exposed my bra strap so that was a little annoying. Fits TTS, even a little loose. As you can see it is not very form fitting. The sleeves are slightly belled out. Not the most flattering dress for my shape but it was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Requires a friend's help but really nice
links_reviews_text: So this what I call a "Friend Dress"--it's a dress that, when trying it on, is enough to make a single women living alone think "UGH I'm so self sufficient in everything in life except closing the buttons on the back of this dress!" I really enjoyed how light and fun this dress was, fitted in the waist but slightly large on me in the bust. I had to wear a jacket over it to work and have a colleague button up the tiny buttons in the back when I got there. But it's also a dress that I got so many comments and compliments on, including from two women I don't even know but proceeded to have a 5 minute conversation with on the benefits of RTR and how helpful reviews are in figuring out what to wear--hence this very thorough review. TL;DR: have someone help you button the back, it's a little large in the bust but totally fun and worth both those slight inconveniences!
Pretty dress. Love the cutout in the back. The top of the dress did run large. If I wasn't standing up straight you could tell it was big.
Fit great. Length was perfect even though I am only 5'2". Very flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: Cute but runs a little bigger
links_reviews_text: Renting again in a smaller size

links_reviews_title: Dress was sent as a replacement; has potential but was not my size.
links_reviews_text: I tried on this dress, but didn't wear. This was sent as a replacement for a dress that was not available and was not my size. I would typically wear a 6 in dresses, and a large was sent- it was much to large for me, but hard to tell how it would truly fit. I'm pretty sure I could have worn a small in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Buttons in the back come open all the time
links_reviews_text: This was so cute in the store and I loved the cut-out in the back. But it's basically unwearable bc the buttons in the back come undone repeatedly. And this dress was brand new when I rented it - still had the tags on. So it's not like it was worn out. Only wear it if you don't mind the back coming completely open all the time. Also it's impossible to put on by yourself - you will have to have someone help you button it up. Like I said it was so cute I wanted to like it so much! But after exposing myself twice on the metro on the way home from brunch I couldn't wait to get it off.

I was on the fence based on the photos and reviews but absolutely loved this dress. It fit perfectly. The only downside is that the lowest button on the top of the dress kept coming undone throughout the night.
loved it. very flattering and beautiful colors. i just wish the neckline wasnt so awkward - it was a little tight and could have been a bit lower - otherwise it would be 100% perfect.

As other reviewers said, beautiful dress that would fit perfectly on someone with a bigger bust. It fit well everywhere else, but was floppy since I am on the smaller side, chest-wise. But, I still got lots of compliments even with the ill fit. Cute for a summer time casual event and the lower-back cutout means you get a little skin without having to deal with wearing a special bra - win!

links_reviews_title: Everywhere I went, someone complimented this dress.
links_reviews_text: Really tight in the hips but everywhere else it fit great. If you have a medium or large cup size you'll need to get creative with your bra so that it doesn't show in the back.
I like the fit, print and fabric. However, the top buttons do easily unbutton, which is fine with a cardigan but would otherwise be quite annoying.
Runs true to size but it is short, and I'm 5'8'', so went for the large. It's stylish and comfy but the back is loose, and the buttons unbutton when wearing.

LOVED Wearing this jacket for a friend's surprise engagement in Boston! So fun and different, and surprisingly very warm for a cool Boston night. I am a size small up to, but do have an athletic build, so I am happy I went with the medium. It was not too tight or restricting.
It was cute. Wish the sleeves were longer but goes great with an all black outfit.
I loved this coat so much I didn't want to give it back! It was such a fun accessory to a black dress I wore to a wedding, and jeans a T-shirt to brunch the next day.

This was a fun jacket to have. The faux fur was soft and felt good to touch. It was also very wam and comfortable. The only thing I will suggest for those who plan on renting this is to not wear a sweater made up of thread that can be easily pulled. I made this mistake and the small hooks on the front kept catching on the sweater underneath. Still I highly recommend this! Perfect for a cool fall day!

links_reviews_title: A little too much for my everyday
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear shopping and around town but my husband laughed at me- I think it may have been a little too fashion forward for my town I would rent again if I was going to a wedding or somewhere fancier The fur is faux so it feels a little cheap not as soft as the real stuff Definitely a warm coat- cropped so looks better with a shorter top Runs true to size

Featured on our Snapchat and worn to the runway, this Line + Dot jacket was a showstopper. Fitting true to size, I recommend sizing up for backup. However if you are looking for an oversized look, then you should consider sizing up for your primary as well. I paired with our Rebecca Minkoff Black Striped Love Crossbody, a black blouse and black jeans. Because it's such a versatile jacket, you can also dress it down with a black turtleneck and black leggings. I loved having it for the weekend!

links_reviews_title: Was the perfect (faux) fur jacket for a day out with friends!
links_reviews_text: Wore it around the city for the day and was actually very warm! Got lots of compliments of the jacket almost everywhere I went! Definitely want to rent again.

links_reviews_title: Get ready to be stopped every 5 minutes with this coat
links_reviews_text: Loved this coat! Really fun and received SO many compliments. Tons of people wanted to know where it came from. Loved wearing it out casually with sneakers for last minute Christmas shopping. Would definitely rent again

Rented this for a weekend in NYC and it was great. Would recommend wearing it with high waisted pants and a slim, tucked in shirt. Unfortunately it was too cold for a slimmer shirt underneath so it looked a little awkward with a loose, longer sweater underneath but it worked and at least looked good with the turtle neck style. Everyone said to order up a size for fit and I don't think that is necessary unless you wear something thick underneath. All in all, fun unique jacket!

Talk about a conversation piece! I wore this jacket to my company holiday party and it was hit. I was surprised how warm the jacket was too. I thought I'd be taking a risk wearing this out at night in the cold Colorado weather but I was comfortable walking a dozen blocks or so. The jacket ran a bit large for the tank top I wore underneath, probably a perfect fit if worn with a sweater.

Yaaaas Girl! OMG this jacket is so fly. All this needs is some giant sunglasses and a fringe suede bag. Overall the fit is really true to size. It works well for every body type, but if you are not into a super boxy look, this is not the one for you. Also, there are no pockets, which is kind of a bummer, but then you can just get some fun gloves and accessorize more! One of the things I love about this jacket is that, even with a thick denim button down under it, it still fit nicely. However, if you are really worried about fit, I would size up for your backup. Overall, this gem gets a stamp of approval from me!
Loved this! Would rent again.
I got so many compliments on this fun jacket! It's warm too, which is a major plus. True to size.
Definitely a coat for smaller frames because it is very boxy. But super cute with high waisted jeans or a skirt!! Got sooooo many compliments on it!!

links_reviews_title: Fun coat and got lots of compliments for a city date night.
links_reviews_text: Boxy but still trendy and cuter.
I just had to send this back and I'm still upset about it - this was by far my favorite rental! I received so many compliments!! Such a fun, unique piece!

links_reviews_title: I'm large on top so this made me look larger. Other than that it'super cute.
links_reviews_text: It fits good but has a lot of volume so keep that in mind.
It's a fun piece and o thought guy it would jazz up jeans for an evenin out with girlfriends. Wasn't very flattering (cut is short and very body) and the faux fur is not particularly soft.

links_reviews_title: Rented for my January birthday, wanted something fun to go out in!
links_reviews_text: Really loved this coat, fun way to make my birthday outfit a little something special. Ran a bit small if you are trying to wear anything underneath it, but other than that no complaints! Wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Great fun jacket! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I had people asking all over the country where I found such a great jacket! Tons of compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: Liked the look of the jacket; rented it just because.
links_reviews_text: Man oh man, complements galore! I got so many complements wearing this jacket that it started to get a little embarrassing :). Just know, this jacket runs small, but I made it work. I rented the large; even if there was an extra large option, I don't think a larger size would make up for the proportions of the jacket. Four stars for the sheer awesomeness of this piece, minus one star for sizing.
Love love love this fabulous jacket!! It is so absolutely awesome and flyyy. I feel glamorous and cool in this jacket. I think I will buy it...

It's lovely and very soft. Unfortunately, it got hot again here in DC. A bit warm for a fuzzy coat. I wore it to work for one day only. It is a little boxy, but beautifully made and stunning in person. I will rent again when cooler.
I wore this out for a night with friends at the casino. It was surprisingly comfortable and very flattering. Friends and strangers complimented me! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Awesome Vegas dress! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: When i put this dress on, it fit like a glove. Amazingly flattering and shimmery! Love love!

links_reviews_title: Rented for work awards dinner party
links_reviews_text: Very snug, not as easy to get into as I expected but received a lot of compliments

I LOVED this dress. I would definitely rent it again. It had a good amount of stretch. The sequins didn't bother me. I was worried I would find them itchy, but they weren't. I tried the large and it fit fine too, but I went with the medium because hugged my body a little more. The length was perfect for my party. Not too short, but definitely short enough to look a little sexy. For reference: I am 140, thicker around the belly. 34D. 5'7".
The dress was very soft and stretchy especially for a dress with so many sequins! Great for Vegas!

This dress was more than I was hoping for! I got so many compliments all night long. I am normally a small but got this in a medium because of how form fitting it was. So glad i did! Super comfortable too! I would highly recommend this jaw dropping dress!

links_reviews_title: Stand-out dress with plenty of sparkle
links_reviews_text: This dress was very fun to try on as it was a bolder choice for me. It was very fitted for a Medium, but I think fitted is better with this dress as it's meant to be sexy. It was a little tough to get on and off over the head but manageable. The sequins were not too overpowering and I don't think they would be uncomfortable for long wear. I ended up going with a different dress for the formal Christmas party I attended but would consider renting this dress again for a New Year's party or a fancy night out, especially in Vegas.
I received lots of compliments but had some problems with the neckline staying in place. It tended to pull to one side.

I ordered both the small and medium based on other reviews and wound up going with the medium. I'm short so it was an appropriate length on me for my work holiday party. I liked that I could wear a regular bra with it. (I'm curvy with a large chest and I always worry about having to deal with strapless bras). I had shapewear on underneath and the lining of the dress clung to it so I had to adjust a few times, but overall it was a great choice. This dress is the perfect combination of sexy and classy...I paired it with red shoes and it was perfect!

Rented this dress for my work's annual holiday party. 5'3", 150lbs, 36F, normally wear size 10/L dress. The lining was thick enough the sequins weren't scratchy. Ruching in the middle is super flattering. Received positive compliments all night long!
I'm usually a medium, this was XL but fit like a glove. It's gorgeous, comfortable, and sexy!
Wore this to a masquerade cocktail party. It was perfect. Comfortable, true to size and elegant.

I was torn at first between a large and XL; the XL was more comfortable and the large was pretty tight, but in the end that's what looked the best. I got compliments all night long, the dress was truly stunning. Wore this to a company Christmas party. Drawback was typical of every sequin dress in that it will catch on itself or other things, can be scratchy.

I wore this to a gala. Both sizes worked I (think) I ended up wearing the medium because the sleeves were more comfortable. I read reviews about hair getting stuck to the sequins and wore my long hair down anyway. It wasn't that big of s deal. I found this dress to be very slimming.
Wore as prom chaperone (I'm a teacher). Very comfortable, so easy, could jet around all night easily. Continue to love RTR.
This dress is absolutely stunning. Fitted and looks amazing on the body. Very comfortable! I got a lot of compliments.
This dress was very comfortable and had some give in the fabric.

I agree with what a lot of other women mentioned- the top definitely falls down, so had to safety pin that to my bra straps, but was prepared to do so from reading other reviews. Secondly- people were also correct in saying it's kind of hard to get into for some reason, so be prepared for that. I also thought it ran a little small, I'm typically a 6 and the medium that I wore was a little snug/form fitting. But overall a nice sexy dress that I got lots of compliments on.

It runs small in the arms and is very difficult to put on. Must go over your head so you have to put it on before doing hair and makeup. Other than that, it is a beautiful dress. Somewhat conservative due to the length but still flashy enough to turn some heads.

links_reviews_title: So hard to get on and off
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my Bachelorette Party and ended up going with my backup. While the dress is decently flattering, I was not a fan of how hard this dress is to get on and off. It has a side zipper (why??) and zero stretch, and when you try to take it off the sequins catch your hair and you end up ripping out half the hair on your head. The main reason I didn't wear it though is because the asymmetry of the bottom bothered me. The right side is very fitted and the left side is looser. So basically the dress felt like it was cupping me on one side so I constantly felt lopsided. I also don't think it was super flattering to be cut that way, but that's just me.

links_reviews_title: Very comfy dress, perfect for charity dance party.
links_reviews_text: I got S and XS and the XS for better. I am 5'4", about 125lbs. It was very comfortable.
Zipped up and fit like a glove. Not too short, not too long. I loved the deep V in the front AND the back
Could barely pull the Size M over my head and shoulders. The large was still tight, but forgiving and comfortable. Great neckline. Wore with suede boots because it was cold. Great look!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! Wore it for the Elton John Concert. So sparkly and festive!!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size
The dress was super comfortable and flattering, the material smoothed out any tummy imperfections. I got tons of compliments!

Dress was comfortable and not itchy. It did not ride up at all. A little longer than I expected. I wore a strapless bra with it. Chest looked great and showed some cleavage. Runs pretty true to size but a tad on the small side. The side zipper helped. Flattering on my shape and larger belly area.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments! This dress made me look and feel amazing!
links_reviews_text: Although it was difficult to get the dress on, it was worth every struggle. The fit is very flattering and accentuates all the right areas. I did have some trouble with the neckline. It kept pulling to the right, exposing my bra. I found later on it had been sewn/stitched on the right front side which is probably the reason for the odd fit. I also have a small bust so the neckline was loose to begin. However, I was still very happy with the dress and the many compliments I received wearing it. It was a cold night but the dress was still perfectly warm and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress. It made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The dress was fantastic. It hugged my curves so well and the fabric camouflage my insecurities! It was the perfect birthday dress!! (Both dresses shown are RTR gems)

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a charity ball and then threw on some adidas and wore it out dancing!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress SO much! I am a mom and a teacher so I wanted to make sure the dress was appropriate and not too short or revealing. It was classy & comfortable! I received so many compliments and I felt like the dress was super flattering. I would rent this dress again! OBSESSED with RTR!
This dress was perfect and comfortable. It's stretchy and flattering. I highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments, very sparkly and detailed
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a large but I had to put on XL, the large fit was snug, and zipper was on the side so you will need someone to help zip you up lol

Dress fits all curves and is flattering. Material is stretchy and there's ruching in the stomach section, which is nice. Dress wasn't too short on me, though it is short, and front neckline cut wasn't too low. I loved this dress for the evening party I attended and would rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect combo of classy and sexy!
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments on this. This dress fits like a glove, was the perfect length, allows you to wear a regular bra or full bodysuit if you're well endowed or need some extra cinching. It runs small. I had to order a replacement that arrived hours before my event but it fit perfectly. The sequins will pull your hair if your hair is long enough. And be careful hugging others with sequins etc as they can get caught. It was a great first RTR experience! I'll be back.
Loved the dress! Could have gone with a Large I think, as it stretched through the night. But I needed the length of the XL.
Beautiful dress that was perfect for a NYE party. Elegant, but with a fun sparkle.

links_reviews_title: This dress made my Fiftieth Birthday Fabulous!
links_reviews_text: This dress is SO much fun! The shape, length and WOW factor were perfect. Though the dress was a little snugger than anticipated the fabric had a lot of give and it fit nicely. I rented it for my fiftieth birthday party and the photos are so much more memorable thanks to this great dress!
I felt like a NYE rockstar in this black "disco ball" dress. Very comfortable. Curve hugging. Looks fantastic with fishnets!

When we feel good in what we are wearing it looks good. This dress form fits to all the right areas. The sequins make it a little uncomfortable to get on but they're unnoticed while wearing. So many compliments!

This dress was amazing! I am full figured and it's fit in all of the right places. It sparkled so pretty and I got so many compliments! The only thing I suggest is definitely wear your hair up because the sequins and hair do not mix! Lol #NYE #perfection #sparkles

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a NYE wedding
links_reviews_text: This was my second choice dress but once I tried it on I fell in love. It was exactly what I wanted for a NYE wedding. I felt super pretty and sparkly and got many compliments all night. I loved the long sleeves because they kept my arms from chaffing on the sequins. I did have to fuss a little bit from time to time to keep the dress from twisting around but that really didn't bother me. I was comfortable the whole night and I wish I had an excuse to wear sequins more often.
Heavy but great quality. Forgot about the pockets! They don’t stick out at all. Wore this for my Valentine’s Day rehearsal dinner :)
Super cute dress, received lots of compliments!

Beautiful fabric, very heavy, not shiny or stretchy, almost like a brocade but with no pattern. Photographs beautifully and is a deep, true red, not orangey and not purple-y. Warning for my curvy sisters though - it is very small in the bust! I am a 34B and was a little squished in a size 2. But for those with small busts who want a strapless gown that doesn't feel like it's going to slide down at any moment, this dress is great! It is perfect for photos, hangs great and doesn't flap around or catch light weirdly. I was very happy with it and my owl approves as well!

This dress was so unique and the color was gorgeous. It fit really well, the material was pretty heavy so it was perfect for a winter holiday party (I was actually warm the whole night!). Got a lot of compliments, kind of wish I bought it!

Wore this to a Nov black tie optional wedding in Mexico. I got so many compliments! It's definitely small, especially in the busy - I wish I had had a large to compare to, but the medium worked and the boning on the sides wasn't too restrictive. Loved the pockets too, deep enough to fit everything I needed for the evening so I didn't need a purse, plus the weights on the hem meant I could dance with things in them and they stayed in the pocket. Would definitely rent again!

This dress was flattering and I loved that it had pockets. The material was nice and heavy. I usually wear an 8 in pants but a small or medium in tops. I ordered the medium and large and couldn't even zip up the medium so I had to wear the large. I'm 5"10 and loved the tea length. Perfect for a formal reunion event!

links_reviews_title: Show stopper of a dress! Just size up.
links_reviews_text: Such a stunning dress! Wore this for my engagement photos and revived so many compliments, as well as just felt great while wearing. The only suggestion I have is to size up as I am normally a small (anywhere from a 0-4) and had to get a medium!

I absolutely adored this dress. It is true to size in all areas, except the chest. I am a 34B and this was SNUG. Sitting down for dinner at the wedding, I was slightly uncomfortable in the boning. I ordered a Small & was worried a Medium would be too large overall. It worked great otherwise - perfect for a fall wedding. The fabric is heavy and beautiful. Lots of compliments. Best part - it has pockets!
Comfy, beautiful, fun to spin in, has pockets- what more could you want? The material was a tad heavy, but nothing I couldn't handle.

Beautiful dress! The bust and waist were tight so I wore the SM but I preferred the length of the XS. The dress is heavy and the material is thick. Great for a winter wedding but I did have to keep pulling it up. Overall, great dress! I'd rent it again

I love the shape of this dress! And having pockets was awesome. The only watch out is the dress is heavy. Material was thick which was nice (I didn’t wear a bra) but it would have been hot if the wedding was 100% outside.

This dress is one for the books, I wore this my Harvard award ceremony. I received so many compliments and it felt amazing to wear. The top is snug, so it doesn’t slide down and has grips on it which helps, the length is nice, it didn’t go past my ankles, so it allowed for any type of shoe to be worn. The wine-red color is exquisite and went so well with my sun kissed skin tone. LOVED, LOVED, LOVED!!! Sorry for the selfie photo, the site won't allow me add any of my other photos.

The dress fit perfectly! I did go without a bra for more comfort but other than that the length and size was perfect and I'm a short girl. It was heavier material than I expected, but that didn't stop me from moving around easily. Also, POCKETS!!!! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I received so many compliments. I highly recommend it
links_reviews_text: I was concerned about the length being awakward on me because I'm only 5'2, but it fit perfectly. The material is thick so I would deff wear this in the fall/winter because you might be too hot in the spring or summer

Beautiful dress, heavy rich material. The reviews said the top ran small, especially if you are busty. Very true. I am 5' 135 lbs and the I wore the large size due to the tightness of the top. The medium fit perfect everywhere except the top. Overall very happy with the dress, received alot of compliments.
Fit perfectly! Received a ton of compliments and loved the color with my skin tone!

links_reviews_title: Medium too tight, large too loose!
links_reviews_text: I got the M and the L and wore the medium. The M was a little tight in the bust. It worked, but it was a bit hard to breathe. The L wouldn't have stayed up, though.

Loved the dress! I got the medium and large and ended up going with the large. The medium was too tight around the bustline. The large was just a tad too big, but it stayed up for the most part. My bust size is 34 D

Material is thick and nice. The color is fantastically rich. Little right on the bust so if you are more ample in that area it may be uncomfortable. I am not so it was perfect. Just all around gorgeous and a good alternative to a full gown for a black tie event.
Rented as my back-up, but really loved the dress. Runs small, chests was tight so be sure to size up.

Did not end up wearing this for my intended event, but it was a great dress. Comfortable, well fitting, has pockets. The fabric was darker in person than expected and slightly textured, but very nice.

links_reviews_title: Great quality, even more amazing color.
links_reviews_text: After reading the reviews of the top running very small, I would have to say I agree with them. Had I not worn a silky blouse layered underneath making it slide easier, I think it would have stayed put better. The fabric was thick and heavy, which I usually look for in an event dress. The color was so gorgeous. I styled mine with a coordinating colored blouse and bright yellow accents! Check out my blog where I style several RTR pieces! www.ragpepper.com

I rented this dress for a formal winter event for my company and I would rent it again. I absolutely loved this dress. I got a lot of compliments for it, and it fit just right. The dress is a little heavy so you might get too hot during summer. Other than that, it is a really fun dress, simple and classy. The best part? It has pockets!!! Totally recommend it.

Rented for a formal holiday party. I loved this dress so much that it was worth braving extremely cold & snowy weather. Shows a lot of cleavage, but I loved that you don't need to wear a bra. It is very structured, but you can still move around and dance comfortably.

This dress was super cute and I got a ton of compliments! And pockets, need I say more. The top definitely runs small so make sure you size up for the backup. Aside from the size, the material was heavy so it sits really nice and is flattering.
This dress is really nice, good quality, and has pockets! I love the fit, although I had to occasionally pull it down for a better fit .

I rented this for a formal wedding, I knew there was going to be both long and short dresses so I wanted something in between. This dress was perfect! I'm pear shaped with a very small top (34A) and generally large bottom half, this dress fit perfectly in all the right places. And pockets are always great. I wore the M and ordered the L as a backup size but I probably should have worn the S as I found myself pulling up the dress throughout the day/night. The dress was a hit and I'd definitely rent again.

I got so many compliments in this dress, even from the people that only saw pictures! My chest is pretty small, so I wore a strapless bra, and the part under it was a little tight, but not terrible! The pockets are a huge plus!

links_reviews_title: It was a wonderful holiday party for work.
links_reviews_text: The dress is pretty heavy and since it is strapless I found that I was having to pull it up throughout the night. Totally worth it tho, the dress was gorgeous and I got a ton of compliments. I was probably between a medium and a large. Love the pockets and how flowy the skirt is.
Wore this dress for my niece's wedding and I loved it! So comfortable and it has pockets! Would definitely rent again!!!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a black tie winter gala.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It ran slightly smaller than expected but without a bra it was fine. Do not reccomend this if you are busty!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Christmas cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. It's very heavy, thick material so by the end of the night, when the picture was taken, it had fallen down a little bit. However, it made me feel amazing and I think I will definitely be renting this dress again for any other formal holiday events.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a winter wedding and the pockets were an added plus!
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size 6 so I ordered a M and chose the L as a backup due to reviews about tightness in the breast area. I have larger breasts (34D) and found that the L was less binding for me. I highly recommend this dress as it is a beautiful fit and the color is more of a burgundy than the brighter red portrayed in the picture.

The dress was perfect for the welcome dinner before the wedding. It has pockets which i love. the fabric is really thick and a bit heavy which made me worry it would slide down but it held in place all night. i would definitely recommend
I rented this dress for a black tie birthday party. This dress is definitely run small. Make sure you get the 2nd size.

I loved this dress and received soooo many compliments on it!! It is a beautiful dress!! It is a heavier dress, but it stayed put even though I am small chested. It crinkled up a bit at the chest, but not to the extent where it looked bad. It ran a bit small. I wear size 00/24 in jeans and needed my hubby’s help zipping me into a small. I am very happy with this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Loved renting this dress! It was a VERY tight fit for me at first, but ended up being comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful dress. It was extremely tight for me across the rib cage, which is where it holds up, rather than squeezing under the armpits. (I’m 5’9” 157 lbs, and 36B) I ordered a Large. It was difficult to take deep breaths until the fabric stretched out, but I was glad it didn’t squeeze my armpit/boob/back fat! The waistline hit me just right, and the length was perfect. I felt so pretty all night! Heavy material, but it stayed up well for me. I did use a strapless/backless bra with it bc it offers no bust support and the fabric is thin enough for nipples to show! Pros: gorgeous, rich color; comfortable fabric; pockets; shows off shoes but is still a modest length; squeezed my rib cage to stay up but not my boob fat/back fat/armpit fat! Cons: no bust support; heavy fabric; only up to size Large on RTR;

links_reviews_title: Dancing the night away in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was super soft and comfy and the pockets are to die for, but the top bodice has some ribbing in it which made zipping the dress challenging and some of the ribbing was bitting into my side by the end of the night. Overall though, I loved how the dress looked and all the compliments I got!

links_reviews_title: Rich fabric and texture, gorgeous color and an all around compliment magnet!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The material was slightly heavy, but it gave it a very rich feel and was perfect for a late fall wedding. The color is a deep red (not quite burgundy) in person and the texture is gorgeous. I received SO many compliments. I usually wear a 4 and the small fit perfectly. To top it off, the dress has pockets! Haha I love a great formal dress with pockets!

Overall I loved this dress! It was classy and the color is gorgeous for a fall wedding. The material is heavy but lays beautiful and no need to steam. It does run slightly smaller in the chest area but other than that this dress is amazing!
Dress fit very well-just nothing Uber special about it!

I wore this to a winter beach wedding. I was hesitant with the darker color but the plum color was amazing. The deep V neckline, mixed with the fun cut out backing made the dress so fun and sexy. There was many layers and pleats in the skirt part which made it fun dancing!!! It was short though, I'm 5'7" and it just covered my back side! I would highly recommend. The fabric was very comfortable and breathable.

I loved this dress. I am usually between a 0 and a 2 in this brand but glad I went with the size 2. Everything about it was a great fit. The skirt does remind me a bit of a cheerleader but I liked the look because it was different.

I wore this dress for a wedding. The deep plum purple was perfect. The dress was form fitting on the top, yet flowed on the bottom half. It was great for dancing and free movement. It wasn't too fancy, but the material and the look of the dress was easily suitable for a formal event. Easy to match accessories and doll up. I got a lot of compliments.

This dress was so fun to wear and I got a bunch of compliments! Very form fitting but fabric is on the thicker side so it gives a nice buffer. I loved the cut out detail in the back. Highly recommend.
Loved this dress! The pleats on the skirt made it a fun shape and beautiful color. I loved the back cut out. I ended up wearing the 6 for a little more length.

links_reviews_title: Was worried about the fit but it was phenomenal!
links_reviews_text: I am 180 pounds and about 5’6. All the reviews said it ran small and none were size 12 so I was worried but FOR NO REASON! Great dress and so comfy. I wear a 36 C and it held the babies in the right spot. Great length for dancing and sitting with no worries. I don’t have the flattest stomach and the drop waistline still wasn’t an issue. I even had love handles but it hugged my curves just right and I was so comfy. Definitely recommend this dress 💜

links_reviews_title: Simple dress. Clean lines. A little too cheerleader-like to be sophisticated.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the dress but returned it without wearing it. I normally wear a size 4, depending on the dress, of course. I ordered this in a size 6. The size 6 fit perfectly, and I believe the size 4 would have been too small. I am 5'7", normally a size 4 in a brand such as Lululemon, athletic build, 130-135 pounds. My only issue with the dress is that it felt too cheerleader-like due to the skirt. I would wear it out for an evening with the girls, even though it was not completely flattering, but I definitely would not wear it to a cocktail party.

This wasn't the dress I originally picked out. I had rented another dress but I got a message saying the 0 couldn't be shipped. So, I was able to pick two additional dresses in size 0 to replace it. This was one of the options I selected and I'm glad I did. I received lots of compliments on it. It's a little snug in the stomach area but overall it is really comfortable. I have a pretty small chest and it fit well in the dress. If you have a large chest, be prepared to have a lot of cleavage!

links_reviews_title: This dress looks simple online but it's amazing in person
links_reviews_text: Super flattering - I couldn't wear spanx because of the open back but I didn't feel like I needed them. Loved the cut and color! One of my favorite dresses I rented for a wedding this summer.

The color of this dress is beautiful. It fit true to size, but I went a size up for bust comfort 😂. The dress was a little shorter than I expected, but I’m thicker bottomed. I’m normally a 4 and I wore a 6, only for peace of mind with the cleavage (I’m 32DD). It was very comfortable and lasted me a solid 16 hours. I’d rent again in a heartbeat! I also rented the earrings and purse in this pic 😊

links_reviews_title: Cute idea for a dress, but I was sucking in my stomach all night.
links_reviews_text: The color is great and I like the shape in theory, but pleats that flare out from two inches below the belly button is kind of a tough cut to pull off. I don't recommend this dress if you're planning to eat a big meal.
Cute flare skirt with a very fitted waist. It's true to size if not a little small. Got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress is just fabulous. It fits so well. Would absolutely rent this again!
links_reviews_text: Snug fitting. I usually wear a 0 or 2 but the 4 was perfect

links_reviews_title: PERFECT for a pear, creates a beautiful hourglass figure
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress! I wore it with this jewelled belt that i owned, but it looked great without it. It should probably be steamed or dry cleaned before wearing as the pleats were a little messy, but i didnt have time and i was still very happy with how it looked.
Absolutely gorgeous! Accentuated exactly the right features while keeping my stomach flat- I looked wonderful!

Super long story, but wound up running into the actual store (ups held my dress hostage) trying thisnin and walked out with it! Hugged in the waiste with a slight flare/a-line. Sure oute and received compliments allllll night!
I loved this dress. It was a perfect fit but the skirt was a little short on me. I would have worn the next size up for some extra length but the back up size had two rips on the back of the dress.

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: I have relatively large shoulders and this fit like a glove! I rented it for my brothers rehearsal dinner and wore it out for drinks after. Perfect for the transition. Thick enough to wear in the 37 degree weather.
This was a great dress overall. I am short and athletic build and this was perfect. MateriAl was heavy but very forgiving and comfortable. No part was too loose or too tight.

links_reviews_title: Dress was great for the occasion
links_reviews_text: My 17 yo daughter wore this for a wedding. Perfect for a young woman. Very youthful style.

I LOVED this dress! It fit like a glove and the color was great. There wasn't a big difference between the 4 and 6 but I went with the 6 because there was just a bit more room in the chest. Overall a great rental once again from RTR! They never disappoint!

Super sexy, but does run a size small. I loved the figure hugging fabric with cut out detail. Had to use fashion tape to make sure my strapless bra didn't peek out, but for someone with a longer torso this might not be an issue. Length was perfect on me, but would be super short on someone taller.

The dress is a heavy material, but I liked it because it wouldn't blow up in a breeze. I also liked the open back of the dress. I typically wear a 0 or 2, and in this dress the 0 fit, but was a little tight in spots, so the 2 was perfect. I wore this to an outdoor wedding.
It was so comfortable with a perfect fit. I paired with a fun belt and shoes to add a little flair

links_reviews_title: We used this dress for my engagement photos.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly - slim waist, very flattering. I loved the back cut out, and just felt like a million bucks in it. The halter top is lower cut than I expected, so be prepared to have some cleavage out there. That said, it worked perfectly fine without a bra. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Favorite dress so far - will rent again!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a date to a vineyard with my husband. It was perfect! You can dress it up or down so it is very versatile. The dress fit like a glove. With every other RTR dress there have been aspects I've loved and other parts that I haven't liked as much. I loved everything about this dress. It was supportive enough that I could have gone braless, but I opted to wear it with one of my regular bras that has convertible straps. I will absolutely rent this dress again.
It is a little low. And loved that I could wear a bra (strapless). It was a great fit and great color!

I rented this dress for a wedding not initially loving it but having no other options. That being said once I tried it on and put the accessories with it I fell in love. I rented the 4&6 after reading that E&J dresses tend to run small. I never had to try on the 6 because the 4 fit perfectly. I couldn't wear a bra with the dress because you could see the sides from the armholes but I felt secure enough to go bra less. I'm a 34DDD and the material was thick enough and had enough support for all night dancing. The bottom of this dress is a dropped waist so if you stomach is your problem area I wouldn't recommend this dress. It is hard to wear spanks with because of the cutout in the back. The skirt part also reminded me of a cheerleading skirt with the pleats but it didn't come off as too cutesy. I would rent this dress again or any dress from Elizabeth and James as they're perfectly suited for petite women.

I absolutely loved this dress! It fit absolutely perfectly. I rented it for my cousin's country club wedding in early spring. Since I ate a lot at the wedding, I started to feel a little bit self conscious about the tight midsection towards the end of the night. But overall, I received so many compliments about how well it fit me. I danced the night away with ease. My one request would be that it could be a little bit shorter, however that is probably because I am so petite.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dancing the night away on NYE.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Beautiful color, well-made, comfortable, and can be worn with most styles of bra. I sized up for my backup size but didn't end up needing it. Would rent again!

I loved this dress! I wore it for a winter wedding, so I had to wear a jacket over it for part of the night as I was chilly without sleeves. At 5'10", it was quite short on me, so I had to wear tights, but I could have worn it to a different type of event or in warmer weather without tights. Definitely runs small, so order a size up! I was able to wear a regular bra with this dress.
It was a little tight around the bust so I ended up wearing a size 4. It's a great dress and is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Love this fabric. It made me feel super sexy, yet comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Great dress for dancing! The skirt does a great twirl, but because of the heavier fabric, doesn't reveal everything. Fits like a glove, but thicker fabric hides any imperfections. Definitely recommend.

Ultra flattering fit and flare. The material is super thick and pulls you in in all the right places and the cut is incredible flattering. The shape is super feminine and the cut-outs make it a little sassy.

I wore this in a homecoming parade and it was amazing! The fit was very flattering and the back gives the dress a little something extra. I ordered the 2 and 4. Both fit but I opted for the 4 so I could have a little extra room. Would rent again!
The dress fit perfect and I got so many compliments! It's true to size. It's the prefect dress for a night out.

Perfect for pair-shaped body types! Tight at the top and loose below the waist. Thick material, but that made the dress super comfortable. Not too short but no longer than mid high length. Only small issue was that it was difficult to zip the top section in the back. I needed assistance and the zipper got stuck on the material. But a little patience fixed it! I got tons of compliments and I'm considering going out and buying this dress for future events. Love love love!!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable & cute for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, fabric was breathable, great color, easy to wear with sticky boobs, nice length for 5'5''-5'8''.
This dress was fun to wear for a fall wedding! Fits true to size and had the tags still on it when I received it! No hiding your stomach in this one though, definitely wish I had worn spanx.

links_reviews_title: Cute romper to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Wore this on a trip and was pleasantly surprised how much I liked it! Able to wear a bra underneath with minimal showing. Fitted waist and fairly short but this didn't bother me. Wore on a casual day out but could easily dress this up with wedges for evening. Purchased it as I enjoyed it so much !

links_reviews_title: Wore a bunch of times, wanted to keep!
links_reviews_text: Super cute romper, and the asymmetrical shoulder makes it fun and different. A bit on the tight side, especially in the thighs for me (I am wider on the bottom). Probably could have sized up to a large and been okay.

links_reviews_title: Perfect combo of dressy and casual!
links_reviews_text: Material is very "casual" but the ruffle adds an extra element of "dressy." Much shorter than I would've preferred so I'm definitely glad I sized up. I'm typically a 2-4 & the medium fit pretty well, other than having to be extra careful about the length.

This was such a cute outfit for my 14th anniversary dinner. It definitely complimented my athletic build and made me feel lean! Great material and I was able to wear riding my bike around town. I was even able to get myself in and out of it when I had to go to the bathroom!

links_reviews_title: Wore out in NYC. Loved it, super cute!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size

links_reviews_title: Perfect outfit for a hot day wine tasting
links_reviews_text: A little snug but that's how I liked it for this piece. Casual if you wear flats but a little dressy with wedges and super cute

This romper is super flattering and comfortable. It held everything in so I didn't need a bra. I wore it to dinner on vacation, it's really versatile and I plan on wearing it a lot more! Definitely on the short side, so good for petite ladies.

First off I LOVED this romper BUT, the sizing didn't work that well for me unless I was seated. I don't have much chest so the top part was lose and made me fear of a nip slip. I also have a short torso so I felt it was longer than needed. I got the M cause I'm bigger around my hips and butt, but it was quite short and my cake was probably hanging out a couple of times. Either way, wore it twice and maybe if I got it tailored, I would've loved it more
Wore to a beach festival and LOVED. Fit perfectly.
Felt easily put together without being overdressed. Loved this piece for my family vacation.
Light but quality material that doesn't wrinkle and fits GREAT! The side detail over the shoulder makes it extra stylish and fun. Compliments all night & so uncomfortable. LOVED IT!

Wore this to a summer rooftop party and it was light and comfortable. Came brand new still with the tags on. Easy on/off (which for a romper is not always the case). Loved the navy color and cute design, would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Delivered in time, brand new with tags
links_reviews_text: Great romper, super cute, very comfortable. A little short but loved it!

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Rides up your butt
links_reviews_text: True to size. Definitely don't size down as it rides up your butt when you bend over. It was a little big in the chest area for me, so I wore a thicker strapless bra to fill it out more. Would probably rent again

Reviews said it ran small but I really didn't realize how small it would be. I where a small-medium in most things so I opted for a medium and should have got a large. I couldn't even zip it up all the way. Might have been cute if it actually fit. If you got this thing on your body, props to you.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it cause the outfit was more casual than I needed but the fit was amazing.
links_reviews_text: The fit was very true to size. Might rent again for a more casual event.
Fabric & details are beautiful. I usually wear xs rompers and this was very small on me, size up!
Super cute but short and small. I usually wear a 10 and the XL was snug.
Didn't get to wear, normally get small and I got a medium. It was still too small
Material is thicker denim like. Runs small.

links_reviews_title: You need to be a stick figure to wear this.
links_reviews_text: I didn’t wear it, it was super small and unflattering and the material was thin and cheap

links_reviews_title: very small- size up by 2 sizes if possible.
links_reviews_text: fabric is thick, you can tell it would be cute if it fit. short and sassy but also small around the torso. could not wear Medium.

links_reviews_title: Short and tight meant it stayed in the bag
links_reviews_text: I am definitely too tall and curvy for this romper. It barely covered my butt and was pretty skin tight. Super cute if you're shorter -- the fabric was nice and the pattern and ruffle adorable! Wish I could have worn it!

Really wanted to love this as a cute romper to wear walking around. It runs so so so small. Looked like I was wearing a onesie and showed way more of the bootie than appropriate. Couldn't even wear it out of my apartment.

links_reviews_title: It was too small, it was short and my torso was too long to fit into it.
links_reviews_text: It's very cute, but order a larger size than normal and be comfortable with a shorter romper.

Was expecting this medium to be loose, but it was definitely snug-- however, it looked amazing and I got SO many compliments. I have a long torso and a big butt, and neither of those things made this romper unwearable. A lot of reviews say it's WAY too small, but I didn't find that to be the case. Just make sure you size up! Perfect for my fellow pear-shaped ladies!

Very nice quality & very cute on the hanger but did not end up wearing. The small runs like an XXS & there's not a lot of give in the fabric - definitely size up at least one size, maybe 2. Also, very short - my cheeks were out

I ordered the large and took it on vacation but it was just too tight in the waist and too short for me to feel confident, comfortable or cute. I never buy size large and sized up after reading reviews. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone with a butt, or a belly that you wouldn't describe as flat.
Did not fit at all runs very small

I wanted to love this. It was my favorite rental for vacation- on paper, at least. But it ran so small I couldn't zip it up. I'm a true zero and it wasn't possible to wear the XS in this. Also, the ruffle on the front was so bent up it looked mangled. Really, it looked so badly cared for that it seemed like someone washed and dried it rather than having it dry cleaned. Perhaps that was why it ran so freaking small. Yikes.
Larger up top than bottom.
Unable to even zip up.

links_reviews_title: Front dip cut made it look like I have a body
links_reviews_text: Small was pretty snug. Thought it had polka dots but the pattern is small thread lines. Not a smooth fabric and ruffle is a little off but it is cute. Nice shape for body overall. I am short and felt like the shorts were short. Perhaps a half size larger would workout better.

links_reviews_title: very flattering, got lots of compliments
