links_reviews_text: Runs a little small, no stretch
Runs extremely small. Could not even zip it up.

I was really looking forward to wearing this, but unfortunately my usual size in this item was way too snug. I had to immediately return it without wearing it. I suggest sizing up if you're at all questioning which size to order.

I rented this for a party, but ended up just wearing it for the day before returning it just to get use of it. The fit was good but it was forgettable. The fabric was strange and kept rolling over itself to show the inside. I would wear this on a vacation for some daytime romping around.
Cuter in person

links_reviews_title: Dress up or down - LOVED this romper!
links_reviews_text: Loved this romper! Was perfect for a night out dancing with booties and statement necklace, but also for a day party with comfortable high-tops. The texture and detailing in the ruffle were a flirty add-on. The romper itself fit true to size, but it is quite short, so if you are leggy like me, be prepared for some extra skin showing!

links_reviews_title: Cute but emphasized my lower belly
links_reviews_text: Very cute romper. Very fitted but fabric has a little bit of give. Never wore because the way the seam hit across my waist, it emphasized my tummy.

links_reviews_title: The photo doesn't do this dress justice! Loved this dress! It fit like a glove and the color was wow
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size, the color was vibrant and bright and was fitted and comfortable! Due to the length, it might not be the best for dancing but not sure as this wedding didn't have a lot of dancing.

I loved this dress but it did run up a bit when I would walk - but that's due to the fact that I have a booty + thighs (athletic figure). Other than that I received a lot of compliments! I normally wear a size 6, however, I wore the size 8 due to being insecure about the dress feeling too tight. I was also freezing because the wedding I attended was in February in CA and it had rained that day...but other than that, very fun dress.

I love a dress that's sexy and classy at the same time. High neck, asymmetrical hem, skin tight but with darts and seams that flatter, color saturation perfection, shoulders on display... my husband could NOT GET ENOUGH of staring at me in this dress. Head turner. Obsessed.

I ordered this dress to attend a company Christmas party. I ordered a 4 and 6 but didn't even try on the bigger size. Material isn't as thick as other dresses I've worn from RTR, but was thick enough not to wear a bra. Overall would wear again & received compliments all night :-).
This dress fit like a glove, nice material, was able to dance all night without feeling restricted. The color was beautiful. I'm 5'6 and weigh 145lbs.

links_reviews_title: Amazing! Would buy if I could!
links_reviews_text: T- back was stellar, length was perfect as was the color. Looked like a edgy and sexy. Would buy if I could! Fantastic dress!

I had originally rented a black dress for this occasion but unfortunately the sizes I'd ordered didn't fit. This was an overnight dress and although I was biting my nails waiting until 2p on the day of my event for my dress to arrive I couldn't have been more happy with the outcome. All dresses I've rented from this designer have been extremely complimentary to my curves and such great quality. I received compliments all night, not only for the color but the cut as well.
This dress was perfect for an outdoor summer wedding and fit like a glove. The color is so beautiful in person!

Was so worried about receiving the dress just days before the wedding. I read many reviews and tips about the sizing. The dress was perfect! I feel like the pictures do not do it justice. Beautiful color and so comfortable on. I danced all night long with no worries!

The vibrancy of the blue is exactly why it kept grabbing my attention when looking for a dress for a wedding! Inner layer is silky so it moves easily with you which had its plus' and minus'. Bust area shaped for a larger chest so I had some extra material that I needed a bigger strapless for. Overall beautiful color, cool angled hem gives it a dash of some fun, first Jay Godfrey dress.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress. Great color, perfect fit, and got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for my houglass shape. Fit my hips and thighs but was also nice and formfitting on my waist.

links_reviews_title: That it was in Kentucky and the wedding was at the most beautiful venue!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! So flattering for a curvy body type. I am a size 4 and this dress was the perfect fit.

Everything about this designer is perfection. Fit true to size, the color was so vibrant, and the style was EVERYTHING. Used it for my professional headshots and literally everyone complimented my dress. I want to buy it!!
Dress is a vibrant color and fit perfectly for the wedding I attended. No complaints. Would totally rent again.

This was the perfect dress for my high school reunion! I got so many compliments! It fit in all the right places and was super comfortable! Such a sexy dress without being too showy. I'm 5'1", 120 lbs, 36"x 28"x37" for the perfect fit of this size 4.

Maybe my favorite dress I've ever rented. Color was beautiful, fit was so flattering, dress was comfortable all night. Shorter side definitely crept up a bit while sitting but was manageable. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy for a July 4th wedding!
links_reviews_text: First off, this dress makes your waist look incredible! The top was a little large for me, but I managed by pulling the back down to make the top tighter. I was held in and didn't have to wear a bra! The only flaw I give this dress is that it rode up quite often. Lucky enough, the wedding was outside and the stickiness of the humidity helped it stay in place LOL! Overall, this dress was so comfy and is THE dress to make your bum look AMAZING! Will definitely rent it again :)
The dress fit amazing. It had just enough stretch to make it comfortable!
Beautiful color. True to size

links_reviews_title: Many compliments, very comfortable, would love to rent it again!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a party and absolutely loved it! It was very comfortable and fit like a glove. I received a lot of compliments but I also felt super confident in it. I would highly recommend this dress for a party or a wedding or any event!
Jay Godfrey just makes perfect dresses. I've worn this in other colors before but this blue is a beautiful color and makes a statement. Super flattering and comfortable!

I was really happy with this dress. I'm short but also muscular and can sometimes have trouble finding dresses that are flattering but don't make me look like a linebacker. This was perfect! I loved the slightly asymmetric hemline and the back. I did wear a strapless bra, but probably could have gone bra-less.

Beautiful dress. I wore this for a weekend with the girls in Vegas. It's fitted but not tight. I am normally a 6 but the 8 worked very well for me. I have more of an hourglass shape so it hugged my hips more. There was very slight bagginess at the waist but not noticeable enough to take away from the look. Very comfortable and beautiful color.

I rented this for my senior dinner for my doctoral program. I am a RTR Unlimited member, and the 8 was the only size available. I am usually a 4-6 and was surprised when the fit of this was so good. I could have sized down to a six, but I would say this runs at least a size small. Overall, I loved wearing this dress. The color was amazing and it was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send this one back!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments. I went with a 10 over a 12. I didn't have to wear a bra with this. Such a beautiful color

I loved everything about this dress and wish I could just keep it! I'm 5'9 and about 170 lbs, athletic body. Size 10 fit like a glove and while the short side was pretty short, it was not too short. The dress is also super comfortable, I had so much fun dancing and partying!!!
The fit was amazing and so comfortable. I loved the uneven slit and the cute back was a great detail

The fit is AMAZING! Hugs all the right curves. And the asymmetric hem makes it so unique. This is the second time I rented this dress because I loved it so much the first time. The only issue with the second rental was the top was stretched out and would rotate, but other than that, was absolutely perfect!

The fit was perfect and the dress was so comfortable. It was form fitting but not restricting. Wore it for a night out in Vegas and got so many compliments!! I will definitely be renting this dress again!!

The thick material and tight fit sucks you in in the right places! I didn't even have to wear a bra & I'm a D cup. I'm normally a 2-4, and the 4 in this dress was snug but worked. It also didn't show any sweat! The asymmetrical hemline is fun if you want to show off some leg

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, gorgeous color, and super comfy!!
links_reviews_text: This dress exceeded my expectations! I received a ton of compliments. Perfect for a wedding!
Beautiful color and comfy fit! I had to wear those bras that stick by Victoria secret. I received compliments all night from my date!

I wore this dress to a formal party to celebrate the end of grad school. After two years of incredible stress and lots of late-night pizza meals, I was not feeling confident about my body (I was about 8 pounds heavier than I typically am). This dress fixed that! It is made from sturdy material, so it's form-fitting but I did not feel exposed, instead I felt supported. The cut is very sexy and interesting, without being too much. The color is vibrant and beautiful. I highly recommend this dress if you need something easy and comfortable but still want something flirty that will boost your confidence!

Fit perfectly! I'm a size 4 in jeans- but the 2 was awesome. Didn't need a bra. Length was perfect. Can move around easily in it. Highly recommend. I am also a 34DDD in VS bras. So not sure how this dress would fit a much smaller chest.

This was the first time I did RTR. I was skeptical not being able to try the dress on before ordering but this runs super true to size. I have an athletic build and it hugs your body in all the right places. Shows off your curves. I'm a 36D and it fit perfect on me. The color is a bright royal blue - a show stopper. I will 100% rent this exact dress again!
Great room in the bust! Very fun, great color. I felt cool and special on my Birthday
I really loved this dress. The size 4 fit but was big in the chest so I tried the 2 on and it was just so much more flattering all around. It was really comfortable and easy to dance and sit in.

Wore this dress during a weekend in Vegas and got compliments from random strangers. The color is stunning in person. The dress fit like a glove. It's a great choice if you want to show off your curves. The dress is true to size and doesn't hide a lot.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to stand out between the sequins and glitter of NYE!
links_reviews_text: I wanted something different for NYE than the regular black/gold/silver sequins and glitter norm. This dress was a beautiful blue that stood out in the crowd. The spit was a little high when sitting down but not too bad. It was comfortable to dance in and the best part was that I didn't have to wear a bra with it and the girls still looked amazing, which at 36DDD it doesn't happen often! It was true to size and very flattering. I did wear spanx with it.

Loved this dress! It did run a little big but it worked out fine. I wore my usual size 8, The fabric is thicker so it tends to smooth out lines underneath. It was very comfortable and I recommend this dress!
Loved this dress! I wore this for a work event and also for a bridal luncheon. Great color and cut. The sleeves do go up a bit in the armpits but not horribly.
Love the color, and it was great quality. It looks like it does in the pictures; it shows off limbs and hides middle. Not a showstopper but definitely very pretty.

This was a backup dress and a mix-up in sizes to be shipped so this dress, while beautiful and so comfortable was SO BIG. It has huge arm holes so had to safety pin each side in about 2 inches. I probably would have been comfortable in a 16-18. Bottom of the dress is flowy - I wore spanx anyways even though it wasnt necessary. Length was perfect! I'd 100% rent again in the right size :)

This dress was perfect. I got compliments all night from friends, strangers, bartenders, and the caterer! The orange color is outside my comfort zone, but was so flattering. The woven texture of the fabric was great and sturdy, yet still light enough to wear to an outdoor wedding in 90 degree heat. First time ordering from RTR, and will definitely order again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color. I could have worn a size 10
links_reviews_text: Super fun, comfy, but must wear a strapless bra with it.
Loved this dress! The only negative I have to say is it is tight around the bust area so I sized up. The color is so beautiful and the dress is super flattering! Would 100% recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Got this for vacation in Napa - great color and comfortable fit. Very feminine! Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Big fan of this dress! Love the ruffles. I'm normally a 4 and this fit true to suze

links_reviews_title: Everyone commented how flattering it was!
links_reviews_text: Great for a summer event withe the orange color, looks great with a tan, everyone commented on it. Was so comfy and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great bold color in a nice fabric
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for an engagement party! Bold color that people complemented, conservative length, and fun ruffles!

Wore to a wedding and received so many compliments! This dress is super comfortable and light. The dress is a darker orange than expected but still a great color. Lining inside the dress was nice because there was no need for spank!
It was bright and beautiful, comfortable even if it ran a bit large. Loved the ruffles!

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on the dress and dress color! Plus it was super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: If you love orange, you'll love this dress! It is very comfortable. My only caution is in the bustling. It seemed a little snug. I didn't order the back-up size 8. Definitely recommend getting the optional 2nd size. #lovethisdress

links_reviews_title: Fun and colorful! Perfect for a summer beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: I probably should have worn a size down, but I loved the dress too much to risk not getting it!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite dresses yet!
links_reviews_text: Really liked this rental.. I received a lot of compliments and it definitely looks expensive.

links_reviews_title: Fun & flattering dress for curvy girls!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a friends June wedding in Florida and I felt confident and comfortable all evening! I hesitated to rent this at first due to the neckline. I wear a size 36DDD bra and I don't usually feel comfortable in strapless bras but it worked well in this dress - I actually felt like the style minimized my front. It also hid my tummy and I didn't have to wear Spanx which was a bonus. I got so many compliments on the color and the style. Would rent again in a heart beat. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: So flowy and comfortable and a perfect length.
links_reviews_text: Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I don't like orange, but got too many compliments to not love the dress.
links_reviews_text: Got this for a grad party for someone heading to UT. I don't love orange, but everyone loved it (& not just because of the school color). Just wore a strapless and was good to go. Very forgiving. Ruffles are fabulous details. Was flowy and didn't rise up too much when I sat down.
Pros: color, accents and lenght are perfect for a short girl. Cons: Its definitely tent-shaped, so it hides a lot of your body. With the lenght though, it helps a lot.
The color and material of this was fabulous! Didn't wrinkle, and was very flattering. I got a ton of compliments. I wore it to a Kentucky Derby party. Would rent it again!
Loved dress, tons of compliments. Wore to Kentucky Derby party with fun hat. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great color and fun detail at neck.
links_reviews_text: Sligtly snug around bust but was a fun dress for a derby themed party.

Super comfortable, flattering fit! Got lots of compliments all night. My husband loved it! Fits similar to other Badgley Mischka dresses. I had to wear sticky boobs because it ran a little bit large in the arms and you could see my strapless bra. I considered buying this dress... and may still buy it!

links_reviews_title: The color is STUNNING! And totally brunch approved since it's flowly!
links_reviews_text: Pros: flowly (fear no food baby), true to size, pop of color Cons: 0
Very flattering dress. Pretty color, easy to dance in. Hides all the right spots. Material is a little heavier than I expected but for an August wedding I wasn't too hot!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress - you won't regret it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so super cute and makes you feel very flirty! It was perfect for my friend's bachelorette party in Austin.

The fit was perfect and the fabric was kind of like a thick linen. It may have been a stretch to wear it for a fall mountain wedding dipping into the 40s, but it worked. Felt super pretty and very flattering for the shoulders and arms!

This color is beautiful! A little pull between the chest- only pasties worn but overall great fit. Received so many compliments at a dinner party. The material is so nice, not too heavy but wouldn't blow up with the wind. Would rent this again. Ruffles are just a plus!
Got compliments all night in the color! It feels and looks so expensive and fit so perfectly!! Dancing in this dress was a blast and it fit my post baby bod and made me feel so beautiful/Hott!!
It was flowy. Allowed me to eat and dance without feel self conscious. The color is so pretty.

This is by far one of my favorite dresses that I have ever rented! The color and fit were incredible! The fabric is great and actually gives you shape, unlike a normal shift dress would. I would definitely recommend wearing with a strapless bra. I wore with sticky boobs because I forgot to bring my strapless bra with me, and I feel like I personally could tell that I had sticky boobs on. Other than that, I highly highly recommend this dress! I received so many compliments!
The fit is great, little dressy for what I was going for but worked great with my leather jacket. The color is phenomenal and I love the ruffles. The dress is well made and very comfortable.
I have never received so many compliments at work as I did while wearing this dress! Beautiful, vibrant color. Well made and true to size!

Worn for my husband's work event. I loved the color, a deep red/orange color which you can't really appreciate until you see it in person. I love how slimming this was. Was a little worried that it would look to baggy on me - I got lots of compliments. The dress was on the shorter side for me. For taller women, this would be super short. The armholes are a little deep so you may want to think about your bra. I wore nipple covers and was very comfortable all night

This dress was perfect for hiding a little baby bump but still looking chic. The 6 fit me up to and I'm a 32D. Length was perfect for my 5'5 height. Paired it with a rented Tory Burch clutch and floral earrings.
Wore this at a wedding in Charleston SC in August. It looked nice, and kept me cool. The fabric is sturdy and did. It wrinkle when I sat in the heat. Color is great. I got a lot of compliments.
I was my sisters MOH and this dress was perfect for her bridal shower! I absolutely loved the heavier fabric and the cute ruffle detailing! I would 100% rent this again for a summer event!

It was a great dress. It actually looks better in person because of the pattern of the material that pictures don't quite capture. I went with the size 12, since the size 10 pulled a bit around my breast. This dress is so comfortable and was happy to not wear spanx for once!

links_reviews_title: The stylist who helped me at the store (Ali) was so great
links_reviews_text: A little big on the bust because I am not busty.
This dress is frisky and fun! It's got a little sass and is well structured. Wrinkled in the shipping process.

I wore this for a baby shower. I wore it with flat sandals to make it more casual but could easily be worn with strappy heels or wedges to dress it up for a nighttime event! I LOVED this dress. The color is vibrant and I love the ruffle detail. The high neckline is perfect. I wore petals instead of a bra. I decided to wear the 18 over the 16 because the 16 was too short for my comfort. I was 4 weeks postpartum and currently wear 16/18 so i love that the dress isn't clingy and is flowy (no need for spanx!). The dress hit ~2 inches above my knee. I would definitely recommend and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a beach wedding - t-shirt material
links_reviews_text: I missed in the description that this is more of a jersey material. The dress was very comfortable and flattering but I was not able to dress it up enough to be worn to a formal winter wedding.
Loved this dress! Very comfortable and for great.
super comfy and cute!
Wore this throughout second and third trimester and post baby. Works with every body type and bump size!!

My favorite item for pregnancy so far. Super soft looks great no matter how much you grow. During third trimester I moved to a size large in more fitted maternity items but this still fits great in medium.

I really liked this dress, but to echo other reviews, it is long! I got compliments every time I wore it, and it was very comfortable. Wore it at 20-22 weeks and just ordered my usual size. It is low cut but I didn't find it too low, and I don't generally wear revealing tops. Will likely order it again during pregnancy. The only drawback is the length. I am 5'2" and definitely had to hold it up, tie it up, or wear tall heels. Otherwise a great dress!
I loved this dress. It was a great length (I'm 5'9), and there was plenty of room for my bump (at 31 weeks). It didn't cling, and it looked nice. I'm def renting it again!

I'm 5'3" and wore this with 2" heels, and it was still pretty long on me. the skirt is pretty voluminous- I actually tied it up at one point, and the plunge is very low. Still a very versatile and easy style, especially at 7 months pregnant!

Based on the height guidelines and size of my 37 week bump, I went for the long in this dress. I was excited when it arrived NWT, but at this point, I really didn't want to have to wear heels to avoid tripping on the dress. It was well made and roomy, even at over 170 lbs currently I could've probably sized down. I may rent again in the regular length.
I got a lot of compliments in this dress. Fit my curves perfectly. Would wear it again.
Wore this to a bridal shower and loved it! Runs small, I wore it two sizes up.

Wore this for a Friday night birthday and absolutely loved it. Super unique with beautiful details (the buttons along the side are such a nice touch)...got compliments all night! Couldn't recommend this more.
Fit like a glove. Interesting print and colors. Tons of compliments!
Loved everything about this dress--fit, fabric, design, and just the overall look. Wore it out twice and considered keeping it. Got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great dress and received tons of compliments on it! Foley, and fun!
links_reviews_text: It was right in the bust area but the overall dress was flowly and just lovely.
Great fit, felt great in this dress. Wish I could have kept it!
I rented this dress for an engagement party. It is super cute and flattering. I recommend sizing up. Straps are adjustable which I love since I'm tall. Would definitely rent again

Perfect fit. I'm pretty much always a 4 and this fits true to size. Rented it for the 4th if July and it was perfect for the occasion. The straps are also adjustable so you can show as much or as little cleavage as you want. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Nice lightweight dress for an outdoor wedding/warm weather affair!
links_reviews_text: Adjustable straps help the fit of the dress, which is a little big up top but I will still wear it at least once!

links_reviews_title: Such a gorgeous dress! You'll love it!
links_reviews_text: I'm this close to the dress fitting. If it were mine, I would probably be able to make it work with an alteration. The midsection for me is slightly too small. So disappointed! It's so beautiful!!

So many compliments! The size fit great on my pear shape. No need for a bra. The rouching in front hid my problem areas and I didn't even think about my shape at all while wearing it. In fact, it flattered my curves in the best way and made me feel sexy! I got so many compliments on it. The mixed patterns surprisingly work well together. Would rent again!
True to size

I loved this dress. I wore it out for a nice dinner in Vegas, and it was perfect. The pattern mixing was fun, and it has a great soft drape. I wore a push-up bra, which was the right move. It does not have any support, so going bra-less is not an option (I’m a 38DD/ 40D for reference). Generally I’m a 16 in non-designer, and could probably have worn either the 16 or 18 here. I rented the 18, and it was a little loose in the stomach area, but that was actually perfect to feel comfortable while at dinner. The high/low came to about mid-thigh, and down to ankle length in the back (I’m 5’9). It’s a great dress, and I’d definitely recommend!
Fit true to size, the fabric was luxurious and the mixing of prints was fun.
Fit great every where but went up one full size from what I normally rent here. Really pretty. Light weight.
Went up 3 sizes, still couldn't make this work. It's too bad, the dress is cute, but didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Didn't fit but loved the print!
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this because I couldn't get it zipped around my bust. (I'm a C cup and also have a weirdly wide rib cage, so this is an issue for me sometimes in dresses that zip up the back.) I had ordered other Parker styles in size 4, and they fit fine, so I thought I was safe. I would consider ordering this in the 6 and see if it worked because it was so cute, and I thought it would be fun to wear out on the town.
Fit great in the waist. Great length. Not made for full busted women
This dress fit, it just wasn't the most flattering and I wasn't excited about it.

This was amazing, I got so many compliments! It really hugged my curves. I couldn't wear a bra with it but the adjustable straps made going braless easy and kept the girls up nicely. Rent it, you won't regret it!

Loved this hot little number, however I didn't end up wearing it because the other dress I rented was more appropriate for the event. However, I will definitely be re-renting in the future! Also I rented the medium but I feel like I could have also worn the small
I love love loved this dress. I received so many compliments and it fit wonderfully. I would definitely recommend.
Very high slit and low neckline but looked awesome

Fun sexy dress for a date night. I loved how it hugged my (small) curves and showed off my chest. This dress is probably too scandalous for a wedding for work affair. That being said I didn't feel naked in it or exposed on my date. Definitely not for busty women. I wore the xs, my measurements are 32-27-35.

Wow this dress looks AMAZING on! Felt supah sexy wearing it, definitely not for the faint of heart. It was perfect for my NYE party. I'd say it runs a bit small, I usually am a consistent 4 but the S was small in the waist. Material was heavy and nicely constructed. You'll definitely need fashion tape to stay secure though haha

Really loved this dress! I wore it for my anniversary date. I usually wear a medium but the top was a little too big. I got a small as backup and ended up wearing the small. The split is pretty high and the dress is very low cut so it's definitely sexy, but it's still flattering.

I absolutely loved this dress. It fit like a glove. The slit case up high but it was fine for me. Only when I sat it would ride up a little bit. All in all, 10/10 I'd rent this again. I got so many compliments on it all night, and it's so ultra sexy. I love when dresses look good on girls who don't have big boobs- this is one of them! It's sleek, sexy and not over bearing at all. I will be renting this again!!!! I was tempted to keep it actually!!!

links_reviews_title: I was so obsessed with this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel so good ! The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because the chest area was so so so loose , I would have had some serious slippage if I didn't wear the black lace bra underneath

links_reviews_title: Sexy and comfortable dress, perfect for Vegas!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my friend's birthday in Vegas and it was honestly so so comfortable. The fabric is amazing quality so you don't have to worry about any sheer-ness, it was way thicker than I thought it would be. Since I'm petite, the sleeves were extremely long on me so I had to fold them up. They stayed folded the whole night so it wasn't an issue. The necklace was a little bit low cut for my taste, so I just used a safety pin to fix it. Overall this dress is high quality and very in style with the high slit.

The slit is incredibly high, I am only 5'5 but I had to bobbypin the slit to make it more appropriate. If you are relatively "hippy" you might want to size up since the tighter the hip area, the higher the slit. I also fashion taped the bust as this dress ideally works for people with smaller busts IMO. Because this dress needs a lot of adjusting and pinning and taping, I would not recommend this for an event that has a lot of activity like dancing or walking around.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and fabulous dress. Show stopper.
links_reviews_text: The cowl was offset so the dress felt slightly awkward. But picking my husbands jaw off the floor was well worth it. Not for the faint of heart.

I love this dress! I felt so sexy & received so many compliments. It was perfect for a club night for a bachelorette party I went to in NYC. It was warm but still sexy & revealing. I wore pasties & never felt the top move out of place and the slit stays put on the side. I am seriously thinking about buying this dress I loved it so much!!
A little odd in the shoulders. Super revealing. No way to wear a bra. Overall, unusual, unique, edgy piece.

links_reviews_title: A winter night at the opera
links_reviews_text: This dress was bombshell sexy! My body is all boobs and hips. I have square shoulders, D breasts and small waist with wide hips. I am nothing if not an hourglass. That being said, the dress fit different;y on different parts of my body. Tight on my hips so it did ride up at times; fit good on my waist with no issue; very loose and open at the bust; fitting nice on my arms but a little long on the sleeve. All aside, I did really enjoy it because it showed my assets very well (maybe too well). But I like risqué. I wore no bra; I actually taped my breasts up with duct tape and they looked great. It wasn’t uncomfortable the way I did it; I also used double sided tape to adhere the dress to the duct. And all was well.

links_reviews_title: Really wanted to wear but rented to late
links_reviews_text: I got this dress and was hoping it would fit. But when i rented they only had xs s and l. If i had rented it more in advance i probaly would have worn the M (if it fit me) The dress has no stretch so get a size larger!!!

links_reviews_title: Order as my backup but ended up liking it better than my original one!
links_reviews_text: Perfect black dress. The perfect amount of skin showing to keep it classy. I am 5'3 and the slit was very very high, so I pinned it a little so that it did not go up as high. Very form fitting dress but super flattering. I think it runs small, it was a little snug around the ribs. But got so many compliments on the dress and loved it very much. Would 100% recommend and might even rent it again for another event!

The sleeves are long and I had to roll them, plus a button was missing on one... but that didn't affect the fit. The front did keep sliding even with tape and I am not large chested... so be mindful of that!!! Wish it was a little more fitted in the front and not as baggy.
Beautiful fabric, & dont wrinkles ( great for traveling), super sexy but classy, fashion tape helps to feel secure

links_reviews_title: Perfect NYE Dress for Black Tie
links_reviews_text: This dress worked PERFECTLY for me. I ordered it as a back-up and loved it more than the one I had planned to wear. This was for a black tie party and was surprisingly comfortable. The top was a little loose, but I just pinned up the inner lining and problem solved! Definitely recommend this dress!

Loved it. Dress made me feel mature and sexy sophicated ! Showy in all the right places. I am 5'1....130 lbs. sleeves were a little long so i just cuffed it once. Super comfortable. Needed a little bit of double sided tape just in case for when i danced.

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning, fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I loved the material, it was very high quality. This dress was a lot more revealing than what I M used to wearing, but the tights underneath and a little fashion tape really did the trick. Would suggest renting this dress for a party, or evening occasion!
Beautiful dress, girls with bigger breast recommend lots of tape and keep your posture! Elegant and sexy, love it!

Loved this dress, as did my wedding date. It is very revealing, so be careful the occasion you wear it to. Fit perfectly in my regular size, and was extremely flattering. The fabric is thick, so smoothed over any problem areas. I used fashion tape but didn't really need to, it's well constructed and stays in place.

Super gorgeous dress, but very daring so I wouldn't recommend it for anything other than a glam night out. The slit on the dress was so high that I had to keep a napkin over my legs all night at dinner! :) Overall fit was good, though the inside straps were very very long so I had to safety pin it up to keep my boobs from falling out! If I didn't have long hair to cover the pins, it would've been an issue. Otherwise it was great & super flattering. Also, the material was thicker than you'd expect so it's an excellent cooler weather dress.
Va va voom. Medium fit me perfectly. Didn't need any fashion tape. Comfortable. Well made. Might buy this one.

links_reviews_title: Great dress (hard to tell from the photo :) Very sexy ...might be a little revealing
links_reviews_text: Pros: Sexy ~ flattering for most Cons: Sexy might be uncomfortable if not pinned in....lol. Great for someone with confidence (I felt I had to cover my "slit" when I was sitting down.

I got tons of compliments on this dress! Very very sexy. I found it hard to put on so my husband had to help. The arms were a bit tight as well, but it worked out great! It was pretty comfortable once I had it on. Loved this dress!

I rented this dress for New Years Eve. It was a total show stopper. The plunging neckline was so flattering and the slit up the side was borderline scandalous in the best way possible. I absolutely loved it. I'd highly recommend this piece.

This dress was incredibly sexy. You would either have to go braless or wear with a deep plunging bra. There is absolutely no give in the dress, and even the arms were really tight-and I have thin arms. The large will probably only fit up to a size 12, not any bigger. My fiancé absolutely loved the dress and it hugged me in all the right places. I wore it for my 50th birthday dinner. I cannot wait to rent it again. This was sexy at its best. You will definitely need to bring your confidence when wearing this dress. It is a showstopper.

This dress was amazing! I gave it 5 stars because I have never felt so good in a long sleeve, high slit, lowcut dress! I will say that I had to safety pin the middle just a little because the neckline was a little too low for me, but it worked out perfectly ! I wore the medium instead of the small simplest because the small was a little too tight on my hips/thighs and made the slit very inappropriate, but the medium was perfect! I recommend this dress! Love it!

Love love loved this dress! Perfect a cocktail party or social event. The smaller size fit better than the medium. Fashion tape was needed, but it was so worth it. Lots of compliments and my date could not keep his hands off me!

links_reviews_title: Little too revealing but incredibly sexy...
links_reviews_text: Overall great dress, but had to pin the front a little so as to ensure that I wouldn't flash the entire restaurant on my date. Aside from that, paired with tights and heels it made for an amazing winter date night outfit. Hard to feel sexy when you're dressed for 20 degree weather but this dress made it happen!

Modest thanks to the long sleeves Sexy thanks to the high slit and low plunge Pros: super comfy, great material, elegant but still sexy! Cons: Sleeves were maybe an inch too long, bust area was very big (I used double sided tape to fix that) I wore it to my birthday dinner but wished I had a fancier engagement to wear it to!
Fit was great and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Received lots of compliments. Flattering.
links_reviews_text: Order a Med and LG for a back up. Med fit great on the top however the slit was a little to high. LG fit better and slit was manageable. However the top was big. I work with it and used fashion tape.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and classic piece, excellent fabric and daring cut.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for NYE, it was gorgeous and I received many compliments! Note that it does run large to size, the small was big in the arms and chest. Be sure to purchase double sided fabric tape to keep everything in place, since it has a plunging neckline, it's a little revealing for a formal affair, but great for a party if you're wanting to make a statement!
I am so in love with this dress and received endless compliments. I did not want to return it and will probably rent it again or buy it. The fit was perfect and it was very sexy but still classy.

links_reviews_title: Omg this dress was amazing!! 80s Katherine Turner dreams come true
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress! Definitely 80s addicted to love/Katherine turner in the War of the Roses vibe! Deep v and high slit but still incredibly classy!! Wore it out and got a ton of compliments! I would definitely rent again! Would not recommend for a large bust though.
The fit was too large for me and didn't fall right.

First, thank you to the sweetheart who left safety pins inside the dress because they were so well placed that I didn't have to move them. I' m busty (34ddd ) and without those pins I'm sure my U plunge bra would be visible and a lot more cleavage would be on display. The dress was tighter on my arms than I'd like but apart from that it fit like a dream. The slit was high but not high enough to show underwear and there was room in the waist and butt/thigh area so I didn't feel restricted in the dress. I didn't end up wearing the dress only because I was pressured into wearing a color other than black (since I ALWAYS wear black). I will definitely be renting this dress again...unless it goes on sale, at which point I'll purchase it!
This dress is super pretty and versatile and so comfortable and easy to wear. Loved it. True to size.

This dress was very comfortable! It was perfect for a backyard wedding reception-- between nice casual and semi-formal. I LOVED the frills; it kept the dress feeling airy and light on a hot summer day. I do feel like the dress showed off my tummy more than I would have liked, and it almost had an empire waistline (more fitted toward the bust than the waist) that wasn't ideal for my body type. I wouldn't rent again for that reason, but I am glad I rented it for this occasion. It was bright, fun, and flirty!
Loved this dress! It was really comfy and the bright pattern stood out at the cocktail party. Not too forgiving in the belly area, but I still felt really confident wearing this!
Fit beautifully. Very feminine. Line with lingerie clips in the shoulders. Perfect!

links_reviews_title: What a beautiful dress for a beautiful day!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is beautiful! Got tons of compliments on it. It is fitted around the bust and then flowy around the waist, which made it very comfortable and still flattering. Perfect for a spring bridal shower!
Loved the colors, pattern, fabric and fit of this dress, got lots of compliments! Wore it to the office with a shrug because it is low cut in the back
Soft, light, feminine print. Very comfortable and nice mix of fit and flair.
Absolutely loved this beautiful dress! It fit like a glove and I got tons of compliments. Cannot wait to rent again!!
This dress ran really wide and boxy. Completely unflattering and gave lumps and bumps in places I didn't have. Didn't wear.
I received a lot of compliments at work!

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress but challenging with "the girls"
links_reviews_text: I loved the color, length and sleeve, but it was lower cut than I thought. It's definitely form fitting, but still comfortable! It was great for a rehearsal dinner. I'd rent it again!

I chose this dress for a somewhat fancy Saturday lunch in NYC. It paired well with flats for walking, but could be dressed up with heels and jewelry. Runs pretty true to size, if not big (it's forgiving through the torso and hips/thighs). Very pretty print- purples with coral accents. Showed a bit of cleavage on me, but I've got 36DD and can't seem to avoid cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfortable. I received several compliments about this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little big - I would have been better off in a smaller size. The material is nice a light weight for a Summer night and the colors are beautiful in person!

This was a very "sweet" and girly dress that was feminine and professional. It had beautiful fabric and mice details. Generously cut ... I found it to be somewhat loose for a 6 and would have definitely been OK in the 4.
I loved this dress so much, I wanted to keep it. You could wear this dress to work, lunch, or a wedding, easily. Lots of compliments. The picture doesn't do the color justice!

links_reviews_title: Lovely print, lightweight, and perfect for spring/summer
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a graduation event. The dress was comfortable enough to sit/ mingle in throughout a long day, and lightweight enough for summer. Just be careful if you're busty — I did feel a little exposed and was checking myself all night.
This dress has a hint of sexy but is still work appropriate. It fit perfectly, and was great on a hot summer day.

I love this trendy dress by Nanette Lapore! Running true to size and very comfortable, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is formfitting and not too tight . It works best for A to C cup sizes (fitted at bust). You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. The pattern on the dress is amazing in person. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

Comfortable, spring dress. This dress would be great for a garden party, bridal shower, etc. The one downside is the dress has an area for your breasts, and if you have small or large breasts it might not fit well. I noticed my boobs popping out throughout the day and had to keep putting them away!
bought it

I loved this dress. I love the shirt but I wasn't sure how I would like the short sleeves. I wish they were longer but it was OK. This dress looks great on and with a cardigan it can be professional and without it is perfect for the weekend or warm weather. I will rent this again.
I wore this for my granddad's birthday party and it was a hit! The length is so elegant and it is the perfect amount of fitted/flowy.
Flattering slim fit and length. Lovely for spring and summer. I may well rent it again.
Went from daytime to dinner with the family. Was very easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: So flattering for post partum mom
links_reviews_text: So cute on fits true to size. Hides postpartum belly!
I ended up not wearing this dress. Fit was a little too tight under the bust to the belly button --for me

links_reviews_title: Had a vacation and work event approaching, wasn't sure what to wear this for until it arrived.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, cute dress, nothing special. Returned it without wearing. Would recommend it if you like the pattern and cut and want to find something that will hide your tummy, it was lose but not baggy.
Flattering and elegant
Fit was nice, I loved the ruffles I. The wind as I was at an outdoor gathering

This was a cute dress to wear for a day in port on a recent cruise. It could also go into evening if dressed up with the right shoes. It fit well, true to size. I loved it and would definitely rent it again.

I rented this for work and with a pink camisole and blue sweater it was very pretty. I usually wear dark colors and this was a nice change. It didn't feel too dressy for work. It was also very flattering.
Nice fabric. Lots of compliments. A little low cut for work- wore a cardigan with it.
Fabulous fit; wonderful material and print - I can't say enough about this dress. I will definitely rent again
a little loose but fits well and comfortable

links_reviews_title: Feminine, flirty, just the right amount of formality!
links_reviews_text: Initially I thought the color was too subdued but the lilac grew on me and I jazzed it up with a coral shruggy and some fun shoes. I wore it for a family celebration, then again for a fancy business dinner. I found it was just the right amount of fancy and not over the top. It was very slimming and flattering. Has straps to clip to your bra straps inside, no need for tape, or hard zipper to tug on, just a nice solid go-to dress.
Couldn't fully zip up. If fit, could work for a bridal shower or daytime party as opposed to the workplace
Loved the colors and fit on body. However I have a large bust and had to wear a tank underneath which took away from the beautiful dress. Made it more casual.
Very pretty dress, which fits true to size. No stretch in the bodice although the skirt flows nicely over the hips. Feminine, comfortable and you can wear a regular bra!
I rented this twice & then bought it! It fits like a glove. The material & colors are more beautiful that the photos. I've worn it to work, out at night & on a day trip.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress twice while on vacation. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable feminine dress
This dress fit me perfectly! I normally wear between a 16 & 18 but due to being too heavy, 20 was the best fit for me! I totally recommend anyone that's busty to go up a size! I totally recommend it!

So I ordered this dress with 3 others and the quality of this one was immediately a standout. The one caution I'd give is the top is definitely on the tighter side so my boobs were a little crushed but ultimately it worked for me. If I was anything bigger than a 34C it would've been a no go. Got a million compliments and highly recommend to anyone looking for a dress that will float with you for the evening.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments - perfect for a formal gala!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4L as a back up, they were out of 4R but I wanted to be safe incase the 2R was too small. The 4 was a better fit but too long for me, so I ended up wearing the 2R to the event (what is pictured). Besides that, the process was convenient and seamless. This was my first rental and I will definitely be using this in the future!

links_reviews_title: Good material and flows nice. I felt dressed up but not overly fancy.
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size 2 so I ordered a 2P and a 0 because of reviews. The length was good but the dress was too tight in the top. There weren't any cups Inside and I didn't wear a bra because it would have been tighter. It was fine braless since it was tight enough and had good material. Next time I order a dress I will order a 2 and a 4 for backup.
This dress was a lot more flow-y than expected, which was a lot of fun!
Fit well and I was comfortable all night. I usually where a size 4/6 for an Ann Taylor dress and the 8 was perfect. I'm 5'5"- heels were a must.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress runs large in bust but narrow through waist, hips.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small in the waist and hips. I ordered 18 and 20 but ended up with the 20. The 22 would have been fine through the hips, however would have been way too big in the bust. I ended up pinning the top on the left due to how large it was. Over all it was a beautiful and comfortable dress. The process was easy and I enjoyed renting from RTR.

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress, prefect for a bridesmaids dress
links_reviews_text: This dress runs SMALL. I had to go up 3/4 dress sizes. Being 5'9, the long was perfect length for me. Read reviews to get an idea about sizes. Overall, I loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear. It fit really well and flowed nicely just wasn’t a good fit for the event
links_reviews_text: More “bridesmaid dress” vibe than I thought. I wanted to wear it to a gala but it just didn’t fit the event. Everything fit really great!! I am 5,10 and the length was perfect for me.

I am 5’4” and the dress was pretty long on me. I had to wear large heels. The fit was beautiful! I usually wear a 2 but from the reviews sized up to a 4R and it was perfect! Looks almost like a bridesmaid dress.
Loved it. Ran a size big, glad I got the bigger size. My only issue was it kept tripping me up walking up stairs. Other than that great dress!

The ways this dress flows!!! Simple but SO ELEGANT! Yes, it runs a bit small (a bit tight around the ribs in 1 spot) BUT I still wore my regular size!! Such a flattering fit, too! I tied the sash in a square knot on the side of my hip & it looked very nice. I did NOT wear a bra, just some tape & you couldnt see it :) I got the Regular length since i was wearing flats but would definitely suggest the tall if you wear any type of heel (im 5'8)

This was actually a backup dress, but worked out better than I could have expected. Runs a little small in the top, but overall very comfortable and a great length not requiring a unreasonable heel for me at 5'4". Would rent this one again!

The dress was very tight, so I didn't (well, couldn't, really) wear a bra but it was tight enough that I had some support even though it didn't have cups. The sash is sewn on which is unfortunate because I wanted to switch it out for something with sparkle. I love the color and how the fabric flowed. It was ok length-wise with 2 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: The easiness of the entire process!
links_reviews_text: For true to size and was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful dress. Got many compliments from everyone - I believe the term used was greed goddess
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 12 and this was a replacement dress after my initial order did not fit at all. I decided to go with a 16 & 18 only because I saw from previous reviews that the rib cage was tight and they weren’t kidding. I thought that I could get away with the 16 but it was really right in the rib cage area. I had to wear the 18 although the bust area was a bit too big. Overall the dress was very beautiful and flattering.

I love this beautiful gown by AMSALE. It runs true to size and it has no stretch. The fabric is very flowy. I recommend wearing your true size for your primary and going up a size for your backup. This dress is loose from the hips down. The style is comfortable. At 5’3 this dress hits floor length for me. Beautiful color for a bridesmaid at a wedding.
No stretch and runs a bit small but a great simple formal dress

links_reviews_title: Really nice dress, got lots of compliments and was comfortable all night.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 10 but because it is cinched at torso I rented a 12 and 14. For my busy and rib cage the 14 gave me an extra inch, ease of sitting and sat nicely. I got the Long and it was very long even with 4 inch heals.
Loved this dress but it was difficult to zip and wore the larger size. Typically I'm a 14/16 but wore the 18 and it was still hard to zip. I would rent again and was very flattering.
beautiful dress, so easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately I can use this dress due to fit and length.
links_reviews_text: Too long and far too tight in the waist. Disappointed as I had high hopes to wear this in 2 days.

links_reviews_title: For people with no rib cage!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a very lightweight material and very bridesmaid-ey. Of the five size 2 dresses I tried for the event, this is the only one that I could not zip up over my rib cage. There is absolutely no give around the middle, so make sure to be thoughtful about your back up size!

links_reviews_title: Size up! I rented this dress very last minute. The dress is very flattering.
links_reviews_text: As many of the other customers mentioned, the dress definitely runs small in the waist. Thank goodness I read the reviews and got a larger size for my back up. The dress is very flattering. My only complaint was that the top was a little loose (once you adjust to size up the waist), but it definitely was not a deal-breaker. I will definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Received on time and easy to return!
links_reviews_text: The dress is great.. lots of compliments. The only problem is I am a size 8 and had to go with a 12.

This dress worked out perfectly for a December wedding I attended as a guest! It fit well, maybe was a little long for me with heels on (I'm 5'2). But it worked out well. There wasn't anything too special about it, but I was comfortable all night and it fit the Black Tie Optional attire. I wore a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a military ball and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable and so beautiful! Will definitely use this site again :)

links_reviews_title: I could not wear the 12 or the 14 (backup).
links_reviews_text: Dress was pretty, although a little flimsy. As noted above, I could not wear it because the 12 would not fit my 38D bust. The 14 (back up size) fit my bust, but left a gap and a lot of fabric over my shoulder.
There was a minute where we didn't think I would get it on over my bust. Once zipped it fit nicely. Pretty color. Then angle in the front is quite low

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an elegant yet understated wedding and reception.
links_reviews_text: I'm only disappointed that I didn't get any good pictures in this dress! (I did well with having my phone away, I guess.) I'm SO glad I took the 4 as well as the 2 - the 2 was surprisingly tight, but I do go between a 2 and a 4 about 50/50 when it comes to dresses. I wore pumps with about a 3 inch heel, and with my being juuust under 5'5", the dress hit just at the right spot, lengthwise. I received so many compliments - it felt elegant but not over the top. Also, it's a super low-maintenance dress in terms of needing to be fussed with during the event. Definitely recommend an updo and some sparkly earrings. Don't be wary just because it's affordable - this a 5-star dress!
Loved the style and it fit perfectly. Was soft and comfortable. Did not end up wearing though because so have hips, and the style of this dress accentuated them too much.

Beautiful fit and color! I’m typically dress size 8/10 5’8/ 160lbs/ 36D and the top fit a bit snug! Length was perfect with 2 inch heels, skirt of the dress was relaxed and lovely. Side zipper busted out on the Uber ride over so I had to undress, fix zipper and redress in the bathroom stall at the gala LOL! Overall the dress was a beauty and I’m totally satisfied with my rental experience!
Fit was small. Usually wear an 8 and this did even start to zip through the rib cage. Ended up wearing something else but it was a nice dress I wish would have fit!
Somewhat odd fit. Inner lining pulled at the hip so it looked odd.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress. I felt glamorous but understated which is the look I was going for.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 4-6 depending on the cut and style, I was a 6L in this dress. I am 5'8 and wore four inch heels, so the 6L was perfect. If I had wanted to wear shorter heels I would have gone with the 6R. Overall great fit, I will say if you are larger around your chest maybe size up. I could zip the side closure up, but that was with no bra (I'm a 32C).
This dress runs small. I needed the bust size to be bigger. Someone should list the max bust size so that different types of women can order appropriately.

links_reviews_title: It was simple, classy, just what I needed.
links_reviews_text: After reading the reviews I ordered the long, which was not necessary in my case. Regular length would have worked well with heels. Otherwise, it fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: The Fact that this dress was so beautiful and confortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress was simply awesome!

links_reviews_title: Rented for a wedding but did not end up wearing.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress but too small in the bust area

I chose this dress for my company's Christmas party. I wanted a dress that wasn't too holiday-ish and still flattering - this dress checked all of those boxes and more! The color was appropriate for the holiday season. I loved the cutout details on the side. The fabric had a nice weight to it while still being flouncy - so, pretty much perfect. I said that this dress runs true to size, but it *may* be a tad on the small side - but not enough to say that it runs small. I prefer when dresses are a little snug, so it didn't bother me.

links_reviews_title: Wore to my Company Holiday Party
links_reviews_text: It has pockets! There is a strong material in the bottle to keep it "flowy". If you are a larger chested lady I would recommend going up a size or two even. I am small and didn't even wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the office Christmas party
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2 but the 4 was a perfect fit. Not a lot of room for a bra if you wear anything larger than a b I would think. It was comfortable, flattering for my body type and I got so many compliments! Loved this one!
This was a great dress -- the length was shorter than I expected but overall I liked it. I had to wear the larger size due to the cutouts making me look "bulgey" but I would wear it again. Fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for Christmas Eve dinner. Got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit a bit snug so I wore a 4 instead of the 2. Very flattering. Made my waist look smaller and chest look bigger. Great color and fabric.

links_reviews_title: Perfect if just a little tight
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for my cousin's 15 and got compliments from almost every one. This dress does run a tad bit small. When trying this dress on I had issues with almost every bra I tired it with. Normal/push-up the straps were out. Strapless showed through the cut outs. Luckily I had backless & strapless cups that worked perfectly. It was tight enough in the chest for my boobs to be held in place. Maybe if I'd gotten a size 12 instead of an 8 as my back up I wouldn't have issues. But ultimately I absolutely love this dress and I'd definitely rent it again.
The fabric & color of this dress are beautiful. I thought it ran small and sized up to the 8 to avoid any flesh squeezing around the cutouts.

Glad I went with the size 6 due to the cut outs. The color green of this dress is phenomenal. The material is thick and it's made well. The skirt part of this dress is actually really flowy and beautiful. This might be my favorite rental yet! Tons of compliments!

Gorgeous emerald color and perfect for Christmas! This is the second time my daughter rented this dress for a banquet. It runs a little small so we ordered order up 1 size. It even has pockets! My daughter normally wears a size 8 and she wore a size 10.

links_reviews_title: i've rented this dress before and fell i love! i wish i ever had to return it! so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: this dress fits amazingly! i've rented this dress before and fell in love with it! i wish i could keep it! the color is gorgeous! so many compliments all night! i'd rent it over and over!

links_reviews_title: This was SO easy!! First timer. Already ordered my second dress :)
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress was amazing. I'm 5'9 and 120lbs. I'm extremely hard to fit, and this fit me PERFECTLY!! And not too short!

Loved this dress! Fit was good but I am small chested, could see where it would be an issue for a larger chest. Perfect length and fit for me. It had pockets which was a must! Color was different in sea of black.
No stretch and was super tight in the waist (order size up) but it had pockets!!!
I loved this dress. It fit like a glove and I got a lot of compliments.
I LOVE this dress!!! If I could keep it I would!! It was so comfortable and it had pockets!! It's super soft and flattering! It does run a bit small. I am usually a 0, and the 2 fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: My daughter loved this dress and the playful green color made her stand out against all the black.
links_reviews_text: There was a strange kink in the hem (above the right knee) but it didn't stop her from wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the cut outs!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5' 95lbs and it fit great. It was longer than on the model, but not too long. It fit perfectly everywhere else. My only complaint would be the hemline was a little bent (there is a thick plastic band in the hem to give it shape and volume).
It gets wrinkles. I ordered for my daughter class night and before she used it I took it to the Dry Clean, anyway it got wrinkle.

This dress is GORGEOUS on! My daughter wore it to her 8th grade formal and felt like it was made for her. It is definitely snug in the rib area (she's 5'5", 115 lbs, 32B and wore the 0) but she said it was comfortably snug. The pockets are a huge plus. The dress we received definitely had a LOT of wear and honestly should be retired but it was incredible for the evening!
I absolutely loved this dress! Received so many compliments. The pockets were so helpful, didn't want to take it off! It runs small in the busy so I would definitely size up!

This dress was soooo beautiful. The color and the fabric were so comfortable. I'm busty so the top was a little snug, but it wasn't anything too uncomfortable. I loved the cut outs on the side. It just made the dress so fun and unique. I highly recommend!

The cut is great for an hourglass shape, but the dress was a little tight in the bust even after sizing up. Maybe it would be better for a smaller bust? Also, as others have pointed out, the fullness of the skirt may not be the most flattering for all. The hem did lay strange in some places, although this seemed to improve through the night. Overall, the dress was a beautiful color, and was fun to dance in.

links_reviews_title: Date night that turned into an engagement/proposal night
links_reviews_text: I'd never utilized RTW and thought that an extra special date night would be the perfect occasion to use it. I'm glad that I did, as this date night was extraordinary b/c it was the night that my guy asked me to be his wife. I read the reviews and followed the advice to get a size up since it runs small. I'm glad that I did and was able to wear the size 8 rather than my usual 6. It was tricky zipping up by myself (thank goodness for SO's that can help with zippers), but once the dress was on, I was stunned by how well it fit and how pretty it flowed. I was able to wear a regular bra, however the fabric lent itself to being enough support to go sans bra. I tend to pick LBD (little black dresses) and was so glad I opted for something more fun and vibrant.

I ordered a size 2 and a 4 for backup. The size 2 was a little snug in the chest and the size 4 fit perfect. The length was great, even for long legs. I couldn't have found a better dress for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Great color! Fun dress for dancing!
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 4 but luckily they also sent me a 6! Runs snug in the chest area. Tried the 4 but the bottom seam was so warped/stretched that the entire seam was flipped up altering the look of the dress completely. RTR you need to retire this dress- it's DONE. Great party dress overall though.

links_reviews_title: Rent this for the color alone!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing! I rented it for New Year's Eve. I agree that it fits snug, especially in the chest area (I am a 32DDD) I went with one size up. I was a little nervous about the cutouts but they were not super revealing or tight on my sides. I would rent this dress again just for the color!! Such a vibrant green.

Great emerald green with a pretty sheen. Flared skirt is very flattering. Medium weight material didn't wrinkle easily. Went without a bra to avoid the band showing through the top cutout or straps showing at the arm.

Fit true to size, gorgeous emerald green color. Nice thick fabric that was very forgiving and hid any body flaws. Pockets were a great feature. Very comfortable dress. I felt a little sexy, a little classy, a little princessy in it. Perfect dress for a petite pear shaped figure. (Small waist larger thighs). I’ m 5’3 115 lb wore size 2. Many compliments. Highly recommend!

Wore to semi-formal event. Fit was excellent. I typically wear a 10 but the 12 skimmed my body perfectly. There was no bulging around the cutouts. The hem is interfaced to make it heavier and keep it's flouncy shape. It was a fun touch and this dress twirled like a dream. But the construction of the hem was wonky. It was like the interfacing was too big and bunched up in places so the hem twisted in some places. It was a little offputting but it was the only negative for me. You can wear a regular bra but I needed fashion tape to keep the bra straps from slipping out. The shoulder straps are cut in a little from where a typical bra strap would lay. Totally recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for the holiday season! I wore it to my company holiday party and felt very festive
links_reviews_text: This dress was VERY snug. I usually wear 0/2 so I ordered a 2 and 4 from rent the runway based on reviews that it was small. I ended up wearing the 4 but it was still very snug and I had to wear it without a bra. I would have ordered a 6 and probably been more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Downtown Chicago Christmas party dress
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Color is amazing and the bounce in bottom is fun! Runs a little big

Loved this dress! The color is gorgeous and the cut is unique and fun. Good quality fabric (fantastic to twirl in) and an overall great dress. Only downside is that it does run small, especially in the bust. If you are larger-chested, you likely won't be able to wear a bra with this dress. However, the dress was tight/thick enough that I could get away with no bra. Perfect for a winter wedding!

links_reviews_title: Not your basic Red Christmas Dress
links_reviews_text: Great dress! I wore this to my husband's company christmas party and was pleased to be the only green dress in a sea of red. I got many compliments. I am 5'9 & 34DD. Bust fit very comfortably, and length was short but notnuncomfortably so. Pockets stowed all my necessities so i didnt require a purse. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great color and material for holiday party
links_reviews_text: Ordered 2 and 4 (going on other reviewers remarks, saying it was cut small- found it was cut true to size and wish I ordered 0 and 2 instead) the material is thick and is a beautiful color, the bottom hem is heavy feeling/thick to make it flare. This dress was nice, but not something I would wear or rent again, definately good for a holiday party. Looking at pictures, I did not find it flattering since it was a full skirt right at mid section.

The dress was perfect! Color was fabulous in pictures and looked even better in person. The other reviews don't lie, the dress is tight in the chest area so i recommend sizing up. I'm normally a size 6 but the 8 fit perfectly. Can't emphasize how amazing this dress is and will rent again!!

links_reviews_title: This is the most amazing color GREEN ever!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a holiday party at a winery. Satin, comfortable. Material is very thick and sturdy. Dress is pretty short so if you spin, be ware! :-) Highly recommend. Slits in side are sexy and revealing.

I️ rented this dress for my daughters prom. She absolutely loved it! The dress fit like a glove...she is normally a 0, but based on reviews we ordered a 2 and it was perfect. I️ think my daughters favorite part of the dress were the pockets! They are the perfect size to fit a cell phone. I️ highly recommend this dress!! My daughter hated having to send it back.
I usually wear 4-6. 8 felt the best. I'm 5'9", 142 lbs, small chest. It wa me super short with my long legs, had to be careful sitting down! But looked amazing. Everyone loved the color.

I wore this dress for my friend's rehearsal dinner. I really loved this dress and received a lot of compliments! Keep in mind that the dress runs a little on the small side so I would order one size up.
perfect color and perfect FIT

This dress was fabulous. It for amazing and I received numerous compliments on the day of the event and days afterwards! This was initially my back up dress that I chose to wear over my first pick. So glad I ordered a “back up”dress. This dress was no back but the main attraction!

In an interesting turn of events, the red dress I originally reserved was not available. The RTR stylist sent me this one instead. While it was a little long, I am glad they sent the size 6 because there was no way I'd fit in a 4, which is my usual dress size. The fabric has no stretch and it wrinkles easily. I was pleasantly surprised on the fit. I got compliments all night.

I am usually a size 8 or 10. I tried the 10R first but it was a little snug in the midsection so I went up to the 12R. I'm 5'1 but with heals on the length of the dress wasn't an issue. I received so many compliments, loved this dress!!!
I'm 5'11 and was able to wear this dress with 3 inch heels. I definitely could have worn a size 10R, but the size 12R left plenty of room to enjoy all the wedding food.

links_reviews_title: I got this dress last minute for my brothers wedding. Let me tell you I loved the quickness.
links_reviews_text: It fit so beautifully and was so bold! I hate showing my arms and this made me feel confident because of the coverage yet still shows some sexy shoulder.
Gorgeous dress with really nice arm details, fits true to size, the inside layer is very form fitting, my hips were very snug and usually a size 4 fits me comfortably.
the fit was perfect. I loved this dress, tons of compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress !! Fit was perfect
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect !

I didn't use this dress after all because I hated the fabric, I know I'm chunky and probably I'm asking for a miracle to happen but I thought that this dress would sit Nicely on my curves, but it just made my stomach pop out too much lol. Still have baby weight on me soo don't feel confident!
Loved this dress for fall wedding! It fit like a glove, was sexy, but not over the top and stood out. I felt it fit true to size and was good for 36D chest (didn't need a bra).
I loved this dress and received a lot of compliments but I had to use a lot of hem tape plus three inch heels to be able to wear it. Street clothes size 8 - 34DD chest for reference. 5-0" 140 lbs

Rented for a formal wedding...color is fantastic! However the fabric is a satin-y so it wrinkles easily and no stretch. Other con is that there is a weird seam right at the natural waist and right below the bust which I found unflattering. I am a typical 4 and had to size up to a 6 here. Length was perfect for me - 5'5" and could wear 3" heels and it did not touch the floor. Received lots of compliments on this - great choice for holiday!
The fit was almost perfect. It puckered a little strange around my boobs (36DD/E). It felt so elegant but I could still dance. It wasn't too long and was perfect with heels.

I love this fun and feminine look by ML Monique Lhuillier! Running true to size with limited stretch, I recommend wearing going up for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for cusps A-C sizes. You aren't able to wear a standard bra with this formal look. I recommend wearing a strapless bra. At 5'8, the length hit tea length on me. Pair with a strapped sandal and simple accessory to complete your outfit!

I loved this style and color. But the liner was too tight. The dress zipped up and looked ok, but the liner was very tight. Wish I could have worn it because I truly looked like the red dress dancing emoji! If you are between sizes, I would order up.
The waist was super tight. Also the neckline is very low.
I am 5'6" and feel this might be better for someone taller, this was so big all over

The dress fit very well and hovered just above the floor with 4" heels. As others have mentioned the fabric has no stretch to it, but it runs pretty true to size so it wound up being ok for me. I also appreciated being able to wear a regular bra and underwear! The color is really vibrant and eye-catching, so I got a ton of compliments throughout the night. I would highly recommend it if you feel like making a statement!

links_reviews_title: Stunning color and style- lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Great dress, fabric is nice quality and color. Got lots of compliments.
Too big in the boobs :(
The fabric looked super cheesy and very stiff. Did not wear and returned the day I got it.
Did not fit my boobs ,run small You may need to size up for this beautiful dress.
This dress was absolutely gorgeous. It fit very well and the material was pretty sturdy. I didn't end up wearing it because it was a back up.
I loved this dress, but it didn't go with the event I was attending. Would be great for the summer time. Fit was perfect.

Full disclosure, I did not wear it to my event. It is very slim fit through the hips and runs on the small side. I am busty (36DD) and the key-hole was actually quite revealing. I was also not comfy sitting in it and I knew the event i was going to is mostly a dinner and live auction. I did love the ruffle front and the length was perfect with 2.5" heels on my 5'5 height.
great dress, so many compliments
Fit in my hips but much too big in my boobs

links_reviews_title: Beautiful evening in Manhattan for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 10 and this dress was a 14 and fit like a glove. The fabric is completely unforgiving so make sure you have a good pair of spanx to wear underneath. Received tons of compliments and was happy with my selection.

It is a very nice dress. I am about 180 and a size 44" hip with a 32" waist. The size 12 ran a bit big up top but a bit snug around my hip and thighs. Had I gone up a size it would've been too large in the chest, waist and arms.

links_reviews_title: Dress was a sexy but comfortable
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfect
Gorgeous dress, fits true to size. Classy yet sexy. Perfect for work events or weddings. Definitely recommend!
This dress was super comfortable and loved that it had some stretch. Got lots of compliments!

Tight dresses are not usually my thing. But I loved this one! I rented the 4 and 6. The 4 fit, but I definitely felt more comfortable in the 6 so I went with that! I felt comfortable and confident all night. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. Second time I rented this dress!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress. Hits in all the right places and the fabric sits really nice!
Dress was comfortable and classy. Fits snugly but the material is thick enough to hide any flaws.

Rented a size 6 but its definitely snug. I usually like a fitted dress but this was too tight for comfort. Going to try and order an 8. I have the RTR unlimited membership so maybe just have to play around with the sizes a little. The color seemed really dark, not sure if it was just my room lighting but almost looked black instead of navy. Very pretty dress though.

This dress was so flattering. I got compliments all night long. Runs small. I usually wear a 4 so I ordered a 4 & 6. The six fit almost perfectly but I could have done an 8 to be more comfortable. I would rent this again. Can be casual or dressy. Very versatile.

I really liked this dress, just wish I would have ordered a size 6 and 8! I usually wear a size 6 with my largest area being my bust. It was tight! I was able to get it zipped and move around okay (fabric loosened slightly as the night went on). I would have been more comfortable I think in a size 8 though. Overall, would still recommend and received a ton of compliments!

The fit was true to size! The color is a dark navy. I love that this vendor uses heavy quality fabric, but it is still breathable and fluid. This dress was dressy enough, but not too formal. I also loved that it fit me. As a petite woman, it is extremely difficult to find dresses that fit in the torso or across the shoulder area. This dress would look great on a taller woman as well. It was very comfortable and easy to move around. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I've used RTR for our annual Christmas party and I've never been disappointed.
links_reviews_text: Size up. I recently lost 30 pounds so I was unsure if a size 10 or 12 would fit. Thank goodness they offer a free size. The 12 was snug but it's supposed to. I needed help zipping with even going to the bathroom so it's very form fitting but absolutely beautiful. I am a size 10 in jeans and my bust is a C cup. It does push down on your chest so just wear a padded strapless bra. Many reviews from other customers were size 4 so i was a little nervous. If your between a size 10 and 12, this dress will make you feel incredible!
This dress was perfect for the rehearsal dinner I attended. I will say, I'm busty (32G) so the top was very tight on me. Otherwise it was perfect!
Fits true to size, no stretch, classic, accented my waist. Super classic and elegant. Great for a fall wedding.

links_reviews_title: Very nice material; flattering fit, nice material
links_reviews_text: Pros: Goes with a lot of different shoes and jewelry. The color is a really nice dark navy. Cons: If you are pear shaped it may fit pretty tight in the hips (I made it work but it definitely was quite tight- maybe size up?)

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this dress!
