links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove, like it was made for me! I am typically a 2 and sized up to a 4, it is snug but I was able to sit and eat and dance without any worries! It is an extremely classy dress and I got compliments all night. My favorite rental I've done for sure!!!

The reviews on sizing for this dress are mixed, but for me it ran small. If you have a butt or hips, I would recommend sizing up. I am usually a 4 and wore the 8. Both the 6 and the 8 fit when I tried them on, but the 6 was very restrictive through my butt and hips. The 8 gave me a little more breathing room to walk and dance. Other than sizing, the cut is conservative but the slit and ruffle give it some sexiness. It looks great dressed up with some statement jewelry and shoes!

Ok this was my favorite rental so far! I was a little worried since some of the reviews said it ran small, but it worked out perfectly for me! I felt it was pretty true to size, but the top has no stretch, so if you have a larger bust, you may have issues. I’m a D cup and while the top was snug, it worked out fine. If you’re larger than that, it may not work for you. I got SO many compliments on this dress! It is incredibly flattering, and the material is thick enough to help hide any imperfections. It’s a beautiful dark navy color. It was perfect for a formal wedding! I’m actually sad to return this one, I wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: Formal dress with a hint of sexy bc of the slit and the fit. Loved it and got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fitted. Didn’t even try on the 6 bc I liked how the 4 fit so I can’t speak to how they compare.

links_reviews_title: Early fall wedding dress with class and slight flare
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for an early fall wedding. Though I typically wear a size four, I was glad I ordered up for my back-up size, and ended up going with the size six. Though the six fit perfectly to my body shape, I discovered that the seem was ripped where the dress ruffles at the legs and I had to put my wrap across my thighs whenever I sat. You also cannot wear a regular bra with this dress due to how it cuts inward at the top, but I wore adhesive cups and that worked perfectly. Despite the tear, the dress still fit well and I received many compliments on how it flattered my shape.

I LOVED this dress! I felt so confident and beautiful in it. I rented this for a military ball that was cocktail attire. This dress runs small though. I ordered a 4 and 6, and definitely had to wear the 6. An 8 may have even worked better. I was afraid of the length, but when I put on heels with it, it was perfect! Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress is awesome. It hugs all the curves just right. I got loads of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It runs true to size, but there is no stretch. The zipper is a little tight, but past the waist it zips right up. I was comfortable and felt great all night.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and likes on social media :)
links_reviews_text: It is form fitting and runs a bit small. I was able to squeeze into a 6 (my street size), for reference I am 5'6" and 145 lbs somewhat athletic build, but not because it stretches because it only stretches a little bit. I got so many compliments and likes, which made me feel great. Would be awesome to wear to a class reunion to strut your stuff. If I hadn't been seen by everyone in this dress, I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: LOVED! Nice thick fabric- very comfortable
links_reviews_text: I typically can wear 0 or 2, however I wore the 4 and it was pretty snug! Very comfortable to dance in, I didn't wear a bra bc it was so tight it held everything in place. Would recommend this dress for sure! I'm shorter and the length was great!

Absolutely loved my dress. True to size and I got so many compliments on it. I already rented again for my next occasion :) you will not regret it. My sister in this picture is wearing a RTW dress as well!!

This was my first rent the runway and I am in love! I ordered the 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 6 for a little extra breathing room (size up!) It runs small, but the material is thick so it smoothed out everything (I didn't even have to wear a bra). It was hard to move much and walking up stairs took a little extra time with snug silhouette but overall it was a perfect rental. I felt so elegant, loved!

Rented for a friend's wedding- was a bit tight but material stretched. Made it a little tough to dance freely, but overall felt good about the dress while remaining comfortable all night! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a meet and greet with a NG photographer. It was perfect combo of casual and dressy
links_reviews_text: Fit was a smidge tight for a 12. I usually wear a 10-12. But I could still sit and move comfortably.

I rented this dress for a wedding in Southern California. The material is thick so I was hot in the 80 degree weather. I got a lot of compliments on the dress, the only reason I rated it 4 out of 5 was because the material is really unforgiving on my midsection. I'm 5'2" about 115 lbs and I wore the 4.

I got a lot of compliments on this dress for a summer wedding. It was 80 degrees outside and I wasn't too warm. It's form fitting and thick so no underwear or bra lines show. A little hard to dance in but it's long enough to hike up a bit to get down on the dance floor.

links_reviews_title: Lovely party at a gorgeous state park outdoor venue.
links_reviews_text: True to size, fit me a bit tight in the hips, but just enough stretch to make sitting no problem. Very sleek and flattering. I got ‘hey Jackie-O,’ which I’ll take any day!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress!! Second time renting it!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an event last spring and I loved it so much that I decided to rent it again! I failed to remember how small it runs. I typically wear a 4 and ended up squeezing into the 6 because I forgot that I should have actually ordered the 8. I absolutely love the neckline on the dress, the overall fit is form fitting but classic. I am 5'3 130 lbs and the length hit me mid shin. I ended up going bra-less with it since I am small chested. Fabric is also nice and thick . Would rent it a third time!
Comfortable, fun dress. The color is classic. Easy to dance in

The thick fabric and lining skims the body but stretches to move with you and doesn't feel tight. Hides imperfections. I wore a racerback bra, fabric would allow you to go without. Left knee is exposed when walking/sitting, so it doesn't feel as "long" on. Was perfect length to cover some bruises and veins! :) Rented for an out of town wedding and would def rent again for a local event.

I wore this dress for a black tie optional fundraiser in late March and an indoor wedding in mid-May. It was perfect for both. I fell in love with the dress - it's elegant and accentuates your shape, and is tight without being inappropriate. I felt quite comfortable around my boyfriend's family and felt very classy. You'll want to wear a strapless bra or one that connects in the back, and make sure to order up since it runs small - I'm typically a zero and the 2 was still snug, but the right choice.
Fits like a glove! I'm a curvy 4/6 and glad I ordered a 6 because I think I would have been able to sit in a 4. Was paid LOTS of compliments in this dress. LOVED it

links_reviews_title: I felt really pretty in this dress at the work event while still being appropriate.
links_reviews_text: I have fuller hips so the ruffle did a great job hiding that! Be aware that the midsection and bust area are a little small. I could wear a bra but some might not be able to. Got lots of compliments!

Worn for my sister's casual wedding in August. Runs small and fabric is thick so it covers up all the right places. The belly in my dress was much looser than the rest of the dress (maybe worn by a pregnant woman before?) but I loved the neckline and length. The ruffle slit was flattering to my straight hips.

I am at a weird weight right now so I’m inbetween sizes 4-6. Some 4s are tight some 6s are just right but with this dress the 4 fit like a glove. Elegant dress length was perfect for a black tie wedding. Overall loved this dress and I would definitely wear it again in the future. So comfy!!!!
Ended up wearing the size zero so I could go without a bra, but it was quite tight. The slit made it work for someone as short as I am. Material is thick and lies nicely.

links_reviews_title: It was cute but very curve hugging
links_reviews_text: I have a troubled mid section so this dress was lovely but made me self conscious
I usually wear an xs/s or 2/4 and I went with the four because the dress ran somewhat small. Overall its flattering and comfortable and I got a lot of compliments!
Fit perfectly!

I absolutely loved this dress! I wore this to a wedding and received many compliments. This ran true to size, form fitting but not too tight. I loved the asymmetrical hemline, the deep V, and color. I'll rent this again!

I've rented E and J several times now and this one didn't disappoint. Felt sexy and classy. Many compliments. Form fitting, v neck cut flattering and tasteful. Is short, but wasn't too short for a family wedding. I'd rent again, wish there were more colors!

It was definitely on the sexier side for what I typically pick out, but the Asymmetrical hemline made it still wedding appropriate-- Fabric is super thick and high quality so although its a tight dress it is very forgiving! I normally wear a 2-4, and ended up with the 6-- it was a perfect fit. Really loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: I've never felt so pretty before!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a wedding in Las Vegas. I wanted something sexy and classy and this fit the bill! The dress was stunning! I felt like a million bucks in it and I would have bought it if I could have! It was so comfortable and hugged me in all the right places, although I did wear spanx under it. I ended up wearing the 10 because it was a bit tighter on my chest and I felt more comfortable. Otherwise, the body of the 10 vs 12 wasn't all that different. Can't say it enough- LOVED THIS DRESS!!!!
Fit perfectly. Showed a little more cleavage than I had anticipated, but not bad. The dress bunches when you sit down so every time I stood I had to straighten the dress.

This dress fit like a glove! I didn't need a bra, it held everything in place. The material is thick so it holds you in, but also stretchy enough for dancing all night. I will absolutely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: So flattering & timeless I had to own it!
links_reviews_text: This was my boyfriend's favorite dress that I've ever worn. It's very well-made: the fabric is sturdy enough to hold you in with some stretch for comfort, it's sleek and simple so that it's not like the dress is wearing you, but the asymmetrical hem adds just enough interest. I'm fairly busty (I think a 32D but don't quote me on that lol) with some tummy and hips and a 6 fit like a glove. I wore a bra but you may be able to get away without one. Thanks to the dark color and thickness of the fabric, my tummy wasn't super noticeable. I loved this dress so much I stalked it on eBay and now I own it :)

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and comfortable dress for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I wore it to a wedding in mid-December and got a ton of compliments. The fabric is heavy enough to be worn comfortably in the winter with a peacoat or shaw. The material is stretchy enough that it is forgiving. I usually wear a size 2 and needed to size up to a 4. I could have gotten away with the 2 but wanted to be comfortable. I would highly recommend this dress and would definitely wear it again!

I wore this in Vegas. It was a cute dress. I'm writing this months after wearing it and it doesn't really stand out. But it was comfortable and the cut was interesting. Great cleavage and the plunge wasn't too intense.
Fit great! Holds you in. I ordered the 4 and the 6. Size 4 got but the 6 was more comfortable. Loved this dress!

First, I tried on the 6 and it fit very nicely and comfortably, but I've recently lost a lot of weight, so for the hell of it I tried on the 4- and it fit (photo)! Was noticably tighter, but still looked and felt great! My measurements are approx: 36-26-36

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend lost his mind he loved this so much
links_reviews_text: V flattering. I was worried about tummy because I do NOT look like the model lol. Love the asymmetrical cut, loved how low it was. I have no boobs so this might have been a problem if I did. True to size though I probably could have gone smaller if I was more confident. Also if you're at all taller than normal or wear heels -- it's short yo. But amazing.

To this day I still haven't worn a dress that has received as many compliments as this did. It was well made, loved the asymmetrical cut at the bottom, and accentuated the right areas. I liked the fit, but it was definitely on the tighter size, so I suggest sizing up if you prefer a looser fit. I got both a 4 and a 6 as my back up size. Went with the 4, but it was nice to compare the two. Will definitely rent again and even have considered buying.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this dress! The materials was thick and fit like a glove. I am short and was worried about the length but it hit in the perfect spot and the angels hem was a nice detail. Definitely recommend!

The dress was amazing and received compliments all night! I will say it runs a bit small and I had to use the included size up. It really works out great! Would definitely recommend for cocktail attire.
Perfect mix of sexy and classy for Vegas. Accented all of my assets, cleavage especially.
Love the dress, true to size, fitted.

If you want to feel good in a dress, rent this! The material and fit is so flattering and hugs your curves. 4 months after having a baby this dress made me feel as confident as before!! Definitely recommend.
Loved this dress! It was tight and fit in all the right places. The side made it not as basic and it was a good length and good fabric. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Second time wearing to a wedding!!
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress twice!! The first time the 4 wasn't available so bought spanx and squeezed myself into the 2. The second time got the 4 and was able to breathe :) I didn't wear a bra but am really flat chested so don't need anything. Very fitting so sexy but not too much.

I originally selected a white size 10 dress that was baggy on me. When I tried this one on, I knew it was the one! It fit me true to size...only a little hard to zip up. I went braless but the dress held me in. I got compliments all night. I probably should have opted for the 10 and then worn a bra but it was plenty flexible all night and I never fell out!
I have a bad habit of only renting Elizabeth and James dresses. They are high quality, classic, and beautiful! This one is no different. It does run small, so size up.
Dress was perfect! Looks great on and runs small. Recommend go a size up. I normally wear a 6 and I wore the 8. Fit perfectly. Love the color and style of dress.
I love a well made dress with great thick fabric. And this dress checked those boxes.

Elizabeth and James continues to be my go to designer. I always order a size 6 and 8 and one always fits like a glove depending on the fabric. This one was more of a stretchy fabric so I went with the six. Was SO comfortable, danced he night away. So sexy....the Boyfriend loved it!

links_reviews_title: I used this dress as a wedding guest and it was perfection!
links_reviews_text: It fit like a GLOVE! I had to use the sticky bra because it was too low cut in the front for a regular bra. Regardless, I loved this dress. I'm 5'0", ~123lbs and received many compliments. It hit right above my knee despite not being able to see it in the image but it hugged every curve and lasted throughout a whole night of dancing. I would wear it to the next wedding I'm going to if only it wasn't the same family!
This dress was very classy. It also was pretty tight and tended to ride up a little when walking or dancing. But it still looked beautiful. I didn't have to wear a bra which was nice as well.
Beautiful, elegant dress; received many compliments. I'm 5'3, 118 lbs. Highly recommend. Wore to an evening birthday party. Runs a bit small, size up.

I'm 5'2" and 117 pounds, I have a hard time finding dresses that fit because I'm so petite and I carry most of my weight in my bottom half (butt and thighs). This dress fit amazingly! A lot of dresses are baggy around my shoulders (I'm a 32B) and this one was only slightly, in the picture I didn't wear one but for the wedding I wore a push up bra to fill out the top of the dress more and then it fit perfectly! I got so many compliments! It's not too long on me either which was great.
No give in the fabric, a little tight for a six but looked and felt great!
Such a pretty fit. The v neck was a little deeper than anticipated. I didnt mind, but for any one who does. It fit like a glove. So so so pretty. 10/10

links_reviews_title: Great color and arrived on time
links_reviews_text: Really pretty dress but runs very small. I ended up going with my backup dress and could have gone up one more size to a 6

links_reviews_title: Shows off the right amount of your upper and lower assets!
links_reviews_text: Really loved this dress. The fabric was great, thick enough to hide what you wanted it to, but not too hot for a hot weather wedding. Usually a 6 and the 8 fit perfectly! Didn't need to wear a bra it was tight enough up top to keep everything in place. Would definitely rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress. As a teenager with a large chest I am very nervous about cleavage but this dress allowed me to show it off in a comfortable way! All of my friends loved it and I received so many compliments. I did size up based off of previous reviews which was helpful. I was also able to wear a bra with the dress which was nice. The only issue I had was that it was ridding up while I was dancing but it was not a big issue. I really wish I could buy this dress!
This dress fit me like a glove and was perfect for a night out in Vegas!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit wonderfully. I would rent it again
links_reviews_text: I chose not to wear a bra with it to make it less booby and more appropriate.
I wore this for my office christmas party snd it was a hit. Everyone complimented me all night!
Loved this dress! I wore it for NYE, and got tons of compliments on it! I will def rent this again
Originally got this as a back up but loved it too much not to wear it. It rides up a little bit but other than that it's perfect

Flattering to the waist and tummy. Beautiful skirt. I felt the top was slightly big but I still got lots of compliments on this dress from husband and coworkers. Can dress up or down and I wore this to work, out to dinner and on vacation in Mexico. I would rent this again!

This dress is so adorable, a classic style and very feminine & flattering. It did run large on me throughout. I ordered another Draper James dress the following week and got the 4 - it was perfect. I found this perfect for everyday use here in Florida.

links_reviews_title: This dress is made very well.
links_reviews_text: This dress is made very well. It runs a little right around the middle/belly. The straps are also a little long and can slip down sometimes.
The belt comes loose when you breathe but I liked the design on the bottom and it hit a nice length

This is such a cute and comfortable dress. I love the way the belt accentuates the waist. I would say if you are between sizes you could likely go with your smaller size. I am between a 6 and 8 and should have ordered the 6. The belt helped make it look less baggy. The skirt is super full and very fun! Love the colors!
Very sweet dress. Surprisingly unforgiving, though. The fabric is lighter than it looks so it shows any weight underneath.
I am a little short and the straps did fall off my shoulder.

Fit: I picked up a 4 in store since they didn't have a 2 available-- it actually fit great, but even in a size up the belt kept coming loose (there is no pin/prong on the buckle so maybe it has nothing to do with size). Overall it probably runs small. Fabric: Great summer dress. Just enough breathability and softness while still sporting a frilly design at the bottom. Comfy lining too. Style: Very casual but cute look. Great as an everyday piece; just don't get it for an occasion where you want to stand out. Overall great dress, taking off 1 star due to belt issue and too-casual look.

This dress was adorable- nice fit through the waist, and the flouncy skirt made it sweet and special. I wore it at a casual work event and on an unseasonably hot day to work with flat white sandals. It's a little bare on top, so wouldn't recommend for a more formal office.

links_reviews_title: Good for a summer date night.
links_reviews_text: If you are at all long-waisted or tall, the belt is too high. It's a cute dress though.

This dress fit nicely and it's well constructed. I wore it on a coastal vacation. It was a perfect daytime dress, nice enough to wear at a fancy seaside restaurant but also relaxed enough to walk along the coast.
Draper James usually runs big so I got a 2 instead of a 4. Could not zip! Sonruns true to size. Also the drop waist just not flattering on petite frame.
Fabric is thicker than it looks, almost like a neoprene. Off the shoulder adds interest. No compliments but easy to wear.
This fabric is amazing!! I love the asymmetrical flare of the dress. A must rent!
Made of scuba fabric so thick and flows over your body rather than highlighting bumps. Very comfortable.

Fabric isn't very high quality. It's thick but exactly like a 1970s polyester. Very hot and unforgiving IMHO. If you wanted a lot of shapewear or had a tight fit body, would be nice for a summer wedding or event.

Great cut! And off the shoulder that actually stays off the shoulder! Fabric is stretchy and beautiful pattered. The only down side was from the back because it was a high low, you could see the back of the fabric and it looked a bit cheesy, and some of the pattern didn't line up exactly ( these are things i look for on high priced designer items). Even so, It's a great dress and I would rent again!

Strapless or one strap bra necessary. Fabric is a medium weight "scuba" type - really great, doesn't wrinkle. It does run a little big around the middle and slim around the chest. I wear typically a 6 and the 38R was a little large. The shoulder definitely does not drop down as low as the model shows.
I love this dress so much!! I felt great in it all night! I chose to wear it with a strapless bra because you can see the straps through the lace with a standard bra.
Got so many compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, good quality, great shape.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and the quality was great. The shape is very flattering. If I were to order again I would probably size up to a 10 to be more comfortable as the 8 was very fitted. As a short person I liked the shorter length.
I received so many compliments on my dress!!
Wore this out Dancing/ was a great fit/style. Fairly short but I'm tall so should work well for most.... will def rent again
i rented the size 10, but it was a little too big for me and i probably should've gone with my typical size 8 instead. I wore a different dress to the wedding I attended

Dress was very comfortable, could easily wear a strapless bra with it & was in excellent/almost new condition. I have a long torso so the color change hit me in a odd spot but otherwise a good fit. I'm normally a 4 or a 6 and wore the 6. Length was nice as it wasn't too short or too long my 5'5 frame.

I wore this for my 40th birthday dinner followed by dancing. It fit like a glove. I wore it with tights and high-healed booties because it was a cold night. It also helped to dress it down a little. This could be dressed up with fancier heels and more jewelry or an up-do. I got so many compliments and I found it very flattering. Great rental!

Great rental! Perfect for our anniversary date. Was a bit snug in the waist/butt so I wore backup size bigger for more comfort. The blue is not as vibrant as in pictures of model (almost can't see 2 colors in dim lighting) but still great color blocking! The dress is short but I expected that and didn't mind. Very flattering fit! Material is nice and thick. Would rent again!

I didn't end up wearing this because it was a bit too conservative for the New Years vibe I was hoping for. But it is a really pretty dress that fits well, and is true to size. Can't wait to rent it for a more family friendly event in the future :)

Wore this to a work holiday party and it was the perfect combination of figure flattering without being too sexy. The lace looked elegant and I like how the color of the top half mixed things up from the usual black dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I sized up from my normal size and it fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments. Simple yet classy and would definitely rent again!

I'm still dealing with a little extra post partum weight so I wasn't sure this dress would work. The material is nice and thick and the size 2 was forgiving enough for me to get away with it. The dress was super comfortable until we ate dinner and then I wished for more space in the waist, but that's my only complaint. Loved the dress and would wear it again. Colors are so sophisticated.

links_reviews_title: Fit great, looks great, would definitely rent this one again!
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable while dancing, fit really well. The lace is gorgeous on. Highly recommend this one. I'm 5'2" and 130 lbs and the size 6 fit perfectly.
Great length, comfortable

I typically wear a size 8, but ordered a 10 as my backup size since some reviews said it runs small. I found it ran true to size and wore the 8, it fit perfectly! I have a larger bust and wider hips and did not find it constricting at all, the lace detailing was beautiful and a bonus was that I was able to wear a normal bra without the straps showing through the lace! 10/10 recommend!

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress and even better in person. It was true to size. I am 5'6" and 145 pounds. I wear a DD. I had plenty of room. It does not have a lot of give. Well made.

Great dress for the fall with lace and two tone navy on black. The color difference between the navy and black was stark enough to see a difference but didn't clash. The lace overlay was beautiful. I don't have a waist and the two-tone helped hide that and provide the allure I was a little taller and had a distinct waist!
This dress is flattering and comfortable. Runs a bit small, one size up from my normal size fit perfect. Great length-would rent again.
This dress was absolutely perfect for an August wedding! The colors were subtle and the lace was nice! I loved the color blocking and little sexy peek a boo with the lace! The fit was right on!
Love the navy and black lace together. Fits well everywhere and flattering. Just perfect length for me in my office but couldn't imagine having longer legs in it.

links_reviews_title: This was for a wedding! Simple and classic.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4 and 125 lbs. Dress was tight across the chest but made it work. Def suggest sizing up. Typically I wear a size 2 or 4 but ended up with a 6. Dress is also short, no crazy dance moves or bending over ha!
Love this little dress. It's perfect for a bachelorette party.
The dress was beautiful. It fit true to size. It was comfy with elegant lace detail. I wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress! Didn't want to give it back!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a wedding and I absolutely loved it. I felt so comfortable the whole night and was able to dance the night away. When I was sitting it would be a little short but otherwise it was great. I wore a strapless bra and because the lace sort of hid any imperfections and I didn't need to wear any spanx. Highly recommend this dress and hope to wear again soon!
Perfect dress! Very flattering, made me look very thin! The fabric is perfect and great quality. I'd rent this over and over

This dress was beautiful and perfect for a wedding. Fits true to size however if you have bigger hips sizing up might be best because the material have no give in that area. Extremely comfortable as well. I loved the color contrast and received so many compliments.

This dress was absolutely adorable, I loved it! I sized up due to the fact that I have large hips and the size 8 was a little tighter and shorter than I liked. I loved everything about this dress though, it was very slimming and cute, I'd definitely rent this one again!

I've worn this dress to a March wedding with tights, and to a very humid September wedding. Worked out great both times! It rubbed a bit in the armpit section after a night of dancing, but otherwise very comfortable. I didn't need to wear a bra (36D).

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments about how hot this dress was!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it to a graduation. It was just the right length. Love the shear lace at the top and the extra lace detail that went around the neck. It was a perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: Confidence and fun all in one dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely adored this dress. My husband's work was having a huge anniversary party and I decided to try RTR for the first time. This dress did not disappoint and now I am hooked. This dress was exactly what I was looking for- it was structured without being stiff, shorter without feeling like I couldn't bent over, high neckline without being stuffy, and you can't go wrong with lace! I do wish I had more of a bust to fill in the top, because it was a little room up top. I would rent this again.
Great dress! Fit was snug on top and looser on bottom than I usually like. I ordered both the 2 and 4 and couldn't tell much difference between the two except length and hip room.
Great dress! Very fun and classy! I tylically wear an 8. Ordered 8 and 6 aa backup and should have done 8 & 10. Made the 8 work but could have gone up a size!

This was my first RTR rental, for a work celebratory dinner. I had it shipped to our hotel out of state (a huge Disney World property) and I was a little nervous about the dresses making it there but the package beat me to the hotel and was easy to pick up. I was glad to have both a backup size and backup dress. I felt the dress was true to size, i typically wear about a 2 and the 2 fit me great. I am only 5'4" so the dress wasnt wuite as short on me as it is on the model. I worr a strapless bra because of the lacey top, but probably could have gotten away with a regular nude bra. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for Work Holiday Party!!
links_reviews_text: This was my 2nd RTR experience and once again i loved the dress I rented! I wore this dress to my work holiday party and it was great. I read the previous reviews and how everyone ended up wearing the next size up and thank god I did. The band where the top meets the bottom was tighter than expected and I went with the next size up. You couldn't even tell, it wasn't baggy anywhere, the only thing was that the shoulders were a little higher but this only happened when sitting down. Dress was so comfy all night and I would absolutely rent again!
Loved the dress! I ordered 3 others from the site and none worked. Either didn't fit or didn't look good on me. I went into the store and found this gem!

I loved this dress. Great fit and detail at the neck. I liked the length but it was on the shorter side--but I am only 5'2" so something to keep in mind if you are taller. I would definitely rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: Works well for a tiny baby bump
links_reviews_text: I am 14 weeks pregnant and just beginning to show. I had a hard time choosing a dress to wear, but I'm so glad I picked this one. I ordered the 4 (my regular size) and the 6 because I have gained some weight in my pregnancy so far. I could have worn either one, but the 4 was a little more snug and was a little more flattering. I am larger chested, but I wore the 4 without a bra and I felt really secure because the dress is structured and the lace is thick. Would definitely recommend!
Highly recommend this dress for a wedding! some things to keep in mind when ordering: a bit snug on the chest (I am a 36DD) and pretty short. It was a beautiful dress though and I loved wearing it!

This dress looked super cute and was totally comfortable and form-flattering. It tucks in at the waist and hugs the hips but not too tight. I even was able to wear a regular bra with straps and you couldn't tell (usually an issue with lace top dresses). The color block makes it stand out in a sea of black dresses, but it isn't too showy. I got tons of compliments at my work party and was able to dance the night away without any issues! Highly recommend, would definitely rent again.

I rented this as a backup style and ended up loving it more than the dress I intended to wear. The dress is much more elegant and formal in person than it looks on the model in the photos. It's extremely comfortable, has pockets (!), and you can actually wear a bra. I wore a flesh colored bra and it was completely invisible with the sheer lace back of this dress. Got tons of compliments. I'm quite short and the length was perfect even though it wasn't a petite size.

The back of this dress is beautiful! Black/see thru floral designs- therefore I work a backless strapless bra. Loved the length, wore with 2.5" heels but also was not tripping when I took my shoes off. Oh, and it has pockets!!! Highly recommend.

I love maxi dresses but RTR dresses are typically too long on me. The high low cut is the perfect length and the lace detail on this dress is amazing! Best part: no bra needed! So flattering and pockets are the best. Highly recommend!

Rented for a wedding and received compliments all night long. Worn for a family affair, was a little concerned about the low cut in the front but it was tasteful. The detailing and appliqués added a beautiful, unique touch. I never wanted to take it off! Fits true to size. I wore a Nu Bra to give some lift but could have easily gone without.
I wore this for a semi formal gala. It was cute and fun! Fit was great, maybe a little right in the waist but accommodated by ample bust.

I rented this for a black tie optional early fall wedding. Fit was great-- wore without a bra and it was comfortable and supportive. Dress was perfect with 5" wedges and with the tennis shoes I changed into for dancing (I'm 5'3" on a good day). I received compliments all night. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Really nice for a formal black-tie optional wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am VERY short and the high low worked well for me as it just skimmed the ground. Additionally, the fabric is quite sturdy so it traveled well (via car) and needed no steaming or anything, which was a bonus!
Fit well in torso

This dress was comfortable and a show stopper. The front is low cut, and the back is sheer, but you can totally wear a low cut bra and it won't be noticeable. Got so many compliments! A great long gown for a shorter person.

links_reviews_title: Good type of drama for a wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a back up to a back up due to an issue with logistics and availability of my previously scheduled dresses. I am SO GLAD I ended up with this one. One of my fave dresses ever.

My #1 priority when picking a dress to wear for a wedding? I need something that I can dance in! This dress checked that box. I didn't feel restricted at all the entire night, and I loved the colors. The sexy see-through back was a nice touch that made the dress even more interesting! I definitely recommend this one.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for black time optimal wedding
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress and got many compliments. Perfect for someone petite and no need to worry about wearing a bra

I rented a few dresses through unlimited to choose from for the event but this one really stood out. And it is so comfortable. The dress looks amazing on, but you can see that from the other review pictures. So I decided to do a close up of the fabric, appliqués, and bottom lace. I was very surprised by the quality of the fabric. For some reason I was expecting it all to be lighter and not of this quality. I didn't notice the appliqués until I received the dress but I really like them. The fabric has a sheen and is slightly ribbed. The pattern evokes flowers, but is also kind of abstract. The shape was great to define my waist. I wore a sticky bra but could have gotten away with no bra. This is a dress to wear if you want to be noticed and a no brainer pick.

links_reviews_title: Went with my backup but loved this dress
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and the high low was gorgeous. The dress definitely folds strangely in the front so if you look at just the right angle it makes your stomach look big. The colors and pockets were perfect. The only reason I chose a different dress is because I was traveling and the puffyness of the skirt made it tricky to pack.
Perfect fit. On my petite frame longer than tea length.
well constructed dress with beautiful lace and details. loved that it had pockets. the lace back and lace trim hem was so elegant and slightly sexy. im normally size 4 but size 2 was perfect

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print, gorgeous high low hem and super comfortable and POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a black tie wedding in December, paired it with a fur shawl and it was the perfect outfit. The dress was comfortable, fit great, was able to wear a black bra and it blended in with the lace back. I rented both 0R and 2R and went with the larger size for the waist fit. The pockets were a bonus where I can put my phone in it and dance without having to hold it. Truly amazing and I felt special with its high low hem pretty hem and fun to twirl and dance in! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but too much flare in the hips for me
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty and obviously well made. The material is heavy which is nice. I love the detail and colors in this dress but I just didn't think it was super flattering for my figure. I'll be returning it.

links_reviews_title: Love, love, LOVE! Perfect fit and flare shape, just the right amount of fabulous and classy.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely adored this dress! I needed a fancy gown for a gala with the dress code of "fabulous cocktail" and this dress totally delivered. I typically wear a size 4, occasionally size 2 in dresses, and I ended up going with the 2R, which was perfect. It was tight in the waist (which I wanted) and had a beautiful poofed bottom, which made it feel extra fancy. It was also fitted enough on top (I'm a 34b) that I didn't need a bra or tape (huge bonus). It was also very comfortable and has big pockets that fit my phone and lipstick. I got a ton of compliments, and this was a party where people REALLY dressed to impress. I honestly considered buying the dress because I loved it so much! RTR service was amazing as well. Great experience overall, I'm only sad I didn't take more photos in what we're now calling "the perfect dress"!
Wore 19 weeks pregnant ( ordered up two sizes) and good for a bump.

This dress is one of a kind. The cut is very classic and flattering; its waist will fall right at your smallest. The back detailing is just gorgeous! I was able to wear a nude colored bra, without it being too noticeable. And this dress has pockets!!!! It was dressy enough, without being too formal. The neckline doesn't show too much boob-age either. Super flattering, lovely, comfortable dress- with POCKETS! Did I mention the pockets??

This was a gown I rented in store in Chicago. When I put it on I immediately fell in love! I am usually a size 4 but am also very hourglass shape, so I have a smaller waist than bust and hips. With that being said, I was able to wear a size 2. It is a very well made dress with the most comfortable fabric, AND it has pockets! I had so many compliments and "wow's" when I walked past people in this gown. If you're looking for a stunner of a gown with a ton of personality, this is the one for you.

Rented this to wear to the AMAs and received tons of compliments on it! The waist is tight with no give and the back is a bit big and buckles a little but may fit better on someone with bigger boobs. Either way, it was comfortable because of the full skirt and even had pockets! The material is nice and heavy with pretty black embroidery so it was a little hot. Overall very happy with this dress and wish I had another occasion to wear it.

I wore this for my non-traditional wedding. The dress was so comfortable and extremely flattering! I wore a size smaller than normal but could have worn my regular size. I danced all night and didn’t think twice about my dress. So well made and lovely!

links_reviews_title: Fun, classy, beautiful, for black tie
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress. Was able to wear it without a bra (32B), it's poofy below the waste, so even if you have a small belly, it looks sexy. I was worried it would make me look huge, but not so. Tight on top, so it makes for a really beautiful silhouette.

I wore this gorgeous dress to a black tie wedding at a country club last weekend. The dress was beautiful and I received many compliments. I am petite and curvy and I found it to flatter my frame. Because I have a short torso I did notice it was a little loose around my shoulders but not enough for it to be a huge problem. Overall an excellent rental experience!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Tons of compliments and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a fall wedding. I had a baby a few months ago and I'm between sizes so I'm never sure what to order. This dress was the perfect fit for someone trying to hide a belly. I would highly recommend this dress to any post baby moms out there. It fit well around the waist and looked great!

I completely fell in love with this dress, ordered to wear to a work event with cocktail attire. It fit beautifully. The color, lace, and hemline all added up to something really beautiful. And it was a nice departure from my normal, black cocktail attire comfort zone. I'd definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: So pretty but couldn't zip it
links_reviews_text: More pops of light blue in person. Amazing dress, just could not get the zipper to go past my waist - my waist is 35.5. I'm going to loose more weight and rent this again !
Perfect dress for a Black Tie Optional wedding. Several compliments all evening. No need to wear a bra. Very coo black lacy pattern. Comfortable all evening.
Love the style and it has pockets!
Never can you go wrong with a style that has an A-line fit!

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and well-made! I felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black tie wedding. I wanted a long dress that would work for my 5'2" height with low heels (under 2 inches). This dress was perfect! My favorite detail was the lace back. The fabric is heavier and does not stretch, so I didn't wear a bra. It also does not wrinkle at all. One note: if you have a larger chest (bigger than a B/C cup), the top may be a bit snug as there is no stretch. I absolutely loved this dress and received many compliments.
Fit was good. Looked much better in person than in the pictures. You could wear a regular bra assuming that it was flesh toned or black as the back is sheer
The material is thick. The dress is forgiving and very comfortable!
Fit like a glove .. loved the pockets

I wore this to an annual fundraising gala for my work that had a floral theme this year. This dress was awesome and I got a lot of compliments! I am pear shaped so typically dresses that fit me up top are too snug around my hips. This dress has a nice full skirt, so it's great for accentuating your top half assets and hiding all the bottom half stuff. And because it fit so well, I was able to go braless - hooray! Also, the back of this dress is so pretty (although no one ever thinks to get a photo of that). And hello, pockets are always a huge bonus.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color & style! Perfect for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a wedding. While it wasn't my 1st choice dress, I was able to exchange for this dress. I have to say...it was a gorgeous dress! I received many compliments. Loved the hi-lo hem. The back had a beautiful design that was sheer, so you cannot wear a bra. The dress looked perfect and really, if you're on the smaller side, there's no need for a bra. Just beware - there is NO give in the fabric. The 4 fit me to a tee. The dress was in great condition!
Large full skirt with huge pockets. Very comfortable fit. Wore a backless bra but probably could have gone without.

The details are beautiful. The back makes it very sexy while the short front makes your eyes focus on the embroidery at the back of the dress. Did not give 5 stars because it rubbed a bit around the arm pits and while you cannot wear a bra my chest was not big enough to fill out the front. This made me have great posture all night long and having my hands in my pockets helped as well. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Just a really fun & flirty dress. I got lots of complements

links_reviews_text: I wore this for Thanksgiving and it was absolutely perfect with a pair of tights. I recommend sizing up for a larger chest so it doesn't pull!

Although it's a cute dress for everyday wear, there are two cons. The first is the lining underneath -- it's very short (barely covered my bottom) and very tight. The second is the button at the neck -- it was so hard to do/undo that it actually broke my gel nail.

links_reviews_title: Wow! Can I just say this dress was EVERYTHING! Perfect for my grad pics.
links_reviews_text: Flattering. Fit perfect in my bust and arms. Covered my mid section. Good movement in pictures. Very comfortable.
Wore it for a casual evening event. Flowy and fun.
Got so many compliments! The medium wasn't available so I got the large and just Tied it tight and it worked great. Very comfortable and cute.

I loved the fit of this dress. It was great for work since it had sleeves, but it has flowy fabric so it doesn't feel too heavy. I could see this being too short for taller girls. It has the ruffle in the back but I even felt a little self conscious walking up stairs. It was a little hard to lean down/pick anything up. Not a problem since I'm 5'2 but could be an issue for work if you're taller. Would definitely rent again!

I wore this dress to a Bat Mitzvah service followed by daytime party. The fabric light and comfortable for summertime. The attached skirt/lining is short and you have to take extra care to pull the lining down and straighten it out after using the restroom, but otherwise the dress was easy. I received lots of compliments! It also looks great in the photos.

I love this edgy dress by Rebecca Minkoff! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes, so you are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5’6”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. The dress is really cute and comfy. It's ideal for a casual or even semi-formal event paired with nice blocked heels or even a point toed pair. I'd recommend a solid colored bag to match!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, comfortable, true to size. Would definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, comfortable, true to size. Would definitely rent again.
It's a beautiful dress that helps hide some tummy challenges. Very comfortable you can dress it up with high heels or down with flats.

links_reviews_title: So cute but not for big booties
links_reviews_text: If you have a curvy lower body, you want to size up for this one. It fit perfectly in the top but it was super tight in the hips and booty.
The slip under didn't really match the rest of the dress - it barely fit over my hip and was barely past my butt. I'm only 5'2" - this is probably going to be very short for anyone else who's taller.
Nice dress. Runs large on top. I am 5'3", 112 lbs , 32B
I work in a casual office and loved wear this! For pretty well- I have a rather larger but so the lining underneath was pretty right. Super cute and pretty true to size
Light weight dress, flattering length and fit!

links_reviews_title: Not as pretty as I thought - not a fan of the color/fit.
links_reviews_text: I'm apple shaped and it made my chest look "wide" and was too short for the office (especially the back of the dress - felt like it was riding up all day.
Fit was great! I wore it to a wedding rehearsal dinner and it was perfect!
I ordered an XL, which is 8-10, and it was to big in the shoulders and I have broad shoulders. Length was good for being 5'2".
Runs small. Usually wear L but this was XXL and fit great.

I normally have to dress more conservative for work, but was good for a friday, easy to wear, very pretty on and so comfortable. I'm normally a size 8 which is an XL in this dress. If your small chested I would go a size down. Looks big when you get it but it's a wrap tie so you can adjust it. I wore with black boots, but can wear with shoe, flats. A good transistional peice for spring. Will rent again.

I usually wear a medium but rented the large because I wanted a looser fit for work and didn't want it to be too short. The top was blousy and too big in the shoulders but the skirt lining was so tight around my hips and riding up. Not the right fit for me. I'm proportionate but curvy and don't normally have that issue.
Loved this easy and adorable dress. Very flattering.
I enjoyed wearing this dress. It's a sheath dress with a faux wrap skirt that gives it some form. It definitely runs large.

I wore this to an engagement party and got a lot of compliments. The material makes it a little fancier than an every day dress. The only issue I had with it is that there was a lot of extra fabric at the top. I am not small chested and the extra fabric made me look even bigger. Wore a size S and I would say it is true to size.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress- so fall appropriate.
links_reviews_text: A little big- which worked well for thanksgiving.

links_reviews_title: Not flattering for me -- maybe needs younger vibe
links_reviews_text: I was not comfortable with neckline, length.
Great dress, nice material. However, it was not flattering to my figure.

The dress is fine, but nothing special. The slip is very short, and the actual wrap part of the dress is about 5-6 inches longer. I wish they were more similar in length, as the slip was little too short (if I raised my hands above my head it kind of got stuck above my butt), and the dress was a little too long. It's fairly flattering, but I didn't get any compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: I use it for every day!
links_reviews_text: It was very cute lots of compliments
It's a cute dress for transitioning from summer into fall. Liked the fit, comfortable and can dress it up or down.

links_reviews_title: Love the color, just too short for work!
links_reviews_text: I love that this is a faux-wrap dress, but the slip underneath was a little tight for comfort. The overall length provided includes the ruffle, which is very sheer. Overall I loved the style but it was just too short for work. Maybe later in the fall when I could wear tights underneath it would be more appropriate.
The upper torso fits well, but the inner lining made it extremely difficult to put on and walk around in. It was constantly catching on my skin because it was so much tighter than the outer layer.
A little confusing to figure out. Too short for my liking. Nice color and print though
The dress is a little big but the belt makes it look just right. Very comfortable and light, great Fall colors.

links_reviews_title: Always love Rebecca Minkoff!!! Color, cut, fit are exceptional
links_reviews_text: The dress fit as expected. The faux wrap gives it that extra something special - without the worry of a true wrap loosening or coming undone.
Cool fit cool dress

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to work and to spend some time with friends.
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress. It wasn't too long or too short - just the right length. It has some nice flair to it. I felt very confident and pretty in this dress. I highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Nice color & print. Slip it on & cinch the waist
links_reviews_text: I didn't realize I ordered an XL and should have gotten a L. Even though you can tie the waist, it didn't sit right on me in a a size too big. Cute print & easy for work. I was looking for something modest I wouldn't have to constantly 'fix' at work.

Did not end up wearing. The top portion (waist up) fit and the arms were roomy. However, the slip was very short (barely covering my butt) and fit very close to the hips. Might work better for shorter women but at 5'7 it was too short for work. Online it looked a few inches longer.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals yet!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on this dress! Subtly sexy but can be worn at conservative event. Fit perfectly and material flows beautifully. One of my favorite rents yet!

links_reviews_title: Flowy and fitted in the right places
links_reviews_text: This dress was so freeing and light that it made all wedding activities easy, from sitting to standing to dancing to playing cornhole. The waist hugged in to make it an overall flattering fit.
So comfortable in this dress all night! The high neck was not tight and it flowed in the breeze as you walked. The back does not zip up all the way so wearing a bra is tricky.

links_reviews_title: So beautiful and So comfortable for summer wedding
links_reviews_text: So light and comfortable without being see through! Back makes it difficult to wear a bra so petals would be best. Perfect length for my 5'5" with 2.5" heels. So many compliments!
It ran a tad larger on me however I have a small waist and the worlds smallest chest. I got so many compliments all night. I loved it :)

I loved this dress and received so many compliments! It was so flattering and the material was very comfortable for a late-summer wedding. The slit on the right side was pretty high on me, so I did have to be aware of showing too much leg when sitting. Overall it was a great rental and I would definitely rent this one again!
I absolutely loved the color and the layers to the dress. The back is completely open so you can't wear a typical bra. I got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: The compliments on the dress were endless!
links_reviews_text: Flowy, comfortable, dreamy color. I loved everything about this dress. It moved so wonderfully and was fun to dance in. Great fabric, the sides/arm holes were just the right size so as to not show too much side-boob. (Be sure to note that the backside is back-less, so you'll need a sticky bra. That was something I didn't notice in the photos ahead of time.) I would say this dress is true to size, though I am often between sizes and was glad I sized up to a large so that it wasn't too tight in the hips. For someone tall, though, I will say that without heels it is possible to trip as it will drag on the floor a bit. Nothing too dangerous though!
Loved the fit of this dress. It was float and comfortable for a hot summer wedding and got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my daughters purple spa birthday!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, Wonderful material and could work for any kind of event!

The color and fabric of this dress was lovely but the overall fit felt too fabricy and overwhelming on my frame. Wish the top had less ruffles. Runs pretty TTS, I'm usually a true 00 and the XSR fit while being a little loose in the waist.
The fit was close to true to size, possibly a little on the larger side in the chest and torso. Loves the color and ruffles are super on trend!

This is one of my favorite rentals! Beautiful color, easy to dance in, and made me feel really elegant. Perk: if you're small chested (like myself), you can get away with no bra (!!). I ordered the small and medium but wore the small.

This picture really doesn't do this dress justice. Hit my waist at exactly the right spot--the waistline is pretty adjustable and I appreciate that. I could dance and eat and felt beautiful the whole time. Great for an hourglass shape and for ladies with broad shoulders!

Wore this gown to an anniversary dinner. No issues with the zipper in the back. There is not a lot of give in the waist. The material is so light and elegant. Flows very well when walking. The slit on the right side goes up quite high when sitting. Would rent again!

Overall a size 6 can go small or medium. I felt more comfortable in the small because I am smaller chested and that fit me best up top. The medium just looked a little too loose to wear. It's beautiful, I got a ton of compliments all night. Would totally rent it again!

The fabric is silky soft and the dress is so comfortable flowy and feminine, without being too frilly! The waist cinches a little tight while sitting but otherwise it is sooooo comfortable. Millions of compliments at the springtime wedding I wore this to

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal spring wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is a beautiful color and it's so soft. My only complaint is that I have a larger rib cage, so it was a little tight around the bottom of my ribs. I got a ton of compliments in it and felt very comfortable minus the tight natural waste.

links_reviews_title: Didn't actually wear this since it was a backup, but I liked it!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress so didn't actually wear it, but it fit really well and was comfortable! Nice for a fancier occasion, but will require some steam ironing to get the wrinkles out.

The compliments did not stop all night with this dress! It is such a beautiful lilac color- perfect for spring and summer events! I ordered the M and L for backup, and both fit and looked good, but I ended up going with the M. Great dress for larger busts/ hour glass shapes!
Fun, flow-y, stunning color. Gorgeous material. Felt so beautiful in this dress! Had to wear a sticky bra which was a challenge dancing at a wedding but otherwise this dress was great.

links_reviews_title: This dress inspired *all* the hair flips.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun to wear. It was perfect for a spring wedding!

links_reviews_title: This lilac beauty was perfection for a beautiful destination wedding/vacation
links_reviews_text: The color and fit made this dress special. The ruffles are romantic and the cut of the skirt is super fun for dancing. I love it, everyone complimented me on it and now want to own it!

I really loved this dress for a day wedding I attended. The color is beautiful, fit was great- even for a short girl like me, and the fabric was really soft and glamorous. Received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I went to a wedding for two of my closest friends, it was really romantic!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. I'm a little flat chested so it was loose in that area, but other than that, the dress was absolutely perfect! I received MANY compliments! A friend of mine even said that she was going to borrow it one of these days... I told her I rented it of course lol. One friend said "you look like you're going to a ball, you're the belle of the ball!"

Perfect fit but be aware, it is snug around the stomach/ribs area when you zip it up and around your throat when you button the top button. Great length and flowy! I comfortably danced all night in it!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my sister's wedding in Las Vegas!
links_reviews_text: The color was exactly what I pictured! The waist was fitted but in a good way that left the dress still very comfortable and breathable. I thought it was a very flattering dress as well! The only issue I had was the bust area being too large. Other than that, it was amazing. I would have kept it if I could!

This was a replacement rental after my first order was going to be late. But I'm so glad I went with this dress instead of my original! It was so flattering, easy to wear and breastfeeding friendly! I had to go braless as the back is open. I have small breasts so the top is a bit big and I was afraid I might expose myself if I wasn't careful. Nothing a little tape can't fix (didn't have it at the time). I really wish I could have kept this dress, it was so beautiful!
Lovely dress for a petite gal like me. Although the dress was floor length for me, I still loved it. The only con is the saggy open back.

links_reviews_title: Soft, elegant dress for a semi-formal summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at the end of my 1st trimester. Usually a Size 2 in formal dresses, I ordered the Small-Reg and XSmall-Reg as a backup. I have a short torso, so sometimes the smaller size is better. However, for this dress the waist is very snug. The small was loose enough to sit higher on my waist and make room for my growing belly.

I was a little iffy about the dress originally since the top part was a little baggy but it ended up being a hit. The dress was crazy comfortable and fun to dance in. The lavender color was really pretty and photographed well. Love love love this dress!

links_reviews_title: One of my absolute favorite rentals!
links_reviews_text: I fell in LOVE with this dress! I wore this for a September beach wedding and the fit, color and weight was perfect. I'm normally a 2/4 and ordered the XS and S based on other reviews. I tried on the XS first and it fit perfect. I have a small chest and wide hips and it hung perfectly. If someone had a larger chest I could see that the top may have been too tight. I wore a sticky bra for the open back but could have gone braless as the dress isn't sheer. The band under the boobs is a little tight/doesn't give so if you have a wider chest/rib area you may need the next size up. Received compliments all night and wish I could keep this one forever!

Wore this for an August wedding and it was beautiful. I was really nervous about renting a dress I couldn't try on but it fit and looked great on me. The material was light and flowy. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress, but Better if You're Taller than 5' 6"
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a charity event my husband and I attend every year. It was a beautiful dress, but the top was way too big. I am fairly small chested, so if you are bigger on top that may help. I did read other reviews about the open back, and wound up buying a sticky bra to wear with it, which worked well. Whereas the dress is big on top, it is fitted in the mid-section, so I don't think I could have gone down a size. I also think this dress works a lot better if you are on the tall side. I'm only 5' 6", and without heels, the bottom of this dress brushed the floor. With heels, it was still almost floor length. I would have preferred it the length shown on the model in the picture. It was a fun, different dress, though, and I would rent again if I could figure out how to make the top a little more fitted.

This dress was gorgeous! I got compliments all night long. I would have preferred the small but xs was only available and the waist was a bit snug. The color is gorgeous. Rent this dress- you will not be disappointed!
One of my favorite rentals! So flattering and comfortable. No bra necessary.

This dress is incredibly flattering and comfortable! The waist band is a bit tight but I have a large ribcage...zipped fine and fit great regardless. Absolutely loved this dress and was sad to return it.

Talk about effortlessness! Put this baby on and you'll feel fantastic! I was thinking of wearing the small but the waist does not give, so I decided to wear a medium so I'd have a little extra room for yummy food and drinks. I didn't wear a bra or girdle with this dress so I was very happy to say the least. I received tons of compliments and had a great time dancing at the reception. I would recommend this dress over and over again!!

links_reviews_title: Flowy and fun to dance in
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and super comfortable to wear, once it was on stayed in place and never had to finagle with any zippers or buttons! Down side, while the fabric is comfortable it is very unforgiving....ANY type of underwear you could see. I am normally a medium or large, ended up wearing the medium since I am smaller chested and it is very lose up top.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: It was perfect for an August wedding. The materials were light but it wrinkles very easily. The back is open as well so wearing a full bra is not possible. Great dress for a summer wedding!

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress! Amazing color! I wore this for a Mardi Gras ball and got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2-4 and the 4 petite fit perfect (the length was perfect even with 4 inch heels). It was a bit big in the bust (most things are on me I’m a 34b), but a strapless bra took care of that. I didn’t have any trouble dancing, sitting, or going to the bathroom in it, despite it being a fitted dress. It’s also very flattering for a form-fitting dress. I did steam it a couple of hours before I wore it, and it looked awesome. I very much recommend this dress!
super flattering dress that accentuates your curves in a good way!!

There is a giant brassy zipper on the side which isn't visible in the photos. The zipper was stuck sideways, was obvious in photos taken of me in the dress. My favorite part was the giant wire that was stuck in my ribs all night, very uncomfortable. The dress itself was beautiful and I received lots of compliments but the particular dress I received needs to be retired...it was shabby.
My daughter wore this for her senior homecoming court and it was a huge hit!!! Compliments all night!!

I am about 5’5”, 137lbs, athletic build. I wore 3” heals with a size 8 regular dress and it worked well. Taller shoes can work too. I typically wear a size 4 or 6 but this dress just runs small and the 8 was snug and fit great!!

With 3 inch heels this dress brushed the floor perfectly. Beautiful rich color. A little difficult to zip up, but once zipper was up it fit great in the bust and waist. Very elegant and eye-catching! So pleased.

Beautiful dress! The draping and mermaid style make it very flattering. It was perfect for a formal gala. A little long (expected with this mermaid style), so be sure to get a petite size if you're short like me.

Color is incredible and fit was perfect for me. No bra needed. Would not work well for a larger bust. Dress was a stand out in a sea of black as my gala. I was an honored guest and on stage and it looked wonderful. Photographed well.
This dress is a gorgeous amethyst color. A real showstopper at a formal event. I'd rent it twice, but everyone will recognize it!
The dress was super comfy even tho it had no give. It was a bit big in the chest and waist, but I couldn't get the next size down over my ribs! Loved this dress.
So beautiful..... so many compliments

Loved this dress. True, no stretch. I read the reviews and was thankful that the 6 fit. I'm a mom, wear my weight in the middle, 5'3"+, 125 and 34dd. The fit was snug, but secure. I wore a corset bra underneath and a 3" heel and danced all night. Loved the color, shape, style.
This dress is made for a slim build.

The color is gorgeous!! It fits TTS. I am between an A and a B cup, and the top was a little big, but between the boning and a push--up bra, I was fine. Also, the long was perfect for me with 4" heels. I got TONS of compliments all night!!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this dress but it's beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Run a little small, I ended up wearing another dress from the same designer in a 2R, but this model felt a little tight in a 4R. Other than that the dress is gorgeous, beautiful color and easy to walk with.

I read in the reviews that people got a lot of compliments and I didn't believe it! They were telling the truth! I got compliments all night which was great! Unfortunately, it wasn't as comfortable as I would have liked. When I tried it on, I felt the boning sticking out at the bust/neckline area. I thought that I could get through it. However as the night went on, boning from two other places started poking out. I looked great but was extremely uncomfortable all night.
This dress fit me perfectly from top to bottom. I got so many comments on it and felt comfortable

links_reviews_title: This dress was a perfect fit, comfortable, elegant, yet took my husband's breath away!
links_reviews_text: This dress is excellent for hourglass figures and hides trouble spots (tummy or hips that may have grown a bit over the holidays - don't judge). I wore this to a military formal event (ball) and received compliments throughout the evening. I am 5'6", 145 lbs, C cup, and hourglass figure. All evening, I was able to move about freely, sit comfortably, dance, and all. The only thing to pay attention to is the slight train... I wore flat shoes due to a combat injury (the dress was still a great length) but the train will get stepped on.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but runs small for busty women!
links_reviews_text: This dress is GORGEOUS. There is zero give at the bust line, however, so if you're like me (36DD) it probably won't work. Maybe a 34DD could have worn it, though. I am normally a size 6 and I could barely get this dress in a 6L to go over my hips, though. My back up size, 8L zipped all the way up but would NOT go over my boobs all the way and I really wasn't going for the busty bar-maid/half hanging out aesthetic. It zips on the side which is normally easier for me to get into with tight dresses. The 8 was already pretty roomy in the torso, so going up to a size 10 would probably have looked ridiculous on me. I really wanted this dress to work, but once again the "ladies" betrayed me. Sigh. I'd totally recommend it, just make sure you size up! P.S., the picture shows the dress like it actually fits, but it's not actually zipped up all the way...wanted to keep the pics PG-13, lol!

links_reviews_title: Unbelievable color and cut. Felt like a princess.
links_reviews_text: The cut was great. I usually wear a long, but it wasn't available. I wore 3" heels and the regular was perfect length. I would definitely rent this one again. The color was gorgeous. So many compliments all evening.
Fits true to size.

The color of this dress is beautiful and vibrant!! I received so many compliments on it! It does run a little snug so I would size up from what you normally wear. It also hides the mommy pooch in front and I didn't wear Spanx! It also hugged my curves and I felt sexy but classy! With the mermaid style you do have limited movement but all you have to do is hike it up and you're in business and people kept stepping on it!! I loved this dress and I hate to send it back!! I would definitely rent this again! I stood out in a sea of sequins too!!!

links_reviews_title: I have never looked so glamorous!
links_reviews_text: I attached a few photos that demonstrate how NOT purple the dress is. It is a royal blue that appears purpley in some lights. I got it to wear with my mask, which has a large range of purples, but the dress was too blue. Ultimately it didn't matter because I looked incredible. The dress is well-made and glamorous. The exterior material is thick and it has a light liner. I have small boobs but I had no issues keeping the dress up. My alternate size had wires sticking out, so do check for that when you receive the dress; it would have been unwearable due to the constant pricking. The 2R was a little long on me (5'3") with 3" heels, but the back was designed to be a little longer. My hips and legs are my largest body parts so I usually put dresses over my head, but the liner wasn't cooperating (kept riding up, folding over) so I was very grateful that the zipper went very low, making it easy to step into it, even with larger hips.

links_reviews_title: Rent the Runway always knocks it out of the park!
links_reviews_text: Badgley Mischka is consistent. I can order these dresses without any hesitation. I didn't have to wear spank or a bra. I will say that I used "chicken cutlet" inserts to fill the top a bit, as it shifted slightly in the bust, but not uncomfortably. The 4L actually fit better in the body, but was way too tight for my 34D bust. The 6L still worked well and I was able to sit, eat, breathe, dance, etc.

I wore this for my prom and it made me feel like a queen all night. The purple color really worked well and stood out as lot of people didnt wear this color! Additinally, it's very easy to dance in and looks bomb in photos.
Hands down my favorite RTR yet! Amazing fit and vibrant color. I'm 5'7" and wore the 2L with 4" heels. Wouldn't have changed a thing!

The dress looked great and I got a lot of compliments on it. But the material has no give at all so it was a little tighter than I liked around the hip area. Sitting down was difficult and I couldn't bend over for anything. I feel like a bigger size would have been too big. But I wish I would have chosen a size up to try it.

The color is a gorgeous cool-purple and the fit is amazing! I got compliments all night! I am 120lbs, 5'2" tall, 32b, 25" waist, 36" hips and the 2P fit perfectly with heels! Style is very forgiving around the stomach, too!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a Mardi Gras ball
links_reviews_text: The dress ran a little small but i am 5'3 and it was the perfect length.

links_reviews_title: This is a statement dress. Heads will turn.
links_reviews_text: The bust fits tight, even if you're flat-chested, and the wiring helps keep it up but can poke you. The styling around the tummy is very forgiving. I wore four-inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Bagdley Mishka always flatters curvy women
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small. I normally wear a 10, but the 12 fit like a glove and hugs your curves in all the right ways. The fabric is high quality and the draping perfection. I ended up not wearing it because my first choice was even more beautiful, but I will definitely keep it in mind for another occasion.

links_reviews_title: Stunning gown! Felt like a million $$$
links_reviews_text: I rented this for the VFW Post 1 Founders Dinner in December. It was actually a backup when my original didn't ship in time. And I'm SOOO happy that I got this one! This gown made me feel like royalty, and it got SO many compliments! It was sexy enough with the hip-hugging curves, yet classy -- perfect for a formal, somewhat conservative event. It comfortable enough to dance in. I was going to wear spanks, but ended up not needed them since the fabric around the middle covers up enough that it's not too revealing. Went perfectly with a Nocturne necklace. Great dress!!! Would totally rent again.

Dress was one size small - generally a 4 or 6, but comfortably wore the 8L. I'm 5'4" and wore 4" heels so I thought renting the long would be sufficient given the dimensions. The dress was slightly long so the regular would have been perfect. In a sea of dresses for the black tie affair, this was one of a kind!
Another perfect dress by BM, the color , the fit, the folds of the skirt.... felt so elegant, length was perfect with 3,5" heel,& top stay up!
This gown is so gorgeous in person! The color is a vibrant beautiful purple and the fabric is luxe! The 8 fit like a glove! Great lining- didn't even need a bra!

links_reviews_title: Flattering mermaid cut. Fitted in bodice and hips. Gorgeous and timeless.
links_reviews_text: Fit great - true to size. The material doesn't have much give but it was soft and overall comfortable. Material is more shiny that photo showed, but it really looked beautiful. Length was perfect (I'm barely 5'6") although I wore a small heel.

I'm not big on taffeta and taffeta-like fabrics so I really didn't care for this dress but needed something conservative and classic for a legal gala and went with this last minute. The gala was circus themed so I needed color. The color is cute, but the material makes the dress very tight and unforgiving. It runs true to size - that is to say sizing up won't help if it's too tight. I received a lot of compliments throughout the night but felt a little Marilyn Monroe-ish...kind of kitschy. Also, I wore the 6L...I'm 5'3" and wore heels and ended up being happy with the length. Probably would only rent this dress again or one like it if I had to for a conservative, formal affair. On the plus I really liked the silhouette of the dress. Great for hourglass figures.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a straight body type
links_reviews_text: It's a great fit for a straight figure like mine, I love a trumpet skirt. The color is vibrant - my photo was taken in outdoor light. Overall, I liked the look and feel of this dress. You won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: One of the most gorgeous dresses I've ever rented
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress!!! I wanted to keep it. So many compliments. Definitely a fancy gown. I wore it to a black tie Freemasonry event, and it was great. I am busty, so I did feel a little tight across my boobs, but it wasn't painful or anything (just made my boobs push up in a way that I was conscious about). Sizing up didn't work because then the middle looked frumpy and loose, so I just didn't wear a bra and wore the size 6. It was fine, and the beautiful purple color looked amazing in the photos!
It's hard to tell for the photo, but the fabric has beautiful sparkles woven in.
Rented this for my daughter for a wedding...she loved the dress. The color of the dress is gorgeous. The fabric is stunning.

I loved this dress and received so many compliments! I'm 5'2" so it was perfect for me with the high/low hemline. I have a small chest but broader back and shoulders, so it was snug around the back but not uncomfortable. Not sure how it would work on a large bust though! I would definitely recommend this dress though, I felt like a princess!

This was my first dress I selected from RTR and it did not disappoint! The high low is perfect for me as I am short and don't wear heels. It was so comfortable even with eating so much at cocktail hour!! Love how it sparkles and twirls when spinning on the dance floor. Only thing it's missing is pockets!

Thanks thought this dress was quite flattering on and I got lots of compliments. It was perfect for a spring evening wedding. I'm 5'4" and the back almost grazed the ground with no shoes but was fine with low heel.

links_reviews_title: This dress is great for petite frames!
