links_reviews_text: I was so nervous about this dress hitting my waist in the wrong place but it sits perfectly on my short torso and doesn't hit the ground even when I'm barefoot. I love how it twirls when I twirl- so fun for dancing!

links_reviews_title: Great for a Garden Spring Event
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this as it didn't seem quite appropriate for a black tie wedding. The fit is true to size, very high-quality material, extremely comfortable, can even wear a normal bra with it. I feel like it made me look a tad wider in the shoulders and hips than I really am. It's very pink and has sparkles (which my 3-year-old daughter adored!). In a different color/pattern I think this should be a great formal dress, but the almost cartoonish flower print brings the formality down a bit. I'm planning on wearing it to a baby shower instead.

I've rented a similar Shoshonna style in the past and loved the comfort and ease of this dress. No spanx necessary. I'm 5'4" and 120 lbs and fit easily into a 4...but I'm small busted. If you're fuller up top you may want to size up. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I never dress up. I hate it. This process made things go smoothly and the dress was great!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great on this dress, however I have an odd body shape. The 10 was snug in the waist, 12 was too loose. Overall, it was a comfortable dress and I received lots of compliments.

I received endless compliments on this dress! I'm normally a size 8 or 10 and only an 8 was available - the fit was snug but plenty comfortable. As many others stated, bigger busts will be tight - I couldn't even wear a bra and I am NEVER able to go bra-less, but it worked because the fabric is so thick and sturdy.

links_reviews_title: Was a weather perfect day and perfect dress for an August wedding !
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little tight in the chest. If you are larger up top I would recommend upsizing. It was the perfect length for pictures, dancing and feeling comfortable!
The material is very heavy. For me, the dress ran true to size. There was a lot of structure in the top but it was still comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a formal military event. It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress! The fabric felt expensive and was slightly sparkly. It was comfortable all night long and was a unique silhouette that I received a ton of complements on. If you have a larger bust I would size up. I wore my backup size and it was still lightly snug up top but the bottom is plenty spacious. The only thing that would have made this dress better is pockets!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite dresses ever!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect and color was great for a spring/summer wedding. I was a little nervous about how long the back of the dress would be since I'm 5'2", but it was just right with heels on. So comfortable and easy to dance in all night!

Love all Shoshanna dresses and this one matched the Shoshanna standard for great fit and pretty details. Beautiful blush base with metallic detail around flower design. Made the dress shimmer. Fun to dance in! Zipper was challenging so recommend having a friend to assist
This dress runs big , the material was great but unfortunately it was big on the waist , it was a beautiful dress , it had a princess feel to it!

links_reviews_title: Compared to something Michelle Obama would wear!
links_reviews_text: I weigh 154, am 5'6, and a very small "A" cup. I'd say my shape is probably "Pear". That being said, the fat where my arms and chest meet are a bit chunky so the fabric was accentuating it a bit. Nothing too crazy though. I absolutely loved this dress. It may look a little underwhelming on the hanger, but on I felt like a dream.

I rented this for my daughter and nieces baptisms but it unfortunately didn't fit me very well. I have a longer torso and where the waistline hem hit me it made me look off proportionally....however it fid fit my sister perfectly and she looked stunning in it! She was receiving compliments throughout the night and said it was very comfortable. It is a very beautiful color and pattern perfect for any spring or summer event

Fits tight across the chest for a big bust but it was comfortable and felt secure for hours (I did wear a bra). Needed help to zip it up. The high-low hemline is a nice twist to a pastel tea length dress. The skirt itself is so fun to play with and has a nice body. Would definitely rent again!
I wore this for easter service at church. Many compliments. The material is very luxurious and but not too heavy.
Perfect!
Tight in bust. Beautiful fabric color texture and print.
Fit great beautiful to spin around in

This was sent as a backup dress after my first choice was unavailable, and when I saw it on the hanger I was incredibly worried about the combination of baby pink, sparkles, and flowers. One I put it on, though, it looked incredible and it was very flattering. I really loved wearing it. Joe clearly loved it too, just look at that smile.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress BUT Requires Strategic Styling
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9, 145lbs., wore the 6Reg (length was great barefoot and with 4" wedges), and was happy with the fit. With the right styling, this dress totally works (and I'm happy with the look I achieved), however, I admittedly didn't love this dress (had I tried it on in a store, I wouldn't have walked out with it). There was NOTHING wrong with it, but I think it looked better on the model and in the photos. A bit more muted in color than I had expected.
Very pretty dress, a little big but I was comfortable wearing it all day. The fabric is thick, but doesn't wrinkle easily. Very happy with this rental
Comfortable! Snug in the bust. Can also go with flat shoes. But everyone loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Runs small it the back but its beautiful!
links_reviews_text: From all the other reviews it does run small. No bra is needed which is perfect. I wore nude heels and pearls to a black tie wedding in Newport RI. I had so many compliments, this dress is beautiful and doesn't need fancy shoes or jewelry to bring it up a notch. I wear a size 8 in all other dresses but with this dress I wore the 10 because the back was tight/zipper was stuck. I will definitely be renting again!

This dress was perfect for a southern spring wedding. The color was perfectly muted and the flowers created more of an abstract pattern in person. The dress had plenty of movement for the dance floor and I would definitely rent it again.

Perfect fit and comfortable. I'm 5'5", 140, and hourglass/pear shaped. The size 6 fit me perfectly and looked great and flowy for my waltz performance. Fabric has some sheen and body but is soft and feminine in appearance. Hides big hips wonderfully yet has room for an ample bust. I'd rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: A little tight, but wore it anyway
links_reviews_text: A beautiful dress, but although "true to size" and checked with another review, was still tight. Was my last effort Dress, so wore it anyway. Cute, but tight on this lady.
So lovely

I was looking for a thicker fabric to hide some 4 week post baby-ness. This dress was perfect. It did seem a little snug across the chest, so I might size up if you're broad in that area. I got so many compliments and my husband said it was his favorite dress I had ever worn. I am narrow through the hips but recommended it to a friend who is curvy with a narrower waist and she loved it too. It is really elegant.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel so classy because the cut is great.
links_reviews_text: This dress is true to size. I would be careful if you have a fuller bust because the top is very tight and can make your under arm area bulge if you're not careful. I rented this for my bridal shower and got so many compliments. This is the 6.

I rented this dress for my wedding rehearsal and loved it. It was more lightweight than I thought, which was great as we spent the evening outdoors. The dress fit true to size, and I was able to wear sandals with it.

I wore this lovely dress on Kentucky Derby Day to a big party in my city and I'm so glad I did. While I found it was a bit long (and I'm pretty tall) the cut was pleasant and flattering. The fit was just about perfect and I got compliments the whole time!

This dress is beautiful. It's perfect for anyone with a full bust and it's very flattering. The material feels very high quality, but it's surprisingly not too heavy and quite breathable. I wore this for a graduation event and it was perfect!

Favorite rental ever! I wore this dress to my daughter's baptism. The fabric is absolutely stunning - shimmery but not overly sparkly. The dress is a little longer than I thought which makes it a bit more formal. When you walk it puffs out in the back like a princess gown. Got tons of compliments. It is slim fitting through the torso and under the armpits. If you have extra underarm skin or very large bust, you may need to size up.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for my daughter's bridal shower
links_reviews_text: The dress is well cut, true to size, beautiful color, comfortable, lightweight! Both sizes arrived on time, in excellent condition, and were a breeze to return. Sorry not to have photo without the shawl as it looked even better without it - the day was much cooler than expected. I received compliments all afternoon and couldn't be happier with my first RTR experience!
I loved this dress so much! Received lots of compliments. The only con is this dress has no stretch so it was a little snug but other than that it was great! I will definitely be renting again

Loved loved this dress!! Got a ton of compliments on it! Molded to your body-- was a tad baggy in the back, but I think that's because I should have gotten a size down. The dress is tights down by the legs, so not the dress to bust out your dance moves on the floor, but it most definitely complimented my figure! I The dress is stretchy, so I can see this dress looking great on a variety of women's body types!
Fit like a glove and felt like a million bucks. Elegant & comfortable. Would highly recommend.
Loved this dress. It fit me like a glove & I received compliments all night.

The fit is tight. The dress part is pretty normal even though it runs a little small. The arms are the hard part. The sleeves were very tight on my arms. I was still able to move and absolutely loved this dress -- but just keep that in mind when ordering it.

I wore this for a May wedding in a Garden. It was the perfect amount of class with a hint of sexy. The cut outs kind of slouched together so they weren't noticeable. I had to adjust the neck line a few times from slipping up but over all I loved the dress. The fit was perfect and hugged my body in all the right ways. The slit was a great length and the color was beautiful. The material was a bit thick but the reception was inside so it was ok. I paired it with a floral zac Posen bag and received multiple compliments.

The dress was perfect for a wedding or formal occasion. It is tight, but still comfortable. I felt more comfortable in my back up size of 6, rather than my usual 4. The dress was a little long, as I am only 5'2", so it hit below the knee for me. Super sexy dress. Loved wearing it and would rent again!
This dress fit me amazingly. The neckline stays in place and really highlights the collar bone. It runs small; I wear size 2 and had to wear size 4. It wrinkles a bit easily at the bottom.

Classy dress that fits like a glove! Sleeves forced me to maintain a proper upright posture, which isn't a bad aspect in my book. However, I always needed help zipping the dress up and found it difficult to walk up or down stairs. I'm petite, 5ft 3in, 112 lbs, and usually wear a size 0 on this site, but based on reviews , I ordered a size up. For the event, I ended up wearing a size 2. Overall, I received many compliments!
Really cute but restricted my ability to move my shoulders which was kind of a bummer

The dress was a great color and nice fit. It definitely limited arm and leg mobility but not too drastically. Thick fabric felt great and wasn't terribly warm even in 80 degree temperatures. A little tricky to keep up in the busy area depending on sizing. Lots of compliments

I felt great wearing this dress! I ordered it in a size larger than I normally wear, but I am definitely glad I did. It was still a bit sung, especially when sitting, but still great for dancing. The top has a sticky trim on the inside to help keep it in place.

Loved this dress! I'm typically somewhere between a 4 and 6, so I ordered both of those sizes expecting to go with the 6 but ended up wearing the 4. The arms are definitely snug enough to limit mobility, and you won't be taking any long strides in this dress, but it's a fair trade for such a flattering shape. Perfect if you're going for an elegant, classic, and graceful look, but I'd opt for something else if feeling unrestricted is a priority.

I love this dress. I rented it for my brother-in-law's wedding and I couldn't be happier with the fit. I usually wear a 6-8, and the 8 fit perfectly. The material has a good bit of give and the quality is great. It hugs the body without showing every bump, and the sleeves stay up with no problem. I would be wary if you do have larger arms, as the sleeves are pretty tight on my average size arms, and there is a good bit of cleavage on display if you have a medium to large chest. I noticed that some reviewers noted that the dress ran small, but as long as you look up the dress and go by the size chart it should be fine. For reference, my measurements are roughly 36-29-40 give or take an inch or so at the waist. I'm somewhere between a pear and hourglass shape, and I think it complimented my figure nicely.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks!!! However, it was very tight!!
links_reviews_text: This is an absolutely stunning emerald green dress! I wore it for a formal luncheon at a charity event. It was however, very restrictive. I typically wear a 00 or 0 and squeezed myself into the size 2. I'm 5'5" and 115#. I was still able to fit with a strapless bra. The material is beautiful and heavy, but does not have any stretch!! Getting into a car is difficult, as well as going to the bathroom! It is too tight to pull up to use the restroom and has a hook-eye and zipper up the back. Thankfully, my mom was with me for the event and was my own personal attendant to go to the bathroom. I would not recommend if you do not have someone to help you in and out of it, or if you need to dance at a wedding. That being said, I was at a charity event and it worked perfectly for what I needed. I received so many compliments and it was very flattering. All in all, I would definitely rent it again!

I got a lot of compliments but definitely listen when reviewers say it runs small! I'm a pretty true to size 6 and the 8 was even a little snug. A bit hard to walk in especially with heels and honestly bathroom breaks were tough too. But I looked great as long as I sucked in and got so many compliments
The dress was beautiful. It fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this dress all night!
links_reviews_text: I got a ton of compliments. It's a bit low cut, but not at all inappropriate for a wedding. I think I could have fit into the size down but was much more comfortable in the 2. The length was great, although getting in and out of cars was a little difficult, but for everything else it was great. I do kind of wish I could own this dress. I would definitely wear it again!

links_reviews_title: No such thing as too dressed up
links_reviews_text: I felt super glamorous in this dress. The cut and color are simple but stunning. It fit like a glove - a very tight glove that was made by vacuum-sealing the material to my hand. I would say this runs on the smaller side, and I'm glad I ordered the size up (a 4) as a backup. PROS: girl you will turn those heads SOME CONSIDERATIONS: 1. I am not a busty person, so I intermittently needed to adjust the top of the dress to keep my strapless bra covered. On the plus side, I finally had the posture my mom always wanted me to have because pushing my shoulders back helped keep the dress up. 2. The dress is tight and restricts your physical movements. Getting into my car was...interesting. I could not move my feet more than a foot apart. Dancing only worked because I love dancing and was committed. 3. I physically could not put on the dress or take it off by myself. I needed someone to come to the bathroom with me to help me undo the clasp in the back. I don't know if this is tmi, but I feel like this could be pertinent information for people who just don't got the time for that.

Loved this dress!! So pretty and flattering! I will say, it did run small. It's a very snug fit through hips and across the arms too. You definitely can't raise your hands far up. All that being said, I really wish I didn't have to send this one back. Will def rent again!!!

I felt beautiful wearing this dress! It fit pretty snug.. the only con was I felt like I had T. Rex arms all night. Not a lot of movement there- but besides that, it was an amazing dress! I didn't want to send it back.

Ordered this dress in my normal pre-pregnancy size 2, then two weeks later my belly "popped". It was a struggle to get in and out of this dress (required the help of my husband) but I loved it. I wish the size 4 would have been available as a backup, but it wasn't available so I sucked it up (or in!) and had to avoid going up/down stairs... but overall a win. I would order this again in a heartbeat but possibly in the next size up.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my fiancé's office holiday party. It was the perfect blend of classy and sexy where I wanted to show off a little but be tasteful. Was grateful for the reviews that had me size up - I'm normally a 6 and the 8 fit perfectly - form fitting in the waist but just enough room to move around. I will say since the back slit is pretty low, I had some trouble with leg movement. Had to take steps slow and it was difficult to get into a high car. But the color, fabric, and cut were all lovely. Would definitely recommend and may rent this one again in the future.

links_reviews_title: Sexy Christmas Party Dress for Hourglass Figures
links_reviews_text: Due to the fact I have a lot I'd like to say about this dress, I will make some pros and cons for you: Pros: -Rubber/non slip lining around neckline of the dress -Sexy cut for hourglass shapes -Compatible with a long torso -Accurate color depiction -There was room for my legs to move in the bottom of the dress. I didn't feel like I was bound together with fabric. -Looks great with heels (Nude or gold) and gold accessories -Shows of your boobs a bit. Not too much not to little. It was the perfect dress for my office party in downtown DC. Cons: -Not terribly easy to lift your arms -Insanely small (I wear a street size of 8 in dress (WHBM, Ann taylor). Had to wear the 12 in this dress) -Smashed my boobs down even after sizing up (I'm a 36D) -Small in the bust, a little blouse-y in the bottom/butt area -Zipper is a little slippery so it can be difficult to pull up -NO STRETCH TO THE FABRIC Size Reference: I wear a size 8 in pants and 10 in blouses at WHBM and Ann Taylor. My bust is a 36D, Natural Waist is 31. Height 5' 9" Even with my cons added, these were not deal breakers for me. I came in prepared for all of those issues. Knowing that, I loved the dress. I got so many compliments. We went to a bar afterwards. I got such and ego boost from all the glances headed my way. I was a wonderful evening. I know my boyfriend was thrilled with my dress choice and loved how it quote, "fit my curves". I would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Stunning color, flattering, but VERY restrictive!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. Material is extremely high quality and the color is gorgeous. Pictures don't do this color justice. While I felt gorgeous wearing this dress, it was so restrictive in the arms and legs that I had trouble dancing. I joked that it was like wearing a straight jacket all evening. I love to dance at weddings so this was a problem for me! I did not wear a bra, but the dress fit snugly enough that it was OK. I would recommend this dress if you want to look like a million bucks but don't need to move too much!

links_reviews_title: Great Dress, so many compliments. Very slimming fabric.
links_reviews_text: Fit was very snug and the sleeves slipped down my arms a little, so had to pull them up a few times. With so much shoulder and back exposure the length was great.

links_reviews_title: The fit was amazing!! Never ending compliments
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Might me my favorite one yet!

links_reviews_title: This dress is absolutely gorgeous! I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It does run a little small but the quality and material is impeccable.

This dress (as beautiful as it was) I feel is more for curvier women? I felt it made me look a little flat chested although I'm a size 32D. I'm usually a dress size four and since everyone was saying how small it runs I went for the size four and size six. Size 4 fit big, and long, making me look flat. I still wore it and I still felt beautiful but I know if I had worn a size two I would've looked better. The color is amazing! I got soooo many compliments, but it's a very restricting dress, even though it fit me big it was hard to walk in and also had to be very careful of my movements as to not flash anyone lol.

Loved this dress so much, they were sold out of my backup size. So I only had the size I normally wear in dresses, and let me say.. it fit like a glove. It feels like it runs a little small, but I do think its supposed to be snug so that the dress stays put. I felt beautiful in it and got many compliments, its a perfect balance between classic and sexy, and different. Not a dress that can easily be found in a store. Highly recommend! You won't regret it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was really great for a winter wedding, thick, stretchy and super elegant for an evening.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were tighter than anticipated, dress was really snug for a size 6 I'd say order one size up just in case. The reviews don't lie, you won't be doing any fist bumping moves with this cut but its sure to impress. Overall, very happy with the quality and the wear.

Loved this dress but I was so happy I ordered a size up in it. The reviews are spot on, it runs a little small but the quality was so nice. I loved wearing it the entire night and dancing was possible so don't hesitate to order this dress!

I typically wear a size 2 dress from Banana Republic or JCrew but the 2 in this dress was a bit snug. The 4 fit nicely. The fabric had just the right amount of elastic and hold. The one downside was that I am a bit broader across the shoulders and I couldn’t quite lift my arms above my head while dancing. But otherwise it fit like a dream and flattered my smaller chest and longer legs.
I LOVED this dress! And so did everyone at the party. Super comfortable. The only con is I couldn't lift my arms up very high. I'd definitely get this again!

I loved this dress on the model, but I looked like a sausage. Wasn't flattering on my hips/tummy and the bigger size wouldn't stay up around my shoulders. This was the first of 5 RTR orders that I couldn't make work- I had to abandon ship completely and get a new dress.
Beautiful color. Sophisticated style. But couldn't lift up my arms and felt like my biceps were going to rip the sleeves open. Made dancing uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Unique dress style that makes you stand out in a crowd
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, and so did everyone else at the wedding I wore it to! This dress was really tight, so dancing wasn't the easiest. The sleeves would fall down every now and then, if I had used fabric tape it would not have been a problem.

This dress needs a fierce competitor, but with the right amount of Crisco and double spanx, you, too, can be victorious! To say it fits like a second skin seems insulting to the constrictive, gravity defying way this dress fuses to your body. Definitely don't eat a solid 24 hours before wearing. Requires at least one other human to put back on after bathroom adventures, but two are better.

I wore this dress to a fall wedding and the color was perfect! I'm glad I listened to the other reviews because the dress is very tight so I sized up! I'm 4'11 118lbs and I wore a size 4. The dress is gorgeous, I got tons of compliments all night! I read other reviews that said they didn't wear a bra with the dress and my thought was "ok well these ladies probably haven't had children yet" But then I tried the dress on and definitely didn't need a bra! The dress held me in place without any problems! This was one of my favorite rentals so far! I love RTR!

Like others described the arms are pretty tight--difficult to dance in. But I signed on for it anyway! It looked amazing. And despite my circulation being cut off, I felt amazing. I should have ordered the 6 and 8.

This dress was overall amazing. I range in sizes from 6-10. Originally I wanted to order a size 8 and 10. 10 was not available so I did a 6 and 8 instead. The 6 was too small, the 8 fit like a glove on the lower half. It had some stretch, hugged curves beautifully and kept a nice contoured shape. I have broader shoulders and (I suppose) bigger upper arms because it was very tight, but still wearable. Had to have someone come to the bathroom with me each time to help with the unzip/zipup. I love this dress! Would rent again. Would be interested to see how the size 10 would have fit. Maybe next time in black!!

Absolutely obsessed with the fit of this dress. Definitely runs small and I'm grateful! I always have an issue renting as I normally fit a 00-0. The length is perfect for a formal occasion and the cut outs are positioned perfectly for added drama. Rent it!

Amazing dress! Husband was a big fan! Super form fitting.... I'd still say it's true to size but if you want more room prob size up. However w my true size and it being as form fitting as it was it was still appropriate to attend a cocktail party with city officials.
Consecutive and chic
This was a gem for work. Fit beautifully, classic cut, and the shoulders added just enough interest. It does run small. I usually wear a 0 or 2 in most RTR dresses but I needed a size 4.

Beautiful dress! Love the shape and the arm cutouts. I had a speaking engagement, and received several compliments! This stress runs small. I could barely breathe when I first zipped up the 12, and I'm roughly an 8/10 and 5'11". If you are busty like me, your girls will be smashed in. I'm a 34DDD and look like a B cup in this dress. Not a bad thing, just an observation. Wear a racerback bra with this to prevent the bra strap peekaboo.
I got so many compliments on this dress! It's the perfect LBD! The cuts around the shoulders added a little edge. The fit was perfect and the material was easy to move in

I wore this dress to an awards event where I was being recognized. I wanted something sophisticated but edgy and this dress was perfect. I received several compliments on the dress. I am thankful I read the other reviews, as it does run small. I am normally a 6 and the 8 was super fitted. Thankfully, it worked as RTR didn't have a 10 available. I loved this dress and will likely rent it again in the future!

I loved this dress. It was made great. Good quality material. I wish I ordered a size 6 though. The 4 was pretty snug and has zero stretch to it. I could move and dance but it was uncomfortable at times and really flattened my chest. I am about 120lbs / 34c. But overall a great pick. My advice order a size up if you are busty.
Love it

This was my first RTR dress, and I absolutley loved it. I wear a 6 normally and wore a 6 in this dress. It was very tight however it was not uncomfortable.... I could have probably worn an 8. I wore a strapless bra and no undergarmets. The material is very thick however since it was so form fitting you could see the lines of the spanx.. so I would definately size up for your back up size. The length was perfect just below the knee. The dress really shows off your curves and I received many compliments. I wore my hair up to show off the shoulders and chose emerald earings since the wedding was held on St. Patricks day.

This is a form fitting, body-con dress that also runs small. I am a comfortable 4, sometimes 2. I wore a 6 and wish I had an 8 to try. The dress tended to slightly "bunch up" or wrinkle in the midsection/hips bc it was so form fitting. It is a beautiful dress, but I did feel like I had to yank the bottom throughout the evening to keep straightening it out. I loved the sleeve cut outs, the sleeve length and the dress length.

links_reviews_title: Fit like an actual glove this is a very chic/sleek look
links_reviews_text: I️ would rent and re-rent this dress any time I️ need a simple yet sexy go to. It hugs every curve . It's really conservative and runs past the knee but has cute cut outs in the perfect places to make it fun rather than matronly. Perfect for a work engagement

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove, the sleak black lines were perfect for an October wedding.
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Super flattering and slimming. Minimal jewelry, let the dress speak for itself.

I'm a huge fan of this brand and how flattering the silhouettes usually are. This one did not disappoint! The longer length make it very sophisticated, while the body con aspect gave it just the right sex appear.

links_reviews_title: Not for the faint of heart (or those without spanx)
links_reviews_text: This dress is stunning. I was self conscious, since it is so different from what I am used to wearing, however the silhouette is really beautiful. This dress is very flattering, but very very form fitting. I normally wear a size 4, based on other reviews I ordered a size 6, but wish I had gotten an 8. I definitely recommend spanx to help smooth things out. All in all, it's a very sexy dress and I felt beautiful.
This well made dress is made of a thick material that helps smooth out lumps and bumps.
Does run small, wore a 10 and it was very comfortable! Sexy alternative of the normal LBD! Paired with a hot pink shoe

links_reviews_title: The fit and class of the dress was a knock out.
links_reviews_text: Have tried to find this dress to buy, but haven't found my size. I sized up to a 6 based on reviews. I hate not wearing a bra (32E) and had no issues not wearing a bra. Felt secure all night and very comfortable. I've never received as many compliments as I did in this dress. The fit was fantastic and hugged curves while still providing a great silhouette without highlighting problem areas. Highly recommend.

The length of the dress sets the dress apart from being a basic LBD, however it definitely adds formality. Would recommend if you're renting for an event that is more on the formal side. Loved the fit of the dress and the thick material allowed for me not to have to wear a bra. Highly recommend.
Very classy but edgy. Snug fit, but had some give so was comfy.

I wore this for a bridal shower and it was perfect! Thick fabric that holds you in (I didn't wear a bra), sophisticated dress with just enough detail to make the black color a little more interesting. Got a lot of compliments. Great dress!
I usually wear a size 4, but after reading reviews, I went with a size 6 and it fit like a glove. I will definitely rent this again!
I got this dress in an 8 and 10. I'm busty so the 10 worked best for me. The back slit is high so it was perfect for dancing. I recommend this for anyone that needs a black, sexy but classy dress.
Beautiful dress. I wore for work and then to a work dinner after. Cutouts are so flattering. Dress definitely snug, which I prefer.

links_reviews_title: Classy and form fitting in all the right spots
links_reviews_text: I felt trendy and beautiful in this form fitting classy lbd. Size up if you'd like a more conservative fit - definitely recommend for work function, wedding, or date- will rent again for sure!

Absolutely loved the dress. The fit was a little off. It was really tight in the thighs but the hips were too big and stuck out slightly. I could have worn the 4 but the 6 felt more comfortable throughout the night.
Beautiful dress. Modest yet form fitting. Material is thick so it's forgiving. Fits true to size, prob looks best on 5'5 and taller as it is a little long.

links_reviews_title: I had great help at the store picking out this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. I felt so sexy. This was the first dress I tried on at the store, tried on many after it, but kept coming back to this dress. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel sophisticated and accomplished. I wore it to my art show reception.
links_reviews_text: Fit runs small, so order one size up from normal size worn. The dress itself is figure hugging and flattering. I love the contemporary design of the dress. It is modest yet very sexy. I want to own THIS ONE! I'm in love <3

When I first put on this dress at the RtR store, I felt like I looked like one tall black cyclinder (hah). But after I moved around in it, styled myself (including pairing it with a nice little jacket, due to the cold northeast weather) it was great. I'm a girl who loves black, and this was a good mix of classic, edgy, and modern style. I wore this to my company's holiday party. RtR to the rescue again!

links_reviews_title: Classic and stylish - perfect for office party.
links_reviews_text: True to size, no supporting undergarments needed due to the thickness of the material. Short gals need at least 4" heels.
I was concerned that it might be too tight for a work diner but it wasn't and the length was appropriate. Loved it!!

Loved this dress! It definitely runs small, so size up! Zipper is tricky to get up, unless your arms are really flexible, you'll need someone to help you get it zipped. Material is great, thick enough to hide minor imperfections even though the dress is form fitting, but not so thick to make you hot. You can wear a racer back or halter bra with this to hide the straps. Wish I could buy this and wear it again and again!

links_reviews_title: Great fabric. Forget a bra or spanx!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me so well it make my almost non-existent waist look awesome! The length was perfect mid-calf and the slit in the back made it sexy. Fits true to size, but make sure you have a partner in crime to help you zip and up-zip!

Loved this dress! Definitely runs small. They didn't have my backup size so I wore the 4, but I think a size 6 would have still have looked fitted without being so restrictive. As you can see in the fitting room photo, you'll need to convert your bra to a racerback or wear strapless. Beautiful dress. Received many compliments.

The fit was perfect! I was assuming I would have to size up but the 6 fit perfect! I got so many compliments! I felt sophisticated being covered up but the fit made me feel sleek and sexy. I wish I could buy this dress, I love it!

After the dress I ordered had an inventory problem, 2 dresses that I did not pick were sent to me and were horrible. The day before the wedding I was frantically talking to Lauren R to find a dress. Picked this one based on availability and it was overnighted to me. It was perfect and probably better than the one I ordered! So sleek and sophisticated and classy, great quality, fit like a glove. Got so many compliments and felt great. Hit me below the calf, which is a better length than where it is on the model, bc I am short. You do not cut off your calf when you are short! Paired with my fun pink shoes and minimal jewelry which is my style. Did not need a wrap bc of the sleeves. Really loved it!
Great dress for professional with an edge.
Absolutely gorgeous dress! Whisk I didn't have to return it. Definitely very fitted, but fit like a glove. Really well made, no spanx needed. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to my 30th HS Reunion. Extremely classy & highlights your curves! Stealthily sexy!
links_reviews_text: Runs small!! The 10 was not available so I took a chance with the 8. With the help of some Spanx and a friend to zip it up, good to go. Even though it was snug, it was not uncomfortable. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for South of France heatwave
If you wanna be a show stopper, rent this.
links_reviews_text: This isn't something I personally wouldn't buy because it's definitely outside of my comfort zone but I'm glad I had the opportunity to rent it. It runs pretty large ( but not sure if that's because I'm in between sizes) so if you're between 135-140 maybe think about sizing down or else your boobs will be making an unwanted appearance
This was one of my favorite rentals ever! The material was thick, but the fit was still cool and breezy. I wore with a small heel but even short girls could wear this dress with flats.
Runs a tad large. The back is open and it's difficult to wear a bra. Would look better on a small chested person. Loved the color and combination of fabric.
Unusual and eye-catching. A bit too plunging in front for me. Loved the open back.

I had to tie the top of the dress twice, but it fit perfect once I did so. Also a little long, but it is a very beautiful dress. I wore no bra which actually made me look like I have a smaller bust in this dress! Worked out fine at the end :)

Tibi runs large so I went down two sizes and am glad I did. The back is elastic and there is a side zipper so easy to get in and out of. I got SO many compliments and felt friggin awesome in it. Also, pockets! I'll def rent again.

This dress runs large...I am usually a 4 or 2 and rented a zero knowing that it could look big on me. The zero worked but if I were tall, the two would have been perfect as it was a little tight on the hips. Great summer dress with beautiful open back. Definitely recommend.

A dress where you can eat a lunch of donuts and waffle fries unencumbered (which I did) . I felt: comfortable but a little bit risqué with the dropped v, simple in its colors but striking in its dramatic length, ruffle, and silhouette. Fun piece to stretch your fashion comfort zone in for a day. Runs a smidge large, but not so much where I couldn't wear my regular 4.
Wish halter neck was adjustable. Fun and different. Would rent again.
Cool cut but material is not breathable or summer-y. The strap that makes it a halter top is also odd and annoying to maneuver, as it's not a traditional halter. Would not rent again.
The 4 fit perfectly. I didn't know how to secure the halter tie, but found a way to make it work. Really cute dress

links_reviews_title: Dress was huge and tons of material. I'm 5'10 and couldn't pull it off. I didn't end up wearing it
links_reviews_text: I didn't like this dress at all. Way too big and way too much material.

I wanted to love this dress SO much but unfortunately it just wasn't meant to be. As someone with an hourglass shape this did nothing for my hips/thighs and made me look incredibly boxy. Very disappointing since the low back was absolutely stunning.

Reviews suggested this dress runs large but not if you have hips! If you are curvy in the bottom areas like me, rent your size, don't size up! I'm a 10 and rented an 8 which was way too snug in the hips and butt, pockets buckled. I rented the 10 and it works!

I loved this dress so much. Perfect for a summer party or a vacation. The pockets made for a little bit of an awkward fit and the drop waist is a little long but I'd still recommend. I got so many compliments
loved this dress, was a bit large in the bust, so i'll try a size down next time.
the pockets make it look like you have big hips. You cant adjust the length of the neck because its sewed.
I got this as an option for a wedding I was attending. I got this as a back since it's pretty simple/safe. The fit was great and it was super comfortable to wear, but it's a little too plain for me.
Wonderfully cut design. I do wish it were longer (a longer option was unavailable), I'm 5'9" and felt like it was just a tad too short.
It was snug but loosened up over the evening so was still comfortable. I'm 6'1 so the Long was perfect. Even fit in the chest area which I was concerned about since I'm DDD
This dress ended up being a great option for the Mayor's Ball. (Size runs a little small)

This dress is super flattering, especially for those of us with some curves! I am size 14 and the dress fit like a glove, yet was stretchy and so comfortable the entire night. I wore spanx underneath which I suggest to help smooth out the look. I am at a place where I’m a bigger size than I’ve ever been, so I was worried about this event- but this dress made the entire night a dream. I got SO many compliments!

I wore this as the maid of honor. I ended up wearing with flats and I am 5'4". It just touched the ground. It looked good with heels too but I was walking on grass. I wore spanx for a smooth line and went braless. There is a bit of cleavage but I felt comfortable. Many compliments and it was so comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, I felt classy and comfortable, no spanx needed
links_reviews_text: This dress is very classy with a nice silhouette, yet stretchy enough that I was comfortable all night walking, sitting, and dancing. I ordered a 4R but a 4L was sent by mistake and was way too long, so I tried the backup 6R and it fit fine. I'm 5'4" and wore 3" heels, and the difference between regular and long was huge - I couldn't walk without tripping in the long, and the regular hovered nicely at floor length. Cleavage is not usually my thing but it didn't bother me in this dress and I never felt in danger of falling out of it. It's a lovely dress but quite simple so I wore some sparkly jewelry to bring it up a notch. Overall I recommend and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Complements all night - Elegant and comfy black tie gown
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a black tie reception and dinner. At 31 weeks pregnant, I did not have many options and was so excited about how well this worked. The dress looks plain on the hanger but is gorgeous when you get it on. Very comfortable due to stretchy, forgiving material, and soooo elegant. I'm 5.6 and rented the long to be able to wear high heels with it. Regular was too short. Another RTR for the win!

links_reviews_title: Such a comfy and flattering dress
links_reviews_text: This dress has the perfect amount of stretch and was so comfortable. It fit me perfectly and gave me curves! Only con was that I had to safety pin my bra straps to the dress so they wouldn't show in the neckline.

This dress was great for my company holiday party. It was nice to not have a black dress, but it didn't stand out too much being navy in color. I used some double sided tape to keep my regular bra straps from popping out as the neckline is slightly wider than a regular bra, but not by too much.

This dress fit like a glove and I felt so classy, even with a deeper cleavage than I'm used to. I have a bit of a lower tummy pooch but I threw on a body shaper and it was perfect. I'm 5'9" and in 3" heels, this dress was still long.
Amazing dress! But too low cut for my chest. I would absolutely get it again!!! I'm a 5'8 and this one was a LITTLE too short. But did get LOTS of comments

links_reviews_title: Great dress - caution wearing when pregnant
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my husband's work awards gala. I am 21 weeks (5 mos 1 week) pregnant (with my 2nd). This time around I'm showing much sooner than with my 1st. I read all the reviews and decided to order 2 larger sizes. I ended up wearing a 12R - I'm so glad I ordered up because the fabric isn't too forgiving. The dress is very flattering but the bust line is a little lower than I'm comfortable with (also my chest is significantly bigger being pregnant so it is what it is). I think if I had been able to wear the 10R or even an 8R, the neckline would've been fine (also not with an inflated chest). I received a lot of compliments and was overall comfortable in this dress therefore pleased and truth be told relieved it fit!

This gown was definitely a favorite of mine, even though I was skeptical at first. I've had two babies so I was a little nervous about the dress not hiding my less desirable areas :) but it was stunning on and I loved they way it looked. I also loved the details of the sleeves! It was a little long for me even with four inch heels, so I would have had to lift it up to walk, but still one of my favorites for sure! This dress does not disappoint!

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for elegant awards ceremony that I attended.
links_reviews_text: I reviewed other's comments and noted it ran small, so I rented a 6R and an 8P as backup. I am generally between a 6 and 8 at stores (depends on the dress). At 5’2, however, dresses are almost always too long and I have to get them hemmed (petite clothes is sometimes too tight or fits awkward, so sizing can get tricky for me) so I was worried about the fit and length. The garment bag with two dresses arrived as scheduled. I was not able to zip up the 6R completely and at it was way too long for me. The 8P fit perfectly both in size and length and I wore it with 2-inch black heels. The dress was very flattering, a very nice thick material and comfortable (form fitting but stretchy enough to give me some room for steak dinner). I do not have an hourglass shape but this dress gave me curves in all the right places so I felt really pretty in it and my husband could not stop raving about how much he loved it and how great I looked in it. I went with a combination of pearls and bling for accessories and a black wrap. Although the dress is blue it is a very, very dark blue and can probably pass for black. I would definitely recommend this dress. This was my first time doing RTR and I'm certain that I will do it again.

It runs small, but it has good proportions otherwise. My 36 H cup chest fit (though it definitely shows cleavage - not a super deep plunge, but wide). It's snug all the way to just below the hips, but it looked so good even with my recent 60lb weight gain I felt confident in it. Wore it to a formal wedding and it was perfect for me - not too flashy, just very classy.
Wore for formal family photos. So perfect. Would be a great dress for work formal event. Comfortable and classic.

links_reviews_title: I was the only one wearing a gown at this event.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my fiancé’s military Christmas ball. It’s a very pretty gown. Unfortunately, it was a bit of a let down for me. It runs small so I had to wear the back up size. I couldn’t wear a bra with it because you would see the straps. If you are curvy like me it makes your self conscious areas more visible. Although I received many compliments, I didn’t feel like I knocked it out of the park with this gown.

This was my backup dress and I’m so glad it was! The dress hugged my curves but the dark color minimized faults. I’m pretty big in the chest so had to go with a demi bra, and it worked great. Shoulders didn’t slip around and show the straps. Also showed off my bust quite a bit but multiple friends told me it wasn’t too much. (I asked a lot because I felt a little uncomfortable, so might be something to keep in mind if you’re more conservative.). The material was very comfortable. I wore 3 inch heels and it was still pretty long, resting about an inch onto the floor. I think I could have gone with Regular with lower heels and been fine.
Dress was super comfortable and flattering. Perfect length for me at 5'3 with heels. It's very simple, so you'll need some jewelry to give it some extra jazz. Hugged my curves the right way!

links_reviews_title: Very elegant dress. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I find it extremely difficult to find dresses that really compliment my style at 55 years old. This dress knocked it out of the park. The cut is really quite simple. It has just the right amount of sexy with a nice neckline and a shape hugging line. I did use spanx and a strapless bra to "hold things together". The fit is true to size, and the material has good substance to it and is comfortable. Since I am 5'3 I did have a problem with the dress being a tad long.
I felt sexy and glamorous in this dress. I wore spanx but not entirely needed as the material is thick and all looked smooth. Lots of compliments on this one.
The dress fit amazing! I was nervous because I'm pregnant but being able to get 2 sizes really helped. I got so many compliments on the dress. I can't wait to rent another one.

I wore this dress to a formal wedding. The fabric was beautiful, slightly stretchy and relatively thick. I couldn't wear a regular bra, like some reviewers did, since the straps showed. So I was able to just wear silicon nipple covers, and the dress was structured enough to support me. It is very fitted, and I couldn't wear my spanks because it created a noticeable line where the spanks ended around my belly. I would recommend getting the spanks that go up really high to avoid this. Overall I really liked the dress and felt very comfortable wearing it. I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress if my postpartum body.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! Simple,elegant, with a gorgeous neckline. I am 4 months postpartum so I wanted something forgiving in the waist. The fabric is sturdy and lined. I loved the cap sleeve and the neckline was low enough I could pump during the event. Only cons was it was a little big through the shoulders. I probably would have sizes down one.

links_reviews_title: Perfect - if not slightly daring - answer to the black tie blues
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and received a lot of compliments. There aren't usually a lot of options for floor length gowns for us shorties. This was probably about an inch too long even with my 4" heels but I was able to manage. The neckline is what makes this dress. It is a bit daring. I was surprised when I read other reviews that they were able to wear bras. I did not own one that could have stayed hidden. It definitely helped keep my posture in check!

This dress looks much better on than it does on the hanger. It's dark navy blue, not black. I didn't choose this dress, it wasn't even my just in case choice, the RTR stylist chose it for me when my order didn't come back in time. I never would have chosen it from the picture, but I felt classic and elegant in it, it was perfectly appropriate for the event. I thought it was really tight, but it's pretty stretchy, so it was comfortable. I'd say it runs small, but it gave me curves I don't really have! It was long, but a little tape in the front worked fine.

links_reviews_title: The neckline and color was classic and on point. Not too much cleavage but some!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful in color and fit. It did have some stretch, but not too much...it still held me in. I would highly recommend...very classic.

links_reviews_title: I felt so glamorous all night long.
links_reviews_text: The size 2L fit like a glove. The material felt so soft almost like silk. The only downside was it was a little low cut in the front. I was on the dance floor all night at a black tie wedding and found that I kept pulling the front up. Other than that I loved the dress so much and got so many compliments.
great fit. unable to wear bra as straps showed. wore 4" heels to ensure train in back did not drag too much. very comfortable, flattering.

I wore this dress to my boyfriend's Air Force pilot training graduation and wing pinning. I comfortably wore this dress for 7 hours. The top was a little big on me but I am small in the chest area. I wore a bra and it helped a lot. I got a long size and the length was perfect for me. The overall fit was very nice. I am definitely going to be renting a dress form RTR again.

I absolutely LOVED the style of this dress. But unfortunately I had to wear my back up style instead of this one, as it was just too tight. I'm 189 pounds, 5'5", and a 34HH. In this photo I'm wearing a regular bra (though I probably would have had to use tape to keep it covered if I'd have worn this, maybe just because it's too small) and the Spanx higher power shorts in a size XL. I loved this style, the weight, the cut...but it was just too tight. I think a 16R would have been great. (I ended up wearing another dress from RTR and it was a 14R with plenty of room.)

I wore this dress to my stepdaughter's wedding. I'm usually a size 8 and the 10 fit perfectly. This is a very flattering, form-fitting dress that made me feel beautiful. At 5''8", I ordered the long, but then had to wear 3" heels. I would have been more comfortable in the regular with a shorter heel. I didn't rate the dress the full 5 stars because it was a tad too low cut for me, but my husband, of course loved it! The dress works with a regular bra, but you may have to tape the straps to the dress to keep them from showing.

links_reviews_title: Wedding at the Ritz - back up dress won
links_reviews_text: This dress is super plain (in a good way - think statement jewelry) with a fun neckline. Ultimately I ended up wearing my back up dress because it felt too good to pass up but wish I had gone with this one. At 5'7 this dress would have been a smidge short with heels I think. Neckline is fun but a little risky if you are well endowed and prefer a conservative look. Fit was true to size but the dress is meant to fit you close - still a flattering look.

links_reviews_title: This was a lovely dress to wear. Very simple and classic.
links_reviews_text: I wore this gown to an ROTC Navy/Marine Corp Birthday Ball. This dress is a form fitting for sure. I have a small little tummy and I am not self conscience of it because I am a curvy women. I ordered 6R and 8R as my back up because it recommended ordering a size up as my back up dress. Wonderful gown, received several complements. I am 5' 5" and was about 140ish pounds when I wore this gown. I think I wore about 2 and half inch heels with the dress and it fit perfectly. I am large busted, 32DD, so it definitely highlighted my chest but there was no slight so I thought that was ok. Overall, I would definitely rent this again if I had another important formal occasion to go to. The only thing I had an issue with, but I figured it would be an issue when I rented the dress because of the cap sleeves, is that it is hard to lift your arms up all the way due to the sleeves. But if you aren't a huge dancer then the arms thing won't bother you. But when I went to go dance I could raise my arms up all the way.

I have a *really* large chest, so finding a dress that fits everywhere is a challenge. This one was outstanding! The best part was being able to wear a regular bra with it. SO many formal dresses are strapless and/or backless, and with a chest like mine, that just won't work. It looked fantastic on, and I didn't even have to bother with Spanx.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a fancy night out
links_reviews_text: Rented for Navy Dining Out. Material has gorgeous drape and falls beautifully. The neckline is killer; classy and sexy at the same time. I'm 5'1" so I knew the dress would be long but I pulled it off with 4 1/2" heels. Easy to wear with any bra. Felt fabulous all night. This was my first rental and I'll definitely be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Rainy wedding day in N. Carolina, but this dress carried me through!
links_reviews_text: This was my back-up dress, but it was a nice replacement! Usually a size 8, I nearly panicked after accidentally ordering a 6 and 8 rather than 8 and 10. Luckily the 8 fit well enough (very form fitting) and I felt more comfortable throughout the day. I definitely would have preferred a 10 though. I wore 3 inch heels to add to my 5'3 height and still struggled with a small 1/2 inch of extra material when going up or down stairs. At first I was really nervous because the neckline was more revealing than I anticipated, but, again, I became more comfortable with it throughout the day. I skipped the bra to avoid dealing with the lines and straps that showed. The dress also shows underwear lines so make sure to find a no-show pair! I really appreciated the cap sleeve which forced me to sit up straight! Finally, the bride was super relaxed about the bridesmaid's dresses and we went with Navy and found our own way; this dress was luckily a true Navy and we looked like we shopped together!

This dress was absolutely perfect for the occasion. I was standing on the groom's side of the bridal party, they were wearing navy suits, the color and cut of this gown worked perfectly. Form fitting and feminine, yet simple and tailored enough to match menswear. It was super comfortable, wore it all day and night with no complaints.

links_reviews_title: Rented the dress for a Gala.
links_reviews_text: Rented a 12R and a 14R for the event. I'm normally a solid 12 however, the 12 was tight. I ended up wearing the 14R to have some comfort during the night. The dress was the perfect length with heels for my 5'4" frame.
I loved this dress. So comfortable and perfect for a mountain wedding. I was able to wear a strapless bra and Spanx. The silky material felt great and I got a lot of compliments on the dress.
The straps and chest felt a little weird and required some adjusting of the straps. Otherwise perfect dress- great quality, pretty colors!

links_reviews_title: Dress is butter. In the best way!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress - so I bought it. Subtly sexy! I discovered after this photo that the straps were adjustable - which helped the sorta awkward bulge around my bust. And yes - I won that trophy in a tennis tournament!

Fit true to size but the fit in the chest was just crazy odd. Adjustable straps so it really seems like it should have worked but you def couldn't wear a bra with it (see pics, that beige in the middle is my strapless showing. Also the top was tied in the middle but the top of each neckline laid wrong and flipped down- making it look cheaper. I will say the fabric was so light and great feeling. I was bummed I couldn't wear.

I really, really wish this dress had more a normal bust-line/cut. The fabric is like butter, so light and comfortable. The length of the dress falls very well, but the top was just so awkward. I adjusted the straps as best I could but you can't really wear a normal bra with this, and even without a bra, your cleavage will be weirdly shaped and unsupported. It's too bad I won't be able to wear this.

The dress felt so comfortable and pretty. Love the elastic waist and adjustable straps. Usually I don't like polyester but this material felt really nice and smooth. Probably would work best with no bra or paste ons because there is a hole underneath the bow so probably difficult to wear a strapless bra without it showing. I bought it!
Runs VERY large in the chest, and rather small around the hips. Ended up not being able to wear it.
Very thin material
Fit was not great on the top. The tie in front showed too much cleavage

This dress was perfect for the event I attended. I am 5'1" 190 36B and I wore a 14. It was perfectly fitted in the chest and waist, but just a tad large in the shoulders and a smidge longer on me than I would have liked. Overall, it was a great dress though.
The dress was a little snug around my ribs but other wise it was fantastic. It fit in the right places.

links_reviews_title: My 14 year old daughter wore this to her Cheer Banquet.
links_reviews_text: It was a perfect fit! It was classy and stylish. My daughter received lots of compliments. I cannot wait to order again for our next event!

The dress was a hit and I received so many compliments. A little snug through the mid section so if you are between sizes I recommend going up. I consider myself athletic and I have broader shoulders. The cold shoulder was my favorite part of the dress but also reduced the mobility of my arms/shoulders since the fabric is woven. Overall I loved the dress and would wear again.
This dress was beautiful! I was getting compliments all night. I had to have a size ten shipped to be overnight, that was painless and I think it's an amazing accommodation.

This dress is incredibly flattering. I got tons of compliments all night. I wore it to a September wedding and then out to bars after the wedding. People were stopping me to tell me how much they loved the dress. Perfect for ladies with curves.

At first try on this wasn't my favorite rental, but once I was in it and ready to go it was a fun dress and my moms favorite that she has seen me rent that I wore to a Date night/work event. A little loose, but that made it comfortable to wear. The skirt was very fun and I liked the shoulder detail, though wouldn't want to wear this for a night out dancing as lifting your arms is hard.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress just wish there were more like it
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, I feel like I usually hate how things like this look on me but I felt confident all night and was complimented often

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress for outside party.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Some reviewers said that the off the shoulder strap got in the way but it did not bug me at all. Fabric was thick so bra straps and lines were smoothed out. Great dress definitely recommend.
Got a lot of complements! Went up a size because arms were too tight

I felt so beautiful in this dress and I was getting compliments on it the whole night! This dress really flattered my figure, I felt like it was made for me. I LOVE to dance, and the arm-sleeves restrained my arms a little bit, but I wouldn't let that discourage you from getting the dress.
So adorable! I loved it! I am a 34DD though and so I found the chest part snug.

Rented this for a sorority reunion party. It was pretty tight on my bust and stomach and I had to wear spanx. It was also way shorter than I'm used to but that's my problem. It's very cute and matched my sorority colors tho so I had to rent it!

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of special
links_reviews_text: The little antique gold accent in the bottom - and the cold shoulder detailing on top - make this navy party dress just the right amount of special... while also being conservative. I got so many compliments (from strangers!) that I'll definitely rent this one again!

Not my favorite rental. Kind of felt like a tween party dress. I have a long torso and am 5'7" so this was too short in the bodice and ended up flaring out higher than my waist. The 0 fit better but was even shorter in the bodice and length so i went with the 2. Comfortable and pretty easy to wear. Not flattering on me but this would be great to hide a belly or bulges. This is warm so it would make a great cold-weather dress. Got compliments on it but for me, there was no "wow" factor. Can wear a regular bra.

links_reviews_title: Fun with a Pop of Unique-Restrictive on the Dance Floor
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for an early spring wedding... the pop of gold added just enough uniqueness while still feeling classy. Was a bit disappointed that the fabric has zero give and wouldn't allow me to lift my arms up much past shoulder height-restrictive on the dance floor! Would rent again but would consider sizing up for this reason. And yes, that is an alpaca wedding reception greeter!

links_reviews_title: Very Flattering for my mom belly!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me great in all the right places! Cute and flirty and hides my mom belly very well. Loved the material and the gold accent at the bottom was so pretty!! Since I got this in a size up and it fit so well I said it runs small, but I did not try my true size.

Loved this dress. It was so flattering but also left room for my tummy to grow while eating dinner. :) It was so comfortable - I loved that I didn't need to worry about what kind of bra I was going to wear. I am pear shaped and this is not tight at all around the thighs, so it was super easy for me to wear. The only restriction I experienced was not being able to lift my arms up very high. Would definitely wear again/recommend!!!

links_reviews_title: Fun wedding and the dress fit right in with wedding colors.
links_reviews_text: I am very glad I had the backup size. I ordered an 8 and a 10 which I considered standard sizing for me but the 10 was all that fit and really not without a deep breath to get it zipped. I went with no bra because it wasn't necessary, plus I didn't have the room. I'm 5'7 (just about), 150 lbs, and double D cup. I should have read the reviews better in deciding which size is best for me. I read a lot that said the arms were constricting but I didn't have any troubles. I chose this color based on the wedding colors (navy, gold and burgundy). I loved the dress so much. I received a lot of compliments on it throughout the night. If I had it to do over I would most definitely pick it again.
I wore this dress for Valentines Day dinner, and it it was perfect. Super comfortable, flattering length and forgiving material.

Beautiful color and metallic detail!! I loved the fit and flare and how thick the fabric was. This dress definitely runs very small so I would go one size up from your normal. Works well for small busts. Arms are tight and do not stretch. Alhough both the 8 and 10 fit, I felt like I could move more in the 10.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments and the dress felt amazing to wear!
links_reviews_text: #beautiful #stunning #danceable

I absolutely loved this dress! I originally ordered a size 0 and ended up wearing a size 2 just to have a little more space in my arms. Both fit very well and did exactly what I wanted for my figure. The fabric is a little "thicker" therefor allowing for any imperfections to be hidden by the beauty of the dress. The wedding I attended was at a ranch, outside in the humidity and this allowed me to breathe and yet be comfortable in the temperature changes. It was the best I have felt in a dress in a long time! Needless to say, LOTS of compliments!

Wore with gold earrings and nude shoes. Dress was great thicker material and underlay detail was a great accent. Fit well however the sleeves make you feel like a T-Rex. Dancing was hard but twirling looked great with the fuller skirt. Also do not recommend wearing a strapless bra- mine fell often through the night and it was difficult to adjust back into place with the dress on.
I like this dress, it's very cute. Dressy without being too formal. It is a little restricting though due to the sleeves - couldn't lift my arms over my head. Just keep that in mind.

This dress was beautiful. It ran slightly small but was very flattering. My only complaint was that due to the cut out, stiff, sleeve I was not able to lift my arms above my shoulders. It was manageable but I had a hard time dancing to shout!

I wore this dress to a winter holiday party. It was adorable, flattering, had the perfect amount of flounce, and the gold was fun! I'm short and dresses tend to run a little big on me, but this one fit really well! I'd definitely recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, very comfortable, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9" so I was worried it would be too short but ended up being the perfect length! I wore this to a work Christmas party and got tons of compliments! I didnt have any trouble with the "cap sleeves" and was very comfortable. I typically wear a size 8 but it was a little tight around the rib cage so I definitely recommend getting the extra size up.
Fit great! The navy blue is classic, but the gold makes it feel extra special. Loved it! Can't wait to rent more!!

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress that got lots of compliments- would get again
links_reviews_text: Maybe not for busty women- more on that after my praise. I wore this to a wedding that was on the higher end of fancy that had a mixture of attires and felt great in it (and was told I looked great by lots of folks ;) ). I feel like this dress is one of those magical ones that at any event you wouldn't feel too dressed down or up. The shape was very flattering and most importantly, I could dance. Now to my bust warning- it's tight. I wear mostly size 6/medium dresses, but depending on the brand wear 8 sometimes and rarely ever a large (looking at you, Asian brands), and am an optimistic B cup. The 6 was a bust at the bust and I forwent a bra in the 8 to get a slight bit more room to breathe. It wasn't *un*comfortable, but I wanted to a least give a warning of consideration with those with larger chests.

I received tones of compliments from strangers throughout the party. I was still able to dance and didn't feel like the sleeves were too in the way like other reviews mentioned. Wore with blue tights and blue heels and gray silver clutch with simple gold earrings. FUN PARTY DRESS!

links_reviews_title: Nice but hard to get on and off by self
links_reviews_text: This dress was pretty and comfy. A little tight around arm bands and super hard to get on and off by yourself. Make sure you have someone to help.

I received compliments from everyone. It fit well and was easy to move in. The only thing I would say is it doesn't allow for a lot of overhead reaching (if you're planning on dancing). But overall I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to dance the night away in
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfortable and chic. It was perfect for a wedding that was in between a cocktail and formal dress code. I received numerous compliments throughout the night about it, and I could not be happier with how it fit. It fits TTS in my opinion, and since I'm short it is hit me just below the knee.

I rented this for my 15-year-old daughter to wear to a theater event. She's 5'4" tall and 100lbs, and the size 0 fit her beautifully (maybe a tad big). She loved the cold shoulder sleeves and gold detail at the bottom, and was excited that it twirled. She had no complaints about the fabric, zipper, or any aspect of it, and desperately wanted me to buy it for her. She would rent again!

This is my second time renting with RTR. I chose this dress to match my husband's suit. The sizing on this dress run small so I sized up but I still loved wearing it! Just ordered a 3rd rental dress for an event this coming Sunday! :D

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a nice outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: Overall I really liked this dress. It was cute and comfortable. Good length for someone shorter-didn't hit in a strange place. I was in between sizes so picked the larger and glad I did. Only drawbacks were the material can make you hot and the bottom of the zipper made a bit of a tent near the bum instead of laying flat. But overall really cute and had lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: First RTR dress and it was a success! Easy and Hassel free and super cute!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress! It was a perfect dress for a fall wedding. Many compliments! I ordered two sizes, 6 & 8 and I ended up wearing the 8. The dress material is not stretchy so it was nice to have a little bit of room on the arms and chest area wearing the size 8.

links_reviews_title: Love the color of it! It was perfect for fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5 feet 2 inches and it fit me perfectly.

It was a bit tight in the bust (but I'm busty). I loved the sweetheart cut. I could wear a regular bra with it the slit in the front allowed for movement while providing a sexy quality that was perfect for date night. I loved this dress and would totally rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Worn for graduation, this dress was perfect.
Great dress with just the right amount of sexy but also comfort
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a dinner auction at daughters private catholic school. I'm young so don't wanna look too stuffy but need to be classy. This dress was perfect for the occasion. It was a cute, comfortable black dress that had a great neck line if you like a fair amount of cleavage without the girls falling out! Sat at about my knee. True to size (I'm usually an 8 so got 8 and 10 but was thrilled to fit comfy in the 8). Also love that material has some thickness to it- couldn't see pantyhose lines or bra lines anywhere.

Great LBD. Worn to an evening work function. Easy to dress up or more conservative as needed. Thick material with some stretch. Neckline adds nice detail yet not too revealing. I was able to wear a normal bra. Great for tall girls (I'm 5'10") Not too short! Would rent again!
I'm about 5'7, 140 pounds, size 6 worked perfectly for me. Love the unique neckline. Wore this for a wedding rehearsal dinner.

links_reviews_title: This dress looks cute but don't move in it.
links_reviews_text: I am typically an 8/10 and wore the size 10. This fit nicely and looked really cut but the seam for the center of the dress kept moving to one side and shifting. I had to keep pulling the dress down and twisting it while wearing it. I ended up changing. Wore this for NYE party and it looked nice, love the neckline but did not like how it fit.

This dress was a great little black dress with some sexiness to it. Loved how thick the material was. I had one issue with the dress and it was the bottom hemline (which seemed to be the theme with my RTR order this time). It seemed to be winkle and bunching at the bottom and I thought maybe it was the slip underneath. I couldn't get it to dewrinkle or lay flat. The back kept bunching weird on the bottom but I had to wear it as the other dress was too worn. Otherwise great dress and if the bottom had been normal I would rent again. I will say for others with a large bust it held up nice, a little cleavage but not too much or too uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: The perfect LBD which hugs the curves just perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a luxury magazine affair. There were about a hundred other LBDs but I felt great in mine! The zipper was easy (no catch), the shoulders weren't too snug, beautiful neckline. The fabric was a little stretchy (but a thick enough, comfortabe material) so I was even able to fully bend my knees. It did wrinkle in the bag near the bottom when it arrived, but my curves got rid of them. ;) I would want to keep this as a staple in my wardrobe.

links_reviews_title: It was a very nice dress. Fit well. Received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Nice material. Sexy but not too sexy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful neckline but snug in tummy.
links_reviews_text: I really wanted a black dress for my friend's rehearsal dinner. This dress had a great neckline and wasn't too short. It was snug in the middle which made me feel uncomfortable, but I had no other choice.

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong with a LBD!
links_reviews_text: Dress was comfortable and flattering!

The dress was perfect. It was classy enough but still sexy and femine. I was comfortable all night and received many compliments, especially about the unique neck line. I would wear this dress again and again.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this LBD!! It seems like such a simple dress, but it exceeded my expectations and is one of my favorite rentals so far! Wore it to my mom's rehearsal dinner and it was perfectly classy. The neckline definitely makes it stand out. I'm currently 145lb and, although both the 8 and 10 fit, I decided to go with the 10.

links_reviews_title: Was my second option but i felt amazing in it! So i wore it.
links_reviews_text: PROS: fits every curvy, but still classy with the lenght and cut of the dress. CONS: really none

This dress is by far my favorite rental. It was comfortable, flattering and perfect for the occasion. Many of the dresses ive rented looked nice but had an issue or two (too tight in the arms, wasn't flattering in person, weird fit etc) but this one was absolutely perfect. I would buy it if i could!
This dress fit a little big so I went with my smaller size. Probably could have gone down another. The neckline is very unique, I received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my nursing school graduation! So comfortable and fit amazingly!
links_reviews_text: The neck line is beautiful! It also fit really well and was super comfy and stretchy and not too tight. Wore it to my nursing school graduation and it was a perfect blend of sexy and professional! I would rent this dress again any day!

links_reviews_title: I needed a simple dress that was appropriate for a family wedding. This was spot on.
links_reviews_text: This dress was form fitting, sexy without being over the top. Accommodates a large chest without feeling overexposed.

links_reviews_title: I want to buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress! It fit perfectly and had awesome stretch to it so you could breathe and move. It was so flattering and classy, I will be renting again for sure!!!
I loved this dress! It was a good length for me (5'2") and fell right at the knee. The textured fabric stretches a little, but not too much. You can wear a regular bra with this dress.

I loved this dress. I rented it for a very nice wedding in New Orleans. It fit well, and the material was comfortable. An old man pulled me to the side and asked me if I was a movie star. I'm not sure I looked THAT fantastic, but I was happy for the compliment.

I loved this dress! It fit perfectly and was the perfect LBD. I wore it to a fraternity formal on a dinner cruise. I would rent this dress again, if I don't find a way to buy it first. (Not pictured burgundy heels for s fun pop of color!)

Needed a solid black dress with a bit of cleavage for a wedding. It was a bit tight in the hips, which made it difficult to sit down and stand up throughout the ceremony. Received many many compliments on the overall shape of the piece!

I felt like this dress ran a little small, but I have a larger chest and wide hips so that might be why. I usually wear a 4 or a 6 in dresses, but I ordered the 6 and 8 in this dress and went with the 8 for comfort. I loved that I could wear a regular bra with this and I also wore Spanx for a little extra cinching, but they were definitely not necessary. The slit in the middle was the only somewhat down part about this dress, but once you get used to it and remember its there it isn't a problem.

I loved the dress and the material. My only complaint was that the bottom of the dress was stretched out in one spot causing the dress to bulge a bit. It was as if someone had the dress tightly over their knee, while sitting cross legged, for an extended amount of time. I was able to work around it though and would rent the dress again

I wore this dress to a graduation event. It was absolutely perfect for the occasion. The hemline and neckline were conservative enough to look classy, but the sweetheart neckline also gave it a little flair. The material was great and it was incredibly comfortable. The straps will also work well with a regular bra. I preferred to wear the dress with shapewear.
