It was great! The neckline was very flattering. The dress is lined. The material is textured and comfortable. I wore this for my husband's graduation.

links_reviews_title: Great balance between conservative and flattering!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a gala event where my boyfriends whole extended family would be. This dress was very flattering and hugged all of the right places without being too showy. The design is simple and elegant for an event where you don't want / need to be the center of attention. I usually am in between a 4 and 6, but the 4 fit better in this dress for me. I really liked the thick fabric of the dress, it felt high quality. Overall great dress!

The dress fit amazingly. I normally get self conscious about my stomach and legs, but the dress was super flattering and gave me an hour glass figure in appearance. The only issue I had was that the dress kept shifting to one side and needed to be fixed. Overall, I really enjoyed this dress.

This dress was comfortable and easy to dance in. I had rented a different dress but it didn't look right on me so I rented this instead. I really didn't want to wear black but I felt amazing in this! Its not too low-cut so those of us with a bigger chest needn't feel exposed- gave just the right amount of cleavage. Lots of compliments too!

I wore this to a winter/evening wedding on the East Coast. It was a safe dress, but the neckline is definitely unique and it was overall very flattering. I got a few compliments on it. I usually wear a size 0. The smallest this dress comes in is a 2. It was very big for a 2- both in the bust and waist. I had to wear a super padded bra plus gel boobs. Ultimately my boobs were a C-D cup (I'm actually a 32A-B) just to fill the dress and make it fit right. The waist was a little loose too so I added a black belt on the day of the event which helped add more shape. It would have been ok without it, but I like to have dresses tight on my waist. The length was good and the slit in front was cute. I danced all night without it ever being uncomfortable.

Loved, loved this LBD! The neckline is so unique and I got plenty of compliments on it! I did have to wear a size larger than normal because the size I normally wear was a little too-form fitting for my taste. But overall, definitely felt beautiful wearing the dress!
Dress fit like a glove. Comfortable, easy to move in and fits in all the right places. I am a bit of a curvy girl and it accentuated everything flawlessly.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and classy, matches everything!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I wanted a LBD for a Christmas office party and this was perfect. Very comfortable and not too tight (especially given that I have wider hips). The neckline was unique and created a little extra wow factor. I paired this with black heels and silver drop earrings, but this could easily be paired with any accessories or colors. My husband said it was sexy, but it was also modest and appropriate enough for an office party. Highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Basic little black dress was just right for the fundraiser cocktail party I attended.
links_reviews_text: The neckline is flattering. Fitted through the waist and hips.

Could have fit into the 4 or 6, I liked the tightness of the 4 better though. This dress is classic! When I got it in the mail I was worried I was going to look like I was attending a funeral but i received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove, but was comfortable and a bit stretchy. Fabulous style!
links_reviews_text: Also loved that it was knee length!
Fabric was thick which I liked because the dress wasn't flimsy. Very structured and snug fitting.

links_reviews_title: As the maid of honor, I wanted to feel like a knockout: this dress was perfect! My bride was proud!
links_reviews_text: My backup was an 8 because I'd been working out a little. The 10 fit beautifully, though, and had a small bit of stretch in the fabric. It's a lovely dress and I received compliments all night! I have 0 cons, only pros: this is my first of many outfits from this company! Thank you so much!
Love the fabric- thicker than I expected but with a lot of stretch. Danced the night away in this dress and it looked great the whole time. Slimming but not too tight. Would order again!

I wore this to a Moroccan themed, black tie holiday party and it was a hit! The cape was perfect and the color was amazing. I'm typically closer to a 4 but there was only a 2P left so I went with it, it was snug but very comfortable and flattering. Received compliments all night!
Great dress for a formal affair that didn't feel maternity like. Was very long on my short frame but fit great.

I would absolutely rent this again. It fits true to size. I'm not quite a 4 but ended up wearing it. It was loose in some parts. Got tons of compliments and the cape came in handy when it got chilly out. It's fairly thick but it wasn't overwhelmingly hot.
I received so many compliments on this dress. It is unique and flattering and the color is beautiful. It stands out in a sea of dresses.
So many compliments on this dress, and it fit true to size. Wasn't tight in the bust which is usually my issue in formal gowns. Just perfect. Glad I ordered the long, it was perfect with 2.5" heels.

links_reviews_title: This jewel tone stands out in a room full of black dresses.
links_reviews_text: This gown was a hit for the charity gala! Fun to float around the room in and so many compliments. The color is a head turner, kinda peacock blue. I almost didn't get to wear it because it was too big but with the help of a safety pin and some double stick tape I avoided a wardrobe malfunction and went with it. I did trying getting a replacement but unfortunately when it came it was a 12L. At 5'2" with 3" heels the petite was still a little long. Still enjoyed getting dressed up! Thanks for the glam RTR.

links_reviews_title: Felt comfortable, yet attractive wearing this gown at a local hospital gala in February.
links_reviews_text: With just having a baby in December, I chose a dress that was more forgiving. Generally I wear a size 10, but selected the 12L and 14P, just in case. Surprisingly, I had extra room wearing the size 12. The fit was comfortable, yet structured to give a silhouette. The cape added a dramatic aesthetic to the whole look, which I LOVED!

A simply stunning gown! The color is fabulous. The fabric is a great weight, lays nicely, and the cape/train adds something special. I am 5'6", wore a 2L with four inch heels, and the skirt just grazed the floor.

links_reviews_title: Lots compliments and fit well. Favorite was neckline cape on side. short frame need over 2 in heels
links_reviews_text: Glamorous, need over 2 in heels even in petite if only 5 ft

links_reviews_title: This dress was my back up dress. I love this dress. So comfortable and it flowed beautifully.
links_reviews_text: I'm thankful for the 2nd choice dress option and multi size. Both dresses were great but my first choice wasn't quit right for black tie. With the 2nd dress options I wasn't stuck with a bad pick. This dress is comfortable and elegant. Great service & I will use it again and again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and a perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: The 4L fit perfectly and I paired it with a stunning necklace.

Love love love this dress, the cape was easily the best part. It was nice and stretchy over my big old hips but maybe for the same reason was not great on my poochy belly. I would have liked the Long length but only the R was available on short notice so I had to wear flats to avoid weird gapping between the floor and the dress (I'm 5'4" for reference). Would recommend to anyone who loves a cape ;)

links_reviews_title: Attended a work holiday black tie optional party.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. It’s a stretchy but heavier material. I went with the smaller size to fit my chest even though it was more snug in the hips. Keep in mind the dress will show anything underneath if it’s snug. I received many compliments and double takes from people all night! Looks very elegant with an updo too!

links_reviews_title: Get ready for your grand entrance!
links_reviews_text: This dress is pure quality and style. The teal is an opulent, deep color of teal and the fit felt and looked custom. The material, lining, and cut are perfection (not to mention slimming). This dress made being the "belle of the ball" effortless. The most beautiful dress I've ever seen or worn! I wish I would've had it as my wedding gown! I am 5'6" and normally a size 8 in regular clothes and a 10 in "fancy" dresses. I wore the 10L. I liked having the extra length and did not have trouble tripping on it.
I wore this dress to an Indian wedding reception. I am usually a size 6, but I liked the snug fit of the size 4. It was beautiful, badass, and glamorous! I felt like a superhero with the cape.
Heavy material helps prevent wrinkles, a little long even with 3" heels for me

Fit very well (too long but all they had was the long) and the fabric was very forgiving. I think I could have gone with the 0 but all they had was 2L. I didn't end up wearing this because I felt the cape would be too much (I wanted a less "flashy" dress) but it made me feel gorgeous and I would rent again with the right size!

I rented this for our friends' formal Pakistani wedding and got a lot of compliments. It gives Old Hollywood vibes, which is exactly what I was looking for.. I paired with a black fur stole that went beautifully as well. It definitely screams for a statement necklace. The cape trails out behind when you walk, which is nice. This was a little tighter than I was wanting in the waist and thighs, but I do have thicker thighs and the 12L was like a potato sack on me. I also think I could have gone with the long with the 4 inch heels I was wearing because the regular was just touching the floor in flats.

I am 5'2" and I wore 4" heels with this dress and it worked out really well. I wasn't tripping over the dress at all BUT the little train did get stepped on quite a few times throughout the night. I wore spanks and my pudge wasn't super noticeable. LOVE THIS DRESS! Would definitely rent again in another color!

links_reviews_title: Disco Ball Fundraiser for the CPH. I thought the dress was Dynasty inspired.
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 10 and back up 12. Wore the 12. Felt more comfortable in my breast and stomach area. Beautiful color and the floor length cape was to die for. Dress was easy to ware and I felt fabulous.

Loved this dress and received many compliments! The cape made it so elegant. A little big in the armpit region, could have maybe gone one/half size down, but worked fine for one night. Didn't want to take it off!

I wore this to my husbands military ball. I absolutely loved this dress and wish I could have kept it! I wore the 14P and the fit and length were great. I am right at 5 foot 2. The color was amazing. It was a little loose around the shoulder area, but nothing a little adjusting couldn't fit. I felt amazing in this dress. Would definitely rent this again and recommend it! This was my first time using RTR and I was very satisfied!

Fits true to size, I'm 5'4" and 125lb, the 2R fit exactly as I wanted it too. I got so many compliments throughout the night, and I loved wearing a unique and dramatic dress that made a bold statement. It is bright and eye-catching amongst a sea of black and ballgowns! Everyone asked what designer I was wearing. I ended up pinning the cape a few inches onto my shoulder because I wanted a drape. It was not a necessary move at all, just personal preference! I loved this dress and would wear again! Definitely recommend!
Fabric is thick and heavy good quality over all. Beautiful teal color gies well with brooches. Very elegant design
Amazing, tight but still flowy gown! The cape was the best and added a little extra pizazz!

links_reviews_title: Felt elegant and got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2 to 4 in dresses, but had to size down to a 0 because this dress ran large. I do, however, like a snug fit. This dress was so beautiful. I kept telling my husband that I felt so "regal" and everyone kept telling me how stunning I looked! I even danced for hours in it. The only issue that I had with it is it was VERY long. Even after sizing down two sizes and wearing heals.
Rented this for a island formal themed work gala. It was beautiful, I reviewed so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Best dress I have ever worn
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a gala and I can't stress enough how amazing this dress is! It killed me to have to return it! Gorgeous dress and so comfortable to dance in! Glad I read the reviews and went with the long. The 4L fit perfectly, but wasn't quite long enough to wear high heels, but the dress was so beautiful I did not mind!

I cannot her over this dress!! I got compliments all night because this dress is just so amazing. The cape makes it so stylish and fun. I wore it to a Hindu wedding that was formal and extravagant and this dress fit in perfectly! This dress HIGHLIGHTS YOUR TUMMY so bring spanx and be warned! Stretchy material though so don't be afraid about not fitting! True to size! (I'm a 6 IRL and wore a 6 here). I'm 5'8" and wore with flat sandals and it hit the floor perfectly.

So as an unlimited/pregnant member, I had to go through a few sizes. But once I was able to nail down my size I feel in love with this gown. At 6 months pregnant (and I have a huge bump) this dress was very flattering. Great material and had a little stretch to it to accommodate curves. Does run long but I think my bump and my 5" heels helped me out. Overall I highly recommend this gown for both maternity and non maternity.

links_reviews_title: Felt like royalty in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 12L, I normally wear a 10. I was scared it would be tight in the hip area. The 12 was just perfect(maybe a tad loose). This dress is STUNNINLY GORGEOUS! Length was perfect with 3 inch heels.
Fitted absolutely perfectly! I would recommend this! Totally would wear again!

links_reviews_title: Loads of compliments will make you feel like a celebrity
links_reviews_text: I ended up using the 10L and it was just the right length. The back bottom of the dress had some weird staining on it when it arrived but no one noticed it. Paired it with a statement piece that went so well with it, people thought it came with the dress. I also didn't have to worry about it riding up, which was good as this was a church affair. Overall, I'd give this dress 4 thumbs up but since I only have 2 hands, I guess 2 will have to do!
The color of this dress is so pretty. I received so many compliments all night. Very comfortable, no complaints. Glad I ordered the 4L, the length was perfect with 3 inch heels.

Rented for a theater gala. This dress did not disappoint. Super comfortable, thick material (didn't arrive wrinkled, didn't wrinkle when I sat, able to wear spanx, but could have gone without). Beware of the train, though. Likely could have been solved by slightly higher heels on my part. Many compliments by friends and strangers all night!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress for a Formal Event
links_reviews_text: I felt like a princess! It fit beautifully. I am 5'9", have a hourglass figure, and am around 145 lbs. I received so many compliments. It was comfortable and elegant. The cape in the back MADE the dress. I didn't want to return it!!! I will definitely be renting this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Very comfortable and easy to wear. Should have ordered a 10R.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color, heavy fabric- very forgiving!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress... felt like a Goddess!
links_reviews_text: I. Loved. This. Dress. I got so many compliments - especially on the cape! I was a little skeptical of the site recommending the "L" length - I am 5'8", but I am so glad I went with what was recommended! I wore the dress with 3" heels and it hit the floor at just the right length. The dress has an inner liner which kept me warm but not too hot throughout the evening. If I owned this dress I would definitely wear it again!

The fit was great and dress was good quality. It did have a couple small stains along the very bottom but im sure were unable to be seen from others. I typically wear @ 26 in jeans and the 2 worked perfect. This was a great first experience with RTR and i got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: A standout piece in a sea of black!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color, great fit, lovely dress! I couldn't walk 10 feet without someone stopping to tell me how beautiful I looked, and I felt it! This is one of those unique pieces that you love to wear but people would remember if you wore it more than once. Love RTR! For my height, the long dragged just a little in heels which was perfect. Bonus: material is thick enough to be relatively warm! Ran a little big so I'm glad I got a smaller size as my backup. Rubber lining around the inside designed to keep it up flipped out a couple of times and was showing. I think it was designed for a bigger chest than mine. Overall, loved it!
I love this dress! It's form fitting with thick material. You will probably want to wear shape-wear with this dress.
Hugged my body perfectly! Bold floral is gorgeous. Thick stretchy material is ultra comfy.
Floral fitted dress. And has a ton of stretch. Nice flirty detail with the ruffle on the bottom.
Fit great- awesome fabric

Beautiful dress made of thick, stretchy, flattering fabric. Comfortable with a pretty summer/spring print. The material is a thick almost sweater like knit, so would be warm for hot daytime wear and the straps are a little long but still fit. Shows cleavage, so not a family/work dress, perfect for a date or bar. Happy I rented it!
The material is thick but I loved it!! Was well fitted and comfortable.
Pretty floral pattern with a bit of 80s vibe. Forgiving fabric. Hugs every curve. A bit low cut, so it requires a jacket or sweater for work.

links_reviews_title: Loved the print and the fabric
links_reviews_text: Very body conscious. But thick fabric. Still, don't eat too much while wearing it. Great length if you are tall. And I love the low scoop neck. It's hard to find dresses lately with that detail. Would totally rent again.
I loved everything about this dress. Hugs all the right curves. Received lots of compliments
Thick material, stretched perfectly. Perfect length to be work appropriate. A black blazer made it perfection. Would rent again!
The fabric was forgiving and thicker than expected. Loved the bottom ruffle! Paired with a jacket for work. Super cute.
Thick fabric. High quality dress.

links_reviews_title: having a dress I felt comfortable in
links_reviews_text: perfect fit, super comfortable & unique dress

I love the style of this dress but the fabric was heavy and the pattern was a little weird. The colors were pretty but the pattern looks "printed" onto the fabric versus woven into it. I didn't wear it.
Just didn't look flattering
Great color, fits well

links_reviews_title: The perfect blend of dressy but not too formal.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit and stretchy fabric was so comfy.

This dress is soooo adorable! I love Robby Kobo designs! Its very body con though, and if you have even the slightest hint of a tummy, you may want to pass, or wear Spanx. It does run small, so if you're a size 4/6, go with the medium. The length was not too long for my 5'4 height: came to just above knee
Love the fit and colors.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fabric but fit is for a long person
links_reviews_text: I really liked the fabric of the stress, it is substantial and the cut was a little bit different than a lot of dresses I have rented. However, I think this is made for someone with a really long torso. The neckline was just too low and the heavy fabric pulls it down. Too bad it didn't work.

links_reviews_title: beautiful pattern and material - loved this dress - will rent again
links_reviews_text: flattering fit

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, it was comfortable and great for a spring event.
links_reviews_text: I think this runs small, especially if you have any sort of a booty. I had to size up. The print is really pretty, love the color combo, and it is a comfortable thicker knit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I should have worn a Medium though.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable. The fabric is thick and a little stretchy. If I had realized the stretch, I would have worn a Medium as I normally would but I ordered a large trying to play it safe for the wedding. Because of it being a little big on me, the side with the ruching pulled down. Luckily, I had a bra the exact color of the dress which made it nearly impossible to tell. Overall, great dress. Just stay true to size.

links_reviews_title: Great from hips up but too long
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 2 or a 4 so I first rented this in a Small (2-4) but it was huge, so I got an XS (0-2) instead. It fit like a glove from the hips up, but the style is just too long on me (I'm 5'3") I ended up wearing it to work and jury duty, but in hindsight it wasn't really a work dress. One other thing to consider is the bra. I wore one that criss crosses so it wouldn't poke out the side. There are also snaps to hold your bra in place inside the dress.
Beautiful dress and lots of compliments! Right armpit hangs lower than left...a little strange but it worked since I wore a bra the same color. Your butt will look great in this dress!
Love this dress, which flatters an athletic figure. The knit is a touch too loose, but that was only a tiny issue. Great color and style.
Truly flattered my shape without being outrageous.
The shirred side of the dress is too heavy, causing the dress to pull down and expose bra
Fits great - made out of a high quality stretchy bandage material. Wore it to a work event and got so many compliments!
Great fitted dress but longer length makes it work appropriate. Can adjust slit with drawstring tie. Substantial knit fabric is very flattering.
very flattering fit and received many compliments

links_reviews_title: Rented for work as part of unlimited plan.
links_reviews_text: This is a cute dress for work. The ruffle and ruching make it a little special. I thought it ran really large though. I easily could have worn the XSR. It was fine as part of my unlimited plan, but nothing special to rent for an occasion.

links_reviews_title: I got this just because I liked it. It fit well and looked very professional.
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed this dress. Would rent again for a work outfit
knit MAterial, fit, stretch, length, tie on side

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable & the right mix of casual and dressy
links_reviews_text: I was able to adjust the touching on the side by tying the bottom. It's that heavier knit that holds weight and was super flattering. Definitely renting again.
Super cute, but runs small. I was able to squeeze in barely, but size up!
I was hesitant to try this but glad i did. It was perfect for a festival. I did have to sew myself into the buttons tho, bc it ran small and it popped between them.

I was skeptical after reading the reviews. So I went from S to M and I'm glad I did! It fits perfectly and I'm in obsession with it. Like other reviews said, it's probably not for girls with curves because the material gives minimal stretch. But it's very light weight and breathable which is perfect for a warmer day. It's a hit or miss for some people but definitely a hit for me.

The dress fit in length and all, but the busy had way too much extra room. If I leaned over my bra/boobs would hang out. Lots of extra fabric in waist area too. Not a good fit for me. I thought it would be more form fitting.
I liked this dress. My only complaint is that I wish it was a zipper instead of buttons

links_reviews_title: This dress is a dream! I wore to a date and to a wedding rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: I'm very tall and athletic and this dress was perfect for me. Showed off my neck and décolletage tastefully. I used safety pins to keep it from gaping in the chest area. I am so close to buying it for myself :)
Very comfortable and looked great with sneakers!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for brunch with friends on summer day.
links_reviews_text: It was perfect for walking around comfortably all day. It ran large though, should've gotten a size down.
A bit tight would size up next time to not stress the buttons
nice sundress

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not cut for women with curves
links_reviews_text: Way too tight in the chest even though it fit properly elsewhere

links_reviews_title: So pretty, not for a big chest
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty but unfortunately there is no give on the chest & the buttons were pulling, couldn't wear it. Everything else about this dress is perfect, even the length was great (thought it would be too long for my height).
tight around the chest area
For chestier/curvy women, I would reccomend sizing up.. Couldn't get the top button to close due to my breasts (size C34)

links_reviews_title: It is a beautiful dress to wear on a summer day!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, It was too tight for me in the bust area, I couldn't even button it up. I am a 6/8 in dresses so I had ordered a Medium regular.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small. Could not get dress on
links_reviews_text: Runs very small. Could not get dress on

this ran SUPER small!!! I usually wear a medium, occasionally a small, never a large. This medium was soooo tight I couldn't begin to get it buttoned in the front! I'm talking a 4" gap! I love the dress, I'm going to try it again in a large, but as off as the sizing seems, I'm not even sure that will be big enough.
Cute dress But zero stretch so not great for a curvy body. Would not button over my chest

This dress fit extremely oddly. It was very tight in the bust but loosely in the waist but then very tight again in the hips. I have a proportional hourglass figure which made the reasoning behind the dress cut even more strange. The buttons gapped badly when I sat down. The dress did lay smoothly with the buttons when I was standing, but that was it. Even if I had sized up, then I think it would have been too big and not accentuated my waist.
Love the print on this dress but unfortunately it was too small on me. Needed about 3 more inches of fabric so buttons could close. The next size up was a 3XL which is a long jump from XL.

links_reviews_title: I really liked the fit in this dress. It was great for a casual beach wedding
links_reviews_text: A nice casual dress

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my step daughter's graduation
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight through the chest so when seated, the buttons gapped and needed adjusting.

links_reviews_title: This is the perfect weight for a Florida Vacation. I would have worn it to an outside dinner party.
links_reviews_text: Light weight, just very small for me. I will reorder in another size. I would like to wear it on our Florida vacation and for a July pool party!
Small across bust

links_reviews_title: Very tight around the rip cage and bust line doesn't sit flat
links_reviews_text: Cute but not a good fit
The dress was big in the chest area but fit great though the torso. I had to pin it up top to make it work for me. Not ideal for the small chested

links_reviews_title: Way too small in the chest- order up a size or maybe even two
links_reviews_text: Cute idea, but way too small in top and absolutely no give to the material at all. Couldn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Love the print and quality of this dress!! So cute. Looks great with a denim jacket.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wear it though - it fits very small in the bust. I couldn't button it all the way up. (No picture of this reason!!). It fit great everywhere else. I fluctuate between small and medium in the dresses. I think I would have been fine in a medium. I will rent again when it becomes available in the next size up!

links_reviews_title: The pattern on the dress is incredible! Very unique.
links_reviews_text: I had originally ordered a medium and it didn't even fit over my chest (I'm a 34C and traditionally a medium). The large fit quite well (although a tad big). Ended up wearing it for Easter and it was perfect.
Fabric was almost like a stiff linen. Pattern cute, unfortunately unwearable for me. Appeared to fit like a straight size 14/16 ( I typically wear a 20).

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern. Not meant for woman with curves
links_reviews_text: It was a cute pattern and length especially with the center split. Would make a cute spring/summer occasion dress. This dress, sadly, is not meant for anyone with chest, mid section, and hips. You can't have any of those things if you want to wear this.
I'm typically an 18/2X. Rented this and it wouldn't even button. No stretch at all.
Nice turquoise color and beautiful cut. Nice material

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress, I contemplated buying it.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and form fitting. I also liked that I was able to wear it without a bra--it provided enough support. I got several compliments on it at a wedding. One thing that would prevent me from buying it is that it's so tight that I had to unzip it and pull it down to use the restroom. It was also a little hard to lift my leg to get in and out of cars. Would definitely wear it again though!
I'm glad I ordered a size up, because it felt like I had poured myself into it. But it fit nicely. I think this would work best for women with larger busts.

Really beautiful dress, gorgeous color and nicely cut. So dang small though! I'm normally a size 12 and with the other reviews I ordered at 14 and I could barely zip it. Like a second skin and a little more bombshell than I had planned.
I loved it! It didn't ride up while dancing, and also slowed me to eat all three courses lol. I usually wear a 0 but the 2 fit perfectly

Hugs beautifully, extremely well constructed. You can't wear a bra but the cups are really well built so even if you're large like me you feel perfectly confident. The straps have silicone strip lining so they stay up on your shoulders, a brilliant detail. Only a little stretch, so size up for sure, this runs small. Shows everything! I have a pierced navel and this dress actually showed the outline-- never happened with any other dress. Gentle spanx might smooth you out nicely here
Fit perfect

links_reviews_title: Hugs your curves but you won't be able to walk
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2 and sometimes a 4, the 4 for this dress was quite tight. I loved that it hugged my curves but it was so hard to bend over and sit because of how tight it was! Difficult even to walk in too. Definitely size up!! The color though is beautiful!! Perfect for a summer affair

The color is perfect for summer and the cutouts jazz up an otherwise very simple dress. You definitely can't wear a bra with this dress, but the material is thick and supportive, so it wasn't a problem. Will definitely rent again.
No stretch...had to go a size up.
Loved this dress and I wore it to a summer wedding. Lots of compliments. I’m 5’7, 145 pounds and thought the 10 would be plenty big but it was snug thank god for spanks :) Would wear again!
Fit perfectly and great quality! I got a ton of compliments.

I love LIKELY! The material is amazing and the dress hugged my body in the right places. I'm usually a 4, but I ordered a 6 because I wore this to a wedding and wanted to be able to eat and not feel like it was skin tight. The color is what makes this dress stand out. Loved it!
Such a cute dress! I wore it on a bff date night. So many compliments & it fit like a glove. I'm 5'8", 34-26-36.
Very form fitting dress, but I didn't wear it because it wouldn't zip at the chest. (I'm a 36 DD). If available I would have done a size up, but this was a replacement and there weren't many options.

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear this dress
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 or 6. I do have a bigger behind but this dress has NO GIVE at all. I had them send me an emergency overnight after neither size fit, and even the 10 was way too small. It was a cute dress but the sizing made me sad.
Hugged all the right places except for the busy area , straps were a little bit long for a smaller chest.
This dressed was listed under 3 trimester maternity options, but I couldn't fit into it in my second. Pre-pregnancy I was size 2, now I have been ordering size 4, whereas this dress was size 6.
small and tight

links_reviews_title: Fun color for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Silhouette is flattering; material is thick and forgiving; color looks great with tan skin and gold accessories for a summer wedding. No bra needed. Fabric doesn't wrinkle, wilt, or show sweat. I would say it runs true to size, but a little tight in the calves of all places, which made it difficult to walk in - I wish the slit in the back was slightly longer as that would have improved mobility for me. For this reason, I recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Runs small and the cutout is in an odd location - skip this one!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small and has zero stretch. I am a curvy girl so this is bad news for me. The peep hole is also in an awkward place. I thought, based on the pictures, I could wear a normal bra with this dress and that's a negative due to the location of the peep hole/cut-out. Color is pretty-ish but that is about it. No major redeeming qualities about this dress. Will have to swap and won't try a different size. Not my thing.

links_reviews_title: I wish I got to wear it!!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. Great quality and color. However, I'm in my third trimester, and this dress is NOT maternity even though it's listed as such. Too bad because it's beautiful!

I ordered this for a vineyard wedding but didn't wear it for that due to the cleavage and difficulty pinning. I wore it the following day wine tasting and immediately regretted not wearing it to the wedding the nite prior..oh well. Could probably wear without a bra, but didn't want a nip issue. My strapless bra showed a little in some pics due to low cut of the dress.
I had to safety pin the back and front because my boobs were OUT. That is my only complaint. It was a pretty color. The fabric was nice and soft and it wasn't heavy

I absolutely loved this dress! It's pink in person, not peach like in the picture. I sized down based on reviews, but went with the 4 over the 2 because it gave me a little more room. After some temporary alterations to close the very revealing neckline (I'm a 34DD), shorten the thin strap and take in the extra fabric gaping under the right armpit, this dress fit amazing! It's stretchy enough to hug your curves through the hips while still being super forgiving of panty lines. I was able to dance all evening without any adjusting! I wish I could buy this dress and permanently do the little alterations. I'll definitely consider renting this one again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but large up top
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but it was weirdly large in the chest. Had to use tape to keep it in the right spot but still looked a bit too big in the bust at certain angles.
This dress was absolutely gorgeous. I loved wearing it and felt beautiful in it. The bust area runs large, but that's nothing a little fashion tape can't fix. 10/10 would recommend!

The color in my opinion was more pink in person which I liked and the floral print was beautiful. It fit well on my tall frame, however it would've been nice if the straps were adjustable since they were a little loose. Overall it was great and I would rent again!
Weirdly large in the chest, but other than that I really liked this dress. Pretty low cut so I needed to use fashion tape to avoid nip slip. Overall, really liked and will rent again.
I didn't get to wear this but once I drop a few more lbs and feel a little more comfortable in my skin, I'm 100% renting this dress again! It fit perfectly, was flattering and so silky comfortable.
Pretty color and fabric felt nice but ended up not wearing due to it being too large.

links_reviews_title: Overall, it's a beautiful dress and print. I rented it for my birthday celebration in Napa.
links_reviews_text: I took a chance on this dress because when I rented it there were no reviews. I really wanted to love it, but the top half of the dress was HUGE. There was so much fabric on either side under the armpits so I had to use fashion tape to "take it in." The plunging neckline looked gorgeous, but I was so worried that I would accidentally fall right out of it. Unfortunately, I was pretty uncomfortable wearing it even though the dress itself is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Very flattering in all the right areas and an amazing color.
links_reviews_text: I did need to pin the chest area because it was a little large, but other than that the dress was perfect!!
I received so many compliments on this dress. It fits really well and the material is beautiful. My only complaint was that the straps were way too long and I had to pin them.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, nice fabric, but could not wear. Top too loose.
links_reviews_text: Body of the dress fit great but the straps are far too long that the chest is floppy and too loose.

I rented this dress for a sundress and linen party ; however, the dress was too big in the bust and didn't fit. The dress was beautiful and material nice so I was looking forward to wearing it. I rented an 8R and should have size down to a 6R but I done believe the 6R was available. If I get another opportunity to rent it again, I will because it really is beautiful in person.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress but was too big and could not wear. Would recommend sizing down
links_reviews_text: Nice material and pattern

The dress looked and fit so sexy until the chest. It was too low and too loose to wear without a bra- and without one, the slightest move could be a scandal! I have a large chest (36DDD) and It wasn’t even close to fitting. I love low cut items but this was too much unfortunately! The rest of the dress fit so well and was so flattering, i was bummed! I tried a safety pin but it was just too much of a gap for it to hold.

links_reviews_title: Top was far too large, and material felt very cheap. Not sure who this dress is made for.
links_reviews_text: Really wanted to like it, but didn't!

links_reviews_title: Large chest area and very low cut
links_reviews_text: Fabric was pretty. Sized down from usual size 6 to size 4 which was definitely necessary, but still too large in the chest area/too low cut for size 34dd chest. Did not end up wearing this dress.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress and would be perfect for a summer outing but would not rent again.
links_reviews_text: Pretty fabric and beautiful pattern but you need loads of fashion tape because the cut around the top isn’t right. It bubbles out on the sides leaving your boobs exposed if you’re not careful. When I sat I had to keep moving the straps. If it wasn’t for this would be a good dress.
Loved this dress! However, couldn't wear it because the bust area was EXTREMELY large.
Really big up top!

links_reviews_title: This should be a great dress, nice fabric, cute cut- but the chest area is hard to work out?
links_reviews_text: I rented the 12 and normally wear 12 it fit nicely everywhere except in the chest- it just sagged with an odd amount of fabric in the wrong places around the boobs and it's really really low cut so you can't put a bra or tank or anything underneath it? I so wanted to wear and just safety pin it somehow but I just couldn't figure out how to make it work- sadly had to return.
Beautiful and got lots of compliments. Had to safety pin the top and had to adjust all night.
pretty colors, high quality but the straps were long.

links_reviews_title: Very low cut and loose in the chest
links_reviews_text: My bust size is 32DD and a size 0 in this dress was too big in the bust! Also, it is very revealing. I didn't end up wearing it.
Usually wear a size 10 or 12. Needed to size up to the 12. The dress fits tight around my hips, emphasizing the stomach and butt areas. Would work will with a more slim figure!
The fabric is very shiny compared to what's pictured and the colors are not as pretty and vibrant. But the dress runs very large, especially the top. Probably 2 sizes too big in the top.
Chest area was way too big and loose. I normally wear 4, this was a size 2.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, meant for a larger chest
links_reviews_text: This was a very pretty dress, however I have a small chest (32B) and it was loose and gaping in an awkward way. The dress did fit my waist (27") and hips/butt (38") well.
Pretty dress, but I think I would have needed a 2 instead of a 4. Runs large.

The top runs HUGE--and I'm a 32D! It was laughable how large it was up top, and not in a cute drapey way, but in a really unflattering gaping-under-the-arms way. Material is also quite thin, and even though the top was gigantic the hips fit pretty tight and would have required spanx.

Not what I was expecting. I was hoping to wear this to a wedding in Miami but the chest area fit really big and hung down way too low. This also fell at a weird length for me since I'm only 4'11. The material is very thin similar to a slip dress.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this but had rented for work conference but got cancelled
links_reviews_text: Super cute, great coverage and appropriate length- not tight on arms, hugs just right (not too much) around hips but if u want it to hang like the model then get a size up. I'm usually size 8 or 10 with 34B and got a 10 and looked good and may even look better as 12? Good for work, conference, elegant showers or dinners
Loved wearing this dress. Color and details were beautiful, very Kate Middleton.
Exquisite design and royal blue. Not much give, though - Not the dress for a big dinner.
Great fit! Flattering material. Very happy!
Fit well, was very comfortable, and looked great. Received many compliments

Too pretty a dress to leave under a graduation robe for long. There was more give in the thighs than I expected based on reviews (I am a true 12 on bottom). Felt like I had plenty of room in the chest too. Good fit overall. Usually I wear just a little above the knee so this was a tad shorter than I usually sport. Fun dress to wear though!
Beautiful detail, lots of compliments on the dress.
This dress was stunning for our September engagement photos. The detailing on the dress photographed beautifully! I'm 5'4 and 118 lbs- The dress fit perfectly without being too snug.

I wore this for my husband's naturalization ceremony. The colors were perfect and the embroidery was bright. Perfect for the occasion. There is absolutely no stretch in the fabric, so I sized up to the 8. The difference between the 6 and the 8 seemed to be more in the width and not the length. Sometimes the larger size is too long, but this was not. Sad to send it back.

Chest was a little snug, I would recommend sizing up, perfect length and amazing detail! Tons of compliments (even on the photos) and I felt confident in my choice. Wore this to a charity auction event and loved it!
Very cute pattern. Wore with tights for winter
Got compliments all night on this dress. Fits true to size - highly recommended!!

Receive so many compliments on this dress. I have broad shoulders and a wide rib cage, and the 4 worked perfectly up top. There was room to spare in the waist and hips but the dress still laid beautifully so it was not an issue.

I LOVED this dress. The details and color were beautiful and the fit was very flattering. I wore the size 6 (backup size) since the 4 was too tight and I felt more comfortable in the 6. I would suggest sizing up especially if you have a bigger chest. I loved that I could wear a regular comfortable bra with this!

I received so many compliments on this dress! Perfect for the boathouse wedding I attended. I ordered my size and one size up but ended up wearing my size as the dress runs pretty true to size. It is not st all stretchy - so I'd recommend ordering like I did!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my niece's wedding that took place in a winery. Beautiful!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me like a glove. If you have a larger than 34B bust or hips larger than 36", you might want to order an 8. I have no complaints about this dress. It was perfect and I received many compliments.

This dress is so beautiful and unique, I've been wanting to rent it for awhile. The blue really pops against the white and the design is just gorgeous! When I first put the dress on, I regretting not getting the next size up because I am larger in my hips/thighs/booty and the dress is more fitted in that area. But I ended up being comfortable all night dancing at a wedding (with spanx!).

I was nervous before the dress came in because I have wider hips and smaller up top. I ended up wearing the 10 but both dresses fit, 10 was more comfortable for dancing. Was very comfortable, didn't have to worry about it wrinkling. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Casual Wedding in hot Chicago Summer
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress- the blue and white popped against each other. It was a perfect dress for a casual wedding and fit like a glove. I received so many compliments and it photographed beautifully! Very pleased!
Structured dress, very flattering. Gorgeous details

This fit like a glove and I normally wear a 10. I am 5'7", 155lb with an athletic build. I wear a 36B. If you have a larger chest, I am not sure how you will make this work but I would recommend going up a size. The design in the dress does all of the shaping for you. It was one of my favorite dresses from RTR.

This is my second time to rent this dress and I just adore it! I wore this for Mother's Day this second time around. The only size they had left was a 4. It was a tad loose on me, but not too noticeable. I wore the 2 the previous time. I am 5'3 and 115 lbs. I love the detail of the dress and it's super comfortable. I'm always sad when I have to return this dress.

Both the 0 and the 2 fit, but it seemed like the lining of the 2 was a bit more smooth and had cleaner lines. I love that you can wear regular undergarments with the dress. I thought it was a print when viewing online, but the blue is actually embroidery. I received tons of compliments. Looked into buying it online immediately afterward, but can't find my size available! :) For comparison purposes, I am 5 ft tall, 105 lbs, 34A and typically wear a size 0.

links_reviews_title: Simple and beautiful. Fairly comfortable and looks great!
links_reviews_text: I wore the 12 because I just felt more comfortable in it. It hugged all my curves and I was able to move and dance. It was a great length (I'm 5'4"). Overall I'm very happy with this dress!

This beauty fit like a glove and photographed so well. I wore it to an outdoor wedding on a pretty hot day and it didn't hold heat in like some dresses do. I got so many compliments on it and wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! Looks great in photos and in person.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a ceremony in a chapel and then to a reception that included cocktails, dinner, and dancing - it was great for all occasions. This dress doesn't have a lot of give, but it fit well. I could have worn either the 2 or the 4, but ultimately went with the 2. Usually I wear a 0 or 2. The length was perfect for a short girl like me! I loved this dress, but it did seem like it had been worn quite a few times before me. the blue detailing is thread embroidery, and a piece or two was not fully tacked on. The lining at the neckline was also visible, since it seemed to have lost a bit of its structure over time.

links_reviews_title: Stunning details and fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Wore this to a outdoor summer wedding, it was perfect. Originally ordered size 2 & 4, and about a week before I got an email that the 2 was unavailable. Worked out because the 4 fit perfectly! For reference, 5 ft 4 in and 125 lbs.

links_reviews_title: This dress was PERFECT for my engagement photos!
links_reviews_text: LOVE this dress. I ordered an 8 and 10 for my engagement photos and ended up wearing the 8 which fit like a glove. I have broad shoulders and was worried that the 8 would dig into my arms - the material does not have any stretch so it - the sleeves were a bit tight but I was was still comfortable enough and could raise my arms fine. This dress photographs beautifully, the pattern is super flattering!
I rented this dress for my niece’s baptism. I got so many compliments on it! It was very comfortable to move around in. I highly recommend this style!

This dress is gorgeous - I felt really pretty in it. The color is beautiful. Warning - I'm a 36G and needed to wear the 12 to get it to fit on top - and it was still tight. The bottom was very loose because of that, but overall, still looked decent. Definitely need to size up if you're large-busted. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: Fit very well, very nice material and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that fits true to size and still leaves room to dance!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. You do need to be careful with the zipper though because the crochet overlace runs right up against it making it easy to get caught. I was slightly worried about wearing a dress with so much white in it to a wedding but it didn't seem to be an issue to anyone else. It really is mostly blue. I'm always concerned about comfort at weddings because it's usually a long night filled with eating and dancing, and I had no issues in this dress!
This was my first RTR rental, and I felt great in this dress. It was comfortable, I was able to wear a regular bra, and it was very figure-flattering. I received several compliments.

Have had my eye on this dress for a while and finally had a good event to wear it to. It was comfortable, modest, and photographed well. I received several compliments. The only negative is that the zipper on both size dresses was impossible to get up and down on my own. I typically wear a 0 or 2, but the backup 2 wasn't available and the 4 fit with some wiggle room for a big meal so that is the size I went with.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blue and white dress. Rented for a sorority brunch
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size. A little short but very classy.
Went outside my comfort zone with this ornate dress! Got a ton of compliments. Runs true to size. Given it's shape, I'd say it was somewhat unforgiving though.

This dress runs true to size (I fluctuate between a 2 and 4 depending on the designer) and the 4 fit like a glove. The lace stitching showed wear and tear but overall was unnoticeable to anyone but myself. This dress turned out to be exactly what I expected from the photos: very classy and sophisticated.
Nice pop of color for photos. Didn't "cinch" at the waist as much as I would have liked, otherwise fit like a glove.
Worn to a baby shower, fits true to size however with the lace overlay there is no stretch or give so I ended up wearing the 4 instead of the 2 as it was more comfortable! I got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress perfect for my daughter's baptism.
links_reviews_text: I ordered both the 4 and 6. Usually a 4, but went with the 6 for comfort. Great dress for an in between seasons formal event.
I liked the concept but this would work better for a winter wedding rather than the summer wedding I was shopping for. Also I tried the 6 and I'm normally a 4 so it hung a little loose on me.

links_reviews_title: The color was the best part
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress on the site, I didn't realize until after the wedding when I saw pictures of the dress on me how short it was! I'm 5'5" and wore 2" heels and the dress was up to my ankles. I would have preferred it to go a little longer. So if you're on the fence about the length I'd recommend doing the longer length to achieve the right look. The dress fit wonderfully and I did get compliments on the style, just didn't love this dress like a few others I've worn.
I loved this dress and go so many compliments. From the fit to the color, it was perfect -- I can't remember what size I wore, I think 14

I loved the dress, it made me feel super slim! But, I have a large chest and wide hips, so it fit a little bit snug. I was worried about what might happen when I started eating, drinking, and dancing, so I ended up wearing my back up dress, also from RTR! Overall- love the dress but size up and probably go long as well if you're wearing heels!
Best dress I've ever rented most comps ever received. I will buy it! Sexy comfy easy to dance and doesn't show sweat
This dress is amazing!

links_reviews_title: Fast shipping and cool garment bag
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a black tie affair, received so many compliments about how this dress "snatched" me in. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress!! Perfect combination of classy and sex.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Wore the petite and the length was perfect. The skits at the waist add just the right amount of sexy to this comfortable classy gown. Was worn to the USMC Birthday Ball.

I loved everything about this dress - I wish I owned it!! The 2R was comfortable but slightly big. I could have gone with the 0R if it were available but the 0P was definitely too small. The color is fabulous and the little cutouts are just enough sass without crossing over to tacky. You will love this dress!

links_reviews_title: The color was perfect. Fit amazingly!
links_reviews_text: Cut outs were in the perfect place, dress was just the right length for my 3 inch heels. Definitely would recommend this dress.

This dress fit great. Very flattering I got so many complaints. The cut outs were just the right amount of skin to show. The material was soft and easy to move in. I ordered the petite size because I planned on wearing flats. I am 5'5" and the length hit just above the ground. It would have been too short for any heels. This was my first time ordering from RTR and I loved the whole experience. It was all so easy.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my law school graduation gala and I got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2" and the length of the 4P, worn with heels, was perfect. The dress is form-fitted, so Spanx were a necessity! But overall, very comfortable, flattering, and a stunning color.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a formal wedding.
links_reviews_text: It was easily worn with a strapless bra. The heavy fabric really makes it great- helps cover imperfections. Looked good with heels and the sandals I changed into later. It is a really beautiful blue color.

This dress was stunning and I was so upset that it was unwearable. The bust was COMPLETELY distorted and stretched by previous renters. I am a 32B, and this dress was clearly worn by someone with DDs and should have been in a larger size. It ruined what was otherwise the perfect dress. Please be considerate of the renters that come after you and do not squeeze into a 2 or 0 for your own vanity. If that's what you want to do, then I suggest purchasing a dress you can damage. Don't do that to a rental that others will wear after you. Sad.

I am 5' 2" and 110 lbs, and the 2P was a little big on me and with three in heels, even a little long. But I got so many compliments on the dress, and the color is beautiful! I should've gone with the 0P, but this dress is gorgeous.

I actually fit better in the size 6, but would have needed to be able to wear Spanx to smooth out my backside, so I went up a size and it was fine! I felt that the color was fun and vibrant and a nice change from the typical black tie options. If you are large on top, size up but otherwise fits pretty true to size!

I wore this to a black tie event. The 4p fit perfectly! Im 5'2" and wore 2 inch heels and the dress just covered my toes. It was comfortable and covered everything I needed it to. I got a lot of compliments on the color as well

The color popped, the gown was comfortable and I had no issues during a long evening of covering the Emmy Awards. I typically wear either a 0 or 2 in dresses so I thought a 0P would be too small, but it fit like a glove and worked well with a stick-on bra.

I loved this dress for my event! The slits on the side were subtle and comfortable. Only think was the dress was very short. I couldn't wear heels and instead had to wear flat sandals. Made for comfortable feet but I also love wearing heels!

links_reviews_title: I'm 5'3' 125lbs and this fit beautifully! I felt very glamorous and made my night extra special!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!!!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but opted for a different one
links_reviews_text: Figured I'd toss this review up even though I went with another option. I'm 5'3", about 133 lbs, hourglass shape. This 6P was the perfect length with ~3.5" heels. The color is really nice, the neckline is actually quite flattering (and the arm holes don't cause any bulging) but I was not a huge fan of the cutouts - they are thinner lengthwise than in the photo and the fabric bunches around them, perhaps it just didn't sit as well on my figure. Still a really nice dress, and very comfortable.
Great color. Great fit.

links_reviews_title: Not a Bridesmaid, but I certainly looked better than them ;)
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! True to size, cut outs are just slits and very tasteful! The color is even prettier in person. I received compliments all day and night! I would absolutely rent this again and in fact, I noticed they have it in other colors, both long and a short version! You won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning. I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I sized up a bit just to be more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect wedding dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! The color was striking and the fit was extremely comfortable. The perfect combination of sexy and wedding appropriate. I'm 5'8, about 130 lbs and I wore the 6P because there weren't any other sizes available. It actually fit well and I could even wear heels. I would think the 4 regular would've fit perfectly though! I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone!

Loved the bright color of this dress and thick fabric. Ran a bit big, so the fit wasn't exactly what I was hoping for. If the fit was a bit more snug I think the shape would have been more flattering. Over all dress was comfortable and the cutouts gave it a little something extra.

From what I could tell the 6P was just a 6R that had been hemmed. I wore heels and probably could have gotten away with the 6R if I needed to. (I'm 5'3") The royal blue color was so flattering and I got a lot of compliments. I loved the cut, dress has some stretch and the cut outs are are fun way to make the dress a little younger feeling. Would highly recommend!

This dress is Perfect! Fits like a glove and hugged all the right places. Due to my height I would recommend 5'6" and up take a Large rather than Regular. (I do not like my feet to show in floor length gowns). Dress fits true to size, would recommend sizing up for a backup. Great for any cup size comfortably, would recommend a strapless bra. Dress is great for curvier shapes. Dress has enough stretch to fit into and be hugged.

I am 5'8 but after reading reviews I decided to order the 6R and 8R instead of the long. It ended up being too short to wear with heels but I made it work with flats. The color was vibrant and beautiful and the fit was very comfortable, cut outs very flattering. Received many compliments at a black tie wedding.

links_reviews_title: There are no words, the dress, the service.. I will use and recommend RTR time and time again.
links_reviews_text: This dress was exactly what I was looking for- classy and sexy. The slits were a perfect touch and showed just enough skin to make me feel comfortable but also glamorous. The fabric of the dress is soooo comfortable but beautiful and high quality. It was stretchy but sturdy (somewhat heavy but not in the way you'll be dropping buckets of sweat lol). I'm a 36DD and I did not have to wear a bra, I wore petals from VS and pulled those babies right up and they stayed put all night! It came at 12pm, so much earlier than expected, I was incredibly pleased and I will use RTR for EVERYTHING in the future!

Perfect dress for a wedding! It fit great and was extremely flattering, and to top it all of was super comfortable! I was worried the slits in the side would be a bit too much, but they added a unique detail to the dress without making it kitschy. I wore this with black heels and a modern necklace and bracelet and they worked perfectly together.
Perfect fit! Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Stunning and comfortable gown with a unique neckline! Amazing for summer weddings!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. It was actually sent to me as a backup when my first choice became unavailable, and I'm so glad it worked out this way! I was concerned the cut-outs might be a bit much for me, but they were very tastefully done! The color is amazing, the neckline is flattering, and most importantly: it's comfortable to dance in! Runs true to size, perhaps a bit long. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable! Received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! This was my first time using RTR and I was not disappointed. I was kind of nervous about the slits on the side but they were the perfect size and not too revealing. The dress is super comfortable and flattering. Was also nervous about the size as I wear anything from an 8 to a 12 depending on the dress. I am big chested (34DDD), have a very short torso and am curvy but the 8 fit perfectly. With being only 5' 3" the dress was a bit long but with heels with was fine and I only wore about 2-3 in heels. Would definitely recommend this dress!
This dress fit like a dream. I was unique in my dress color as well. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and color. The cut outs on the side weren't very big & the length was good w/ heels
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9" and was able to wear heels and the dress was still long enough for me
I Got so Many compliments and fit my curvy body comfortably and perfect !
Fit true to size. Thick enough that I felt held in but without being too hot.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a wedding and got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and did not even drag on the floor. Great vibrant color and flattering cutouts.

links_reviews_title: The dress was so comfortable and handled a Mardi Gras ball, dancing and parading effortlessly!
links_reviews_text: The length was perfect and I was able to wear flats with this (essential for a Mardi Gras ball). The slit was the right amount of showing skin but being classy, especially with the higher neckline. It was a great fit across my bust and able to accommodate a strapless bra. While the 8R fit, the 10R was a better choice for my wider hips/thighs. Would rent it again in a heartbeat!
This is a very nice dress, the fabric falls nicely and it flattering. It does run large and I have to wear a camisole, so if I rented it again I would size down. Still I enjoyed wearing it.

links_reviews_title: This was a very romantic dress and I felt beautiful wearing it despite a slightly loose fit.
links_reviews_text: Too large through the bust and torso despite being a size zero. The dress was pinned at the bust when it arrived at my house and I wore it that way, yet it was still loose.

I wanted a uniquely classic look for my City Hall wedding and this dress fit the bill perfectly. Family members and strangers complimented me all day. The dress was comfortable, revealed a tasteful amount of cleavage, drapes beautifully, AND it has pockets! Don't hesitate to get this dress if you want to look and feel gorgeous.
It has pockets! It worked with a jean jacket and with a dressy coverup too. I felt feminine and it worked with hips.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress for a summer party
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect. Beautiful color, heavy fabric that draped well, and not too low cut!!! Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an hourglass full chested figure
links_reviews_text: Very flattering, I normally wear a 10 so fit was true to size for the most part but slightly large in should strap area

Dress is great -- liked the material, well constructed. I wore an 8 which is my normal size but probably should have gotten a 6. The top was a bit loose, but totally wearable because this just made the dress look a little more casual / boho -- could easily be dressed up or down. Would rent again, maybe in a 6. It has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work formal function. Classically pretty!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit wonderful. I wear a size 2 in most regular retail lines such as BR, JCrew. I wore a size 0 in this dress and it fit very comfortable. It is very classic and sophisticated. I felt fantastic.
Loved the material but it hung on my body like a loose sack. I'm a true 0, and sometimes a 2 (5'7, 118lbs) and this did not fit at all.

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress. Received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and true to size.
The dress is BEAUTIFUL and incredibly flattering. It reveals just enough and is perfect for a spring or summer day occasion. I didn't want to take it off!

I felt like a princess in this dress. It was for a charity event where the dress code was black, white or silver. So happy I chose this dress. The only flaw is that the boning on the back left side is starting to break through the seam. I don't think anybody noticed. This dress must have been rented a lot. But, I can understand why. I didn't want to take it off at the end of the night. I may have to go grocery shopping in it tomorrow. Just kidding. Fits a bit small. I'm usually a size 2.
This dress was very comfortable and easy to wear, with a higher waistline. The zipper was a little tough but not a major problem.

links_reviews_title: People couldn't stop raving, it was red-carpet worthy for my daughter's VIP-themed bat mitzvah
links_reviews_text: fit perfectly–I've got a 34DD and am hourglass shaped. the tiers perfectly camouflaged any belly, no spanx needed. Material is luxe and elegant and it worked for the mom of the family that was the center of attention. I felt like a star.
Loved this dress! Great fit, very flattering, very comfortable, received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Trendy , would rent again
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfect I’m 5.0 120 pounds and 34dd size 4 fit , didn’t need bra ... and hit right below knee, which I liked .. Comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore to a Gala & was worried that I might be undressed-Not the case with this beauty-stands out!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. No tugging/repositioning the dress throughout a night of dinner and dancing. I'd rent it again in a hot second!

Tons of compliments. It really is stunning and photographs absolutely amazing. Tight in bodice but I like that so I am not pulling up when dancing. I didnt even have to wear a bra due to fit and structure. Wish I could buy it!

This dress is amazing. The zipper is on the side, so you can get in and out without help. I have the dreaded abdominal pooch, but the amazing design of the dress completely hides that. I looked like I have a totally flat stomach! It was loose enough on top that it didn't cut off circulation, but at the same time I never once had to pull it up. I could breathe. I could sit. I could dance. I never wanted to take this off!!!

Dress was pretty. Fabric is thick. I wore without a bra. I did get compliments. I probably wouldn't order again though. The zipper on both the 4 and 6 were very hard to get up and on both sizes they puckered out once zipped up. I found this to make the fit less than perfect. Color was a mix between silver and a "champagne" color.

Picture does not do it justice. Wore dress for optional black tie affair with a shaw. VERY comfortable. Chest fabric area goes up higher so not concerned with constantly pulling it up. Someone with larger chest could still wear this dress. The cut and layers make it super flattering for all types. Didn't have to wear spanx. Compliments all night. FABULOUS color and material. Rent this dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress was fun to dance in and I received numerous complements.
links_reviews_text: The size 6 fit my body but was too tight at the bust line. The size 8 fit my bust but was loose on the rest of me.

links_reviews_title: Fun and unique dress for a festive affair!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a New Year's Eve party and loved it. It's a very flattering, hourglass shape and structured so it holds you together nicely. Highly recommended!
Fits snug in the bust (and I'm not busty) but was a good fit. Overall the dress is well made and fabric is thick. Was great for a work cocktail holiday party! Would rent again!

I rented this for my friend's December wedding. It is nicely made with a lot of detail. I probably would only wear this dress around the holidays as the silver/metallic would be a lot at any other time of year. The zipper was very tough and without my husband, I never would have gotten into it! The bodice fits well but i felt that it ran large in the back/bust and I am a 36DD. I had to keep pulling the dress up. A heads up: there is a lot of detailed thread sewn on the dress that pulls very easily.

I actually chose this at the store last minute bc the dress I ordered wouldn't zip :/ but really happy with it! It was a little big bc it was about a size too large but last minute I didn't have a choice and it fit well enough to work. I got so many compliments! It was really comfy to dance in and nice structured material great for a fall or winter event. I am short so it was longer than it's supposed to be, ended up more tea length than knee length but still looked great!
This dress worked great. The style and shape of the dress makes it an easy dress to fit and size. I had three compliments before I ever even made it to the door of the building.

links_reviews_title: Summer cocktail party(formal)at the Museum of Fine Arts. This dress knocked it out of the park!!!!
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 8 & 10...no way the 8(depending on the make I am between sizes) would fit but the 10 was quitetight-ish at the waist & mine is small.The good was that the bodice very supportive so didn't need an uncomfortable strapless! I am 5'3"/145 lbs/34B+ with a small waist(not all the statistical info on the reviews I have read are honest) When I removed the dress from the package it was disappointing as it was more drab grey in daylight but in evening light it was LIQUID SILVER!!! The tailored flounces camouflaged my 67 year old tummy. The length of the asymetrical hem was a designer bonus. TONS of compliments from people...I would buy this dress if I had more events to attend...the designer has a website and is located in Charleston S.C. Wear with hot pink lips & nails; silver sandals; rhinestone bracelets; chunky necklace, and channel your "INNER MARILYN"!!

I wore this to a benefit concert/dinner where I received an award. I received tons of compliments! My only con is that the dress kept turning on me and I had to adjust it several times. It could have been the shaper I was wearing underneath that provided the opportunity for the dress to slide around a bit. Otherwise, I felt beautiful and glamorous!! Great dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable and yet looked amazing! So many compliments!!!
links_reviews_text: I rented both a 10 and a 12. They both fit, but I chose the 12 for comfort and the ability to wear a strapless bra. I was the chair of the event, so I worked all night---outside, inside, lifting things, running around---the dress was so forgiving and easy to wear. I hated to send it back!

links_reviews_title: A little tight in the bodice, but love it overall
links_reviews_text: This dress was great, and not just because we share the same name. I wore it to a Nigerian/Jamaican wedding (lots of regal attire present), and I felt absolutely stunning in it. The size 10 wasn't available to ship, so I don't have a size to compare it to. The 8 did require some assistance to get in, but once I was zipped up, everything stayed in place the entire night. Would definitely rent again. The earrings are from RTR also.

links_reviews_title: Elegant, chic, tasteful standout for a graduation event
links_reviews_text: When the dress first arrived I was skeptical, because my initial impression of the material made me think of curtains in a modern style hotel room. Once I tried it on, I got over that quickly. It hangs beautifully and looked fabulous. I was mildly overdressed for my department's residency graduation, which I anticipated beforehand, but the dress was tasteful and didn't feel out of place. NOTE: I wore a 4 and ordered my backup size in a 6 as some reviews suggested. The 4 was so much too large that I almost didn't wear it, but I didn't have anything else to wear, so I wore a thick adhesive bra AND supplemented further to keep it from falling down. This beautiful dress would have been even more flattering had I ordered a 2.

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It felt slightly too big on the top so I had to readjust a couple times during the night, specifically while dancing. At first, I tried on the dress and I was a little underwhelmed. It looks more grey/silver in reality, though it comes out metallic in photographs. On the day of the event, my mind had changed. I definitely felt beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for fun night out!
links_reviews_text: Top was large on me, had to wear padded bra.

links_reviews_title: Random strangers approaching me about how great the dress was!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress and fit!! It hit my hips and chest in all the right places! I was comfortable all night long and random strangers approached me complimenting how great it was! The zipper was a little tricky around the boning area, so you might need help zipping it all the way up.

links_reviews_title: Love the fit of the dress. Especially how high the front comes up for women with a bigger chest
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5 about 130. Chest 34C Dress fit beautifully, felt glamorous

I wore this to a charity gala, it was perfect! The design in the fabric is amazing, such a well made dress. It stands out against all those in black without being over the top! Sizing... I am normally a 4 and I wore the 4, but the boob area was a little tight, so I had to do no bra to avoid pushing skin up over the top. The size 6 was too big in torso and felt longer. Great dress! Would rent again! (Not the best picture but some how I didn't take others)

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a silver anniversary benefit gala.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit nicely and it was well made. Although, the fabric had multiple strings hanging from it. It may fit slightly small. There was substantial fabric at the top so I didn't need to wear a bra. It was very comfortable.
Fit perfectly. More metallic than it looked online but beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I got more compliments than I can count!!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!!! It was really beautiful!! It was a little long on my under five foot frame, but the overall look of the dress overcompensated for the length being slightly off how it was designed. I also thought I was a bit overdressed for the cocktail attire of the party, but I got so many compliments, it was ok. I also can't say enough about the wonderful customer service from RTR. This dress was my first choice, but outside my price range, so I picked a different dress. The dress I ordered came back damaged from the previous renter so RTR contacted me and offered me another dress up to double the price that they would overnight to me. I picked this one and LOVED it and was so grateful to RTR for stepping up to ensure I had a dress I loved! I will definitely be renting again!

Fabulous metallic dress by Mason Hosker! Running true to size, we recommend going one size up for backup. With some stretch in the fabric and a fitted bust, this dress is would work best with smaller cup sizes. This dress is fitted at the waist, but not in the hip area, so it allows for comfortable movement. One thing that I love about this dress is the metallic color and the asymmetrical hem. At 36” from shoulder to hem, this dress is perfect to wear for any formal event, like a wedding or gala. Pair it with silver or gold jewelry and heels to make for a stunning look.

A little snug in the waist and a little roomy for me in the bust. Almost went up to the size 6 but then too roomy up top. It was the most unique dress at the event. The dress is more of a warm silver so black accessories looked best. I wore the suggested "rustic evening earrings" and they looked fabulous with the dress. The pattern on the fabric is more pronounced than it looks in the photo on the model. I definitely felt like I was wearing a high fashion "runway" dress.

links_reviews_title: Option for a wedding. Gorgeous dress but ran so large! Love the shimmery fabric
links_reviews_text: Warning if you have small boobs - the top is really big!
Runs a bit small, but I made it work!
Comfortable fit. No cons. This dress is all pros. Gorgeous material, gorgeous fit, gorgeous everything.
Beautiful dress but runs a bit small.

links_reviews_title: I loved the classy look of this dress and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Unique dress but would not rent again
links_reviews_text: Thought the color and pattern were interesting (you could wear with gold or silver) but it wasn't super comfortable. The fit was odd. It was snug around the waist and hips but too loose on top, and I felt like I was swimming in fabric on the bottom. As a result I had to keep adjusting the dress the whole night. Would not recommend for a petite body frame.
fit perfectly

Sizing was right on the money - enough forgiveness in the hips for us "slim pear" types. Fabric was detailed and interesting - enough black tones in the material to make pairing with black nylons work.
I almost always wear 2 in dresses like this - I couldn't get it to even zip. However, the fabric and the cut were beautiful -- I'll probably try the dress again in a 4.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit perfectly for a 5'0 typical size 8 and received many compliments throughout the night!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit very well. I like both the Medium and Large but preferred the tighter fit of the Medium.
