Wore with Spanx and was very forgiving of problem areas in combination with dress. I was looking for a long dress for my short stature and this fit the bill. This was my first time using rent the runway and already using it again a week later for another event.
Dress was comfortable to wear. Very simple. I've rented a lot of dresses but this one was ok wasn't one of my favorites. Did the job.

I was very happy with this dress! It looks great and was comfortable all night. I rented the medium and large, there was only a slight difference between the two. I was pleasantly surprised with how the length looked on my short 5'2" frame!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress. It was a perfect combination of sexy and sophisticated.

links_reviews_text: One size smaller than normal may be good idea. It is not form fitting, more flow than expected. Beautiful color. Nice neck line. Straps can be adjusted and sleeves hang effortlessly. you will receive many complements wearing it. Perfect for transitioning into fall. Dark but breathable fabric.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful style and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress looked beautiful on. The top with the hanging side sleeve was so cute. I usually wear a size 2/4 and small but ended up wearing the XS in this one. Received so many compliments. Was comfy and easy to dance in.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color, not the most flattering dress
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and shoulders on this dress! Unfortunately, it wasn't the most flattering around the tummy area. I definitely recommend wearing shape wear with this dress (if you need it). The length was right around the knee, and looked great with heels.
It's typically hard to find clothes that fit my petite frame, but this dress looked beautiful and I loved the fit. the straps adjusted for the perfect strap length!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a wedding this past weekend. Such a fun evening celebrating an awesome couple!!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! This dress fit perfect. I rented the XS & S and wore the XS. It has adjustable straps and I was able to wear a strapless bra with is which is always great. It's a beautiful color and good length even for my short legs! I would definitely consider renting this one again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a formal wedding by the beach.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful! I usually wear a size 4/S so I ordered the XSR and SR. I ended up wearing the SR although I didn’t notice a huge difference in the two sizes. The material is very thin but it falls beautifully and I loved that the straps were adjustable. Overall I was very happy with this dress and it was perfect for a formal wedding!
Skims your body, gorgeous wine color, would recommend spanx. Elegant and classic, nice material.
Absolutely stunning! I felt amazing in this dress, comfortable and flowy but also very feminine. So many compliments I seriously considered buying it. Highly recommend, will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but not the most flattering shade
links_reviews_text: Verges on brown. Didn't work for me.
I ordered the Medium and Large and to be honest they weren't THAT different in size. I ended up wearing the large because it hugged slightly looser. Overall a great dress! Very comfortable and light.
Wore this for a Valentine's dinner/fundraiser. Very pretty, figure flattering. Very flattering on the chest. And you can still move around and be comfortable

links_reviews_title: Loved the flattering fit and gorgeous color of this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable and beautiful to wear to a wedding. The only important consideration is that you can easily see lines or lumps if you wear anything under it due to the close-fitting, silky nature of the fabric.

I wore this to a wedding at the end of October. This color and length of the dress were perfect for fall. I feel like I didn't have to add any accessories besides earrings because the dress looked formal and elegant itself. The fabric had a very slinky/clingy feel to it especially around the midsection, so spanx will be your best friend.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Got so many compliments, and I loved the fit and style.
links_reviews_text: Bustier ladies might need to size up. The medium fit everywhere else, but was too tight in the chest, so I ended up wearing the large, which worked out great!

links_reviews_title: I want to buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: Very forgiving, sexy, elegant dress. Felt really pretty in this dress, highly recommend!

Rented this for a friend's wedding. I'm 5'6 and 130 lbs and I wore the medium - I almost could have worn the small but would have been uncomfortable after dinner since there's basically no stretch. The fabric/flow/movement of this dress is beautiful - made the length tasteful and not frumpy. The cut was definitely low but for me that balanced out the length. I did get a spot of hairspray on the front as I was getting ready and that stuck around all night looking like a waterspot so this material doesn't really hide spots well. Everything else was great though, would recommend!
Loved this dress for a wedding! I have no pictures without my coat due to 30 degrees weather and no heating at the venue but it was so comfortable and sexy. Image to show length on my 5'2" frame.

I am 5'0 and it's hard to find a midi/maxi length dress that fits well. The straps are adjustable and the material of the dress was thin but I was indoors the entire time so it was fine. This was a slinky dress that looked classy yet sexy, and still looked great even though I ate a large dinner. Would rent again!
Loved this dress!! It was slightly more of a purple than it appeared online. The material was very thin, but very comfortable and easy to move in. Would definitely recommend!

The color and length (midi) were perfect for a fall wedding! The material moved nicely and the draped sleeves hid my least favorite body parts! Showed some cleavage but was conservative everywhere else.
Very flattering

This dress was the perfect fit. I am typically a size 8 and the medium was good with a little bit of room to move around. I didn't wear a bra, but I am smaller chested. Straps are adjustable which was nice for creating the perfect fit. I was nervous about this material hugging the wrong places and showing too many imperfections but it was the total opposite. Loved it and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: LOVE THIS DRESS! I received so many compliments at the wedding I attended in Minnesota.
links_reviews_text: I love both the color and the style of this dress! I am typically in between a small and a medium (have larger hips and backside), the medium is the size I went with. I did have to make the straps pretty tight, but otherwise the fit was perfect! The small would've worked, but I was more comfortable dancing in the medium.

I absolutely loved wearing this dress. So flattering and easy to wear. Straps are adjustable. I recommend wearing a sticky bra with this. Beautiful color for a fall wedding. I highly recommend. I'd rent this dress again in a heartbeat!
This dress was really comfortable and I felt sleek and sexy in it. It was just enough cleavage but not too much. It was comfortable to sit in and also to dance in.

links_reviews_title: I adored this fun, flirty dress!
links_reviews_text: As someone with a pear shape, I was a little afraid to pivot away from my usual A-line style but I'm so glad I did! This dress fit perfectly (I'm usually a size 4 and I wore the size Small) and was NOT too tight in the thighs/booty. Win! I received a lot of compliments from other wedding guests and loved feeling a little bit sexy with the open shoulders. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a day wedding. It was absolutely beautiful and so comfortable. I could move and dance, and it hugged my curves in all the right places. I am typically a size 4, but the 6 fit me a little bit better in my stomach/hip area, so I recommend getting a size up if you have some curves. I will definitely rent this dress again for some upcoming spring weddings I have, since it really could be worn any season. Perfect color and loved the sleeves. You will feel amazing in this dress!

Lovely color and easy, comfortable style. Love the sleeve detail and the length. The fabric is definitely on the thin side and will show everything (not see-through, but a little clingy), so I would recommend renting a larger size for backup and choosing undergarments carefully!

This dress was perfect for a fall wedding. The plum color was beautiful. I ended up wearing size small, which fit great. I have a small bust, so a bra wasn't necessary. Very comfortable and great for dancing!
This dress was great! The color was nice and rich, the fabric was lightweight and great for an end of summer out door wedding!

links_reviews_title: Great color for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: Rented for an outdoor fall wedding in Virginia - found out after I ordered this dress it was black tie optional dress code, and it fit in perfect as it's not a short dress (mid calf) but also not floor length. If youre smaller in bust like me, sticky bra helped immensely as there is no support/padding built in. The material was thinner than I anticipated (lined, but very thin), but made it very comfortable. Paired with strappy nude heels and dangle earrings - worked out great!
Loved this dress! Fit was perfect for smaller bust and the dress didn't cling anywhere unflattering. No zipper on this, so get a size up if you're curvier.
Can't express enough how wonderful this dress was to wear to a friends wedding. So comfortable and flattering. Felt like a total snack. Prettiest color ever. Can't recommend enough.
I wore this to my sister's wedding as a bridesmaid dress. It was comfortable and perfect for a hot, AZ, outdoor ceremony. I felt sexy yet appropriate. Loved it.

Wore this for a wedding and loved it!! It was actually my backup dress but I loved it and just had to wear it. The color is a beautiful plum and the ruffle sleeves feel so feminine and pretty. The inner liner felt a little out of whack with the top layer of material but that might just be because it was a very warm and sticky night for the event. Fits true to size. Very comfortable and classy. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wore for maternity shoot and was perfect
links_reviews_text: Great fit and so comfortable! A little bit long if you're on the shorter side, so I think heels might be warranted. But great dress! Really loved it!

links_reviews_title: The color and fit portrays confidence.
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. Wore the small, my prepregnancy size. It fit well without being extremely tight. My only complaint is the shoulders. The food was incredibly difficult to keep down, so I spent quite a bit of time fidgeting.

Rented this for my baby shower at 35 weeks and have never felt sexier. I'm 5'8" and 150lbs now and the small fit perfectly. Had initially ordered a medium but it was loose. I got so many compliments and really felt gorgeous on this special day

links_reviews_title: Perfect maternity dress for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a back-up option for a black tie optional wedding on New Year's Eve, and ended up wearing this instead of my first choice! It's very comfortable, super flattering and classy. I did think it ran slightly big – I'm 27 weeks pregnant, 5'8" and 160 lbs pre-pregnancy (probably gained about 15 pounds by this point) but I have a smaller bust (36B) and felt the Large was too big on top. I usually size up for my hips/thighs/booties, so maybe a Medium wouldn't have worked anyway, but it was stretchy. I agree with other reviewers that the arm holes/sleeves are too big, but it did lay flat nicely for photos and was fine throughout the night aside from dancing. :) Rent it, you won't regret it!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress!!! A must rent maternity dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a fall wedding & This dress was so comfortable and very flattering at 36weeks pregnant. I received a lot of compliments and would absolutely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Sooo many compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was comfortable and I felt great in it. I am 22 weeks in this photo, 3rd pregnancy. The arms fell a bit and created a slight buckle in the arm pit area, but wasn't bothersome. I would definitely rent this dress again for maternity wear!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. It is stretchy and even at 9 months pregnant I felt sexy in it.
Great fit, comfortable even at 35 weeks
links_reviews_text: I'm in love with this dress. I'm gonna keep it probably till the end of my pregnancy. It fits great and has room to spare. Currently 35 weeks. The color is gorgeous. I ordered medium even if I'm usually small not pregnant because I'm already 3rd trimester. If I owned this dress I would get it hemmed a bit but otherwise this is the perfect fall dress for me.
Very comfortable and plenty of room for a growing bump. No zipper

Dress fit well. It did stick out a little at the bust/ underarms (you can see my bra in the pics) but was mostly manageable. Should have worn cups and not a strapless bra but didn't pack any! The medium stuck out a lot more in the bust which is the only reason I wore the small instead.

I felt the dress ran a little small, but it’s super stretchy. So it wasn’t uncomfortable (and I could’ve worn the XL backup). I would not recommend for larger chests; I had a hard time working out a bra for this style, and I hate strapless. Overall, very very comfortable and smoking hot for a pregnant lady!!
24 weeks pregnant and this dress was perfect! So much stretch - could definitely wear later in the pregnancy also. My husband even loved it!

links_reviews_title: I was very satisfied with this formal maternity dress. It was perfect to wear as a wedding guest.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at 37 weeks pregnant. At the time I was approximately 5'7 and 170 lbs. I am usually a medium, but for this dress the small fit perfectly. Great fabric, length and fit. Received lots of compliments and felt comfortable all evening.
Dress was super comfy and flattering for a big ol belly at 39 weeks! Nice amount of stretch and the length was perfect. So happy with this pick for mom and dad's last night out before baby!

links_reviews_title: Felt really pretty at the end of my pregnancy! Fit great, could move really easily.
links_reviews_text: Stretchy material helped it fit comfortably.
True to size; I wore xs (pre-pregnancy size) and it fit perfectly. Great stretchy material. I'm 5'1" 106 prepregnancy --> 125 @ 30 wks. Added plus - it photographs really well!
The fit was great. I still had some extra room in the medium. Pre pregnant size was small. The sleeves are very annoying but the dress was pretty so it was worth it.

This was a gorgeous dress. I had ordered it as my backup choice and didn't end up wearing but figured I'd share my review. Just preferred my first choice dress over this one. My thoughts: Quality was amazing. The only thing I didn't like was the arm holes were pretty big from the side view so you could see side boob and/or your bra a lot... The dress itself is obviously well-made and a show stopper. The red is a vibrant bold red. For reference, in the photo, I'm 5'4" and currently 32 weeks/8 months pregnant and about 183 lbs currently.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for introducing the grand finale concert for my summer music program!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly for 7.5 months pregnant - felt glamorous and got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Love the color, style and fit!
links_reviews_text: Was going to wear this dress for my baby shower, but it was too formal and so I decided to wear it for my maternity shoot. The material is thick and stretchy, so be aware if you are in a warmer place. I did have to keep adjusting the shoulder area, and probably need a little more blessing in the bust area to fill more in it it worked out just fine :P. I do love the color and cut and how it fit my belly at 27 weeks!

I rented this for my maternity shoot and loved it! The dress is super comfortable and stunning! I felt so incredibly beautiful in this dress. It hugged all my curves and bump really well. The top didn't fold over as much as the model image but it worked for me. I wore a large. I was 29 weeks at the time of the shoot and it really accentuated my bump well! If you're on the fence. Don't be - rent this dress!

links_reviews_title: 6 months pregnant and it was the perfect dress to wear to an outdoor wedding in the SoCal summer.
links_reviews_text: Dress was true to size and I felt comfortable moving around all evening. Received so many compliments! A note: There is no lining to this dress, so I wore a pair of maternity Spanx underneath and it seemed to smooth everything out. (I also now realize I could've folded the top part a little more so it wouldn't have that weird open area near my underarms. Oh well!)
The fit was perfect! Super comfortable and easy to move in. The color was beautiful...got so many compliments!! Loved everything about this dress.

I'm usually not a 'red' dress girl but this was a special occassion so I decided to try it. Glad I did! I am 31ish weeks in this picture, normally 130, but 155 in the pic. I usually wear a 2/4 and the Medium was too big. The small was very fitted but material was thick enough that it didn't show flaws. Loved it! Lots of compliments <3

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful and so flattering I felt gorgeous
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly hugged all the right places made my 23 week bump look amazing. Perfect for a special occasion.

Rented this for a black tie optional wedding and it was the perfect dress for the occasion! I wore my normal size and it worked perfectly with my 33 week baby bump. Got so many compliments all night long!
I wore this to the opera with my husband and I felt radiant! It looked small on the hanger but it ended up fitting like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Dress was easy to move and dance in!
links_reviews_text: Im 5’6 and typically a size 4. The dress was very comfortable and I got lots of compliments on it. Wore this to an event at 25 weeks pregnant.

links_reviews_title: Loved being the lady in a red dress!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was excellent for a Derby themed Bridal Shower! It was extremely comfortable. I thought the sleeves would be a little uncomfortable due to them not staying in place, but it was not an issue at all. Loved the color and the fit! Especially at 7.5 months pregnant!
Love the color, fits great and very flattering. Six months pregnant on here.
Flowy and tight
This dress was very pretty. Loved the color. My only complaint was that the sleeves kept riding up and were difficult to adjust without help.

I seriously love this dress so much. It was so flattering and so stretchy and comfortable. If this dress came in every color I would wear it to every nice occasion!! Wore it around 22/23 weeks pregnant.
Comfortable, clean and made me feel pretty even with a huge belly of twins!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a special occasion!
links_reviews_text: Ordered this in a small and medium. Ended up going with the small. For reference I'm 33 weeks pregnant. Normally 130 lbs; 5'10"; size 4. I've gained about 25 lbs so far. Only wish is that the top panel stayed down like it does on the model. Maybe it's my height though. If I went with the medium it was too baggy up top.

I rented this for a cocktail event at work and couldn't have been more pleased with it. It fit great, I felt amazing and got so many compliments. I wore at 19 weeks pregnant with my second baby. It is very fitted, so a maternity strapless bra and spanx were needed. Highly recommend!
32 weeks pregnant here. I wore this to an awards ceremony for work and received a ton of complements from my coworkers and strangers. It's VERY stretchy and comfortable. No complaints here!

links_reviews_title: This dress's color popped and fit me perfectly at 6 months pregnant!
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable, fits incredibly well, and stays up. Some strapless dresses fall down but not this one.

links_reviews_title: Rented both the M and L. Wore the M because the sleeves kept slipping off on the L.
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress in both M and L for a wedding. I wore the M because the sleeves kept slipping off me when I tried on the L. I would definitely recommend ordering 2 sizes to make sure you achieve the right fit. Ultimately, this dress was gorgeous and I received many compliments. Not too bad for 20 weeks pregnant!

links_reviews_title: Fit great at almost 6 months pregnant! Love this color!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a fall wedding in October. The material is stretchy and easily fit over my 5 month belly and it was very comfortable! I got so many compliments and I loved the color!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Dress in School Colors for Graduation
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress, it was gorgeous and very comfortable. I graduated from Georgia Tech and our colors are white and gold, so I looked for yellow dresses in particular to wear for my graduation and grad photos. This translated really well on camera, and flowed beautifully--we took lots of twirly pics. Would love to rent again! Amazing!
Beautiful colour. Very comfortable, many compliments. Think it runs a little large but the adjustable straps make it very easy to wear.
Good length for petite. A little loose on me around waist so I added a belt. Otherwise for great. Comfortable and lightweight. Can be dressed up or down.
This was actually picked out randomly because my original choice was unavailable. I ended up loving the dress and it was very comfortable as well!
Pretty dress for vacation

I took a risk renting this dress because the flower print isn't really my style. I prefer solid colors or geometric prints. But I was looking for a nice lightweight dress to wear outside in 80 degree temps and liked the cut of this dress. It really is quite pretty on and is very light weight and perfect for hot weather. I normally wear a 2/xs. This dress fit great with one caveat. I felt like the straps were too short for my chest. They are adjustable but were difficult to manipulate and I was afraid I might break them. You don't necessarily need a bra with this style but I felt more comfortable in one because the chest area was so much higher than mine. I felt like the chest was more appropriate for a shorter girl. Also I'm bow legged and felt like the asymmetrical hem emphasized this.

links_reviews_title: Pretty print & can wear if short / petite
links_reviews_text: Pretty yellow and really detailed & interesting floral print. Love that straps adjustable. I stepped into dress instead of overhead and had to wiggle past hips to get on but fine after. Decided to add a delicate belt & crazy high Jimmy Choo wedges!!! Fun just before Labor Day. Lightweight and flowy / comfortable. Strapless or Nubra.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, bright and breezy summer dress
links_reviews_text: Fabulous color for an outdoor summer party. Comfortable and breezy in warm weather.
Super easy to wear! Runs true to size. I dressed down with tennies but could easily be worn to a summer formal affair.
Great fit! I wore a strapless bra but it would have been fine without one. My girlfriends liked the dress a lot!

Received compliments all day long! The vibrant yellow with colorful flowers made for the perfect daytime party dress. The elastic around the waist and ruffles on top made it easy to go bra-less. The fit is very flattering. Highly recommend!
I wore this light dress for a brunch. I was just perfect! @PriscilleCanivet
Not a show stopper but very sweet, nice color/pattern, light material & comfy elastic waist. Also I was concerned i would not like the uneven hem, but didn't bother me.
Have rented this dress twice- both for vacations. It's a great length for petite girls and is true to size. Requires strapless bra.
This dress is gorgeous! Super silky, fun silhouette, spring florals. Easy to dress up or down, and also comfy. Roomy in the waist, and can wear a strapless bra.
Fun pattern and light fabric perfect for summer. Stretchy waistband so size down. Straps are adjustable.
Fit well and was comfortable. A little large in the waist, I would size down. The waist is elastic and the fit around the hips/thighs was fairly loose.
This dress was really beautiful. It fit perfectly and super comfy. I wanted to keep this dress.
The dress is fine, nothing to call attention to you. The pale yellow color kind of washed me out.
Easy to wear and true to size, light material so great for warmer months.
Wore for a brunch shower. Felt super comfortable and was flowy in all the right ways. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, make me feel so famine, perfect for the Jazz Concert.
links_reviews_text: I'm a DD so I went to a XL gets perfectly even being only 5ft.

The first of this dress I received from RTR had a detached strap which RTR rectified immediately sending me a replacement for it. This is a very pretty floral pattern and the material is so soft. I enjoyed wearing this in the summer with wedge heels. The cinched waist gives it a little shape so it isn't just hanging down too loose.

links_reviews_title: Too large fit like a potato sack.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually an XS-S, this dress was far too large and just looked sloppy. The waist did not hit at the correct spot, however, I do have a very high and small waist. Probably better if you have more curves. My figure got lost in this sack of potatoes.
Fit well on petite frame
It was great! Yay!

I am a petite, pear shaped lady. Small on the top and medium on my bottom part. The small size is loose everywhere. I think I might wear this with a belt, but I should have tried the XS. This is a pretty dress but I would not use this for a special occasion. I think it is more of a casual dress to "dress down".
Loved the way this dress fit...it also photographed beautifully imo. Lovely fabric and print.
I wore it casually with white sneakers and loved it so much. Love that it has adjustable straps. Can definitely be dressed up or down

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for an summer event or everyday with a casual jacket
links_reviews_text: My office is fairly casual. Wore to work with a denim jacket over it. Really cute dress, would rent again for a summer event with heels and no covering
Great fit...very flattering...can be worn casually or dressed up.

links_reviews_title: easy, breezy right out of the bag
links_reviews_text: fit is perfect, the straps are adjustable so I'm sure it would fit a range of bust sizes comfortably.. the kind of dress you slip on and just feel great ...fabric is so light and flowy, perfect for a hot day

i'm typically a 4 with a large waist. the small fit perfectly, esp with the elastic waist. i love the adjustable straps and how comfortable the dress is while still being easy to dress up w cute heels. this is an awesome dress to travel with, too. if you put a blazer over it you can wear it to work. hit around tea length for me. love the pattern. RENT THIS!

links_reviews_title: Awesome fast delivery from RTR so I can have more moments to enjoy this dress!
links_reviews_text: A bit loose but wearable. I did receive compliments on this dress. I wore it once on the weekend and once to a gender reveal party. Great dress for a sunny afternoon outdoors. Very comfy and felt beautiful in it.
Maybe it was me but it fit super awkward and wasn't flattering. This dress probably would look better if you added a belt to it.
Didn't end up wearing, color was more of a dull / very light pastel yellow and didn't like the hemline
My first fancy party--looked amazing and I comfy enough to dance hard for three hours. So. Much. Fun.
Amazing fit for my hourglass shape. Got soo many compliments on the style and the fit. Would love to have this in my closet to wear for other events!

Best fitting dress! I was really nervous when it was only available in one size since I have typically gone up in other dresses but went with it anyways. Enough stretch to be comfortable all evening and enhance curves without being too tight. So many compliments!!

This dress saved the day for me! It fit perfectly and I received so many compliments on how beautiful it was! I adored the delicate, gorgeous back and it even caught the eye of the artist who was live painting the ceremony, who included it in her image. Worked perfect with a backless, strapless bra.
This dress was beautiful and fit perfectly true to size. My only challenge was the regular was too short for me with heels being 5'7 - definitely get the long length for a formal affair.

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning! The compliments were flowing in all night! Perfect for a formal wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect dress for a formal wedding. The lace and gold details were stunning. I am 5'1" and with 3" wedge heels, the dress just barely hit the ground. I loved that the dress was form fitting but the fabric was stretchy enough to give me some breathing (and dancing) room.
It was a bit loose on top, other wise it was great! I got compliments all day!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so amazing and comfortable. I wore it to a dinner at the Governors mansion.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs a bit small. I'm typically a 10/12 and wore this in a 14.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it to the event.
links_reviews_text: The fit is great but doesn't do anything for the girls which I prefer to show off. It would work well for all chest sizes though! I have great curves but didn't feel that the dress really showed them off. Still, beautiful detailed and georgous dress!
Fits to size.
The dress is gorgeous! It is true to size, fits well, excellent condition. I would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: "The most beautiful dress of the night"
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous! The gold detailing was perfect and the back of the dress was stunning! It does not have a lot of stretch to it, so I found it a bit tight in the booty section, but other than that it fit really well! I received so many compliments, and heard so many people say I had the most beautiful dress of the entire night! I paired the dress with gold and rhinestone earrings and bangles, and was hesitant about wearing the red lipstick but so glad I did! Take a chance, rock a red lip with this dress! You won't be disappointed!
This dress was amazing. Very comfortable and the fabric was flexible. I needed high heels because it was long.

This was my first choice but neither size fit well. The 4R fit great overall but was too long (even with 4" heels). The 6P was too big overall but the length was much better. I think a 4P would have been perfect but it wasn't available. I have on the 4R in the picture.
Fit like a glove. Very pretty and comfortable dress. No bra support in the dress, so used Gaffer tape to create my own!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments! Gorgeous back detail.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very forgiving! It has some stretch to it. I am 5’8” and with pumps the Long was perfect. Wore spanx and a strapless bra. Loved it! Comfortable all night.
Nice high quality material. Beautiful fit... fitted, but not skin tight. The cut is elegant. Perfect for my work Christmas gala.
Fit well and was actually the right length but it overly emphasized the girls making me look very top heavy. The lace around the top was also itchy. Didn't end up wearing to my event.

links_reviews_title: Felt like beyonce in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I belted it with a brown satin sash I had. I didn't wear this dress because it was a back up but I love this dress and plan to rent it again for another occasion

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing!! So flattering, comfortable and fun!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect gown for the Marine Corps Ball that I attended with co-workers. The high neck lace overlay keeps it conservative, but the fit of the dress was extremely flattering and accentuated my figure. The lace had a gold sheen to it and gave it an extra flair along with the BEAUTIFUL lace detail on the upper back!!

I rented this dress for a black-tie optional wedding. It ran a little big (chest/back area) but still looked beautiful. The length was perfect for me at 5'3" (I wore heels, but could have worn flats). The details were gorgeous and I received many compliments!
This is a beautiful, classy and comfortable gown! The color is an amazing classic Navy and there material is beautiful. It fit like a glove and made me feel so glam! I highly recommend.
More of a bright blue than the photos suggest. Gorgeous gown. Was a little big on me, size down if you're in question. Metallic photographs well.

links_reviews_title: Solid dress for a conservative wedding
links_reviews_text: Nice dress. A little bit of mother of the bride thing going but worked well for a conservative wedding. I say conservative because it was for the wedding of a work client so I had to dress appropriately. There was slightly too much fabric around the top of the dress so there was a little bit of bunching in the lace area
I wore this dress to my first Military ball. It was the perfect dress! It fit like a glove and was so comfortable. I felt like a queen!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a formal wedding and it was stunning. I received tons of compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 6 dress, but with this dress I was a size 2. This dress is best for coolers months, it was very warm to wear because of the lining. But overall I really liked this dress.

This dress was my backup dress and fit perfect. I'm 5'2" 140lbs and wore 3 inch heels and it was a great length. Being a 34DD, it's hard to find supportive dresses but I didn't even have to wear a bra, which never happens! The lace did rub a little in my back above the armpits but was a minor thing. Cant recommend this dress enough.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I rented again for engagement photos!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! I'm 5'1" and the dress was a perfect length with 3" heels. Even in flats it wasn't really too long. Fit perfectly in the bust (36C) and the arms, wasn't itchy or too hot. Easy to dance in, walk in, and sit in. The back of the dress does require good posture though! The way the sheer fabric lays, the back can be a little unflattering if you slouch!

I wore this dress to a wedding. I had strangers coming up to me all night and telling me my dress was stunning. This was very comfortable and only rubbed around my armpits towards the very end of the night. I am 5'10" and the long was a great length with 1 to 2" heels.

I tried a 6R and 4R & 4L. I ended going with the 4R because it was more form fitting on top and could show off my figure in it. It definitely looks much prettier in person. The length was perfect becasue I wanted to show a bit of my shoes (I wore 3 inch heels & I am 5'6). Also, I didnt wear a bra but I do have fake breast so don't need any lift. But the dress really has no support to go braless. Overall loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and easy to travel with
links_reviews_text: I traveled with this dress to Spain for a formal wedding and loved it! Beyond being easy to pack, it was flattering, appropriately modest and sexy all in one dress!

This dress was really pretty and comfortable. It was a little bit big on me, but not noticeable. The 0R was too long though (I'm 5'3") with 3ish inch heels which was a little annoying, but served its purpose as a beautiful black tie wedding dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful back up but not worn
links_reviews_text: I had to choose a new dress when my back up size was unavailable. I chose this because it was the only one available, but knew it would not work because of the length. This is a gorgeous dress. For anyone with a large chest--there is absolutely no upper support. I knew the dress would be too long for me (and with 3 inch heels, it dragged the floor by 2 inches). While snug in the hips- the top felt loose and gaping. I was wearing a strapless bra in the photo- but the top still felt really loose. I would not have been able to dance comfortably in this dress, even at a regular length--mainly because of the lack of support in the top.

My original three dresses I chose and rented arrived on a Friday, event was Saturday.. one was too big, one too small, one too long.. I am 5 ft. 9 in. and I ordered the long of each dress... after calling customer service, we got one figured out through my "hearts" and the representative I spoke to chose this dress, and WOW am I glad she did!! It was so beautiful, I didn't do 5 stars because as the night went on the layers began to separate a little bit.. so the lace layer was shorter than the satin blue layer, but I got so many compliments, especially on the back.. I felt amazing in this dress!!
My torso is small so the back of the dress did not lay flat so I was disappointed. Otherwise, it was beautiful.

My size 6R was not snug at all. It worked well for me at 5'2" and a 3" heal it was barely touching the ground. I was the chairperson of a Gala. I wore this dress and it did not disappoint, very classy and timeless. Im around 135ish lbs.

links_reviews_title: More body-con than I would have thought was "my style" but comfortable and got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Perfect. A little stretch. Lace was not rough. Did not have the problem under arms like some. Length

Great dress, lots of compliments! Very pretty and flattering on and was perfect for an evening at the opera. I'm 5'6" and it hung perfectly at the ground with 2" heels. The back is very flattering and you can wear a strapless bra without it being noticeable through the lace. The subtle gold detailing is pretty and it works well to have gold accessories. I did end up wearing the size 8, not the 6 even though I'm usually a 6, it was just a bit more comfortable around the mid-section. Definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for holiday party, formal but not too flashy. The lace detail was very feminine.
links_reviews_text: Dress was very slimming and easy to move in. The lace detail was stunning. Overall perfect for the holiday party.
True to size. Perfect length with heels.

I would say I am between a 2-4 but on this order I ordered 5 different dresses all different designers and all of them were size 2. They all fit perfectly except this dress, it was quite tight. I couldn't wear a bra and my legs were very restricted. It was virtually impossibly to zip and unzip alone. However It was nice and classy and got the job done. I suggest Size up for comfort & bc it's so short, it shouldn't be too long even for shorter people.
This dress is so dreamy! Perfect combination of classy and delicate. Wore to a wedding and received so many compliments.
Great dress for a fancy wedding in Chicago! Chic and elegant, easy to dance in. Looked great with my sparkly MK heels and I got so many compliments! I'd totally rent this for another event again!

This dress was great quality and still in great shape! Perfect length for me at 5'5". Easy to dance in! I had to size up to the 2 because of the bust being tight but the zero would've been perfect otherwise. Overall, loved it!!
Runs small and the fabric does NOT stretch but is super flattering. I ordered a 2 and a 4, wore the 4. I am 5'6 and usually wear about a 2 or a 4.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my neice’s quinceñera. The dress was the perfect mix of classy and playful.
links_reviews_text: I’m very petite at 5’0” and just under 100 pounds. I was surprised that I had to size up to Size 2, because I usually wear XS and Size 0. Aside from the sleeves being a little tight, the dress was perfect! Rent the Runway made it so easy to get a backup size delivered to me before the event!

This was my back up dress. Normally a 0, i got a 2 after reading reviews. Kinda wish I had a 0 to try as this dress was roomy up top and in the hips. The waist line was tight, which made the dress hard to get on and off. Overall, this dress was perfect though. Super cute and girly. Loved the color and sparkly embellishments.

I rented this for a derby party that was also a fundraiser that I was speaking at... I felt professional and beautiful. I wore the 4 instead of the 2, which is unusual for me, but the ribcage area of the 2 just was a bit snug. The 4 had a little more breathing room. The bottom part gets short when you sit down. And some of the beads on the shoulder detail were missing. But I am sure no one noticed.

Super cute and flattering dress, I work it to my job's holiday party and felt it was very appropriate. It do run small and may be hard to put on depending if you're bigger on top or bottom (i'm bigger on bottom so it was tough to get over my butt). If you're busty, it may be tight at the top. Overall I really loved it and would recommend!

I wore this for a formal dinner in December. I was very pleased with how it fit and the shoulder detail was nice because I didnt have to find as many accessories to wear with it. Just keep in mind that the material doesn't have any stretch to it! I probably could've gone a size up for it to fit better in the waist, but it may have been too big in the shoulders then.

The dress itself was amazing. The soft pink was perfect for a summer wedding. The dress is tight in the rib cage and tight in the legs, I knew this going in from the other reviews. I underestimated how tight, though. Getting shoes on and off was a challenge due to needing to bend over. The dress does run small! The dress was too cute to pass up and overlooked the struggles. I got many compliments through the night.

I really loved everything about this dress except that it runs really small. It's so difficult to get on as well. I had to go to back up size "4" and even the size 4 was a bit snuggly. It's a little tight around the end of the dress around your thighs as well. I realized that I should've read the reviews before renting. Other than that, the dress was really beautiful for a wedding.

I wore this dress to a wedding and it did not disappoint! Received tons of compliments all night and it fit perfectly. Runs a bit small, though -- I'm typically a 0 but I read reviews about the sizing and went up a bit for this. 2 fit perfectly though!
This looked beautiful on, but it was a little tight, even though i ordered a aize up. Im usually between 6-8, and wore the 8, and it looked good - was just tight :)

links_reviews_title: When the two dresses i did rent didnt fit and one had a zipper issue i got two more over nighted!
links_reviews_text: The dress itself is goregous. This dress runs super small. I mean im usually a 4-6 and i can fit to an 8 but i wore a 10 because it was more roomy. The dress is super tight around the mid section. I've gotten lots of compliments all night long. Just oder a few sizes up just in case so you can breath, sit and eat at events.

Pros and cons: Tight around the rib cage. I'm a 36DD and barely fit in the 10. I am typically an 8. I ordered an 8 and 10. Should have ordered up with the 12. But no bra was needed because it was so tight. Great color and it looked great with a Hollywood glam look added with red lipstick. The details on the shoulders were pretty but most of the large sequins were missing. You couldn't tell much because they are a pewter color and blended with the other sequins. I did notice that one dress had a small slit in the back while the other had a long one, most likely someone ripped it previously. My undies would have surely shown if I bent over. Luckily I was headed to a work holiday party where I'd be standing or sitting in a chair most of the night. Also there was a hole in the side of the waist, nothing a safety pin couldn't fix temporarily. Be aware there is a reason why some of these dresses are discounted so much. Wouldn't rent again but I did get a lot of compliments. And for the price it was a nice dress.
Dress was beautiful and fit wonderful! A little small around thr bottom of the dress but the top fit perfectly. Highly reccomend for a summer/spring wedding!

This dress was actually my 'backup' style for a wedding! I ordered a size 2 last minute, though I normally wear a 0. Most other renters reported that the dress was too small, so I went a size up. While it was definitely formal for the occasion with some bagginess in the torso/chest area, I would have preferred a closer (and more flattering) fit and would definitely rent the 0 next time. The clasp at the top of the back zipper was warped, but this had no effect on closure. Skirt pleats were gorg, and the skirt itself hit just above the knee (again, perfect for the formal nature of the wedding). The dress is a gorgeous ballet slipper pink, and I managed to match a pair of pink kitten heels with it, now that millenial pink is all the rage.
Loved the color and the fit was very flattering. I tried the smaller size on first by mistake and needed help to get it off. Right on the ribs when seated but overall pretty comfortable.

This dress was beautiful and elegant. The dress was just a bit challenging to get on if you are curvy due to a petite waistline. I usually wear a size 2. I ended up wearing the 4 instead of the 2 for comfort when sitting. It fit well and the shoulders gave it the glam factor. Overall, I received many compliments and I had a great time in this dress!

I wore this dress 2 years ago for my husband's company Christmas Party. It is so gorgeous. At the time, my stats were 5'4", 106 lbs, 34C. The 0 fit perfectly. I have never felt more fabulous than when I wore this dress!

links_reviews_title: I received compliments all night long for this dress! It's a perfect mix of a classy and sparkle
links_reviews_text: I really love this dress but wish I had requested another size up. I'm currently between a 6-8 and the 10 fit but was tight on my waist the entire evening. I also read about issues with the bottom being tight, but the dress I wore had a hemmed slit part way up the back of the dress while my backup size didn't, so I'm not sure if someone else had previously ripped it. This dress really is a beautiful shimmery pink and the shoulder bead detail is the perfect amount of sparkly without being gaudy. I would totally recommend it, just be sure to order a few sizes up for a backup size!
Great dress. The zero was small around ribs but 2 worked better.

links_reviews_title: A gorgeous dress - but runs super small!
links_reviews_text: This dress is stunning in person. The fabric, the seaming, the details are all really beautiful and very well made, but the other reviewers are right - this dress runs small! I got it to wear to a black tie wedding and the style ended up being perfect, but both sizes had issues. I ordered a 4 and a 6, expecting to wear the larger size, however, the dress appeared to have been repaired and was sewed together slightly above where the zipper ended, making it nearly impossible to get over my hips. The 4 was slightly tighter through the ribcage, but fit better around the shoulders and was much less of a struggle to pull up over my hips. While the images of the dress show it as super mini, it fits much longer on a petite build. I'm barely 5 feet tall and the dress hit my knees. The dress is also tight around the legs, so use caution when sitting and dancing. I would definitely rent it again and even consider purchasing it so I could alter it to fit perfectly. The only reason I gave it four stars was due to fit.

Wore it for my birthday blog photoshoot! (Check it out here http://eforelisa.com/40th-birthday-wishes/ ) I wanted something pretty, feminine and edgy that really represented my style. A dress to remind myself that I'm still young and ready to have fun. The dress fit great all over. I would totally rent it again!

This dress was cute for a formal charity auction! I didn't like a previous dress I ordered, so RTR sent me this dress in two sizes overnight for an additional $25. Great deal! Got many compliments on the dress. It runs a bit small, especially in the ribcage, so size up 1 to 2 sizes to be safe.

links_reviews_title: Tight fit but got lots of compliments and matched the other bridesmaids dresses.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress but the fit was really tight on me. I usually wear a 6 and barely got into the 8! Once it was on it was very flattering and I liked the hourglass shape it gave me. The cap sleeves are gorgeous but a little restrictive on moving your arms above your head. And the bubble skirt also looks great but does come in a little tight around the thighs. Makes it difficult to bend down and pick something up or dance a lot. I ended up changing into a more comfortable dress for the end of the night dancing, but I'm really glad I had this dress for the ceremony and photos. It was a huge hit and I felt beautiful in it. And it would be perfect for a non-dancing event.
Color is pink enough to wear to a wedding but does not make you look washed out. Beautiful material and such a flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to an evening wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress does run about 1 size small like the other reviews said. The fit is good but it is tighter in the waist. I actually wore my backup size which was the size 4. It was difficult to get on but once it was on it fit really well. The size 2 was too small! The 4 fit great. It does ride up a bit when you sit down but if you are careful it isn't a problem. I wore it to an evening wedding and was able to dance in it. I got a lot of compliments on the dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my Bridal Shower!!
links_reviews_text: Couldn't ask for anything better than this blush pink dress!! Perfect color, perfect fit, elegant!! Love this dress so much
Beautiful color and detail. Accentuates small waist. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous! Loved it for the wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress was form-fitting but comfortable with little embellishments at the shoulders. I received so many compliments on its uniqueness and really loved wearing this dress to my sister's wedding!

links_reviews_title: Loved it, but runs very small!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a wedding and I got so many compliments on it. I loved the quality of the material and the beautiful petal pink color, and the beading on the shoulders was the perfect tough of edge. The only downside was that the waist of this dress is VERY small. I usually wear a size 12 but got a 14 as well because I read that this was the case, but I would have liked to have a 16 if that was possible, it was so tight! Beautiful dress, just make sure to size up!

All the reviews are pretty accurate this dress definitely runs small specifically in the waist and legs but has more room in the chest and hip area (once you get the smaller parts over your hips). I opted for the 6 because the 4 was too uncomfortable in the waist and hard to sit in. It's very understated but pretty. Would definitely recommend! Just make sure you get a size up for your backup size or maybe even two depending on your body type.
It fit nice but was a little tighter around torso
Fits true to size. I am pear shaped, so I loved the bubble skirt! Color and detail on the sleeve are amazing.

links_reviews_title: Great for a holiday black tie event
links_reviews_text: I am petite and liked that this dress worked for me length wise. I received lots of compliments!
Fun short dress for a fun birthday I went to. I'd rent this dress again.
Loved this dress. I wore it to my rehearsal dinner and it was a huge hit! It is the perfect combo of classy and adorable.
I usually wear a size 12 dress depending on the fit, but I was able to wear the 10. It was a tad snug under the chest and a tad short but overall I love it.

This dress is a stunner. For reference, I am 5'7" and 146lbs and usually wear an 8-10. I carry most of my weight in my stomach so I thought this style might be very unflattering but it's the exact opposite. This dress tucked me in and fit perfectly in a large. It's a very dark red; I would almost call it eggplant. I can easily wear a strapless bra with this dress. Such a beautiful dress!!
Fits a little snug. Could have gone up a size but still loved it. The materials thick enough to hide everything so a+

links_reviews_title: The quality of this dress is GREAT!
links_reviews_text: I loved the material, the fit and the cut of this dress. Tons of compliments on this dress and I felt so good in it. Comfortable enough to dance and have fun in without feeling too restricted or uncomfortable. #wedding #greatcolor

links_reviews_title: Simply classy, looks great, and feels great!
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit big, but not uncomfortably so. No bra needed, I felt supported all night. The fabric is on the thicker side. The slit does not stay as creased as on the model, but it didn't really bother me. Overall, I received a ton of compliments on the dress, felt sexy, classy, and confident, and would recommend to other women looking for something to wear to a formal event!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress - color and fit are great!
links_reviews_text: The material is thicker which is great for a spring or fall wedding. It reads formal but also appropriate for a cocktail party. Fitted but very flattering and unique detail with the cutouts and slit. I'd rent again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Classy and flattering for fall wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of this dress - it was form fitting and the off the shoulder look was super flattering. Fit was great, except for I realized when I was wearing it that it was a little less than ideal for three reasons 1) I have bigger boobs and so used sticky pads, and the dress didn't offer much support so I felt like I had to keep adjusting to keep my boobs lifted and away from the cut out on the chest 2) the off the shoulder style did make it a little uncomfortable to dance in, 3) the fabric on the slit had a weird bend from previous wearers (I couldn't manage to iron it away), so it didn't lie flat but instead was weirdly sitting. Despite these things, the dress looked fantastic on, was a really flattering and perfect color for fall, and I have no regrets with my choice.

Wore this dress for graduation pictures and loved it! Probably could have sized down - it felt like there was a lot of fabric in the stomach area that didn't lay flat against me but overall this dress was great!
Great fit, subtle cutout that was very appropriate for a banquet function with fellow professionals. Would absolutely rent again.
This dress was super cute without being slutty. My only complaint is the lining rides a bit making the hem look a little awkward.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color and the feel of the dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! I was a little nervous about the off the shoulder straps staying up, but I’m glad I decided on this dress. The color is more burgundy than red. The only thing I didn’t like was I couldn’t get the slit on my left leg to lay flat. This was my first rental, I will definitely be a returning customer!

I wore this for a winter wedding in Alabama. It was pretty cold so I had to wear a coat for the ceremony held outside. Once I got into the reception though I got so many compliments on this dress. The straps and cutout are so unique and elegant. The color was gorgeous and the fit was amazing! The only part I didn't like was the front slit. The corners didn't lay flat and when sitting it rode up a little too high. I would recommend this dress for a fall affair when it's a little warmer!!

Rented this for a holiday work party. Received lots of compliments and didn't feel like it was too revealing (which I was worried about). The lining on the top kept the shoulders in place and the fit was perfect! Color was beautiful as well. Definitely will rent again.

links_reviews_title: I loved that I had two sizes to choose from!
links_reviews_text: I loved that I had two sizes to choose from, I tried on both and ended up going with the small. I have a larger chest, so I was worried about the fit on top, but it ended up fitting great! It was comforting being able to have two sizes to try on. The dress came fast and was super easy to return!
Comfortable easy to wear would rent again!

Wore this dress to a wedding in November. The length was perfect and the dress was very comfortable to wear. I was between a medium and large but they look pretty similar so I went with the large more comfortable. Got so many compliments on it

I got several compliments on this dress! It fit well...tight, but not too tight. The slit in the thigh bothered me a little bit because it wasn't completely straight, but it wasn't something I focused on all night. Would recommend wearing no bra or pasties as my strapless bra kept showing a little on the front. Would order again and would recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Great color for an outdoor fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is sturdy, so it does a good job of holding you in. I wore a strapless, though could have gotten by without one. Because I was a little heavier than I would have liked to be for this wedding, there was a bit of an issue with puckering on the hem/slit area, but I was really the only one to notice. Tons of compliments all night long. Have worn this in black, and while that was more forgiving overall, I was happy with this look!
My boyfriend proposed to me on a recent vacation when I wore this dress! It fit perfectly and I felt great in it. It's a beautiful color and the material stretches nicely.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Fall Wedding - Tons of Compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was actually my back up but my first choice had a little tear in the zipper so I couldn't wear it. But this dress was perfect for a fall wedding. It was unique and sexy, and I received a ton of compliments throughout the night! Like other reviews said, you can't wear a bra but I did end up having to wear little nipple stickers because it was a bit chilly! Lol

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but runs a tiny bit small
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and great design on this dress but I felt like a little sausage in it. I'm between a size 4 - 8 depending on the designer so a medium should have fit fine but it was a smidge right around the chest / rib cage area. Still happy about the rental.

links_reviews_title: LOVED IT! SO many compliments- in person and on pictures I posted!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is so forgivable and very supportive. I would like to think I have a pretty big chest and I didn't need to where any sort of bra. The dress is also a very conservative length with the slit in the leg to make it fun! The only things I would be aware of are: 1. sitting because the slit sort of goes up a little high and 2. If you really like to dance the arm bands are a little restricting but I made it work! Would 100% rent again.

One of my favorite dresses from rtr. Color was spot on gorgeous for fall and I loved the shoulders and cutout. Fabric was tight (but not tooo tight) with a little stretch. Only thing that annoyed me was that the edge near one side of the slit would not lay flat, but no one noticed except for me!

I wore this to a September wedding and it was the perfect dress for the occasion. The material was comfortable and the color was classy. I was receiving compliments all night long and was able to dance the night away with no problems! This is my favorite dress so far and I'm already thinking about renting again. No complaints!
This dress was perfect! I am 125lbs, 5"3, and 32ddd, and the XS fit the best! I received so many compliments and felt so comfortable in this dress all night!

links_reviews_title: Nice blend of classy and sexy
links_reviews_text: I was really happy with this dress! Very comfortable. I loved that it was form-fitting and had cut-outs, but also liked that it was long enough to balance out those "showy" features. I also loved that it had some stretch to it. I ended up not wearing a bra because the fabric/fit was supportive enough and this was a plus for me. This was my first RTR and I'll definitely be a repeat user now!
Great fit! Be prepared to not have the ability to wear a bra (even strapless) mine was totally visible in the keyhole, so that had to go. Material is forgiving.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress. It was so comfortable. Really debating purchasing.
links_reviews_text: So many compliments on this dress!
I got this as the extra free dress with my order. I was going to wear to the rehearsal dinner but was so uncomfortable in it and decided against it. It would be cool as a party dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress and fit; so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress to attend a summer wedding. Ordered the size small and medium. Ended up wearing the medium, as it fit slightly better. I was a bit worried about the off-the-shoulder being annoying, but it wasn't a problem at all! Received so many compliments all night! Would definitely rent this dress again!

This was a great dress for a September wedding. Very comfortable and I flattering. Received a lot of compliments. I wore the size small and typically I wear a 4 so it ran true to size. Definitely recommend!

The color was perfect! This was a black tie optional wedding at a marina. It was great for the event. It was HOT outside but I never felt like it. The length and off the shoulders gave me some breathing room in the weather. CON: I was constantly adjusting. My bra would show through near my underarms and if I sat or the dress hiked up, you could see my bra in the cut out. However, I received a ton of compliments and would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I accidentally matched the wedding party, but still stood out
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress. Material was thick enough to be flattering, without being too hot. The slit was a little high when I sat down, but I still had room to wear spanx underneath without them showing. My only teeny complaint is that the cut out on the chest is somewhat high, and I had to keep readjusting to make sure my bra wasn't showing.

This dress was perfect for wedding. Got a lot of compliments on it. The dress is very fitted with little stretch to it. Couldn't wear a bra with it due to the cut out but the top was very tight so I didn't feel uncomfortable. I am a size 6/8 and the medium fit perfectly. Only complaint is that the slit is very high when you sit down (can almost see underwear).

links_reviews_title: Wore for graduation and grad party. Able to look classy with an alpaca so it was perfect
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, I usually wear a size 6. Incredibly flattering and wish I could own it!
Loved, very comfortable. Almost like a stretch material, cute neck line too!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress and got so many compliments at the wedding I was at!
links_reviews_text: So comfortable even with a slimmer fit!
It's a wonderful dress and I got a ton of compliments on it. The top was slightly loose but not enough to be an issue. Very comfortable to wear.
I wore this dress to a wedding and I got so many compliments. It was very comfortable and easy to dance in all night...10/10 highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress! Super comfy and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I sized up to a L since it does fit snug and I have a large chest, but the material is thick enough so I felt comfortable in it. I also didn't need to wear a bra with it which is a plus with it being off the shoulder. I would highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Everyone complimented the dress and I was able to dance in it.
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable and I got so many compliments! I am glad that I ordered a back up size to be sure because it was a little snug.

links_reviews_title: The photo doesn't do it justice, it is a lovely dress. I used a black leather belt & red shoes
links_reviews_text: It is very loose and the fabric has a stretch. I had to wear a belt, but loved the look.

This dress was one they sent when my original was not available. Fortunately, I loved it. I received many compliments. It was a hot July day but because it was a lose and flow-y dress, I was very comfortable in it. The slip was form fitting and the overdress is a tad sheer so I didn't feel my shape was lost. I still think about this dress.

Flattering dress with great fit and movement--as you can see, this could work with a belt too, but my coworkers convinced me it was prettier/more fashionable without. The material was light (it came with a perfect black slip underneath) and flowy, and I felt cool throughout a warm day! The material has give and could work with many different body shapes. Will definitely be renting again!
So soft and flowey and comfortable, i loved wearing it! Loose enough that I didn't feel self conscious about rolls ;) but still really flattering.

This dress is gorgeous and so comfortable. As with most Fuzzi styles, it is stretchy to accommodate many different body types. I would size down as a backup. I could have easily worn the L and the XL was very roomy. At 5'5 this style hit below the knee on me.
Light fabric, comfy loose fit. I probably could have gone down a size. Less see-through than it looks on the model pic. Recommend for more casual events, would be bump friendly
I wore this dress to work. It was a little on the fancier side, but I just wanted to wear it! It was extremely comfortable and looked great all day.
Cute. Comfy.

links_reviews_title: OK, but a little old ladyish on this old lady
links_reviews_text: It's the high neck with the longer length. Just didn't look good on me. Otherwise liked the colors and it seemed high enough quality. Did not wear it.
Lovely in person, needed a belt and it looked like a potato sack on me, in the end I didn't wear because of how it just hung on me. Lightweight and would be great for summer.
Large, loose.
I will wear this again very nice
This was a super easy dress to wear to work. I paired it with a leather motorcycle jacket. I received many compliments all day.

links_reviews_title: A little big but i like it!
links_reviews_text: This rental comes with two pieces because the dress itself is a bit see through. While the black slip hugged my body well (a good balance between loose & tight), the dress itself was a little loose BUT in a good way! I think it would look odd if it was more form fitting. I can definitely see this paired with a belt but I think a cropped or fitted jacket over it works well too which is how I styled it. With my petite size, it fell slightly above my ankles. I styled these with ankle booties.
So comfy and flattering
This dress is beautiful and so comfortable. I rented it for my wedding anniversary date and it was perfect. Will rent it again.

links_reviews_title: So flattering and gorgeous. I get so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: If you are hourglass shaped, I recommend belting!
This dress is not flattering by itself. I added a snakeskin belt and heels to make something of it. My body type is pretty straight and without the belt it did nothing for me.
The dark lining moves all around which can be super embarrassing when it rides up given how sheer the dress is. Definitely plan on wearing an alternate liner if you get this one

This dress is so comfortable. I wore it on a very humid day in NYC and the breezy fabric and loose fit kept me comfortable in the heat. It is a big big for my taste, which is why I said it runs large. I got a few compliments on the dress, but not a ton like when I've worn other RTR pieces.
I got this dress for my mother in law for dinner. She usually wears Large and the medium fit her perfectly. I would recommend sizing down as the dress runs larger.
Very cute. Wore belted with a blazer.
The dress was very pretty light weight and comfortable. It looked great on! Wore to dinner and got complimented.
Simple dress. Loose fitting.
It's a really pretty dress and the material is great. Definitely flattering. I just didn't end up needing to wear it. I would say this is true to size.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit was just ok - did not really like
links_reviews_text: Dress fits very loose at the waist and as a result is a bit unflattering.
One of my favourite RTR rentals. Runs large so I wore it with a belt to give shape.

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress but runs large.
links_reviews_text: Would love it in a small size.

Rented for a christening in September. It is dark but the flowers lend it a summer-to-fall. Looked a little formal but I was able to dress it down with some pretty sandals. Got a ton of compliments. I am petite (5'1") so it fell mid-shin but length was fine nonetheless. Please note that the waist does NOT taper which was a bit of a surprise to me.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and pretty dress for Christmas brunch
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little worn- but it is a rental. I am short and it was longer than in the picture and very loose. Really beautiful colors and very comfortable for a holiday brunch.
Beautiful dress in a lovely autumnal pattern and color scheme. Got many compliments! Just make sure to belt it.

I wore this dress for both a day time shower & date night with my husband - I am kicking myself for not snapping a photo! It was so beautiful on - versatile for Summer or Fall, a little modern for work but could definitely get away with it for day time if paired with a jacket - or, if you have the excuse of very hot weather! This dress made me feel like a million bucks, I didn't want to part with it! Also it was my first time wearing this designer - can't wait to try more from them!

So sad I didn't get a good shot of this dress. I wore it twice once for a small charity event with hairdressers and for a day at work. So easy to wear. The slip is so soft I could have worn it all day. The overlay is gauzy and light perfect for a hot day. The fit was easy, hides all flaws because of the flowy (apparently not a word) shape. Would recommend for anyone who's looking for a great day dress, a level up from casual.

links_reviews_title: This dress is like a tent
links_reviews_text: Was not able to wear this dress. I am 18 weeks pregnant and my bump is on the small size. Dress did not fit at all, way too much fabric if you are only a little bit pregnant.
I added a belt to the waist to make it look less maternity, and got tons of compliments. Beautiful, floaty dress that moves like a dream. So comfortable. So cute.
Cute summery dress, very comfy , good dress to wear around town or to a restaurant. I wish was a more summery color.

links_reviews_title: If you want an easy to move in/comfortable dress, this is for you!
links_reviews_text: This dress is SO comfortable!!! Flowy but still elegant and flattering to curves. I got so many complements, it was perfect for a late summer/early fall wedding. Safety pins at the bust are a must so you don't pop out. Also would recommend wearing spanks. With spanks and a few safety pins, I was able bowl comfortably all night, no problem!
Great dress, perfect color for fall, super comfy and I felt beautiful

I rented this dress for my engagement photos. I think it photographed extremely well and was very flattering on my figure. However, this dress is not made for busty women. I was showing way more than I was comfortable with and had to hike up the neckline after every shot. It worked well for a photo shoot because I could adjust it, but I would not have been comfortable wearing it all night. I tried to use fashion tape, but it showed through the material

links_reviews_title: Perfect for late summer/early fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I was pretty much in love with this dress from the get go and it definitely met my expectations. Went with the L just to be safe in the hip/thigh area but the M probably would have been fine too. Dress is lovely and comfortable. Skirt can be a little see-through if you're wearing dark underwear so I would definitely stick to neutrals underneath.

links_reviews_title: Perfect option for cousin's church wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress worked great. I bought cheap wedges on popzora to go with the dress and shipped the dress ahead to where the wedding was so I didn't have to bring a big bag on the plane. I got SO many compliments! I safety pinned the dress in 2 places so that I didn't spill out of it in church, but to be honest it fit so great I was comfortable all night for over 12 hours and never fussed with the dress. I got the large regular as my backup size but it was too baggy so I wore the medium regular.

Wore the dress for a more casual rehearsal dinner at a brewery. It was light, flowy and comfortable! Used sticky tape to hold the middle together so it was not too low cut as that is not what I wanted. XL Was too big. Got great feedback from friends also.
Love, love this dress! It was flowy enough to be able to dance and eat with zero discomfort and still showed a bit of my curves. I’m usually in between a S/M and the small fit perfectly.
Absolutely loved this dress. It wrapped and fell beautifully, great simple yet bright colors for a casual backyard wedding
True wrap dress- very flattering cut. The neckline is lower than I would normally wear so ended up using some wardrobe tape just for my personal peace of mind. Absolutely loved this dress!

Loved this dress and received so many compliments! I'm 5'9 and the length was perfect (without heels). The dress runs slightly large in the waist, but otherwise it's pretty true to size. There's a button on the inside, then you wrap and tie the dress. I wish it had two buttons for a slightly tighter fit. It was a windy day and I found myself trying to hold me dress from opening at times. Overall, it's a beautiful dress and I am strongly considering purchasing.
Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Fit was great but I did not like the yellowish color at all. Mustardy with a hint of brown tones.

links_reviews_text: had to wear an undershirt to cover the chest area - runs a bit small

links_reviews_title: 100+ degree heat for and outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am large up top so I have a difficult time finding dresses that waist doesn't ride up. this dress worked out well on very short notice. there was a heat wave on the east and the wedding was outdoors, the original dree I chose wouldn't have worked, this was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Random straight dude stopped to tell me it was a GORGEOUS dress
links_reviews_text: Wrap dresses are the best! No matter how you're feeling, always looks good. Got lots of "you look so skinny" comments from coworkers.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a wedding at a vineyard. The dress is very lightweight and it comfortable All night long.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, length was perfect for me at 5'6" with flats or heels because of the high-low. Super comfy and lightweight. Slightly see through on bottom if you have the sun behind you. Make sure you cross the left leg when you sit, when you cross with the right, the fabric kind of slides away on you! Got lots of compliments on this dress. Don't be afraid of the color, it is very pretty on.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, light and perfect for summer dancing!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size - I'm a 10/12 and wore a L (34DDD chest, 5'4") and it was a great length. I imagine if you have a smaller chest there could be some gapping/need for pins around the chest. It was a hit, I got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable and summery. Got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: A touch see through around underwear. I'm 5'5, 140 lbs
Easy to throw on and go for drinks or day time hang

links_reviews_title: This fit more like a size 8. I couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Too tight in the mid-section and very revealing if you have a large chest

links_reviews_title: Received many complements on the color. It is very comfortable for a casual wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress is see through and thus requires careful undergarment choices.

links_reviews_title: I could have worn a medium but the large was fine. Cozy. So many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved so much I bought it.
Received tons of compliments. Felt a little big I think a small would've fit better.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Renting again next shipment but smaller size.
links_reviews_text: This color is amazing and the fit is very flattering. I got the large since the M was not available, and while I made it work, I definitely needed a smaller size, I just tied it extra tight to where it was a bit bunches up. Length was awesome for me, I'm 5'10. The main part you want to for is at the waist, and my waist is only 28, so I think even the small could work. Even with being a little big, loved it and got tons of compliments.

This dress was great! I dressed it down with a jean jacket, but easily could have worked for a summer wedding. The only downside was that the inside button unbuttoned itself a few times, but it wasn't a big deal.
Bottom completely see through. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: This fits like a dream without being too low cut.
links_reviews_text: Color is more of a mustard Yellow with pretty flowers and not too long for my short frame.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but got to be careful of the cleavage

links_reviews_text: This dress was a big hit. So many of my coworkers said I needed to buy this dress after renting it. The interior button sometimes came undone, but I kept it tied right. Love this dress!

This blouse is very sheer, so will need a cami underneath. The black cami I wore complimented the green really well, but didn't show through. The fit was true to size, so no fit issues. I would consider the color a bit brighter than hunter green. I wore it with tan pants and a pair of knee high black and brown riding boots.

links_reviews_title: Great transition top for spring days
links_reviews_text: It is spring here, so the weather fluctuates from 40*F in the morning up to 70*F in the afternoon. This top is perfect for adjusting to the temperature changes. It is a dark green pattern but the shirt is completely sheer, so I wore with a black cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Green shirt for St Patrick's day
links_reviews_text: Slightly tight at the top. I wish the v neckline was deeper.
Beautiful blouse for everyday that can be dressed up or down. The ruffles are light and not too much.

links_reviews_title: top definitely makes me feel confident, even with a larger chest
links_reviews_text: very cute blouse, had to wear a cami underneath because it is see through, good fit for work and weekend wear, color is lovely.
fit well

links_reviews_title: Love the ruffle on the sleeve. So pretty!
links_reviews_text: This blouse fits true to size. I wore it a couple of times. I loved it, but my husband did not like the color on me. It is an olive-y green and the flower print is pink and lavendar. Very pretty, if you can wear that shade of green. I wore with a pair of Vince pull on, pleat front, trousers.
