Wore this to a black tie optional wedding and loved it! Great thick fabric with a really cool texture and sheen to it - and lots of stretch! Definitely a long dress - I wish it was maybe 1-2 inches shorter on me but overall a great dress.
Wore it to a late afternoon wedding and evening symphony concert, it was perfect

I wore this dress for our engagement photo shoot - while definitely in between a size S and M, I opted for the S so the length could fit. I am normally a dress size 4 - 6 and the S was snug, but the side zipper helped. It accentuates all the right places and is simply elegant. I am contemplating purchasing this dress!

This 8 was really snug but doable. That said, once I was zipped in I didn't feel pretty. The combination of skin tight, there's a little sheen to the dress, and the coverage at the top wasn't my best look.

I wore this dress to a formal wedding. Only tip I will give is this dress is really tight so be prepared to suck it in! I rented small and medium and medium ended up fitting me! Overall I loved this dress

The dress was very comfortable. The fit was snug and held everything in. My picture was taken on a weird angle which makes the dress appear longer then it actually was. I am 5'4" and it was tea length. I wore it to a work party so i didn't want to be too flashy. It was subdued enough, yet fashionable. I received several compliments throughout the evening.

links_reviews_title: I wanted something that I felt and looked fantastic in.
links_reviews_text: Fit was SNUG. I planned to order the medium and large (backup size) but by the time I placed my order the large wasn't available. Because I had read so many reviews, I felt OK just going with the medium. Because the zipper is on the side, I struggled to get the few inches beside my bust zipped myself (had to have the hubs help with that). Once it was on and zipped, it looked fantastic, no one would have said it was too tight and it felt grippy in a good way, like it was helping me stand taller. The reason I loved this dress and would recommend is because it is the kind of dress that makes a statement without standing out. You look amazing but people still see you. I was officiating a wedding, so while I wanted to look and feel good, I didn't want to draw too much attention to myself (and away from the bride) with prints or colors but I also didn't want to feel frumpy or dreary. Goal accomplished with this dress! Would highly recommend.
Comfortable

I wore this dress to my husband's graduation ceremony from his medical residency (no photos from that funny enough). It's a lovely dress for an occasion like that - I didn't want to stand out too much but I did want to look formal and put together as it was an evening dinner at the Four Seasons. But it's really not a show-stopper like other RTR dresses I've rented. I recommend better shoes than what I wore (kind of short black strapped sandals).

For being form fitted, this dress was extremely comfortable. The material is very stretchy and easy to move around and dance in. I rented the S and XS - both fit me similar but the S was stretched out in the bust region. GREAT rental highly recommend!

I needed something conservative, but also wanted to look elegant. This dress nailed it. The fit was very form fitting, but the material is stretchy so you don't feel stiff in it. I'm petite, and the length was perfect, just hit around my ankles wearing the small regular.

Very comfortable dress. I usually wear a size 6 and went with the small. It hugs all the curves, the good and the bad. Left me a little self conscious. Great length for my 5'8" frame. Would rent again.
Fabric is stretchy but fitting. Comfortable, classy and would recommend!
Felt great in this dress. Nice length, with the right amount of sexy and elegance.

Beautiful dress! The black on black textured details were very flattering. It's cut small, especially in the arm hole/ bust area but it still fit very well. For those on the shorter side like myself it will hit you at the ankle. Material was very stretchy and comfortable. I had no issues dancing or moving and got a lot of compliments. My only problem was getting in and out of it. The zipper is on the side so if you're going to get an updo as I did, be sure to have help getting in and out of it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect little black dress with a twist!
links_reviews_text: The ruching is very flattering and forgiving :) I am 5'7 and the length was perfect and hit right above my ankles (if you are short, this dress wouldn't be good for you). . The dress was so comfortable and has great stretch to it. I received so many compliments on it as it isn't your standard black dress! I especially loved the little ruffle at the bottom! This will definitely be my go to black dress from now on!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a work event
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a black tie event the nonprofit I work for was hosting. We were required to wear black (which I find really boring) and with the ruffles and fun texture, this dress at least had a little something different. It was perfect for all the running around I had to do; I was able to wear a regular bra and felt comfortable the whole night. The only thing that bothered me was that the zipper was on the side of the dress, rather than the back, so the inevitable buckling that happens along the zipper line disrupted the smooth line of the waist- I'm sure it's something only I noticed but I felt the need to double check that the dress was pulled down snug on that side before any pictures.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress. Felt absolutely beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Body conscious dress. Fitted and flirty. The fabric of this dress is heavier but that's a positive. It helps give shape so the dress hugs all the right places without stretching as the night goes on.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for work party!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It fit snug, but still had enough give for walking which is crucial in a midi mermaid style. I wanted to pair it with a leather jacket ( I hate my arms), but it ended up being too boxy and heavy. I'll definitely rent again.
Definitely hugs the body but a comfortable fit. I'm 4'11'' so the dress was more ankle length on me which was perfect! The texture of the material helps camouflage imperfections. Lol

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress! Super flattering. Definitely form-fitting, but material is thick and holds everything in. Loved it and would rent again!

At 5'2", I loved that I could wear this long dress to a formal event without ridiculously high heels. The model shows this dress hitting mid-calf, but since I'm short the dress grazed my ankles. The Small fit perfectly, but the XS was sooo tiny that I could barely get it over my head. It's very body hugging, but the fabric kind of acts like Spanx, sucking you in! The flared bottom is a nice little twist on a simple long black dress.

links_reviews_title: Great for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Tight dress but pretty forgiving and incredibly comfortable. I'm tall so the length was great with heels. Easy to move in and always a plus being able to wear a normal bra. The texture adds a unique touch to an otherwise very classic black dress. Dress came in great condition so no cons with my experience.

The dress is stretchy and very form fitting, so comfortable to move and sit in and very easy to wear. You can use a regular bra but you might want to opt for shape wear because the dress shows every bump and curve unless you are really thin. The one design flaw with this dress is that the zipper is located on the side of the dress. Since the fabric is very stretchy and soft and the zipper is stiff and inflexible, the zipper buckled along the side of the dress when I moved instead of lying smoothly along the side of the body. I used a wide belt which hid this noticeable fit issue. I gave the rating 4 stars because of zipper issue. I would otherwise highly recommend the dress because it is very sexy,so flattering and extremely comfortable. I received compliment all day about a gorgeous dress!!! Someone told me I should buy it!!

links_reviews_title: Easy and comfortable dress that looked very chic!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress. I have a 36 DDD chest and carrying some extra weight right now so I was a little nervous to wear the dress, but with a great pair of Spanx I was feeling super confident! I was effortless, comfortable and chic looking. I would rent it again!

This was my first RTR experience. I was nervous because it was a big night and I was unsure of how it would fit. I was so happy when I put the first dress on! It fit like it was made for me. This is probably my absolute most favorite dress I have ever worn! The texture and the sheen of the dress made it look so sexy, but also very classy. It had a little bit of stretch so it hugged in all the right places, but the material was thick enough that you can wear a regular bra and panties and not worry about panty lines showing. Really, I could not be happier with this experience!
I received compliments all night. It's a little heavy, so its better worn for a fall or winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: The event was a Monopoly themed hospital fund raiser. The dress was easy to wear & loved the length.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the Small & the Medium, I am a size 6. Didn't even try on the Small, the medium hugged EVERY curve. Be prepared to see your every asset!! The material is thick enough, so it is comfortable. Loved the ruffle & the midi length.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is definitely form fitting but hugs in all the right places. Perfect for a family wedding.
Material was too stretchy. Fit nice but not my favorite.

links_reviews_title: Wore to an elegant April wedding. Awesome dress; tons of compliments; great for dancing, too!
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting but material is stretchy enough to find all the right curves. Saw other dresses similar in style but this was the best one due to the excellent quality of the fabric. Looked and felt expensive, classy and sexy all at the same time. Medium size fit perfectly. Came down almost to ankles; low heels looked fine. (Higher heels also lovely for younger ladies.) 5'7"; slim build.

I thought this dress was okay -- I didn't love it as much as I was expecting. It was comfortable and fit pretty well, but the length felt a bit awkwardly long on me. It's a solid dress, but I've worn better on RTR.

Dress was gorgeous! I got compliments all night. The flirty end was fantastic. And ribbed fabric super forgiving. True to size. I went with the medium because of my bust size and height but the small would have worked also.
Dress has nice stretch to it, I was afraid it would be too small but it fit like a glove. XS was longer on me than shown in the picture, I am 5'1". Beautiful dress!
I rented for a formal wedding and it was perfect. I received a ton of compliments

I loved this dress, it was super comfy and flattering. My only complaints would be 1: although it fit and was not overly tight it kept riding up and scrunching up around my waist. 2: it had a few snags when it arrived...nothing major...overall would recommend.

I rented this dress for a black tie gala for work and it was the perfect choice! Dressy enough for the event but comfortable and appropriate to wear while working as well. The fabric is really stretchy which makes it super easy to wear. I was concerned the dress might be too tight and restrict movement but it didn't at all. Other great plus is that you can wear a normal bra. I loved wearing this dress and received tons of compliments for the unique style. Pair with a fun pair of shoes and you're good to go!

Loved the fabric, style and fit. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 was because it rides up a little creating a bubble effect on the side where the zipper it. Also I recommend this dress for someone on the taller side, I am 5'6 and it was a lot longer that's expected definitely past my mid calf.

I liked this dress because I got to show off my new shoes. The material was very nice but didn't suck you in if that is what you're looking for. I found it to run a bit on the small side but I was able to wear it still. Once I got it on I didn't feel constricted.

I rented this to officiate my best friend's wedding. I am nursing so bustier than normal and wanted to make sure the girls were covered. Warning to my large chested friends, you may encounter some significant side boob. Also, the dress puckers oddly on the side near the zipper. I have a short torso, so perhaps that's why it did this to me. All in all, gorgeous dress. Hugged my curves perfectly, yet was very slimming.
This romper was so comfortable yet classic. You can dress this up or down. Perfect!

This is very cute. Easy summer outfit you can dress up or down. Some construction issues that I didn't love: The buttons at the back of the neck are small and hard to undo and redo, making bathroom breaks an annoying challenge. Also, you can't wear a bra with this one, which I personally don't love (the fabric overlay helps; that also hides any belly issues).
So cute and I love the neckline and open back. Only 2 issues, the buttons at the top are really difficult to fasten and if you are long waisted it does a little "creeping".
So cute and really flattering. Size up if you have a curvy bottom half
It was super cute fit great
The inseam was so short on this romper. It fit everywhere else. The next size may have been too baggy up top on me.

LOVE this!!! Great for hiding a thicker midsection and very flattering cut overall. I didn't pay attention to the fact that a special bra might be needed to wear this but it's everything I hoped it would be!

links_reviews_title: That it covered my pouch! I felt sexy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great!
Perfect fit
runs very short
After trying to figure out how to put this on for about five minutes, I finally succeeded. It looked like a sack. I love wearing the "oversized" look, but have to be careful as a petite. Not for me.
Just was complimentary looking, even in the smaller size. I tried the M and S but neither looked right on me.

links_reviews_title: Wore out to the bars for a bachelorette party. Classic piece.
links_reviews_text: A little boxy and not much shape overall, but fit well and was very comfortable. Also a nice material.
I loved this romper. I did not wear a bra and it was fine

I loved this romper. It wasn't too difficult to put on and looks great. I wore the medium and it fit well, but it was a tad short in the torso- perfect on the legs tho. If you have a longer torso it may not be the most comfortable thing in the world.
Received new with tags, was way too big and too long for my taste. I'm 5'7" and 130lb.

links_reviews_title: Cute Flowy romper can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: Very flowy.... I wore a medium but I could have gone with a small if I wanted a more fitted feel. I'm usually a size 8 for tops and 4 or 6 for bottoms. The length was just right not too short. I'm a 36 c and thought I'd be able to wear a strapless bra but because of the open back it looked funny. I ended up wearing a pretty strappy yoga bra so the detailing showed on the open back.

I have rented this dress in all the colors/similar styles by this designer. I love it. It's very fun and comfy yet can be worn to work too. I have rented while pregnant and when not and i love it either way. I'd say it runs a bit big just bcuz it's a thick type material. When not pregnant i order size XS and I am usually around a larger size 2. 5'3 135lbs. While pregnant i have ordered in a size small and it fit great. I went with medium this time and I'm 27weeks 158lbs but small would be ok too

Unique pattern and colors. Scuba like material, but it wasn't as tight as other scuba dresses. If it had been it might have made me look thinner versus a bit frumpy at times unless I was standing with perfect posture. Sometimes it accentuated my "fanny pack" which is why I didn't looove it.

Super comfy and easy to wear. I'm a size 8/10, and probably could have gone down to a medium but the large worked and wasn't skintight. Pattern is flattering and the colors are fun...particularly if you are a Seattle Seahawks fan like me!

I felt great in the dress and it felt flattering on my body, even with my curves. I got a bunch of compliments too. The fabric is sturdy and thick. One drawback was that after wearing it for the evening it felt like it stretched out quite a bit and lost its shape some. I might go down a size for this reason if I get it again.

links_reviews_title: I meet me husband at the airport in this beautiful dress. He automatically gave me compliments!!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size in my opinion. I received many compliments from people when I wore the dress. The colors are vibrant which, when with my skin tone very well. Great dress to dress up or dress done.
The waist fit me a bit large and you want to be sure you wear a bra with good lift to ensure the lines are flattering.
This dress is super tight! It's really cute but beware it's very tight fabric.

So this dress is kind of like a sweater material so it's a little clingy, but not tight if that makes sense. I'm 5'2" and the dress fell just above my knees. I loved the color combinations together - navy and lime are two of my favorite colors together! This dress also definitely runs big. I was wearing the XS and had plenty of room. I'm usually a 0-2.

links_reviews_title: Great colors, striking dress, feels great, too long for me in back/waist
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to wear this; loved the fabric, the fit and especially the design and colors. The size 8 fit well everywhere except in the back, where the zipper buckled out. I couldn't get past that, thinking that the side and back views would not be so great. This would might not be a problem for someone taller, or longer from neck to waist in back. Too bad! I highly recommend it for comfortable feel, high quality fabric, and vibrant colors. I will give it a try in size M when available.
I got tons of compliments on this dress today! It's tight fitting but the thicker fabric is more forgiving, but it breaths really well. It really pops too! #tvnews #reporterdress

I originally chose a different dress, but this was my secondary. I chose to wear this dress because of the perfect fit and bright colors. Hides unsightly curves but accentuates the good curves. The material is thicker than other sheath dresses and has a comfortable zipper in back. I got so many compliments and the best came from my husband. I highly recommend this fun dress. I wore to a charity benefit and had a great night. This will be a go to dress in the future.
Form fitted, bright pattern Easy spring dress for work😊
Fits perfectly and is very flattering. I made it sporty with cool sneakers and dressed it up with heels, goes from day to night easily and is super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Size up or wear you typical size
links_reviews_text: Great material. Super stretchy. Amazing color

Wore this twice in one week to a style show/champagne brunch and a wine tasting (in different cities). It is perfect for early spring and I got so many compliments on the colors and style of the dress. Fit is TTS but I probably could've worn the XS. There was a little room in the waist and the XS might have been a little more flattering.
Nice snug fit without being too tight. Fun color combination. Did hit a little awkwardly at knee but ended up looking ok. After sitting down to dinner the behind got a bit stretched out.
It was not made for my body type- likely better for someone much shorter and in extremely good shape.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress. Received tons of compliments all day.
links_reviews_text: Hugs in all the right places.
I loved this dress. It felt like a chic summer outfit that I could wear at work and then out to drinks, and look completely comfortable and fashion forward in both spaces
Great colors , form fitting, and definitely a head turning dress! My husband loved it!

Rented this same dress previously but in a different color combo- loved this one just as much! Great fit even on my longer frame and the color combo is so unique. Looks like white stripes but it's actually a light lilac which sounds unusual but looks amazing in person.

links_reviews_title: It didn't. It was fine. Not unforgettable.
links_reviews_text: It was an easy work option. Perfect rental. Fabric was stretchy so it gives a little.
Am by no means a size small but might try that next time as I really enjoy J&& dresses
Loved it and now I own it! Nough said.
Good fit. Comfy to wear
The dress was so comfortable and fit great. I almost bought it!
Love the colors, super comfy but very large. Would rent again but in a small.
I really like this dress and got a lot of compliments. Very form-fitting but was a bit long on me. I'm only 5'3", though. Would rent again. Very forgiving and does hide bumps and lumps.
Wore a size small, should've ordered an XS. Wonderful quality.
It fit a little loose. Very comfortable. :)
Gave me weird baggy fabric hips. Strangely shapeless and weird shaped at the same time. Runs big, but also extra big in random places. order down.

links_reviews_title: it was a bit large on me. wont wear it
links_reviews_text: same as above
Love it but I feel like I'm swimming in a small. I'm a curvy 4/6 so not usually an xs

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments from the gals at work.
links_reviews_text: Great dress and fits well, good for work to happy hour or outdoor lunch. The stripes and geometric fit were flattering and the fabric was thicker so no need for super spanx.
True to size and lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an outdoor rehearsal Dinner!!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Fitted. Perfect mid-length. Great for full bust. Amazing colors!!

links_reviews_title: Wore it on the town in the Hamptons. Fit the bill, but no love for the dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress is tapered at the bottom, so it felt restrictive, and as the material was thick, not very summery. I felt it made my stomach look like it was pooched out, and per my spouse, apparently it made my butt look big, too. On to the next...

Really wonderful for every day wear. A woman even stopped me at the airport to say it was beautiful. Fabric is stretchy, making the dress comfortable for even 9+ hours of weather delays at the airport
This is a bright, sporty, unique dress that can be dressed up or down. It's form fitting, but true to size.
Will def rent this dress and brand again! medium ran a little bigger than expected.... super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and amazing Customer Service!
links_reviews_text: First off the customer service RTR provided was amazing! I received notification the day before I was supposed to receive the original dress I ordered that RTR couldn't send it since it was either not returned in time or damaged by the previous renter. I called into the RTR customer service line and was met with a very nice young man that went through the filters of available dresses in my sizes that could be overnighted to me, he added them as "favorites" to my account so I could easily see them in the RTR app, and stayed on the phone with me until I chose one. He was very patient, truly concerned and extremely helpful. I received this dresses the next day and I think this style was even better than the original I ordered. The fabric is strong, with a slight stretch. I did have shape-wear on underneath to smooth any bumps, but I received multiple compliments on the dress all night. Wore this to a black tie wedding in South Florida.

Heavy fabric - would be great for colder climates. True to size, except for length. The "L" was really long, even with heels it was dragging on the ground. I would recommend some kind of support for the girls, no bra is great for smaller busts.

I purchased a Macy's gown and soon saw others had it. The week of the event, I decided to try RTR and wanted a low priced dress that didn't look cheap. This dress is beyond expectations! The fit was perfect, great price, incredible quality. It's double lined and very thick. The zipper is VERY difficult and you'll need someone to help. I got tons of compliments!! Wish I could buy it. RENT THIS!
I rented for a black tie event. Fit perfectly. The back was gorgeous. Received many compliments and felt beautiful! Husband loved it!! Would certainly rent again!

This was a replacement dress & was the perfect fit. Definitely fitted through midsection. I carry most of my weight there so I wasn't sure out it would turn out but the material is thick & smoothed out my tummy. You definitely need someone to help zipper the dress. The top was a bit roomy for me but I have a smaller chest. The pads in the top were all over the place so I had to spend some time fixing them. The back is stunning. The fit & flair look was beautiful & I got lots of compliments.
This dress was extremely flattering. It was extremely comfortable and had some stretch. The lace detail is beautiful.
This was sent as a replacement for my original dress that didn't fit. It was true to size and perfect! It's so pretty in person! If you rent this you won't regret it!

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! So elegant and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. I felt very comfortable all evening long. This was the first dress I rented from RTR and it really helped me to choose the correct size by reading the reviews and sizes of the other women who rented it.
I am typically a size 14 but I am 11 weeks pregnant with my second baby so things have shifted quickly. The dress came in at just the right places. Zipper can be tricky. Two person job for sure.
This was a beautiful and comfortable black tie dress. It has lace detail and fits well without being too constricting. I'm 5'2" and it was the perfect length with 3 inch heels. Highly recommend!

I loved wearing this dress - it was the perfect amount of sexy but classy to wear to a wedding with my boyfriend's family. It was definitely on the long side for me, I originally wanted to order a petite/short size but regular was all that was available. However, with heels it hit right at the floor. The material is thicker than I thought it would be, which actually made it perfect for an outdoor wedding in October. It's also more form fitting than I anticipated, and hugged my hips/stomach

links_reviews_title: I wore to the Emmys and glammed it up with some rhinestone trendy clips.
links_reviews_text: The back is the showstopper of this dress. It is classy and sexy without being trashy.

Beautiful, lots of compliments, super comfortable. I'm 5'4 and the long allowed me to have floor length while wearing 3 inch heals. I think it runs a little small, glad I went up a size. But the fit was perfect. This was actually the backup dress.
Beautiful dress. Fabric was so comfy. Zipper was a little hard because of the lace in the back. Other than that, recieved a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! Simple, yet stood out in the crowd.
links_reviews_text: This dress was simple, yet stunning. I sized up a size, since it was a very fitted dress. It's not the easiest dress to wear. Sitting down or bending down was a struggle, but I was on my feet most of the night anyway. I would definitely recommend this dress. It looks better in person than online.

links_reviews_title: Classy and interesting dress for a formal fundraiser.
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful in person. The details of the lace cutouts and the back make this dress special. Tons of compliments. Fit like a glove. Would definitely recommend for my hourglass sisters out there.
Received so many compliments on this dress! I usually wear a size 6/8 and wore a size 10 as the size 8 was only slightly too small. Beautiful detailing on the back and great material.

This was my first time renting a gown and I never RTR wouldn't fail me! I wore to a benefit gala in NYC and felt like a million bucks. Nice form fitting look with a stretchy material to keep you comfortable and confident. The style on the back was the draw for me, allowing me to feel classy and sexy at the same time. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wonderful dress option! Fits like a glove.
links_reviews_text: Originally got a 6 which ended up being too big and short (I'm 5'5" and felt that the 6R fell right at my feet). I live in NYC so I was able to get the 4L same day. My heels were about 4.5/5" tall so the longer length was a perfect choice.

Great dress. I'm usually between a 4 and a 6 and the 4 was a little snug, but the 6 was perfect. Very slimming and I got lots of compliments! Wore it for a bridesmaid dress and it so easy to move in and photographed well
This dress fits great. The 6L pas perfect with heels and I'm tall. I highly recommend!
Has some stretch, nice hem kicks out of the way for easy walking.

The silhouette cut of this dress is beautiful. I loved the thickness of the dress and simple, but elegant style. I got the 6L only because the 6R was not available. It was verrry long, and I was worried it wasn't going to work. But I pulled it off with high heels anyway, sacrificing a bit of drag. My boyfriend convinced me that's how the stars do it, so I accepted it. In the end, I loved it and felt amazing in it!
Absolutely loved this dress. The detailing in it is beautiful, I received many compliments. I was comfortable in the dress all night. I definitely recommend going a size up

I wore this dress to officiate a friend's winter wedding. The dress was elegant and sophisticated - perfect for a more formal affair. I ordered a size or two up, and because the cut/detail was high on the waist, it did a great job of accommodating my growing baby bump. I definitely recommend this dress for the #secondtrimester. I also wore it without a bra, but next time I would wear some of those sticky cups.
Great dress for a black tie wedding. Fabric is heavier which makes it nice for winter and less need for Spanx.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear because it is not too long and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The dress is form fitting, yet flattering. The material is thick, but it has some stretch and give. The style is elegant and classy, yet has a little edge to it with the exposed back and lace detail. I would highly recommend this dress!
Doesn’t show a lot of skin, just at arms and back. So you keep your dignity looking elegant still. Super comfortable as well. I’m 5’6 and about 135lb. The reg length was fine.

links_reviews_title: This was my backup dress, but once I tried it on I knew it was the one I should wear.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, very true to size. I wore a 2 inch heel with it and was just the right length. It does take 2 people to zip up because of the beautiful lace detail in the back.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable. It's great for colder weather. The fabric is heavier and there is nice built in full length slip. It made me feel beautiful, sexy, and confident!

This was my first RTR and could not be happier. Dress was exactly as described, arrived on time and fit perfectly. My build is tall and thin and have never been able to wear a dress off the rack without alterations. This was a first and it fit like a glove. The dress arrived clean and well taken care of and was perfect for the black tie gala.

I absolutely loved this dress! I ordered it for a NYE black tie event and it was perfect. I am 5'6" and the long was perfect with heels. The back was stunning and I got so many compliments on it! I will definitely be ordering from RTR again!
Fits true to size. Stretchy and comfortable!
I'm 5'6", 34C and 125 lbs. The 4R was perfect with 3" heels. The gown was comfortable, no bra necessary and the back was beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Beautiful, classy and comfortable
links_reviews_text: The back of this dress was my favorite part! Definitely wear your hair up to show it off. The fabric is very nice and is a heavier weight, so it was perfect for the NYE wedding I wore it to. I am 5’5 and a half, 120 lbs. and the regular was long enough to just brush the floor with 3” heels. The only con was that the zipper was difficult to get up. I got lots of compliments! It’s a beautiful, elegant gown.

This is an amazing dress. The fabric is high quantify and form fitting, but comfortable. It is easy to move and dance in! I wore this as a bridesmaid dress in a December wedding. I had it on for 10 hours with no regrets. If you have a small chest I would recommend sizing down due to the shape of the top. My only complaint is the zipper is difficult and was on both sizes I received. It took two people to zip me up. Otherwise, a beautiful dress. Would rent again!

Thé dress is absolutely gorgeous. Pros: it has some give and stretch. The dress moves when you move. No bra is needed. You’ll receive a ton of compliments! It’s a classy but sexy dress. Cons: be aware, you can not zip the dress up yourself. You will need help. You will also need help getting out of the dress. If you are a pear Shape, order your size and a size up just to be on the safe side. I ordered the 4 & 6. Thé 6 fit better around the hips but thé 4 fit better around the breasts and waist. I wore the 4.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a black tie party!
links_reviews_text: The material is very thick so definitely wear in black tie weather. Zipper is hard to zip but with some muscle we got it. Love this dress! Definitely get the long if you plan to wear high heels.

Rented this dress for a winter wedding. It fit like a glove, hugged me in all the right places. I wore 2.5 inch heels and the length was prefect. The zipper was difficult to pull up. Material was nice. Overall, felt great and would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful and comfortable. The material was heavy and perfect for the winter.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. I normally wear a 14 and the dress fit perfectly. Received compliments all night.
Though tight, this dress was great for a rehearsal dinner! Would've paired nicely with a funky pair of shoes. I thought it looked best with hair up because of the one shoulder and ruffle!

I love this cute dress by Slate &Willow! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size. (add if true to size) and going up for your back up. This style is fitted at the bust, fitted throughout the midsection and, fitted at the hips. Curvier women should consider sizing up. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a strapless bra with this dress. At 5’3, the length hit mid-thigh length on me.

I love this trendy dress by Slate & Willow! Running true to size with stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and room at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so I would recommend wearing a nubra or no bra At 5’3”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!
Fun dress
I am usually a size 2 and I even went up a size and this dress was so tight on my legs. Yikes!

I absolutely loved this dress, but it was just a little too tight in the butt/thighs for me to wear in public. I will keep it in mind for my next event and order a size up! I have a very high natural waist, and the ruffles helped give me more shape and make it look like I actually had a waist in this dress-very hard for me to find!!
Runs small. Very form fitting.

The dress was beautiful and I was really excited to wear. Unfortunately the size 10 was a little too snug for me. It was skin tight and didn't seem appropriate to wear to the wedding I was going to. If I was going to a different type of event I would have worn the dress but I decided on something else instead.
I wanted to wear this dress but it runs really small. It was a pretty shape and had nice detailing with the ruffles.

links_reviews_title: not meant for athletic body types!
links_reviews_text: I loved the idea of this dress, but it runs small and is made for those with hips/curves. I have a very "straight" body, with no curves (ugh) and I was so bummed this didn't work for me! the extra fabric around the hips stuck out and wouldn't lay flat because I didn't have anything to fill it out.. so I didn't end up wearing. however, my roommate has more of an hourglass figure and it looked amazing on her!!!

links_reviews_title: Tried this for a wedding, it runs SO small. Im a 6 in *almost* everything and this was TINY!!
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing this, it runs so small and I could barely zip the dress. I am really bummed because I really wanted to wear this for a wedding!
I rented this dress for a wedding and it was so small I could barely zip it up. I have an athletic build with no hips and it was too tight in that area. Order one size up!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, I wish it worked. It was smaller than anticipated so I didn't end up wearing
links_reviews_text: Size up!

So small in the hips I did not wear... I sized up based on reviews and could fit into the dress but it was unflattering and too tight. Maybe should have sized up 2 sizes. I don't usually have this problem (average, if anything slightly narrow hips).
Fits small compared to other dresses.
was sooooo tight around the hips I could not zip it up

links_reviews_title: This dress is great but runs small
links_reviews_text: Runs Small

links_reviews_title: did not end up wearing because it was too small
links_reviews_text: Comfortable material but very tight in a size 2. Definitely would wear a size 4.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a date to the circus!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 6, but they only had a 4, and I thought it would be too small. It actually worked super well! I did use double sided tape on the chest to ensure everything stayed in place, but it was great! Paired with a RTR bag and orange hoop earrings!

I love Saloni! I'm always happy with the fit and material. This dress was no exception. I wish I would've rented a 6 though. It was a bit loose in the arm pit. The deep v cut is very sexy and great for a date!

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress to dress up and down
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Had to wear a cami.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to dinner at a very nice restaurant in Barcelona. The longest part of the dress barely hit the floor so it was perfect for a short person like me. It was comfortable and the fabric was nice. The only thing I would say is that I had to wear a cami under so my girls were not bulging out. There is a deep v cut. The cami was personal preference as I don’t like exposing that much, but just be aware that your girls will be out there if you don’t wear one.

I didn't expect to like this as much as I did but it was great! Everyone I came across complimented this dress! It was pretty true to size, slightly tight in the rib cage. Very low cut, may not work well with larger chests.
Great fit, wore it with a regular tee shirt bra without much trouble. Lots of compliments at a work vacation HH.. love this line for fun summer dresses.

beautiful pattern, but i'm 5'10 and i'd say it was still a few inches too long, and the chest area is really tight and low cut. i'm a 32 d, if you are bigger than a c, stay away, it's too revealing and then also really modest on the bottom so it feels unbalanced sadly. wanted to love !

links_reviews_title: Makes you feel special and dressed
links_reviews_text: Cut is slimming

links_reviews_title: little low cut but really beautiful
links_reviews_text: low cut but really gorgeous - lots of compliments and flattering for hips

links_reviews_title: Great print and details, a bit small in bodice
links_reviews_text: This *just* fit me without a bra. Flattering and fluttery ankle length (I'm very petite). The subtle ruffle details add sophistication and fun. Gorgeous dress, but unfortunately not right for the venue. I'll definitely go up a size to rent for my next event (though the 2 fit, it would become uncomfortably tight after a meal. I'm typically sz 0 or 2).
Fits perfectly. Very very low cut. Super flattering for women with hips, a great length as well.
The best RTR. So beautiful and a perfect fit if you're an hourglass shape
Love all Saloni dresses. This one fit really well and was great for a daytime event!
This is a stunning dress! Beautiful, lush fabric and details. It's a little type on top so size up if you have a larger bust. It's also low cut so have a cami ready.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, funny fit up top.
links_reviews_text: I ended up having a weird tan line so wore a different dress, but I was hoping I would be able to make the dress work despite a funny fit. The straps felt like they were slipping off my shoulders, but the chest was definitely a little tight. Might be best for ladies who can get away with no bra and some fashion tape, but I was planning to finagle this with some pins and a low-cut strapless bra. Beautiful pattern and fabric!!

This was an okay option for a wedding, but I didn't end up wearing it because the chest area was too tight -- it just smashed my boobs against my chest, which gave me weird-looking cleavage. For reference, I'm a 34D. Definitely runs smalls -- I am normally an 8 but the 10 fit (except in the chest).
Fits true to size. love the asymmetrical hem ...the neckline is a bit deep so perfect for a vacation but if you're conservative and have a big bust Maybe not the right fit for you
This dress is beautiful but too small for me. I couldn't zip it up. I'll try again in a larger size.
Got so many compliments but runs super small! I was lucky enough to pick this up in store so I was able to pick the right size, but I'm usually a 0-2 and even the 4 was pretty tight
Great if smaller chested

This was a beautiful dress, and really well-made and I loved everything about it except that I felt that it made me look shorter than I am. I'm 5'5" and it was too long for me. It is also pretty low-cut. If you're tall, I highly recommend renting this dress!
Great material and design. I did not wear because it was too tight in the chest.

I wore this to market for work, I made it a little more casual with some flat sandals and had a denim jacket as an option. The assymetrical hemline is great and the bold colors offer and interesting pattern. Lots of compliments on this beauty- would rent again!

links_reviews_title: i love love this dress so much i purchased it.
links_reviews_text: flattering, fits well, no stretch but very comfortable. my favorite RTR yet.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this for my event but I loved the dress.
links_reviews_text: It looks exactly like the photos and it was a super interesting and cool dress.
Gorgeous but very small in bust. So disappointed because I wanted for vacation. Will rent again but size up next time!
Pretty dress but shoulders were gaping on my petite frame. Hoping for more petite dresses in the future
pretty colors, but WAY too much cleavage. need to remove a rib to zip it in my normal size.

I can see why the others said to size down. I found that once I tied the strings at the neck, it made all the difference. Also cinch well at the waist. I normally wear a small and the small fit loosely as intended. If you're in between a size, size down. Very flowy and feminine.
Comfortable for everyday wear
Definitely size down. I wear 8s and 10s, so I got the medium and large, but I probably would've fit into the small. Still looked nice. Easy, simple, lovely dress.
This was too unflattering to wear. Anything that makes me look bigger than I actually am... I just can't.

links_reviews_title: so pretty, but just too roomy
links_reviews_text: normally a size 4, and the xs was still too big
Looks like a shapeless muumuu. Might be because I'm 5'4" but lots of excess material at the waist. Didn't wear it. While it has a drawstring at the waist it couldn't be adjusted enough
The fit was large and I could not wear
Dress did not cinch at the waist, felt frumpy
Fun and comfortable

I loved the detailing on the neck and hem! The pattern was fun--I usually wear solid colors or stripes, but I actually liked the floral print on this dress. The fit was okay except for the top. It seemed a little bulky there, especially on the sides. Overall though, it was a cute work dress.

I really loved this dress and would consider buying it. It was less formal in person than in the pictures as the fabric was a soft cotton. I wore it to work with a jean jacket, which may have been a little casual for being a middle-aged woman but I got a bunch of compliments. The elastic ruching around the waist was really comfortable. Only issue for me was the lining of the dress is a couple inches shorter than the outside fabric so dress felt a little short on me simply because I knew you could see the difference between the layers. Overall, great dress!
I wore this as a casual dress to work and got lots of compliments. It's very comfortable.
Love this dress. It's flattering and very comfortable. It's not too short so you can wear it anywhere.

Pretty and flattering dress, great for everyday wear. Good for large chested women. A little short/feminine for formal office attire, but great for a daytime date. Can wear normal bra (sheerness still doesn't show nude bra).

links_reviews_title: I rented this for the fall.
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfortable. The medium was perfect and I felt super comfortable. Great to wear during weather transitions. Reminds of me a stylish 80 style.
Flattering dress for any shape. Wore to a "barn chic" rehearsal dinner. Would also work for a date night, winery day, or other more casual dress event.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but made me look super top-heavy
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress, but it was just ok. The top fits a full bust and wasn't tight, but I looked like I had a uniboob. The smocked waist sits really high, almost directly underneath the bust, and that added to the fullness. Paired with the high neckline, the dress basically made me look 10 lbs heavier up top. I tried refining the silhouette with a wide belt, but couldn't get it to work.
The dress was perfect for me. Fit my bust area, and waist. I have big thighs, and was roomy in that area.

links_reviews_title: Relaxed, fun dress for a more casual day at work or the weekend!
links_reviews_text: Everything fit exactly as expected and was a really comfortable dress that I wore during the week and out on the weekend with a casual slip ons.
Incredibly cute dress and so flattering for someone who carries some extra weight in the mid section. Probably a little casual (short) for this summer gala but it dressed up nicely with jewelry.
This dress had a cute pattern and was really comfy on. The fabric was smooth, soft, and just stretchy enough. It fit me well and I thought the waistline was flattering.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress from work to dinner
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Flattering and easy to wear
Easy to wear and comfortable with the ruching in the middle. Details are cute on the trim. Easy casual but dressy enough.
This dress was not as form fitting or flattering as I wanted it to be. The ruffles did not look well on petite.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress - makes your waist look very small
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a medium but this large fit well so the dress does run small

links_reviews_title: Cute Dress but don't love the waist.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but didn't love the waist. The height and placement of the elastic waist can be non flattering. I put a belt on it to hide it
Fits well. All season dress
Great work dress. Sweet pattern. A little poofy in chest area

links_reviews_title: This looks plain in the pic but it was really cute on.
links_reviews_text: Fits somewhat large. I wore it with booties and a long cardigan.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color perfect for a formal affair
links_reviews_text: Nice thick and stretchy material. Easily held my DDD chest. Shows everything so be Aware of the type or undergarments you use. I had to ditch the spanx since it pushed all my skin out of the cutouts. I am wearing a size 2
This dress hugged all the right places and had a just enough sexy with the sides to make it pure perfection.

I LOVED this dress so much. It has all the classic appeal of a formal gown but the cutouts make it young and fun. It was super comfortable, amazing fit (factor in time to steam the fabric....), and I am pretty tall but wore the regular (the Long size wasn't available). I normally wear closer to a 0/2 and the 4 fit perfectly so I would say this runs small. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Loved how sexy this dress was. Showed off my body and it was very form fitting!
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size 2, but the 2 was just way too tight. Make sure you don't try it on with deodorant or makeup on. It is very hard to get into! Extremely form fitting, but that was the look that I was going for! It definitely shows off your body! The length was perfect with 4 inch heels and I had to wear a strapless bra. I got lots of compliments and it was different than any dress I have ever worn before!
Beautiful dress! I received so many compliments! The length was perfect but the dress fits very snug. So whatever size you wear, I'd get that size and a size up.

links_reviews_title: Went to a debutante ball where we had to wear long dresses
links_reviews_text: This fit nicely. I was nervous since I'm pear-shaped and have a wider butt/thigh area, but this fit well. The cut-out was a fun touch!

This dress was perfect! It hit right above the floor with 2 inch heels and was great to dance in. I thought the slits on the side and open back were sexy but not over the top. Looked great in pictures. Didn't need a bra and the material is stretchy and comfortable.
I really liked this dress, it fit like a glove and the purple is simple enough to swap for a black dress. The material is thick and stretchy and was perfect for dancing in.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for Black Tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress! I honestly may end up jsut buying it because it was so perfect. It is a good stretchy material so you have plenty of give to dance and feel comfortable. It is definitely form fitting and I do not suggest it to girls who may not be as confident with the belly area, it does not hide much. I was worried about the slits on the side causing back fat but the material was stretchy enough that it wasn't an issue. The slit in the back helps with movement for dancing as well. I am 5'10 and the 6L was perfect with heels. I'm a 36C bust and was able to wear a bra that stayed hidden. Bra is probably not necessary but I wanted to fill out the top nicely. I received so many compliments and am sad to have sent it back!

I got so many compliments on this dress! I felt and looked fabulous on it. I loved how stretchy this dress was and for being a Columb dress, the slit in the back made it so easy to dance still. If I could wear this dress every day, I would! What a show stopper!

links_reviews_title: The name says it all, QUEEN of the night!
links_reviews_text: My boyfriend's favorite color is purple and when I gave him my top 3 dress choices, I knew he'd pick this one. Like the other reviewers mention, it does fit true to size and has lots of stretch. I wore the 8R, although the 6R zipped up fine - I wanted to be sure it didn't look too sexy/tight. The length was ok, but would've been better had I gone with the long option, I'm 5'7" with a short torso/long legs and was originally planning on wearing a shorter heel but changed my mind at the last minute to a 3.5" inch black, block heel. Tons of compliments, especially from my date - nobody ever picks this gem of a color (it really is like a jewel royal purple color!) - looked amazing in pictures and in person among a sea of black/navy dresses at the formal wedding I attended. I would highly recommend this if you're an hourglass shape and want to show it off!

This dress was amazing!!! I'm 5'5, 32B, and fluctuate between a size 2-6. This dress fit perfectly and had some stretch to the material. Was extremely comfy as I danced all night! If you're bigger chested you may want to go up a size. I received SO many compliments on this dress and I'm contemplating buying it I loved it so much!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and the beautiful purple color! Very flattering!
links_reviews_text: This ran a little small. I usually wear a size 6. I am 5'6", 135lbs. This is not a dress you want to wear too small or you will ooze out of the cutouts.

links_reviews_title: Lightweight guy, comfortable. Great length for someone who is short
links_reviews_text: Lightweight guy, comfortable. Great length for someone who is short

So happy with this dress. I felt like a princess. The quality and fit was great. It was fun yet elegant and in the perfect shade of purple. First time at RTR, recommended by my friend in the picture also in RTR! : ) I'm 136 lbs and 5'6" and the length was great in heels.
I wore it to a masquerade birthday party and it was a hit. I tend to wear an 8 or 10 based on designer, the 8 was a little snug but the 10L was perfect

links_reviews_title: This dress is simply PERFECT!! Seriously- the most stunning dress I've ever worn.
links_reviews_text: I wore a 4R - I'm about 5'5", and it was just perfect. The only minor complaint I have is that the hem was too long. But if I had gotten it in a 4P, I'm sure it would've fit perfectly. I received so many compliments on this dress - to the point where people were texting me after the fact to find out where they could get one themselves. So comfortable, sexy, glamrous; and all around winner :)

The color of this dress is gorgeous!! Its very bold and unique. I was the only person in this color at the event we attended. I received so many compliments on how beautiful the dress was. Pros: The material has stretch and is flattering. I was able to wear a regular bra so there was no hassle of a strapless or sticky bra. The color would be pretty on any skin tone. It was incredibly comfortable. I could dance in it easily. Cons: Even with the 6L, the dress didnt touch the floor. I am 5'8" and wore 1 1\2 inch heels. If you're tall and want something that hits the floor, this may not be your first pick. It runs small. Normally I wear a 4 (was too tight). The 6 was even a bit snug. I probably should have ordered a 6 & an 8 as my backup size. Overall I would recommend this dress to anyone! I loved it.
By far my favorite RTR dress I have ever rented. It was so confortable and very flattering!
The fit was great!
Runs true to size. I'm 5'10" and wore 4 inch heels. The 6 long was long enough. Its a flattering dress wit lots of support.

links_reviews_title: Great color & the cut out makes it sexy
links_reviews_text: I am a size 0 and wear a 32DD; the girls fit! The color was bold/bright. It looked blue in the purple uplighting but was a vibrant royal purple. I got plenty of compliments and felt sexy, yet classy.

links_reviews_title: I felt glamorous and sexy with the cutouts in the dress! I am 6'0 and the long was a perfect length
links_reviews_text: Length was great, I am 6'0 and could still wear a small heel with this one. Comfortable and flattering. Thick material that stretches perfectly.

I'm 5'3. Weight: 120lbs. I rented the 0R and 4R for backup. ( size 2R was not available at the time) . I was worried that the dress was going to be too long for me. I wore 4 inch heels and the fit was perfect!. Fabric is soft and stretchy. It hugs your body perfectly. Im a size A sometimes B depending on the bra, but I did not have to wear any bra. The color of the dress is beautiful! Makes you stand out in a croud! Definitely will rent again!

I wore this to a formal event and it was a fun alternative in a sea of black. It's classy yet modern with the cut outs on the side. The dress was a little tight for a 6. At 5'11 the long size was right above the ground in kitten heels.

RTR sent me this dress because the one I'd ordered couldn't ship. Honestly, I didn't feel great in it--perhaps bc I was so pale in December, and I don't think it photographed well at all. Length worked, even though I'm only 5'4"

The color of this dress in person is striking and beautiful. It's stretchy thick material hugs curves in a flattering way. I felt great wearing it! Unfortunately, the 4R was way too long for me. I'm 5'4 and even with 4 1/2 inch heels there was 5 inches dragging on the floor. I kept double checking to see if I had a long size by mistake but the label said "R." Luckily, fashion tape did the trick and I was able to wear it.
This dress fit like a glove. It hugged all the right places and I felt great in it. It ran true to size and the length was perfect with my 3.5 inch heels. Has a bit of stretch.

I normally wear a 4 but my breasts were a bit too smashed since I'm still breastfeeding. The 6 gave me more room. No bra. Not too big either. The material was a bit heavy for August in fl, so I was happy were were inside. Loads of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Engagement Photo Shoot - it was the perfect dress for it - sexy yet classy!
links_reviews_text: Just make sure you tuck in those hanger strings on the side - they got in the way sometimes. But other than that - beautiful fit and color! This is a winner!

You will definitely be the Queen of the Night in this dress. This was actually a second option, overnight dress (thank you Amber W. for your phenomenal customer service) since the dress I originally wanted (Likely Mulberry gown) was way too long. So glad I was able to rent this dress. I was much happier with this dress option. I wore this to a 60th birthday party which was a formal affair. It is stunning--from the regal color that photographs beautifully, the slit in the back and chic cutouts, you will definitely stand out. I received so many compliments from so many people. It is just the right amount of sexy and classy. It fits absolutely perfect, is very comfortable (stretchy material), easy to dance in and makes you look tall with the right size heels. This is actually the second cut out style I've rented from RTR and it seems to be my go-to style. I was initially reluctant to reserve the cut out style, but I'm so glad that I've stepped out my comfort zone. You will look beautiful and will turn heads for sure!

I wore this dress to a black tie wedding in Miami. It was perfect. I am 5'3" and 135 lbs, 34DD - so a bit curvy. The 6R fit perfectly. I wore 3 or 4 inch heels and it hit right at my feet. The fabric is a bit thicker so it hides imperfections well. The cut outs are fun. Not too revealing but add interest. I was able to wear a regular bra which was nice. You may not even need a bra (I've breastfed two kids so it's necessary for me!). It was fun and easy to dance in. A really pretty purple color. Loved it!

Great fit with a fabric that has a bit of a stretch making movement effortless. I wore it to a wedding and was able to dance without having to adjust. The color is stunning and cut outs well placed; count on the compliments in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and sexy! Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I rented the 4R and 6R. I'm usually a 4 but the 6 was more flattering. (I was bulging out of the cutouts in the 4- not cute.) I loved this dress! It was comfortable, flattering and sexy! I wore a strapless bra because my regular bra wasn't completely hidden with the way the straps sit. Overall this dress was amazing. Even the bride and her mother told me how much they loved it!

links_reviews_title: The color was perfect for Mardi Gras!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little tight, but it looked fabulous on. The 4R length was great with my 4" heels on my 5'5" frame. The cut out were the perfect little dash of sexy, even though you can't see them in any photos I took thanks to my purse. It has a little stretch and is actually pretty comfortable.

Rented this dress for a gala that was a Mardi Gras themed. The fit of his dress was amazing and I loved the color. It was so comfortable and I got tons of compliments. Would definitely rent this dress again!
Fit perfectly. Super unique dress and got lots of compliments. Worn to a black tie masquerade charity ball.

Perfect dress for a formal wedding. I loved everything about this dress. The cut was slimming and long enough for my 5'7 frame to wear heels. It's dress was sexy (the side and back cutouts) yet covered up. The dress was super comfortable and I was able to wear a regular bra. The purple color was vibrant and luxe looking. I got countless compliments. Definitely rent this dress!

This dress was absolutely stunning. Received tons of compliments, fit great! I wore a 2, Fit true to size Stretchy material that hugged body. Thicker material nice for winter event! Able to wear regular bra Top zipper was difficult and required an extra set of hands to get into
Gorgeous color, gorgeous cut, just perfect. I felt like a celebrity in this dress. Fits perfect, very snug though.
I wore this dress to a cocktail party. I loved the way this dress fit. True to size and hugged all the right places. I got lots of compliments! Definitely recommend.
I'm 5'9" 150lbs Ds. I got the 6 and the 8. It's perfect. I wore the 6. I didn't even try on the 8. It's a perfect dress. Thick material.

Love this dress. I am larger in the hips(42"), I was worried about the size but this amazing dress came through! Fit perfectly It was perfect for our cocktail party Will be renting form RTR again soon Side zip, lined, length and details on bottom of skirt are fabulous.
Loved it. Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I love Likely dresses but you can only wear this if you have hips and a butt
links_reviews_text: This is really my fault because it's obviously a curve hugger. I just have no butt or hips so the dress held me very awkward around the hip and butt area, if you have no butt or hips go down a size, but it maybe a problem if you have large breast's because mine are DDs and felt snug in the 4.

links_reviews_title: Felt squished but secure in this beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: Size UP if you have a bust. The dress has no give and was a squeeze for me - two people effort to zip, and that makes no one feel like a princess.
This dress made my butt look good which is very hard to do! I don't even have a butt
All the reviews were right on. This dress was fun and perfect for a work event. I wore the size 6 and it was a perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Flattering and fun to dance in
links_reviews_text: Didn't get a great photo of this dress and I stole someone's tie in this photo but this is a fun, flattering dress! Held my tummy in and made it look flat even after I ate a huge meal.

This dress fit amazing, slightly tighter than my normal style but I received a ton of compliments. I have a smaller bust, narrow waist and with curly hips and butt and did not have any issues with fit. I paired with gold sandals and cute little parrot earrings that were perfect for a zoo wedding. Would highly recommend this dress

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the wedding. Color is great and quality of the dress was great.
links_reviews_text: Dress was very comfortable, lower hem on the back hit at a weird angle but was manageable. Loved the hemline of this dress. It was sexy and fun but not too flashy. Would rent again!
This dress is absolutely stunning. I love the color and received many compliments all night. I usually wear a size 4 and it fit perfectly.

Phenomenal color and comfortable style! The fit was slightly smaller, as I had to go up a size and I still felt like I was spilling out at the top. If you're a C-D cup it would likely fit great. It truly was a perfect dress for the Derby. I went 3 days in a row to the track and this was my favorite look for Derby week.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a dental mandiball. I felt beautiful, sexy, and confident.
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress, and I wore the size 2 which is my normal dress size. Slit came to the perfect spot on my thigh, and the ruffle was perfect for dancing. I am 5'3 ish and this dress was the perfect length. I felt very secure in this dress on top. I recommend trying not to wear any shapewear or undergarments because there could be lines. I did wear a sticky bra which was helpful. Only complaint was the lining flipping up on the neckline part that goes toward your armpit (opposite the strap on the shoulder) since it is not fully lined which totally may have been fixed with dress tape. However, I am pretty sure I was the only one who noticed that. OVERALL HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS DRESS!
Fit like a glove. Great quality material. The perfect length for a cocktail attire wedding / event. Loved!
Fit great and hugged the butt perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit, the color and the style! I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved it! I should just buy it because I would totally wear it again!
Loved this dress for a wedding! Classy style, yet form-fitting in all of the right places. The material was a bit stretchy, making it super comfortable to dance in all night too!

This was my first time ordering a dress from Rent the Runway and I was a little skeptical. The dress came in 2 sizes which I was grateful for, if the original size didn't fit I would not of had time to find a replacement (not that I had any luck finding one to begin with). I felt beautiful and quite glamorous in the dress. Ordering was simple, delivery was fast and returning was easy. I am a fan of RTR now, I told everyone about the dress and where it came from. You can be certain I will order again.

links_reviews_title: The cut and the vibrant blue.
links_reviews_text: It fit me well, silhouette-wise. The top was fine if I didn’t move my arms too much above my head, I had to make sure my boob wasn’t popping out. Overall, so so so beautiful, and very elegant. Didn’t need to wear a bra with it.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this dress! Very classy
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 0 and with this dress it fit perfectly! I was a little nervous after seeing other reviews but very pleased when I got it!
The dress fit great. I’m an athletic fit (5’3” 130lbs) so typically I have to go up to size 8 because my shoulders are broad but this fit amazing! Got lots of compliments on it.

So many compliments on this dress! Fit perfectly - only small issue was on side that didn't have shoulder strap I had to adjust a few times to make sure I stayed put together. Looked great with silver heels and silver hoop earrings.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a company party
links_reviews_text: This was actually my backup dress and I’m so glad I had it because the dress I originally picked did not fit right at all. This dress runs pretty true to size. I loved the color and the fact that I could wear a regular bra (one strap). I wore this for my company holiday party and received many compliments on it all night long. It is made of a nice thick material and is simple but classy. I'm 5'7" and felt that the length was perfect, but if you are shorter you might think it is a little long. I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I dressed for this wedding for in style!
links_reviews_text: Athletic build at 135 lbs. with at 34 C chest size and size 4-6 jeans. This dress is so flattering and so fun! Got a ton of compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Skin tight, couldn't wear a bra so order your size and a size up!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the Havana Nights theme of the fundraiser! Lots of compliments. Great dress for event!
links_reviews_text: Dress is very fitted but the material is comfortable to wear all night long. Super flattering cut and color. Great dress!

I loved this simple, yet elegant dress! It was actually my backup style for the weekend, but I'm so glad it was when my other picks didn't fit the way I wanted. The fit was great -- hugs your curves but isn't uncomfortably tight. Comfortable to wear for 10 hours and dance in.

I love renting unique dresses for special occasions. This blue dress was no exception. It's a beautiful fabric and very well made. I wish I would have gotten one size larger. The 6 was very snug in my hips even with spanx. I am wondering if the 8 would have fit better but may have been too large in the bust area? This is not a very forgiving dress so definitely rock it if you like form fitting dresses.
I wore it to a wedding and felt great all night. It was perfect to dance in. The flare of the skirt really made it fun to move in.

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove, yet perfect for a work event.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my work awards ceremony. The event is billed as "cocktail" attire but we all know when it is a work event to many sparkles and skin just look tacky. I usually wear a 2 or a 4 in regular dresses but in this case the 6 fit like a glove. I'm 5'3.5", 127 lbs, 34C, athletic with proportionate curves. Fabirc is stretch yet provides support and it laid smoothly over a strapless bra. The ruffle moves when you walk and it really creates a great silhouette. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a huge hit
links_reviews_text: Received many compliments! I am pear shaped and had to wear the size up- thank goodness I got 2 sizes. Definitely a form fitting dress.

The material of the dress was great and very comfortable. The only issue I had was the zipper got stuck anytime I tried to zip it even when I wasn't wearing it. It was a little big up top and I had to wear a bra to make sure the top didn't slide down. Other than that the dress was great and I would recommend. Very comfortable and I didn't have to worry about it while I was dancing!

links_reviews_title: I loved that I could go into the Chicago store to try on the dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very form fitting and looked great. I got a lot of compliments on it!

I loved this dress so much! I really considered buying it but had to remind myself that the main reason why I use RTR is because I don't like wearing the same thing to events where I have a lot of photos lol. But the fit was perfect, it was tight but I didn't feel like I couldn't eat and it was still comfortable. Not too short and I was able to dance which is a must. Also didn't have to wear a bra, just some stickies. 10/10 FOR SURE.
True to size, comfortable

I ended up falling a little between sizes and went with the larger since I had a baby 7 months ago and the boobies are a little bigger than normal. Also for ladies with a little mommy pooch, I recommend some spanx. Overall a lovely dress and flattering

links_reviews_title: Bold, Beautiful, Classy! The side flare of fabric made the dress unique!
links_reviews_text: I loved the design!! Was gushing at the many compliments I received from friends and guests, they too loved that when I turned around or was dancing, the mini side trail of fabric at the bottom whisked around me every time. It is pretty sturdy fabric, as you can see I was sweating and active ( it was a humid July Wedding) , if you sweat easily note this sturdy dress won't feel breezy at all. Snug and true fit- make sure you get your correct size and a backup that's one up! Here I'm more like 128lbs.

links_reviews_title: Came 2 days ahead of schedule and fit perfectly
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and easy to move around in and dance.

links_reviews_title: Bold brilliant color, great dress for day or night formal affair
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this dress and was even greeted at the wedding by a friend saying "rent the runway? You always have such fabulous dresses!" What i liked: the color is so much more beautiful in person than on the website. The raised hem and ruffle bottom made this dress interesting and so fun! What i didn't like: it runs small, i wore the larger of the two sizes and still felt stuffed in it a little. The cut of the top is slightly weird, I'm also very busty (also nursing so this fluctuates during the day) and while I didn't fear reveal, i felt it could have come higher under my armpit. I'd definitely rent again if i weighed about 5-10 pounds less.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress that highlight the top and hide the middle
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a cruise vacation. This dress helped me look easy and pretty. It is well made and the floral print is so beautiful but to wear and to just to look at. The white fabric is just the right tone. Wish I had bought it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a romantic summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and comfortable. Wore at 28 weeks. Only downside is it gets wrinkly while traveling, but nothing a steamer couldn't fix!
It was the perfect beach dress :) very flattering and just beautiful!
I think I wore this dress a thousand times! Also wore it for my birthday dinner! You can dress up or down for any activity
Wore this to a work event and was comfortable all day. Wish I would have belted it because didn't do a lot for my shape but overall I enjoyed it.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear- belted for shape
links_reviews_text: Pretty, easy dress. Very loose and everyone agreed looked better belted.

links_reviews_title: I loved the fit. I was very flattering
links_reviews_text: I don't usually wear flowy dresses like this because of my petite and curvy figure. But this was actually really flattering. I wore it twice. Once to a friend's birthday dinner and once to the theater. I received many compliments.

This was the perfect dress for a charity polo match! I received many compliments and perhaps more importantly, I was comfortable the entire day. It was true to size. Would have been a 5 star review however the material was a little tired looking upon close inspection. Overall a great dress.
Fits well once I adjusted the neck tie to allow room. I am short so it fell more to tea length on me, which was fine!
This dress fit perfectly!! It felt loose and airy. The material is very light and flows with your movements. The print made it perfect for summer vacay!
Loose fit - perfect for a sunny afternoon and cocktails at thebeach
This dress was very flattering and comfortable. The flower patter was beautiful. The mid length does not always fit me well but this dress was perfect! Would definitely rent again.
Really enjoyed wearing this for my bridal shower and received many compliments. Great material for a hot, humid day. Does not wrinkle and kept shape for several hours. Would rent again!

This dress is perfect for a warm spring or summer day. The fabric is very lightweight and the bright colors bring out the dress! The dress is loose and roomy all around and the high neckline is not uncomfortable. I would advise to wear either a strapless bra or nubra due to the halter neck. At 5'6 and a half, the dress comes right to my calf. Overall, the dress is a perfect summer style and can be worn on any occasion.

I am either a medium or large in most dresses and wore the medium in this one. The tie in the large seemed twisted, making it fit a little tighter in the top. The medium fit perfectly. I wore a belt to accentuate my waist, but I could have gone without and been just fine. A strapless bra worked perfectly with this dress. The dress is light and super comfortable. The colors are bright and fun and perfect for spring! I wore the dress to a Derby Day party. I loved it so much that I wore it again to church the next day! Another happy Rent the Runway experience!
Perfect fit. Perfect material. I wanted to keep it!!! Was complimented throughout the day. And even made onto the local news as they were covering a fundraiser I was attending with my puppy, Coconut.
Got this dress as a backup. At 18 weeks pregnant this dress accentuated by bump, DID NOT look like a tent or overly flow-y, ad showed off my shoulders. Love it!

links_reviews_title: summer print dress with baggy fitting.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print summer dress but no shape to the dress and runs large.
Pretty colors and pattern, loved the birds and snails. It was totally shapeless and didn't do anything for me so I added a belt. It helped a little bit this wasn't one of my favorites.

links_reviews_title: Great for maternity without looking like a maternity dress
links_reviews_text: Silky soft, easy to put on, hides the bump, easy to dress up or down. Great for summer time. Hides stains/spills. Loved it. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: feminine and floral, but not too cutesy
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. Wore it for a work cocktail event. As someone who doesn't do pastels and pinks - this dress was flattering, but not too precious or cute.
This dress is fabulous. The fit is relaxed and flowing. Perfect for summer. I paired it with a coral jacket for evening, which worked well. I love this dress so much I've rented it twice so far!
If you are athletic size up. The arm holes pulled too right to even make this comfortable enough to wear.
Runs true to size and so comfortable for rehearsal dinner. Perfect outfit!
lose fit and very pretty
too big to wear
A little large and loose, but gorgeous and comfortable liner and fabric. Perfect gif tropical vacation.
So constricting in then arms

links_reviews_title: i didn't end up wearing this but pretty print
links_reviews_text: fit tight under the arms, otherwise pretty.
I wasn't impressed with the way it wrinkled so easily and the fit was wonky

links_reviews_title: Too tight in chest, too voluminous in torso hips
links_reviews_text: I loved the print and overall style, but this was too tight for me in the chest and too loose in the torso and hips, it wasn't flattering to an hourglass figure.
i really wanted to like this dress bc the print is so fun and unique, but this dress runs so huge on my 5'3" frame that I felt like I was drowning in it. Size a couple of sizes down. I returned it.

This is a loose-fitting dress. It was very comfortable and not too long - I was able to wear it with flip-flops and it didn't drag the ground in the back. I'm 5'2" so that can be tricky sometimes with maxi-length skirts. I don't think it was terribly flattering, but I didn't care because it was so comfortable. I think a skinnier person would look better in it than I did. :)

Dress was comfortable and loved the fabric, but the cut was odd at the neckline. Felt like I had to tie it very tight for it to fit around my neck, but then the arms came up really high to my armpits.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for lunch meeting...shared app again
links_reviews_text: Great fit, light for the heat...casual working lunch, perfectly comfortable!

Wore this for a beach wedding and it was perfect! I am a 4/6 and rented the small which fit great. The tie around the neck is sort of adjustable-I loosened it a bit cuz I'm on the busty side and it made a big difference. The fit was great, not baggy at all.
