Loved the silky fabric and the beautiful pattern. Very flattering. Got tons of compliments. I want to buy it!

links_reviews_title: Love it got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Beautifully made Flowy and comfortable

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress for a summer wedding. I loved that it was so whimsical and light.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected wasn't too tight in any one place and was very comfortable.
Rented for a weekend in Delray Beach, FL. and my friends complimented me as soon as they saw me! I quote, "You look so Palm Beach!" Exactly the look that I was going for!
Fit was wired on top. Usually love TT
Flattering slimming. Classy. Comfy. Good for my height. Pretty but not 'the one' for my particular event. I like it overall but didn't loooove.

Wore this dress to my engagement party and it was not only SUPER soft and comfortable it was stunning on. I felt so comfortable in it and got compliments all night. Fit was true to size and not too tight! Would recommend you get help to get in and out of as its near impossible with the back buttons to do on your own.

This dress is beautiful! The open back makes it not too conservative and great for a semi-formal occasion. The length is perfect for shorter/petite people and can be worn with flats. If you're small chested and between sizes, I'd recommend sizing down.

links_reviews_title: I ordered this dress as a possible change of clothes during my wedding reception.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing it because it was a backup style, but I may have sent it back if it was the only dress I ordered. While I loved the top and the back of the dress, the sheer part of the lace came up a little higher than expected- well above mid-thigh at its highest point. Sizing up may have solved this problem, so it could be something to consider if you're on the taller side.

I wore this dress to brunch the day after my wedding and got tons of compliments on how pretty it was. It's super elegant and an interesting take on a white lace dress, and I loved the black detailing and the open back. You can't wear a normal bra with this; I used a Nu bra. The area in the middle of the chest is sheer and the sheer part of the lace at the bottom of the dress in front starts almost at the top of the thighs, which I didn't expect, but it's not super noticeable or revealing.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wind up wearing it. I wanted something a little more formal.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wind up wearing it. I wanted something a little more formal.
longer than pictured, great fit but material is thin enough that you'd need a strong base layer
Tight around the chest
Dress was longer than shown in pictures and did not fit properly
Perfect fit with simple sexiness. Great for a concert and even the office.

Absolutely stunning dress. Feminine, sexy but modest enough. Would be appropriate for a bride, I think. I wore it around town all day and felt pretty but not overdressed. You will definitely need a backless bra. Would definitely rent again.
This is true to size and flattering even if you have a bigger chest.
The dress fits great and I loved the open back. Only downside for me as the length. As a short girl, it hit a little too low on my shin and made me feel even shorter.
I wore this dress for a summer luncheon and it was perfect. The back is my favorite part! Only good things to say about this little number!
While this dress wasn't my style, it was a very well made piece and fit perfectly. I'm not much of a lace girl or a flared longer skirt girl, but if I were, this was perfect.

This fit true to size. It was very comfortable, with a stretchy fabric. It is gold in color, not the black that it appears in photos. Be warned that it is extremely low cut in front. I used 3 pins to make it more appropriate for the occasion. I am 5'3 and it touched the floor without heels. With 2" heels it hit at the lowest point of my ankle. I was very happy with the comfort and quality and the price.

Dress is comfortable, conservative, but fun. Received several compliments. Wore a small. Fit well. Length was good. Not super flattering on mid section. Actually think it made my waist look larger than it is. 5'7'', 124 lbs.

This dress was amazing. It fit so perfectly and I received so many compliments. I did wear some Shapewear to smooth everything out. I’m 5’7” and 210, normally wear a size 14 and it felt very true to size.

links_reviews_title: This dress hugged my curves in all the right places
links_reviews_text: I decided on this dress for my engagement pictures and it did not disappoint. So beautiful and flattering.

links_reviews_title: The dress was exactly what I was looking for. I loved it and got so many compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: The dress was more beautiful than I imagined. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable all night long. Now, I want to buy it!

links_reviews_title: A classy, glittery dress perfect for a winter wedding
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, flattering dress that is not too tight on the stomach. Fit true to size. I am 5'3" and was worried it would be too long on me, but it was the correct fit and length. I was happy to wear it all night and wasn't dying to get it off at the end of the night. You can also wear a regular bra with it - which is a major plus in my book.
Super comfy super flattering (very forgiving 😉) you can wear a bra with it! I'm 6'2, wore spanx and felt like $1million bucks!

The dress fit really well. There was a little bit of stretch but it didnt feel baggy. The neck line is a lot lower than in the picture so prepare for that. I ended up using boob tape just because I couldn't get a bra to work with it. I order 14L because that's all they had but I would have preferred 14R because it was a bit long. I'm 5'9" and I had to have heels to keep it off the ground.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a glittery queen all night
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress to wear to a black tie affair. The photo made it look black with some sparkle, so I was a bit surprised when it arrived and looked more gold, even brownish-gold. I tried it on and it fit me perfectly. I am usually drawn toward a-line gowns, so this was definitely out of my comfort zone and it paid off. I felt so lovely all night and got a ton of compliments!
Great Fit, very comfortable!
Wore to a black tie gala size 16r so comfortable and easy to wear. Classic and basic in a great way. I'm 5'5" and length was perfect with some heels. Would rent again.
Flattering fit, definitely a lot of cleavage so be ready for that. Had a good stretch and was super forgiving to my post baby belly bod! Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. Very comfortable to wear.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for an industry gala that was James Bond themed. It is more gold than the photos on RTR show but it is gorgeous. I got tons of compliments. I'm 5'9" and the long was perfect with 2" heels. I got the 14 and 16 just in case. The 14 fit well except in the chest. I'm busty so I opted to wear the 16 and with a few safety pins was able to be confident I wasn't showing too much cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and Flattering, back up dress to the rescue!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and flattering. This was my back up dress (they sent to me when my first dresses were a no-go) and I loved it! Non-stop compliments! It is low cut, so rent if you're feeling confident (and I used a safety pin for insurance)

links_reviews_title: Society wedding in West Loop, Chicago
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. The fabric draped in all the right placed and hugged my curves perfectly. The fabric had a little bit of sparkle to it without going over the top. I would absolutely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing but beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: I ordered two different dresses for a formal work party. I ended up going with my first choice and didn't wear this one. It is a beautiful dress and I would order again. I ordered a 10R and this dress does have a bit of stretch to it. If I order again might maybe try one size down.

The dress is more gold/bronze than appears in the photos. It fit well- a little too low cut for my taste in the front. If you’re busty and otherwise small, you’ll show cleavage in this dress. But it’s stretchy so it hugs curves. It was a classic look- great for a formal event.

I rented a 2R and a 4R. The 2 was a little big and too long. I would have needed 4 inch heels or higher and it just ended up not being my style, so I wore a dress from my closet instead. I'm 5'5.5" and 125 lbs.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: The dress has the perfect amount of stretch without being unflattering. It was easy to move around in and not too long.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, so easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: No cons!

Gorgeous dress with a fabulous fit. Because the fabric is stretchy, it was a great piece for me. I usually have difficulty with dresses because I am long waisted and fuller bust, but this was a good fit. The regular length was very adequate, even with a 3 inch heel. Would definitely rent again!
The dress was extremely comfortable. Easy to maneuver in -- pleasant surprise for formal wear.

links_reviews_title: This dress is very comfortable and has good stretch.
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’10, and have broad shoulders and an ample chest. The dress fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: i felt gorgeous while dressing modestly! #rtrftw
links_reviews_text: i was worried about finding something where i could look glamorous and modest at the same time. this dress worked out great! it hugs in the right places and is forgiving in the right places. note - i did wear shape wear underneath - leonisa body suit in medium if you'd like to know, which held everything in place and was not visible underneath. i do prefer my dresses to skim the ground, so i might have preferred a long. however, this was just an inch or two above the ground and looked fine with my 3 inch heels. enjoy!

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on this dress. It is more gold than it seems in the picture.
links_reviews_text: There were a few pulls in the dress but nothing too noticeable.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a gala!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my backup dress, but I liked it better than the one I originally selected, so wore this to a black-tie gala. True to size, and not too long for me (5'4"). The long sleeves were nice for November, and the dress was comfortable for dancing. I felt very glamorous in it, and had a great night!

loved this dress and it was so fun to wear! very sparkly- more than you can see in the pic. I'm 5'4" and wear size 2-4. 4R was perfect albeit a little long (requires heels). Otherwise great highly recommend !

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and pictures don't do justice
links_reviews_text: This dress looked pretty bland and I ordered it as an after thought in case my first choice didn't work. But it is beautiful in person and very sleek. Also super comfortable. Would recommend!!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit great! Very figure flattering!
links_reviews_text: I love this fit on this dress. The 14 fit snug, so I went with the 16 for some extra room because I was wearing the dress the majority of the day. It fit really well though and was very figure flattering.

This dress was ironically perfect for lounging around in COVID-19 isolation, as it's something between a sundress and a hospital gown. I felt like I was wearing chic, fashionable scrubs. Very comfy and fun. It's loose and boxy on top, but the ties at the hip are adjustable, so you can get a nice fit throughout the waist and hips to make up for it. The fabric easily shows water, as I found out when I went outside in the rain to feed the cat. Also, the sleeves' cuffs could use and ironing.
Not great for packing - gets very wrinkled and picks up oils/dirt easily. Great, flattering fit and comfortable! Overall fun dress!
Loved this unique dress and color but it didn't wrinkle very easily when I sat down. Not ideal for pictures.

links_reviews_title: Pretty summer dress with fun lines
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. So twirly and fun to wear but conservative enough for a preschool graduation. The back is opened but I taped the bottom part closed with fabric tape, which worked well. Very flattering.

Perfect for work, weekends, anything! The back is open, but the strings line it up to close pretty good, i don't think anyone even noticed. The little ribbon tie details are so lovely and the movement is amazing. It wrinkles but no one will notice. Couldn't stop wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: Simple, beautiful fabric and fit. Color is great for spring and summer.
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size. Great fit. Simple and classy.
Beautiful! Felt so happy all day in this color.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! I wish I didn't have to return it!
links_reviews_text: Fits nice throughout out. True to size

I liked the look much better in the photo online than in person. The fabric is silky and the color is paler, so it looks different in person. The top portion was large, but the bottom was too tight in the hips. Therefore, for those with curves, this may not be the best choice.

the back is a lot less scandalous than you wld think because there are so many strings. don't bother with a bra. very pretty yellow color, but nicely lined so it is not see-through. hit at the knees. i'm typically a 2 and the xs had plenty of room because this designer runs large. overall, cute work dress.

links_reviews_title: Nice elegant design, wrinkly fabric and long torso cut
links_reviews_text: Petite friends, be aware that this dress runs large. The design doesn't work well for a short torso. I had to wear a jacket to cover the weird back as it was hanging too low and weird for me. The design is beautiful and I wish they had petites for me to buy.

I loved this dress! I had eyed it at the store a few times and never had a reason to pick it up, so I made a reason! It was perfect for a fun summer date night. The color is absolutely gorgeous and the open back isn't too revealing. I wore it braless but would look just as nice with a lacy bralette. Definitely will rent again.

links_reviews_title: NO to this dress. Do not rent it.
links_reviews_text: The ties on the hips are uneven making it flop down. It fits oddly. It wrinkles terribly. OMG, very bad.

links_reviews_title: Fun beautiful dress, tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Lots of layers and beautiful details. Love the barely open back (just tied with laces)
Beautiful dress but prone to wrinkles. The ties make for a perfect fit.
Very flattering. A little tight after eating dinner. Wrinkles easily.
Wore this to my destination wedding in Mexico. I loved this dress so much and got so many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: A little on the short side
links_reviews_text: Overall very cute, a little tight in the waist and a bit short for me. I'm 5'5' and have a pear shape.

The large pineapple graphic was so cute and in fun, bright colors. At 5'2", 106 lbs the 0 for me perfectly. I loved the length, but may think it was too short if I was taller. Great dress for petites!

links_reviews_title: OMG! Have already rented this twice!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. This is the cutest dress for vacation. Tons of compliments.

I rented this for a tiki-themed bachelorette weekend at the beach. Unfortunately, I didn't plan my outfits out appropriately and didn't end up having a chance to wear it which I'm bummed about. I did have to iron the bottom of the dress because the hem was turned up when it arrived. As others have said, the skirt is VERY short - I definitely could not have bent over in the dress and I also wouldn't have been comfortable wearing it dancing since it's flouncy and would bounce up. But the pattern is cute and would have been perfect for the theme of the weekend! The 2 was a little snug on top but the 4 was unavailable.

Rented this for vacation in Hawaii- didn't get a picture that shows the length but it's pretty short. Great for a standing affair, a little uncomfortable when sitting. It was tight throughout the top & really didn't need a bra. Print is bright and fun!
I rented this for the rehearsal dinner for my sisters wedding. Obsessed with this dress, wish I could afford to buy it. It is a little short, but still looked cute and classy!

links_reviews_title: Tropical Fun for a Luau Party!
links_reviews_text: If you ever dreamt of being Malibu Barbie, this dress is for you. Fabric is stiff enough to hold its pleats, but light enough for a warm day. Adorable print that fit the party mood. Fairly short dress, easily balanced out with flats. Or rock it with heels! Also, pockets!

Fun dress for island anniversary vacation. Tons of compliments. Fun print, shorter length, pockets! Really considered purchasing it. Wore a strapless bra, material is thick enough, really you could do without one.
Wore this to a "cheeseburger in paradise" themed welcome dinner for wedding and it was perfect! Everyone loved it and the fit was amazing! So fun and flirty!

This dress was perfect for a destination wedding in Mexico. It was my backup, only a size 12 available. I def could’ve worn a 10 if It was available. The 12 had to much room in the top for a 38c. It is very comfortable and the print is so cute!!
Wore this to the Derby and it was perfect! So comfortable and it has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a trip to mexico!
links_reviews_text: Difficult to zip up by yourself. No need to wear a bra with it but you could wear strapless. Very comfortable and bright!

links_reviews_title: This dress is sooooo cute! Perfect for vacation or summer!
links_reviews_text: I rented the dress to wear while on vacation in Florida. It fit perfectly and looked super cute,however we didn't end up going out to dinner so I didn't wear it. I really wish I did, I'm already planning to rent this for a future event!

links_reviews_title: Easy fun dress to wear! Perfect for Hawaii
links_reviews_text: Fits great, I usually wear 6 I think but 4 was great from this designer
This dress was so much fun to wear! The colors are so bright and summery! It is a little short, but could still wear it with comfort.
Perfect fit!

Wore this dress to a beach boys concert and it was perfect, I got many compliments throughout the night! I originally rented the 4, but it was too tight in the back and chest, so I swapped it out for the 6, which fit way better.
This is a fantastic fit and flare dress. Great for smaller girls as it is a little short. The design is bright and festive. It was the perfect dress for my tropical vacation
This dress is so fun to wear. I wore it in Hawaii for dinner, twice. It's VERY short so I would not wear to a wedding.

One of my favorite rentals. So cute and colorful with an amazing pineapple print! Very flattering fit and super comfortable. The keyhole opening at bust shifted around a bit and I had to keep adjusting (may not be good for larger busted women) but other than that it was great and perfect for a bachelorette party in a vineyard! Great for petites, shorter women and pear/hourglass body types.

links_reviews_title: Super cute bright colors runs a bit small.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress I got a lot of compliments. Wore it for my birthday on a hot summer night at the beach.
Loved the fit, received lots of compliments!

This dress was perfect for a themed birthday party. Fit great AND had pockets. I mean, for that reason alone this dress is a "must"! Highly recommend if you're looking for something fun and easy to move in all night.

I worn the 4 because the 2 was not available. It was slightly large and I noticed that the torso was long for me, because of this I added a strapless bra with some extra padding which seemed to help fill out the top a bit more. I received tons of compliments!
I loved the print on this pattern. However, at 5'8", this dress was a bit short on me. I got a lot of compliments though.

Fit is very true to size and I was able to get a good gauge of that through the pictures on the website. I am 5'2 and have a short torso, so shorter dresses look better on me. Could have possibly sized down to a 2 but it was not available. The 4 was pretty spot on and perfect :)
This dress was so comfortable and cute! I had about 50 compliments !
Get. This. Dress. Cute and sexy. Easy to wear!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer bday
links_reviews_text: Wore it for my bday getaway... perfect material (one of the few 100% cotton ones) for 80F weather. Got so many compliments from strangers too. Pockets are handy for a day walking in the city, easy to accessorize, flirty length. Love the water color print and the pineapples are unforgettable!
Great dress with a really fun pattern. It was light and comfortable to wear. I would rent this dress again. I don't have a single complaint to say about this dress.
This dress was true to size. I was afraid it might be too short, but it was perfect. Wore it for a Sunday brunch cruise on the bay. It was the perfect summer dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a work summer event!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable and flattering. The material was well made and the structure of the dress held up well with out wrinkling as I wore it for about 16 hours. It was true to size and I got many compliments on the look. It was bright and fun and just perfect for a summer event. Best part, it has pockets! Would definitely recommend this cute dress!
I rented this for a summer party. The size was perfect and the material surprised me because it didnt wrinkle at all throughout the night. I felt so purddyy!

This dress is perfect for vacation very summery Received compliments even from strangers! Has a little side boob action but not too revealing Fits true to size I usually am a zero but bc of reviews I went with 2- it fit comfortably not too tight or short Wish the colors were a little brighter it tended to wash me out a bit Super fun unique head turner ;)

links_reviews_title: Wore to Hawaiian themed baby shower!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved! Received numerous compliments. Fit perfectly w pineapple shower theme. Comfy and TTS!!

links_reviews_title: My favorite dress for the summer!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress! Lots of compliments! The pattern is fun & perfect for summer parties. The fit was perfect--The waistline hits just right & the neckline is so flattering.The fabric is thin & not tight so not hot during the summer. A show-stopper for sure!
I love love love this dress. I am 5'1 with short legs so the length (for me) was perfect. It was everything I needed for a hot summer wedding.
Compliments on compliments on compliments! Did not want to send this dress back! Beautiful color, fun pattern, and super flattering fit!

I'm usually a size 2 and this size 8 fit perfectly. It fit well in the chest and not too tight in the tummy area. I wore to a concert and it was comfortable to dance in. The bright color caught a lot of attention and I received many compliments on the dress. Not too short but it's def a mini dress. I wore with Vans to keep it more casual. Would rent again.
This pink dress was well suited for my bachelorette party by the beach. It held a pleasant silhouette with or without my help.
Fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Wore for a date night on vacation in Miami
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an xs or 2 in dresses. Fit like a glove. Great quality and fabric that lets you pull off a sexier tight dress. Tons of compliments!

I loved the fabric - it was thick and had just a little stretch to it, but the top is sheer and lightweight. Some photos make it look like almost a nude blush color, which I was afraid would wash me out, but it's not. It's the prettiest light pink.
It fit like a glove. I am 5 7, 135 lbs (in this photo) with an athletic build.
This dress runs to true to size and is very comfortable. Be aware that the materials is heavier so I wouldn't recommend on a really hot day. It was really beautiful detail.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress! Good conservative length. Great for church functions!
links_reviews_text: Lovely color and fit. Very flattering.
Absolutely loved this dress! My favorite from RTR so far. Was way better than expected and received lots of compliments. This had a nice shape to it so it was very flattering and wasn't too short.
Wore this to my daughter's baby shower. Very appropriate as she is expecting a girl! Received many compliments!
A little smaller than I expected but otherwise great! Lots of complements. I like the sleeve and the color is perfect!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a high school graduation
links_reviews_text: The dress was a pretty color and perfect length for a graduation. The sleeves were a bit awkward as they were looser than the rest of the dress. It also did not have much give in the stomach area. Overall its a unique dress with laser cut detail.

I rented this dress for a wedding in Texas. For sizing, I ordered a small with a medium as backup. I'm in between a small and medium in most clothes, but the small was pretty roomy on me, so I went with that size for the event. I didn't even try on the medium. In regards to the dress itself, it was a little closer to bubblegum pink than the online picture (see my photo for a more accurate take), which was fine for me but could be a problem for those wanting the blush color. I also think this dress's lace overlay is a little more fun than regular lace - almost like a crochet effect. It also feels like crochet and is thicker but doesn't restrict movement. I wore a normal bra/underwear, but I realized part way through the night that you could see my straps through the lace on the shoulder. Oh well! Overall, I got lots of compliments on this dress (my family now just asks "Rent the Runway again?" and I say "yep!"). I would highly recommend it.
Loved this dress! Fit great and was comfortable to wear all night!

I really liked this dress! I wore it to my cousins rehearsal dinner. I got the medium and as a backup size the small, but I tried the small on and it fit perfectly! The only downside was that the area around the middle was tighter than the other material & it kind of made it look like it was cutting me off and showing fat above & below, but it was just material bunching up above & below. The color is really pretty & I had a bunch of people give me compliments which is always nice!
Very comfortable. I probably should have gotten a small instead of a medium, but it still looked okay. Only complaint is the material is very stiff and holds wrinkles

I wanted something fashionable but professional for a big work presentation, and this dress was the perfect choice! It was a nice, soft pink that paired nicely with black, navy, and gray blazers (I went with black, obviously). The fabric is heavier than I expected, but I didn't feel too warm, even when I was nervous during my presentation. Loved the length -- very work-appropriate (I'm 5').

This was my back-up dress and I ended up not wearing it because the other dress worked better for the event, but it is a great dress! The fabric is thick so it might be too hot if you have an outdoor summer event, but for an indoor daytime event it would be great!. Although the fabric is thick, it is also stretchy so easy for bending over, picking up children, dancing, etc. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Runs a bit smaller, thick material
links_reviews_text: Cons: smelled funny when it arrived in its cloth package, didn't smell like it was drycleaned, runs smaller, thick material was so hot for summer weather. Order a size up from what you normally would wear. Pros: beautiful design, classy, perfect for a baptism celebration, great price to rent

Very pretty color. Only complaint is the middle band is slightly more fitted. This made the dress bunch in an unflattering way when seated and in some poses. Also the slip underneath felt tighter than the lace overlay. Despite this, still a very pretty dress that looked great in most pictures.

Wore this dress to an outdoor bridal shower. I loved the dress and received many compliments. I got a medium and it was true to size. The fit was very comfortable, the dress material is thick/heavier. Worked perfectly for this event! Would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Graduation party and work !
links_reviews_text: This worked great and wore it to my daughters graduation and to work. Got a ton of complements on it.
Great color. Slimming. Thicker material. Perfect for any wedding guest. I would rent it again.
Loved. Fabric was thicker and more structured than I anticipated, lots of compliments

I love this super cute dress by Stylestalker! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend ordering your regular size for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. Curvier women may consider sizing up for full hips. It works for all cup sizes but you should wear a strapless bra because of the sheer lace detail at the top. At 5'3 the length hit knee length on me. I adore how girly and feminine this style is. Pair it with a cute little clutch and heels and you are ready for date night!

links_reviews_title: Cute spring/summer dress! Prettier in person!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering dress. Love the color for spring and summer. Perfect for any occasion, baby shower, bridal shower, wedding, church etc. not 5 stars because it's not a show stopper.
The lace on this dress is beautiful and feminine. I knocked off a star because it bunches in the middle.

Nice fabric and nicely cut, although it's just a touch on the small side so I found that to be slightly unflattering. Perhaps I should have ordered a small rather than xs. Nice length for me at 5'2 (appropriate for work) and I can see this working well for a day time event as well (bridal showers etc). Lastly, I only gave this dress 4 stars because of the color. It's not a subtle blush color like the picture but more of a girly pink color, which to me took away some of the elegance. Nevertheless it's a beautiful dress and I would recommend renting once.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering and gorgeous dress! I especially loved the rose gold zipper!
links_reviews_text: Bust and waist were a little tight, but the fit was very flattering. Loved everything about this dress!

This dress is even prettier in person. Beautiful cut out details. I'd say the small is equivalent to a size 2. Fits in hips and length, but a bit baggy in the upper back. Maybe would fill out if you were taller (I'm 5'2").
Overall fit was nice; however, being 5'0, way too long.

Perfect for a nice dinner out. Work it with nude heels, minimal jewelry. I was worried it would look a little cheap, but it's actually really pretty in person and has a good weight to it. I work it with nude stockings, but you could definitely wear without any tights/stockings/spanx.
I wore this for the rehearsal dinner for my wedding. It was so comfortable and classy! It has a sturdy material and the design is just perfect.

I loved the color and fabric of this dress. Fun hem and loved the exposed zipper in the back. The material is heavier so I wouldn't recommend it for an outdoor summer event. Lots of compliments and definitely would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a bridal shower. It was perfect. I got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, classy.
I loved this dress and wanted to wear it so bad! Unfortunately the waistband was too tight my ribcage (which isn't particularly larger than average), and has no give. I would suggest sizing up.
I didn't like the quality of the fabric; the fabric was very heavy for a summer wedding in Texas. In all, the fabric was not as expected.
Pretty color, lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: I wore this for Easter Sunday.
links_reviews_text: Length was nice, not too short or too long, the fabric was a great material, comfortable to wear

Absolutely loved this dress! I went up a size because of my arms and so I would have extra room for eating. I loved the pink lace and the weight. Even though it was an outdoor wedding in August, this dress did not show any sweat stains. I was so sad to send this back!
I'm always a 4-6, usually a 4, and I could hardly breathe in the small.

I like the color and the details, and I did receive some compliments. However, I did not like the material, because it is stiff and holds wrinkles. I tried to get rid of those using steam with no success. Another downside is that the area around the middle is not very forgiving. Especially if it is your problem area like in my case. Because the material is very stiff, it bunches up above when you sit and makes you look fat. I would not rent it again.
i rented this for my sisters wedding but it was way too boxy and tight if you have boobs, i have a 36c. i returned it and got a credit
The color is beautiful. Super girly dress but everyone loved it
Rented this for a 1920s speakeasy party and it was perfect. Size up at least 2 sizes tho as this dress runs small. I usually wear a 6/8 dress and rented a 10.

I had rented this dress as an option for formal night on a cruise. I am typically between an 8-10 in dresses and had rented the 8 but felt it was too tight through the torso and not very flattering. The positives are that you can wear a regular bra with this dress, it's easy to zip by yourself and the length hits nicely on a short girl (I'm 5'2").
Great dress. Classy. Sightly snug in the bust.
Ran a little small in the mid torso. Although I love this designer, I am not a fan of this dress. It was just ok.

This dress's drop waist is super-flattering. Got it because I'm large-chested and always happier when I can wear a bra, but if you have a big chest, you, too, may fall victim to the dreaded side boob with this one. A bullet-style or uniboob sports bra might alleviate the problem, but since this was my backup, I opted to pass.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a Great Gatsby event, and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size 6, but got a size 8 for back up, and the 8 fit better than the 6. It is a bit tight at the top, so the bigger size worked better for me. This is the perfect dress for this type of occasion and theme!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a prohibition party I attended!
links_reviews_text: The only issue I had was that I'm fairly busty so it was tighter accross the chest than expected. I ended up not wearing a bra with it even though I wore the larger backup size 10. Also, it was challenging to zip up by myself and took some arm and back stretch acrobatics. That said it was really comfortable and easy to move in once on.

This is my first RTR review, that's how happy I was with this dress. It's super flattering without being too revealing. I'm 5"4, but the knee length was still cute and fun given the swirl of the skirt. The faux key- hole chest feature was also cute, and the dropped waist elongated my short torso. Love, love, love.

My husband and I were going to a Roaring 20s bootleggers party for NYE. I saw that some other women wore this dress for 1920s parties as well. It was perfect! The dress was comfortable and flattering. The only issue was the zipper would catch up in the sequins if you didn't zip it fast enough. It also requires help! Otherwise I loved this dress and would rent it again if I ever attend another 1920s party.

links_reviews_title: Ringing in the New Year...Gatsby Style!
links_reviews_text: Perfect Gatsby themed dress! Both sizes fit but the zipper on the 4 was a little easier to get up (with assistance). Comfortable to dance in all night and ring in the New Year! #newyears #gatsby
Great looking dress and perfect for a 1920s gala. Only downside was a weird bump in the upper back that wouldn't lie flat no matter what. Other than that, super-comfy and fun!
I rented this dress for our housewarming party pics. It truly showed my personality and fit amazingly. Plenty of sparkle, but super comfy.

The fit was fine but it looked on unflattering on my figure...my fault perhaps but did not like how it looked like I had a skull imprinted right front and center from the lace...felt more like Halloween which I love but not for this occasion.

I loved wearing this dress! The detail in the sequins is more beautiful than shows up in pictures. I'd wear it again in a heartbeat. Glad I took the advice to size up. It's snug from the bust to the waist so if you have some curve, size up. Because the skirt is loose, it wasn't too big by sizing up. I'm short (5'3") and the dress was a good length with high heels. Wore with a regular skin-toned bra, easy!

This dress was absolutely perfect for the 1920s fundraiser I attended. It was comfortable and pretty flattering. The lace has no give, so I sized up to be comfortable. The skirt fit perfectly and the top was a bit loose, but not noticeably. I received tons of complements and felt great.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a work holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for an event where you want to keep covered but still look pretty and festive. The underslip is black. The RTR photos make it look nude. I wore a regular bra. It hit me right at the knees (5'8").
Loved this dress - it was elegant, and perfect for a Roaring 20's-themed event. The drop waist was super flattering. Definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but bordering on mumsy length for shorter girls
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a roaring 20's themed school fundraiser and it modest enough and suitable for the occasion. However, I would caution those 5'4" and under that the length can be somewhat dowdy - it hit me just below the knee and clung to all the wrong places in the midsection.. Also the top is very covered up so overall not a very sexy or figure flattering dress.

I read the reviews and wanted a size up, but it wasn't available, so I still tried the 8. The dress was a little snug at my chest, but that's ok cause they stayed in place. :) The length was perfect. Hit right at my knees. The detail was beautiful and I was getting compliments all night. Very happy with my first RTR experience!

links_reviews_title: I would have loved it if I was taller!
links_reviews_text: This dress was sent to me as an alternate style, and I ended up wearing the dress I originally selected. The top of this dress is GORGEOUS. From the waist up, it's so flattering and the detail is beautiful. I'm 5'2, and the skirt hit me just below the knee, which isn't a flattering length for me. I would recommend for taller ladies, but not for shorties like me!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and great for dancing
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a Great Gatsby-themed party and I loved it! The bodice fit me like a glove and the flared skirt was perfect for twirling and dancing. The sequins were gorgeous and not scratchy at all. High recommend!

The detail in this dress is so beautiful! I am wearing a size six in the photo. The dress does run small so I recommend curvier women sizing up. The dress is fitted in my midsection and waist but not my hips. I felt very comfortable in the dress. The fabric does not have any stretch. This dress is great for any cup size. I am a 36D and felt very comfortable in the dress. This dress may be worn with a standard bra. I am 5’9” and the dress was knee length on me. The dress is perfect for a black tie event or wedding. Pair with black heels and gold jewelry.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with a beautiful swing to the skirt!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. Fits true to size and had a wonderful silhouette. I wore for a 20s style look with a head piece and had total strangers complimenting me all night. I'm sad to send it back!

This Dress was a hit! Fit my body very well, complimented my curves. Comfortable and enough room for those with bigger busts. I would definitely rent again! Thanks Shalema! You're the best! I was a cute Wedding Planner lol!
Tight and a tad itchy around the shoulders but incredible twirl and catches the light beautifully.
I wore this dress to a "Boots and Glitz" western themed Christmas party. It went perfect with my favorite cowboy boots and the perfect length to be flattering.

Beautiful dress, but runs small at the top. I sized up, so that it would fit. That meant the dress was longer than I would want, but I still received compliments on the dress. If you have C or D bust- size up one size

links_reviews_title: Slipped the dress on and it fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to the husband's work conference cocktail party and dinner. I received so many compliments on it. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable. The fabric is weighty and hangs well. There's a bit of sparkle in the fabric which makes the dress very festive. I'm 5'7" and the 8 fit me well.

It was a perfect fit. Now, I actually wear a size 8 in shirts/pants (sometimes even 6!) but a 10 in a dress like this I think is normal. It was comfy and elegant at the same time!! There's no give so I would recommend getting a size up as your back up. And the zipper was really tough - definitely need someone else to zip it for you. I wore it to my work's black tie optional holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Went to a Roaring 20's flapper party. It was cocktail attire at an estate in Massachusetts.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit beautifully. I'm in between sizes, so I did go with the size up. I got the pearl/diamond earrings and the pearly necklace from RTR as well. I wish I could have kept it!
Chose larger size because the zipper was sticking something fierce. The 12 was only slightly better

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Elegant, classic and worthy of special occasions.
links_reviews_text: Wore hair in loose chignon. Used adhesive Braza ; easy to wear. Was a tad scratchy under arms (same as another reviewer) but nothing to not want to wear it. Great details around face. Need just beautiful earrings and bracelets to finite.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Fit perfectly and was super flattering!
links_reviews_text: Length was perfect, loved the flare so it wasn't too tight or sexy. I wore a regular black bra with straps that you could barely see with the top covering.

links_reviews_title: Not for shorties or smallish boobs
links_reviews_text: I sent my measurements to a stylist and she sent me two dresses. One was entirely too tight, and this one was too big. The waist was fine, but I'm only a B cup and it was too loose on top, causing the lace across the back to gap. I am 5'4" and the length was wrong, I looked like a kid playing dress up. I also didn't feel the nudish lining came through, the dress just looked plain black, and the kind of pleated look of the skirt didn't hold well during shipping. I had to send it back. I will say it was comfortable, and the sequins and lace were in perfect condition.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Great first RTR experience!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Beautiful lace and sequin detailing, plus it was super comfortable. Perfect for a black tie optional event. Dressy, without being too formal. Comfortable enough for dancing at the after party too! Felt amazing in it! I am very petite and although this dress was longer on me than probably intended, the look still worked perfectly. This was my first RTR experience and it was wonderful. So easy and affordable! I picked the dress out at the NY showroom, but I would feel comfortable strictly ordering online next time. Can't wait to rent again!

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress & got many compliments at my event!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and elegant.

This detailed lace LBD by Marchesa Notte will give you an effortless dressed up look. While this style runs true to size it is more fitted in the bust, midsection, and hips. If you're a 36C cup and higher or curvier you may want to consider sizing up as there is not much give to the fabric. The lining on the inside allows for a strapless bra or backless bra. At 5'7" the dress hit just above my knee. Show off the shine by pairing with simple jewelry.

links_reviews_title: perfect fit! Very comfortable dress to wear, we danced all night
links_reviews_text: no cons, only pros!! you won't regret it!
Sized up and couldn't even zip this dress. It's beautiful and the lace and beadwork is gorgeous but it runs REALLY small. Maybe size up 2 sizes and it would work.

This dress for like a glove. I know other reviews have mentioned it being a little tight in the chest, but since I'm not that well-endowed that wasn't an issue for men for lots of compliments and loved the dress BUT the beading and trim got a little itchy baby the end of the night.

Fitted at the chest but loose at the waist and hips. The slip that comes with the dress is very uncomfortable IMO so I would recommend wearing one of your own. I wore my favorite yummie slip with it and was comfortable all day running errands! Just a really great little dress!

Rented this for work but it would also be good for a casual occasion. I'm 5'2 and it hit at my knee. It's very well made-you can tell it's quality. It came with a slip underneath. It's super comfortable and doesn't need to be zippered. I would buy it if it wasn't so expensive.
Nice texture. Light and very comfortable
Little too casual for my night out but this would be a perfect dress for a dinner out on vacation in a sunny destination! Fits great!

links_reviews_title: Good winter fabric, dingy grey color
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my winter bachelorette. I liked the heaviness of the fabric for that purpose, but would not recommend for a hot summer day. The low v is sexy yet comfortable and no need to wear a bra. No undergarments show through. However I did find the color to be a rather ugly grey-ish white, whether from too many washings or if that's how it's supposed to be, it was a little dingy and made it seem old/used. Fits true to size, like every RTR piece the zipper is hard to use and gets stuck.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to elope, couldn't have asked for a better dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit well, fabric was different and very flattering. Absolutely loved this dress.

Love this dress!!! Wore it for graduation and other events throughout the month and I didn't want to give it back! Very classy with the feel of the fabric and the detailing. I have a small bust line and small chest but I wasn't worried about bagginess or too much skin with the 'deep v'. The short sleeve made it a little restricting but nothing that made me uncomfortable. Fit was great, comfortable, and elegant!
Very heavy material but it is gorgeous and fun to wear. No bra needed!
The perfect dress for our engagement party. The fit is true to size and I received so many compliments!
It runs large, I usually wear a 6 and the 4 fit fine. It is a bit revealing but designed well enough to keep everything in place ;)

This dress is A-M-A-Z-I-N-G! The dress is made of a very thick material without being bulky. Due to the material and the cut of the neck line this dress does, and should fit slightly more snug to the body. Due to this the dress can become slightly warm to wear in the summer months. This dress is also not a crisp white, but a more of a cream white. I loved this dress and would absolutely rent it again and again.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a low-key elopement in Las Vegas!
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress when my husband & I eloped in Las Vegas. It was PERFECT! The size 6 fit like a glove, was comfortable & most of all fun to wear! I want to rent it again for my elopement celebration, but my friends insist I already have enough photos in it. Highly recommend!
This material is THICK! Nice and flattering fit in a classic A line. Beware if you're renting for summer- you'll be a bit too warm. Perfect for winter though.

I loved this dress! It is very low cut so i chose to wear a pretty bra Let under it. I was on a anniversary date and was surprised by the reactions i received from people i didn't know. One couple chased me down to tell me how lovely and sophisticated my dress was. When i got carded the gentlemen said i would of never guessed. Felt like a princess! Would love to purchase this dress!

I rented this dress for my "engagement" pictures, which were the day before our wedding in Chicago. This dress was perfect for the occasion! The material was thick and structured, and the dress fit like a glove. I wore a backless sticky bra, as the neckline was too low for a regular bra. It worked out fine. We had a pre-wedding happy hour with our guests following our pictures, and I received many compliments on the dress! Highly recommend!

Very low cut- I would guess that only A cups could get away with wearing this to a classy event. I was interested in this for my engagement photos, but it showed way too much cleavage. It's also a heavy material- not light for hot days. That said, the detail is beautiful.

This dress fit true to size. A little tight in the arms/shoulders though, so be careful if you are broad shouldered. No need for a bra. The material is very thick, I would not recommend for an outdoor event. Overall good rental!
Obsessed with the material of this dress. No wrinkles whatsoever. However, the material was heavy, so avoid for outside summer events. Very low cut. Otherwise, great.

I wear this dress for my bridal shower. It was low cut V in the front but everyone loved it and I got a lot of compliments. I would recommend wearing fun heels. It is heavier in material then you think so be mindful not to wear it for an outdoor event in the summer.

This dress fit super well and was very easy to pack and wear - no iron needed! However, the material is thick. I was wearing this for my bachelorette party in Charleston, SC during a massive heat wave and practically sweat straight through it. The dress did showed up with a small stain right around the waist - I had to hold my clutch in a specific location for pictures and when we were walking around. Super cute dress and would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! It is low cut, but I got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Pretty true to size

The fit was really good, snug in the right areas. The only flaw was the that it was really low cut in the front. Had to be careful when I bent down and moved around. Overall really beautiful material and design.

Wore this to my wedding rehearsal and rehearsal dinner and LOVED IT. Got lots of complements, and it looks great in pictures. My décolletage has never looked so good! My size fluctuates a lot, from size 6 to 10, so I was worried this size 6 was going to be a non-starter, but the fabric has a lot of give and stretch and the cut is flattering so I looked fabulous and felt comfortable - not like a sausage. Just the shoulder were a little tight (I have broad shoulders for a woman my size).

Rented for a bridal shower, didn't end up wearing it. I thought the details on the dress were really nice. The cap sleeves were a little tight, which would make any kind of movement a difficult. I also thought it flared out at the bottom more than I would have liked. Would probably look a lot better on someone with smaller shoulders!

links_reviews_title: RTR overnighted this to me & it was perfect after my first choice didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs true to size, if not bigger. I had a baby a few months ago so I wasn't sure what size I was or if this was designer or commercial sizing. After talking to a stylist, I chose this because it was commercial sizing. I chose the 6 because I wanted to be safe - well it was amazing. The fabric is thick and forgiving. I could've worn a 4 and been very comfy but the 6 was just fine. The deep V didn't allow for a bra and that was okay - I felt confident and covered. Regular undies can be worn without concern. The length was great just above my knee. Love the industrial zipper and high back. The cap sleeves are current but classic and a great alternative to sleeveless. I wore this to my anniversary party with strapped nude heels.

Beautiful dress, fit tight in all the right places but I couldn't wear it to my bridal shower as there is a LOT of cleavage. also its a thicker material, so probably not good for anything in the summer. I did end up renting it AGAIN for my bachelorette party (I was the bride). It was perfect for dancing : )

I wore this for my wedding rehearsal and rehearsal dinner and wish I didn't have to send it back! I got the size 0 as my second size and it was a good thing I did because the 2 was a little large on me. The neckline is VERY low so I did need to wear a cami underneath due to the nature of the event I was attending. The fabric is thicker so if you need to wear something underneath it is very forgiving.
Very flattering but material is heavier than I expected

Very thick material! The pattern almost reminds me of the fur dresses Daenerys Targaryen wears in season 8 while in the north! Very low cut also. I think the material and the thickness was too much on a petite woman like me, and I would not recommend in the summer. This is better for winter or fall.

I'm between a size 2 and 4 and the size 2 fit. This is not a summer dress. It's a thick fuzzy fabric. Also the V is too low. It's not flattering for your chest. I tried wearing a cami under which looked better because I could wear a bra but it was too warm for the dress. Wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: The dress is not white. It is dingy.
links_reviews_text: Was supposed to wear this to a white party and couldn't. It is the color of a dingy old gym sock.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for an all white clothing party in Newport, RI.
links_reviews_text: It was definitely true to size. I liked the overall cut and fit but I was not crazy about the material. It was thick and a little heavy.
I wore this dress to my rehearsal dinner. It was super comfortable and very flattering! It's a heavier weight fabric so it was perfect for December.
Very flattering cut!

links_reviews_title: put it on and spin spin spin
links_reviews_text: Really pretty texture detailing that you can't see in the pictures. It makes it look exxxpensive.

I sized up hoping to solve the problem of this dress being too short-waisted (a problem I commonly have). However, it was big and still the top of the waist band was essentially on my boobs. Would be soooo cute on shorter ladies!!
It looks a lot lower cut plunge on.
Very very low cut! Attention grabber. I am 5'2 and 125. I wore the 2 and it was perfect.

Great heavyweight textured winter white fabric with flirty look and a deep V for a little sex appeal! The fabric is amazing, ribbed woven texture, heavy, not see through. Love this in person and in others' pictures, but it turned out to not be a good fit for my height - the horizontal band hit me at the ribs, making for a short torso look. The length was fine, so just a quirk of my proportions! This is a very cute dress and I highly recommend it.

This dress is so freaking cute on! It's got the perfect amount of flair and it made my boobs look awesome! I was able to wear a strapless with it, but a deep v one. I'm trying to figure out when I can wear it again!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress!! It fit very true to size, but I chose my original order from RTR.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for the Kentucky Derby party I attend every year. It fit great, was comfortable and very easy to wear, but it was warmer out so I went with my other RTR dress with lighter fabric.

I got this and one other white dress as options for my Bridal Shower. This dress fit my athletic frame well even though the capped sleeves were a bit tight (ie I couldn't raise my arms over my head, entirely). I didn't end up wearing it because the fabric has significant weight to it and my bridal shower was taking place in 88 degree weather with 80% humidity. So.... I'll keep it bookmarked for another time!

This is a very interesting dress! I rented it as a possible graduation dress but decided not to wear it once I tried it on. The material is incredibly thick so it might not be great for a warmer day, which is my main concern. As others said, the cap sleeves are kind of tight but manageable. Also, the v neck is low cut so you can not wear a bra with it. The shape is very cute and the skirt is very bouncy! All and all I would wear it for another occasion and would rent again!
Wore this for a night of rounds in sorority recruitment. It was amazing. I felt amazing. Waist looked so tiny very low cut but material holds bust in nicely
Dress was a smaller fit with tight fit around the arms and cane in a little short.
Fit great!
Fabric on the heavier side hides pantyline well. Nice Room in the chest but should work for all sizes. Almost bought this one! Nice colors and a little stretch.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful & practical dress for every day
links_reviews_text: Lasts perfectly throughout the day, no wrinkles or even minor accidental stains can be seen. Not too open, not too long & not too short. Material is somewhat " heavy'ish", so was afraid might be too hot, but it 's not. Really recommend, awesome rental option
Very comfy. Runs a little big

I really loved this dress. The ponte knit fabric was heavy enough to survive a windy day in Chicago but it wasn't too heavy to be hot. The pattern and colors are perfect for spring. I would definitely rent this again.
Simple dress, pretty pattern. Some stretch. Nice for the office.
Such a great color palette and I loved pairing it with this kind of bright blue cardigan I have. Will definitely rent again! Very true to size.
Comfortable with good coverage and a cute pattern. Win!
Fit really well and super comfortable. Great dress for spring

I wore this to a flower-arranging class and also to the office. The material is soft and not too thick, but not too thin either. It looked great with a pair of wedge sandals and a long necklace. It was tighter around the bust area and flowed nicely around the waist.
Xs was a great fit & length for me - typically a 4/6

links_reviews_title: Absolutely obsessed with this comfy dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so incredibly comfortable and soft, I could wear it every day. And it still wouldn't wrinkle! It's formal enough to be paired with flats or pumps for the office, but different shoes and jewelry and it would make a great brunch piece too. Runs true to Draper James size, which runs a bit large as compared to other brands. Might consider purchasing!
Material has some stretch, is mediumweight. Unlined throughout. Cut was very flattering on my pear shape and I like the way the arm openings were made, covered more of my armpit.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a vacation in San Francisco.
links_reviews_text: The A-line dress is flattering and comfortable, especially since I still have a mummy tummy.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, just a bit big for me!
links_reviews_text: Was a bit big, but I just didn't get a chance to wear it. Would rent again!
This dress was so comfortable and stylish. It's very stretchy which I loved. The length was perfect on me. Would definitely rent again.
Didn't even think twice about it. Love the Draper James line

links_reviews_title: A little short for work but cute!
links_reviews_text: I should have ordered the large - I'm a size 10 and this fit very slightly snug at the waist and arms. And short. But still very cute!
Loved this cute little dress! It was super comfy, too!

I loved the pattern and heavier ponte fabric! It made a simple dress feel more structured and high quality. This dress is very comfortable, and I could have worn it for days. I do think it runs rather large. It was definitely too big for me, and I'd size down next time, but paired with a cardi, it was perfect.
Easy pull on dress that looked put together. Fit n flare great for a curvy girl.
I love Draper James dresses and this one is no exception. It's comfortable and the flower pattern is pretty. It seemed to run a little large so you may want to size down if you are in between sizes.

links_reviews_title: Hoped to wear to bridal shower, but too short.
links_reviews_text: I rented this hoping to wear it to a friend's bridal shower, but it was so short that it barely reached the top of my thighs.
Comfortable fit. A bit shorter than I expected.
This dress is super comfy and cute- wore to a wedding rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. Not super fancy, but formal enough. Runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, too short for me.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress that fit true to size. Tall ladies beware though! It was too short my 5'11" frame. If I bent over, I would have flashed everyone. Wanted to love, and would have if it were longer.
Perfect for work, beautiful and comfortable, very flattering as well.
Comfortable and cute!

links_reviews_title: Nice, quality dress. Can be dressed up or dressed down.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, wore it dressed up to Easter and dressed it down for a friend's engagement party. BEing tall, the length was perfect and I was even able to wear it to work. Highly recommend! It has a stretch to it and no zipper, so having it slightly big was nice!
This is a cute early spring work dress. I wore it with a white shirt beneath it and a cute casual blazer. The stretchy fabric is a good choice for curvy girls!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a day time fundraiser and it was wonderful. Very comfortable material and fantastic fit.
links_reviews_text: Material falls nicely and is very comfortable. Extremely flattering cut. Would definitely wear it again.

This was one I was sad to return...may have to rent it again! Also sad I didn't get a pic in it. This dress is cute, comfy and flattering, you can dress up or down. I am 5'8" w/ broad shoulders, and overall a pretty rectangular frame and this dress flattered the hell out of me. Fabric is a good weight, feels quality not too light, not too heavy. Okay. Writing this review is making me sad now. Will def have to rent again.
Love this! So flattering and pretty
I wore this for a baby shower, and got a few compliments. I sized up, and wish I hadn't. Usually wear a 10/12 and ordered the XL, which was comfortable but definitely quite a bit too big.
The material is very soft and the fit was comfortable, but a little loose in the chest/shoulder area. Also the pattern is a little boring in person IMHO.
Love the style! Did not realize from the photo the upper back was "vented". I loved this, but definitely something to note for occasions (wasn't comfortable wearing for work).
Fit is true to size. Perfect for summer weather.

links_reviews_title: Loved the wrap detailing on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It hits at the right point for a business or family affair above the bust. I wore this to speak in the chapel so I was especially concerned about this point. The open back detailing was concerning at first, but I managed it with a black camisole and it ended up being kind of a cool detail that elevated the dress from boring to bold. The fabric has some stretch to it, so it is comfortable and the skirt is generous enough I was not worried about it flapping open. I got lost of compliments!

I loved how this dress fit and I got lots of compliments. I was concerned about how the back was open, but I'm petite so nothing showed. I wish RTR would have the option of letting us have first dibs on things we rented and loved... I'd love to own this dress!

links_reviews_title: SO BAD. A dress for Quasimodo?
links_reviews_text: A new winner for the worst garment I have ever rented. The fabric is stiff so the vent in the back poofs out instead of laying properly so it looks like you have a hunchback. It's also terrible fit everywhere, very small in waist but way too big in the chest. Do not rent!!!

Somehow I missed in all the photos that this dress has an open back. Super cute, flattering, and a great fit, but I rented it for work and didn't end up wearing it due to the back. Regardless, very cute dress. Would be good for a brunch, baby shower, summer date...

links_reviews_title: Cute dress with a peak hole.
links_reviews_text: I work from home and seldom have to make it work appearances. Unfortunately, I recently gained a lot of weight and I don't have any work clothes that fit me. This dress was a very nice fit and look nice on, but the back is open and I'm afraid that if I wind comes along my Spanx will show. Outside of that issue, nice dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a family engagement party and the dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an 8 but I wore a small and it fit great - a medium would have probably been too big. Super comfortable and everything stayed covered even with having my two small children in tow. Very classic, great compliments on the dress. I wanted to keep it.

links_reviews_title: Dress arrived completely wrinkled, not in a plastic sleeve like the other 3 items in the bag.
links_reviews_text: I thought this fit fine, it was a little tight in the sleeves. I felt self conscious about the open back and wore a camisole/tank underneath -- this also helped with the low-cut front, since I was wearing this to work.

Dress was cute! Loved the open back detail! Wore it to work and got a ton of compliments... was a little snug in the waist and the sleeve openings for me so wasn't the most comfortable to wear so I'd say runs a little on the small side but still fit and was able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a night at Delacorte Theather!
links_reviews_text: The buttons were a little bit too weak. I guess they need to be sewed back multiple times. The dress is a must have for a summer night, but it is also perfect for the office.
The fit was overall true to size with the exception of the arm area - it was a little hard to lift my arms. The dress hit me mid-calf. Was suitable for the occasion!

links_reviews_title: Looked great on, wasn't the most comfortable
links_reviews_text: It's a cool and fun day dress. It was just very tight in the ribcage, but sizing up would have made it too big in the chest. I'm a 36C so if you're a 34 or below it might not bother you. I looked adorable, if I do say so myself. But after a full day at work I was ready to take it off.
Comfortable cotton, fits well, cute opening in the back.

I loved this dress however had I known I would've needed to pin it from showing my goodies I would've done so before leaving the house. It's a wrap dress so you can't go wrong but all day I was adjusting making sure my chest wasn't falling out and I wasn't flashing anyone when the wind blew. Just a few pins would've handled this situation. The dress is a great light weight material and the top back cut out gives the dress a little "things that make you go hmmm" vibe. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Good length / weight for transitional weather (spring to summer).
links_reviews_text: Loved the design and construction of this dress!

True to size. Hard to button. Inside button was missing but that was OK because the sash could be tied tightly around my waist. Perfect dress not something I would usually wear but I love the style and will order more like this!

links_reviews_title: Amazing! You need this in your life.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress and may have to buy it. I didn't realize it is open in the back. Thankfully it's high waisted so I could get away with wearing it to work before seeing a musical the evening. Rave reviews and then some! So flattering and I felt glamorous.

links_reviews_title: This is the perfect dress if
links_reviews_text: You're into wearing capes. My neck was also a bit big for the collar. It's one of the only dresses I've rented that has come without pockets- and I'm certainly not holding it against them, but I didn't know what to do with my hands. Gingham is so in for the summer!
A bit tight in the waist. I should have sized up.

I liked this dress so much I wore it 3 times before I returned it. It's so cute and different from everything else. However, it's extremely difficult to button. The buttons lay against your skin, on your waist, so it's really hard to reach underneath the dress to pull the buttons through. They're also kind of small and very flat and slippery. So they're even more difficult to grasp. The third time I wore it I had false nails put on, nothing very long, but even the additional bulk of the nails made me give up on trying to button the dress. I just tied it tightly and hoped for the best.
Wore it to church with a cami under. Perfect length, loved it.
Retro design. I felt liked I walked off the set of I love Lucy. The cut out in the back was an interesting twist but since I wore it to work I wore a cami underneath. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: On trend gingham wrap dress with midi length
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. The buttons were a bit snug around my waist but the tie made it feel secure. I posted a pic of the back. I loved the open back. It was unique. It's similar to a cape or the top back of a trench coat. I wore it to an Eastern house party and then again to work. I was not concerned about having a tank underneath, as you cannot are any skin unless you bend over.

links_reviews_title: Perfect piece for transition to winter to spring!
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear something to work that would work with the crazy spring weather, so I liked I could pair this with knee high boots and a warm trench or pink pumps and pink trench for warmer days. The cotton was breathable and I absolutely adore the puffy sleeves. Looked great with the shearling J.O.A moto jacket I rented too! One thing to note: wasn't wild about the poufy open back vent. That was kind of weird. I don't think you'd have to worry about exposing skin at work, my husband didn't notice until I pointed it out, but I wore a cami underneath just in case!
Long enough to be modest but flirty fun open back!

links_reviews_title: Did not fit around my bump. Runs small.
I love myself a grandma chic dress and this was perfect to wear around town. Would recommend.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Love the style and the unqie back cut Cons: I have a small waist and this was just a little too tight.
Super cute! has a cut out in the back but you can't really tell unless someone points it out. I'm usually a size small or medium and based on other reviews i went with a small fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress but beware of some the details...
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress but please be aware that the back is open. I rented to wear for work so needed to wear a cami underneath. The wrap also had a tendency to fall open in front so I needed to use a safety pin to secure it in place. I loved the dress, however, and received many complements. I believe it might be better suited for social occasion than work one.
Dress was very cute on. Waist is really tight.

Too tight around waist for a 2nd trimester maternity option. And it has a cutout in the back I didn't notice in any pictures so that didn't work for the occasion I needed it for. Had to send back unworn

Fabric was stretchy and bottom fit well; top of the dress was too large with the back of the dress sticking out, ended up not wearing it bc had rented it for work and didn't realize how open the back was.

This dress has absolutely zero give and the hidden buttons make it incredibly difficulty to button. Add in that I'm 6 months pregnant and getting it on was impossible. I was pretty bummed because it's a very cute dress that I imagine would have been super cute pre-pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: opening in the back is super cute
links_reviews_text: it was tight at the waist for its size. Everything else was fine.
This was sooo cute, but way too big on me. Luckily it was a wrap dress and I could hide it, but I felt like I was swimming in the fabric.

links_reviews_title: The dress has a weird back flap/opening. It made the dress look too big on top.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit fine around the waist, but the top portion has an open back. It made the dress seem at least a size too large on top (I'm pretty small chested, so that didn't help matters). The shoulders seemed large and the sleeves puffed so I looked very 80s, but not in a good way on me. The quality of the dress itself, like the fit and construction, was very nice. I'd recommend for others to give it a try, it just wasn't for me. I didn't end up wearing it and returned it immediately.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear this dress due to the fit.
links_reviews_text: This wrap dress runs small and has an awkward cut out in the back. Despite the dress being so tight, the top part above the cut out looks like a huge flap/ wings.

links_reviews_title: I didn't realize there is a cut out in the back, but it was cute
links_reviews_text: I was suprised by the cut out in the back. It ran a bit tight around my rib cage. But the fabric looks and feels expensive.

links_reviews_title: Birthday parties to picking produce, this felt like a sweet "wholesome" look. Comfortable and cool.
links_reviews_text: Unexpected opening in back makes for a fun surprise!

I've searched the internet high and low for this dress because I need it in my closet! Made me feel like a million bucks. I've already rented it again for a holiday party I have coming up. Neckline is low, but I could still wear a regular bra with it, and it fits tight in the chest so I didn't have to worry about anything falling out. :)
Definitely one to try on in store and/or order a backup size, as dress has no stretch. Wore it to a gala and loved it!

I wore this dress to a recent wedding. It was elegant, comfortable and forgiving--also easy to dance in! My only complaint was that due to the very low v-neck, it was almost impossible to find a bra that would be imperceptible under the dress. I chose a very low, black demi-cup and you were still able to see the center of the bra in the point of the v-neck. Not ideal, but I made it work!
Loved this dress! It was perfect for a semi-formal/formal wedding and was so COMFORTABLE! I wore a sticky bra, but ended up removing it so I wasn't so "booby"

Loved everything about this dress. I was looking for a long dress but something that was formal and flattering. It definitely has a mermaid fit to it which I liked!! Got tons of compliments and would definitely rent again!

A RTR stylist picked this out for me in the NYC store for a black-tie optional wedding. It fit me very well and gave me a nice shape. The dress is a nice lace fabric and not too heavy but definitely has some weight to it. It may be too heavy for a summer wedding but very good for other seasons! The neckline was low so its a good dress for A or B cups. I went braless and it felt fine. I'm 5'2" so the midi-length didn't feel overwhelming but I still felt perfectly dressed up for the occasion.

Browsing through thousands of dresses on RTR, this one might not stands out as other dresses just because it's a very simple black dress with a little bit mermaid shape. I ordered it first online and went to the NYC flagship store to try on. Once I put on, I knew this is the dress I want to wear and fit me perfectly. No crazy design, but it shapes your body surprisingly. You will never go wrong with it.

I wore the larger, backup size because the hips were too fitted on the original. The top on the backup was a little large/low cut for a work party so I wore a cami underneath. The material is a heavier lace, which worked well for the season. I wore black knee high boots too because of the weather.

links_reviews_title: Great, form flattering style, definitely low cut
links_reviews_text: The quality and cut of the design makes this incredibly flattering (spanx aided obviously:)). I wore to a family wedding so I chose to add a thin black spaghetti strap under that only went up about an inch above the point Of the V in front. It was just borderline on being too low for me. I have a larger (38DD) bust/chest though. A smaller cup size may not require. Also, went up to a 14R because of my chest but if it were about a 1/4 inch smaller or opted for no bra I could have worn my regular size 12R. Again, with my bust size and a family/church wedding going sans bra was not an option. Overall it was cute and I had a lot of compliments.
Flattering, form fitting, I'm 5'6" and it hit just below the knees, perfect length. Low cut but was still able to wear a bra. Wore to a wedding and was complimented many times!

This was my back up dress but ended up being the one I chose. I loved the curves it accentuated and it ran true to size. The material is heavy and lines don't show. The dress is a little on the plainer side compared to most things I would wear to something black tie optional, but some sparkly jewelry or shoes, and fancy hair and make up will elevate it. I would definitely rent this again!

I love the silhouette of this dress. I am almost always a size 4 but I could juuuust baaaarely get this zipped. Once it was zipped I felt comfortable and also felt like everything was plled in in a good way, but if you are between sizes maybe size up. I would be raving about this dress and how flattering it was (gave me something close to an hourglass shape which is a miracle) EXCEPT for two big flaws: it's really low cut, and I didn't realize until too late that my bra was showing all night. I think the only way around this is those stick-on bras that don't meet in the middle. Also, my dress had a clump of fabric at the base of the zipper that I could not smooth down. Maybe it was just the particular ress I had, or maybe I just couldn't figure out how to smooth the frabric, but anyway I attached a picture you can kind of see the clump of fabric. My husband said it wasn't noticeable but I felt self-conscious about it.
Classic

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress!!! It was flattering and super comfy. Perfect for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I'm generally between a 4 and a 6, and I went with the 6 on this one. The 4 was tricky to zipper, and the 6 fit like a glove! The v is deep, but perfect for little boobs. Ended up not wearing a bra and didn't have to fiddle with it at all throughout the night. Would buy this dress - I loved it!
I would definitely rent again. It's a little long but looked good with heels.

links_reviews_title: Great Length and hit me about mid calf (5'7). Wonderful fit and wasn't too low in the chest.
links_reviews_text: I am not a busty girl so this wasn't a problem for me with it being fairly low cut but if you are more aware of that area I would opt out for this dress or find an insert for the chest area. The fit was so flattering.
This dress was very pretty and would of loved to wear but I got the wrong size. Detail was very beautiful.
Classic lace dress with nice shape. The vneck is very low and it ran small so I could wear.

Structured dress that gave a great shape, but as some of the other reviews mentioned, the zipper get stuck around the waistline area and is very difficult to get up or down. Not a good option if you are in a rush!
I'm a usual size 4 or 2. The size 4 fit everywhere besides the thighs where it was a bit too tight for dancing- if you have more athletic thighs consider sizing up

links_reviews_title: The dress is simple and beautiful but not made for women with hips or a full bust.
links_reviews_text: Not made for curvy women.
