This dress accentuated my curves, but be warned that the fabric has no stretch! It definitely hugged my hips. The nice thing about a thick fabric, though, was that I didn't feel like I needed a bra.

links_reviews_title: Dress was classic style and great fit. Loved the lace fabric and fun hemline.
links_reviews_text: Dress was very form fitting, but looked great hugging the curves. Very low cut dress, but without exposing too much. Loved the length of the dress, looked great with stilettos!

Didn't wow me, but still really liked it and it worked for my event. It's very low cut...plan accordingly since I didn't think there was enough structure to go without a bra. I was in-between sizes but went with the larger for more room in the hips. It's a heavy fabric (but enough stretch for movement), so would only recommend in cooler weather.

links_reviews_title: Dress is gorgeous! I received tons of compliments. Great for curvy gals - shows off your curves.
links_reviews_text: Definitely low cut for those with larger chests.
Rented to wear this for a cocktail party. Looked amazing, hugged in all the right places. Love this dress
I did not end up wearing this dress due to the tightness around the hips. The dress is very pretty but I would need to size up on this one.
This LBD was both very comfortable and fun to wear. The lace was beautiful and delicate, but the dress felt very sturdy and supportive.
Great dress! Pretty heavy. Definitely better for winter. I'm usually a 12 in Fame and Partners. Unfortunately I could not even get this zippered.
This dress was older than my years, matronly, yet the chest was incredibly low cut.
Too small. It was snug across my bum made me too nervous I would rip it if I wore it. Gonna try a size up

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: It fits a tad snug on me...I needed help getting the zipper past my mid back. But once it was on, I loved it.
The dress fit beautifully, although a little long, as I’m only 5’2”. It felt too long and dark for an April wedding so I opted not to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Very attractive on and was comfortable to wear.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! I wasn't sure when I ordered this dress if I would like it, but I loved it once I tried it on. The V neck wasn't too revealing. I usually don't wear low V neck tops or dresses, but this was just right. I ordered a size 6 and 8 , the 8 fit perfect. It was definitely form fitting, but comfortable and I was able to sit comfortably. I received many compliments and would recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved the way this dress fit and made me feel. The neckline is low, so I ended up wearing a black bralet with it and had no problems. Like a lot of the other comments on this dress - it fits very tight through the hips. My waist and my hips never match up in sizes (my hips are usually a size bigger). The dress was snug through my hips, but I had no problems dancing or sitting in this dress. I would 100% rent this dress again.
Form-fitting, flattering, and great quality.
Gorgeous dress but I'm between sizes- if I had more bust I'd likely have been able to wear it!

The cut did not fit well for my body shape. I have larger, muscular legs and flutes and this dress was very tight around my thighs. So much that it was difficult to walk. The larger size was still tight, and then was too long in the body and much too large around my bust. I was bummed about the fit because it's a beautiful dress, but this is something I would have to buy larger and have tailored to fit my athletic build.

links_reviews_title: The length was great for a formal work holiday party. The fit made it still made it sexy and fun.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly, with some room to breath. I did have some issues with the v-cut. I’m a B cup, so the top part is a little big, but it was only an issue when I was sitting down. Other than that, AWESOME.

I'm between a size 4 and a size 6, and I went with the size 6. I was able to zip up the 4, but it was tight through the hips and i felt like I was spilling out of the top! This dress was beautiful and perfect for my husband's black tie optional work event. Very flattering and elegant dress that revealed just enough cleavage but still looked classy. The length was great for a winter event.
This dress pretty, elegant and exceptionally easy to wear. It does run true to size and I am right between an eight and a 10 so it was just a smidge big.

It's pretty maternity friendly, but if recommend sizing up. I put on most entirely belly weight and it was way too tight around the shoulders. It was also not flattering on my backside, even in pregnant lady spanks. Had I gotten a size up, it might have been better. The weight of the fabric was great. I didn't love the way it fit around my belly/lower hip. I'm not sure if the next size up would have made that any better

links_reviews_title: Sunny and bright easy to wear
links_reviews_text: This stretchy material is comfortable and thick enough to go braless and hold you in. Lots of compliments on the color. Definitely a good wedding guest dress!

links_reviews_title: Pretty color and style! Shows lines.
links_reviews_text: This was a fun and pretty style dress for a wedding! It was different than what I typically wear. It fits true to size and feels even stretchy in places! But it shows lines (underwear, bra, spandex, etc.) so make sure you're okay with that before renting!

I did not choose this dress originally (my original dress did not come, so I was able to choose two different dresses) and man was I delighted! It is a thicker fabric. I hugged all of my curves. I got SO MANY COMPLIMENTS! I paired it with a colorful statement necklace and some low heel strappy sandals - perfect! I love how the cut was a different length at the bottom. I danced the night away in this dress and it was so fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Perfect day time semi formal event dress! Bright as the sun!
links_reviews_text: THE PERFECT SHADE OF YELLOW for all skin tones! First of all, the construction is impeccable. I loved how tailored yet feminine this dress is. I would totally buy it! The color is eye popping without being obnoxious. I wore this to my husband's graduation ceremony at a hospital in NYC and really made heads turn. Everyone who saw me told me the dress is so pretty and that I look beautiful. Btw I wore this 20 weeks preggo, 193 lbs and a size 12 fit perfect. I generally wear 10 or 12 depending on fabrics. Pair these with skin tone stilettos- can't go wrong! Love how these highlight my athletic shoulders and the way it hugged my baby bump. Very highly recommend!!!
Very cute, fit right, fabric was ok, kind of wrinkled easily and hang weird on the wrong spots :-( moved beautiful when you walk or danced :-)

links_reviews_title: A color I would never purchase on my own. But def worth renting
links_reviews_text: Fit really weird around the hip area

This dress was the perfect pop of color for a spring wedding! I got so many compliments. Although the dress is form fitting, it does have some give so it wasn't tight and uncomfortable. The extra fabric at the bottom made it extra fun to dance in!

The yellow is pretty vibrant and won't totally wash out pale skin. The material is forgiving although doesn't hide every imperfection (felt pouchy in some pics). Wore with a strapless bra and had no problems there although underwear lines were a problem. Bigger bust and it fit well up top. Went with the 4 instead of 2 so it didn't hug quite so tightly. Not my fave rent the runway style but had fun trying it out.
Quality material, photographs well, great color, had to size up because size 4 was too tight on my chest, but 6 was way too baggy on my hips.
Beautiful dress. Lovely color and it made me stand out from the crowd. Couldn't stop getting compliments. Would definitely rent again!
i ordered a 14 which is my usual size but had to wear a 12 in order for it to show my figure . material is nice and there was no wrinkling in the dress. Got a lot of compliments on it

Dress makes a statement! Flattering cut, pretty, definitely bright yellow. Weight is 124 lbs in picture, think it wouldn't have felt good if I was heavier or carried weight in stomach area. Wore to cocktail party.

Got many compliments in this dress! The fabric had decent stretch to it and fit well for my hourglass shape. Even though the fabric is thick, I could still see lines through it and wore with a seamless shaper to smooth out. I wore with a regular bra with straps tucked in.
Beautiful lemon shade ....a little big in the bust and you need the right undergarments but I adored this dress! Very comfortable fun and flirty!
This dress was so sexy and comfy and fit my shape to a T! I am searching to find one to Buy! Requires a racer back bra, but that's easy. Absolutely fab!

links_reviews_title: This is a perfect summer dress to go from work to cocktails on the patio.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size. It's extremely comfortable and I received lots of compliments on the color.
Ladylike and so easy to wear. Ran a bit big in the midsection.

The color is definitely the standout with this dress. I honestly never wear yellow, but I wanted to try something different, so I ordered this for a friend's wedding. Got tons of complements because of the brightness! The dress is a bit clingy and doesn't hide much, so I did feel like I was sucking in a lot. It's still good for dancing, though!

links_reviews_title: This dress felt so good on. The yellow color was beautiful and the dress was very flattering!
links_reviews_text: The fabric had a nice stretch to it and was thick enough that there was no worry about it seeing thru and it was a bit smoothing which is always nice. I loved the asymmetrical aspect as it added some interest to an otherwise simple design.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Fairly conservative but still fun.
links_reviews_text: RTR and previous reviewers suggested sizing up for the backup size, which I did. However, I wish I had sized down as I found the dress a little large, but still wearable, in my normal size 4 (5'8" and 130 lbs). I would like to have been able to try on the smaller size. The yellow was a great color, perfect for a summer late afternoon wedding. Tips: I wore a normal bra and used tape to pull the straps in the front closer together so they did not show (the armholes are cut wide on the front of the dress). The bra straps did not show in the back at all without any extra work. I also had to fish through my shapewear to find spanx that did not have a seam up the front, because anything with a front seam showed through. I wore it with a sparkly statement necklace and nude heeled sandals.

Very cool skirt, nice shade of yellow. Note that dress runs a little big in the waist. Fiance opinion is most important. On the first wear, he told me to change outfits. But on the second wear, he said it "was nice." The only thing I changed was shoes, going from wedges to flat sandals. Go figure.

links_reviews_title: What a fun shade of yellow!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a school Spring celebration and it was absolutely perfect. The color was beautiful and the dress hugged all the right places while ending in a fun ruffle skirt. Strangers commented on what a pretty dress it was. Can't help but be in a good mood in this one!
Wore it to work as a news anchor, lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a bright sunny day. Love It!
links_reviews_text: This dress is form fitted at the top and flares out at the bottom. Love the bright color, Fabric has some give so works well for full bust. Got compliments all day long from people at work, to walking to the parking garage, to leaving the post office and in BJs. Definitely a shop stopper. I will definitely rent again

I love this feminine dress by Theia! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5"3, the length hit right at my knees on me. Perfect color for Spring! Pair with heels and a pair of cute earrings to complete your outfit.

links_reviews_title: A pop of color for spring
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous yellow that was like wearing sunshine. The fit was very flattering but the fabric is a little unforgiving so you'll need to wear smooth underwear. I loved it and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I was maid of honor for my best friend's wedding. It was the perfect color and style for the day.

links_reviews_text: Fit big
Needed to size down before wearing out of the house. Rented a 4 and I am a 4/6.

links_reviews_title: The fabric was too clingy. Showed my belly button.
links_reviews_text: Dealbreaker because of clingy fabric.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for work as part of my unlimited plan.
links_reviews_text: I don't usually think of yellow as my color, but I received lots of compliments on this dress, specifically the color. The fabric is thick, but has a little give which is nice. You do definitely need spanx since it shows everything. I would definitely rent this dress again.
I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 and went with a 4 based on reviews. Big mistake. Was swimming in the 4. Looked horrible. Had to send it back. I'm 135 lbs, 5'8", and 34C.

links_reviews_title: This is a stand out dress!
links_reviews_text: It needed spanx and wasn't forgiving in the tummy area. But it was an absolutely gorgeous dress. I wore it to deliver a speech and the dress was the highlight of the night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but the fit was too large
links_reviews_text: I was really looking forward to a fun yellow dress for the summer. I didn't land up wearing this dress as it didn't fit me. It was too loose, there was too much material and the places that did fit, you could see every curve. It's still a beautiful dress for a cocktail party and I'm sure it would fit another body type better.
It did not look right on my short frame and the color was far more "yellow" than it looks. Didn't wear it
Good dress, the fabric is a bit thin so you will see panty lines or worse and that made me uncomfortable but I found something that worked. Otherwise good dress but wouldn't rent again.

Didn't quite work for me-- the yellow is a little on the chartreuse side, and clashed with my skin. I'm in between a 2 and a 4 and the 4 was too big, so I would say go for your regular size or size down if in between sizes. However, I know everyone carries their weight differently, so it depends on proportions. I have a small ribcage/ waist, and this was very roomy there for me.

links_reviews_title: Great color, but didn’t fit me right
links_reviews_text: Color is great. Otherwise, this was a total miss for me. I tried on the 6 at 22 weeks pregnant and the fit was terrible. It gaped at the bust and the length was not good for me. I would say this runs large The bottom fabric reminded me of polyester dinner napkins.

links_reviews_title: Prim and Proper in the front, and like a mullet the party is in the back! 😂
links_reviews_text: This little dress is all prim and proper in the front, but like a mullet, the party is in the back. Comfortable and with pockets. I wore it with fishnets and cowboy boots. It was perfect for Christmas when you want to be not full on dressy b/c your hosts were legit in jeans and barefeet but a step up from Marvel/DC tee and denim.

Easy to dress up or done! I'm a 4/6 top with 8 hips and usual get a 6 dress. The waist of this dress fit perfectly, although I did find it to be a little large in the shoulders. Back is stunning. Overall I will likely rent to purchase next time.
Because the arms are puffy and no support to hang you'll want to go for a size smaller. Other than that it's very flattering and a beautiful color. Sexy back cut made for extra compliments!

I was a little unsure about the shoulders but the dress was super cute on. It has a unique stylish cut, and the fabric is a nice thick quality that gives it this nice classy look. And obviously the back is the real show stopper for this dress. I loved it!

I rented this for an outdoor April wedding in North Carolina and it was perfect for the weather! Very comfortable dress with a pop of fun in the shoulders. I loved the material, the back, the shoulders and the pockets! I received so many compliments!!

I really love this dress in pictures/on others. However it just didn't work for me. The puffed sleeves were way too wide on me, it was not a flattering look for me. The open back is pretty but with it being slightly loose for an XS I didn't feel entirely secure in it. Beyond that I found the neckline to be a bit choking and that was uncomfortable. Ultimately I knew attempting to wear this would be a nightmare for me in reality. I prefer to be comfortable and know I look good. The POCKETS are fabulous though. I think if you have the body for this dress you will love it. I didn't so I'm passing it back.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my brothers wedding!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Classy and sexy! The back is to die for!
The color of this dress first caught my eye, but the sleeve detail, low back, and pockets won my heart.

links_reviews_title: Open back + Pockets are a win
links_reviews_text: Likes: the open back, pockets, length (I'm 5'6", hit above the knee without feeling uncomfortably short), rich green color, overall fits true to size. Dislikes: high neck line irritated my neck, felt a bit tight on my diaphragm, scrunches up a bit when you put your arms up.

links_reviews_title: The back and shoulder detail on this dress are the classiest statements. Just enough safe and sass!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 0 or 2 but have put on a few lbs in recent weeks. I'd say if you are a true petite 0 or 00 this might not be the dress for you as it fit me well and it might be a little too roomy for many ladies I know who are smaller than I. I was also worried about the back gapping but it actually laid quite nicely throughout the evening without using any sticky tape. The material is thick so the right person might be able to get away without a bra. My nipples always shine through so I opted for a sticky bra which did just the trick. The back really is the perfect surprise element on this otherwise-conservative silhouette. Received so many compliments! Also, I am mid-30's and trending away from the super short mini-dresses so this style hitting a few inches above the knee was just perfect for me!

links_reviews_title: Didn’t wear, but may have for another type of event.
links_reviews_text: Fit fairly well, but back was very open—too revealing for my office party. Luckily this was the backup dress Rent the Runway sent for free and not the one I planned on wearing to the event!

links_reviews_title: Classy but with a flare! I wore this for a holiday work party.
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’7” 130 pounds and I wore the size small. It was a little tight and irritated my neck but I’m small chested so it was the far better option. I loved it. It was a little high in the waist for me. The dress was a heavy fabric and a pretty muted color.

I ordered this dress just 2 days before my work Christmas party. It arrived within 2 days, mid day on the day of my party. I had SO many compliments on this dress it made me feel so beautiful. The sleeves did slip a little, but was worth wearing!

Loved this dress for a nice dinner out. V. classy and conservative from the front but fun and flirty with the backless style. Thick fabric that I wouldn't wear in the heat, but makes it possible to wear without a bra. Neck comes up quite a bit in the front, sometimes felt a little awkward. And pockets!!!

Love this dress! I was a little hesitant at first about the sleeves being too puffy, but it was beautiful and I got so many compliments. The open back is perfect with the conservative front, not too long or too short in the front. Overall, a very flattering dress!

The fabric on this is a scuba material which I actually find pretty flattering. I wasn't able to wear the XL as I rented this as mostly a back up and it was too small for me. I am more of a 14 and I would say the listed size 10 is true, maybe a 12 if you are smaller on top than bottom. The color is a bit of a soft emerald and I love the sleeves. It was a bit shorter than I like even though I'm only 5t3. If you are in the size range for this and don't mind the open back I would say go for it.

links_reviews_title: I wish it had a back
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a potential dress for a movie premier . The dress is a beautiful color and the material is structured and high quality. From the front it looked amazing on me. But the dress is totally backless and it would not allow me to wear a bra. I'm a 36DD so I can't go braves and the idea of contorting myself into some low back crisscross bra did not seem comfortable. I tried to wear a body suit under it but that did not work either. The only other thing is that while the zipper was a bit hard to get up the open area gaped and was too large on me. I suspect it's because I'm petite and have no shoulders.

I loved the open back on this dress, but given how thick the fabric is (usually a good thing), there was some weird gaping going on in the back depending on my posture or where my arms were. I sized down to minimize this problem and make the waist fit but then the high neckline was a bit tight on my collarbone and rubbed it all night, leaving a mark. Dress is a beautiful color.

The color of this dress and the fabric was wonderful! The only reason I give it a 4/5 is because it was a bit big up top for me. It's definitely a balance because you cannot wear a bra with this dress, but because of the open back, it made the shoulders lose, which didn't offer too much support. Since I'm small-chested, it worked for me - just beware!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my Saint Patrick's day bridal shower! I loved it, especially the color!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup style, and I ended up wearing it! I did get a lot of positive remarks on the dress! I'm an hourglass/curvy figure and it did feel slightly tight at times (whereas the size I got normally fits me), but I could definitely sit and breathe. I was worried that the shoulders would be too sharp, but it only bunched up when I went to go hug people. It's a little on the short side, at least for me, so you may want to keep that in mind. Really, overall, the dress was beautiful and I'm glad I got to wear it!
Pretty back, nice for a date night or cocktail party

links_reviews_title: The color and fit were perfect
links_reviews_text: This was such a great dress for my friend's baby shower. It fit perfectly and the surprise detail of open back gave it a little extra flare. I also loved that the shoulders were puffed up, it gave the piece some extra interest. I will definitely rent this dress again!
material was nice and thick -which was helpful since i couldn't wear a bra

links_reviews_title: Loved the color. Cut was flattering!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this to wear to my cousins winter wedding but ended up being asked to be a bridesmaid in the end. I was very excited to wear this dress because it fit me like a glove up top but still offered a flattering look from the waist line down. The Loback was also very flattering yet classy and sexy all at the same time.I would definitely rent this again.

I tried this on immediately because this was the dress I was most excited about in my unlimited order. Unfortunately, it did not flatter my shape. The shoulders poof up slightly and made me look broad. I think a smaller frame would be the best fit for this dress.
Makes you look wide .

links_reviews_title: Waist was too tight to wear :-(
links_reviews_text: Really cute but I would have been uncomfortable if I had worn it all night. I have a small waist so normally dresses fitted at the waist in an xs fit.

I didn't end up wearing this because I wanted a longer gown for my work event. This dress is so beautiful that I wished I could have worn it to something else. The sleeves make it look elegant in the front, and the open back gives it a sexy feel. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color but the shoulders are a little intense
links_reviews_text: I LOVED the color, the back, and material of this dress BUT I didn't end up wearing it for engagement photos as I felt like the shoulder were a little too intense in person and was worried it may look weird in our photos... The arms and chest were a little snug (I'm a 34B) and it hit mid thigh on my 5'11" frame.

links_reviews_title: It was a super cute bachelorette brunch outfit!
links_reviews_text: It was a little short, but fit great.

I rented two sizes and went with the smaller size. I went bra-less and felt pretty comfortable! The darts are a little funny at the breast area, but I still thought it looked okay. Pockets are always a plus! Stylish and sexy, I felt great in it!
Wore this for the casual night of my bachelorette. Small was just a little tight in the butt so I went up to the Medium. Such a fun outfit!

links_reviews_title: Easy piece for a white party
links_reviews_text: Fun and comfy romper for a white party. On the shorter side, darts on the front were just a bit off for me but would probably be perfect for someone with a medium/large bust

links_reviews_title: The outfit was amazing and fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my bachelorette and it is true to size.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, breathable! Lots of fun in this outfit.
links_reviews_text: I wore a size small and felt comfortable.

I ordered this to wear for my bachelorette weekend and it was the perfect find! It is not bright white, a bit muted and at first I thought it was dirty, (Don't be alarmed when you look at it on the hanger) but when on, it's more of a creamy color. I thought it was great for the day, a little too casual for going out at night. If you are tall I would size up because it was a little short! But I would definitely order this again!

I had my eye on this romper for a long time and it did not disappoint. This was so figure flattering and I could wear a strapless bra with it. The lace was a little overstretched along the neckline but it wasn't too bad. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Super cute outfit, perfect for a white party event.
links_reviews_text: It was very cute! I wore sticky petals, it fit ok. However, the arms were a little too long. The outfit was so cute, the top darts make you look a little perky! The outfit is cute in angles, and is not flattering in other angles. So be careful !
This romper was perfect for my bachelorette party. Loved the lace details and it fit perfectly. Plus it was super comfortable.

I really wanted to love this romper more but, the fit was not great on me. I wore it and enjoyed it and, even got compliments but, I don't feel like it was my best look! I think someone a little taller and with a bigger bust would rock this dress! It is comfortable and not too much of a hassle to go to the bathroom.
Im obsessed with this romper! I wore it to a winery for my bachelorette party and got so many compliments!

This romper was so cute and fun for my bachelorette! My only complaint was that the small was a little tight and the medium was a little big -- I wish there was a size in-between!! I ended up going with the small it was a little tight, so I felt like I was pulling it down to cover my backside all night, but considering it was a bachelorette party I think I got away with it! :)

I loved this romper! It was the perfect choice for my bachelorette night out. We weren't going somewhere too fancy but I still wanted something to stand out. It was super comfortable and very flattering. I felt great in it. It did bunch a little in the front pants area but not too badly. I wish I could have kept it

Love this romper so much, I want to keep it forever. I felt so white hot and it was perfect for a warm night in Vegas. It barely wrinkles and is comfortable. It is short, so when sitting, you will feel like your rear is hanging out a bit. You cannot wear a traditional bra. I wore one that sticks to my chest.
I absolutely loved this romper! While I think it was a tad boxy, a nice heel or wedge (like I wore) really set it off! It was super comfortable. Highly recommend!
Wore out to dinner in Hollywood. Loved it and was complimented on this comfy romper. Would have loved to keep it forever! My long legs fit well in this.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a bride to be!
links_reviews_text: I am so happy with my rtr rental for my bachelorette in Nashville. The romper was slightly worn, but fit really well and I loved the cutout. It was way better than wearing a dress, as I felt covered when I was out dancing. I got so many compliments and would rent again for another summer party.
Fit very well and looked awesome ! Plus, it even had pockets

Finally decided to write a review for RTR since pictures and reviews have helped so much with all my purchases. I loved this romper so much! Rented it for my Nashville bachelorette party and it was perfect. I have a muscular build - 5'5, 135lbs, I have bigger legs, size 4 but my waist is smaller so an XS was perfect. The only negative is that it's definitely been worn a lot and the white is kind of dingy but I still recommend.

It was a fun romper! It was nice to not worry about being lady-like in a dress after a few (too many?) cocktails. It did ride up a little in the bootie area when dancing, but it was tolerable. Not too fitted in my midsection.

This romper worked perfect for my bachelorette party! I was comfortable in it all night- we did a lot of walking and dancing at the bachelorette party. It did run a little big (I have a petite figure), but definitely could make it work for the night!

This romper was a great fit for my rehearsal dinner. Very comfy and cute! I have a long torso and it still fit great (always a concern with rompers). Also awesome because you can wear it with a normal bra. Highly recommend this romper for any occasion when you'd like to wear white, be comfy and look classy and cute all at once!

Wore this for my bachelorette party, liked a lot but couldn't get a good picture. The shorts part is pretty boxy, which I liked. I'm smaller on top and bigger on bottom and fit well on top and a little loose on bottom. The lace wasn't too revealing

I loved the look of this romper, so did most of the people I encountered while wearing this garment! I wore it to lunch on a Saturday & it was a hit. I knocked off a star because of the wear of the romper I had. It was slightly pilled in areas and the wear (and probably love) was beginning to show. That was disappointing, but whatever. Unless you were next to me and inspecting, it wasn't visible.

links_reviews_title: Post-Bridal Shower Romper! Super cozy to wear post-event & skill look stylish.
links_reviews_text: True to size for BCBG - I usually wear a size 6 - so for them that is a Medium. Fit fine, length was good, trendy cut-out romper design. It was perfect to wear post bridal shower because we still had people over at our house to entertain - and I was ready to ditch the high heels - and slip into something stylish and comfortable.
I wore this romper for my bachelorette party. It fit absolutely perfectly and was super comfortable! I would recommend this romper to anyone...I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved the romper- I felt different when everyone else was wearing dresses!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR. I chose two sizes XS and S. I ended up wearing the XS because it overall fit better. The fabric was thick, which was a huge plus since it was white. Overall, a great experience!

links_reviews_title: Last minute find for Labor Day bachelorette party
links_reviews_text: Received a lot of compliments on this romper and overall, the quality was good. The fit was just OK. The XS fit much better on top but was a little snug on bottom so I opted for the S. The way it gathered in the bust was the biggest detractor and the straps were a little long, but high quality material and perfect length. I would recommend!
Decided to take a bit of a risk with this romper! In Vegas for the weekend and wanted to deviate slightly from what I would normally wear. Glad I did, it felt fresh and fit nicely!
The fit was perfect, shorts were the perfect length. The cutouts were in the perfect place. I received so many compliments and did not want to send it back! Much recommended!
Very comfy. I wore this to my bridal shower and got lots of compliments.
Rented this for my Miami bachelorette party. Was between the small and the medium... Could have worn either, but went with the medium to have a little more room to move (and eat and drink).

links_reviews_title: Bright white in the dark dining room
links_reviews_text: Fit was large, baggy around crotch area and wrinkled after sitting. The romper arrived looking pretty worn. The nude lining around the edges of lace was distinct against the white. I could have worn the small. Still a good look for date night. It stood out and was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: The outfit was a hit! It was an all white party.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a small and medium. I thought the medium would be my main outfit, but it turned out the small was. Of course not everything is perfect. The small had a small hole by the pocket, which wasn't noticeable unless I put my hand in my pocket. I also ordered bling earrings and they were a gorgeous add on to the jumpsuit. It could have been worse but I made it work and no one noticed the hole, well they didn't bring mention to it.
This romper was perfect for my bachelorette party! Super comfy and still sexy. Great for dancing

I rented this for the evening part of my bachelorette party! The romper was super comfortable while still looking elegant enough to wear out in downtown Indianapolis. It fit true to size and the shorts were longer than most rompers so I didn't have to worry when bending over or dancing. And the best part...it has pockets!!
The darts fit odd so I looked *perky* all night hahahahaha which was slightly awkward. Otherwise it is great for petite sizes!

I personally rented this outfit for a date night with my husband and friends. However, this would be an adorable bachelorette outfit. I have a small chest so I need to wear a padded bra to try to help fill out the bust & darts in the top. I am also petite, so it was a little bit big on me , but a lot of compliments all night long!

I ordered this to have on hand for my wedding weekend with no plan to actually wear it. My grand exit outfit ended up not fitting and luckily this piece was in my bag and ready to go! I wore it to the venue and as we left. It was incredibly comfortable - a relief after being in a long dress and high heels all night - and I got a ton of compliments. The lace details on this romper really add to the fancy factor. All and all, highly recommend.

Everything about this dress is perfection. The style, the fit, the comfort, the material. I wore it 4 times in a month! I should probably buy it. I loved how it showed very subtle boob, just barely noticeable. If you don't want to show it, just wear a lace bralette. I'm so happy I wore it for family pictures!
The only con is that it shows your skin where the buttons are. I wore a blue lacy bra that looked like a tank underneath. Got lots of compliments!
I loved this dress - the ruffles are very feminine and fun. There is a bit of a gap where the buttons are, so you have to wear something under it (or not). Also, the top was a bit big on me.
Adorable! So many compliments, unique and feminine. Absolutely loved it!
Must wear cami underneath. Got several compliments. It is super girlie. Comfy and easy to wear.
The buttons in the chest show through so if you are wearing to work you need a cami. I wore to work and then also around town with no cami. So cute! Comfortable fabric. I loved the fun style.

Well isn't this dress just adorable? While I wore this dress I was called "darling" "baby doll" and "precious" .. you get the hint Very girly and doll like Fits true to size- super Comfortable. Usually I don't like sleeves like this but it wasn't too over the top for me THe fabric is so soft Love the color and is so cute for summer
Wore this for a rehearsal dinner and received so many compliments. Not only was it flattering, but was super comfortable, too! Would highly recommend.

Running true to size with little stretch in the midsection, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going one size down for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and straight at the hips. It works great for any cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5'9", the length hit mid calf on me. This dress made me feel like a doll baby.
Beautiful detail on this dress and it is very flattering. Wore it to a mothers day tea at my sons school. Would def rent again.
front has 4 bottons but be ware you can see in between the buttons. I went to work and noticed in the office ladies room!
Got lots of compliments on this pretty dress. Wore a white cami underneath.

This dress was so cute & I received many compliments wearing it. It is definitely a dress for someone with a small chest based on the buttons on the front of the dress. If you have a larger chest, I would suggest wearing a cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Loved the style. tight on chest.
links_reviews_text: Need a slip to wear underneath and the top is very flattering on the arms.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but should have gotten a larger size.
links_reviews_text: Really adorable dress. Too tight in the bust and I wear a 34 A. Size up if you are busty.
Cute
Loved this, I just put a very thin spaghetti strap tank under to deal with the gaps others mention.
Cute dress... but the only place it didnt fit right was the bust... Unfortunately couldn't wear it

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my daughter's baptism, and it was a good fit and nursing friendly.
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was fine, but I was a bit underwhelmed with it overall. I think it was a good choice for the occasion, but it didn't deliver the wow/compliments that my other rentals usually elicit. It was nursing friendly, and the back was beautiful.
Beautiful detail but the buttons pulled so much on the chest (I'm a 32C) that it looked weird so I couldn't wear it.
Very cute but way too long! I'm 4'11" and this was too long for tea length and too short for maxi style. I wish it worked!
If you are petite, this dress is not for you. I am 5'2 and this dress was floor length on me.
Fits well, very comfortable. Worked great for both work and social outings. Great fabric for packing for a trip - I took it out of my luggage and did not even have to iron it! Wrinkle free.

This looked like a cross between an apron and a dress from Little House on the Prairie. I couldn't help but laugh at the absurdity of how it looked. The ruffles are too wide on top and altogether unflattering. The skirt portion was nice though and if I had a nice Jean jacket or sweater to cover up the top, I would have worn it. The bottom half was actually quite nice and well cut.

What I didn't notice, is that the top has buttons. The gap between the buttons is big enough that it is hard to find the right bra. Even a neutral bra showed through. I had to wear sticky boobs, but still felt a little uncomfortable with the space between the buttons.

I was going to get a Medium but went with a Large due to the button in the front (I did not want them to pull apart too much as I move). It was a great fit! I wore it to a family vacation and got compliments! It is a great outdoor picnic or outdoor summer event dress. I stayed cool but looked fashionably comfortable.
Fits very weird. The upper body pieces do not lay flat and overall just a strange looking dress once worn.

Very cute. Loved how it looked on. I wore it a few times and received many compliments. Only thing to consider when renting is the ribbon line is more of an empire cute and doesn't not give. Was a bit tight on the rib cage and I don't have a wide rib cage.
Gorgeous material. It's sort of longer than I wanted and fit oddly. Tight up top and very loose/baggy on bottom.
I felt feminine and gorgeous in this top. I rented it for my birthday dinner out with friends. The top was comfortable and stretchy so never felt confined. I wish I owned this!

I rented this for work but I will probably also wear it on a date with jeans. It fights me well and is not too small or too large. The zipper on the side is hard to zip up over the band under the chest but once you get it fully zipped, it is very comfortable! I paired it with Navy wide leg Theory slacks for work.
This was so perfect for a bridal shower! Got a ton of compliments.
This one was hard to zip. Pretty cute.
This blouse fit me perfectly but I don't know how someone with boobs could ever wear it. I paired it with skinny jeans and flats for work. It's a cotton lace and very pretty.

links_reviews_title: Cute Shirt, But Not Extremely Flattering
links_reviews_text: I love the lace detail, and I did have a couple people at work stop to tell me how much they liked the shirt. However, I am fairly small chested, and I feel it made me look too busty. I know that should be a positive, but it almost stretched too much across the chest to make it look a little ill-fitting. I like the flare from the waist, but it did make me look a little bigger than I actually am. I would rent this again, if I didn't have any other options, as it's a different look for work, and I did receive a couple compliments.
120 pds, I normally get a 2 or 4. Went with a 6 based on reviews. Glad I did! Wore it with a pair of denim and cowboy boots. Fun....and loads of compliments!
Wore this to work and all day people were asking about it. The tank straps under are super long but I knotted them and you could not tell.
I've worn mostly size 2 items from RTR, but this was a four and for well.
For larger chests, go a size up. I'm 32DD and usually wear a small but wore size 6 for this one. Great for going out and/or work. Versatile and cute!
Great to be worn alone or under a blazer

I love this shirt. It was very feminine and easy to wear. I have a small chest and the outer layer was fitted, warning to those who have a larger chest. The camisole that came with the shirt to wear underneath fit well excluding the straps. They were way to long and I had to adjust it a few times through out the day. It didn't take away from the beauty of the shirt though. I loved it and so did my husband.
Great shirt, size up. Zipper can be hard to zip. Lots of compliments.

Pretty top but added unnecessary bulk to my waist and created a pregnant effect. Might be better on apple shapes that need more room in the waist. On my pear shape, I found this to be unflattering. Runs a teensy bit small. I'm usually an 8/M in tops and the 10 in this top was comfortable. If you're busty or sometimes in between sizes, I'd recommend sizing up in this.

links_reviews_title: Rented this piece for a trip to Australia
links_reviews_text: Very cute and delicate!

Top fits true to size with loose bottom. Definitely go with the size you need for around your rib cage/bust. Side zipper is tough but does work. Wore this for work but equally fun for a night out with jeans. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 stars was that it came without the camisole (RTR warned me and I did still take it)...
Very pretty top that could be dressed up or down - office, dinner, or for everyday wear. The white cami underneath is a bit large but the overlay is snug. Overall, it's quite flattering.

links_reviews_title: Simple but fun for work or weekend
links_reviews_text: Cute top that got lots of compliments at work but I had to wear a jacket over it since I wasn't able to zip up the side - the size fit but the zipper wouldn't budge over a seam on the side.

links_reviews_title: If you have a bust this might be difficult to wear
links_reviews_text: My bra size is 34B and I had trouble zipping it up without a bra on, and it was pretty tight around the ribs for me. With a bra, I could not get it closed.
Ended up not wearing this because i didn't like how the waist was so tight and then flared out underneath.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but I couldn't zip
links_reviews_text: I liked this top a lot but couldn't get the size zipper up. It didn't feel super tight so may have been a combo of a sticky zipper and the shirt running small
The top is beautiful, no question. However, the under top has the straps too long, and I was fixing it all night to cover my bra in the front!

I wish I could have worn this. The fit was ok everywhere else, except strangely the part that makes the tee, the part right under the chest and above where it flares out, is way, way too small. It's weird, since that's not a large part of my body, and there was plenty of room above and below that. Just couldn't zip it.
This is such a cute and feminine top. I paired it with skinny jeans and strappy sandals. Love this top! Will definitely rent it again.
The zipper was broken so I couldn't wear. Was so so sad as it was super cute.

links_reviews_title: Great shirt for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Love the fit.
Very pretty top. I just wish I could have worn it. It was so small that it didn't fit over my shoulders (and I'm pretty thin!)
Cute but extra tight ribbon around ribs. I'm a 36B but size 4, but my ribs are apparently whale size as this was not comfy. Cute on more petite frame
Top is nice. Had a zipper closure on the side. I felt the inside tank was bigger/looser than the tank itself
Pretty shirt but runs very small around the chest. Was super tight and uncomfortable. Almost couldn't zip it up all the way.

Really cute top if it fit. I got the zipper to my bust and it just missed in a size 4. Really nice that it came with the camisole separately! I would size up if you have ample up top, I dont think I do and I had an issue.

links_reviews_title: It’s beautiful! Can be dressed up or down. Absolutely love this top. Will be purchasing it
links_reviews_text: Fits tight in bust and waist area and then flares but not too much. Flattering for many body types
Fit was smaller than expected. I am normally an 8 or 10 and i could not get the 10 zipped up.

I love, love, loved this shirt. I got so many compliments when I wore it. The outer layer fit perfectly but the inner shell that comes separately was much too large for me personally, but I have a very small chest so that may have affected the fit.
Really pretty top - had to have someone help with the zipper. Zipper quality was poor.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my Birthday dinner with skinny jeans and loved it!
links_reviews_text: The straps on the tank are a little long. I had to keep adjusting it to make sure my bra didn't show.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty overall though, Would have liked to wear it if the zipper worked.
links_reviews_text: I was not able to wear this as I could not get it zipped up no matter how hard myself or my husband tried. It seemed to be stuck at the middle. I think the size would have been good once it was zipped but the zipper just wasn't working. Was thinking about trying a size up, but they didn't have it available. I also think the size up would have looked too big overall.

I enjoyed wearing the top. I think it was flattering. Though if you are larger than a D cup, the fit might be a problem for you. The layering tank did not have adjustable straps so I had to stabilize the tank after I zipped so the ain't band would hold it up high enough. The zipper was tough and I could not do it alone. I wore this went to see my bestie so she could zip me in and out of it so you might want to have an extra hand around for the zipper. The top did have bra strap holders. I didn't use them because one was missing when I received the top (would not have helped with the strap anyway). Overall, I did enjoy the top.

Best rental ever. I did not receive the 14 as ordered and wore back up size 12. Plunge was so deep I could wear a bra, but it somehow managed to work. The first and only time that has ever happened for me. This dress is stunning and sexy as hell and made to make everyone's mouth drop. I am literally waiting for the moment to rent again

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for growing baby bump (20 weeks)
links_reviews_text: Typically a size 6 pre pregnancy, ordered a 8 and 10 and wore the 10, but mainly due to my chest.

links_reviews_title: The cape was to die for
links_reviews_text: While the dress is a little difficult to get on if you are a bit more hippy the over all fit is perfectly true to size and you'll definitely be a show stopper with this cape.

The color and cape style were perfect for a winter/early March wedding. I was worried about the how low the V cut would be but it wasn't bad at all (not sure how it would look for someone with a larger bust). I did need double sided tape to make sure everything stayed in place.

I rented a size 6r and 4R and the 4 fit perfectly. I wore flats and the dress was at the perfect length. I didn't need to wear a bra and everything still was perky. Every 20 mins someone came up to me to compliment the dress. I am so happy.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful gown and it's perfect for black tie events.
links_reviews_text: Elegant and stunning
This dress fit beautifully. I felt very elegant. It has just the right amount of sexiness while not being too dramatic. The neckline is low and you'll be wise to have it pinned.

I wore this dress as a bridesmaid in my sister's wedding. It was fabulous! I received so many compliments. One thing I will say is that you need to have a chest to fill this out. I had my second daughter 2 months before wearing this, thank goodness. Otherwise I don't think it would have worked. That being said, I did nurse while wearing it - just unzipped the back.
Great fit. True to size. Awesome color. Cape style was perfect for moulin rouge theme.

Loved this dress. I'm usually pretty conservative and this one pushed my comfort level with the neckline. With that being said, I'm 5 months pregnant and have a much larger bust (36DDD) than normal(34D). Plenty of double sided tape used! The previous renter did not return in the second size option I ordered and I wore my regular size while 5 months pregnant. There was enough stretch to the dress to accommodate the bigger belly and the fabric is of great thick quality to keep things smooth. Overall, a great dress!

This dress is amazing but not for the faint of heart. The front slit came to about mid thigh for me and I'm 5'9, so definitely recommend having a pashmina for covering up when seated. I went based on other reviews and sized up. I'm typically a 4 or 6, depending on the brand, but got the 8 in this dress and was very happy. Tall ladies - the 8L was long everywhere, not just the hem in my experience. I felt the top was baggy and ultimately went with the 8R even though it was short with heels. I tried fashion tape and wanted the 8L to work but didn't want to risk it! I found this dress was compatible with a "sticky bra" with no issues. Received tons of compliments and felt great in it all night!

links_reviews_title: Bump friendly! I'm 32 weeks pregnant and this dress was still glamorous!
links_reviews_text: Pregnant ladies, this is your dress! A size up wasn't an option so I rented my normal size 2. I'm on the short side at 5'2" and typically not curvy. Right now, I'm 32 weeks pregnant and have pretty much only gained a bump so I was able to squeeze into it. I wish I had one size bigger to accommodate the eating I wanted to do, but the dress was beautiful and made me feel like I wasn't a dumpy pregnant lady at a black tie wedding. The slit in front is high. The cape covers most of your bootie so I didn't even worry about shape wear.

The fit was perfect, very comfortable fabric, and made me feel beautiful at 21 weeks pregnant! Was a little low cut, but still tasteful. This was my first RTR experience, and I'd definitely rent again! I'm 5'4", normally 120 lbs but 141 with the bump. The 4R was a perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: At one point, another woman approached me and said I was voted best dressed by her and her friends!
links_reviews_text: The color (appears red in other review photos) but is truly a maroon. The fit was exactly true to size. I am 6'1' and the long wasn't as long as I hoped but really, nothing is. The length came to a good spot so it wasn't an issue. The cape sleeves are a unique feature and help create drama but still let you be covered up a bit. The neckline is really flattering and allows for some fun cleavage to be accentuated.

links_reviews_title: 8 months pregnant at a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and comfortable outside of the low neckline. I had to use fashion tape but other than that I was so pleased being 8 months pregnant and feeling so fabulous. I did not want a maternity fit or dress and this was just that. I sized up 2 sizes from my normal dress size of 8.
I love the dress and got many compliments! However the midsection was kind of loose because of the lovely preggos that have worn this dress before me :) It was still beautiful!

links_reviews_title: I was a bridesmaid in my brothers wedding and this got so many compliments on this beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress actually is pretty breathable and stretchy. The neck line is low, that was the only part that felt different for me but that is probably just personally bc I don't wear low cut often. I felt beautiful in this dress I definitely recommend!

I wore this as a bridesmaids dress for my cousin's wedding and I can't say enough good things about it. It was very comfortable, the color is gorgeous and it's different enough to make a statement without being over the top. I didn't need to wear a bra with it but did use some fashion tape just to make sure there were no incidents. Also the slit in the front does cause you to show a lot of leg if sitting cross legged, but I didn't find it to be a problem. I got compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: Great for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved wearing this dress - so pretty and flattering. My only issue was the deep v neckline. I had to safety pin the dress to my bra to keep my bra from showing. Even so, I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress. Fit perfectly over my baby bump.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. It was my back up dress and it came in handy since the other dress was not flattering at all. It fit over my 3 month baby bump perfectly. I received a lot of compliments. The only con was that my bra was showing but I bought garment tape that solved that problem. Overall, I loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: Really elegant with some wow factor!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a black tie family wedding in the late winter/early spring, and it was perfect! The heavier fabric made the cold day bearable. I also love the contrast between the flowy sleeves and the tight fitting bodice. Very high slit when walking, FYI (I liked this, but I could see how some might find it uncomfortable). Looked sophisticated while standing for photos, and sexy/fun on the dance floor.
I’m normally a 12 and wore the 14. It fit great. The dress has some stretch, so it hugs curves nicely. I got so many compliments on this dress. Don’t hesitate to choose this one!
It has no stretch. I was worried sizing up would make the top too drapey/open. I am 5'10", was long enough with flat shoes. I was able to nurse in it.

I wore this to an orthodox black tie wedding so I needed a fair amount of coverage but also wanted to feel sexy and beautiful. I did! It fit really well and I didn't have to fidget with it all night. I usually wear a 0 but the 2 fit a bit better since the waist is quite form fitting but overall Id say it fit true to size. Plus I got a ton of compliments. Even my husband exclaimed over how "cool the cape is!" Highly recommend!

This dress was beautiful and I received many compliments. I'm 5'8" and always have to rent the longs if I want to wear heels. The color was really pretty for my Spring event and would look good in the Fall as well since it is a deep red and is made with a little thicker fabric. The only thing I didn't love was the slit ran a bit high and I accidentally split it a little getting into a vehicle. Other than that, it was a really great rental!
Bump friendly got lots complements as I'm 20 weeks pregnant was very comfortable will def rent this again
I was worried that it would be too low cut with a large chest but it fit perfectly. Received compliments all night. Great color

Wore this as the maid of honor in a wedding and got lots of compliments. I'm 5'7" and the 0L fit great with 4 inch heels. The slit is pretty high in the front and the v is deep (I used tape to keep it appropriate) so be aware of those things, but otherwise great dress. The cape is fabulous!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Comfortable stretchy classy! 4 months pregnant
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this dress! Great pregnancy dress as well!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Red Dress for an Evening Wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was a hit! I got so many compliments on the color and the style. The deep neckline was sexy, but elegant, and the cape was very flattering. I did wear a body-shaping slip underneath since I am newly postpartum and have a soft mommy-tummy, but I felt confident and comfortable in the dress all night long. I chose not to wear any type of bra or pastey on the girls, and the dress stayed put, even through dancing. I am 5'6" and wore 2-inch heels and the dress hit just above the ground. I feel like this is a sisterhood of the traveling pants type of dress - it looks good on every body shape! The only downside I can drum up is that the slit is a little higher than I would prefer. That being said, I would wear this dress again and recommend it for anyone who needs a classy dress with a little bit of flair.

I wasn't having luck finding a glamorous maternity dress for a photo shoot and looked on RTR at the last-minute and came across this one as bump-friendly. (Only after renting it, did I notice that Beyoncé wore this dress while pregnant, ha.) The dress was gorgeous and the color looked great in photos. At 32 weeks pregnant, I sized up one size - I'm normally a 2 and rented the 4L. I tried on the 6, which could've worked, but it was a little too big in the shoulders/chest for me.

Gorgeous color and draping, fit like a glove and perfect length for 4 inch heels (I'm 5ft 1inch). Was a small tear in the center front slit, but wasn't noticeable when wearing and fashion taped! I wore a regular bra and taped it to my bra! Wish I could rent this in every color! Perfect for gala event!
High slit but got a bigger size for more coverage. I usually wear 6/8 but the dress is a size 10L. The v cut is low but it pin it up a little bit since the occasion was a church fundraiser.

links_reviews_title: Great fit! Perfect for 1920s theme gala!
links_reviews_text: Will rent again

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! I was 20 weeks pregnant and it fit amazing! Love!!!! Long worked great with heels!!
links_reviews_text: Fits tight but appropriate.

Wore this gorgeous dress for a black tie wedding. It has a CAPE!!! I was 5 months post partum and wasnt sure of my size, but the ladies at RTR helped me find the perfect dress! Long enough so I could wear my 5" heels, slit up the front, deep V front and did I mention a cape!? Beautiful dress!

I ordered this dress for a black tie gala at 26 weeks pregnant. I hoped to order a size up, but since it was not available I went with the 4L. I typically wear a dress size 4 so I was pretty nervous about the fit. I was pleasantly surprised when I could actually zip this dress up! Not only was it flattering to my belly, the color and cut is simply perfection. I received compliments all night long and felt absolutely beautiful wearing this stunner. It is sleek, modern, chic and somehow timeless all in one. Pregnant mamas - this is the evening dress for you! I may have been slightly more comfortable in a size up; however, the Long length helped keep the front slip from riding too high up (as other pregnant reviewers mentioned). I wish I owned this dress - it is by far my favorite RTR rental!

Rented 2P. 118lb, 5'2" w nursing bust that fluctuates from 34B to 34C Gorgeous dress with steep neckline plunge. Lots of compliments all night. Easy to take on and off for pumping and stays on boobs comfortably without 2-sided tape. Would NOT accomodate freemies, just fyi

links_reviews_title: First timer and will definitely use RTR again!
links_reviews_text: Ladies this dress is EVERYTHING! It was perfect for me as I wanted to highlight the assets I'm proud of (the ladies) and hide what I'm not so proud of (arms and thighs). This dress does it all! Subtlety hid my arms without actually having sleeves, and showed just enough leg without making me feel self conscious. Not gonna lie though, the slit is HIGH when you sit down so definitely keep that in mind. I also probably would've been more comfortable in the 16 as the 14 was pretty tight in the hips/tummy. Can't wait to use RTR again!!!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The cape made this dress more fashion forward from any other dress at the gala and the color was stunning. If you want to stand out from a crowd of LBD's, this is a sure bet!

I got this romper for a date night and did get it two sizes too big because I am large busted and it was low cut. I probably would have been good with a size 10 (normally being size 8 with 36 DDD/F). It was lightweight, cute, and my boyfriend loved it! The snap in the front did come undone once or twice so I would recommend safety pinning. Would rent again!

I loved this romper! It was very comfortable to wear and fit great. Easy to dress up or down. I wore it for a bachelorette party. I'm still thinking about purchasing I loved it so much. I am typically a 2 but wore the 0.

links_reviews_title: Felt super confident and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The stomach area bunches up in a slightly weird way sometimes but I ended up feeling really confident in it and got so many compliments. I love the length. I did have to make sure it wasn't riding up in the back.

..the outfit and my bachelorette weekend! I ordered this outfit in a panic because my other jumpsuit would have been too hot to wear. The weekend ended up being the hottest in July so I was so glad this was available. It was super fun, comfortable and stretchy in the waist which is what I needed. I'm pretty athletic so my legs tend to be bigger and the shorts were a tad tight and rode up a little but nothing terrible or uncomfortable. I was able to go to dinner and dance all night long.
Comfortable and long enough to move around on a boat without worrying anything would fall out the bottom or top :) ruffle adds a cute detail to an otherwise simple romper. I'd rent again!
Cute & fun. Wore this a few times and always got compliments. Added a belt once. Strap on 1 side is adjustable so it worked even for a short person!

This was the perfect black romper for summer. I loved the ruffle detail and the thickness of the fabric. Zero complaints on this one. Fit true to size and with the adjustable strap it was perfect. Could see myself wearing this one again for many different occasions.
I rented this romper to wear to an engagement party. It fit perfectly and wasn't too short like I find a lot of rompers to be. Easy to dress it up or dress it down with the right accessories.
This romper is so great I think I may buy it! I got so many compliments and felt so comfortable and confident in it!
This was fun for a day event! It was a bit loose up too and short at the bottom. I was still able to rent it but wasn't the most comfortable fit!

links_reviews_title: Arizona girls' retreat in the desert
links_reviews_text: It was short, but sexy. I had to go up a size bigger because crotch area was riding up.

I didn't wind up wearing because it's winter and it's too summery. I would definitely rent again and possibly even buy. It fit so well and was super comfy. Pockets were a great touch. In the picture my spanx are longer than the actual short length so keep that in mind when looking at hem line
Great fit, true to size, easy to get on and off.
Super comfortable! Loved the fit and was long enough where your butt wasn't out like normal rompers. It was super cute and fun to wear for a night on the town.
This was crazy comfortable. The fit was flattering and I received many compliments. I'd rent this again
So hard not to purchase this fantastic romper!!

links_reviews_title: The most comfortable party jumper ever
links_reviews_text: Easy on easy off, flattering and sexy with heels. Perfect Miami roof-top party outfit in the summer time!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for our tenth wedding anniversary date!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, perfect for hot weather, easy to move in, and I wish I could have purchased it!
Its too short for a formal ocassion ; but its perfect for a club/bar with your friends... i used it for a girls night out. Works well for large bust.

I absolutely love this very chic romper by Parker. I would do one size up for backup. It fits great with any cup size. Formfitting through out the waist. Fitted throughout the hips. i love that its a stretchy fabric.
Cute, flattering and versatile. Runs small.

I love this trendy romper by Parker. Running true to size with some stretch in the midsection, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going a size up for your back-up. This style is comfortable throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for A - C cups sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this romper so you should wear a strapless bra due to the spaghetti straps. At 5'5, the length hit mid-thigh on me. This rippling ruffle adds to the summertime appeal of this ready-for-anything romper. I would recommend pairing this with large earrings to accent the ruffles.

Wore this to house parties and out in the Hamptons. So comfortable and cute! Dressed it up with big earrings, but also made it casual with wedge sandals. I also wore it on a date in the city. Absolutely love this romper!
Wore for bachelorette party - super comfy and cute black romper staple , can't go wrong.
true to size, great fabric as always with this brand....true to size I wore a small and it was perfect
This is precious and flattering. I wanted to buy it for sure. I wore it out with black heels and then with a jean jacket during the day. So cute
Fits true to size. Very comfortable and flattering !
comfortable, sexy, cute romper. can be dressed up or down. wore this to dinner and to hang out on the beach. spotted another girl wearing the same romper!

links_reviews_title: Loved the overall fit, only downfall, is the snap would not stay snapped. Loved it though
links_reviews_text: To sum it up, I feel a bigger person must have worn it previously and it would not stay snapped and I struggled with it all night, literally buttoning it all night. sitting, standing, walking, and it would just unsnap. I would like them to make sure they take care of their products a little better.

links_reviews_title: Outfit fit perfectly. Sexy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Outfit fit perfectly. Sexy and comfortable.
It's a very sexy romper. Very flattering. Loved it and will wear it again.
Wore this for my birthday. Super cute and comfy except the snap in the front comes undone easily.
I ended up not being able to wear this. At m height of 5' 7.5", when looking in the mirror, I noticed that if I bent down or moved a certain way, someone would be able to see my but. Can't have that!
Perfect for a fun night out! Loved it. So classy yet sexy

I rented this for my HS daughter but I ended up wearing it. Perfect for an outdoor concert (Violent Femmes, so good!). Cute, a little edgy and more comfortable than I thought it would be. Has a little snap so your not exposing yourself. When my daughter saw it on me, she wished she had worn it to her event!
I'm 50, my daughter is 21, and we both could wear this! Fun and flirty, but not too over the top. Cute with wedges.
Adorable day romper that can be dressed up with heels
This romper is so cute and so comfortable. I will definitely rent this one again!
Perfect Parker romper for dressy or casual date night
I ordered up a size or two probably didn't need to. This romper is comfortable and super flattering. The straps are adjustable so it doesn't hike up. I loved this piece and got a ton of compliments!

I absolutely loved this dress! Wore it to Sleep No More and got so many compliments at the after party. It's perfect for #weddings #filmevents #sleepnomore and any formal event you might attend! Fit beautifully; was very satisfied with the dress!
So comfortable! Beautiful color and fit like a glove. Perfect for a black tie event.
Dress was very easy to wear the peekaboo cleavage was sexy. Winter wedding so having a long dress was worth it and it was lined nicely. Another great choice from RTR.

links_reviews_title: This lovely gown is both modest and super flattering. Great for a charity gala!
links_reviews_text: The fit is very flattering. The neck is high but has a cutout, which gives a very feminine look. The contour of the dress is fitted but not super form fitting or tight. I felt very glamorous but modest at the same time. My dress was a wine color, a nice neutral that adds a warm feel. The fabric is a high quality thicker matte texture. I highly recommend this dress.
This dress was comfortable and cozy and elegant all around!
I wore this to a black-tie event that I was working. Nice and conservative for a work event, but still fun and formal for a party.

RTR really came through on this one. I ordered another dress that wasn't flattering at all in the same side. They sent me 2 back up dresses that got to me in 2 days! This dress fit perfectly and was so incredibly comfortable. I could wear a normal bra which was a win for me! Very flattering and not too tight. The only thing I would change is to get it in a short--but it was last minute and that wasn't available.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a million bucks, I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit was very comfortable, fits true to size, usually wear a 12, rented a 14 as well and ended up wearing the 12. The cut in the dress is very complimenting to the figure but you do need to wear your slimming garments underneath for best look. Loved it and felt amazing in it!

This dress was so elegant and flattering! The 0R fit me perfect. Fitted at the waist and fell straight down which made it super slimming. Fabric is very nice, thicker with a slight texture to it. Was comfortable and not too revealing but I still felt very sexy! Also loved that I could wear a bra and shape wear with it. Loved everything about this dress!

links_reviews_title: A formal gown with some fun touches
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. While initially it looks a little simple, the interesting neckline, beautiful color and perfect fit/flow make it a standout. I wore it to a formal wedding and received so many compliments on it. It was comfortable all night! I'm 5'8" and wore low heels and wore the regular length (I also got the long but didn't even try it on since the regular worked). I am on the smaller side of a 2 currently and I probably could have fit in a 0 - the fabric is really forgiving.

links_reviews_title: It was luscious to wear. I looked amazing in it. So worth it!
links_reviews_text: It fit well and I felt confident in it. It was a lovely fabric and did not require my highest heels to make it work.

I wore this dress for an on stage interview. It really stood out compared to other dresses in the room. It's unique, the color is striking and so many people stopped me to compliment it. There is really something to be said about feeling confident that your dress won't fall off- I loved that I could wear a normal bra. I'm so happy I chose this dress!

This was a great looking dress that was conservative but elegant. I rented this as a back up for my company's holiday party. Ultimately I went with the other dress that was slightly more fun. If this was the only dress I could have worn, it would be a great choice!
This dress optimized my hourglass figure. I was easy to move in and very comfortable. I danced all night. I wore Spanx with the dress.

I'm 5'8, 155 lbs with B cup. The long length was perfect with 2-3" heels. Both the 10 and 12 fit but went with 12 for a smoother look. The fabric is heavy and very forgiving. There is a slit, but it's not too high--work appropriate. I didn't need to wear Spanx and wore a regular bra. Some might feel the dress is a bit blah, but since I was attending a Gala for work, I didn't want something over the top. This was an easy and classy dress!
The color was beautiful and received lots of compliments from people. It was a great selection for a mother of a teenage boy, with whom I attended the event.

Loved this dress for my cousin's black tie wedding. It was a January wedding in Jersey so I needed something with thicker material but didn't want to be covered up entirely. I got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Dress is elegant and not too conservative
links_reviews_text: Beautiful wine color long dress. It is high quality material and I think suits many body types. I was unsure about the bra to wear but think I could have gotten away with a regular one if I had sizes down one as my bra showed a bit under the armpits. I did not end up wearing it as my husband liked another dress better in the end.

links_reviews_title: Good for a last minute event
links_reviews_text: I found out I was attending a black tie event with two days to find a dress. There weren’t many options in my size on such short notice, so I wasn’t picky. This dress was fine, but just wasn’t quite right for my body and did remind me a bit of a bridesmaid dress. The longer length was good for me at 5’9 and wearing 3 inch heels.

RTR saved the day! I received a dress the day before an event I had out of state, unfortunately it did not fit. Not only were they timely in their response but they shipped this beauty to my hotel the day of the gala and it fit perfectly and looked amazing!!! If you have been blessed with curves this dress makes you look like a million bucks and the material is very forgiving and flattering!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! I was completely comfortable dancing the night away!
links_reviews_text: The size is true. I recommend a seamless body shaper, the material does cling. But very comfortable and easy to move in.

links_reviews_title: This was the most amazing dress!!
links_reviews_text: I didn't want to return this dress! The fit was perfect/comfortable and allowed me to dance all night.
Loved everything about this dress. Very flattering, comfortable, and perfect for a wedding with co-workers.

This dress was so comfortable and fit like a glove. I am between sizes and went down, but either size would've worked. I wore Spanx (but I'm not sure it was necessary) and a regular bra. I loved the modern and layering cut. I felt very glamorous and got a ton of compliments. I would buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: Elegant feel of the dress because I was under or over dressed for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: Dress fitting was true size and fabric was stretchy, which made it extremely comfortable to wear, especially on the dance floor. I am 5'0 and wore 4 inch heels, and I had to pick the dress up while walking to prevent it from dragging, but that was not a problem. I really adored the key hole as it added to the appearance and sexiness of the dress.
Great fit, true to my pants size. I a little smaller up top so there was a bit of gaping at my arms, but with a good push-up bra it was minimized. Received great compliments at the event.

I rented this for a black tie gala and wore it last night. It's a perfect dress for fall - there is an extra layer of fabric to keep you a little warmer. It covers you but still gives a little peek at the goods. And most of all, I got into a 12 in this one after not being able to fit into a 14 in the other one I rented!

I love this classic dress by Trina Turk! Running true to size with some stretch. I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips, however it's super comfortable. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5'7 ” with 3 inch heels, the length hits perfectly to the floor. This super chic gown is perfect for any black tie event.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a game of thrones queen!
links_reviews_text: I got an 8 and a 10 as my size range with RTR can vary a lot between designers. I'm usually between sizes so I wasn't super Shocked when the 8 was tight on the hips and fit my bust perfectly. The 10 was just fine though and didn't show too much boob (until I wanted it too). The petite length was perfect for my 5'4" self in 2/3" heels. If you're taller or planning on wearing higher heels definitely get the regular. It would've been fine for me in my usual choice of heels, but it was safe as formal was on a boat and I definitely would've tripped if the gown was longer. Overall this dress was AMAZING for a chilly boat prom. The fabric was thick enough to keep me warm from wind and also looked gorgeous in the breeze. My boyfriend couldn't keep his hands off me. 11/10 would rent again.
Absolutely LOVED the style and fit, very comfortable as well!
The dress fit perfectly and I felt amazing all evening! Will definitely rent the runway again!
Great Dress! Fits well and extremely comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I was invited to a gala at the last minute and had no time to shop. Thank goodness for RTR!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit beautifully, I didn't even need to wear undergarments to feel comfortable/skinny. It was a tad long so heels were necessary. While it may have been a little "plain" I looked and felt amazing and received many compliments.

This dress was super comfortable and you can wear a regular bra! I'm around 5'4 and with heels the hem still touched the ground. I wore the 2R but on average I wear a 4 in dresses which is why I said this runs large. Gorgeous color! Would def recommend!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! I absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It fit great, I have a relatively large bust and everything fit comfortably. Only slight con is that the long is still pretty short if you plan to wear heels, I’m 5’9” and wished it was just a tad longer. Also, slit rides up when seated so be careful about spanx! Otherwise, perfectly unique and beautiful dress. I saw no copycats at my event! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Elegant, classic look in a stunning color.
