links_reviews_text: Wore this to a January black-tie event. The dress in a lovely burgundy color, perfect for a winter occasion. I usually wear an 8 or a 10 and the 8 fit nicely. For the busty ladies out there, you can wear a normal bra with this one and the keyhole doesn't show a bunch of cleavage like some keyhole cuts do.

I saw tons of duplicate RTR dresses at the event I attended, but no one had this dress on, so it made me feel pretty awesome! Easy to wear, very comfortable. The color is darker than how it's presented online, and photos don't really show the true color well. The slit is pretty high (heads up if you have some thigh cheese), and the neck was snug but fine. I'm 5'8' and curvy, and the dress highlighted those curves in a good way.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress at my event!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I think it was elegant yet super comfortable and really gave me a classy look.

I rented this for a holiday party and it was perfect. It was comfortable yet different. The neckline was unique and many people commented about it. This dress runs true to size or even a little large. I was afraid from other pictures it would be too fitting but it wasnt at all. I probably couldve worn the 10.
This dress was great for a holiday charity event. The fit was really slimming and the fabric was a good weight too. I'm 5'6" and I wore 3 inch heels and the length was perfect

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but fit is off
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to work and while it's pretty, it has no stretch and as a result doesn't have the right fit. The waist could have been more tapered for my taste.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for work or play
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous fit that hugs all of my curves, but is still comfortable and forgiving. Perfect summer work power dress.
I wore this for my son's confirmation. It was a great dress. Super comfy. I went up a size just for a bit more space since it ran a bit small. It was a great rental.
My husband said, "you're keeping that right?" I think that's all I need to say.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a must rent!!!
links_reviews_text: Sizing was on point, the color was bright and cheery and I loved the length!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable! Dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: Dressed down for work. Super cute. Lots of compliments. True to size.

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress. Work to dinner out
links_reviews_text: Cute, comfortable, not tight, but short. Could not bend over without underwear showing

links_reviews_title: Red4Ed and R-E-S-P-E-C-T was never so easy and super stylish with Rent-the-Runway!
links_reviews_text: I needed some red attire to attend my union conference weekend and Rent-the-Runway helped make it easy! I wore this cute number to our kickoff dinner and received many compliments! It was form fitting in the bodice and draped beautifully. I am a little thicker around the waist area, but I felt that the dress helped mask my imperfections. I'm on the petite end, so the dress was a bit longer than on the model, but it wasn't bad. In fact, it was probably better that I was demure vs. "hot for teacher hot" at my teacher union conference. Several people said, "That's a great dress for Red Tuesdays!" Indeed. I wanted to keep it!

I loved the bright color of this dress and the beautiful eyelet details. It was comfortable to wear and made me feel put together. I could zip it myself! Received lots of compliments. Fun color for the summer. When you sit down, the lining rides up a bit so while sitting you can see skin pretty high up on your upper thigh through the eyelet, so just something to keep in mind.
Great bright color for summertime. Eyelet detail is nice. Perfect for work or a daytime event. It was just OK.

I really enjoyed this dress. The color is gorgeous, and the cut is very flattering. Like other reviewers said, the lining stops just under my butt, so it felt really short, but didn't look inappropriate. The only downside is that the bottom came suuuuuper wrinkly and steaming couldn't really fix it, so I feel a little disheveled wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but odd fit on me
links_reviews_text: I loved the style of this dress, and it really pops with the color and the circle detail. It just fit on the top half, but from the waist down it was quite big. I am a straight and narrow/athletic build so this might be a different story for curvy figures, but on me it just hung odd when I wore it and when I sat down I had a dress tent with quite a bit of material. The top half was tight enough that I don't think I could have sized down anymore without it being uncomfortable.

In love with this color and material! So perfect for summer. The material is super light. It was a bit tight in the chest, but nothing outwardly noticeable. Beware of where straight part ends and flowy skirt piece begins (kneel down, don't bend over ;) )

links_reviews_title: Super cute summer dress. Runs large.
links_reviews_text: Very light fabric. Great pattern and style for summer. Got compliments from strangers. Usually between a size 2 and 4. Ordered the 2 and it was HUGE in the waist. So much so that I had to wear a tight cardigan in order to wear it out. Would order again but in a size 0.
Fit as desired. Got lots of compliments. "Perfect summer dress" was used.

Brand new with the tags! Score! This dress was so lightweight and comfortable. It would be perfect on a hot day. The color pops and the cutouts make it interesting. Fit: A bit off. The chest fit just right but the bottom was loose. It was almost a size too big. The length is longer than I would have wanted for flats, which had to be my choice on this day. Better with heels. I'm 5'7", and it was still long. While the overall length is long, the dress inside is short! I had to watch what I was showing when I sat down.

links_reviews_title: Cute red dress with interesting pattern/style
links_reviews_text: The color is wonderful and I love the style. It runs a little tight in the stomach so wasn't the most flattering. Overall was ok...I wouldn't rent it again though.
It fit well and is good for dancing

links_reviews_title: Great fit, detail is pretty. Paired it with a navy suit Jacket and navy heels, on point!
links_reviews_text: Great hug on the body, but not too tight!
Great color and style. True to size. Don't size down or up.
Wore these with straps heels for a Friday in the office. I'm only 5 3 so I normally find dresses of this length overwhelm me but it worked great and was so fun!
Cute idea but waaay too big. I think the material makes it look frumpy
This is a very cute dress. It is casual but with style.

links_reviews_title: great and comfy dress- very stylish!
links_reviews_text: fits well....zips up the back!
Perfect for an evening with the Hubbie or just a date! Comfortable and sexy at the same time since it hugs the body and shoes off the curves. ;)

The color is STUNNING! The pattern and style is gorgeous. BUT, I don't have a small butt and the lining barely covered my booty. The above lining was perfect, if only the bottom lining was longer. Might try a 10 in the future!!
The underlining of this dress is so short that the bottom of my butt was hanging out. I'm 5'4" so I can't imagine how short it would be on someone taller. I couldn't wear it and sent it back.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this since not as high end for a work dress.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit but not as high end as I was hoping for in a work dress. Since the fabric is mostly cotton I could tell with wear it would wrinkle easily. The fabric also looked a bit tired. Probably better as a casual dress.
Would be best for a thin straight build. Hugged stomach in all the wrong places and tight in chest. Not best for hourglass or fuller figure

links_reviews_title: Loved material, color and look of this dress.
links_reviews_text: Wore to work and would certainly rent again.
I'm usually an 8 but this dress was so tight in the chest it pulled and felt awkward but then wasn't form fitting in the torso... great color but didn't end of wearing
fit great .. a fun dress
This was just too big. Should have sized down.
the hem of the skirt was very flattering

links_reviews_title: Disagree with other reviews that this is too revealing for work
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress, lots of compliments! The inside liner was short, but, not as short as other reviewers mentioned. I felt it was work appropriate.
flattering fit for more of an hour glass figure
I did wear this dress but it did not fit me well. It seemed to fit fine in the top but the tummy area was baggy & shapeless.
Comfortable, fits well, and can wear regular bra!
Really cute but the bottom flutter portion is see through the holes - but the opaque portion didn't cover my bum! Couldn't wear. Best for shorter girls.
Stunning color
Loved this dress it was a little snug and I felt like I was pulling down on it all night but otherwise perfect and I got so many compliments on the color!
Loved this dress! I'm 5'8, 150lbs, 36DDD, 8months postpartum, and this dress was so flattering. Fits well and slimming in the chest, tummy, and arms.
I loved this dress. It was a bit short so I wore it with tights. The sleeves were a fun offset to a pretty straightforward dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, comfortable and didn't wrinkle.
links_reviews_text: This dress was classy and beautiful. The sleeves added a little statement to the dress. It is suitable for a wedding or professional work environment depending on how you choose to accessorize! I would love to purchase this dress that's how much I loved it!
Tips: I would suggest sizing up if possible Pros: Overall comfortable and classy. Love the sleeves! Cons: I would've liked for it to be slightly looser around my tummy. Rides up a little bit.

Fit great, lots of compliments. I wore it for my son's senior awards banquet. It was shorter than I expected. I'm 5'4" and it hit mid thigh, not knee as I expected. I also rented the clutch which I thought complimented the dress beautifully.
I wore to a rehearsal dinner of friends. It was cute but I didn't feel spectacular in it!

Cute dress with bell sleeves that I wore to an engagement party. Perfect for cool spring weather, so I didn't have to bring a sweater. With a pear figure, I had to go a size up. Lots of compliments and would wear again.
The wings/flared sleeves were fun and felt a bit fancy in a good way. Sheath fit still looked nice and a Large fit my pear shape well. lined.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, easy to move in, can dress up with jewelry
links_reviews_text: Wore for a wedding. Easy to move in for dancing. Lenient on body type. Great color. At first I thought it was plain Jane, so I dressed it up with jewelry. The bell sleeves give it something extra also.
I wore this dress for a Valentine's dinner and I really did like it! The sleeves made the dress, I wore black leggings and black ankle boots. Super simple, but cute!

I love this classy dress by Slate & Willow. The bluish teal color is very pretty and unique. It's magically comfortable all over. Its comfortable for any bust size and comfortable in the midsection area. I recommend wearing your true size and sizing up for your backup size. At 5’3 this dress hits knee length for me.
The sleeves are awesome and make what could be a boring dress into something special.
Wore this dress to a retirement party at a country club. Tried on both the M and L could have worn either but chose the L for a little extra room.
Easy to wear. Nice fit
I LOVED this dress. It's my favorite color, LOVED the sleeve detail. Perfect for my holiday party, and so flattering.
This is a great dress! It stretches and is comfortable! I am 5'8" and 165lbs. I highly recommend!
I'm a size 12 in 99% of my dresses and this dress fit just perfectly!
I rented this for a wine tasting first date. The dress is cute. But it was too tight in the arms/chest area. I still wore it because I had no backup. But I wasn't the most comfortable thru the night

links_reviews_title: The bell sleeves added enough flair for my friend's 40th birthday party!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was thick and forgiving wit

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Fabulous color and such fun sleeves! Perfect length for a dinner date.

links_reviews_title: Super-flattering gem tone, fun shape and sleeves
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for being flattering while not tight. Wore it for a wedding with my family. Sexy shorter length was really understated and fun!
Forgiving on body. Several compliments. A bit short for my taste.
sleeves are very long, so have to be very careful not to dip into things when eating

links_reviews_title: The ceremony I attended in this dress was special.
links_reviews_text: This dress is comfortable, flattering and good color. It is arguably a little tight in the bust.
Love this dress! Stretchy, comfy, flattering and such. great color! I would definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect! Received many compliments
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the L for a little extra room but the M fit perfectly. My stats: 5’8”, 145lbs, 36D
This was my backup dress that I ended up wearing. I thought the fit was true to size and was very flattering. It was shorter than I'm used to wearing but didn't appear too short.

The fit was great, especially in the bust, but I'm 6' tall and this dress was too short to wear to a wedding, or really anywhere. Could not move without having it ride up and immediately become inappropriate. Waste of money and just left me with regret. Beautiful color and sleeves though, true to the photo.
The color is super sharp. The dress is fitted & short- unlike the picture. It's cute - but I was unable to wear it to my event. Size up

links_reviews_title: Short but good overall fit & great color
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress overall, but my main complaint, and the reason I would not rent it again, was the length. I'm 5'5" and I couldn't raise my arms without the dress riding way, way too high. Overall, though, the fit and fabric were nice and I really liked the color for a spring wedding.

While I wound up picking another option I rented, this dress was really beautiful. Color was gorgeous, sleeves were just the right amount of a statement, it's fitted so that's the only thing noteworthy if you are concerned with that. I'm keeping it as a fav.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! Would definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: This was such a fun, simple dress! I received a lot of compliments on the way it fit.

This dress was fitted in all the right places. I'm currently between a 14-16, so after reading the reviews, I went with the recommended size. The sleeves were amazing and made the dress feel dressier. I'm 5'2 and the length was above my knee so I would imagine this would fit taller women pretty short.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a hit, I got so many compliments on this.
links_reviews_text: I could fit in the smaller size but it was very short. When I went up to the larger, it fit slightly looser and was the perfect length. I was comfortable all night and didn't want to return it!
From the pictures I thought it would just hang but it didn't. It was too tight for me.
It was a nice dress. Fits true to size but I found it very short. I’m 5’11” so sometimes stuff is short but this was very short.
I received this new with tags. Great fit, loose around the waist. The sleeves are super fun!
Gorgeous dress, perfect length for work, can wear with tights or not, elegant and fashionable yet conservative.

The material was not what I expected and unfortunately, the dress showed every lump and bump. The length was a little shorter than I would have liked. Fine while standing but no one wants to stand through dinner.
I wore this to a bright colors themed fundraiser event. It was comfortable, light, and fit true to size. Dress up or down. Very pleased

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this beautiful dress because it ran big...as you can see.
links_reviews_text: Order a size smaller. It runs big. I rented in size 12. I wish sizes were more uniform.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful. Got many compliments. The color is extraordinary and the style is unique.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so beautiful. I was afraid that the size 8 might might fit me but it fit me so well. I'm between a size 8 and 10 now but mostly a size 10 due to my thighs, but this dress.... hmmm. It wasn't tight and I was comfortable to move around with it.
Loved the dress color was great. I wish I would have sized down, it was a little baggy in the midsection

links_reviews_title: So cute! Looks great with a tan :)
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a wedding! It was so cute, fit perfectly, and it looked great with my tan.

links_reviews_title: We took a family vacation photo shoot at the beach in Costa Rica.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits like a glove, and the color is so radiant. I have never wear a yellow dress in my life, not sure why but I wanted to take family photos by the beach with my family and the pictures came out so beautiful. I strongly recommend this dress for any occasion.
I received so many compliments on this dress. It ran slightly large, especially in the stomach area. Would definitely rent this dress again but in the size down.

I read prior reviews on this dress and based on those I ordered it multiple sizes smaller than I usually wear. I'm usually a 16 or 18, and I attempted to order a 14, but it wasn't available. So I decided to take the risk on the 12 based on reviews and I loved it!!! The only thing I would recommend is for bustier ladies like myself, wear a strapless bra, there were a few scary moments bending forward.

I wore this dress wine tasting with my in-laws and received so many compliments! My measurements are 33-26-35, and the 0 fit very well. I had some extra room, but it didn't look too big. It's a shift dress, not a pencil dress, there's no stretch and no slit, so if it were tighter it wouldn't have been comfortable. I had no trouble walking in it, but I had to pull it up a little to go up or down stairs. There are extra layers of fabric in the bust so I went without a bra easily. I could have worn a padded strapless bra to fill it out a little more and give it a little shape. The body of the dress is a little sheer, but was fine with nude no-show underwear. The bow didn't stand up the way it does in the RTR photos, but I still thought it looked cute Overall a lot of fun to wear, would definitely recommend!
Fit true to size. Very comfy. No bra needed. Loved the length.

This dress is perfect for summer wedding festivities; I wore it to my friends' engagement party in July and it was fantastic for it! It was a little big on my midsection, which made it a little unflattering, but it wasn't a deal-breaker. I was surprised that there was nothing to hold up the bow except your own bow-tying skills, so it kept falling throughout the evening and I had to keep adjusting it until I gave up a few hours later. The length was actually fine even on my 5'0" frame, so I was very pleased! Overall, a really gorgeous dress but I just don't think it was right for me.
The fit was amazing, and I received so many compliments! Wish I could keep it :)
The bright yellow is usually not my color, but I wanted to try something new for Jamaica. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a photo shoot to update my portfolio. It was absolutely PERFECT!
links_reviews_text: The color is amazing and eye catching. The bow is a great style element. It’s such a flattering dress! 5’10 I wore size 2 even though I’m usually an 4.
The color just makes you feel good! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Can't wait til I have an excuse to rent this again
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. The cut was wild and 80s, but the material was a really nice lace-- kept the dress distinctly modern despite the retro cut. It's bright yellow. Fits like a dream. Got a million compliments. And I can't wait to rent it again!

I wore this dress to a summer wedding. It was a beautiful color but it ran large. The straps were adjustable which helped. Strapless bra was necessary. I ordered the 10 to be on the safe side but wish I had gotten the 8. It was very roomy. I got lots of compliments and I would rent this dress again, but in a smaller size.
Wore it anyway- lined- little stretch - Fitted in busy and huge in body - was comfy to wear at the movies
Loved this dress! It's a beautiful yellow and very comfortable- didn't even have to wear a bra with it! It's true to size and perfect for a summer wedding!

The color is beautiful. The lining gets a little bunched up when you are sitting and then wrinkles. The fit is a tiny bit large. I had to steam the bow to get it to stay up. Lots of compliments and perfect for a spring daytime wedding.
Has a little stretch to it so it would work for curvy girls! Gorgeous dress!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to Preakness and it was perfect for the weather, for the event and comfy!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly - it wasn't too close to the body and straight fit. I love the bow in the front and it was perfect for my dressy event.
This didn't fit me at all. I recommend sizing down. Also, works better if your chest is larger. The bust was gaping on me.
The bow of this dress does not stand up like that. It flops in the middle.

links_reviews_title: Cute for summer but probably won't rent again
links_reviews_text: I felt this dress was a bit unflattering in the midsection and I'm not large there. The material was really light which is great for the summer but it didn't give a "flat" look to my stomach. I'm 5'4", 138 lbs and athletic build and it just made me look dumpy. I didn't end up wearing the dress because of that. I liked the idea and style of the dress and sad it didn't work out...
Perfect for summer !

links_reviews_title: A bit transparent so I had to wear skin-color spanx underneath but overall cute
links_reviews_text: Wish it weren't so transparent

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress perfect for Tea party Bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Love the fit and color. It adjust at the shoulders for a perfect fit.
Beautiful color and fit--lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: pretty dress, butlarge in the waist
links_reviews_text: I'm a 25-26" in waist and this was very loose on me. I still wore it and it is a pretty dress (nice bright yellow) but know that it runs large
The dress showed every curve and ultimately was too small to wear and feel comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for Father's Day brunch
links_reviews_text: Loved the vibrant color. Fit was a little big and it was hard to move due to where the dress landed on my legs.

links_reviews_title: Runs really big and it's see-through
links_reviews_text: I'm a very consistent size 2, I sometimes wear a 0. In this dress, the 0 was still way too big on me, so it runs very large. It's also definitely see-through! So I didn't wear it.
Loved this dress! The size 6 fit, but was a bit loose on the bottom. Probably could have sized down but the top part fit well (bust/back). So many compliments on the color at a bridal shower!

links_reviews_title: It was a wedding at a vineyard on Long Island that I rented it for.
links_reviews_text: It was superrrrr see-through so I didn’t wear it. And the fabric was more made for a summer dress than a wedding. So I opted not to wear. The dress itself was comfortable, ran true to size, and was pretty. Which is why I gave it a few stars. But you need to wear something under it for sure.

links_reviews_title: love trina turk. this is a generous size 0
links_reviews_text: very fun. adjustable straps which helps us shorter gals (5'3")
Great bright yellow, but the bow can fall down easily (needs to be tacked into place). Dress ran big, if you sit between sizes go with the smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Sexy classy mix but wearing a bra is difficult
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a Xmas party and for a party amongst family and friends I thought the dress was fun and flirty- wouldn't wear to a work event due to neckline plunge and length but would definitely wear again. Only challenge with the dress is I am a. 38dd and wearing a bra was near impossible and the dress isn't very thick so my nipples would occasionally be visible thru the dress (not see thru but the shape/ outline)

links_reviews_title: Loved the red and the sleeves!
links_reviews_text: It was definitely stretchy material that made me slightly self conscious about my mid section, but with shapewear, I felt great. I got a ton of compliments on the color and the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Perfect length with heels, able to wear normal bra.
links_reviews_text: Fits pretty snug. I run between size 4-6 and there was no chance I could comfortably wear the size 4. With that said, the material is thick and flattering.

LOVE the statement shoulders. Not too big and in your face but very flattering. The fit is perfect for busty gals. I was able to wear a normal bra which made it super flattering. I would definitely recommend Spanxs or smooth underwear underneath as lace shows through the fabric.
Very tight, glad I ordered the bigger size.

I found this dress comfortable and flattering. Note: it is a "true" red / fire engine red, even though the model's pic looks a bit orange. I rented with some orange earrings (https://www.renttherunway.com/shop/designers/elizabeth_cole/odessa_drop_hoop_earrings) that looked a bit red-orange but turned out to be true orange, so I was unable to wear them together. Was able to wear a regular bra even though it has a unique back cutout.
I needed a dress for a Night at the Races (Derby theme) and this was perfect. Shoulders on the dress are so cute and the fit was great. Very form fitting but comfortable

links_reviews_title: Fabulous party dress for the 3rd trimester !
links_reviews_text: Felt pretty fabulous for a reunion cocktail party at 34 weeks pregnant! I sized up from my normal pre preg size 0 to a size 2 in this dress and although I could (just barely) zip the dress it was very fitted (although I thought in a bump flattering way!) but if you want a little less of a bodycon look and you may be more comfortable going up two sizes. Lots of compliments all night!
The fit was perfect. Very comfortable for dancing!
Very fitted, but the material was high quality and didn't wrinkle much! I got so many compliments!
I have a curvy figure. I could have used the size 10 but the size 12 was so much more comfortable. It was a great dress.
The dress fit well and was very comfortable. It did ride up a bit as you danced. But, it wouldn't deter me from renting again or buying. It was beautiful in every way!
The dress is a knockout with the color and the sleeves. It is curve hugging and not lined - so make sure you wear shape wear underneath it. It does have some stretch to it. I liked it!

I have crazy broad should so I'm around a size 10 up top but I have no hips so I'm about a 4 on the bottom. This was very comfortable in an 8 which is my normal size but just accentuated my lack of hips. Great color and nice material but better for someone showing off their curves rather than trying to creating them.
Fits true to size, will show all the curves. Size up if you dont want it to look too sexy
The fit is snug. Need to be pretty body confident and/ or wear a lot of shape wear to wear this. My only real complaint is that the armholes are really large, so any traditional bra shows through.
I loved the color of this dress! But I wish I had known the dress was stretchy and hugged curves - this was good and bad. I had to wear spandex to hide my belly!

The dress is a vibrant and unforgettable shade of red. The fabric looks and feels beautiful, as it contours your body, without over-hugging. The length and cut of the dress are styled for maximum comfort and finesse. Caveat: The arm holes were a bit large for me and I would recommend choosing undergarments (which may peak through) wisely.
Perfect dress for a night out on the town! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: It is beautiful and VERY form fitted. Stretchy and forgiving material.
links_reviews_text: I ended up chosing another dress for the wedding that I also ordered from RTR. This was just too form fitted for the occasion despite my Marine’s persistent nudges to wear it. The material is very stretchy and forgiving and he zipper is high quality.

This dress is even prettier in person. I received compliments all night. I am between a 8 and 10 but I ended up wearing the 10 to feel a bit more comfy when dancing. The fabric is very stretchy and shows everything. If you're very self aware of any pudges, I'd suggest spanx or something similar.
Loved this dress. It fit great (showed the perfect amount of cleavage) and I received many compliments.

I wore this for my bachelorette party. I felt beautiful in it. The fabric is stretchy and rich feeling. My only complaint is my bra showed under my armholes as other people said. However, it wasn't that big a deal. I would wear again!

links_reviews_title: Sleeves felt a little like Star Trek.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so cute and I loved the way the body fit, but the sleeves were just a little odd. My husband described them as football shoulders - i think it was a little more like Star Trek. It may be because i have broad shoulders and bigger upper arms. I ended up wearing a different dress.

links_reviews_title: I've worn this two different times now.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. The material is a nice stretchy material. Ive worn this dress twice now and the comments are thru the roof. A friend of mine said she was renting it for her next party.

I typically don't go for a red dress, I had seen this one in October and opted for a different one then this month had another wedding and decided to give it a go. It fit like a glove, It did not wrinkle when sitting ( like one of the other reviews) not too short, just perfect. I would rent again.

This dress was great for the wedding I attended. It was form fitting - I normally wear a size 0 but I knew I wanted to be comfortable all night dancing and wore the size 2. They fit similar but gave me more comfort in my waist that I wouldn't have to pull it down or worry about it riding up. I got lots of compliments while wearing it. I had black strappy heels on with the dress but those came off so i could dance the night away!

links_reviews_title: Loved the beautiful red color and looked great in pictures !
links_reviews_text: I really liked the color and sleeve details on this dress . It runs pretty true to size although it rides up a tiny bit when you walk . I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: First time red, lots of complements
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and fun!
Loved this dress and received many compliments. I would highly recommend if you want a curve hugging dress.

links_reviews_title: Great style, it was an outdoor wedding and it was unseasonably hot and the dress stayed awesome.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 4-6, but ordered a 6 and 8, glad I did. Wore the 8 and it was snug. I like the sleeves and what they do for you silhouette. The fabric is stretchy and thickish with out being heavy. I got lots of compliments and enjoyed it. If you're older like me the length is good for a shorter woman, if I were 2" taller, the dress would have been inappropriately too short. Over all thumbs up, I did have to iron the dress upon arrival however, I was not expecting that...

I loved this dress! It was very flattering and stretched in all the right places. I usually wear a 12, but got the ten just in case and ended up wearing the 10 because the 12 was a little big in the under the boob area. Also got so many compliments all night!

I was so surprised how simple and sexy this dress was. I felt comfortable and confident. I have a large bust and always worried about too much or too little coverage but it was perfectly sexy and classy. I fluctuate between size 8 & 10, and ended up going with the 10.
This dress was great. It has a little bit of stretch, but make sure that you get the backup one size bigger.
Not my favorite RTR rental but wore the piece out for a Valentine's Day dinner.

This is a fun dress! I wasn't able to wear it because it was too tight but I could tell the next size up would have been perfect. Such a great date night or party look with the flirty sleeves, v neck line, keyhole back and gold zipper! This dress is on the site in black too! I felt great in it but it just hugged my curves a little TOO much! I will rent it in the larger size!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a work/charity event.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much! I'd wear it again if I had it. Super comfy, a little stretch. I got compliments all night and I felt so pretty! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Very easy to rent and the dress was super
links_reviews_text: Great dress and super comfy!!! I got so many compliments!!

I wore this for a charity event. It was simple and elegant (always something to strive for). The ruffle sleeves are a cute touch. I'm a 30DDD so my bra showed a bit under the arms. But it was comfortable to wear and I felt pretty in it.

links_reviews_title: I should've gotten my true size
links_reviews_text: After reading the reviews I went up to a 6 but I wish I had a 4! I still wore it but the waist line was very big. It still fit well in hips and butt but again, go with your true size!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my maternity photos at 37 weeks and loved it.
links_reviews_text: Its a little large in the bust but was so flowy and comfy! I think I could have worn a small, but the Medium worked well and I'm glad I had some extra length.

This dress was an adorable dress to wear for a brunch I was headed to. In fact, I'm hanging onto it for another smaller outing I have. I'm currently 38 weeks and was a size 8 prior to maternity. This dress is great, because unlike other maternity stuff, the top is adjustable, and the flowy part at the bottom isn't so obnoxious that you feel like a tent. I actually kinda feel elegant, which is saying a lot because again, I'm huge and swollen all over. Haha! Plus, it has pockets! Yes!

links_reviews_title: Ethereal! Very spacious and roomy, soft, beautiful, flowy.
links_reviews_text: I wore this at my baby shower when I was 7 months pregnant and the medium was perfect. It was comfortable and loose and not too warm, which I appreciated since it was over 90 degrees outside! It was ideal for fitting a baby bump and I feel confident I could fit in a dress like this right up until giving birth. It does have pockets, but they are very shallow and I wouldn't rely too much on them. Only one note - the chest area fit a little strangely so I ended up making darts with safety pins, but otherwise I was able to wear a strapless bra no problem!

I loved this dress! So lovely for maternity photos. Pros: generous fit in stomach/hips, true empire waist great for third trimester, great SLIP portion attached so not see-through, adjustable straps; cons: long. I'm 5'6" and wore 3 inch heels and it just brushed the ground. Couldn't really do it with flats/sandals. Also gapped a bit at the front. I was fine dealing with both though. Five stars.

links_reviews_title: A little big, but great for maternity
links_reviews_text: The dress ran big, but is great and really comfortable for maternity.

Probably my all-time favorite maternity dress I've ever worn. I got this dress for maternity photos at 7 months pregnant. I'm typically a small or medium when I'm not pregnant, and the small fit me perfectly. I am 5'9" and it was LONG on me, so if you are short or do not plan to wear heels then this might be a little too long, but it was perfect for me.

Very comfortable and flowy, great for a warmer day & fit an 8 month belly. Only thing wrong was it was very long as expected for someone 5'2, too bad they don't carry petite sizes. Had to hem the bottom with safety pins but wasn't too much of a problem.

I am 5'3 (125lbs not pregnant/145 lbs pregnant) and it was too long. Better with heels but either way wasn't soo long that I couldn't wear it. Beautiful pattern and got lots of compliments! Very comfy for a pregnant belly. Beautiful fabric.
Nice to have in the second trimester, would also work third trimester. A little long, but that's because I'm 5'1"

links_reviews_title: My second baby shower which took place at 35 weeks pregnant in August-California heat!
links_reviews_text: I was a D cup prior to pregnancy and went up a bit but not a whole lot and the top didn’t really fit that great. Also at 5’3 it was VERY long-but the colors and the light easy fit were really nice. So overall not The greatest fit, but at 9 months pregnant there’s only so much to ask for

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It made me feel magical because it was so flowy and ethereal.
links_reviews_text: It’s a bit long but I didn’t mind. It photographed beautifully. I wore a pre-pregnancy strapless white slip. It’s a bit see-through so you definitely need something. Also the top is low and small so that really helped with support. Otherwise I felt like a princess. Makes you look more pregnant than you are. I’m 26 weeks and this made me look about 35 which was what I wanted for taking pictures and not feeling enormous. It just really emphasized the belly.
It was perfect for summer. Flowy and light. I'm 30 weeks pregnant and have gained about 25 lbs and the small fit me perfectly. Got so many compliments! Love this dress

links_reviews_title: Great Dress for my baby shower and maternity pictures
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed wearing this dress. I got 2 uses out of it by doing a photo shoot and wearing at the shower. It was comfortable and vary forgiving in the waste line, although I was worried that the top part would be too loose/ show off a but much as I didnt wear a bra with it. But it did stay put and worked well. Pre pregnancy, I wear small/ size 4. I am 35 weeks pregnant and the small fit me perfectly, so it may seem that it runs a little larger. Word of caution to short ladies. This dress is LONG. It worked well for the shoot as I didnt want to wear heels and it covered my feet with a trail of dress. But for the party, it was a bit of a pain as I didnt wear shoes inside the house. I ended up rubber banding/bustling it at one point just so I could walk. But it is to be expected for someone who is 5’1”. I think it will make many other ladies happy with their choice. I can’t wait to get the pictures back from the shoot.

links_reviews_title: Wore to an afternoon garden party then on a 2 hour flight. Very comfortable for both!
links_reviews_text: The dress is long. I am 5'4" and even with wedges I needed to hold it up whenever walking. I wear a size 40D cup, and the cup size on the dress was just a little too small with a bra. Otherwise the fit was great!

Rented this for vacation. I'm 5'5 and dress was a bit too long to wear without heels. Perhaps if I was in my third trimester it might be shorter? However I couldn't wear it because the boobs were WAY too small on the medium. If you're boobs have grown in size during pregnancy this dress isn't going to work for you!

links_reviews_title: Too long even with the highest shoes.
links_reviews_text: Too long. Otherwise cute and fit bump well.
This dress runs incredibly large and is too long even for my 5'9" height. Just looked frumpy.
It was a pretty dress, but fit like a tent due to the pockets.

I loved this dress. It was flowy and pretty. Only complainant was that it was super long, which usually maxi dresses are too short on me, but I kept stepping on it. And the top was a little too small for my bra size so I had to wear a shirt underneath. Still beautiful dress. Perfect for all trimesters!

links_reviews_title: LOVE!!!! THe colors are vibrant and gorgeous and the dress is simply beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Adjustable straps with elastic through the chest/back really helps as my bumps grow. Plenty of room in the tummy area to expand, the dress is perfect.

links_reviews_title: Cute casual maternity dress for the 2nd and 3rd trimester
links_reviews_text: The dress was just a tad bit too long. However the material was light and very flowy.

links_reviews_title: Wore to date night and loved how pretty I felt.
links_reviews_text: A little long. I am 5'6" and I don't like wearing heels so it was a little long.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty but didn't end up wearing
links_reviews_text: Was too big in the chest
Loved this dress! I was my sisters maid of honor and this was the perfect fit.

I'm usually a size 10 Petite. I had to change it 12R. My bust area fits but it is low cut. When I dance, it shows my bust. I had to use safety pin on the shoulders since it keeps falling down during dancing. I did wear it because I love the dress. There is no stretch on this dress.

links_reviews_title: Super tight in rib cage and loose in sleeves
links_reviews_text: I usually would order a 4 or 6 for this dress. I ordered an 8 after trying on a 6 and it being too small. The 8 is huge up top but the top part of the zipper is super tight. This is the smallest part of my body, so it's rare that going up a size, I still wouldn't fit in it. I am going to try to order one more size up again to see if it improves the fit. This would be better for someone full chested with broad shoulders and smaller bottom half.

links_reviews_title: Built for a large but and smaller bottom, but I made it work
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much that I made it work. I have very even proportions, and this dress was for a large bust. It also runs small, as the 18w was too small on the bottom but fit on the top. I ended up wearing the 20W which did on the bottom but was big on the top and I padded my bra and used garment tape. I felt like a goddess and got lots of compliments. It was pretty low cut but no one complained.

links_reviews_title: I love this earthy hue gown by Watters
links_reviews_text: Running slight small with no stretch, I recommend wearing the next size up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and roomy at the hips. It works best for A - C cups sizes.You are not able to wear a standard bra with this style. At floor length, the length hit the ground on me. Pair with neutral color heels and earth tone accessory to complete your outfit!

I love this earthy Stone Antonia Gown by Watters. Running small with no stretch, I recommend wearing a size up for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It woks best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this gown, so you should wear no bra since it has a built-in bodice for support. At 5'5, the length hit floor length on me. The grey crinkle chiffon material of this gown is flowy and has a delicate touch. Pair with heels and dainty earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Weird fit so couldn't wear...tight under bust and WAY too big in bust, straps and upper back
links_reviews_text: waist too small for oversized bust area

links_reviews_title: Very low cut and loose in the shoulders
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a bridesmaid for a wedding. I ordered this dress in my usual size and I thought it looked good except it was slightly too small. I ordered a size up and the shoulders were very loose and the dress was so low cut that I was pretty uncomfortable all day and night. I made it work but it is definitely not something I would want to wear again.

links_reviews_title: very attractive but did not fit
links_reviews_text: I run broad around the rib cage area and I could not zip the dress the last 2 inches.

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: All the reviews said it was true to size and photos showed that it was forgiving to a full figure body type. This is just not the case. At best this was actually a size 10 maybe even an 8. Surprisingly the backup size didn’t work either. Not a great first experience for someone who absolutely hates (and doesn’t really have time to...) shopping.
Typically between sizes because of my hips. This was too tight in the back but then the straps/bust was gigantic when I put on the bigger size.

What a beautiful dress. I did not wear it as it was my back up but will rent again. It has cups inserted so no need for a bra if smaller breasted. Great for both cold and warm weather as the color is neutral.

Didn’t end up wearing. The cut was surprisingly low and loose in the bosom, so I was afraid I would have a wardrobe malfunction. The slip underneath was also tight on my hips. Just not good for my body. Color was ok.
Too small and too short.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments and felt beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress!! Fit like a dream and is super unique and fun. I wore it for my best friend's rehearsal dinner and loved it so much. I will say it’s a tad booby so just be aware of that depending on your preferences.

It was tight where it needed to be and loose in all the right places to give beautiful balance to my figure. The dress had pockets!! Imagine that? The neckline was extreme. I'm not use to my cleavage showing , but I went with it . I had to tighten the neck a bit because my torso is on the shorter side. I wore this with tennis shoes, for a daytime look, but for night I would pair with kitten heels to rock more of a party look. Tons of compliments and lots of wows!!

I wore this for a dog rescue gala. I was really anxious about wearing this dress, because I lost my nerve about wearing such a plunging neckline about 20 minutes before I needed to go. But, once I was in it and ready, I felt great! A little fashion-tape and I was good to go. Plus I got to carry puppies around to cover my own puppies.
This dress fit so perfectly. Plus there are pockets! I felt sexy with the deep v but also not too revealing with its length. Felt appropriate as a 30 year old! Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Worked as a costume and for a gala!
links_reviews_text: So I wore this for my Stevie Nicks costume (along with a RTR Natori blazer) and I just loved it. I'm def larger on the bottom and the slip under the lace was a little tight but not uncomfortable. The whole dress feels so well made - with pockets too! I'm small chested and I didn't need any type of bra. I then wore it for a work Gala with a bandeau underneath and got so many compliments. Rent this dress!

Well, actually, my husband insisted. This dress is so gorgeous and beyond comfortable. Wore a low plunge bralette which provided the perfect amount of support. Compliments galore! From 80's-teens everyone loved this dress.
Great if you're small chested. Bigger boobs, might be hard to put them somewhere. Pockets. Love the length. No bra.

The dress was amazing. Everyone at the wedding fell in love with it. The only issue with the dress was that I was too small for the top, I had to come up with creative ways to make sure I was spilling out. If I had a longer torso it wouldn't have been an issue, but overall great.

links_reviews_title: The Perfect Dress is often the back up
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It had just enough give in the fabric to be super comfortable, while at the same time being so flattering. I ordered this dress as my third back up! It was for my 50th birthday party and I wanted the perfect dress. I felt so pretty in this dress and was really happy with the way it turned out. Plus, the best thing? POCKETS!!! Such a fun dress. I would rent this one again.
Love this dress! It is very low cut but sophisticated. I would buy this if I could afford it.

links_reviews_title: Work or play you'll feel amazing.
links_reviews_text: NE ADVISED: LARGER BUST GET DBL SIDED TAPE. When I wore this dress w/o a top under it I was falling out. Partly b/c I have two kids and the ladies aren't exactly where they should be, but the cut is both wide and deep. Dbl sided take helped me out.
Gorgeous dress, super flattering. Comfy and with pockets! It's pretty low cut so anyone with a larger chest should be careful.
I really liked this dress, although I found it to be a little bit loose in the neckline for a dress that had a plunge. But overall, I enjoyed wearing it. I would probably size down next time.

I love this midi length dresses fit my body! I love the plunging neckline, and got so many compliments from wedding guests. I didn't wear a bra and felt secure the entire night. The lining is really soft so I was comfortable all night too! Win win! I'd recommend this dress for specifically taller women.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but will look better on a tall person
links_reviews_text: The dress is very pretty (and heavy) - I'd say good for fall/winter. I'm 5'4 and normally size 6. I had a size 8 and the dress fit perfect on my waist, but it was very loose on the top. The dress overpowered my body and I believe it works better on a taller person. Ended up not weakening as I had a different option.
I didn't end up wearing this for my event but will TOTALLY rent in the future!!! It's stunning. The neckline is a gorgeous dramatic plunge (great for a small chest).
I received a ton of compliments. It was comfy and the pockets were an awesome touch.
Used for a #barmitzvah and it was great

Great dress!! Lace was heavier and had some stretch. I did not end up wearing due to the amount of cleavage shown- I would rent again for a less formal event. Great even for me at 4'11- paired well with heels!

links_reviews_title: I got several compliments on this dress. I felt comfortable and beautiful the whole evening.
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size and fit well. The cut, although low never moved and I never felt like I was going to fall out or flash anyone. It was perfect for the formal awards banquet I attended. It also has pockets which makes having your phone and lipstick on you so much easier!

Hosted a work event at the Grammys- wanted something fun a little edgy but still safe for work. This dress was perfect- I could run around comfortably- it has pockets too! Best for girls with a small top. Loved this dress

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress but the cleavage is cut VERY wide
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a fundraiser that was affiliated with my work. I usually wear a 0 and that's what I'm wearing in the photo. Waist was snug but not too tight, and even then I'm only 5'0" no hemming tape needed because I could wear it as a full length dress. Loved its uniqueness. Biggest issue was how they cut the cleavage. Because it's cut more like a U instead of a V it gapes out to the sides terribly. Fashion tape would couldnt hold it. Maybe a size 2 would have given me extra room in the chest but the cut would have still been super wide. I have a 32-D chest. If it had not been affiliated with work I may have still worn it but for this I was afraid I'd flash a nipple on the dance floor.
I wore this for New Years and I loved it! It fit comfortably and I loved the pockets! So glad I went with this dress for the party.
Loved the dress. But it's very low cut. Not flattering at the hips but it was really unique and cute and I really liked it

links_reviews_title: Stunning lace, perfect neckline, and POCKETS
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a Marie Antoinette NYE party that I was DJing. This dress was so amazing. I usually wear a 4, I got this in a 2 and it was a perfect fit. I do have a small chest though, so if my chest was larger my then normal size probably would have worked. The lace is so pretty and detailed, I ended up putting a pink tulle skirt under the layer of lace and it peeked through beautifully. And THIS DRESS HAS POCKETS.

links_reviews_title: The look on my hubbys face when I put the dress on :)
links_reviews_text: The fit was great but it's a super deep v. So if you don't wear low cut clothes normally you may be uncomfortable. If not, you will love it!

Loved this dress and recommend it with very tall heels. Very revealing as you can see so that made me a bit self-conscious. Loved the lacey material and perfect if you're looking for a black dress that's a bit more regal.

This dress is fantastic!! I'd rented another dress that didn't work, so I went to the RTR store in NYC to find something last minute. This is actually not something I'd normally choose, but options were limited so I decided to give it a shot. I'm SO glad I did!!! I usually wear a 4 or 6, but the 2 fit like a glove. I'm not busty (32C) but it made the girls looks fab! I'm contemplating buying this one I love it so much!! (Also, apologies for the hotel room selfie! We had so much fun I forgot to take real pics!!)
The plunging neckline is out of my style comfort zone but some double stick tape made me feel a bit better!!! Got lots of compliments! Fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt like I was headed to the Oscars!!
links_reviews_text: Had a blast in this dress - receiving a ton of compliments!! I didn't recognize the 'depths' to which the neckline would go (get it?!?) when renting, but nothing a little fashion tape and confidence can't overcome! The fit was true to size and I loved the length of the skirt and where it fell on my long-legged 5'9" frame. Only 'meh' feeling about the dress was that it was a bit 'hippy'. Not peace and love hippie. But rather, too much pleated material on the skirt, causing my hips to look much wider than actuality. Now that said, pretty sure no one was looking at my hips!! (LOL!!) Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a 'wowza' look!
Got so many compliments with this dress. Definitely a head turner. Sexy and elegant. The best part it has large pockets!! Hold large cellphone and wallets.

links_reviews_title: So many complements on this little beauty! Show stopper for sure.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect! I didn’t have to wear any sort of bra and it was very comfortable! It rubbed a tiny bit by the end of the night under my arms, but nothing unbearable. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: The lace is classic and elegant without being over the top
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a fundraiser and was complimented on all night. Wish I got the 10 as it was a bit big up top and needed support tape. Very low cut may need some coverage/support if you're DD bra size

links_reviews_title: Simple with just right touch of fun and sexy!
links_reviews_text: If you are small chested like me, this may be a touch big. I usually wear a 6 or 8, probably should have worn a 4. I used some fashion tape on the v area but it wouldn't sit perfectly which annoyed me a bit. No bra needed! Pockets were such a fun surprise!

links_reviews_title: I was so happy the dress fit!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I felt so sexy in it and received so many compliments. I got both the 6 and 8 and the 6 definitely fit better. Although the 8 felt a bit more comfortable it was to big around the underarm area. With whatever size you get i highly recommend double sided tape for that boob area. It kept everything in place.
The midi length hit a bit lower than I would have liked and the front was very low cut (so keep that in mind if your event is more conservative) but overall I enjoyed wearing this dress.

I rented this dress for a 6p Saturday wedding that was "cocktail" attire at a Castle. I got it as a back up dress for another event in May so I knew what to expect going in. I typically wear a 10R. Because of the cut of this dress (the plunge neckline) I opted for the 8R. I am bigger at the hips/thighs so it was a little snug there, but the top held in tight and comfortable. With the lace overlay, the snugness of the underneath lining didn't really matter. I did tape the girls down mostly to try and keep them a little lifted. I wore it with a light/copper/beaded heel, longer dangly earrings and no necklace. I think too much around the neck takes away from the deep neckline. Also - not sure what they've done - but the zipper was a non-issue! And when I tried it back in May, it was! I had my 22 y.o. daughter on hand to zip me, but my husband got it right up - no problem. I am very likely to rent this again - it's a great dress. I received a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fun, stylish dress (but not for the small chested!)
links_reviews_text: I had to rent this dress last minute from the RTR store outside LA, and this was the best of the limited options at the store. It's a bit edgy/different than my usual wedding guest style so not sure I would've rented it under a different circumstance but ended up loving it!! I got SO many compliments before and after the wedding. However, ** if you are small chested this dress will be huge on top**. I'm a 34B and had to tape down the front of the dress & pin up the top fabric to make it fit my chest. I'm usually a 4/6 so this sizing was correct, just not up top. If you're willing to adjust it at bit, worth it, but keep that in mind when renting.
Perfect. I wore a cami under it.

This dress was PERFECT for the semi-formal charity gala I attended. I usually wear a 12 in dresses, but the tighter fit of the 10 helped keep the girls up without a bra (though I did use a LOT of Hollywood tape). I don't usually show much in the way of cleavage, but this dress allowed for a little sass without ever feeling exposed. I'm hippier, so the smaller size was a little tighter in that area, but I was able to sit and dance fine, which is why I said it runs a little large. I love the midi overlay - so flattering. It's hard to tell, but this dress does have a slight peplum in the overlay, which I didn't love, but overall didn't make a huge difference.
Perfect pencil skirt. I rented this for a night out with the matching strapless top, but then held on to the skirt and wore for work several times! It goes with everything!!

I didn't notice from the product photos that the name of the designer is woven/embossed all over the skirt as a pattern. Not what I wanted. I thought it was plain black. The medium fit well for me, currently a size 8.

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear in the city
links_reviews_text: I think the specific skirt I received had stretched out waist elastic because it fit well everywhere on my body but the waist was suuuuuper big so I had to wear it with a clip in the back.

Loved this dress - elegant and sexy! I wore it to a formal wedding and loved having pockets, as well as the detail on the waist. The only bummer is that I probably would've been a little more comfortable in a 38P and that size was not available; the 36P was snug at the waist but otherwise comfortable. I did need some fashion tape to hold the girls in place, and a stick-on bra. I got tons of compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color in a classic style
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a gala. Beautiful dress but a little snug in the waist and very low cut. Order size up and have your fashion tape ready.

Loved this dress! Zipper was a little tricky, and was easier with help. I'm 5'4, wore 4 1/2" heels and this just grazed the floor in the regular length. Fit snug at the waist while trying to zip, but perfectly comfortable once on. I wore no bra and used no tape, I didn't worry about any slippage. No issues seated during dinner, or dancing later in the evening. Truly a stunning dress, and I loved the less common color.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful concept but just not the one
links_reviews_text: I loved the idea of this gown and had high hopes that the plunging neckline would add some drama to what could otherwise have been a boring maxi dress. Unfortunately there was just too much I didn't like about this one. The material is a drapey washed silk feel beautiful but not lined, it didn't seem sheer but could be clingy. The size 8 was super tight at the ribs and blouse-y with the deep plunge so that I would have needed to pin or tape the top down. The L was super long compared to other L dresses I've ordered from here so you'll need platform or Higher heels if your 5'9" or under. The green was gorgeous though and worth a try this just didn't work for my body!
I wore this for an Indian wedding that I didn't have a saree for. It worked out beautifully, easy to dance in, a beautiful color, lots of compliments.
Loved the thick waist band - helped cinch in my waist. I'm small chested so it was loose up top but overall it was very classy and comfortable

The dress was beautiful and luxurious - the color and fabric were top notch. I had to use fashion tape to cover more of my bra area (which was a little tricky and took away the wow factor a bit), but the deep v neck would have been stunning on a woman with a flatter chest.

Dress was long, but only came to my ankles. Would recommend for some 6'1" or shorter including heel height. Luckily with the photo shoot this was used for it didn't make much difference. Very low cut dress and a beautiful color.

I loved this dress. The material was beautiful and lighter than it looked online. I felt classy and a bit sassy at the same time. Only reason I couldn't give 5 stars was because of the indecent exposure that happened every time I sat down. Don't forget your tape.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved the dress - sexy, yet elegant, and very flattering for my body type.
links_reviews_text: The 36R I received was missing a stitch on the front envelope structure so it sort of flopped over and the zipper was extremely stiff. Fortunately, the 38R still fit great! I absolutely loved the dress and the color really complimented my skin tone. The dress was form fitting, but not too tight, and hit my waist perfectly. The front plunges low, but not too low where it was inappropriate. The dress was very sexy and sophisticated. 10/10 will rent again!

Everything about this dress was perfect. I'm 5'3'', about 150 lbs and a 36B. The size 40R was the perfect fit with 3" heels. The dress was super sophisticated, comfortable and even came with pockets. I absolutely loved it and would definitely wear again!
Loved wearing this dress! The color is unique, the fit is flattering and it has pockets! Highly recommend pasties instead of a bra and maybe even tape if you are going to be dancing ;)

This was a gorgeous dress but it did not fit my body type. I'm more straight and long, and often struggle with dresses fitting my rib cage. It was so elegant but did not zip. I'm a us size 6. The photo is of the 38. I also tried on the 40r and it still didn't zip and was pooling on the ground.
I wore it for our office Xmas party. Very elegant. I received so many compliments. Material is beautiful. Highly recommend. Considering wearing it to my best friends wedding

The sizing was odd, it was very fitted around my mid rib cage but not tapered down my legs. The cut was much lower than pictures and I didn't fill it out enough. The fabric was textured and heavy, so body tape was not holding. I ended up wearing my wrap most of the night to prevent spillage.

links_reviews_title: I will definitely rent this dress again, it was very elegant! I love the dark green color
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner for a formal wedding and got so many compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Black tie at an art museum gala
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable! Pockets were awesome. Neckline was more revealing than I thought but it felt sophisticated because the rest of the dress was so modest.

links_reviews_title: The size I needed wasn't available.
links_reviews_text: I requested this dress as a replacement for another that was returned late and didn't make my initial order. My measurements put me right on the cusp of 4/6 and I have an hour glass shape. The 38R was out of stock so I took my chances on the 36R. It arrived right on time and Tiana the REP I spoke with was so helpful. Unfortunately, the 36R was just a tiny bit too small to zip around one of my ribs but looked so perfect everywhere else. The 38R would've been perfect. I didn't end up wearing any of my choices as the sizes I needed weren't available but it was a fun experience renting and I WILL rent this dress again in the perfect size.

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit for an hourglass body. I felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this dress. At first I was a little hesitant in grabbing this since it's a low plunging neckline. However, God bless a good bra as I was able to flaunt some side-boob for the first time EVER. The dress is a perfect fit from the waist down. Hugs perfectly well at the waist and then flows down naturally. I'm 5'6 and wore 3" heels. Dress fell perfectly and was not too short or too long. And there's pockets!! I was comfortable and I felt incredible! Excellent forest green color too.

The dress looks just like the picture- I was worried how the envelope band in the middle would fit but it's cute. Color is gorgeous dark green and not too light or too heavy (perfect for a fall black tie wedding). When you sit down though or if you're not paying attention, it really folds down and kind of lumps up- not great for pics! I got an 8 and it was a bit too big (no 6 available). I'm 5'8" and wore flats, it just hits he floor. I think if i had the 6 the top problem wouldn't have been so annoying.

Such a beautiful green color - and I'm a sucker for anything with pockets! Definitely go down a size for the backup. There was a lot of room in the chest and shoulders area, and even in the waist. The Regular length is perfect, and I'm 5'3", and I wore 3" heels. I typically wear a size 2. It can be worn with a standard bra, which is a plus! If you have a smaller bust, fashion tape would be a good idea to keep the top down. Especially with the plunging neckline! The rectangular piece right below the bust is thicker, and didn't lay flat - but going down a size will fix that. Perfect for a Fall or Winter wedding! Gold jewelry will accent the green as well!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Runs small, especially for an athletic body type
links_reviews_text: I was SO excited about this dress and ordered the recommended size. I'm usually a perfect American size 4, so I was surprised that this dress did not fit. The bodice was too tight, and the zipper wouldn't zip up all the way. I have an athletic frame, with relatively wide shoulders and ribcage for my 34A chest. The dress was beautifully made and the fabric was gorgeous . . . very lux, despite the absence of ornament. The sculptural details at the shoulders and waist were lovely, and I think this gown would be a great option for those with slightly narrower shoulders or torsos! Happily, I ordered another style as a back-up, and that size 2 fit perfectly. So, if in doubt, be sure to order a backup size or style.

Great understated elegance for a formal summer wedding - even with the very low heel I prefer. The deep V is a little scary at first try on, but use Lift It Up with the straightest side vertical, and dress tape set about 1" in along sides of V. Danced & looked great for hours!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing - too tight & too deep
links_reviews_text: The color is gorgeous but the dress itself is hard to get on (side zipper) so if you're planning to wear this, do your makeup AFTER you get into this dress. The chest portion is low, and I was expecting this, but I wasn't expecting the dress cut in the front to be close to the bottom of my sternum! The length was great for a petite girl but I ended up not wearing this dress because it wasn't super comfortable and the front slit didn't suit me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, best for longer torsos.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an outdoor wedding that I was in. The dress was beautiful, and I really liked the dark green color. The neckline is quite low, so I ended up using double-sided tape to make sure I didn't accidentally flash someone. This dress would probably work better on someone who is taller and who has a longer torso, as it wouldn't quite lay flat on me and give me good coverage at the same time. I wore 3" wedges, but still had to lift the dress whenever I walked. Would rent again in a jam, but wish there was a petite version.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for black tie, and for a professional setting
links_reviews_text: I am typically a 4-6. I wore the 38 L and it was perfect. I wore this for a black tie gala that I was attending with colleagues and industry people. Sometimes I feel like it's hard to find a dress that feels glamorous but still conservative/appropriate enough for a professional work setting. This dress hit the mark. Perfect neckline, beautiful color and fit, and very comfortable (with pockets!) I would definitely recommend and wear it again myself.
I didn't wear it as I couldnt do up the side zip
Great style....too small. Great fabric. Couldn’t close the zipper
Like other reviewers, I LOVED this dress style and it fit perfectly everywhere, but I could not close the zipper.

links_reviews_title: I tried on but did not wear this dress for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of this dress in photos, but there is no undergarment (or even tape) that could have made this dress fit me. I'm 5'5", 150 lbs, C cup and the bands of fabric that made up the top of this dress just gaped open, like all the way open. Maybe if my torso were 6 inches longer it would have worked, but as it was it was unwearable. Obviously will not post a photo.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a charity gala for work.
links_reviews_text: I would absolutely rent this again. I loved the rich green color and lightweight material. The pockets were a plus! I'm tall (5'10") and appreciated the longer size available - it wasn't too long and gave me the much needed couple of inches to wear heels. The cut also gave me a nice waistline. I'm flat chested and had some trouble with the bust, but a little double sided tape did the trick. The neckline doesn't accommodate a bra, so be prepared to go without. Beautiful dress.
The color was a perfect deep green. I have a smaller chest, so the low V cut top was not an issue for me. I used fashion tape to keep the top secured to my body.

This dress could have been incredible...if I were four inches shorter. The side zipper ran adjacent to my ribcage rather than my waist, and as a result wouldn't close. I guess the dress was intended for someone shorter or with smaller ribs.

This forrest green color is gorgeous, and I loved the envelope detailing in the front. Unfortunately it was way too long, and I was nowhere close to filling out the bust. I considered pinning/taping the front but know I would have been worrying with it all night. The side zipper also looked like it'd seen better days. If you're a tall drink of water (I am not), this might be the dress for you!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and super comfortable dress. Even has pockets
links_reviews_text: Again, love the length, pockets, fit! absolutely stunning
I rented this for a NY wedding and didn't even use it. The fit is unusual and did hug my body in the right places. I returned it with no use.
This dress runs quite small in the worse and quite large in the bust. It was so low and large on top that I couldn't wear it without it being inappropriate.

The dress is unusual in its cut and the green is a beautiful deep color. You definitely need a special low cut bra if you're going to wear one at all. I would say that this dress is probably best suited for women with smaller breasts and, while beautiful, the cut of the dress might not be best for hourglass shapes.

This dress is such a great color, still formal but a little more exciting than a black number. It is quite low cut, I ended up having to pin it near the bottom of the neckline. I was a little disappointed in the length - if you have tall heals it might be a good idea to order the long. The regular still worked for me, just had to switch to a little bit lower shoes. Overall, loved it - and it has pockets!

links_reviews_title: I worked as a host shadow for an in-town awards ceremony and this gown allowed me to move freely
links_reviews_text: Very figure flattering and I felt amazing all evening

This dress was great. Based on other reviews of ladies around my size, I only ordered the 12, even though I'm usually in a 14. No regrets. The 12 was a really comfortable fit—no pulling or tightness, nothing loose, nothing needing readjusting. Just flattering and comfy. Loved having pockets too! The bold pattern is a lot of fun and pairs well with all kinds of accessories. Would completely rent this one again.
Very cute! Fabric doesn't wrinkle so this was good to go right off the hanger. Pockets are super cute and very flattering. Easy to zip and go!

Wore this for hosting a Baby Shower. It's was a great dress. Thick yet comfortable material. Pockets are always a plus! I have a small waist for a typical size 8, so I cinched it is with a belt to feel more comfortable. Great tea length for an event where you need to move around and not worry about showing your booty. #babyshower #tealength #pockets

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, bump-friendly, compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my birthday party - I loved this dress, and got sooo many compliments in it! It was a little longer and a little thicker fabric than I was expecting, but when it snows in Chicago in April, those things are really great! I'm five months pregnant and there was plenty of space for my bump while still providing a fitted feel in the top. Plus - pockets!! Would definitely recommend!
This would have been perfect if they had the dress in my size, unfortunately it was too big so it did not work out for me. I do this this is true to size as I typically wear an 8.

links_reviews_title: Elegance and comfort ALL in one!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size. However, it was longer than expected but it did not take away from the dress for me. I LOVED the pockets to hide my phone and lipstick...without ANY notice! HOW? I was complemented all night and was comfortable eating, sitting, and standing...I would recommend this dress if you are wanting comfort and elegance all in one!

It was my 35th birthday party, and this dress made me feel really special. It was comfortable, stylish, and very easy to wear. The pockets were super helpful - deep and barely noticeable. I didn't even carry a bag! The fabric was heavy, as others have said, but being spring in MN I was glad for the bit of extra warmth. It was a little long on me, but I'm only 5'3." Kinda wish I own it. I would definitely rent it if I were you!

This dress fit perfectly. You can wear a normal bra. It is fitted to the perfect spot and then flows out to accommodate for a small baby bump or big meal. It has pockets. You can dress it up or down. Loved this dress. Thicker material, almost like a lightweight denim.

links_reviews_title: Great fit! Pockets are always a plus!
links_reviews_text: Wore a size 4 which is pretty true to size. It was my backup dress that I ended up wearing over my first choice.
Worn to a daytime wedding, loved the A-line cut and print.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for family photos. It was comfortable on a humid summer day and the pockets were great!
links_reviews_text: It was a snug fit, but not too tight. Hit me just below the knee on my 5'6" frame.

I wore this for an outdoor wedding in June. The material is thick, so I didn't feel like I needed to worry about sweating through the dress. Overall fit was amazing...I have bigger hips, and loved that this was fitted in the top, but flared away from my hips. I got compliments all night, and felt great!

This was the most flattering, comfortable, easy spring/summer/early fall dress I've had so far on my unlimited subscription--I HAD to buy it and am delighted it's in my permanent rotation. I'm usually between a 12 and 14 (and 34G) and found the 12 to fit perfectly. As you can see, POCKETS, and it works with chucks (or toms or flats) and I wore it with cute blue heels during work too. Fabric is thick and the lining is silky and luxurious. Enjoy this one, friends!!

links_reviews_title: Wore to church and was a hit
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to church on a super hot day. Comfy and roomy fit. Thick material. Easy to zip
Fit well in the chest so it wasn't frumpy with the longer length. Overall i really liked it! Needed something a little more conservative and this dress worked really well!

I'm petite, so this fit me more midi than knee length on the model, but I was fine with that. This is a super quality dress and material. Thick but not hot. The pockets add an extra touch, but are barely there and fun. I'm a standard size 2 and this fit great, if even ever so slightly large. I would go down a size if you're in between or uncertain, as there's plenty of room in the hip/thigh area. I would rent again.
Very comfortable, lightweight. Really liked this for a spring wedding.

I wore this dress for my bridal shower!It was such a comfortable dress and such a beautiful fit! I loved everything about this dress! I could've had it maybe a little smaller but it really was so fun and perfect! My fiancé absolutely LOVED this dress too!

This was a back up dress but it was awesome. Loved the slightly heavier material and lining. Wouldn't be afraid to wear on a windy day. I paired it with a red skinny belt since it needed a little something extra. Also it has good size pockets that I was able to fit my phone without messing up the lines of the dress and looking awkward. Just might rent it again!

I rented this dress for my brother's college graduation and it was perfect! The style was great and very flattering! It was also very comfortable and I loved the pockets! I usually wear a 12 and found this to be true to size. It is a bit of a heavy fabric so not ideal for extremely warm weather but overall I loved this dress and got a number of compliments!

I normally don't wear this style of dress but I'm glad I did. The cut is fitted in the bust and waist and flares nicely at the bottom. It's very comfortable and effortless. I initially thought the pattern would be too busy, but it isn't. My only complaint is that the neckline borders on being too low cut for the workplace. Other than that, I love this dress.
Really enjoyed this dress- fabric is sturdy enough to keep shape. Loved the pocket placement. A little tight across chest, but I have a broad back ad it still fit. Will likely buy forever.
True to size, comfortable, glamorous, flowy and summery dress! And pockets!!! :)

This dress is super flattering! It hid my stomach well and gave me a nice small waist (my picture doesn't do it justice). Fabric is thick so it doesn't wrinkle, easy to wear with a normal bra, and of course, nice deep pockets! It was a touch tight on my rib cage and under my arm pits, but I barely noticed. I wore this to a baptism and it was perfect for the occasion.

Pretty true to size. I usually wear between an 8 and 10, and chose the 8 here because the pocket on the 10 wasn't properly sewn down. It fit a bit snug, but not uncomfortably so, and nothing a pair of spanx couldn't help. Great fabric, great shape, hit a couple inches past the knee. Would totally buy this dress if I could. And pockets!
Wore this to a reunion in the summer. The dress is very comfortable and the cut is very flattering for all body types. I got quite a number of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wanted to dress up for work.
