links_reviews_text: Rented the 14 with the 12 as back up and the 14 fit great. Since the skirt length is below the knee and I'm 5'1", this fitted like a midi on me which is a style I really like. I wore it with a cardigan and leather heeled sandals and received many compliments on the cheery pattern. I loved having pockets for keeping my phone and work keys. The material is thick and comfortable. I felt a little warm in the dress, but the material is breathable - didn't break a sweat! Absolutely love it and will rent again!
This dress was super comfortable, striking, and, best of all, it. has. pockets. Pockets in a dress are amazing!!
Runs a little small in the bodice but the material is forgiving and good zipper! Loved the dress
I just loved this dress! It felt great on and was comfortable! I would definitely rent this one again or own it!

I got this dress to wear on my birthday at work. It was absolutely beautiful and I received compliments all day. The fit is fantastic with the only exception being that it did cut into my armpits a bit. Other than that I highly recommend this dress! I am between a 4 and 6 but wore the 6. The 6 was less tight in the ribcage and arms.

I LOVED this dress! Great "fit and flare dress". The neckline was beautiful while still being conservative and I was comfortable the whole day. Love the drape of this fabric as well. May be a little long for shorter women.
It fit great and had plenty of room for the chest. It was a little longer than I would normally wear but wasn't too akward. The pockets were a huge plus too.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, stylish dress! Wonderful, useful accessories! Wish I could buy it!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my engagement photos and they turned out beautifully! The dress was comfortable yet stylish and it went great with my white pumps! I also loved the bra strap clips because I absolutely hate when my bra strap shows and would have been frustrating to deal with during the photo shoot. I actually wanted to buy the dress but it is currently not an option on the Rent the Runway website. Hopefully it will be an option soon!

links_reviews_title: Hard to go wrong with this one!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of this dress, the length, and the fabric. Pockets were a bonus!

I feel like I could have gotten a size smaller. The waist seemed kinda big on me but I was able to fix that with an obi belt. The dress itself is a very pretty textured cotton and has a good amount of weight to it. The pockets were great and I liked how I could wear a normal bra with it.
Wore this to a work related conference. Lots of compliments. Comfy, flattering, had pockets! Great length. Nice for hourglass shape.

links_reviews_title: Seriously thinking about buying this dress. It's perfect and feminine and has pockets!!
links_reviews_text: Looked great right away and at the end of the day. Super comfy with tea length and pockets!!!! There are snaps to keep bra straps in place too. One of the best designed and fitting dresses ever. Loads of compliments to boost!

I loved this dress. It is colorful and strapless which is great for summer but it's still professional and reserved. I wore it for an open house and loved it. It also has some hidden pockets which was great because I never have a place to keep my phone. I would totally get this one again.

I wore this dress to my graduation ceremony from graduate school. It was very comfortable - I wore the size 2 because of my small bust and I wanted to hide my bra. Pro: Very flattering, goes with any color shoe, no one else will be wearing it or really anything similar (great pattern), got many compliments on it! Appropriate for weddings, holidays, work etc. Con: The zipper was distracting as the "metal" could be felt on my back (I was sitting through a graduation ceremony). I would not select this dress for a date or a night out on the town (one girl's opinion)! I am 5'6", 36A, 135lbs and pear shaped, conservative style
Fun dress, fit well with a cute flare. Wore for a holiday party. Need a strapless bra, the sides were a little lower than expected so had to make sure it didn't show through. Loved it!

Went to RTR SF store the day before a gala I volunteered at. I liked this dress, but felt the crepe shell was a little baggy. No small available. I pinned the inside at my waist to cinch it a little. I sat for a lot of the evening and it wrinkled a ton. Also stretched out a lot. There is a slit in the back center that goes very high so my spanx kept showing. Lastly, for some reason the dress kept twisting on my body so the slit was off center. Overall, great color and silhouette, poor quality.
just ok

links_reviews_title: I felt good about how I looked because of my dress and the wonderful event we attended
links_reviews_text: Awesome! Dresses arrived in perfect shape. The entire process was easy. Returning the dress was simple and easy. Thank you

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was so unique!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. Great length. Fabric has some give in it. Very unique design and I had many complements on it.
Did not fit. For a full bust it wasnt covering up chest properly. Would have tried to go up a size and see if it was any better

links_reviews_title: This is a very pretty dress.
links_reviews_text: I love the length of the front of the dress and how it falls. The slit at the back of the dress is high up.
I wore this a wedding in Feb and it was perfect. I would not recommend this for summer since it's so heavy. I got a ton of compliments and it was so comfortable.
It was a little big but was comfortable .I got lots of compliments on it

I am 5' 4", currently 170 lbs (20 pounds heavier than normal). I was very nervous about how any dress would fit! I definitely thought I would need the 10 but I ended up wearing the 8. The style of the skirt was very forgiving... the majority of my weight is in my lower half and this dress hid that wonderfully. The dress is pretty conservative but I still got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Skirt shape was nice, wish it had fitted sleeves
links_reviews_text: Dress is cute but unless your hand is on your waist, the bell sleeves give you a kind of blocky silhouette. The lining didn’t show through as much as I hoped, so it was more of an entirely black dress that blended into the dark photo booth background.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Want to wear it everyday
links_reviews_text: Got a size 20, larger than I normally get but I like the fit! Super comfy, and of course super cute. I'm seriously thinking about buying it.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, comfortable and high quality
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, high quality fabric. Forgiving in the hips because of the shape. Slightly tight in the shoulder area but I still wore my normal size.
This dress was an easy beautiful fit. The long sleeves were perfect for a cold Christmas Party. Perfect length not too short.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a semi-formal wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, a little tight across the bust, but was very comfortable for a long evening.

links_reviews_title: Classy... I'm always looking for something to complement my body and this dress was it!! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. I've recently lost some weight so I should have sizes down... but always scared to go too small. I'd rather be a bit big.

links_reviews_title: This dress has two layers of lace over cream satin. The lace is beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I rented the 14 and 16w. The 14 was way too small in the bust and the 16w was extremely big in the bust. I ended up wearing the 14. I couldn't zip the back up all the way so I wore the dress partially zipped. You could not tell it wasn't zipped up. Not the best dress for big busted women. The dress is very well made and the details are beautiful. The lace is incredible, it has two layers on top of cream satin.

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect dress for winter
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a date night with my husband on new years eve. I got so many compliments, i was shocked because its just a simple black dress. The material is very heavy so perfect for winter. The sleeves were roomy and the length of the dress was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Many compiments. Liked the bell sleeve
links_reviews_text: Fit comfortably. I didnt like where it hit on my waist. Felt a little like it made me look bottom heavy. Felt comfortable, many compliments

This dress was perfect for my work cocktail event. The bell sleeves and the drama of the lace and the fun full skirt made it a perfect pick for the night. I had to wear the 10 because the 8 wouldn't come close to zipping due to my chest area. If you're busty, definitely size up! The sleeves and shoulder area are a bit constraining so if you need lots of arm movement, size up!
Loved the dress, very comfortable. Will definitely rent dresses in the future.

links_reviews_title: Conservative with a hint of flair
links_reviews_text: This dress was true to size. I've actually rented it twice now (I should probably buy it because I love it so much). I wore it as the auctioneer at a gala and the bell sleeves were the perfect addition for someone who need to talk with their hands! I have gotten so many compliments each time I wore it!

links_reviews_title: Everyone was dressed up and looked great! This dress helped me fit right in.
links_reviews_text: I was surprised and so happy it fit, because some of the 16's I tried on in the store did not. This fit really well and even gave me a little breathing room. I really liked the lace detail and bell sleeves. The weight is a tad heavy, but it didn't bother me much other than making me feel hot for parts of the evening. My only complaint (and it's minor) is that I wish the gold lining underneath looked more gold. Most people thought it was white lining and I wanted it to really pop as black and gold. Overall, I was very pleased with the dress and received many compliments. I definitely recommend it!
Dress fit well but was very heavy.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments at my graduation!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. I loved the bell sleeves and sheer lace top. I wore my size down back up, mostly because the skirt had so much fabric, it looked bigger when I sized up so for that reason I would say it runs a little big, especially for the size down to fit me across the shoulders and back. Overall loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Such a classy black, lace dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING! I wore it to a black-tie wedding in DC and received so many complements. The fit was so flattering, and I felt like a princess wearing it. I am keeping my eye on this dress if it is ever available to purchase. Rent this dress! You won't be sorry... Not one bit. I can't wait to rent it again. :)

What a fabulous dress! I never realized what amazing fabric can do for a body type! This dress was gorgeous. It was so well made. It fit perfectly. It's a bit heavier so it is great for a winter event. I have a hard time finding dresses that I feel comfortable and confident in, but this covered both of those things. I had so many compliments on it. I highly recommend renting this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great compliments on the dress; warm (it was 12 degrees outside) and very flattering!
links_reviews_text: The fit was snug on top but you could still move your arms well, flares at the waist which is flattering for girls with bigger hips/bum!!! (5.4 and 130lbs)

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable. For a December work cocktail party it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. I'm 5'8" 135 lbs and I wore a size 4.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for cocktail event for work
links_reviews_text: This dress was awesome, I got so many compliments! I wore it for a cocktail event for work. It's a very thick material which was great since it was cold outside. I wore Spanx with it but didn't really need to as it's very flattering. Wish I could buy it and wear again!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a December wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wanted something with sleeves, but still youthful and fun and this dress totally delivered. I'm 5'8", so the size 6 ended up being a short, fun length on me which was a nice contrast to the high neckline and sleeves. The full skirt made the dress very comfortable for sitting and dancing. Just know that although the fabric is exquisite, some nice statement jewelry would really help it pop.
Loved! Received fabulous comments! It's heavy so gets warm.

links_reviews_title: First time renting- definitely a success!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great and I received tons of compliments. The sleeves were a bit longer on me and the fabric was very heavy, so I skipped wearing tights and it worked out perfectly on a cool fall evening. The top is sheer, so don't forget to wear a strapless bra.

This dress was gorgeous on and was comfortable to wear for 8 hours. The slip underneath was a champagne color and the lace was a heavy lace, but still breathable. The ONLY thing that was really irritating about this dress was that the dress rubbed the base of my neck really bad. But I came up with a solution before I had to wear it & ended up putting a band aid right where the dress hit my neck & you couldn't even tell. Also, I do have a small chest & I felt the 2 was rather tight for having such a small chest. The dress does not stretch at all, so I couldn't really lift my arms up too high either.
This dress is stunning but a little bulky for my petite ladies. Otherwise it fits really well. The sleeves / chest area is not flexible so definitely size up. I had to wear stickies to ensure it fit.
The fit and flare style is very forgiving and comfortable. I love the sleeves for the winter event (I won't feel like I had to wear a jacket over to keep warm!)
The dress for beautifully, material was a little stiff but the flare gave very good shape. I would rent this again.

It's a beautiful dress! All the little details! However, if you already have hips, it makes you look somewhat wide. I didn't end up wearing, and instead wore a black lace off-the-shoulder dress bought from RTR earlier this year! Both looked great, but I had some goals for that night (P.S. The dress worked).

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal work event.
links_reviews_text: I have a larger chest so I definitely went up a size (which I always do when ordering online). It was a bit loose around the waist and I did fill a bit boxy. The 20W was to tight around the bust though so I stuck with the 22W. I highly recommend this dress for a formal work event that, the dress was very appropriate and covered all the spots that NEEDED to be covered.
Was a good dress for a more formal date. Fits well, nice lace. Lining is strategically placed. Flattering.

links_reviews_title: It was a Bat Mitzvah for a little girl I adore.
links_reviews_text: The material was uncomfortable and bulky. It was too heavy for the party I was attending.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty and warm dress for fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved the sleeves and the lace detail! Only complaint was that the top was a bit tight - something to be aware of if you have a larger chest.
This is a very heavy dress, and did not look good on me at all. It is still a very pretty dress, perhaps on a taller person.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fabric with loads of room in the chest and hips
links_reviews_text: I thought the 16 was much too large, so much that I couldn't wear it. The dress is lush and well made. I simply had to wear one or two sizes smaller than the 16. It had fistfuls of fabric extra in my back and around my middle - and I'm an apple shape.
The fit was great - true to size. It was very comfortable! Perfect for a wedding in the city in December, a thicker material so kept me warm.

links_reviews_title: The dress is heavy and frumpy. Not the look I was going for.
links_reviews_text: The dress is heavy and frumpy. Not the look I was going for. However, I will say the lace detail at the top of the dress is well made.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but heavy and bulky!! Didn’t wear!
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric! Looked like I weighed +10#! Didn’t wear!! The 2 was a little big but I looked like I was wearing a 8. Pretty dress on the hanger but was not fitted at all.
Easy to move in and comfy to wear, tons of compliments!

SO many compliments on this dress AND the photos afterwards. If you're short like me, you'll need hem tape. Zipper tends to stick on the lowest third. But very easy to wear and not very revealing if you're well-endowed like me. I wore a strapless for some extra lift but you could go braless. I wouldn't suggest this for a warm weather event though, as the material is thick.

This dress was perfect, beautiful, COMFORTABLE, and simply perfect. I am typically a 6, but occasionally can wear a 4 in a dress. I'm glad I ordered both sizes because the 6 was a little baggy. The 4 fit like a glove and was still comfortable. I received a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy, great dress for formal wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved the cut of the dress with the sleeve and slit on the bottom. Stretchy dress so it's easy to dance in and it's forgiving. Got a ton of compliments

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a winery gala - the theme was the Peacock Ball, and this color dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly. It was too long, and had to buy hem tape (I'm 5'4" and wore heels that are about 2.5". ) Fabric is a bit heavy--which I liked, because the dress isn't flimsy. I'm 57, and loved how it fit my curves, with being too revealing. Got lots of compliments! Would definitely wear this again!!

links_reviews_title: A festival gown, glamorous and memorable.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a Christmas ball. It was great not to be in just another red dress. This green was different, many compliments.

This dress was one of my favorite rentals so far. My husband agreed too :) It definitely didn't disappoint for a Fall wedding. The material is thick and the dress fit like a glove. It was a little long but it wasn't really an issue when I had to walk or dance. I didn't have to wear a bra and spanx/shape wear was optional. Beautiful and elegant gown!!!!

The dress fit was good, I'm usually a 2/4 and ended up wearing the 2. I wish I had gotten the 0/2 because the 2 was just a little bit big. I wear a 32DDD and didn't have to wear a bra. Received tons of compliments and felt like a million bucks!!

links_reviews_title: Yes, you can dance in it
links_reviews_text: Dress felt well made and fit pretty nicely. Usually hard to fit me since I am pretty tiny (4” heels and still touched the floor) but this dress did its job! Withstood 5 hours of dancing!

This was sent to me because one of my backup sizes was unavailable to ship. If they sent me the size up, I think it would have hidden my stomach well because of its kind of thick material. I don't think I would have needed a bra. Really cool looking dress glad I got to try it on, thanks RTR.

links_reviews_title: Lovely But Not For The Long Torso'ed
links_reviews_text: Incredible color, fitted in all the right places but pretty comfortable, fun asymmetric top. However it's fitted nature means all your parts have to be where it's accounting for them to be, and this dress wanted my bum several inches higher than it is, so I had extra fabric around my lower-waist and not much wiggle room round the bottom. Wish my torso were slightly shorter, it's a great gown otherwise!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and received some many compliments
links_reviews_text: It was perfect for me. The fabric wasn’t too tight
This dress fit perfectly! It was true to size but even had room for bra and spanx if needed. Didn't fall down at all when dancing and got compliments the whole night. Felt super confident wearing it.
This dress is made for bust and curves. It has built in stays and lining that keeps the curves in check. The material flows over your curves and the neckline accentuates the cleavage.

First time using Rent the Runaway and I was not disappointed. Rented this dress for my brother in laws wedding this past weekend and I felt beautiful. I would say it runs true to size! I wore Spanx underneath to smooth as much as possible and I didn't need to bra which was a HUGE plus. I've gained some weight the past few months but I felt like this dress was made for curvy girls! The color is more beautiful in person and the length was perfect with heels. I wasn't wearing them in this picture so it gave it a bit of a train, I'm 5'3. Although, the stitching on the one strap was coming out and the side boning kept poking me I recommend this dress! I can't wait for my next big event. Get the dress! You won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was my first choice and was the size that I usually wear on a normal day. My favorite part of the dress was the slit. It wasn't too high or too low. I was worried about how that would look since I'm almost 5"3. The heels that I wore with it were about 3.5 inches. The only con was that it was a teeeny tiny bit snug around the stomach but if you wear shape wear, you'll be fine. Overall, I was extremely happy with this dress and Rent the Runway. This was my first time renting a dress and I would definitely do it again. The process was seamless!

This was my backup to the backup dress and it was amazing! Loved the dramatic neckline with the diagonal, one-shoulder strap and the rich, jewel-tone color make it an elegant, yet eye-catching dress. The fabric was heavy and sturdy but did not make me hot. A simple strapless bra worked well too. Loved this dress and would wear it again if I needed to!

links_reviews_title: The Perfect Black Tie Wedding Attire
links_reviews_text: The fit, color, quality, and everything overall about this dress are done no justice in photos. It's absolutely gorgeous, the slit (not seen here) is perfect, the one shoulder strap detail gives it a real wow factor. People could not stop complimenting the cut and the color. I normally wouldn't pick something so form fitting because I can be a bit curvier in the hip area, and it ran true to size and the material has some give. In fact, that's about the only thing that deterred me from wearing the size 12 I ordered, just so I wouldn't be too self conscious all night. Just perfect for my first RTR rental.

links_reviews_title: Didn't actually wear this, but a beautiful dress!!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup style, and I didn't end up wearing it, but still gorgeous! The colour is SO much better in person! I did find that the built in padding was a bit big for me, and because of that it wasn't as supportive as I would've liked. It also fell a bit low on me, even though the rest of the dress was snug. Still a gorgeous choice!!

Loved this dress. I'm in between sizes but the 0R fit perfectly. Note if it is a snug fit and you are OCD like me you will notice the bodice liner leaves a line but I was the only one that noticed. Not my usual color but turned out great. #fashiongala

links_reviews_title: Lovely gown for my performance! Great rental price!
links_reviews_text: I rented the size 2R and the 0R was my backup size. I wound up wearing the size 0. (I'm 5'3 and about 110 lbs, with a banana body shape.) The dress was too long, but otherwise, no problems with the fit! I used hem tape to shorten it for the night because I need to wear a shorter heel (no more than 2") when I perform. Bottom line, if you are on the petite side and need to wear shorter heels, then use some hem tape! So easy! Otherwise, you'll need some pretty high heels (my platforms were the perfect height, but I couldn't use them, of course). Thank you, Rent the Runway - my second rental experience was great!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove, received so many compliments on how unique the color and style it was.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful blue green color, supportive fit, this was my backup and I loved it!

links_reviews_title: WOW! This dress was a dream!!
links_reviews_text: I wore the 14R and it fit perfectly! It hugged in all the right places and I felt so confident in it! The material has some stretch to it which helped when dancing all night! I received so many compliments on the gown. The color is amazing, a beautiful teal color! I will definitely be renting this gown again in the future. I did not want to return it :)

links_reviews_title: True blue! A gorgeous dress that will make you feel super sexy!
links_reviews_text: I have to admit - when I saw this dress online, I wasn't floored. And when it arrived a few days later, I was still a little "Meh." But, putting the dress on was key. It was a perfect fit that hugged every curve. I attended a dinner at my Alma Mater and the compliments flowed all night long. I loved the slit and the one shoulder look was simply perfect. As usual, I hated to return the dress and would absolutely wear it again!

This dress was so flattering and the color is gorgeous! Perfect for an event where you know everyone else will be wearing black. The built in bra cups had plenty of support, the only problem is that the boning shows through the waist of the dress. You couldn't tell in photos but it was pretty visible in person. Other than that, great dress!

- Fits true to size - Thick enough fabric to feel substantial - Slit in the skirt hits right above the knee, I had to be careful sitting at dinner since it rode up a little - Wore to charity gala and got a lot of compliments on the color, try it out!

The dress fit perfect. I do wish it had a little more hold on the midsection, but was otherwise very flattering. Otherwise the dress was perfect. I would recommend getting shapewear if that's something you might require just to make it more seamless. LOVED the slit. Tasteful but sexy. Got lots of compliments! I'm in between 5"6' & 5"7' and was the perfect length

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a very special day.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size. I received lots of great compliments!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable! Felt Beautiful in it and had lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: no problem as all.

This dress is beautiful in color! It fit me like a glove, just like it was made for me. It held everything in (hello, tummy fluff) and it gave me much more of a svelte shape than I have in real life, ha! I loved the way it curved and flowed. It was comfortable at all times, from walking to sitting to dancing. I was so sad to send it back!

I wore this great dress to a women's gala. It was a perfect contrast to the red carpet. The color was so complimenting to my skin color. The fit of the dress was very true to size and made somebody like me, who is quite small on the busy size feel super confident. It really accentuated my curves and hugged me in the right places. Great rental!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a larger bust! So comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a black tie wedding, I received a ton of compliments on the dress specifically on the color which is beautiful! Being 5'3" the regular was long and required a 3-4 inch heel and was just hitting the floor. At 180 lbs and a 40DD I wore the 16R just fine but could have probably pulled off the 14R as I actually had a bit of extra room in top. Hard to tell if it was stretched out, etc. All around great dress! The slit hit just right when walking! Would rent again!
Loved the dress will use the service again.

I’m 5’3” at 140lb and wear a 36DDD/E. I normally have to get a size 12 for bridesmaids dresses then get everything except the chest area altered so I was worried about wearing the size 8. The dress was a perfect fit though! Material is stretchy and the length was just right with my heels. I was comfortable all night and received tons of compliments. My husband was ready to buy the dress, ha! Definitely recommend!
The dress was gorgeous and I felt really nice in it. I felt the slit went up my leg a lot more than I expected

links_reviews_title: Classy and Sophisticated! Danced the night away at this Holiday Formal!
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress but it was my second choice. I should have went smaller as it fits bigger. In areas where it should be a true size fit there was slack. A size 0 would have been a perfect fit for me, however I never wear a size 0. So that's a first. I usually do well in sizing with RTR and this was my first dress I would've preferred a smaller size had I known it fit bigger. Although the dress ran bigger in size the length was PERFECT as I am 5'10 and didn't get a Long for length! Overall, my night was still Great and I felt GORGEOUS! #HolidayGala #Christmas #Formal

I rented this dress for a work holiday party after my first option fell through! This was a great option and I was very impressed with the garment bag that my dresses came in! Would highly recommend this for a future event! The dress itself was a little bit bigger but nothing fashion tape couldn't fix. Great service and shipping time as well! Very happy with this rental!

links_reviews_title: Excellent fit with lots of compliments all night long! Felt like a movie star.
links_reviews_text: The fit for this dress was perfect, I am normally a 10 or 12 in dresses and this fit all my curves in the right way. The built-in corset is a plus so you don't have to worry about having to wear a weird bra. This went perfectly with a pair of large drop earrings. You will feel sexy and sophisticated all night long, guaranteed! (FYI: The only thing about the particular dress that I had, there was a wire poking out of the bodice that kept scratching/poking my rib cage, I had to put a couple bandaids over it to keep myself from getting super scratched up, but it was an easy fix and I was comfortable for the whole event).
Perfect fit. Color was great! Loved this dress and felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: Color, slit and design at the top were all nice features of the dress
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, fit very well. Would definitely recommend. Was long for me, however I'm 5'2 - made it work with tall heels.

I got this dress hoping it would work good with my bump for an army ball. And it looked amazing! I was so happy with this dress. It had the perfect amount of stretch to it which was good for me, with the right amount of support.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to Prom (I am a teacher and Prom coordinator).
links_reviews_text: Glamorous, elegant, and comfortable. It is fitted but not overly tight. Length was perfect in 3-4 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly and the slit was bigger than i thought which is what i wanted!
links_reviews_text: Best fitting dress! didn't disappoint at all!

links_reviews_title: I wore this gown to a company holiday party. I got tons of compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress runs a little small. I'm normally a 4/6 and this was a 6R and SNUG. It is a little long, I had 4 inch heals and still found myself lifting it a little to walk across a room (I'm 5'4 and 135lbs). But overall a gorgeous dress that received compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: I always love rent the runway!
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress! The only small complaint I had about it was it twisted. The side seams would end up moving and I would have to twist it back to my sides. I had another dress do that too. Maybe is was just a coincidence or the same material or I should have worn the bigger size maybe....?? Do not let that keep you from renting this dress though. It was very classy and I didn't see another one like it! Happy renting!

This was actually my backup style. But, I wore it because my first choice was too small. Little did I know...this was "the one" all along. I loved the fit and the high quality material! I was worried that the slit would be unprofessional for a work event, but it was perfect...elegant and classy.

I didn't love this dress when I first tried it on, but with sparkly heels, jewelry and an updo, it felt more special. Easy to wear: didn't need a bra, the seam along the waist hid post-holiday belly. fabric is thick but stretchy and comfortable to wear all night and dance in. The length was a touch long on me even with 4 inch heels, but the side slit meant I didn't trip or step on the front.

I loved everything about this dress! So classy with just the right subtle details to make it stunning. I always wear a size 0 and ordered the 2 after reading reviews. The size 0L was perfect. I'm a 30DD and I originally thought the top was going to be too snug. But once it was zipped (needed some help) it was perfect. Felt custom made. The fabric has just the right amount of give. I was completely comfortable all night....danced for hours. No tugging and adjusting. The length was just right with 4 inch heels. I'm about 5'7" and if I wore anything less than 4 in heels it would have been too long. I would absolutely rent this dress again!

This dress fit great and was perfect for the charity gala we attended. I'm 5'7", 129 lbs, 34C and wore the 4L with 3" heels and it was still long enough to touch the floor. This dress not have much give to it so if you are full busted take that into consideration. I had also ordered the 2L but would've been too tight in the busy. I felt so comfortable and confident the whole night. I accessorized with a black clutch and champagne statement earrings, bangle and peep toe heels. Would absolutely wear again!
Dress was super comfortable and very forgiving. I received my compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie formal event
links_reviews_text: The dress is very elegant and fun with the one shoulder top. I ended up wearing the size 2 and it fit like a glove, very tight (5'5" 118lbs, small on top, athletic) and was skimming the ground with 3.5" heels. The size 4 was too big on top. The dress is a nice thick material in good condition, only a faint smell of being dry cleaned constantly but nothing overwhelming. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress that was appropriate for a formal event that I attended with business colleagues.
links_reviews_text: Overall fit well, a little long in the torso, but not very noticeable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for our Christmas formal work party
links_reviews_text: The fit was slightly on the looser side, I got the Tall size which worked perfectly will heels for me at my height.

This dress is amazing! The fit was perfect and I received compliments all night! Glad for the stretch in the material. The length is perfect with 4 inch heels and I'm 5'1. So elegant! I did wear a strapless bra but didn't need it as the material is thick and very forgiving. Wish I had bought it!

I rented this dress for a formal military ball during the winter and it ended up being perfect for the occasion. The neckline, slit, and overall fit were super flattering, so I felt very confident and received plenty of compliments. It's a rather simple dress, but the ruffle makes it elegant and adds some fun. I'm 5'6", 140 lbs, 34B, with an athletic build-- broad shoulders and a wide ribcage. I ordered a 6R and 8R as the 4 wasn't available. I probably needed the size 4... the bust area was a bit loose, making the dress droop slightly up top and feel a bit heavy, but it was still fine to wear. I probably could have put on a strapless bra if I was really looking to solve the drooping problem. I wore ~4 inch heels for the night which made the hem hit perfectly. I wish I could've kept the dress!
Fit true to size, no major issues with the dress, I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful well made dress . I got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Great dress
Great fit, true to size. Easy to move in. Received lots of compliments! #galaglam #classy
the long was LONG... I have a 32" inseam and needed to wear 4" heels. Unless you are really really tall probably don't need a long. Comfortable dress, very elegant.

links_reviews_title: Fit impeccably!! Loved everything about this dress!! It was a little long but it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit impeccably besides being a little too long!!

Form fitting but comfortable. I wore this for a gala and it was simple and elegant. I normally wear a 6/8 dress but this fits more like a bridesmaids dress so I sized up. Length was good with 3 inch heels. Top was a little too big but manageable.

links_reviews_title: Understated elegance for a black-tie event
links_reviews_text: After my first choice didn't work out, I wore this dress to a black-tie gala. The dress wasn't my favorite only because there wasn't really anything special or different about it -- it's pretty basic but fit nicely and did the job. The dress runs true to size and is very confirmable. Material is thicker which worked well for my late October event. I wore a regular strapless bra without any issues. I am 5'5" and the regular length fit fine with 3" heels. My one complaint was that the dress arrived dirty and wrinkled. I had to spot clean and steam it myself before wearing.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: Runs small, I'm usually a size 4 and the 6 fit perfect. I'm 5'7" so went with a L and it was a bit long with small heels but the R would have been too short. Quality is great, very comfortable.
I am 5'4" about 130 lbs and the 4R fit like a glove. The fabric does have a little stretch, which is perfect and comfortable. Love this dress so much!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a black tie wedding and it it was the perfect dress for this evening!
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress, but it was very comfortable and fit like a glove. I was very happy with this dress over all and would recommend it for any one who is looking for a classic look!

links_reviews_title: perfect as my dress for my cousins
links_reviews_text: I am a 2/4R 5'6.5' and I wore the 4R because everything said to size up. Length was perfect for no heels or shorter heels up to 3". Dress was comfortable and easy to wear. I have 32Es (or I should say thats they size they were at the date of the wedding - *period swelling*) and it was tight, but worked with no bra. The waist was loose (i have an unusually small waist) but it worked and was no less flattering with a little extra wiggle room. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect and evening was amazing.
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered the size I get for most dresses in stores but this dress fit more like bridesmaids dresses do which for me is one size larger. I am 5'10 and the long was just the perfect length for high heels or flats! Loved everything about the dress though.

Beautiful dress, made with thick material. The dress was perfect for a black tie gala and being a simple black dress I was able to add a belt and jewelry to make it stand out more. Definitely size up, I went 2 sizes up for my backup since the 10L wasn't available and it was still a little tight, but not uncomfortable. The length was great for me being 5'10", and I was able to wear a small heel, it was just a tiny bit off the ground. Got so many compliments! Would definitely wear again.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my co worker's prom and kept getting praise left and right!
links_reviews_text: It was perfect! Material was thick and comfortable. Wasn't too long either. I'm 5'3 and weight 130. I would get a 6R

I loved wearing this dress. It was comfortable and insanely flattering, and a tad va-va-voom with the slit. And although it looks like a basic black dress in the pics, it looks very special in person. SO many compliments, too! The construction was great -- heavy fabric, good proportions, nice lining. It was a tad longer than expected -- Im 5'8" and wore 4" heels and the 2L was still sweeping the ground. I also stepped on the hem a few times. I kind of liked that, though. I hate when "floor length" gowns don't actually reach the floor. I paired it with a cute palm tree embroidered clutch (also available on RtR) and gold heels.
Great fit overall but runs a little long. Very Comfortable. Would wear again

Perfect dress for a formal evening!! It runs true to size, but we recommend sizing up for backup if you're curvier, and sizing down if you are smaller framed. This one-shoulder dress is extremely comfortable. I didn't even have to wear a bra because the material is thick and stretchy, so a bra is not necessary. I wore short nude heels, which is why the dress looks a little long, but it wasn't a problem at all. It has a knee-high slit in the front, so you can show off your shoes as well! This dress is perfect for a gala or black tie wedding. You can accessorize it with any king of jewelry, but I would recommend colorful earrings to dress it up and make it more fun! With this dress, the options are unlimited!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a formal gala my husband's work had around the holidays.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable! It was snug enough to feel like nothing was going to slip out, but had enough stretch to it to make it feel like I could easily move around. I rented 3 dresses, but this was the only one that actually fit - but I probably would have ended up wearing it even if the others had fit because it was so comfortable. I felt great wearing it and would totally rent it again.

This dress fit like a glove yet was comfortable to dance in! I received tons of compliments all night. A thicker material for sure, would stick to ordering this dress for fall/winter events. My original order arrived late due to snow so this was sent to me overnight as a backup free of charge. Customer service was great. This is my 3rd RTR order and i will continue to use them.

links_reviews_title: Loved this black dress! Very classy!
links_reviews_text: First of all this was not the original dress I ordered. The first dress came in and had a defected zipper. I was so nervous because I'd never used this company before. But they were awesome to respond and even though they didn't have the same dress they overnighted me a dress I loved even more!!! Such a GREAT first experience with RTR and will use again! I wore a Sz 6 regular in this dress and it fit very true to size. Not too long and not too short. I wore this dress to a Heart Ball.

links_reviews_title: A really great dress with a little something extra!
links_reviews_text: I was very close to wearing this dress. The material ruffles were adorable and made the dress stand out. It was a little short, the Regular was the only length available. If the Long was available I would have worn it!

This dress runs small. It was my back up dress so I didn't end up wearing it but it was stunning. Very elegant and sophisticated look. I am a big bust and did need help getting the zipper up even on the side but once it was on it was pretty.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect & I had no worries!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size & it fit well. I have no complaints about the dress. It looks better in person versus in pictures. This is truly another one of my favorite RTR dresses!!

links_reviews_title: So easy, inexpensive, great fit and such outstanding quality
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit, perfect length...such a great experience! I'd do it again in a heartbeat

Several of the reviews I read said this dress ran small, and I definitely have to agree. When I went to order this dress as my back up to another, they only had it left in the size I ordered so I didn't have high hopes. Well I was wrong! I think one size down would have fit better in the top, however this one was hugging my curves while still allowing some room in the stomach and bottom which allowed for eating and dancing. It's a heavy material which made it feel nicer and kept me warm in January. I ordered the long which was perfect for my 5'7" and 3-4" heels. I received a lot of compliments on this dress! Highly recommend it! Definitely order up in size!
This is an extremely bright blouse. Definitely a Barbie doll pink. If it rather nicely and looked great for an evening out
Nice, loose top for a date night. Flowy, potentially frumpy

I thought this was a fun top for the rapidly warming weather. Made me look put together without trying too hard. The straps did seem a bit long though, and finding the right bra was tricky. Overall I enjoyed wearing it.

I wore this to work and had so much fun wearing it. Vibrant color and fluttery sleeves make this top really fun to wear. Arms were also super flattering for us girls with bigger arms. Visually it's 5*. I give it 4* overall though because it wasn't as comfy as it could have been. The fabric doesn't have any stretch so it can get a bit uncomfortable in weird positions. Also, sleeves don't really fold well into a cardigan so, when I got cold, I just ended up with very frumpy/bulky arms. Overall as a standalone piece, definitely a cute way to simulate an off the shoulder look while wearing a regular bra.

Fits well, color is bright neon pink. Only issue I had was the hook and eye closure, kept coming undone. Tightened the hook portion with small pair of pliers and it was fine. Not sure I would rent it again but I enjoyed wearing it. I did not wear a bra and it was fine.
Great color, fit is just a little large.
I actually wore it for an 80's themed night. It was great.
Arm holes a bit large. I wish I had gotten in an XS I am 5'4 126 lbs. I liked the color but I love bright colors. The arm holes a bit large too.

Super cute off the shoulder top. Be forewarned, it is definitely the color of a highlighter. I loved it. Was slightly snug in the chest area but you couldn't tell. I'm 34D though. Thinking about keeping :)
Loved the bright pink & details of the ruffles, open shoulder & back. Looked great with white shorts. Came brand new with tags.

I am a size 6 and the small was kind of big. It might just be the fit of the top though. I like things a little more fitted. Color was vibrant though. You can see it in action on my YouTube channel in a few weeks. Link to my latest video is https://youtu.be/hNRKAdACpXA.
This top is a beautiful color and cut. It was a bit big through the shoulders but would not size down because it is cut slimmer though the hips and belly.

I rented this blouse for a Rosé wine tasting party where guests were asked to wear pink. I tried to pair it with several different color pants and heels. Very difficult to coordinate an outfit around this color and the cut of the blouse. I didn't wear it but wanted to share this picture of my "best attempt" at a coordinating outfit.
This top is great for a festive evening!

I rented this as a date shirt, and I wanted to love it, but the bust was too tight where everywhere fit- I didn't even get to wear it. I do have broad shoulders and they fit fine! I do feel the ruffles arms fall a little low as well which can make for a little awkward ness moving your arms.

links_reviews_title: fit great, comfortable would definelty rent again
links_reviews_text: loved it
I loved this top and will definitely be renting again. The hot pink was perfect with white jeans for a beach trip. It fit very well and was comfortable. True to size.
It is a very nice color and very pretty but I couldn't wear it without looking disastrous because the sleeves are SO loose.
Love this beautiful top. I got lots of compliments and felt great in it. The color is a very vibrant pink. Highly recommend.
Rented this for a weekend getaway. Nice color and material, but it runs big. I am always a 14 in Trina's dresses, but this top could have been ordered one size smaller.
This top has a very bright pink color, I wore with jeans and black pants. If you are comfortable with bright colors this is for you!

links_reviews_title: The color is so bright that people notice this cute little top
links_reviews_text: I loved the cut and design of this top.

This blouse is absolutely stunning! Every little detail was taken into consideration when constructing this top. The ruffles lay on your shoulders perfectly and the bright pink color is a show stopper anywhere you go. This top runs true to size I have a full bust and it fit perfectly.

This was a great shirt. It had so many fun details. The v cut in the front added a sassy touch, but it wasn't too low. I liked that it could be worn during the day or be dressed up and worn for a fun night on the town.
I didn't end up wearing this only because I though it was too tight around the belly, but I loved the way the fabric felt and the color is a true pink!
This top is so feminine and fits great! I am considering buying it! LOVE!

links_reviews_title: Cute top with lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The top clasp was broken.

This is the perfect pink for summer! I love the design and the fit, however it was a little bit too narrow in the back, and I had to return it. I have a very full busy, and I'm ordering the next size up because it was so cute.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing it. It looks like a bubble gum color, but it's almost neon pink.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Lovely style.

This top fits true to size and looks just like the picture. I rented it as part of my unlimited but I ended up not needing it so I sent it back. Super cute summer top of you don't mind showing a bit of skin.

links_reviews_title: Hard to wear a bra with this!
links_reviews_text: Would have rated it more highly but I just couldn't. My bra strap is visible in all photos and I'm not down with that. But the 16 fit well. Besides the fact that the zipper kept coming down throughout the night. I was dancing and mingling and hosting and constantly fixing the garment. No bueno. But in all honesty, I had an ulterior motive. Pair this with Fenty Beauty's Killawatt Foil Mimosa Sunrise/Sangria Sunset and you will most definitely make them salivate!
Wore this to a concert with turquoise jewelry. Was comfortable and flattering. Received compliments!
The color is not the same as in the photos. It is a fun top, but I found the shoulder cut outs to be an odd shape (they are larger than most) and it was not flattering.

If the fabric was lighter and thinner. It would've been better. The color is very very very bright almost glow-in-dark (which I like). But since the fabric is thick you look BIG! Nice design and color though

links_reviews_title: Cute top - dress it up or down
links_reviews_text: No give in the hips - a little tighter than I would have liked.
Nice material but pink was too bright for me.
True to size. I wore size 2 and it fit perfectly. Not too short, stretchy & comfortable.
Wore for a 90s theme bar crawl. I was ginger spice so the red sequins were perfect.

Red sequins - what more could you want from a dress? I rented this for a New Year's Eve party and had so much fun! This dress was so glamorous and sparkly. It was a little heavy, but no more so than any other sequined dress. I wore a strapless bra with no problems. The length was perfect for - a little above the knee but not too short at all. I was comfortable the whole night. The dress has a little stretch and give to it - not skin tight at all.
The dress is very beautiful ! Fits good and it is comfortable

links_reviews_title: A great Vegas dress, but not high design style
links_reviews_text: It's hard to find a sequin dress that's not scandalously short when you're 5'10" and this did the trick. This was super fun to wear and the sequins didn't scratch me up. The dress has some stretch so it's pretty forgiving, but it's not the most flattering thing I've ever had on. If you want to show cleavage, this isn't the one for you--has a modest neckline for this kind of dress.
I love this dress and got so many compliments. It flattered my hourglass shape perfectly--curvy girls, rent this!
This dress was so spectacular to wear on Valentine's Day.

Fit was okay, I wished it was a little tighter. But it didn't ride up. Obviously the sequins rubbed against my arm and that's a little uncomfortable but it was a beautiful dress that shined in the light and made me feel like a million bucks.
Beautiful for photographs! It did make me look a little heavier than I am, but the fabric is stunning! would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for a post-partum body headed to a Chinese New Year work party!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, easy dress to wear all night. Forgiving fit with a nice neckline where you can feel festive & beautiful but not too revealing.
Was very appropriate but I still felt like I stood out. I wore a regular bra but had to be careful that the part underneath the armpits wouldn't show.

I rented this for New Year's Eve and felt really awesome in this dress! I read a lot of reviews saying it ran big but I'm glad I ordered the size I usually wear. The dress was pretty clingy and I wore a strapless bra since regular ones showed too much. It was fun to wear and recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress. It was for a formal Christmas party
links_reviews_text: The size 6 fit okay but it was a little too low cut and revealing for me, I'm 61 years old. The size 4 brought the neckline up a little bit and I just wore a bra that wasn't a push-up. Length was perfect! My height and weight aren't coming up in my profile, but I'm five foot two and 140 lb with a 32 C bust

links_reviews_title: FABULOUS mouth dropping Marilyn Monroe dress! Infinite positive compliments all night! Sexy&Stunning
links_reviews_text: Make sure you have the appropriate undergarments, dress very clingy. Also very low cut if you have a big chest.

This dress was larger than I expected and I could have worn a size down. It had give despite being sequined. I had a hard time hiding the sides of my bra so after trying to find bras that were less high on the sides, I gave up and pinned it. Totally appropriate for a work event - cleavage but not tooo much.

links_reviews_title: I was really nervous for my Holiday Party at a new job. It was dress to impress. This nailed it!
links_reviews_text: It's covered in sequins but not irritating on your arms. I never noticed the sequins to be honest. I got tons of compliments on the dress and it was absolutely perfect for a Holiday Party event.

Wore this for a holiday party we were hosting. It was perfect. Flashy, fitted, and I was the hostess with the mostest in this baby. Super fun and comfy. Easy to wear. I'm 5'8", 140 lbs. 34C. I wore the 4. Maybe could have done the 6, but it got a lot bigger in the chest and arm hole area, so I put on my spanx and wore the body hugging 4. Great dress!

I rented a size 6 and 10. Size 8 was unavailable. The 6 was too tight but was able to zip up. The 10 was loose in the back but I felt alot comfortable in the 10 vs the 6. If the 8 was available it probably would fit just right. Nonetheless I received compliments all night. This was my first rent the runway experience and I was very pleased. I wore this to my squadron Christmas party and already rented another dress for my husband's squadron Christmas party next week. I'm a full bust wearing a 36D, I'm 151 lbs, and I'm 5'2. The dress hit right at my knee. It had just the right sparkle for a Christmas party. My coworker called me Jessica Rabbit because that is what the dress reminded her of. I was dancing in the dress all night that my husband had to tell me to sit down...lol. I would definitely rent again but in a size 8.

I am 5'8" about 137 lbs. The size 4 fit perfectly and I got tons of compliments throughout the evening. The dress was so comfortable.The lining can ride up a bit during dancing so be watchful and discreetly check for lining to be flush with hem.

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments on this dress at my work Christmas party!! great holiday party dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Was a little stretchy so that was good not super snug and I could dance and move around good in it! Good length! Not too short or too long!

Wore this to a Backstreet Boys concert in Vegas! It's very well made, not itchy and heard several girls comment on how they loved it! Only complaint is I felt like it made my tummy area look bigger than I'd like. With a jacket over it was not a big deal though.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfortable for it being a sequins dress, not itchy at all! It fit amazingly, and is definitely an eye turner. This dress gets a 10/10 rating from me!
I am by no means small on top but being petite the top of this dress/shoulders seemed to fall off and seem too big- plan to order a 2 in future. Length was great and body had a little stretch
This dress is a showstopper. It's comfortable yet fabulous. The sequins were a bit itchy but nothing a hundred compliments wasn't worth. I'd live in this dress if I could.

links_reviews_title: Many compliments! Perfect red dress for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Dress was comfortable to move in, and surprisingly the sequins weren't itchy, although sitting on the sequins took some getting used to, haha. Very happy with this dress, another RTR success!

links_reviews_title: This dress is STUNNING. I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress is fitted, but it's thick so it's still flattering. I am 5'9 and it was the perfect length for a party dress. My only complaint was that it wasn't in the best condition, and the zipper was hard to zip. But, it is a rented dress so I guess I would expect that. I would definitely recommend this dress!
Looked perfect. Fit beautifully. Very well made. The sequins were not picky at all.
I️ wore this for my work Christmas party and it was a show stopper! It has a little stretch to it so it was so comfortable and it's the perfect combination of fun, sexy and classy!

For my trip to Las Vegas, I rented two sizes of this dress, but ended up wearing the smaller of the two. This dress was great! It had a ton of energy and was extremely comfortable! The only thing to note is that the lining inside of the dress does ride up a lot, but everything else was great. Great dress! Had a hard time returning this one :)

links_reviews_title: It's so beautiful! Fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING. It fit me absolutely perfectly, and I felt fabulous. The material is nice, and the sequens didn't snag at me like I was afraid they would. The length was also perfect and not too short. Loved it, and it made my night perfect.

The rich red and all-over sequins made this dress stand it even at a red dress charity event. Fitted and fancy yet comfortable. It was easy to move and dance. No underarm irritation like some other sequined dresses. I'd definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my 35th birthday party.
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress that is fully lined, very comfortable, and a striking red color. I'm only 5'5" so it hit me just below the knee. Very flattering for an hour glass type of body. Got loads of compliments!
The Color was just eye stopping! So glad I rented it!

Wore it to a nightclub for a bachelorette party as all the girls had to wear a solid red dress. This dress was long enough, so comfortable, very glitzy and flattering. A show stopper (and I was the best dressed of all the red dresses). Go for this!
Fit nicely. Wasn't too short. Color was great.

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredible! I absolutely loved it and got a TON of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size, heavy enough for a winter party. The color and cut were fabulous for a middle aged woman.

This was amazing ! The color and sparkle was classy and sophisticated. The material hung nicely on the body. I wore it to a company Xmas party. Got many head turns and compliments. Wore neutral accessories and a nude pump. This dress is truly a stand out! True to size- wore a Strapless bra. Sexy! Very classy though.

links_reviews_title: This dress definitely made me stand out in a good way and I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a NYE party. It was absolutely perfect and was very comfortable. The dress was the perfect length and the sequins were not an issue whatsoever. I would 100% recommend renting this dress. Fits true to size.

I got a ton of compliments on this dress. It was the perfect amount of sparkle for a holiday cocktail party. I'd say this dress runs pretty TTS. I probably could have worn the 0, but the 2 allowed for easy movement. The dress hit just above my knee. Will definitely be renting again. Such an easy process!

links_reviews_title: The color and fit was amazing!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7" 150 lbs. fit true to the size 10. Very comfortable! Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Cute but a little big in the chest
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress! I wore it to a anniversary party in a restaurant with nude strappy heels. I loved the arm cut outs, but I am not very "busty" and opted to wear the neckline open rather than tied, so I had to wear a solid black bralette under the dress to keep myself adequately covered. Really enjoyed wearing this dress!

I'm 5'5" and I'd call this "tunic plus" length. So, as others point out, it's short. I wore it with opaque tights for dinner and drinks -- dancing would have been a problem. What I LOVED was the quality of the fabric (seemed like 100% silk, didn't see the supposed polyester lining) and the details in the cut. There is a slightly wing-like layer on the sleeves, and the opening for the shoulders is pretty generous, and these features together made it surprisigly elegant in a very non-stuffy way. Re: sizing -- I would have sized up to S for length, but the style got a lot more voluminous without the skirt length improving much, so I went with the XS for the better overall fit.

Loved this, I always love silk and the cold shoulder/ high neckline a fun style. Just be warned it is short- I am 5'7" and the skirt just cleared the bottom of my cheeks! Wore with skinny jeans during the day and with tights on a date with my husband so I felt covered. He thought it was great!
I️ wore this to a laid back rehearsal dinner. Very comfortable and true to size. It was cold and the dress was kind of short so I️ paired with tights and booties.

I always love this open shoulder style from Parker. In dress form it's on the shorter side, which was perfect for going out with friends. The small (my usual size) was drapey and comfortable, and was leggy enough to pull off with flat booties and still feel feminine. Would be more day appropriate on someone shorter.
Amazing dress. So cute for work w / blazer and then great for going to grab drinks. Fits perfectly, true to size, please rent this it's adorable.
Very light material. Perfect for a summer evening.
Wore this dress for a concert. Super cute, comfy and casual. A little on the short side. Thin material.
This dress was a lot of fun though a bit in the short side. Perfect for a night out or date
Extremely comfortable and adorable dress. Fit true to size.

I can't wait to rent this for a brunch with friends! Cold shoulder is my favorite! Running true to size, I would recommend going one size up for backup. At 5'7" this was definitely a mini dress on me, so be weary of length. I would wear a standard bra with this dress, which is great, as it's perfect for any cup size. I'd pair this dress with wedges or heels and a cute red clutch.
Great fit- flattering and comfortable
They should list this as a top or a tunic because it barely covers your butt.
A little shorter than expected for being a tall girl - but still was great!
The top of the dress fit perfectly, but the bottom of the dress feels a little too high sometimes. Other than that, it's a great dress to wear!!
Flattering dress

I rented this for a shower but couldn't wear it. am only 5'3" and this dress was way too short. Felt too inappropriate and I'm short. Would not recommend unless you are going out to a less formal event that is okay to have such a short skirt...
Super cute but literally a shirt not a dress

I am 4"11 and about 110 lbs at the time, I was 4 months PP. I was attending a after wedding brunch and wanted something that fit nice but not tight since I was still a little big on the middle section. It fit wonderfully! It was a little on the short side but I have a short torso. Also the middle was very comfortable and not restrictive.
short!
My husband liked this dress and said I looked, "cute". I did not like how large the opening was on the upper arm. I am not tall so the length was fine on me. I wore black tights and booties.

This dress is cute, but it might have been better for someone in their early 20s as the open shoulder/arms and very short skirt felt a little juvenile for me. Wearing it anyway because I like the fitted waist and flowy material :)

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing out
links_reviews_text: The fabric is really light weight and print is very festive and fall-ish. But the cut out in the shoulders are huge and it's a little too short (mid thigh length)
Love this dress. Was great for a girls night out- easy to dress up or down. Great fit!
Wore this to a shower in winter. It was comfortable and fit well.
I really liked this dress but it was too short to wear without leggings. The sleeves are fun and flirty.

I wore this dress for a wine tasting and it was perfect style for a spring event, I just dressed it up with a rented handbag and wedge heeled ankle boots. The dress seemed a little short, since I'm only 5'4".
This dress is pretty short but I loved the shoulder detail!
Great for everyday. I wore with sheer black tights and black booties.
This dress was super cute but really short. The stretch waist felt more natural at my natural waist line, leaving minimal fabric left to cover the rest of my body. Really pretty print.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a special night.
links_reviews_text: This was a fun and flirty dress. It was very comfortable and I paired with black opaque tights and booties. It is on the short side, but that wasn't a problem since I was wearing tights. Wish I could keep it!

I knew this dress would be short but I don't think I realized how short. I had to really pull it down to cover my butt and I'm only 5'5. Pulling it down so much then gave it a really weird and unflattering fit. I tried it with leggings and it just looked weird. I inevitably continued to pick other outfits over this until I finally sent it back unworn.
I wore this over leggings. It is a short hem.

This dress was pretty, and the top fit well but I felt it was a bit short so may not be the best for those 5 10 or taller. If it didn't have the elastic at the waist then the length would have been fine but because of that if caused it to ride up a bit higher.

I wore this to a friend's bridal shower with black over the knee boots. I felt really great in it, but I wasn't thrilled with how baggy the top looked in photos. The print is great and it's super comfy. I will most likely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Wore it to a Saturday date night but I'd feel comfortable wearing this to work also.
links_reviews_text: It fits perfectly. I'm 5'1" and very petite with athletic/muscular arms and shoulders. Some dresses fit well in some areas but are too small or too large in other areas. For my size, it fit perfectly. I really loved wearing it and it made me feel confident and sassy.

links_reviews_title: This is a fun, chic party dress
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect. The length is a little short, but I wore it with tights and dressy booties.
Wore this as both a shirt and a dress on different occasions since it was so short. Pretty but not spectacular.
I wore this to a concert with booties. True to size. Like other reviewers mentioned, it is short so I don't know if you could wear this with heels.

I loved this dress, it's on the shorter side but it looked great with knee boots! The arm cut outs im normally not a fan of, but these were so perfectly feminine with the frill, wanted to buy this dress. Could be fall or warm weather with sandals dress!

Fit was ok. I probably needed the 4, but it was not available. I rented for a portrait picture and it was the perfect dress. I made the 2 work and I actually liked the longer length for the picture, but might have been hard to walk around a lot in.

I don't dress up often, but got so many compliments on this dress. It fit perfectly, though when I first put it on I felt it was a little short in front. By the end of the night I was glad it wasn't longer. The lace is gorgeous and adds stunning detail to this classic dress. I didn't need a bra because of the structure of the bodice, which was good because the back of my strapless was higher than the dress.

This was a dress back up choice for me. What a gorgeous dress! Fit was true to size and the bustier made it so I didn't need a bra. Felt elegant and beautiful all night. Definitely a must rent! Also, RTR was great. First time renting here and when the first two choices didn't work, the second ones came so quickly it was perfect. Super easy process and all the gowns were just stunning in person. Thank you, RTR! I'll be back!

Just the look I was going for at the annual work Gala! Loved the glam factor on this dress! Form fitting yet comfortable and I loved that there was a built in bra!! Received lots of compliments all evening
Great dress-- the built in corset plus spanx worked well together! I did have to watch the short train while walking through crowds.

links_reviews_title: Had a gala for my city's academy of music. Ball gowns were required. This dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Had a gala for my city's academy of music. Ball gowns were required. This dress was perfect. It fit like a glove and didn't even need to be hemmed. I got the size 16R and Im usually a size 12/14. The bust already has supports and I didnt need to hemtape it at all when wearing 3 inch heels. (Total height 5'6")
The process for the rental was very easy. The length of the gown was perfect and the fit of the dress was great. I received many compliments. I appreciated the built in bustier.

I wasn't as excited about this dress as I wanted to be at the beginning of the night, but it grew on me as the hours went by. Built in bra has clasps in the back, which I didn't understand from other reviews. It was a bit hard to hook, but I've had experience getting a wetsuit on, so I employed similar tactics and got it done. The bra was a little uncomfortable, at first, but became more comfortable as the night went on. I am very small chested and added some "cutlets" to fill things out. Unfortunately, I didn't secure them with fashion tape and they migrated to the center several times. I'm sure no-one else noticed them through the lace of the bodice, but I did. Had to go to the ladies room and readjust several times. Not the fault of the dress, though. I am just under 5'7" and ended up wearing the 0L with 3" heels and the length was great. I loved the train. The dress was perfect for a formal military function and I got plenty of compliments. I would definitely rent this dress again.
I loved this dress! I ordered my normal size and it fit like a glove. It was a little difficult to move around because it was still tight past my knees but overall it was also comfortable
This was such a fun dress to wear for New Years!

Fit decently well, didn't have to wear a bra as it has inner lining bralette as part of dress. It was a little loose up top though I am 34DD bra and slightly too long (I'm 5'7" and wore 2" heels.) It's very beautiful and I received many compliments! Also easy to move and dance in. Fun!!

I chose a different dress but this was a close runner up. Really beautiful scoop in the back and the gold is really pretty. I had to rent in a long because the regular was taken, it was definitely long but with heel would have just been dragging the floor a bit.

This didn't have the wow I was looking for so I went with my other choice. The front of the dress is a little shorter than the back. I assumed that the back was supposed to drag a little but it came way too short on me.

I have people coming up and complimenting me all night! Multiple colleagues told me I was the best dressed at our black tie holiday party in this dress. I came out of the bedroom and my 4 year old son said "Mommy, you look like Elsa!". It is very elegant and classy and fun, with just enough sparkle. I'm 5'6" and the 2L was the perfect length with a 2.5 inch heel. Built in corset thingy meant I didn't need a bra.

I loved this dress but the larger size was still too small. I am about a size 10 these days but it didn't completely close in the back. But I did love the dress and maybe next time I have a formal event I'll try again!
An absolutely stunning dress which I wore to a black tie Christmas gala. I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I felt gorgeous in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Gala, with the theme of 'Putting on the Ritz' This dress couldn't have been more perfect. It fit great, even the length. I'm 5'4, 150lb and I went with the size 8r. I was so comfortable all night. I loved the high neck line and the detail in the dress.

Great dress for a black tie wedding! I run between a 4 and 6 and thought the 6 was perfect with room to dance. It did run a bit long in the back. I am 5'6" and wore 2 1/2 inch heels which were generally okay but would sometimes catch on the overlay. I ended up pinning the overlay up towards the end of the night to avoid this. Also, there's a corset under the overlay so you don't necessarily need a bra (though the corset in my dress tended to bunch awkwardly).
Wore to a formal wedding. Beautiful dress, a lot of compliments.
I selected this beautiful dress for attending the opera, it was just beautiful, elegant, comfortable I was complimented many times Thank you RTR

links_reviews_title: I love this dress. So beautiful, I received so many compliment.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit.
I am 5'3" and need to wear 3" heels and it was still a little bit long. Over fit wonderful.
I'm usually a size 6 but this dress was too snug. The 8 petite was a perfect fit. Gorgeous dress. I received so many compliments.

Pros: This was actually the back up dress RTR sent me and I'm so happy they did I loved the style and fit of this one A LOT better than the one I originally picked for myself, I got tons of compliments all night I loved it so much I wore it to dinner after the recital too! Cons: if you have an hourglass or pear shape I would get a size up I normally wear a size 2 or 4 and my hips measure 38in and it was a little snug aroun the hips and thighs but nothing that was unbareable just something to know when purchasing this dress

links_reviews_title: Super fun, formal event with friends.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 8, and I needed to wear the size 10. If you are 5'7" or taller, I would absolutely recommend ordering the long. Beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress with stunning details and beautiful back!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black-tie gala and originally rented the four and six regular length. While both fit me, the regular length ran short on me. I'm 5'6" and thankfully when I called about the length RTR was able to quick ship the 6 long which was perfect with 2-3 inch heels. This dress garnered tons of compliments all night long and is both unique and elegant. My favorite part was the slight mermaid silhouette and the plunging back. Added bonus was that I didn't need a bra with the awesome built in bustier! An excellent option for a black-tie event. You won't regret it!

links_reviews_title: Backup dress got a ton of compliments! My friend said I looked like Beyonce!
links_reviews_text: This was sent to me as a backup. I didn't like it at first, honestly, I thought it looked a bit Mother of the Bride" to me. BUT I ended up having to wear it last minute and it grew on me. Very pretty in person and got a TON of compliments. Very comfortable. I wear a 12 usually but the 16 fit me like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering for a fuller bust!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, I felt very comfortable in it all night. I got many compliments! I have a bigger chest and usually my boobs are spilling out of dresses, but this kept it very modest which made me very comfortable. It was a little tight, but overall, not so much that i couldn't wear it.
I loved this dress! Very well made and elegant. I received compliments all night long. The 10L seemed a bit short for me, but I wore kitten heels and was thankful for the extra comfort.

Dress is gorgeous in person, the gold overlay is stunning, and I got lots of complements - even best dressed! It's a bit on the shorter side. I'm 5'6 and had to wear kitten heels with size 2R, and the dress was just the right length. If you're above 5'5 and want to wear taller heels definitely go with a long. 2L wasn't available on my dates, but 2R worked out. I'm usually a size 2, occasionally 0, but definitely not in this dress! 2 fit like a glove with no additional breathing room, and the 4 would have probably been great. If you're between 2 sizes, go with the higher one.

Have loved the look of this dress forever, and rented it for a black-tie wedding. I typically wear a size 10, sometimes a 12 if a dress was too tight in the bust. The 12 in this dress was SO tight in the cap sleeve (which also weirdly cut in too far at the armpit). RTR was out of a 14 so they sent me a 16 to try. It worked, but was baggy in the front and STILL the sleeve cut in too far. It was also close to being too short (I'm 5'7" and wore 2.5 inch heels). Long story short, size up at least one or two sizes, and be prepared to be annoyed by the cap sleeve.

I received lots of compliments on the dress. I'm usually a size 2 to 4 and the size 6 formal fit perfect. Was very happy I went up a size. Was a very classy dress. I would rent a dress again if I had an event to attend.

This dress was absolutely perfect. I'm usually a 6, and this dress ran true to size. It fit like a glove. There's really no stretch to the material, so I'd size up if you're not sure. It was absolutely perfect for our annual gala, and I got so many compliments. I honestly didn't want to take it off.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect! We even made the cover of our local VIP KNOXVILLE Magazine!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfect, but I did go up a size for the length. It was not available in 8L at the time, so I wore the 10L with no problems. The 8 probably would have been to small. The dress is not made for dancing, but a little was fine. I had the most complements on the fit and look of the dress. It is the right amount of formal for the event I attended. (Fundraiser for Cystic Fibrosis Foundation).

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a movie star
links_reviews_text: The fit was amazing, hugged the frame in the right way, beautiful detail. Wore it to a gala and felt like a million bucks. I can't wait until I find another opportunity to wear it!

I wore this dress to a black tie charity event and felt like one of the best dressed ladies of the evening. Both this dress and my backup were great and the hardest part of this whole process was choosing between two wonderful options. I ended up choosing this gown because it has a built in corset-like support so no special bra or shape wear was required.
