The dress was comfortable and easy to move in but still felt sophisticated and special. At 5'3" wearing 3 1/4" heels the hem brushed the floor but didn't trip me. A very small train behind got stepped on a few times but otherwise was no issue. I wore the size 2 at 117lbs, which was snug and form-fitting but comfortable. I received many compliments and even struck up a conversation with another lady at the event that was also very pleased with her rent the runway dress and also looked amazing! So happy that I ordered this gown and will definitely be ordering from RTR again for my next event!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and earrings! Received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, no bra needed. I'm a 36B, 5'6, 135. Wore 3in heels and the dress still hit the floor in back. Normally wear 6, but these designer dresses vary so much in size! Would rent again.
I got this 8P as a backup size (it was the next biggest available) and I was sure it would be too big but it fit perfectly. I’m normally a 4P so I was super happy this fit! It was lovely.

I searched high and low and couldn't find a dress for my daughter's wedding. I finally decided to try RTR and I'm so glad I did. The dress was perfect! I received compliments all night. It runs a little small so I had to go up a size. I'm very pleased. I'll definitely use RTR again.

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy - but size up
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed this dress. Pros: it gives nearly everyone an hourglass shape, the fabric is a thick knit so holds things in well. Cons: this runs small so size up (I wore my regular size because I didn't get a backup size and it was SNUG), the sleeves cause T-Rex like arms as others have said. If you won't be raising arms much and are ok with a very form fitting dress, rent this!

This dress was EXACTLY the vibe I was going for with my sister's wedding; sexy yet conservative, classic. It made me look like I hadn't popped out 3 kids in the past 4 years, and like I still have my act together (good one dress, we fooled them all!). All that said, I definitely had to be sausaged into it and I couldn't move at all whole I was wearing it. Opted to change into a different dresses for the reception. T-Rex arms and an inability to open my legs more than 1 foot in any direction were the biggest challenges. So you have to decide if it's worth it for you.

I absolutely loved this dress and got a million compliments throughout the night!! It definitely runs small ! I am an 8-10 usually and I ended up wearing a 12 based on reviews and it was still tight. So size up! Loved it and definitely plan to rent it again. I’m 5’9 and about 150lbs

I did love this dress, I think it is very flattering on curvy frames. It runs VERY small. I went on the cinq à sept website to see the size chart and measured as a 4, I ordered a 6 based on people's comments about it being too small and I really needed an 8. I've never been more uncomfortable in a dress, I couldn't move and had to be zipped in and out of it as the arms are restrictive. If you are pear or hourglass shaped I would recommend ordering 1 size up from the size chart and order 2 sizes up as a back up. On the plus side the fabric does have some stretch, so I was still able to wear the 6 without ripping it, just wasn't able to move easily.
Loved the grip on the shoulders to keep the dress in place. I have never worn this style of a dress before, I was happily surprised!
This does run very small. I wore one size up but I could have been more comfortable with a size 10. I did move comfortably in it. I love the silhouette and the thick stretch of this dress.

Material was thick, and cut was lovely. Had wiggle room in the mid section, but was snug in the rear and very snug around biceps. I could not lift my arms up. Overall, glad I chose for a winter wedding, and wish I could keep it.

links_reviews_title: I wish I could've kept the dress - I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel like a million bucks. It hugs in all the right places. You will have T-Rex arms and bathroom trips are difficult but it is definitely worth it. I wish I could've kept the dress! I got so many compliments!

Pros: Gorgeous dress – everyone complimented it. Great, thick, fabric for the winter time. I was able to wear a strapless bra underneath. Additionally, since I am 5’9”, I was worried about the length but it was perfect, right below the knee. Cons: I would not recommend this dress for a wedding or an event that may include dancing because the dress is very restrictive in movement. I had difficulty going up stairs, bending down to pick things up, lifting my arms, and hugging people at my company holiday party. However, it was fine for a short sit-down dinner event.
Fit small, usually a 2 or 4. Wore the size 6. So many compliments:)
Loved how well it fit esp with the top not slipping down as I am a B cup. Only con about it, just as the other reviews said, was that I could not raise arms.

I chose this dress for a recent November wedding and it was perfect! Beautiful Navy color. Nice thick fabric without being too hot. Like all other reviews, this dress runs so small! Order 1 or two sizes up. My boobs were a little smushed. I'm short and the tea length was still fine for me. The dress has a stunning neckline and created some curves for me that I swear aren't normally there lol. It was hard to raise your arms but that shouldn't be a surprise and I loved it regardless! Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a pretty blue sausage
links_reviews_text: This dress ran pretty small but once I got myself stuffed into it, I felt awesome. My boyfriend had to help me zip it up and it was A Process but I think it was worth it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the red carpet
links_reviews_text: Was really happy with this dress. The fit was snug and form fitting, with enough room to still have fun on the dance floor. The stretch made it comfortable to wear throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Dress was a stunner!! I didn't want to give it back. Perfect dress for a wedding guest.
links_reviews_text: The fit was as expected - very form fitting but structured and well made so it still looked classy. The only, (and very minor) thing to note is that the arms are a little tight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for a cocktail wedding!
links_reviews_text: The absolute perfect, classic dress! I received so many compliments! I normally wear a size 2/4, but this dress runs small, and I couldn't get the 4 up over my hips. Size 6 fit great, and I still had wiggle room to dance. When renting, size up, and get the second dress 2 sizes up just in case.

I got so many compliments in this dress. It does run small. I'm usually a 2 and ordered a 4 based on reviews. It did get annoying towards the end of the night bc of the sleeves. I was like t-Rex trying to grab things but it was manageable.

links_reviews_title: quality material, fair fit, perfect in a pinch
links_reviews_text: The fit was fair. The dress came sooo long. I used fashion tape to hem the dress about 6 inches. The material is thick so you feel secure in it but runs the risk of making you looked squished inside. I'm a 32D, without a bra, my boobs were squished flat and up to my chin, with a bra the dress felt even tighter. I chose to wear the bra since long flat boob was not my favorite look. The sleeves were very tight. All the comments about not being able to use your arms, SO TRUE. My fiance called me T-Rex all night. It was conservative and sexy. The top was tight and the lower section was very loose so not ideal. However, it was last minute and I couldn't be happier with the choice. I would wear it again but I wouldn't buy it.

I absolutely loved this stress. Received a ton of compliments. Perfect dress for a Fall wedding. Very elegant and just the right amount of sexiness. The dress was very fitted, so I would recommend trying out two sizes. I am normally a size 0, but wore the size 2. I would highly recommend, especially for petite women.

links_reviews_title: I felt so beautiful in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was one of my favorite RTR looks. It is very very tight. I suggest sizing up, especially if you have larger arms. I wear an 8 and this 8 fit like a glove. I was comfortable but couldn't throw my arms up on the dance floor. Everyone loved it and I received so many complements. It's definitely a dress to wear for the look... not so much the comfort level!

It was perfectly tight for my body, didn’t have problems with the sleeves falling down. I absolutely loved it and it made me feel like royalty!!! I want to buy it because it’s a dress you can wear for multiple events not just once.

This is a great dress. Very well made, heavy material. Snug fit without being too tight. I am 5'10" and typically have issues with the waist being too high. If I had to complain about anything, it would be the lack of range of motion (felt like a t-Rex most of the night). However, I would definitely wear it again.

Hmm where do I start? This dress had great potential but you need to size up 1-2 sizes and if you've got a large bum, definitely 2 sizes up! The sleeves are tight so if you like to dance at a wedding this is NOT the dress for you. I felt extremely sexy but I was so uncomfortable that I changed before the reception. Why? Cause I couldn't lift the dress up to go the bathroom, the dress was cutting off circulation to my arms, and I was constantly adjusting the top where the non slip grips were on the dress. I'm sure if you sizes right it could be great but don't plan on lifting your arms up without needing to readjust everything.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful elegant dress. Compliments your body if you have a curvy shape. I received compliments all night. The dress ran 2-3 sizes small; I'm usually size 6 or 8 and I wore the size 12. Also, it's made for smaller bust, I'm a 34E and it was a very close to not fitting and the sleeves also ran small. However, overall I loved the dress very well made thick material. I'm 5'4 153lbs.

links_reviews_title: everyone noticed me in my dress . Everyone at the wedding gave me compliments.
links_reviews_text: I’m usually a size 4, but I couldn’t zip that one up . The size 6 fit tight, but I didn’t have to wear a bra and it held the girls in place. It fit perfectly and it gave me a nice hour glass figure. Loved that I could get a backup size

This is a beautiful dress. It was true to size and flattering (in my opinion) Be sure to have fashion tape for the size 6. The top portion is supposed to "stick" to your chest, but it has been worn out. (The size 4 was fine) I had to "favor" fashion tape to a wedding, so be prepared!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a night wedding
links_reviews_text: I felt so beautiful in this dress. It's a super fitted so I sized up to an 8. I am normally a 6. Based on the reviews I read prior to renting... I'm happy i sized up. It hugged my curves just right and made my boobs look good too! Haha ... the length was just past my knees. I love love loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Classic and stunning. Incredibly comfortable + incredibly tight.
links_reviews_text: Hugged every single curve. Skipped the bra and wore pasties for cover + hygiene instead. Accomodates spanx. Incredibly fitted but still manages to be comfortable and compact. Usually wear a 6 in a dress but I absolutely sized up for this one. Hits past the knee. So classic and not too busty.
Overall fit was nice! Lots of compliments. Definitely very snug—would not recommend eating big meals or trying to walk quickly while wearing this dress!
I wore this dress for a wedding. It was absolutely beautiful and form fitting. I received tons of compliments all night long! It was exactly what I was looking for.

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress but good luck moving your arms around
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear to an evening wedding that was cocktail attire. I got two sizes - a 0 and 2. I'm normally a 0 but this 0 was SO TIGHT. Definitely order a size up. Even the 2 felt a bit snug. Pros: very sexy and body hugging. I got tons of compliments all night Cons: I could not get this dress on by myself. Thank god my sister was there to help me! I could not move my arms to dance at the reception so I was somewhat robot like. Going to the bathroom was also a challenge, it was hard to lift up and pull back down. Tough call on whether I'd rent this again - it was a lot of "maintenance" to wear.

links_reviews_title: Most compliments I’ve ever received on a dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress even though it was a tight fit. The good thing was I didn’t have to worry about wearing a bra! Very simple, elegant and classy.

I fell in love with this dress because it was sexy without screaming for attention. It is a very classy dress. I read every review before I made my purchase....it does run small! I typically am a size 0 (5'5" - 114 lbs). Most RTR size 0 dresses are loose on me so I ordered the 0 and the 2. I wore the 2 but the 4 would have been better. This dress is super tight. Every time I dropped something my husband had to grab it for me. I had difficulty trying to grab my phone off of the table while standing! Arms are restricted and boobs will be squished and I barely have any. I recommend sizing up and then getting your back up two sizes bigger just in case. (Ie: if you're a 6, order an 8 AND 10) especially if you have wide hips or a larger backside. Gorgeous dress. You can't go wrong. The navy does feel nearly black if your skin is on the browner side. Great thing: the dress comes in teal too!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove! Tons of compliments! Thanks RTR
links_reviews_text: Size up!

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a family photo session.
links_reviews_text: I am a 34DD and wasn't able to zip the size 6. The dress doesn't have a lot of stretch to it. Beautiful fabric and design, just needed the 8 which had been unavailable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a charity gala and felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Maybe the most flattering dress I've ever worn! So many compliments all night long. Without a doubt the tightest dress I've ever had on my body and I could not move my arms at all, but completely worth it!

Perfect for a fall wedding! Super flattering with the thick stretchy material, hugs the curves!! Got tons of compliments. Only thing to take note is the sleeves do restrict movement as does the dress skirt since its column and tight so take that into account if you plan on doing a ton of dancing!

This runs small, so I'd order at least one size up. You can't really raise your arms in it but for me that wasn't an issue. I felt amazing in it, it really hugs your curves. It's also great if you're small-chested. I had to have some help getting in and out of it.
Perfect dress that's form-fitting yet classy. The material pulls you in and pushes you up in all the right places no spanx or push-up bra required!

Dress looks amazing on! Like others have said, it's super snug so trips to the bathroom are complicated and you don't have full range of motion in your arms, but it's totally worth it. I got a larger backup size, but ended up wearing the smaller size since the dress it supposed to be really form fitting. Would definitely recommend for a night when you won't be dancing/moving a ton.

I was not expecting to love this dress as much as I did. It was so comfortable and flattering. The length was great as it was a little chilly out. I wasn't sure about the sleeves but they ended up being super cute and easy to move in. I'd definitely rent this again.
100% size down!! This dress is so comfortable, super stretchy, great length, and beautiful color!

links_reviews_title: I received lots of compliments! I was 4 months pregnant (showing very little and fit great)
links_reviews_text: I’m small busted so the armholes were a little big. Perfect for summer wedding!

Lots of give in this dress for curvy girls. Runs big. I have to wear a bra so strapless worked well. Shape-wear a must. Strangely, the seam in the center of the back kept shifting to the side so constantly pulling it straight in the back. Great color of the fabric.

I rented several dresses for engagement pictures and RTR sent me this dress as a replacement for a dress I had chosen that could not be delivered and boy am I glad they did. I wasn't even going to try it on at first because it wasn't one of the dresses I had chosen but I thought why not and I immediately fell in love. It is amazing! The fabric is unique, has great stretch, I was able to wear the small and still had plenty of room when I'm usually a M/L. The colors are vibrant and the ruffle sleeves are romantic and fun. If you are an hourglass shape like me it definitely shows off the curves in the best way possible. I can't believe I got this dress completely by accident and it ended up stealing the show. Probably ranks up here as one of my favorite dresses of all time!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, well made dress, but way too big up top
links_reviews_text: Fabric is really thick and the pattern is pretty, but as other reviewers have said it runs large, particularly up top under the arms. Not wearable.

links_reviews_title: Wore it a wedding at 32 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: I listened to reviews that it ran large and ordered an XS even at 32 weeks preggo! It fit nicely around my belly - a little snug with the zip in the back but otherwise fit well. Got lots of compliments. The pattern is flattering for any imperfection as it hides it easily, and the material is super stretchy. Definitely size down.

This dress has beautiful colors and the stretchy material makes it very comfortable. The top does run large in the chest area but the top detail and arms hide it well. I received lots of complements for this dress that put me a little bit outside my comfort zone.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for night out! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It has a scuba like thick material which was very flattering.
Photogenic and comfortable dress! my boyfriend loved it and I felt great all night. Hides belly bulge

links_reviews_title: Decent casual dress but not as shown.
links_reviews_text: Decent dress but not as shown. The model pic shows the dress with a beautiful satin blue liner. This dress is overall ok but is much less casual without liner. Someone mentioned it looks a little cheap and I agree. Maybe suitable for a backyard party. The dress runs big and has a lot of stretch.

I am short-waisted so I had to do a bit of quick tailoring to take about an inch off the shoulder straps and raise the top up so it fit properly. I whipped out a needle and thread and did a quick stick to alter the shoulder straps, then removed it after my event. The fabric was stretchy, which made it comfortable to wear, but it also got a little baggy by the end of the day. If, like me, you are on the edge of a size - size down and not up.

links_reviews_title: Loved the bright colors and the thick, smooth material of the dress!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a Kentucky Derby themed charity event! The overall fit was great and the dress itself was very easy to wear!! Loved the colors of this dress for a Spring event!! Got lots of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Rent the Runway has Amazing Customer Service!!
links_reviews_text: I completely ignored the reviews. THIS DRESS RUNS BIG! I'm normally a medium/size 10 and the top was hanging off. I called and they sent me Xs and S overnight. I ended up wearing the small but the xs May have felt better on top. I'm a 36 B but I have hips so the small worked out better. I was constantly shimmying to pull the dress down but it worked and felt nice.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super comfortable! It has a bit of stretch and I would say it runs a little big.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Wore it out in Vegas one night and it was super comfortable and flattering. you won't be disappointed it!
Fun and great for vacation. Very comfy. I got the M and L. I wore the M. I'm 5'9" 145lbs with Ds.

links_reviews_title: Form fitting dress with a flair
links_reviews_text: This dress ran a bit large, so I'm glad I went down a size for my backup! I got a lot of compliments about this dress, it was a hit at my cousin's wedding. I was not expecting the scuba material, but I liked that it was a bit stretchy and form-fitting without being inappropriate for a family event. There was a bit of pilling on the dress, and the material that goes from the front and makes the sleeves was not hemmed so there was some slight fraying along the bottom edge. This was not super noticeable unless looked at very up close. The sleeves were a bit looser and longer than I was anticipating, but they still looked cute and were not restrictive to my movements at all. I was able to dance and have a good time no problem all night. Overall I liked this dress and how it fit, but I wouldn't purchase it at the full retail price.

I love this dress! The fabric is stretchy and comfortable, and the sleeves make it really special. My only complaint is the fit in the bust wasn't quite right, and gaped on the sides. I had to use safety pins to bring it in on both sides.

Wore this for a Havana themed fundraiser. The fit was amazing! Glad I read the other reviews and ordered a size down because had I gotten the large it would have been too big. The biggest part is really the arms as it's off the shoulder and bed t loose. But it worked! Would rent this again.
Beautiful style and print. Comfortable and stylish fit. Flattering cut and ruffles.

The dress definitely runs a little big. I ordered this dress twice. The first time (pictured) I wore the S, and the next time I wore the XS. I've recently gained weight and am mostly wearing size 8, so I was surprised to fit so comfortably in the XS, but the stretchy material made this fit like a dream. I'm 5'1" and it was a lot longer on me than the model, but it was such a fun dress to wear and fit the Havana Nights theme of both parties really well. I loved this dress so much I scoured the internet and luckily was able to purchase it.
Fit was a little large but beautiful dress!
Runs big. Recommend sizing down

links_reviews_title: Great color and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Great stretch which allowed me to wear size S when most of the time I wear a M. A bit longer than I would've liked but fine since I wore high platform shoes. Wore a strapless bra and used fashion tape to keep the sleeves from falling to low.

Rented this dress for a friends wedding. Colors on dress are really vibrant and prettier in person than in pictures. This dress runs pretty big so I would size down. Material is really stretchy which is helpful for curvy girls! The print and material is very flattering I didn't need to wear spanx (yay) bc it covered so well

As everyone states, the dress does run large. I usually wear a med/large and ended up wearing the small. It is incredibly comfortable and provides just the right amount of color without being too obnoxious.

This dress was extremely comfortable. The Davis was soft and stretchy. I received lots of compliments throughout the night. I don't think it necessarily runs large, rather the rental I received was a little stretched out (especially near the armpits). Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress! Got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding, felt comfortable and pretty in it all night. It fitted well, loved the color and pattern.

Wore this for my anniversary dinner in the city and it was great. It's SUPER STRETCHY, and even the XS was a bit big to me. This made it so comfy to eat dinner AND desert without the fear of thinking my dress would bust. The pattern is loud and makes you stand out. My boyfriend said that some people in the restaurant thought I was someone important....soo yeah. Haha

Very fun pattern and funky sleeves make this dress EXTRA. Believe the reviews when we say this dress runs large. I wore a small and had wiggle room to spare, and I am usually a medium and sometimes large. The straps were a bit too long so I pinned them in the back so the neckline hit higher and there wasn't extra material in the chest area. The cut shows off shoulders and booty, and flatters an hourglass figure.
I wore this to a daytime wedding and was glad that it had stretchy fabric. It was really comfortable and forgiving. The sleeves however were too big but manageable.

This runs very large. Because the material is so stretchy I was able to wear an XS and I'm usually a medium in most dresses. I loved it, it felt very Miami in the 50's Chic. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the bottom half of the dress was a little pilly. Otherwise, super comfy and was great to wear all night for the summer wedding.

Loved wearing this dress! Stretchy material made it so easy for maneuvering while emceeing an event. I will say, it was so stretchy, I could've worn an XS for a more snug fit, as I still had room in the bust area. Great floral and ideal for a festive occasion!

I agree with other reviewers: this dress does run large. I usually wear a size small but wore an extra small instead. I found that the top of the size small was very loose. Because I have bigger hips and a bigger butt, I did feel like the bottom was a little tight. Overall, this was a beautiful dress and I was so sad that I had to return it. I wore it to my birthday dinner and everyone loved it. It was very figure-flattering (I am pear-shaped). It was stretchy as well. I was worried that since I'm petite (5'1"), that it would be too long on me but it looked great!

I rented this for my little sisters bridal shower and it was everything. It's a scuba type material so it's thick, smooth, and stretchy. It was perfect for me to run around and perform all of my Maid of Honor duties the morning of the shower, then throw on my heels and look fabulous for the rest of party (no wrinkles!). The other reviews mentioned that the sleeves were strange, but I saw no issue in them at all. This dress was snug, but helped smooth out lumps into curves, and I could easily wear a regular strapless bra. It was incredibly comfortable, the colors were gorgeous, and I got compliments the whole day. Definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great in design and colors. I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The top section ran a little larger than expected, but I was able to manage it. Material is very soft and stretchy. Not too tight, gives you enough room to move around. Great Dress

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, sadly couldn't fill the top out
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Very stretchy material, almost like yoga pants. The top however was very loose to the point I could have fit a small load of groceries in there. Had to be a bit creative in clipping up the straps so it didn't droop. Should have probably sized down.

I liked but didn't love this dress. It was a little too long for by height. Not the most flattering. Fabric was awesome and it was comfortable. Ran large. I usually am a small or medium and I wore an XS

I rented this dress for the bridal shower at a more formal venue for a wedding in which I'm a bridesmaid. The dress is absolutely gorgeous and extremely comfortable. I rented the medium with a backup large based on other reviews that the dress runs large. I wore the medium. I'm not large chested and the top of the dress was definitely large on me, though with the ruffles and pattern it doesn't appear that way. The bottom half of the dress is very form fitting but the pattern is very forgiving and I felt totally comfortable (though I had on the spanx to help). One thing, I did feel like I was shimmying the dress down all day...perhaps it's the snug fit on the lower half of the dress? It was a small inconvenience though because I truly just loved this dress! Also, if you're going to be outside for long periods of time on a hot day and if you're like me who absolutely MELTS in humidity, I wouldn't recommend this dress because the scuba fabric and length traps that heat! Thankfully I was mostly in AC but had to change after spending some time outside. All said and done, I would definitely rent this dress again!

This dress fit perfectly into the theme and was comfortable to wear all night long. I ordered an XL and a M because a L (my usual size) was unavailable. I ended up wearing the M as this dress runs large (which I had read in previous reviews)

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on the dress, the fit, and the color.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. It was comfortable and perfect for the occasion. I was able to wear a regular bra and you could not see the straps through the lace. I am petite and only 5'1 and the dress was the perfect length.

I'm reliably a size 4 in most dresses I rent (unless it's very clear it doesn't run TTS). This dress looked extremely tight so I couldn't wear it. The collar also showed quite a bit of wear on the lace detail.

I am a solid size 10. Occasionally my chest is slightly bigger, but a 12\large is usually just a little too big for me. This dress was tight in the 10! But it does have just a little give, and after trying on a few other dresses, we decided to go with this one. I was able to move and sit fine, but I definitely needed to sit up and stand up straight. Love the dress, though. Wish the 12 was available to try. It's so flattering, I would love to purchase it.
I loved this dress and so did everyone else! The color was beautiful and it fit perfectly. I thought it was very true to size and I could move and dance all night without it feeling uncomfortable.
This was a beautiful dress with lots of detail! I'm short, I wish the torso wasn't so long but overall it was a great fit!

Fit True to size, though I went with the larger size so I would have some room to breathe! I thought it would bother me being more fitted but was actually really comfortable and easy to dance in! Bonus that i could wear a normal nude bra.
I wore this to a wedding and felt great in it. It fits true to size and is very flattering. I got tons of compliments. Highly recommend!

This dress fit perfectly. I am normally between a size 6-8 because of my breasts. (34DD) but the 6 was just right - tight fitted, just like I wanted it! If you want some wiggly room I definitely recommend going up a size if you have hips/boobs. But besides that I would rent this again!! Loved it.
Rented for a work party that I hosted for clients. It fit true to size. More on the conservative side which was appropriate for the event. Great red! Very pretty. Compliments!
This dress was a winner! It fit perfectly and I got tons of compliments all night. It was comfortable yet elegant and perfect for a night of dancing. Would definitely rent this dress again!

The other reviews sold me on this dress. Boss lady! It's a friendly-sizing on the hips. I'm usually a size 6 hip and the 4 fit perfectly. (I'm a size 39.5 at the widest part of my hip). The lace at the neck is a little worn. I was at a large event and people I didn't know remembered the dress. It's a stand out
I got so many compliments on this for the pop of color and the texture of the lace!

I typically wear a 2 but went with the 4 in this dress. The 2 would have fit but the band in the middle was a little tight and would have made eating and sitting down a bit more uncomfortable. I'm 5'2" and the lace went about to the middle of my knee and the slip underneath it a little longer than mid thigh. Loved this dress, would rent again!
I am 5'2" and 123 lbs. the size 4 fit perfectly!
The fit was perfect with the right amount of structure

links_reviews_title: This dress was the perfect color red for our Christmas card photos this year.
links_reviews_text: No complaints about this dress. It was on point and comfortable.
Definitely fitted in the waist and chest, but great length!
Great dress , comfortable to wear and got lots of compliments all evening!
Definitely would wear this again. Great dress, modest yet sexy. Some sort of spanx are a must. Otherwise very comfortable.
This was a wonderful dress. The color was vibrant and the lace was delicate. I felt great in it and I really liked the length as well as the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: It does run a little snug. Overall loved it!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Lots of compliments. You definitely stand out in this. Had to iron the lace at collar, and it got a little wrinkly in mid section, but overall I loved it and would wear again. Probably would get 12 next time instead of 10 tho. I'm 5'8" 165 and it was snug.
I received a ton of complements on this dress. It fit great and looked amazing on. I could have gone without a bra in a size 6 but wore a size up for the length, so I needed a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Nice red lace dress for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: This was a more fitting dress but did have some stretch to it. It's a comfortable dress and fits true to size. I thought that overall it looked nice and was a good pick for a holiday party. The lace on the collar and sleeves looked worn and was even ripped in one spot. It wasn't noticeable when I wore it but when I'm renting a dress I want it to look new not worn.

I would absolutely recommend this dress! I wore it to a November wedding in NOLA. The dress was extremely comfortable and easy to wear. I wore the 4 (5'3", 128lbs, 34D) and possibly could have worn the 2 (so I would say it runs true to size to a little bit big). When the dress arrived the lace at the neck and shoulders wasn't standing up as I had hoped, but nothing a little bit of ironing couldn't fix! The color was great, the lace detail is ideal for hiding a less than flat tummy, I received many compliments and felt great all evening!
This dress was comfortable and classy. A size 0 may also have worked for those who prefer a more formfitting look.

links_reviews_title: Very easy return process! Will definitely use RTR again!
links_reviews_text: Was worried about length, but it was perfect. #christmasparty

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect for a work party
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress - beautiful red color, nice fit. Conservative enough for a work party but a little bit sexy. Felt great and fit comfortably! The red color would be flattering on all skin tones. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable. I am always worried about dresses being too short, but with the lace overlay it was perfect. The 8 fit well, but the 6 was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, excellent color and very comfortable. True to size and loved the neckline.

links_reviews_text: Wore this to a rehearsal dinner - got so many compliments. Tight fitting but comfortable. Gorgeous color.

This dress got a lot of compliments! I decided on the 0 so it was a bit more snug, but it wasn't super tight. Just the right amount of snug. It was a great length for a wedding. I went braless because of the design. It held the girls up nicely. Overall it was a great rental. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: In a sea of all black this red dress was a hit.
links_reviews_text: Usually a size 4, went with the 2, gave a better shape. Received compliments all night. Length was perfect for the Gala event.

I usually wear 2 but I ordered this dress as a backup and the only size left was 4. I was worried it would be a little big, but thanks to that, I was able to eat, drink and be comfortable while being flattering. One thing though, the dress needs some re-threading in the back as I think someone popped it while trying on.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: It was super comfortable and unique it made me feel confident. I got so many compliments!

I wore this beautiful dress for my tea ceremony and it was super comfortable! I read that the dress runs a bit big so I ended wearing the size 2. (I'm normally a size 4). Perfect for any occasion and any brides looking for a simple tea ceremony dress!

This dress is very comfortable. I'm 5'9", 140 lbs, and fit the size 4 or 6, but I opted for the 6 because it was looser and I wanted to dance at the wedding. It's a very easy dress to wear. I wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Otherwomen wore red but I was told how classy & beautiful the dress was. Loved it.Many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 4 and size 2. The 4 was way too big the 2 fit nice with some extra room for dancing. Loved it. So many compliments on the dress going to order from here again for NYE. Dress made it in time but was definitely cutting close to event date. Wish they gave more time to have the dress instead of rushing to send it back the next morning.

links_reviews_title: Used for a High School Reunion.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Beautiful Red color. Would rent again or buy it.
I loved this dress! So flattering, beautiful color and fit like a glove! Great dress!

The dress fit great and was perfect for my event. The lace was slightly torn by the chest and neckline but no one could tell. I usually wear petite dresses and being 5-2, this dress hit me in a great spot. I felt confident and the dress was comfortable all night. Fun to wear a pop of color when everyone else wore black or gray! I would wear this dress again and will use RTR again.
Super cute as long as you don't lift your arms. Cut is short but otherwise all around cute wear.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this shirt!
links_reviews_text: Fun patten and nice material that was light and airy. Perfect for a hot summer day. I had to cross the straps behind my head to get them to stay up. I received a few compliments. However, my husband hated the shirt.

links_reviews_title: This top has adorable frogs in the print!
links_reviews_text: Lovely top you can wear with anything! I thought the straps were kind of awkward with the neckline tieback, so I tucked them in. Also wore with white cutoff jeans

links_reviews_title: I loved this shirt so much, I night it! I tucked the black straps in the blouse and they stayed!
links_reviews_text: Great for any occasion!

links_reviews_title: Wore a RTR outfit to a outdoor Bob Segar concert.
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this top. The colors are vibrant and I really like that it ties at the neck. The Size M worked fine. I probably could have worn a size S since it's a loose fitting and flowy top. A couple of previous reviews noted that the shoulder straps were loose fitting and they looped them under the tie strap! Many thanks for that info and it worked like a charm!

links_reviews_title: Fun, Brightly colored blouse trimmed in black:)
links_reviews_text: Faux wrap top -very well made ;)

I got this blouse for a beach vacation and it was just beautiful. The silk fabric and vibrant colors make it a little bit dressier without being over the top. The shoulder straps were a bit long and sometimes fell down, but I loved that there was a tie around the neck that had flowing straps down the back after they were tied. I would definitely rent this again.
Had a hard time picking what to wear it with since this seems to go so well with everything! Lots of complements, fun and easy!

links_reviews_title: Bright, perfect for a bold look day or night
links_reviews_text: The only thing I'd mention is that the front has a large flyaway "flap" - it doesn't show skin but when the wind blows it billows around and might not be great for an outdoor-only event or beach trip because of it. Aside from that, amazing shirt--beautiful colors, style and fabric.

The Perfect lightweight top for summer fun. The halter top ties In the back in a bow tie- which would be great to show off with your hair up! The nice thing about the way this is cut is that you can wear a regular strapless bra without a problem. The back of the top is longer in the back than the front which gives it a nice line. I think this would look equally great with both jeans, or dressed up with a narrow skirt.
This top is fun and fits well! I wore it for my first day of work and felt confident and pretty. Good for work to HH.

I get serious vacation vibes from this top! Super comfortable and flattering. This runs true to size and is great for any cup size. It is very loose fitting and flowy. This top may be worn with a standard bra. The fabric has no stretch. Pair this with a gold cuff or simple earrings!
Fun, different, casual top. Gave the sexy element to laid back style :-)

Bold print, very pretty colors. Shoulder straps are wide, but as another mentioned, loop the tie ribbon through the straps and problem solved; and it's a cute solution too. I think this easy wearing, bold, colorful, pretty print is a "must wear" for Florida ladies.

I should have sized down to the xs but I am looking forward to taking this top On vacation. The fabric is light and flowy. Cool in the heat!! Straps are cute and I don't really have the problem with them falling down that others had Very adjustable tie neck. Not my normal style but would definitely rent again.
This dress is adorable but not for people with narrow shoulders. The black straps slipped off constantly making it uncomfortable to wear.

I didn't really fall for this shirt until about a month of seeing it. Decided to rent it and love it. Everyone is right about the straps on the sides being wide...but I looped my halter tie through the straps to bring them together and I think it looks even cuter that way! I probably won't rent this again because the print is a bit wild for me but I do really like it!

I loved this top! Bright, colorful and so fun! The fit was just what I expected, the only warning I might offer is that the shoulder straps are wide set so if you have narrow shoulders they might slip down a lot. The halter tie does its job keeping the top up though so it isn't too big of a problem. I paired this with the Piamita black ruffle piping pant as suggested by a RTR stylist and the two pieces really made each other Pop! Lots of compliments all around!

I really liked this top. It fit well. You could wear with or without a bra. The only complaint I have is the arm straps are quite far over on the shirt. Other than that I really liked it. Easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Adorable flowing scarf top w/ tree frogs! Too cute!
links_reviews_text: This silky scarf top is very comfortable & needs a strapless or NuBra. The shoulder straps don't adjust, but the tie around the neck (and cute bow) keeps the top in place. Love the trees frogs on the top! So cute for summer! It's a faux wrap top so ur safe if a big breeze blows ur way :)
Perfect, elegant, and romantic.
Didn't wear this too the large was way too big - the shoulder straps wouldn't stay up
the straps slide off your shoulders but otherwise great top!
Fun unique style for a vacation in Hawaii! The top fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: This was rented for a vacation in a resort in Central America.
links_reviews_text: I liked this top, but when I got it home, it just didn't fit right or fall on me right. I think the problem is that my trunk is too short and it kind of messed up the straps laying right and the neck tie.
Straps are a little long and I wore it with a strapless bra but received many compliments on the flowy fabric and bright colors. Easy to pair with black capris as the picture suggests.
This top is beautiful, flowy, and easy. The only issue I had is that the straps were falling down constantly. Maybe some garment tape would help with this?
Cool for hot weather

I wore this top out to dinner with friends. It was cute, but nothing that exciting. The straps are long, so I crisscrossed them and then tied it in the back. It was a festive top for a summer night out with friends.

This top would be great for a summer tropical vacation with it's bright print covered in quirky tree frogs. It is a billowing top, which does not flatter all body types, but there's not too much material that it can be tucked into a high waisted skirt or pants to accentuate the waistline if one is needed (like I need). The only issue with the top is the straps. I am 5'9 and have broad shoulders, and they fell down over and over, with very little prompting. For this reason I have to reduce the stars, and let smaller ladies know what they are in for if they rent this piece. I got to the point of pulling them off to the side and wearing it as if the straps were meant to be across my arms for the rest of the day.
This top runs large but it's super cute. I paired it with with high waisted skinny jeans and well as a pair of cut off denim shorts. Gorgeous colors and print--just wish i would've sized down.
I enjoyed the design and style of the top but the two black straps were too loose and falling off.

This shirt is cute but I wasn't as impressed in real life compared to the photo. It's really thin and lightweight but the screen printing looks a bit cheap to me. The colors are vibrant and unique which I liked. I wore a strapless bra and there was plenty of room as I am small busted- not sure how well it would look on large busted women. I have a long torso and it was short- not cropped but shorter than I generally wear. I styled it with a lightweight black cardigan for work over black pants. Overall I wouldn't rent it again but I'm glad I tried it!
very pretty and comfy
The fit is gorgeous and adjustable. I'm such a fan of this fun print and adorable fit.

Fits true to size. Love how flowy and vibrant the silk is. Looks even more beautiful in person. The frogs hidden in the patterns are really cute. The shoulder straps weren't a problem for me. I wore the top both ways with the middle neck tie around the back of the straps and without it that way: no issues! I saw this top in a boutique a few months ago and fell in love with it, but not the crazy price tag. I was so excited to see it on RTR!

links_reviews_title: Great top that can be dressed up or down!
links_reviews_text: I have narrow shoulders so straps were a little loose but too looked really cute. Loved the colors and pattern!

links_reviews_title: This top was cute, but a little too much fabric for me through the middle.
links_reviews_text: I really did love this top for a lot of valid fashion reasons, but I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the straps kept falling off my shoulders (even with tape) and I felt like I looked a little fat from the side view with all the fabric moving around the front.
The straps were too big for me and I couldn't adjust to fit. Great colors and cute style just wouldn't work for my frame.
This is a nice light weight shirt with popping color.

This dress is a lace dream. It's very forgiving in the tummy and hips, as the skirt creates a beautiful figure. I couldn't love it because the straps on the red slip under the lace were huge and there's no way to adjust them. The slip kept moving and showing my bra so I didn't end up wearing it. The fit was a bit off, it bunched up in the back, like there was extra space so I probably could've gotten away with a 10 and just wear shapewear underneath. This one is meant to show off curves.

I really liked this dress! I am 5’3” and about 120 lbs, usually between a size 2 and 4, and the dress ran true to those sizes. I am a little bigger on bottom than top, and the size 2 was a tiny bit snug across my hips, but the size 4 was just a little looser than I wanted. Length was pretty perfect in both. I threw in some Spanx and went with the 2, and I felt good in it all evening for a black tie fundraiser. Would recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and so comfy
links_reviews_text: I was surprised how well it fit. It looks like it would be skin tight but it's not. It doesn't show any bunched undergarments and the under-layer feels like a second skin. My only complaint was the sleeve detail of the lace edge refused to stay flat but it didn't look bad, just like it had been hemmed there. Definently on my would rent again list. I usually wear long/tall in styles and it was the perfect length, just hovering over the ground even with my 2-3" heels. I range b/t a size 10-12.

I wore this for an arts awards reception and received compliments all night long! The size 6 was a bit looser than I expected but very flattering. I have a short torso and the straps on the inner layer aren't adjustable so I went with pasties instead of a bra so it wouldn't show.

links_reviews_title: Wore this red beauty to a fundraiser gala and I got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The 6R fit perfectly. I could wear a regular (nude) bra and felt like this flattered me in the right places. I would highly recommend this dress; it feels glam and sexy but is actually comfortable too!
y'all...not only did i feel sexy in this gorgeous dress but i also felt strong & confident. if you want to be a total smoke show, rent it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my friend's Valima (wedding reception).
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 10 and this dress was snug on the hips and a bit big in the bust. The long length was perfect with my three inch heels and I got a lot of compliments on the dress.

links_reviews_title: Murder mystery for my 30th birthday party. I was the murder victim!
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING! It was actually my back-up dress, but I loved it so much more than the main dress I had selected. This dress is absolutely beautiful. I have an hourglass shape, which it flattered very nicely. I started out wearing shapewear and a strapless bra underneath, but took them off partway through the evening because this dress did not need them! I am 5' 9" tall, and the 6L size was long enough to brush the floor when I was barefoot. Also, not only did this dress fit well, but it was also extremely comfortable. I could stand, walk, and sit without any issues. It even looked good during my death scene, as I was the murder victim at my own murder mystery party! Overall, I was thrilled with this dress! Sending it back was one of the hardest things I've had to do! The best advice I can give to anyone who is considering this dress is to RENT IT. Believe me, you won't regret it!!

links_reviews_title: My husband won 3 Emmys and my dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: So comfortable! The dress is stretchy and easy to move in. Loved the color. I felt fantastic in it!
Fits true to size, I'm 5'6" and long wasn't a problem with heels on. Red part at top is see through lace so you need a nude bra or strapless but I made it work. Overall very comfortable.
A little long. I wore low heels and occasionally it got caught in the dress. Otherwise, fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, but very short!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately I was not able to wear heels with this dress because flat-footed it didn't even touch the ground (5'5"). It made for happier feet, but it felt weird being at a formal event without heels on. I wore the 2R and it fit for the most part. I have a small waist and have thicker thighs and butt, so it was a bit loose in the waist, and snug (but not uncomfortably so) in the butt/thigh area. For reference, my bust measures around 35", waist 28", and butt 42". Top fit perfectly. There was a weird thing with the sleeves where it looked like someone had folded the scallops under at some point, so throughout the evening some of them were out and some were still folded under. Not a big deal, just a little annoying,

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This definitely fits true to size...not too tight in any one area. The lace is gorgeous and I had no problems with the zipper or any threading coming loose. I never wear red and was hesitant, however, this red is absolutely beautiful and stunning in photos!

links_reviews_title: Lovely night with a great man by my side.
links_reviews_text: This was the back up of the backup dress. I tried it on and my boyfriend loved it.. Wore it to his military ball.. Fit great really loved it and got alot of compliments.
I was looking for something to camouflage my post partum belly and this dress did a pretty good job! Made me feel elegant! Length was perfect for me with 2” heels.

links_reviews_title: The dress made me feel so gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: This was my first time renting a dress from rent the runway. I was a little skeptical at first but being able to read the reviews and see pictures really help me find it the perfect dress for my event. I was so happy with the dresses I was sent- the fit was excellent, quality was wonderful... I couldn’t be happier. I will definitely be renting from Rent the Runway again! One word of advice, be sure to read the size details from other users. I sized down as other women said the dress friends large and it was a great decision .
It's a gorgeous dress! I'm 5'9160lbs, the 8long fit me perfectly with some length for heels. I have a more athletic body type and it gave me some curves! Perfect for a black tie wedding.
absolutely loved this dress! very chic and a great color and length for a winter wedding. it was also super comfortable which was such a big plus. I would absolutely wear this again in the future!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and lace. And I could breath and dance all night!
links_reviews_text: Maybe ran a little big but not enough to detour me from wearing it. I felt pretty in it. Room to breath, eat/drink and dance. I wore y'all heels and the 10R was a great length.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly and made me feel great!
links_reviews_text: I am 5’5 and usually wear a size 8 or 10 dress. The 10R fit me like a glove! It nipped in my waist and was the perfect length. The color is not bright but not dark like a “wine” color. It’s a rich and beautiful “ruby”. This was my first time using RTR and I’ll definitely will be a customer again. I wish this dress was in my closet!

This was my first RTR order and I haven't worn a formal dress in over a year so I was really nervous about sizing. I ordered the 8R and 6R and both fit but I ended up going with the 6R as it was shorter and fit more snug. Overall, it was a comfortable dress! I wished I could adjust the straps on the slip on the inside as they were too long and I would've felt more secure if they could have been higher. The cap sleeves do emphasize your upper arm area, which can be unflattering, and it does still show a stomach pooch even with Spanx on. I wore sticky boobs as to not show the straps or the side of the bra. My heels were about 2-3 inches.

I read the reviews, sized down and got a long. The dress fit perfectly! I didn't wear much of a heel, and the length was still not too long on my 5'6 frame. I highly recommend this dress!! I received compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my engagement photos and it turned out beautifully! The red is stunning!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and is very comfortable.. it sat right on the ground.
Beautiful in person. Runs large for sure, typically wear a 6 and on this one the 4 fit perfect. Length was great also - ordered the long and was perfect with small heels. I am 5'9".

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress - comfortable, feminine and red.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a formal affair of 200 people and it met all my requirements. I wanted a red dress, it had to be comfortable with somewhat of a flowing skirt that allowed for a lot of dancing, and I liked that the lace went to the shoulders with a small cap sleeve. I'm somewhat modest and didn't want to worry about anything 'falling out' if I bent over, or too skin tight given I was the guest of honor at an awards ceremony. It fit loose enough to be very comfortable. One caveat - the dress is surprisingly plain in person. A large bling necklace was perfect. Also, it is tailored for a far larger bust line than I have. I am a modest B cup, and I didn't even realize until I saw the pictures that it folded in rather than fit tight across the bust, even with a strapless pushup bra. Overall it was very comfortable, I felt confident in it, it fit great, and was elegant but not over the top. I wore the 10L. I am 5'8" so needed 3" heels.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove!! Danced the night away and felt absolutely beautiful. Endless compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9 and the long was perfect with a wedge heel!
I loved the fit and color!

links_reviews_title: Stunning - runs a bit large so size down
links_reviews_text: This dress runs a bit larger than average, so definitely consider a size down for your 'back up' size. I got many complements and loved the red lace. It was long enough to just miss the floor in 4 inch heels (I'm 5'4.5 exactly, so something to consider). I was very happy with this dress.
The dress is surprisingly pretty blah in person. Doesn't have any structure to it and a bit on the shorter side in where it falls.

I rented this for a military dining out event. It was actually my backup, but had more wow than my original choice. It ran true to size, but spanx were definitely needed. My only "compliant" is that it was a little short. I'm 5'7", wore flats and a regular length still barely touched the ground.

Wore this gown for the formal/black-tie portion of a Middle Eastern wedding. The color was beautiful, and the fit very flattering. Length was perfect - just long enough to graze the floor but not so long that I felt like I was going to trip (I am 5'5, wore the gown with approximately 3 inch heels). Easy to move in, not itchy at all.
Fit wonderfully, loved the deep rich red color
This dress was simply stunning and I received soooooo many compliments! I would rent again and super comfortable ... love this app!

Not dressy enough for formal gala so didn't wear. It's actually a little plain in person in my opinion. Does run large so size down 1-2 sizes. Fits nice and was flattering to my body shape and has plenty of stretch. I felt like I looked like a bridesmaid which was not what I was going for, so I didn't wear.
Beautiful gown worn to a military ball. Fit perfectly, confortable and true to size. Usual 4 and wore 4.

I wore this to a black tie gala. I ordered both the 12 and 10 and wore the 10. It fit perfectly although it was a bit short. I am 5'6" and definitely could have gone with the long to cover my heels. The dress is very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for a black tie work event with a country chic theme
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a black tie gala I was working for my job. The theme was country chic and i needed to make sure it was work appropriate and this dress was perfect! I got so many compliments on this dress. The dress runs a little big as the material has a little give to it, I normally wear a size 4 but the 2 fit perfectly without being too tight!
Rented this for a holiday party. The color is lovely and the dress was floorlength with 4" heels. I wasn't crazy about the sleeve length though - thought they emphasized my upper arms.

This dress was gorgeous on! I rented it for a Christmas party and it was very festive! I got both the 12 regular and the 10 long, and ended up wearing the 10. The 12 looked kind of matronly and was too short for me, but the 10 fit like a glove. I got a ton of compliments on this and felt pretty!
I put a navy jacket on top to work, then took the jacket off for the evening outing. very versatile and sexy lacy dress.
Loved the fit of this dress. Great for pear shaped bodies. Fit TTS. I am 5'4" /B cups/ 125lbs and size 0 fit great.

I rented this dress for a wedding and couldn't have been happier. It was so comfy for the 13 hours I wore it and I got tons of compliments. The black cuff detail paired so nicely with my black statement earrings and pumps. I'm seriously considering buying!

It's Tuesday before our event on Saturday and I have nothing to wear, so I naturally hop on RTR and found this beautiful dress available. I'm 5'7, 145 lbs, still not back into pre-baby shape but this dress just fit so perfectly, it was definitely helping me out. Very flattering! I rented the 6 and 8 and the 6 ended up fitting better surprisingly. I felt amazing in it, got lots of compliments and it was comfortable! Thank you RTR!
Loved it! Comfortable and photographed very well!

The dress was beautiful. I loved the fit. I have a larger upper body and it fit my arms and breast really well. My husband loved the dress as well and wanted me to keep it. It was perfect for a slightly chilly Nashville wedding.

I ordered this dress for my sister in laws wedding! At first I thought the dress looked more for a younger girl, but it was actually so beautiful! I paired it with gold heals, that had pink and burgundy flowers, it looked perfect together! I got so many compliments all night long! It's sexy and classy altogether! I ordered a size 2 and 4, I went with the size 2, since I like a snug fit. I'm 5'1 and weigh 140 lbs. Bust size 34DD. I ordered it Wednesday and got the dresses the next day! Arrived on time, and would 100% recommend this site and order again!

This dress is SO CUTE! The 10 fit me to a T, but I wanted a little dancing room so I went with the 12. Loved the lace & the black accents. Worked perfect for the wedding I had this past weekend. I received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a winter wedding. Got compliments all night!!!
links_reviews_text: The overall fit of the dress was exactly as I expected for a size 12. The lace was beautiful and being a first time renter the process was super easy. The sleeves hit just before my wrist so food and cocktails were not a concern. The only negative I had for it was the length. For someone who is 5'8" with long legs, the bottom of the dress would have been inappropriately short without pantyhose underneath.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a winter wedding and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 8 with the 6 as a back up since reviews had said this dress either runs true to size or too big. I went with my normal size 8 just to get more length in the dress since the 6 felt too short. The navy color of the dress was perfect and my accessories popped against it. I was so happy I picked this dress to wear to my brother's wedding!!

links_reviews_title: Lovely! Perfectly classy dressy to wear to a winter wedding at a ski resort.
links_reviews_text: I wanted a pretty, ladylike dress with long sleeves that would pair with black tights and booties for a winter wedding. I was very pleased with this. As noted in other reviews, the lace is a navy, but the sleeves and neck have black. Sleeves were a bit big, but overall, this was very flattering and I could easily dancy in this. Paired with the Rebecca Minkoff glitter clutch for a fun pop.

links_reviews_title: Wow! First experience with rent the runway was amazing! Looking forward to my next.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely perfect dress for my birthday party. Fit was perfect and dress arrived on time and ready to be worn.

This dress is stunning! The lace detailing is so intricate and I love the black accents - makes it easy to wear with black tights and/or black shoes! The bodice is a little tight, so I probably could have worn a size up for a little extra comfort! Would rent again!

Fits true to size. I took a chance and ordered my usual size 8 and it fit pretty well. The detailed ruffles at the end of the sleeves (wrist area) add a feminine twist. Wore this to an evening wedding. Appropriate for cold weather. The zipper is a little hard but not bad if you have another person to help you with it.

Fit just right for a six, some give in the stomach where I try to hide my issues. Haha I'm a 34dd, 138lb, straight waist, athletic build at 5'5". Slightly wider back but the dress accommodated well. Many compliments. Very pleased.
This dress fit well, travelled well (no wrinkling) and gained me many compliments at an awards dinner.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my company Christmas party. Got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm tall (5'10) and usually wear a size 8. I'm also super flat-chested - if I had had anything going on in the chest area, I would have needed a size 10.

links_reviews_title: Non stop compliments. Loved the fit
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work Christmas party, everyone loved it, at first I didn't like the waste line, I have a little pudge in the stomachs I'm not happy about but I sucked it up and wore it, I loved it and everyone else did too, so happy I wore it and it was my first time renting from this site. Great experience and great first pick. True to size, not itchy and very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: If I had somewhere else to wear this, i would buy it! It was so comfortable and beautiful, and I was complimented all night. I chose to go braless as even a black bra was very visible through the upper part, but even though it was cold I had no problems. I'd definitely rent it again!

Loved this dress! The color was a perfect navy blue and it fit great. I'm 5' 7" 135 lbs and I wore a size 4. The size 6 fit and didn't look too big, but it offered more room in certain areas than I needed. At my height the length was right on the verge of being too short. I would not have felt comfortable without hose/tights on. The lace and details gave it a very feminine feel. I'm very happy with this one!!
The navy blue color of this dress was very pretty and I really liked having the long sleeves at my husband's office Christmas party. The dress was very comfortable and a great quality.

Loved this dress! So comfortable and received many compliments! Loved how it had black on the neckline and on the sleeves because then I felt like I could get away with wearing black tights. Only con would be it was short in the sleeves but I also have long arms (5'11").
Loved this dress. It was a great length and weight. I was able to move around and didnt feel stuffy. It was bluer in person that I realized but perfect.
Such a pretty dress! Got lots of compliments. The only thing negative i could say is that it was semi loose around my waist but fit fine everywhere else. Looked great with tights on as well!

I rented this dress for a fundraising gala and it was perfect! I'm usually a 4 but often size down to a 2 in dresses (especially A-line) because I'm smaller on top and that's what I did in this one. The dress was very comfortable, not itchy at all like some lace dresses, and I got lots of compliments! Bonus points for needing minimal accessories due to the details on the dress and the long sleeves. I would absolutely rent this one again!
Dress ran large. This 10 had plenty of extra room but I still wore it because I went for comfort. The 8 fit just right that I knew it'd be too snug sitting at dinner for a couple hours. Recommend!
Nothing special. I didn't end up wearing it. 6 was small and 8 was big

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments all night long.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress. I’m 4’9 and the length was perfect, however it did run big.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress was perfect for a fall cool weather wedding. Received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: The dress I would say runs true to size. I am 5ft4in 123lbs pear shaped body. I am very small up top and due to the cut of the dress I could have most likely gone down to a size 2 but wore the 4 bc the sizes sent were a 4 and 6. The waist and skirt area is very A line and forgiving which was fabulous for my body shape. The dress was well made and I enjoyed wearing it.

This dress is lovely. It's the perfect combination of cute and comfortable, it's not too long or too short and can be worn at more formal events or even to a nice dinner out. I felt gorgeous and received compliments all night long. This is my second time renting the dress, and I wish I could buy it!
The dress fit as expected. I received several compliments on it. I felt very comfortable wearing it all day and night!
. Waist line fell a little high. But overall liked it. Clasp and zipper are quite old but they work well just got stuck. Got soooo many compliments on this dress

I really loved this dress for my first RTR experience. I am a little bustier so the 10 was more comfortable on me. I was nervous that it was too short being at a family wedding but my husband and girlfriends convinced me to wear it and show off my legs lol. One issue I had was with the zipper, it kept getting stuck in the track so you can tell this dress has been used quite a bit. I would definitely use RTR again.
This dress is phenomenal!! Perfect fit, super flattering. I didn't even need a strapless bra, nude doesn't show through the top part. Love this dress, the details are impeccable

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable dress for a Fall wedding in the mountains
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size, but the waist was not at fitted as I wanted. The length of the dress and the sleeves were perfect. The lace sleeves didn't scratch, which was great. I would definitely wear the dress again. Despite the waist being a little loose, I think wearing one size down would have made the dress too small. I was unable to order it in a size 10, because it was unavailable when I needed it, so I can't be sure that a 10 wouldn't have worked. I am a true size 12.
This dress fit true to size. The lace really stood out in my photos.
Perfect for a winter wedding event. Was a tad shorter than I would like but thought it might be based on style and reviews. Sleeves were not too tight.

So I ordered this dress in an 8 and a 10, but what got delivered was an 8 and a 6.. when I tried them off I hadnt realized the wrong size was delivered and fit perfectly into what I thought was a size 8, but it ended up being a 6 (first time I've ever worn a size 6!). This dress was super comfortable and great to dance in. I don't know if it runs big, and that's why I fit into a 6, or if I've lost more weight than I thought I did. Either way, it was a great first RTR experience!
This dress fit great - I am a true size 12. It was a tiny bit short but not terrible - I am 5'11 so most dresses run a bit shorter on me anyway. Perfect for a winter wedding!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing. I recieved so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Not too short for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is thick and nice and the ruffle jazzes it up. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Chic, slim fitting dress - loved it!
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size. Was able to wear a regular bra, which is a real plus. Not too short, not too long on my petite frame. A perfect LBD!

links_reviews_title: Great fit , a little flare, classic and classy LBD
Show some leg , nice twice to a basic LBD
links_reviews_text: A shape hugging fit. I usually wear a 4 in dresses and could not have gone 1 inch smaller. Fabric gathers a little in the stomach but not bad bc it not skin tight. Might not be for the big busted, I'm a 32 and didn't need a bra

This dress is really stunning. I'm in between sizes right now. I'm 5'2, 34 A bust, 29 waist, 130lbs and short waisted. I'm bouncing between 2-6 with various designers and went with the four based on the reviews I read. The 4 was tight, but not uncomfortable, minus the skirt scoot being done on occasion. If you're looking to wear this to a formal or business occasion and match my size- size UP. If you're my size and going out with your GFs then the 4 might be the tight and sexy look you want. It's all about preference. Just don't eat a big meal. It's not a friend to food babies.
Dress was cute. Fit pretty much true to size. Wasn't constantly pulling it down all night. Could wear a normal bra with it. Ruffles were fun and didn't seem to get in the way.

links_reviews_title: Great, simple dress with a touch of character
links_reviews_text: Loved the side ruffle on this simple dress. I ordered the 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 6, which just fit me. If you normally wear a 6 you might want to size up because 6s are usually a bit large for me. Modest while still a little sexy and short but not too short. The fabric was lighter than I expected but it still felt like everything was properly covered.

I'm not a huge fan of the ruffle but it adds something to the dress. The big selling point with this LBD is the fit! It hugs your curves in a flattering way and the fabric is very forgiving. I've definitely considered buying it and if not, will likely rent again.

links_reviews_title: needed next size, and it was not available
links_reviews_text: Size 6 did not fit
Fit true to size!

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress but not if you're small w curves
links_reviews_text: Fabric was thick. Well made. Had stretch to it as well. I am a size 4 but have small waist and am curvy. The back area did that weird extra fabric deal that's just not flattering and adds weight on. It was also 2-3 inches shorter than I normally wear.

links_reviews_title: A LBD with a little flair.
links_reviews_text: Well made dress, liked the ruffle. Didn't end up wearing it for work conference but I'd still recommend

This dress was pretty but overall just felt kind of meh about it. The low neck was fun since I don't usually wear a low neckline! I liked that it was longer to make up for the low neck and not be TOO much. I probably won't rent this again but it worked and it fit well.

Probably my favorite RTR dress I've ever worn and I've been renting for almost 5 years! I loved everything about this dress- the color, cut, and fabric. I love renting because I never have to wear the same dress twice to an event, but this is one dress I would love to rent again!

Absolutely loved this dress. I received compliments all night! Super comfortable and great tea length. The V is super low, I did have to use fashion tape to help cover up some. Would rent again a million times over!
I am 5'3" and 160 lbs and this dress fit me perfectly! I felt so beautiful and received numerous compliments. Loved the plunging neckline and high slit to make an otherwise modest dress feel sexy.

links_reviews_title: Low cut chest, high slit, gorgeous fabric
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric. It felt very special for the holidays. The leg slit was so high it was not appropriate for a family gathering that I had intended it for. It was a little low in my chest so you could see my bra at times. Overall it was pretty, but more risky than I had hoped.

links_reviews_title: elegant but sassy with a leg slit
links_reviews_text: Wore for a winter brunch wedding. I'm 5'7, 130 and usually wear a small but could only get a medium. It was a smidge loose in the boobs but otherwise totally worked! Lots of compliments all day.

I loved this dress, it was my first time renting. I was surprised with the quality of the dress and ease of the process. It was stunning and comfortable. I rented it for a company Christmas party, and I would say it's a little booby. I may have been able to fit in a small but it didn't look bad at all. It flowed when I walked and the velvet and color were perfect for the event. It wasn't too warm but it definitely was nice for colder weather.

links_reviews_title: The fit and the slit were perfect!! And the fabric is so soft and pretty.
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress, I didn't want to take it off. The sleeves and sheer and the slit is pretty high, so very sexy. And the neckline is a very deep v, wore a push up bra and it was amazing! I'm rather small chested so I've never had my chest look that good before. Lol. It was absolutely amazing! Show stopper. I wore it with black pointy toed heels and it was perfect.

I felt beautiful and all my friends could not stop complimenting this dress. Classy but sexy. It may be my favorite rental yet. Fit like a glove, moved beautifully, and was comfortable (always a must for me). Excuse the silly photo. I didn't have any non-silly photos!

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit, beautiful color, just enough sexy!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a fall wedding in upstate New York and absolutely loved it! It was a little snug in the band that wraps around your waist but it wasn't too bad. I received many compliments on this dress—it was a hit with the bride even! Highly recommend!!
Loved this dress! The color and texture was beautiful. It was a little tight in the chest area. The v is very low. Overall, I definitely recommend this dress. I received so many compliments.

I LOVED this dress! Such a unique pattern! It really stands out. The cut was very flattering. It was a tiny bit tight at the waist, but wearable. The v-neck was a bit low, so I ended up using a bit of double-stick tape. Overall, I recommend!

links_reviews_title: Am singing with the Santa Fe Opera this summer and wore this to the Opening Night company party!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I kept hearing how the ribcage was small in it so I got a medium ad a large just in case. My ribcage is larger being an opera singer, but the medium for me fit just wonderfully. *I would say it’s definitely an evening dress. It’s a bit too smoldering for my taste to wear to a day event, but to each her own. It’s a sexy, classy, beautiful dress that EVERYONE complimented me on. I wanted to buy it after!!

I added this dress to my order last minute when I found out there was a chance of snow at wedding I was attending. It was beautiful!! The color is perfect & the sleeves & calf-length definitely made it a great dress for the occasion. Most reviews say to size up because the middle is tight. I agree - I usually order a 4 & 6 or S & M, but the S wasn't available so I got a M & XS. I wore the M, definitely couldn't have fit in the XS, but I think a S would've been better. It's pretty revealing - I didn't have a sticky bra & a regular bra would've shown too much, so I used tape to hold everything down. Loved this dress, but it was one of the trickier & less comfortable dresses I've rented.

I normally wear a size 8 and wore a Medium. This dress is perfect for hourglass shapes since it hid my hips very well and accentuated my waist. The cleavage is pretty low and my chest is small, so I had to use body tape to keep it from showing. The slit is pretty high but I used the same body tape to close the slit.

I loved this dress! The velvet detail is beautiful, the length is long, and the color is great. The only con is that it runs small so I had to size up. Since I sized up the cut of the neck was too wide so I had to safety pin it closed

links_reviews_title: Not for the faint of fashion.
links_reviews_text: Color- eye catching Pattern-classy and elegant Cut-Sexy, but comfortable. I was never worried about anything being out of place and didn't find myself "adjusting" constantly. The neckline is DEEP, which is not my style but I loved it. The slit in the skirt adds one extra dimension of sexiness. The long sleeves were, frankly, a welcome bit of coverage. Overall- the zipper was a challenge, but only at the seams. Once it was on it was very comfortable. The dress is made to get attention. Put your most confident foot forward and party on!
Fantastic color! Even more vibrant in person. I love the velvet details! It fits beautifully. Would definitely rent again.
