Beautiful color and the plunging neckline wasn't too revealing on me. I wish the slit either wasn't there or wasn't as high. Other than that, a wonderful dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but ran very small
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress was gorgeous and I absolutely loved the style, material, and texture but the front was so low cut that I couldn't wear it. It also ran very very small.
I fell in love with this dress the moment I put it on. It was tight in the chest but I'm also small chested so it worked out perfectly and I could wear my normal bra with it.

Loved this dress! I got countless compliments all night long! It's a little revealing for larger chested girls, but I didn't mind it at all. The slit is VERY high up but I am not that tall so I didn't mind it either. The mid section is on the tighter side but it didn't bother me that much. Def will be renting this again!!

The split was perfectly placed, it gives the dress some sass. I also love the color and texture, that really made the dress stand out. The fit was perfect and true to size (small). The front is low cut however still very flattering on my small busy. I loved every second of wearing this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Fav dress I've ever worn for winter wedding
links_reviews_text: Wore to a friends winter wedding and received a ton of compliments!

Fit perfectly for me, gorgeous length and silhouette that complements my body type. Has a deep slit and a deep V neckline. Sleeves are sheer lace with velvet embossing detail. The color and the material make for a romantic mood. Good number for Vday dinner.
Loved this dress and especially the cut. I am a 32 C and have a tiny upper body and I was swimming in it a bit. Would look amazing on someone with a fuller chest.

Gorgeous dress! Fabric is amazing, love the pattern and high slit. Could have been one of my fave dresses but the empire waist is so tight. I'm a 36B so I have a larger rib cage and I could barely take a full breath. Highly recommended if you can do a tight waist. Otherwise- find another dress.

Wore a Med but I think I could have worn a small. Dress was low cut and slit pretty high on left leg. I have never worn anything like this & my husband was shocked when he saw me. He loved the dress on me. It was perfect for a winter evening event.

I'm 5'3 and weigh 138. I wore the medium. I will have to say the fit under your chest seemed very tight. The side zipper also was stubborn. If I rented again I would size up. I did receive lots of compliments! Such a beautiful dress for a winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: Overall too big and too small for my 5'2" frame
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress but sadly I didn't. The waist section was very small so if I did anything other than stand I wasn't comfortable. I couldn't imagine sitting for hours and eating comfortably. The length, on the other hand, was too long for my height. Between the length and the a-line cut, the whole dress look awkward and overwhelming. I think the dress is good for someone taller and slender.
Fit a bit tight in the rib cage and a bit loose in the waist, but that's par for the course for me.

Loved this dress. Wore it for a winter wedding. It was very comfortable and I got tons of compliments! Has a high slit and a low cut front. I had a bra that worked with the low cut front but I could see someone having to go braless with it. I recommend renting!

links_reviews_title: This dress made for an AMAZING night.
links_reviews_text: If you want to roll into your next party feeling like a million bucks for $30... then rent this dress for your next occasion. It is STUNNING! I got so many compliments and felt amazing all night.

Great dress! Loved dancing in it. Got lots of compliments. Was nervous about where the slit would hit but it was perfect. Only problem was I didn't fill out the top exactly right so had to pin it a couple inches up from the low neckline. The long sleeves were a little big on my arms too so I rolled them up to a three quarter sleeve and I liked the look so much better. Highly recommend for a wedding, holiday party, or date night.

This dress is to die for!!!!! The color is the perfect pop to stand out without being obnoxious. The velvet felt so nice, I kept rubbing it! The chest is fairly fitted. I'm a 32 band size and the XS was snug. The slit is tastefully located so it shows leg without feeling too exposed. Unfortunately the event I was going to wear this to was rescheduled. I will be renting again for sure!!!
Wore this to a December wedding - I received so many compliments! The dress fits true to size.

Wore this to a corporate holiday party and it was perfect. Not too much showing up top and the slit is very low key unless you're really kicking your leg out. Got tons of compliments, the color is amazing. There is no stretch so the high waist was a bit snug on my ribs.

Pros - gorgeous fabric with velvet print, very luxurious and flowing dress. Great for winter nights - it was cold otherwise would have skipped tights. Cons - no pockets (automatic 4 stars), exceptionally tight waist with no give. I just don't understand why designers don't build in a bit more elastic at the waist. Our body shape standing is not the same as sitting. I thought about going up a size but he rest of the dress fit great. This photo definitely doesn't do it justice. Notes: you can go braless, but be prepared to bring some fashion tape. It zips up the side, which you can hide if you'd like to unzip while you eat. Highly recommend if you have a tiny waist

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my fiancé's company Christmas party in Savannah. I knew I wanted something that fit the vintage vibe of the city as well as the vibe of the historic venue/restaurant we were in. This absolutely fit the bill. I felt beautiful in this dress and received a ton of compliments. Since this is the first review of this dress I'm sharing extra details of the fit and structure for anyone who may be on the fence about renting this little number. For reference, I am 5'7, 145lbs, 30D bra size, and generally a size 4-6 in dresses. I ordered an XS and S, and ended up wearing the S. -The slit comes up WAY higher than I expected--almost to the base of my hip! This might be fine for other events like a wedding, but for a work function I knew I needed to either pin the slit a few inches or wear tights. I chose the tights. -The neckline is definitely a plunging neckline so a plunging bra is almost a necessity. You could probably wear it braless, but I wasn't quite comfortable with that since I was attending a company party. I actually safety-pinned the bottom of the neckline to the base of my most "plunging" bra and that worked okay, but I had to be very strategic about the way I pinned it so you couldn't see my bra. -There is no stretch to this dress, which made it a little tough to put on/take off. The side zipper was pretty low-quality too for an otherwise high-quality dress. I was nervous it would get stuck or break off every time I zipped up the dress. It ended up being fine, but something to keep in mind. -I thought this dress was very flattering for my pear-shaped figure, but I will note that it was pretty snug around my ribcage. If your bra band size is larger than a 30 or 32 and you're considering getting a small, get the medium. Overall, I was happy that I chose this dress and thought it was worth wearing despite the small complications with the tights/bra I listed above.

links_reviews_title: Everyone wanted to know where I got my dress!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, I'm 5'8" 155lbs. Small chest. If you have a large chest it may be snug. I went bra-less and it was just right. I received endless compliments, it's a beautiful dress!
Elizabeth & James runs SUPER SMALL! gorgeous color and love the cutouts! Paired with RTR DVF hand bag for a night out in NYC

This dress runs small, as I normally wear size 4. It was super tight in rib cage area and chest. The cutouts made it worse (felt like a sausage). Length too short. I don't think I could safely bend over. Returned with clear conscience. Good bye dress, onto the next one!
I ordered 0 and 2 for back up. I worn 2!! Normally I ware 00, 0P but for this dress 0 is too small. I'm 5'5 22A and 100 lbs.
Elizabeth and james use the original sizing so you have to take 2 sizes up if you're used to recent US sizing. Good quality dress.

I received SO many compliments on this so decided to hang onto it and wear it more than intended. I'll definitely be re-renting again! The dress is a wonderful lilac and the cut outs were flattering and perfect. The dress does run small so be sure to size up so that you don't feel too squeezed in.
I'm 5'1 and 110 lbs it's a little snug on the chest area but still comfortable

links_reviews_title: The dress was the perfect mix of sexy and fun! I got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fits great and is a breathable dress. Very easy to move around in.
I'm pretty small up top, but it hugged perfectly. The material doesn't really have stretch, so keep that in mind but it's a great color. I'd wear this in a bunch of different colors.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, great cut, and super flattering.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually closer to a 2 but this 4 felt great - wore it to a 12 hour wedding and barely noticed I had a dress on. Highly recommend.
Loved the color and was super comfortable.

Dang this dress is small as all get out in the rib cage and the "hoop" (for lack of a better term) is pretty wide. It doesn't lay down by your thighs, so I kinda of felt like I was wearing a princess dress.

I needed a lavender dress for a multi-generational photo shoot. This fit the bill, but it was a little shorter than I would have liked for the occasion. It fit me very well-i could not have gone down a size nor up a size-and it was, for the most part, comfortable. The cut outs were a fun way to add something more to the dress

This color is perfect for spring/summer and the cut of this dress is everything! It's a skater dress with a twist. DEFINITELY snug, so if you have a big bust, order a size up. True 0 for small-chested ladies.

links_reviews_title: Cute and unique but a little tight
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for a spring sweet 16 and it was perfect for the occasion! I usually wear a size 0 but the dress was a little small so I wore my backup size, a 2. The waist was still a little tight and the sleeves were tight so I could not raise my arms very much. I would definitely rent this dress again but probably in a bigger size.

links_reviews_title: Cutest dress ever!! Wore for my engagement pics!
links_reviews_text: This I would say is true to size. I usually wear a 4 -6 and I orginallu ordered the 4 it ended up being to small so I sized up a size. So much fun to spin in!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, flattering and fitting! Love this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little tight. Sleeves are snug on your arms so size up if you have larger arms as I do. Side cut are so cut - until you sit! Be ok with some rolls hanging out if you have that haha I wore the dress without a bra. The material is thick and I didn't think I didn't a bra. Love this dress!!
I loved everything about this dress! The color, the cut, the material... It was a tad short but this was not a problem for me. I highly recommend this to anyone!
Does run small- I'm usually 4, wore a 6. I'm 5'3" and the length was perfect, although could be a bit short on the taller gals. Gorgeous color, great dress!
Really cute dress! Got a ton of compliments. It was a little fitted on the chest area so didn't need to wear a bra. Kind of short in the back.

I loved this dress! I wore it for a Sunday afternoon engagement party in Long Island and received tons of compliments. The color and cut were perfect for the event, and the cutouts added a fun element to the dress. I ended up wearing the larger size even though the 4 fit better, as the zipper was a bit stiff on the size 4 dress. If I had help zipping the dress, I would've worn the 4 - you can see in the picture the 6 is a bit tight in the bust and arms. Despite that, I absolutely loved the dress and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress with subtle cutouts for a wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was great - fit true to size and was perfect for a friend's wedding - where my parents were also in attendance. The color and cut are fun - it's pretty short, but still tasteful - and the side cut outs are subtle enough that you barely notice them. I paired it with an RTR necklace and really loved the whole outfit!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for end of summer/beginning of fall weather.
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, nice and breezy and the color was very classic. The silhouette was on point and very different from the rest of the wedding guests- a stand out for sure!
I loved the color and fit of this dress. The fit and flare was super cute too. Material is really thick and forgiving. It is a short dress but other than that super cute!
Definitely ran small, so I wore the larger size. I read that it ran small, so I'm glad I ordered up! The 4 fit perfect (typically a 0 or a 2 with dresses).

Fit was a little small. I'm normally around a 6 but wore an 8. The dress fit beautifully though and was great for a wedding. Just a warning, I went to a summer wedding and it was pretty hot out. So if you sweat like me, you might sweat through the dress. Overall, incredibly happy with the decision.

This was a gorgeous dress I wore for a college organization banquet. It was a little loose in bust for me (32A), but I didn't mind. I definitely had a push up bra I could've worn if I needed to fill the dress out more. The length was just right for me at 5' 4". It was great color, fit, and silhouette for our spring banquet held at a country club. After my sister saw pictures she called to ask if she could borrow it and was very upset rent when I said I rented!

links_reviews_title: So cute overall but needed to size up
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this as it was too snug through the torso in an 8 (my sides pooched out through the cutouts) and it arrived stained. I think a 10 would've been fine. This is the first dress I've ever been unable to zip up on my own due to the sleeves constraining my movement. Lovely lilac color and super thick material, wouldn't bother with a bra. Flared skirt fit my hips comfortably.

This dress was great! I really liked the fit and the cut-outs on the side, although you could see some of my love handles coming out (covers eyes). The color was beautiful for the party and I paired it with a choker and my favorite BCBG shoes. Would definitely recommend this style for a summer party as it was very flowy given the shape. The only feedback to the RTR team would be to double check the dress I received as it probably could use only one more wear and then would need to retire as it had small fuzzies in the front.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress that stands out in a crowd!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a bridal shower. The review all said to rent a size up. I had actually rented this as a back up for another event in an 8 and it was stingy and too short so I tried a 10 this time and it was perfect. The fabric is stretchy and thick enough that I didn't have to wear a bra. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: The color is absolutely beautiful. It is great for a spring time/summer affair.
links_reviews_text: This dress is definitely true to size. I found the zipper a little hard to zip up but I got help with that. The material is definitely super thick, and great rich material. You can tell its not cheap, and I didn't wear bicycle shorts under. I read in reviews that if you have a chest it might be too tight but I did not find that an issue. The only issue I had was that were was a small stain (but I immediately contacted RTR and got reimbursed) and that it was slightly large by the cut offs.
Gorgeous dress. Thick material. Tons of compliments. It's quite short, but was fine for me since I'm not terribly tall.

links_reviews_title: Loved the quality fabric and cute cut.
links_reviews_text: It flares out quite a bit but that's due to my 43' hips. It was comfortable all night at a friend's wedding! I loved it and felt great it in--others loved it too!
I wore this dress to a friend's wedding. It's cute and sassy, but really tight. It runs small, especially across the bust. Also a little short in the back!

A great fun & flirty dress for a summer wedding! The dress is a pop of color & fit really well. Overall, the dress is comfortable and well made. Lots of compliments on the dress and really fun to dance and twirl in throughout the night!
Really nice dress. I got a little sweaty dancing and it showed unfortunately. Cut outs were nice but size one up for sure. I'm usually a 6 and the 8 fit well/snug.
This dress was super cute! It was made out of a really thick, nice quality material. Was easily worn with a bra and supported my 32DDD bust.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a six-year anniversary dinner!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, the color is beautiful and brighter in person. The material is awesome and fits you like a glove. The only con is that the dress is a little small, so definitely size up!
This dress & brand definitely run small so always order a size up, I loved the color of this dress! And it was super comfy, I would recommend to anyone looking for something fun for spring.

This dress twirls like a dream. It was a perfect length. The cut-outs are in a good spot so you can still wear a regular bra. I did think it ran small. Anyway, great dress and got a bunch of compliments!
Perfect color for the spring! Runs a little small and the top is somewhat tight, but it's very flattering and comfortable! Fun and classy.

links_reviews_title: So incredibly flattering - skimmed all my curves
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress - it's so much more flattering than it is in pictures. The dress is lined, and the fabric draped and skimmed all my curves without giving away the bumps and lumps. I rented a 4L and it was floor length on me (5'7") in 4" heels. It's a real stunner and so much fun to dance in!

links_reviews_title: gorgeous dress for the wedding. hugged the figure so well and the material is great
links_reviews_text: fit like a glove
It fit very well and was a nice material.

links_reviews_title: Valentine's Day work event in Las Vegas for Husband.
links_reviews_text: Many compliments on this dress! Very comfortable and well made. I would rent this beauty again!

I rented this for a gala. I actually wrote the 18. The 16 was just a little too snug in the hips. The 18 was *slightly* loose at the armpit but it worked. The dress was beautiful. I felt comfortable and elegant. I am about 5'4" and with a 3" it was just at the floor. As someone who usually wears black, I received so many compliments on the color. I really loved it.

This dress truly is as flattering as the other reviews I read. I felt like I belonged on the red carpet. The 6 and 8 both actually fit but I wore the 8 since I knew I'd be stuffing my face and dancing. LOVE LOVE LOVE !!

This dress is gorgeous on very figure flattering and comfortable. Not something I would've chosen but RTR gave it as an option when my original dress wasn't available and I'm glad they did great choice definitely a huge thumbs up and 5 star gown
Found this dress to be very comfortable. Definitely form fitting and a bit long but I made it work with a pair of heels. Got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Fits perfectly and is so comfortable

links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a black tie wedding. It fit true to size (interestingly the same one in black was much tighter) and stretches well for walking/dancing. It isn't too light or too heavy and the color is very vibrant. I received a lot of compliments and would definitely recommend this dress!

I went to the Flagship store in NYC to get a dress for my BIL's wedding in Italy. As soon as I put it on I fell in love. The fit is so flattering for this girl with curves. I ended up not wearing it because the mother of the groom was wearing something similar. But I did rent it in blush!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Fit perfectly and got so many compliments on color and style!
links_reviews_text: Material was very comfortable and had a stretch to it!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel so confident!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream and covered my upper arms of which I'm very self-conscious. I'm 5'3" and the dress was about 5" too long for me with flats, and I was able to hem it with temporary hem tape. I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat!

Loved it! Fit like a glove. Unlike the others who wore it, I preferred to not wear the sleeves over my arms, as I thought it looked a bit better that way. Just personal preference. I felt like a pretty mermaid. Definitely needed some heels- could have worn higher ones!

flatters in the right places BUT runs long, (even with 3" heels) and isn't available in petite. recommend for taller people, might not be flattering on an athletic build, the skirt part is pretty loose

The dress was really beautiful and the color was amazing. I loved the top portion of it and the fact that I didn't have to wear a bra. I ordered a 16L and the length and fit was perfect, my only issue was that it showed every bump I had.

Okay so this dress was a dream. The ONLY thing is that I forgot to bring my shapewear and was self-conscious the entire night...It's a flattering fit in so many ways but I'd still recommend some shapewear to smooth things out. With shapewear on, I think this dress would flatter super thin or large figures and is probably best for small to medium chested women. I wore the Long without heels and length was perfect! Oh and if you don't have a butt (like me) this dress will make you look like you have one!

I rented this dress for my senior prom. It worked great. I normally wear about and 8. The 6 is what I went with so that it was more form fitting. Both sizes fit comfortably though. Got a lot of compliments. I was very pleased. Since I have a larger bust dresses can be difficult but this was great.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great. Got tons of compliments, and felt super comfortable all night.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super fitted, but the fabric is a great quality so you don’t feel tight or squished. I ended up going with a smaller size because it fit my waist and top half better. The fabric was stretchy enough that is was fine over my hips and thighs.

links_reviews_title: Really nice I wore on Valentine's Day to fancy dinner with my honey
links_reviews_text: He love it and I loved it...felt really elegant in it.
Wore to a gala event. Fit was perfect! Received compliments all night.
This fit perfectly! I received tons of compliments when I wore it to a black tie event. I usually wear a 4 or 6, but the 6 was spot on.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! It looks way better then in the stock photo
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It looks way better on then it does in the stock photo. I ware a size 4 normally but had to size down for this dress. Only con- it shows EVERY bump and lump in stark contrast. I wore shape-ware underneath to keep that to a minimum.

links_reviews_title: Red dress that wows on curves yet still has class.
links_reviews_text: The slip (built in) makes this dress fit like a dream. It is nice light weight not heavy like some gowns can be. Fits true to size, I am 5'9 and wore a 2 inch heal which worked well for the long.

links_reviews_title: Great dress to stand out at a black tie affair
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for a black tie charity gala and it did not disappoint! I live near an RTR store so I found this dress in person but was an 18 L (way too big) but tried it on to see. I usually wear a 12 but my size wasn't available so I went with the 16L and it fit perfectly! I'm 5'9, wore heels and the dress length was perfect.

The staff at RTR were very helpful especially since it was my first time renting. They pulled looks that actually were my style without even knowing what I was looking for. I was very happy that they carried my size in store so I would get a true experience of how my dress would look. The process was smooth and very easy for me. I will definitely be renting again!
I usually wear a size 4, but the 0R fit like a glove. The material is flattering and comfortable and accentuates all the right parts. Tons of compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: I never wear red, but this dress made me want to only ever wear red for the rest of my life.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, the length was perfect with 3 inch heels. The fabric is high quality, and I got so many compliments! Loved this dress!

This dress fits true to size. A little long on my 5'3" frame, although 2 inch heels made the length perfect. High quality fabric, so no spanx needed. I received many compliments on the fit and color of the dress. I would highly recommend!
Great dress, wish it came in more colors. Received tons of compliments and was very flattering. Wore the dress to a garden wedding. Would not hesitate to rent again.
I received many compliments on the style and fit, although it was a little long and big on me due to the limited availability I will definitely rent again from RTR.

links_reviews_title: It fit well given that I was 5 months pregnant. I loved the exposure of the shoulders!
links_reviews_text: The fit was just right and the color popped at the event.
Beautiful dress, wonderful fit. So many compliments! The 2R was a little long (2P wasn't available) but easily remedied with a little double-sided fabric tape!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this one, but I tried it on. Really shows off a curvy figure-in a good way..
links_reviews_text: The challenge of this dress for me was that I was having trouble preventing my strapless bra from showing on the side. I'm sure there is a better bra option, but I didn't have one, so I wore the other dress option I received.

links_reviews_title: Every comfortable and received a ton of compliments! The color is perfect for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: I am 5' 10", 168 pounds and it fit perfect. I ordered the 10 and 12 and never even tried the 12 on. Get a good pair of spandex's! It is so comfortable but the material is heavy. Perfect for the winter parties.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with thicker fabric than what it looks like in the picture, which is great!
links_reviews_text: Order in L if you are planning to wear heels. For my height (5' 6") and 2-3" inches heel, L was perfect.

This dress covered areas on my arm that i'm uncomfortable in showing. I felt very comfortable in the dress, and looked even better. I didn't order this dress originally, but the RTR team sent it because the dress I wanted wasn't going to be there in time for my event. Unfortunately, even the extra dress didn't fit, but I ended up talking to a RTR rep. and I swear these ladies know their jobs well. She asked what I din't like about each dress, and we narrowed it down to this one I just needed a smaller size. She then overnight this dress in 2 smaller sizes, and the fit was perfect. Spoke to her about 2pm on a Thursday, and replacement dresses were here 10:30am on Friday with my military ball on Sat. I've used RTR in the passed, but never had a dress not fit until this order. I love that they did the free replacement dress. I'd highly recommend RTR to anyone who ask.

Ran large in my opinion, so I ended up wearing another dress. However, it is a gorgeous and comfortable dress. Definitely does not hide "flaws," so plan on shapewear if you want smooth curves. I would try again in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: This dress is elegant and very chic! Made me feel like I was a movie star! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Runs long, even with high heels, and I am 5 ft 2'', but should be a problem.
I loved this dress! Super comfortable to dance in all night. The material is stretchy where it hugs all the right curves, but not cheap stretchy. Completely loved it!

Great chic piece. Sophisticated and professional for a speaking event. The waist band is snug so beware. Only con is the pant part was quite wrinkled and difficult to iron out - seemed like the lining was pulling and making the material bunch. The black makes it less noticeable but was a little stressful before the event.

This jumpsuit runs small. I'm an 8 and S/M in clothes and I wore the LR. It was very snug though still a lot of fun to wear. It's very hard to zip on your own. My husband even struggled to zip it beyond the velvet waistband. He had to come with me to the bathroom as there was no way I could get in and out of it by myself. Fun jumpsuit if you're looking to change it up for a party.
This dress fit perfectly! It was perfect for the event!
This is a stunning piece. I will say that the zipper is quite high, so you could get into a bind if you don't have help to unzip and rezip.

I rented this for my holiday party. I read the reviews and it did indeed run small. I went up to a medium to avoid the shorter crotch area and it fit perfectly. I got lots of compliments. Like any jumpsuit it is difficult to go to the bathroom but overall was really happy with it.
Loved everything about this jumpsuit. It was perfect for rehearsal dinner! I am 5'3 and it just above my ankle. I would size up if between sizes

I loved this jumpsuit, it was so sleek and elegant! It runs slightly small, as I am usually between and small and medium, but the medium fit perfectly. I have a shorter torso and it fit me perfectly, so it might be too snug on longer torsos. I have it 4 stars because it is SO hard to zip and unzip on your own! Each time I had to use the restroom I had to get assistance from other ladies. So definitely don't go to the restroom alone! But other than the zipper I loved this outfit and will definitely be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous jumpsuit that can be dressed up or kept semi-formal
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a campaign party and thought it was the perfect semi-formal style. It's definitely meant for shorter people, as the torso isn't very long. I'm 5'3 and it fit me comfortably. The quality is amazing and the lace was delicate.

I chose the XS and the S. Definitely needed the small and it was still a little short in the torso. Loved the look, dressy, but not over the top for a holiday party. You will need a bathroom buddy to help with the zipper!

links_reviews_title: Unique jumpsuit, standout in a crowd
links_reviews_text: This was a fun jumpsuit to wear, and I got quite a few compliments. It was a little tight in the chest (I'm a 36D), but otherwise it was comfortable. It's really nicely lined, beautiful fabric and details!

links_reviews_title: Heavy material. Not for long torsos!
links_reviews_text: The waistline was on my ribcage and it gave me a wedgie! Not a pretty look. I don't think a larger size would work as it fit everywhere else. I just need at least 3 more inches from shoulder to crotch.

links_reviews_title: RTR needs to have better Quality Control!!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this jumpsuit for my Christmas Eve Party. I LOVE Alexis. I know their clothes run small. So I ordered the small knowing it's my true size with this brand but an xs as backup. As expected, the small fit perfectly, however, another renter must have tried to hem it themselves at home which screwed up the whole look of the leg!!! I noticed that it looked weird on the hanger immediately which made me wonder why RTR doesn't pay attention to these obvious details as well. They don't check and then rent it out for $$$. Which in my opinion is very disappointing. It is a gorgeous jumpsuit. I was able to fit into the XS as well however, the zipper was broken and impossible to get it up and then down again. I had an awful double whammy. Definitely my worst renting experience. Please. Please. Please do a more thorough check of the clothing before renting it out again!!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jump suit. Didn't work for me.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful detailing but it didn't fit me right and I felt it was too tight in places. I didn't wear it, I feel if I'd ordered up the lower half would have been too baggy.
Never wear!

It was hard to zip myself, and I wasn't fond of how wide the pants were. The cuffs of the pants were also a little odd, but I loved the top half. It ran a little small, so it was riding "up" all day. Perhaps a size up might have been better?

this is a great jumpsuit, but the fit is narrow around the waist and it has a non forgiving torso length. Would suggest works best for either tall, so the leg show or short (like 5.0) so the pant hangs property.

I adored this jumpsuit, and still can't believe that I finally wore one. It was gorgeous and a perfect fit for a trendy party. The other reviews are spot on. I am a size 6 and had to wear the backup size large. It is also almost impossible to zip on your own. That said, it is so comfortable once on and really a confident piece. Size up and rent this!
Very cute but the torso is short and it rides up on your crotch
Definitely fit small but perfect for petite girls
Cropped pants and odd torso length, didn't like the fit and didn't wear this

links_reviews_title: It was really nice! I think it would be better for someone with a shorter torso.
links_reviews_text: I am athletic build and 5'6. This fot strange through the torso. I did not wear it.
Not made for long torsos. It pulled way too much in the crotch region and shoulder area. Otherwise, gorgeous!

I work in Events and wearing black is typically our "uniform" . This jumpsuit was absolutely gorgeous but also allowed me to comfortably run around all night as needed. I received so many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jumpsuit, but unwearable if you're tall
links_reviews_text: Rented as part of my unlimited shipment. Gorgeous jumpsuit, great quality, but not meant for warm weather as the material is thick. As all the other reviews mention, the torso is VERY small. I'm 5'11" and it was completely unwearable due to the overall fit of the body.
I'm 5'3 and the pant legs were just above my ankles. Runs big

links_reviews_title: Pretty jumpsuit just a bad fit
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 6 and got the medium which fit horribly. I usually love jumpsuits but this one was just too short in the torso and rode up way too much. Maybe a large would've worked but I don't think I'll be getting it again to try. Not for girls with long torsos---at all
This is a beautiful garment. It runs quite a bit small. I did not get to wear it but if you size up and are smaller than I am this is a garment to try!

I don't think I'm especially long-torsoed, at least I have never had an issue with fit relating to that before, but either that is the care or this is cut for someone with a very short torso. It fit uncomfortably tightly in the crotch, to the point I didn't want to wear it. I was sad, because it is GORGEOUS. The lace detail is well-made and looks great over the white top, and the bottoms drape really nicely.
I sized up thought it ran a bit small in the waist. The zipper was really tough to get up, had to have my husband help me both times I put it on.
My torso was too long for the style of this one piece. I was unable to wear it.

Jumpsuit is gorgeous..... but it was so short waisted. I got this through Unlimited immediately tried to put on and took it straight back to UPS. It is think and expensive looking, but there is no way I would ever be able to wear. Could barely get over my shoulders. For reference I'm 5' 6'' and my legs are average length.

links_reviews_title: So classy but a little small!
links_reviews_text: I loved this outfit. It's super classy and I'm not a huge fan of cluottes (sp?) and still found this really cute and flattering. Next time I would probably size up - I have a short torso and still felt like the pants were riding up and giving me little bit of a camel toe (TMI). Loved this outfit and will absolutely rent again.

I loved this so much but the only issues were that the torso is extremely short (and I'm short to begin with and it was a squeeze) and the zipper was difficult to get across the banded part so it took a while to get into. However, I loved the look and got compliments from strangers while wearing it!

I wanted to like this jumpsuit, but the fit was way off. I had to size up to the medium, but it was boxy and my shape was completely lost. The Capri length and wide leg pant are mostly to blame, but it made me look bigger than I am. Might look nice on someone with more of an hourglass shape, but I can't imagine this is a flattering fit for anyone bigger than a 2.

links_reviews_title: Not for tall or busty girls
links_reviews_text: Pros: This jumpsuit is gorgeous and very well made. The lining is thick and perfect for a cold winter party. Perfect for anyone under 5'6" and pear shaped. Cons: Way too small for tall girls. I'm 5'9" and this rode up my rear end and was so uncomfortable I took it off immediately. I have a 34ddd bust and would never have zipped up this suit. My stats: 5'9", 165lbs, (38-31-39) ,size 10, 34ddd
This is the sweetest little jumpsuit, but it ran just a touch too small for me. I should have went with a M, but I fear it would have been too baggy. Great piece, though!
Dress does not have any stretch but is so elegant on. Very thick, textured fabric. It's simply beautiful!
The color was absolutely stunning! I loved the dress and the illusion neckline. It was comfortable and very flattering. Would highly recommend!

This dress is a beautiful color with a bit of sheen to it. The fabric is very sturdy, to the point where I didn't need to wear any kind of bra or support with it. The fabric is also very wrinkle-resistant. I wore the dress for a work event, and it was a bit too low-cut, so I used removable fashion tape to attach a small piece of black fabric under the mesh to provide a bit more coverage. I am 5'2" and wore 4" heels and the regular was about 3.5" too long (had to use more fashion tape to do a temporary hem). Oh, and IT HAS POCKETS that were big enough to fit my phone.

I LOVE this dress and will definitely rent it again. I could have squeezed myself into a 4 if I absolutely had to, but the 6 was a perfect fit and was super comfy even while sitting and eating. And, pockets! Height: 5'8" + 3" heels Bust: 38 C Waist: 29" Hips: 39"
This dress was so comfortable and very pretty color. I went without a bra because the plunging neckline was too low however the material is thick enough I didn't feel exposed.

This dress was perfect. Both the 4 and the 2 fit, but the smaller size hugged my body just perfectly. I didn't wear and bra and had no problems with coverage or worrying something might show. I'm a 32D. The length was great to wear with heels and I'm 5'4.75". The dress was also very comfortable and fairly light weight, which made it great for a south Texas event. I would definitely rent this dress again! I didn't want to send it back!

Great black tie option that offers some color! I'm 5'10" and wore 3inch heels and the length was just an inch or so off the floor. Very comfortable and elegant dress. The color and design are beautiful in person. Pockets are always a winner! The sheer front is pretty and not too showy although beware of tan lines! I wore a v neck jumpsuit the day before and my burn/tan showed through. Highly recommended.

links_reviews_title: I felt so comfortable and so elegant in this - plus POCKETS! This dress got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit absolutely perfect, true to size and I chose to go braless because it fit so well. I'm a 36D so I'd purchased a bra that would work with this, and even petals - but used neither. This dress is a unicorn and you should rent it!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear but would recommend!
links_reviews_text: This dress is one way to do a plunging neckline but still keep your look classy and stunning. I ultimately did not wear it because my other choice was more of what I wanted, but I would totally rent and wear this. I have an apple shape and the dress still zipped up around my rib cage, no problem. Was comfortable and gorgeous. Definitely rent if you're considering!

This dress made me feel incredible. I was so sad when I had to send it back. I got so many compliments on how beautiful this dress is. It was great that it was big enough in the chest to be comfortable while also tight enough that I wasn't worried about anything slipping out of where it was supposed to be. If you're taller than 5'7"-5'8" I would definitely recommend the long. I only needed like an inch or two heel and it was a perfect length

links_reviews_title: The dress was the right combination of elegant and sexy, and the deep burgundy color was beautiful.
links_reviews_text: No bra necessary, but I wore some stick-ons to provide a little more oomph in that area :) Fit beautifully.

This dress was a back up dress after the one I ordered was unflattering. I couldn't have been more happy! This dress was gorgeous and fit amazing. I received compliments all evening and felt comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress and an absolutely stunning material!
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning. Held you in place really well and was very flattering. The thicker material made it great for a snowy Michigan winter formal event! The only CON would be that it's pretty short. I'm 5'10-5'11. Most "longs" are perfect on me. But this one, without shoes on, ended right above the floor, so with shoes on it was about 1-2" above the ground. But the dress was so beautiful I could ignore that small detail
Gorgeous fabric, cut and color!! Many compliments all night. And the big plus - it has pockets!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress stood out among the hundreds of black gowns at my event!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress. Fit beautifully and I did not need to wear a bra (even though I have a large chest). I wear an 8/10 and the 10 was perfect. So comfortable! The fabric was beautiful and not scratchy at all; I have sensitive skin, but had no issues. Sorry for the weird angle in the first photo; my daughter was playing photographer! Would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove and I got so many compliments on the style!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size, and I felt like a movie star the whole night. The mesh around the bust and neck line is stunning and the dress even had pockets!!

links_reviews_title: Great service and easy! Will be using Rent the Runway again.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like perfect. I had a knee brace from a surgery on and it worked perfect to hide that brace. Very flattering dress.
Didn't end up wearing it but I did love it!!
Loved this dress! Very elegant, classy, and sexy in my opinion. I felt confident in this dress and loved the color. The detail of this dress is stunning!!!
Every person raved on how wonderful I looked. This dress fit like glove. Perfect in every way! I didn't wear a bra with this and everything held together seamlessly!

I got this dress for a NYE Wedding and was obsessed! The fabric is really rich, beautiful, and detailed, but the dress still flows very well, is comfortable, and it isn't too heavy. In terms of sizing, I'm normally a solid 4, but the 2 fit very well and felt slimming. Even though the bust is low cut, the fabric across the bust makes the dress appropriate for a wedding or more formal event. The fabric across the bust was just dark/dense enough that it provided some coverage, but still allowed me to feel as though I was showing the right amount of cleavage. No bra was needed as the dress provides a great amount of coverage. Can't say enough good things about the dress - it was perfect for my event and a great dress overall! Plus, the dress has pockets - you can't go wrong!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a black tie NYE wedding and it was the perfect fit. Long enough that I could wear flats. I never felt exposed and it was an easy weight to wear. The pockets were an added bonus! I received so many compliments. Classy yet stylish!

This dress was perfect! The pockets were a definite bonus. The material was heavy so very nice for a December party. The regular length was long but i was able to shorten it about 2 inches with hem tape so it brushed the floor with my 4 inch heels. Received many compliments all evening.

This was a back up dress for a nye wedding. It fit like a glove and the plunge neck line was very flattering but overall it felt a little too formal for what I was looking for. It has a thick material that will keep you warm and the color is beautiful. If i have a more formal event in the future this dress will be on my list! I’m 5’7 and 140lbs 34B, the 4L was a perfect fit for me with a 4 inch heel.
Fit well, great length and the color/material was so vivid in person! Sexy, yet classy. Pockets were a plus, one had a hole/tear inside though.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and show stopping all at once!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Christmas gala. It was a hit! So many compliments and so very comfortable. I usually wear a 12 due to my bust but the 12 in this dress was suffocating. The 14 provided more room but was a touch too long in the torso. Short people problems? I loved it so much I made this my Christmas card. I would definitely rent again.

I wore this for engagement pictures during the holiday season and I cannot even begin to tell you how many people stopped in the streets to tell me how much they loved this dress. The color and the fabric were STUNNING! This dress was amazing and I want to rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, very flattering, absolutely stunning gown
links_reviews_text: I am 5'1".....needed 5 inch heels for this gown to hit the floor perfectly...it was worth it though. Obviously you cannot wear a bra...but the top fits just snug enough to hold the girls in place.

First the pictures didn’t do this dress justice!!! It’s absolutely beautiful! It fit great! It hide my mom gut and those pockets 😍. I had so much confidents in this dress! It came 5ish days before my event so I had plenty of time to pick shoes out and Accessories! After 4 kids I didn’t think I would be one to not wear a bra so I bought the silicone push-up bra but I didn’t need it! Return was easy and I will definitely Rent again!

I absolutely LOVED this dress! As a pear shape, dress shopping is generally an absolute nightmare for me, but this gorgeous gown was perfect for my body type. I found it does run a bit large, as I'm usually a 10L but wore the 8L, as the 10 was too loose in the bust (also a classic pear shape problem). The fabric is heavy, perfect for a winter event, so you don't need a bra. Don't need Spanx, and it even has pockets! If you are looking for a gown where you'll stand out all night, this is it. I highly recommend renting this beauty!

This was my backup dress and I am so glad I ordered it. It fits perfectly, it is very low cut meaning you cannot wear a bra, but there is no need, the fabric is thick enough and the fit perfect that you don’t need to worry about anything. And if you are not convinced... It has pockets!! LOVED it and received a lot of compliments. Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: PERFECT dress for a formal event
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a Game of Thrones themed wedding and it was beyond perfect. It was comfortable and has pockets, which is always a plus. It is long, so I pretty much had to wear heels, I'm 5'5", and the mesh neckline does come up to the top of your collar bone. I loved the texture of the dress, the picture shows the pattern so you can kind of see how it feels. If you are thinking about this dress, be sure you are comfortable with a lit of boobsge at your event. I did use some fashion tape just to be sure there were no slips, but the top was pretty tight so I want all that worried. Definitely an amazing dress.

This dress is amazing and unforgettable. I got so many compliments and it fit like a glove. I suggest ordering a size smaller for your extra size. I'm usually a 4 (which would have fit fine with a tiny bit of extra room) but the 2 fit better! I also suggest getting the Long if you are 5'7 or taller. I'm so glad I got the Long and it was the perfect length with a heel. The top is gorgeous but may be a bit tricky if you have a large chest. I'm small chested and wore sticky bra and some tape but I could have done nothing and it would have fit fine! Rent this dress for a formal occasion...so comfy and with pockets too!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and a great price.
links_reviews_text: Great fit (sans the length). Even with heels the dress ran long for my 5'0" height. The neckline was an eye-catcher and the dress was lovely. I received many compliments throughout the night. I highly recommend the dress!

I'm 5'5 165 and 36C. I'm usually somewhere between an 8 and 10. This dress fit me perfectly in the bust and waist. I wore a 8R and it was tight enough that I didn't have to wear a bra and worry about them "dislodging". I wore a plunge bra anyways and it was really more of a pain than anything. The fabric is so thick that I didn't have to worry about getting too cold..... for various reasons. Length was almost too short. I wore 3" heels and it was perfect. Any taller and this would have been a no go. Pro: fitted in waist and bust, thick fabric, meshing is so classy. Con: the liner was ripped at the bottom. (I'm sure it's something they will fix) If you are too busty this dress may reveal more cleavage than your comfortable with, length was barely there with 3" heels. Regardless, I wore this dress to a gala and then out dancing. I had enough room that I felt like I could easily dance and not worry about ripping.

I'm usually a 2 in dresses, but designer dresses tend to run smaller than department store dresses, so I chose a 4R as my main size and 2R as backup. I ended up wearing the 2R. The 4R was way too big in the chest/mesh area and gaped badly. I'm only 5'3, but I did not need to add hem tape with 3 inch heels. Several people complimented my dress, it was very comfortable, and has pockets! It was a very beautiful dress. To avoid a wardrobe malfunction in the mesh area, I ordered and wore a backless, strapless U plunge bra from amazon, and it worked perfectly with this dress. I thought I'd be the only one in this color at a fall black tie event--turns out there were almost as many women in burgundy dresses as black. It's a popular color.
LOVED it, but wrong color for my wedding. Will rent again when a guest at a wedding. Mesh chest was fine for me with small boobs.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, plunging neckline and pockets :)
links_reviews_text: I'm 5 10 and have a big bust, so I usually stay away from low backs and plunging necklines. This dress has somewhat low back and a low v-neckline with black sheer fabric. I ordered size 14L- and honestly was not very convinced that I was going to wear it. After some crafty approaches, I was able to wear the dress with no bra and I felt very comfortable all night. Overall fit is true to size, with the extra length I was able to wear heels. The top is tight (I'm a 36F) which helps to keep everything in place. Fabric is thick so it's perfect for a fall/winter event, although it got a little bit after some crazy dancing. Color is a beautiful maroon with a hint of black. And thanks to the pockets I was able to keep my phone on me and take lots of pictures.

Gorgeous dress. Material and fit were perfect. I'm 5'4" and the length was great with a small heel. Pockets were fabulous! Got so many compliments. Beautiful color with a little sparkle when the light hits it. Would love to own it!

I got so many compliments on this dress. It fit perfectly, and the neckline left enough to the imagination so as not to be too risqué. I am 5'3" and wore heels that were about 1.75" tall, and the regular length was perfect.
Loved this dress. I was worried about a long dress because I'm short but it was the perfect length. It was glamorous and forgiving. The material was thick, stretchy, and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: ABSOLUTELY LOVED!!! I felt gorgeous, sexy, edgy, and fierce in this number.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 10 but although the 10 I could wear, the 8 fit like a glove (and it was still stretchy). I received compliments all night. Although it appears basic, you can't go wrong with this one. I didn't want to take it off.

This dress was perfect for a semi formal wedding and received several compliments. The dress covers enough to remain modest but the slit and off shoulder design show just enough off. The top was supportive so I didn't need a bra but the overall dress didn't hug too tight that I was able to get away with no spanx. Quite freeing but fit like a glove. It also breathed just enough that I wasn't sweating up a storm as I love dancing. Though body complimenting, allows flexibility for movement.
Fit great, very comfortable. Inside the chest area there was some bunched padding or lining that was uncomfortable and didn't sit right.
I loved this dress! It fit perfectly!
Ordered this for a black tie gala and it was perfect! Great fit and very comfortable. Really liked that I was covered up in the chest area but still felt sexy.
This dress was KILLER! So, so flattering. I have never felt so sexy! I received compliments all night. Comfortable and hugs all the right curves.
This dress fit perfectly! It was my backup dress and I actually wanted to keep it. I have a tummy and you could not tell in this dress. Felt super confident!

The fit was slimming and I got a ton of complimentary! It made me feel so comfortable in a floor length dress. The split helped me look taller (I'm 5'3) so every little bit helps (plus heels), and the length was great. I would 100% rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Most gorgeous dress I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a marine corps ball and I loved it! It was so comfortable and the material was slightly stretchy so it wasn't super tight fitting. Would definitely rent again from rent the runway!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great just a bit nice around the neck. But overall a great dress!
Great thick fabric I didn't need a bra even better if u have some spanks underneath!!

links_reviews_title: This is a very flattering dress, prepare for compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a black tie wedding and felt pretty glamorous! It fit nicely. The slit came up higher than I expected but it was still classy.

The event ended up being less formal, which is the only reason I didn't wear this dress. Fit like a glove and felt great! The regular might have required a small heel or flat (I'm 5'6" with 33" inseam).

This dress fit so well! It was comfortable and flattering. I normally don't wear long dresses because I'm short, but this looked great. I loved the leg slit. Only issue is that the shoulder straps move around a bit.

This dress was very comfortable and made me feel super curvy when I'm not really at all. The regular hit right at the floor without heels so if you are much taller than 5'6 I would suggest the long. Also it was made well enough, even with a large bust like mine, wearing a bra was optional.

links_reviews_title: This was the back up dress I picked from RTR and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. I should have looked for a 12L it was a little short with my heels. I am 5’8”.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so elegant, easy to wear and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a black-tie wedding. I was so comfortable the whole event...it was like I was wearing my gym clothes! I loved it from the second I put it on to the moment I took it off! I actually wore the size larger dress because the smaller size made the slit too wide even when just standing...a little out of my comfort zone. No bra needed I just wore self-adhesive cups so no worries about bra straps showing. I danced the night away and felt amazing! I hated giving back the dress! Thank you RTR :)

The fit was perfect!! I haven't had a formal dress on in years and I felt so beautiful!!! I was so worried because it didn't come on time but your customer service was excellent and everything turned out great. THANK YOU & YOU HAVE A FOREVER CUSTOMER!!!
This dress fit a little big in the hips. The shoulder things fit a little weird, but otherwise I quite liked the dress. I wish the butt area was a bit tighter!

Great dress. I'm 5'1" & 170. I wore a 14R with a 2 inch heel. A little long but hardly any problems at all! We are ballroom dancers & going forward or backwards this dress handled every move with ease & comfort.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a very formal gala. It hugged every curve and the slit was sexy but classy.
links_reviews_text: Straps stayed in place, length was perfect with 3" heels. Material was thick enough to hide most bumps.
I felt so elegant and comfortable in this dress at the gala. I loved that the slit made this solid black dress a bit more fun. Great length with a short heel with short ladies!
Wore to a work function gala. Was very comfortable but also very glam.

Very form fitting. I am usually a 2 or 4 but I wore a 0 with a spanx! Very sexy and comfortable. I didn't like the bra padding that you can not remove. No one noticed but me. It was a great dress though.

links_reviews_title: Ordered this dress Friday morning for a Saturday night affair and it was delivered Sat before 12!!!
links_reviews_text: Definitely was a little short, very comfortable dress! Would definitely rent again!
I love, love, love this dress. Fits perfectly. Very comfortable. Definitely true to size!
This dress was comfortable and fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, would rent again.
links_reviews_text: The slit and shoulder details were my favorite part of this dress. I have a very curvy bottom, and sometimes dresses won't fit but there's a decent amount of stretch to this dress so I felt comfortable all night. I wish the dress was a little longer, since it didn't hit the floor in 2/3 in heels. If you like raising your arms a lot, you may have to adjust the straps a lot.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. The process overall was great and easy.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" thin and a little chesty, this dress fit PERFECTLY. I wore 2 inch heels. I got so many compliments. It was form fitting but very comfortable. You don't really need to wear a bra because it comes with padding and the fabric is think. Such a perfect dress! I wish I could wear it everyday!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so incredibly flattering. I received compliments all evening.
links_reviews_text: The only con is that the slit (which I loved) was so high that I had to be aware of how high it crept up while I was sitting down! Otherwise it was a total home run. Comfy, flattering and the perfect balance of classy and sexy!

links_reviews_title: The process was very straightforward and easy to navigate and figure out. 10/10 would use again!
links_reviews_text: I rented for a January gala, and this was my backup gown. As soon as I tried it on I knew I wanted to wear this one to the event. It fit like a glove! It's true the material is a little heavy--but not in a bad way at all. It made it so slimming and flattering! I'm 5'6", 160lbs, and wore 2-2.5in heels--could've worn shorter heels but that's all I had. Without heels the dress barely drug on the floor, with my heels it was barely up off the floor. The fit of the dress made me feel comfortable and confident while hiding the extra baby weight I have right now.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable, great dress. Just in case you didn't know, you can get a back up size & dres
links_reviews_text: I'm about 5'4'' and the dress is just above the floor when I wear my 3.5 inch heels, so it may be too long for the shorter gals. It was also a tad large at my waist, but probably just because I'm still a high schooler and I'm rather skinny. I was worried that the fabric would be thick and look cheap (since it's polyester) but it was thin and looked very elegant and moved easily. Also, rent the runway allows you to get a back up size and another type of dress (free if you are a first user). It was delivered on time as well. Also, remember to wear a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful, glamorous, and enjoyed being with my significant other, family and friends.
links_reviews_text: It fit very well and accentuated my curves.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Made me really feel elite.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, except for built in bra cups, I had to straighten out. Otherwise worked flawlessly
True to size. I am 5'6 so I couldn't wear very tall heels but overall great dress!

This is a pretty and flattering cut, but very short. I’m 5’7 and this was 2in off the ground before shoes. I could not wear it. In addition the bra cups were really messed up and could not be fixed. Ultimately I had to order another dress.
I love this dress. I wore it for a Mardi Gras Black and White Ball. I received lots of compliments and it showed off all my curves.

This was my backup dress option (there was a coupon to get one for free), so I only had the one size to try. Based on the main dresses that I thought I would end up wearing, both a size 0 and 2 probably would have worked. I had the size 2 and it fit great. There wasn’t too much extra room in the bust, a problem I usually have. Great length, though if you’re short like me (5’2”) be prepared to wear at least 3” heels. I switched to flats when we went out after our event and stepped on the hem unless I held the dress up while walking. Gorgeous fabric, very comfortable. The downside (like, did a man design this dress??) is that the dress hanging straps are attached to a spot that makes it really difficult to tuck them in and away. If this were my own dress I’d have cut them off. Instead I used some hemming tape to tape them to the inside of the dress, but as I moved around throughout the evening, my husband had to keep tucking them back in. Might be a dealbreaker for you depending on the event, so I wanted to make sure you knew!

I rented this for a Mardi Gras Ball. It was so comfortable to wear because of the stretch and the neckline was sexy. I sized up since formal gowns tend to run small. I could have worn my regular 14 because of the stretch fabric, but it would not have been as flattering. The straps stayed in place and the length was perfect with a 3" wedge heel.

Wore this to a brunch engagement party. So flattering. I think it fits a little small, I normally wear a 4, but it's a beautiful cut, you can wear a regular bra, and I received lots of compliments. Beautiful dress!

It was a pretty, classic dress that I ordered to wear for our Christmas photos this year. A simple dress, I didn't want anything over the top, and it has great material and fit. I have received so many compliments on the dress!
Felt comfortable but tight in the bust
The dress fit a little on the snug side. I usually wear an 8. But this particular fit was tight around the arms. The 10 fit perfectly. It was comfortable and flattering.
Great fit, fun pattern, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Liked the fit of this dress but I think the back looked awkward with the shorter hem.
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing but liked the concept (thought it would be good for work) Liked the fit of this dress but I think the back looked awkward with the shorter hem on me. Kind of want to try the black and gold for a dressier occasion

links_reviews_title: Really Cute But Size Up If Between Sizes!
links_reviews_text: This is very cute, both professional and fun. The material is a little itchy but it wasn't uncomfortable to wear. If you are between sizes, size up. This dress has no give or stretch so it kind of flattened my chest. If you have a large chest this might be tricky for you since there is no stretch. Also I am almost 5'9" and the length was good.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a spring wedding
links_reviews_text: Ordered a 0, with a 2 as a back up. Ended up wearing the 2.

Fit perfectly for my petite top. Length was right above knee and the material of dress feels great and on the thicker side. It's very cutesy but not overly cutesy. Good for work and daytime date. Would rent again!

I rented this for a communion party. It was ok but not great. The waist fell in a strange spot for me, I would have preferred it lower or higher and it was a littler shorter then I would have preferred. I am 5 10 so maybe it would have fit better in someone a little shorter

I normally wear a size 8 and after reading the reviews I decided to go with the 10 and I'm glad I did! It fit like a glove! I wore it to my sorority founders day and received so many compliments. The fabric is really flattering and it is (obviously) high quality. The colors were also really nice and easy to match. I loved the neck line and it was a good length, very appropriate with still being trendy! I would defiantly recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: The top was a little tight but overall it fit really well.
The dress was a tad shorter than I usually wear, but it looked great! I got lots of compliments! Super comfortable and flattering

This dress was totally a break from my all black wardrobe. It is perfect for a bridal shower, brunch or something cute with your girls. It fits tight and doesn't have a lot of room for large breasted women so I would size up in that case. I was thankful for the fit and flare styling for the forgiveness in my hips.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, flattering and classy with a little flirty fun at the bottom.
links_reviews_text: Not a perfect fit in the torso for me, I am short and small chested so ther was some extra fabric in the shoulders, but sizing down didn’t help just shrunk the waist. Didn’t seem to detract from the overall look though so I went with it. Really comfortable fabric, good length for the occasion and flattering cut. I paired it with nude flats (outdoor wedding) and some fun necklaces and earrings because the solid navy is quite bland, but the floral peek-a-boo is really fun. Recommend it and would consider renting again.
I found myself tugging on the shorter blue side feeling like my butt was hanging out. But of course it wasn't because of the floral layer
So great for vacation - good fit and awesome for vacay. Good for hour glass figures due to style. Would def rent again
The fit is very flattering and I loved the overall design. So pretty! There is no stretch in the waist, but it fit true to size.
Tight in all the right places. Received a lot of compliments
Wore this for work dinner my husbands work hosted. Was appropriate and very pretty
This dress fit beautifully, I loved it and got a bunch of complements! The cut of the dress did make me look like I had somewhat of a belly, which didn't bother me but might bother some.

I rented this dress to take some engagement photos in, and it was perfect. The fit was nice, and I love the pop of print. I got the 2 and 4, and wore the 4. Any smaller would have been tight across the hips for me. The dress is lined and I just felt great in it all day.

This dress was perfect for a fall wedding. The fit was very flattering and forgiving as the skirt flows out so it hides my not so flat stomach haha. I received a few compliments and felt great in it the whole night!
Great fit, super comfy, and super flirty. I danced the night away and look fab doing it!

I got this dress very last minute after my original one had a busted zipper. As you can imagine the picking were slim with the event 3 days out so I was worried. I ended up loving it! I am a 36D with athletic build so it was a tad tight in chest but it worked just fine. I got tons of compliments and felt so comfident in it! Thanks RTR for getting out to me quickly!
Beautiful airy fabric and very classy

This dress was very good quality and a super unique style. I received many compliments on it, and nobody else was wearing anything like it. I would say that the fit was a little small, I'm usually a 0 but had to wear the 2 and that was even slightly snug on me. Otherwise it was really cute and had a nice shape to it. Perfect for the garden wedding I attended :)
Had a blast and so pretty! Fit was great and comfortable to dance!
This dress was pretty plain except the flirty floral part of the dress, so I wore with a statement necklace. Overall it fit really well and was very comfortable.

Very cute! I wore it to a bridal shower and I loved it! The dress fits true to size and very comfortable. It fell just above my knee. The blue is a very nice color. I think the dress is truly versatile, and can be worn to a casual party or a slightly more formal one depending on accessories and shoes.
I really liked this dress and it was perfect for the wedding I rented it for. I did find that it ran small and that it was pretty right in the chest, but overall it was a fun dress!

So, this was a fabulous dress that I was originally worried about due to there being no back up. However, it fit great! It was a tad loose, and when I say loose it just wasn't body tight. It was very comfortable. The neckline seems to have seen better days but this is also a rental and a ton of people have worn it I bet. I got a BUNCH of compliments and shared RTR with a few ladies out there. I suggest it! I loved the pop of floral from under the blue.
Little snug around the waist, but very flattering and fun flowing bottom for dancing. I received tons of compliments all night and would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm 3 month's postpartum and my belly is still pretty big (39 inch) so the size 16 fits me (since the waistline is not a shift dress). I was going to rent size 14 but i'm glad that it was out and size 16 worked perfectly fine even though i have some room at the chest area. Got compliments for my dress from other guests :) I don't look like i have a huge belly from this dress. haha! It looks like a plain dress but the detail at the bottom makes it interesting. It's lined but the material is not thick - it's perfect for California summer days! The only complain I have is the string/thread that connects the two layers at the bottom - somehow results in a weird outline/flow-y shape (somehow doesn't flow with the rest of the bottom of the dress). but if you take pictures from certain angle, u can hide it.. and it's not noticeable to others as long as u walk confidently :) I will rent this dress or other similar design from this designer again in the future!

links_reviews_title: Love the look but the tightness in the stomach area means you need a size up.
links_reviews_text: The bad thing about this dress is the best size for me has repeatedly been unavailable. They obviously need to get more size 12's in stock.

I wore this dress to an outdoor wedding but would be perfect for any occasion. It's a cute, simple style. This dress was so comfortable! I prefer not to wear dresses that are not form fitting so this style was absolutely perfect.

links_reviews_title: Conservative cut but fun spark of pattern!
links_reviews_text: Not a lot of stretch at the waist, I went up to the larger size for comfort. The length was good and I loved the extra pattern at the bottom. It was a fairly conservative looking dress, which is what I wanted, but with some hidden fun!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size. It was a flattering cut for my body type (wide hips and curvy thighs). The material is thick, so condensation from the water glasses took a bit long to dry. I had to be a little careful sitting down because it was a bit short in the back. Otherwise, an awesome rental and would highly recommend this dress!
Beautiful dress! I was almost too tall for it at 5'11". I got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to an outdoor country themed wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very flattering. I recently had a baby and wanted something that hid my problem areas. This dress made me feel beautiful! It fit my bust well and was flowy at the bottom. The flower pattern underneath was a perfect touch. My only complaint was that I had to return this dress!

links_reviews_title: Super fun high-lo but a little big
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but if you're petit go a size down and recognize it will be longer than it should be. Rented it for a southern wedding!

links_reviews_title: Pretty and elegant for a wedding
links_reviews_text: I felt elegant in this tea length gown, and the stripes at the top have some pretty, sparkly iridescence to them that you can't see in photos. I found the bust part to be a little larger than I expected and the skirt is quite full.

I loved wearing this dress to a black-tie optional wedding. The fabric looked a little worn up close, but no one but me noticed. I was 25 weeks pregnant, about 135 pounds, and the 4 accommodated my bump well! I had no issues with the boning or bodice being too tight. I sized up from my usual 2, and I think expecting moms should size up one size--especially if you are busty. (I'm not and didn't need a bra.)

This dress was very pretty and I got lots of compliments on it at the wedding. It fit well, maybe a little tight at the bust part but I also wasn't wearing the right bra with it. Two things I wasn't a huge fan of, the dress is silver and navy, the silver looks a little ... dingy in person. I think it's just the material they used. You can see it doesn't look bad in photos though. Also I felt like the lining in the top part kept slipping out and I had to tuck it in. Again, maybe because of the bra I was wearing. But it's a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Navy was a great option to stand out in a sea of black dresses.
links_reviews_text: I rented the same dress previously in a different color so I knew I liked the style and knew what size would work. I had to wear the size 10 to fit in the rib area. The bottom was a little more full than I would like, but overall looked fine. The size 8 would have been better overall fit but too tight in top section. Very comfortable dress. Pockets great. Navy is a great color if looking for something other than black.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering along the waist. It was perfect for a "yacht chic" theme.
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size.

My biggest complaint about the dress was the zipper. It was really difficult to get the zipper to go up past the first layer of the silver/blue part. Once it got past that spot it was easy to zipper. I didn't have anyone to zip the dress for me so I wore the size 10 so that I could put the dress on backwards, then zip it, and twist it around. Would have gone with the 8 otherwise. Dress fit really well, didn't have to wear a bra. Was able to dance all night without it falling, it's nice and tight around the rib cage area. Got so many compliments on it all night!

links_reviews_title: I wore this while 6-7months pregnant and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I usually a size 0-2, however I was close to 7 months pregnant and in need of a dress for my work holiday party that wasn't the typical awful maternity floral. This dress was perfect because it is very flowly under the ribs so it can accomodate a baby bump or food baby perfectly. The dress was a bit more blue than I anticipated but really was a great option.

links_reviews_title: Received compliments all night even from strangers!
links_reviews_text: I have a smaller chest so I wore a padded strapless bra. Just had to pull up periodically. Great dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. Fancy but the color made it not too formal. I definitely had the best dress!
links_reviews_text: The bodice was very fitted and too tight to make a sit down dinner comfortable. Thankfully there was a lot of standing which was fine. I ordered a similar dress from shoshana (high-low, gown) in the 6R and the fit in the rib cage area was much more comfortable
Got compliments all night! Wonderful dress - don't be afraid to iron it ;) The wire will dig into your ribs when you sit down - but it's fine!

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a yacht club wedding! Very flattering and cute.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit! Someone else had the same dress at my event though, so maybe too perfect for the event.

links_reviews_title: Perfect rental for a late summer black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I thought from the stock photos and the reviews I read about the dress that the top was white and navy, but it is more a shimmery/silver color! The chest was pretty tight! But this meant that I did not have to wear a bra, and that the dress stayed up and I didn't have to keep pulling on it all night! If you are bigger than a 32DD this might be a little too tight for you! The length was good, a little long, but I am short so I knew it would be. I wore 3 inch wedges and I think it ended up looking great!

This dress was exactly what I needed for the wedding I wore it to. I initially thought the top of the dress was white and blue but it's actually silver and blue. I wasn't sure about it when I first got it but it ended up being perfect.

I've never gotten so many compliments on a dress! The skirt on this dress is flattering and simply perfect. I'm 5'3" and the length was a bit long on me, but still worked on my frame. The top looks white in the photo, but it's actually a silver metallic fabric. I'm usually a size 6 in dresses, but the top is snug so I wore the size 8 the night of event. Pockets are another plus of this dress. My only complaint is the dress had clearly been worn several times before it made its way to me - the ribs of the corset poked out of the top. It wasn't a huge deal, but if the dress had been brand new it wouldn't have been an issue.
Too big in waist and tight in chest.

The dress is non-fussy and easy to wear- it even has pockets. I did not need to wear a bra because the top is very supportive. The only problem is that the zipper in the back is broken so I had to work some magic to get it on me and there is no give around the chest so a size 6 fit me perfectly but there was little room to spare

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a wedding in all temperatures!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a daytime summer wedding that happened to be on a nearly 105 degree day. I went with the 8R and a 10R as a backup, and it fit true to size except maybe slightly big for me in the bust area (and I'm pretty large chested) but the length and fit was otherwise perfect. It looks white online but is definitely silver, so I paired it with silver strappy sandals, silver jewelry, and a silver clutch. The fabric seemed prone to wrinkles so you might need to press, otherwise a great choice that works well for all seasons.
Loved this dress, wore it for a wedding. Received many compliments

links_reviews_title: Love!!! Perfect for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Love it !!! It has pockets !!!! Everyone loved it almost as much as I did!!
