links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for a formal summer wedding. Pockets were a huge plus, bc I could keep my phone and lipstick. I normally wear a 4 but wore the 2 in this dress and it fit great. Very comfortable and flattering. I could also see wearing this dress with a bump if you were looking for a dress like that.

Fits fairly TTS. Great fit on top for my 34DD, which was awesome. Zipper was a bit tricky, just the nature of a worn dress and not so great zippers. The fit was super flowy past the chest, so not necessarily the most flattering dress possible but I liked the fit and got tons of compliments. The flowiness was lots of fun for dancing, and I loved the pockets. Pretty comfortable and easy to wear all night. The length was perfect for me at 5'3", with back being just above floor length bare foot. It might've looked a bit more dramatic if I was taller, but I liked it the way it was. Turned out I even unknowingly matched my husband as we found out his groomsmen tux was navy the day before the wedding.

Wore to a formal wedding and got many compliments even from people I did not know. Fits tight around the rib cage but a little bigger in the bust region. The material is actually pretty thick - it was quite warm in 75/80 degree weather! The top is more of an off-white/silver. Overall, loved the fit and design, super comfortable and fun to dance in!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for red carpet movie premiere!
links_reviews_text: Fit up top. Did not have to pull up all night. Great for small on top, hips on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!!! Will rent again..I received so many compliments ...wore with kitten heels.
links_reviews_text: I am 63 years old, hourglass shape, 36D. 5"6 and 150 lbs. The dress was so comfortable - loved the pockets - kept phone and lipstick in them. Did not wear a bra = top was snug so didn't need one. I wore it to a beach wedding on the Jersey Shore
Stylish and shows off the appropriate amount of skin to feel sexy without being sleazy. At 4.5 months pregnant this dress allowed me to eat and show off some curves without wearing a burlap sack.

There is a corset like top and there is no need to wear any support. The zipper was a little tough and you need someone else to zip you in. Being 5'3" I feel the dress was longer than I wanted but it still worked with heels. It does have pockets! I felt my iPhoneX weighed the dress down when it was in my pocket. Received some compliments, always a bonus :)

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a spring wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was fun and super cute. Great for a springtime wedding. The colors are great, and the fit is flattering. I'm 5'9" and the length was perfect with some heels.

The band on the inside to keep the dress held up seemed stretched out, so I had some trouble getting the dress to stay in place. It took a couple of friends and some safety pins to secure it. Other than that, the dress was beautiful. The picture makes it look like a white stripe, but it is a bit more silver. And, I always love a dress with pockets!
Great dress for Miami wedding. Im 5'3" and 120 lbs and the 2R fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a nautical-themed auction and dance.... So comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove once hubs helped with the zipper. No need for a bra or Spanx which is always a plus. Danced a ton and the bodice didn't move an inch. Paired with navy strappy sandals and sparkly blue jewelry, and got a TON of compliments. Would totally rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for early fall east coast wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit really well. I felt it was a good choice for a black tie optional wedding. The dress is made out of quality material but you could tell it's been worn many times.

This dress is GORGEOUS! I couldn't get over how pretty it was. Unfortunately the event I had rented it for got cancelled so I only wore it to see how it fit. The chest part where it's striped has silver lurex throughout the weaving so it's pretty sparkly. The chest also has zero stretch and I would say really only comfortably fits up to a C cup. The con to this dress though is the stomach area--it make me look like I was pregnant, even when I stood up straight with perfect posture. I think on me in photos I would have really looked like I was pregnant. Otherwise though it was beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Super cute for derby since it was chilly outside.
links_reviews_text: Made a hat to match it. Looks white but the strips at actually gray. Very heavy material.

Love the stress and the thickness of the material. Fit the 10 but it was a little tight across my rib cage and I didn't want to be uncomfortable. I wore the 12 but I did feel like it was a tad bit baggy. No one seemed to notice and I got a bunch of compliments and felt beautiful. Great dress would rent again. The asymmetrical him helps if you're unsure about the length.

Hi I was 2 months post baby and wore this to an outdoors wedding last week of September in NY. I am 5'1 and wore it with a 2 inch heel and it fit fine. The bottom back of dress gently grazed the floor. I got many compliments all night I about how amazing I looked and how you couldn't tell I just had a baby. The picture included here is not from the event but from trying it on at home days prior. Day of event I wore it with a white fascinator, white strappy heels, and a "fur" cover. Please note the bands on the top are silver and blue not white and blue. As I wore white gold jewelry and the white shoes and white fascinator my entire outfit flowed; however, silver shoes would be most appropriate. I highly recommend for post partum mommas! I did not wear bra but still could wear nursing pads. I did not even really need to wear spanx since dress was not tight in tummy. Bodice is fitted and then skirt portion balloons out a bit which is very flattering. The only thing is by end of the night I noticed that I felt one of the wires from the bodice poking me in the belly. Fortunately, was not low on abdomen. In any case, when I sat up straight it did not poke me nor was it painful, just something I noticed. (Usually I would have been dancing, but sat most of the night this particular evening). Before baby I would have worn 6. Now I ordered 8-10 and wore the 8.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a TV premiere.
links_reviews_text: Pros, great dress... well constructed, great fit.. I didn't realize the top was sparkly (which made this dress a little dressy for the event, but I still loved it). Cons, I'm fairly short 5'4" and even with heels this was nearly dragging in the back.

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress for a late summer black-tie optional wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was my back-up style, and it should have been my first choice. The bodice is fitted (didn't need a strapless bra or anything), and the skirt was flowy and flattering. Loved the pockets! I had my phone in my pocket all night--and you couldn't tell! I would definitely rent this dress again!

This dress fit like a glove and I loved the high -low hem, as well as the pockets. I received so many compliments on this dress. The dress was comfortable and can be dressed up with jewelry or worn without it.

links_reviews_title: Friends wedding that 100% required a dress you could dance in!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a friends wedding, worked out great because it rained, the bottom of the dress was perfect length so it wouldn't get wet. Pockets were key. The blue and white stripes are shiny and sparkly if you can't tell in pictures. The top was slightly tighter than expected and I felt the need to pull it up often. The wires also peaked out at the top, not super uncomfortable/ not stabbing me or anything but they were visible navy points when I believe it should have rounded at the top of the dress. Very pretty overall!

I really liked this wrap dress. The pattern was really nice and make it easy to dress up or down. The material wasn't too thin as well and I was able to wear a strapless bra with it. Many compliments!

I rented this dress for an outdoor camp wedding, and it was perfect. I am 5'4" and I often worry about dresses being too long, but the back just skimmed the floor with 2-inch heels, and since the front is shorter it was perfect. The color is beautiful in person, and the flow ruffle nature of the skirt makes it really fun to dance in! However, I will say, if you have a very modest wedding it may be a bit too much-- as some other reviews say, since it is a wrap dress the front of the skirt tends to totally fall open when you sit down and you have to be careful of that or just prepare to wear some bicycle shorts under your dress! The front bust also felt slightly big, even with the adjustable straps, so I ended up pinning it. But I was very happy and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great Wrap Dress! Works Well for Maternity!
links_reviews_text: This dress is even more stunning in person. I wore the dress for family photos and it photographed beautifully. It worked perfect for my second trimester bump. I rented a small, but pre-pregnancy I probably would have opted for an XS. The wrap was adjustable and didn't feel awkward around my belly at all. The dress was super comfortable and flattering. However, it is very low cut, so I used a safety pin to pin the top together, but that was a personal choice. I would definitely recommend renting this dress, baby bump or not!
Fit great!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: This is a wrap dress, but once you figure it out (small hole near your right arm/shoulder) it fits true to size. Loved the ruffled look on the edges as well. Got several compliments. Would definitely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not for a 3rd trimester
links_reviews_text: I liked that the straps were adjustable and the length was higher in the front so it would be easy to wear with a variety of shoes. I thought I could get away with this wrap dress 8 months pregnant but my baby bump made the crossover of the wrap a little too high in front and it would have been difficult to not show my undies without pinning it together somehow when sitting. If I weren't pregnant I would have ordered the M, but at this stage I was 165lbs and the L would have fit well without the extra bump. I would order this again post pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my hubby's golf tourney
links_reviews_text: Effortless wraparound maxi dress, pretty pattern/color! I didn't like that it arrived super wrinkled though so I was struggling to iron it in my hotel room.

It was a great last minute find when I unfortunately picked the wrong sizes from my original rental. Because of my proportions I grabbed the XL bc it's what was in the RTR store and it fit. Since my bust is smaller than my bottom it was a little roomy on top but fashion tape to the rescue! Perfect for a day function! #batmitzvah #dayparty #party #luncheon #dayfunction #wedding #daywedding

I rented this for a Kentucky Derby Birthday Party. I was a littler nervous as there were no previous review-and when I received the dress, it looked as though it was a robe. Fear not, after a few minutes of actually figuring out the one string goes in through the dress, it all came together. This was flattering, beautiful color, and very comfortable as well as easily adjustable to fit. I received so many complements!
Cute dress for a summer wedding. Runs a little large in the bust. Wore one size up from my pre pregnancy size at 21 weeks but wish I had ordered my regular size.
Loved this dress, but wish I had sized down to an xs.
If this didn't have ruffles on the bust, this dress would be perfect to me. Lightweight, easily dressed down, this garnered multiple compliments from strangers.
Great fit, great color, great feel! I love this dress and got a ton of compliments

I didn't end up wearing it because it was a bit too low cut and I didn't feel confident pinning it. For someone with a smaller chest and who doesn't mind a little cleavage, this dress would be great. A little tricky to get it tied right, but it was super flattering otherwise.
This was a really cute dress! Unfortunately, it ran a little big, especially in the bust area. Perhaps size down, or invest in some dress tape

I rented this as an option for a summer wedding, and didn't end up wearing it. In theory it's beautiful, but it runs large...the bust was flapping open and the length was dragging on the ground even with short wedges. The material also doesn't feel super luxe, although the pattern is pretty and the color is really flattering! I would probably have worn it in a smaller size.
Easy wrap dress. Fabric is very soft. Pattern is perfect for spring/summer. Adjustable straps are great for any size chest.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my fancy birthday dinner with my husband. It is beautiful.
links_reviews_text: My only complaint is that the top is slightly revealing. I wore a strapless bra and tightened the spaghetti straps on the dress, but it was exposing a bit more cleavage than I would normally like. Fine for a dinner with my hubby but not great for a conservative event.
I'm 5 10 and was long enough on me, pretty dress, fit nice
It's a beautiful dress but doesn't cover the chest area at all. I'm really disappointed.

This is a low cut dress so watch out if you have big boobs. I ordered a small (it was all that was available) and ultimately didn't wear it since it was a teensy bit too tight in the waist. It definitely runs true to size and would be fun for a wedding or just walking around during the day when you want to feel fancy.
A little tight in my rib cage but I fit everywhere else. Gave me curves!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable and perfect for a night out. I ordered a medium because the small wasn't available. It was a little big at the waist, but fit perfectly across my chest. Loved the golden stripes for a summer vacation. Overall, a fun and comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so pretty you can wash and dry it, doesn't wrinkle and you will get tons of compliments!
Dress is gorgeous. Wore it to the Saratoga race track and received tons of compliments. If you have a larger rib cage it is a little snug when you sit but all around a great dress.

links_reviews_title: Great fit - front was a bit awkward
links_reviews_text: Pros: fit my body perfectly - zipped right up and fit like a glove - not too tight or too loose which is tough for me because I have a very wide muscular back so I never know if the zipper is going to go up easily or if the armpits will be digging in. I'm 5'2" and length was perfect. Fabric was light and airy. Received lots of compliments. Cons: If the pleating on the front had stayed pleated and flat it would have been more flattering but it kept "fanning" and balooning out making the top look fluffy.

This dress was absolutely adorable! I got a ton of compliments on it. I wore it for a very nice dinner to celebrate my husband's and my anniversary. The fit is very flattering and the style/color made for a great summery dress!

I rented this twice once for a trip to Florida and once to Cali. I accidentally got two different sizes, but they both worked. Medium was (obviously) shorter and tighter around the rib cage. It was super fun to wear though :)
I received so many compliments on this dress. I ended up wearing it two times and it was a perfect dress for a night out on the town and then a family reunion party.

This dress fits perfectly. Hugs in the right places and is flown to cover unwanted areas peeking through. The top fit a little bigger than I would like, but I am not busty at all. The bottom is flowy and fun. Wore out wine tasting and it was perfect. The whole dress is lined and made of nice thick material.

This is so flattering. Wore this to Happy Hour for my husband's office friends. All the girls were handing out compliments! Thick, quality fabric makes this easy to not wear a bra. Wore this with flat white sandals. Loved it!

Wore this out to dinner for my birthday. I felt so cute in it! I had to size up from my usual medium because of my larger bust size. The material is really soft and silky, and it flares out slightly from the waist. I'm 5'4 and it hit about an inch or so above the knee.

links_reviews_title: A little too formal for my event
links_reviews_text: This isn't quite a casual sundress - the material is a little on the stiff side but not uncomfortable. I felt that the small fit me perfectly, but an XS definitely would have been too tight on the rib cage. You definitely need to have a little bit of a chest to fill this one out. I'm pretty short and it hit me just above the knee.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for any warm weather outing
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It is so cute and whimsical! This is great for a date or any kind of outing in the spring or summer
Runs a bit small in the chest / ribcage area.
Very cute dress. Perfect for spring. Size was good. I ordered a large to be sure the top of as big enough. I could've gone down to a medium and been fine.
Very fitted through the waist, looser through bust and hips. Perfect dress if you are more hourglass shaped. Have worn it three times so far. Contemplating buying!

I wore this for a local golf tournament - received so many compliments and overall was extremely happy with the dress. I would order a size up (luckily I got a S and M). Super comfortable and neckline cut is very flattering.
I love this dress so much, it was light and summery and perfect for vacation in New Orleans. I loved the neck, didn't have to wear a bra, and the length was great. Wear safety shorts though!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, perfect for work presentation!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this with my RTR Unlimited and wore it for a work party and presentation then to dinner afterwards. It was perfect, bright and festive, the length was great, not too short for work and you can wear a strapless bra. The top is a little "pouffy" so if you are larger chested it won't do you any favors! Loved the waistline, overall very flattering!! It arrived with the tags on it !! Bonus!! One miss- both tiny buttons at the top of the neck, broke off the first time I tried to do them, had to pin it.....

Loved this dress, got tons of compliments. Was comfy, nice silk fabric. I usually wear a 4, but was happy I picked Small over Medium for this dress - fit perfectly and the cinched waist was very flattering. Planning to buy it.

This dress was not my favorite rental. To me the colors looked kind of dingy. Most importantly, though, the fit was off. I am a 6/8 and it fit me great in the waist but was HUGE in the chest. At least a handful of extra fabric there in me (36B). Also the distance from the waist to the neckline seemed long. I have a normal length torso and am 5'7", but this dress was just oddly long in the upper body. Might be better for my large-chested girls out there??
Wore this dress to my birthday dinner. Loved the style and color/pattern. Was a little tight around the ribs and waist area. Got many compliments!
I wore this dress for the 4th of July and received so many compliments! It fit perfectly and was very flattering (not to mention comfortable).

links_reviews_title: This dress is so cute but I didn't get to wear it because it didn't fit
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a medium however I was unable to zip the back of the dress all the way up, however if I would have sized up it would have been too puffy in the boob area. Also the dress is WAY TOO SHORT in the back. Any woman with hips or a butt you will not be able to even lean forward without showing off everything to the world.

links_reviews_title: I could not wear the dress...
links_reviews_text: The zipper on the back of the dress, caught easily and made this very difficult to zip up. Overall the dress was cute, the colors were different and eye-catching but I was to scared to force the zipper. The chest area did run large on me, and needed tape in order to avoid any side boob action... However, the dress was not wearable due to the zipper, so I couldn't wear it to the event.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and flattering! I wore it for a friend's brunch, and got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Even if you have a small chest like me, the dress is a flattering fit. Ran true to size.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Great length, fit, material and style.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a M instead of a small after reading reviews. The medium was perfect. I have big boobs so the fabric up top was not an issue for me. It's a really cute dress- could we worn dresses up or more casual. Great material and very flattering.
Did not fit me. Too tight in waist.
Great fit, flattering waist, light material for a spring or summer event

I rented this dress and went to pick it up / try it on in the Rent the Runway Chicago store. Unfortunately, it was too big up top and my 34B cups didn't fill the dress at all. The arm holes were too big as well. Otherwise, super cute dress! The great stylists at the store helped me find something more flattering! :)

links_reviews_title: Loved it! I received a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and comfortable!
Not too short and has a flattering cut with the high cut sides and neck/check area. The material was a tad hot and it was a bit tight in the mid section.

links_reviews_title: Cute but big in the chest
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. The material wicks away anything from spilling on it (someone spilled their soda on me and you couldn't even tell) but the zipper is a bit of a struggle. The chest is also very roomy for anyone with a bigger chest.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, quite short and tight waist.
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments on this dress. It's a pretty colour and a flattering shape but is quite short. I wore it for a summer dinner with a rather formal crowd, would have been better suited to a dinner on the beach or a fun summer day dress. Overall liked it.
Rented based off reviews from other petite women, and it was great!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear; top way too big for me
links_reviews_text: This dress is really pretty, but I'm short waisted (5'2") and the top was so large. I would need 3-4" in height to get my shoulders in the shoulders. It was baggy and saggy and strange. From the waist down, fit great.

OMG I wore this with a cardigan for casual Friday and I felt so pretty! The dress is pretty short on me (I'm 5'7) so I was really pushing our dress code but I'm going to keep it a bit longer...I just love it!
Runs small. Limited stretch. Very cute and beautiful for vacation.

links_reviews_title: Small too small, medium too large...
links_reviews_text: I rented both the small and medium for this dress. The material is nice, the color is great, and the style is gorgeous. It looks in the photo like it's shorter in the front, but it's not - I think it's just how the model is standing. I'm usually around a size 6, and the small wouldn't even zip up. I tried the medium and it BARELY zipped, but the bust was HUGE. It was really poufy and not flattering. I returned it immediately for a credit because I had to get something else to wear to the fundraiser I needed it for. I'm not sure who would look good in this (maybe someone busty with a very tiny waist?), but it really is a pretty dress.
This dress is so great. It is everything summer in an outfit.

As others have mentioned, this skirt runs small so I sized up. It was a little big in the waist for me, but very tight across my butt. If you have a booty, definitely size up! Loved the quality of the skirt and that it was silver but not too distracting. Would pair with so many things!
I sized up to a 4 (normally a 2) and it was perfect! Thick, high quality material and loved fhe sparkle. Fit high waisted so it's great for tucking in a blouse. Would rent again!

The most versatile skirt that I can't wait to work into my fall wardrobe! This skirt is perfect to dress up or down since you can definitely wear a t-shirt or a blouse to dress it up. It does run a bit small so I would recommend sizing up. It is fitted at the hips so I would likely size up the next size for backup so that I can have some room to tuck in a blouse! The fabric has no stretch and the skirt comes up about 3-4 inches from the knee. I don't want to give this skirt back!
Too small in the waist.
Nice fabric but odd shape in hips
Runs a little small. Perfect for holiday party!

I have a 27" waist and this skirt fit very snug in the waist, but was comfortable through the hips. Next time I would order a size up. Gorgeous material, a silver metallic over a heavy weave. Be sure to note the slots on the side, it might be more exposure than you're planning for. I wore this to work with opaque tights and boots, and then changed into heels for a party later that night. Love this has pockets!

I try to do as much research as I can about how a particular brand runs size-wise before renting. I'm typically a 2/4, so I sized up to the 4 (36) after reading up on Carven and other reviews. I couldn't even zip it, and it was way too snug around my bubble butt. So disappointing, because it's a really cute skirt and I'd planned on wearing it to a party with tall black boots. My measurements are 34-26-38, and I'm 5'9. I guess keep this in mind for your reference when choosing a size! I think I would've needed the 6 or maybe even 8 in this.

links_reviews_title: I ended up deciding not to wear this for a party because of the length.
links_reviews_text: This skirt was longer on me since I am 5'2" and the proportions didnt go with the look I was aiming for the party I had in mind. The pockets are also confusing, one is on the side and the other is towards your backside.

Like other reviewers do size one up. I took their advice glad i did and it fit great. This is great for work if you're petite. if you're over 5'6' this would be way to short and not office attire. Also it doesnt say this but it has pockets, a nice surprise!

It was obvious this skirt was not made in China. Great fit. I could have sized down to a 38 but I didn't want something too tight for work. perfect just above my knee (I am 5' 2") . The weight and color blew me away. I wore it twice over the holidays.
Great fabric. Understated piece.

I usually go between a 4 and a 6 in dresses - for this dress I went with the size 6 to give my pear shape a little more room at the bottom of the dress (since I knew I would be doing a lot of walking and dancing). I wore this dress to a large company holiday party and felt like the bright red color and pretty lace stood out amongst the crowd. Very comfy and made me feel confident!
Loved this dress! Fit incredibly well and might have to buy this one.

I rented this dress for a wedding but did not end up wearing it because the top was so big. The dress is made to be worn off the shoulder, but unless I put the straps in over my shoulders the whole top of the dress would fall down. If you have a larger chest, this dress is perfect for you.

I loved this -- it's a great for a fall wedding as the lace is lined and the fabric of the dress is heavier. It's very comfortable - I wore a strapless bra but the dress does have a built in bra too. I gave it for stars only because I found myself needing to pull the top up a few times in the evening and the sides/sleeves were a little too big. Other than that it was perfect! Lots of compliments.
The dress is structured so it has built in cups. It can be worn off the shoulder or with the shoulders up. With a seven month pregnancy belly it actually worked well!! Bright red color.
My favorite dress that I've ever worn. Great quality. Beautiful!!!!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and very comfortable

I absolutely loved this dress! I got so many compliments! I'm 15 weeks pregnant and my belly is much larger than most 15 week bellies and this dress fit me like a glove. My chest has also grown a lot and this dress accommodated it very well. Pre-pregnancy I was a 32DDD. I have no idea what I am now, but larger than that. I'm usually a size 4, and ordered this dress when I was much smaller in a 4 and a 6. By the time the dresses arrived my belly had definitely popped so both were too small. I called RTR and they overnighted me an 8. I was so thankful! My only complaint is that I can't keep it! :)

I wore this dress to a wedding when I was 17 weeks pregnant with my twins. I felt pretty and got a lot of compliments! However, there is boning in the dress that makes it very uncomfortable after awhile. It's hard to sit. Yes, my belly probably contributed to that but it would've been uncomfortable no matter what I believe. You can tell it's an expensive dress though and is gorgeous !

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress, and I just loved the fit!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this style, the off the shoulders look and not super tight around the mid-section. There was plenty of room for beer, food and dancing!

BEAUTIFUL red dress!! I was worried the dress would be too long for my short frame but I was so wrong! If you have hips and a booty, do not fear, this dress accentuates those areas in the most magical way!! Wore to a Labor Day weekend wedding in Minnesota and received SO many compliments. My favorite RTR rental to date!!
Cute, great fit and party fun!
I really liked this dress for a wedding. It was comfortable and very flattering. Was able to dance all night
I have rented this several times, as it is just a reliable, beautiful dress! It is elegant and fits well, and is perfect for a variety of occasions! It is TTS and fitted, size up for back ups.

I rented this for a night out at the holiday symphony with my family. I sized up to the 12 for more room in the hips. The top was a bit big, but you couldn't tell at all under the ruffle. I did wear a bra for support- some reviewers said you do not have to. I felt great all night. It hugged my curves in all the right places without being inappropriate or too tight. I did need help zipping up the back, but who doesn't?! The length was modest, especially for taller girls but still sexy. I would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Everyone said it was a beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: It stayed up well but didn't bother my arms too much where I couldn't dance.
This dress was amazing, fit TTS and was very comfortable. Didn't need to wear a bra because of the supportive upper half of the dress. Would love this in black!

I rented this dress for our annual Gala that my non-profit hosts. This was my first time using RTR and I won't do it any other way after this! The dress I got was a showstopper! I had SO many compliments on how beautiful it was! It hugged in all the right places. The built in bra was SO nice. I am a 36DD and it worked for me. I love this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Dress was a showstopper, I got so many compliments on the color and cut!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 4 (5'7'', 134lbs, athletic build) and this dress fit just right. the built in bra is great and the dress has great movement with perfect shape. easy to wear, I would def rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit at 5mo pregnant, but just barely!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. I was looking for something that would potentially fit my growing body and this just barely fit! There aren't a ton of options for maternity dresses but this one popped up and I went for it. I'm glad I did. The bodice keeps things contained and the shoulder material does not fall or ride up. It is a well made dress. I was afraid with the lace drape and the long cut it might look baggy but it was quite form fitting, especially given the circumstances.

The dress was great, long for my frame but I hemmed it with fashion tape for the night, I should’ve sized down for a tighter fit and length. The built in bra was a plus and stayed in place, even dancing the night away! Color was amazing!

Great fit and very flattering! I received a lot of compliments and it was perfect for a formal banquet for my significant other. The boning in the top of the dress dug into my ribs slightly when sitting, but it was still worth wearing!

links_reviews_title: Want to try again when I'm not pregnant.
links_reviews_text: This worked OK for pregnancy. I ended up wearing a different dress as this dress was pulling a bit in the back. It was comfortable but I was worried I'd have issues sitting, etc. I'm usually a 0/2 and rented a size 8. I probably could have used a 10 so this definitely runs small! I'm 33 weeks pregnant in this picture (+30 lbs). I think it would work better in the second trimester. Beautiful dress I want to rent it again when I'm not pregnant!

The fit was nice, although I thought it more stretchy than it was. The 6 fit just right (my husband had to help me zip it) and I am 5'7 and about 138lbs. It has the bars or piping inside the top of the dress and they were poking me a little bit in the back, but not badly. I loved the off the shoulder look and the fitted shape of the dress. Very unique and sexy. The color is really pretty. I got a lot of compliments and it felt great!

I wore this for a summer wedding. This dress is well structured and looks and feels like a million bucks. It runs very small and you probably need to size up. I'm 5'3 and 112lbs and usually wear an XS/0 but even the 2 was a little snug. It's very comfortable and you don't need a bra. It's pretty fitted up top so it might be tighter if you have a bigger bust. It was a bit long on me but it was so pretty I decided to wear it anyway. Definitely a unique and beautiful look. Would rent again.

This was actually sent as a replacement dress selected by RTR stylist last minute as the dress I chose was no longer available in XS. Thank God they did because the S in the other dress was actually too tight and not flattering. When I tried this one on, I ended up liking it SO much better! Fit like a glove while still allowing room for dancing the night away. Highly recommend!
Received so many compliments on this dress. Ran a bit small when it came to fully zipping it up, so glad I sized up for my backup. Will definitely rent this again!
Super flattering. Runs long if your short, definitely need heels. Stayed in place all night while dancing, didn't need to fidget with it. Also has a built bra so it was great not needing one.

links_reviews_title: fun dress but a little tight in the back
links_reviews_text: Fun fun dress but it's hard to dance

I rented this dress at 24 weeks pregnant. It was perfect for an outdoor wedding and so comfortable! I wore a 4/6 pre-pregnancy and rented this dress in an 8. I loved the built in bra. The dress is very flattering and I felt great!

Wore this to a summer wedding and it was perfect! I was nervous about dancing all night in a strapless dress, but I had no issues. There's a decent built-in bra as well, so the ladies may not even need traditional support.

One of the sizes of the dress I ordered for a wedding so this was sent to me in place of it. It's definitely not something I would ever order for myself, being both petite and pear shaped. As you can see in the photo - way too long and it accentuates my hips (not in a flattering way). It's definitely a well made dress, just not my style.

links_reviews_title: Tight at top lose on bottom
links_reviews_text: Overall i received lots of compliments! Loved the style and color. My only gripe was that i had to wear the bigger size because the top was too tight on the smaller size. I couldnt zip it at the top. the bigger size was a bit lose on my bottom half. :/

links_reviews_title: A pop of color and fun off the shoulder!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The red color was fun but not overly bold since it has the nude layer underneath. I had to pull up the dress once in a while but it generally stayed up pretty well. The built in cups were a plus, no bra needed. Worn for an evening wedding.

links_reviews_title: The bride even said I looked great! On HER day!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. Though I have some work to do in my mid section I still felt beautiful and comfortable! The zipper was a little tough but that was my only issue. I'd suggest this to a woman of any size!

links_reviews_title: THIS DRESS MAKES YOU THE RED DRESS EMOJI GIRL IN REAL LIFE! See picture proof below :)
links_reviews_text: I rented this lovely little number for the Kentucky Derby, and LOVED it so much! It was the perfect dress for the event, and even better because it fell on Cinco De Mayo this year. The only issue was the hanger strings pop out a lot, so just watch for those. It was so comfortable, and I didn't even need spanks which we all know is the biggest blessing this world can provide us gal pals! :) I'm tall (5'8) and the dress length hit right below the knee, which I loved. You'll feel like dancing the whole day and night away in this one my darlings! :)

links_reviews_title: Just like the dancing emoji lady!!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a derby party and it was a hit. Definitely makes a statement. I'm a 4/6 dress and the 4 was perfect. Built in bra and some stretch to the dress.

Rented this dress for a work dinner event and it was a hit! I absolutely loved this dress! Felt very stylish and classy in it. I rented an 8 with a back up 10 and wore the 10. It's form fitting and love that it has a built in bra/corset so no need to wear a bra.
The dress is classy yet still sexy. It's form fitting in the right places and still looks good on shorter girls. I definitely recommend!
I usually wear between 4 and 6. But it's stretchy material and the 4 fit perfect
Got lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: The process was so easy and the dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 40 and 42. I have a broad back and slim hips, so I tried the 42 and it fit my back perfectly. The dress does have give, though is form fitting through the torso. It has no zipper, so I found the easiest way for me to get into the dress was to step in and pull it up. It was very comfortable and beautiful!
Fun, flirty and beautiful cut for an hourglass figure.

Second time I'm rented this dress and I️ love it! It's stretchy and bounces when you dance in it. My boobs are 32DDD and it worked great braless. Also...I️ have a varicose vein after 4 kids so can't wear short dresses. This dress covers it and still makes me look hot. So easy and fun to wear!
I️ wore this dress to a bar mitzvah and it fit great, very slimming and would work well with most body types. Def would rent again.

I love it, great quality. I wore it to work and it was a little fancy but it was better when I put a cardigan over it... my only problem with this dress is that the arm cutout is just up way too high. It was giving me rolls and wasn't flattering. Otherwise this dress is just so beautiful.

I loved wearing this. I wore to a rehearsal dinner. The material is nice and thick and super stretchy. I have a true hourglass shape so it was super flattering on my figure. I generally wear a size 6 (42) and I sized down to a 4 (40). I actually wish I had sized down to a 2 because my waist is small and I had a bit of room there. I wore the straps up on my shoulders a bit but it looked great with them off the shoulder. I would rent again and have already recommended the dress to a friend!

links_reviews_title: Had a fantastic time and received lots of compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING- but I would definitely consider going up a few sizes. I normally wear a size 4-6 and probably would've been very disappointed if I had ordered this dress in my size online. Because I rented it from a store, I was able to try on the different sizes and ultimately wore a size 42. The 42 was a bit large in the bust, but most dresses tend to be for me anyway. Definitely consider this dress, but if you do, really consider the sizes as the size 42 was pretty fitted on me.

links_reviews_title: Rehearsal dinner--- sexy and classic LBD!
links_reviews_text: I would definitely recommend this dress to a friend! It is fitted, fit-and-flare with lots of volume in the skirt. The material was stretchy scuba-material that hugged my curves--- I wore spanx underneath because the dress was so fitted. It fit true to size and was perfectly elegant for a formal rehearsal dinner.

This dress was perfect! It runs a tad large so size down. I'm 5'4 143lbs 34D and it was perfect for our school auction. I received a ton of compliments on how this dress presented a classic look. Very fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect simple black dress with a little flare
links_reviews_text: I wanted a dress that would be conservative enough to wear to my company holiday party but still fun enough to make a statement. This paired with a fun necklace (also from RTR) was the perfect solution. I was very pleased with the fit, I usually wear an 8 and I wore the corresponding size 44 and I don't think I would have wanted it go bigger. I would have probably felt more comfortable with some Spanx but I didn't have any at the time.

links_reviews_title: Thank you Sharifa (stylist)! Prompt reply and help with selection.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and Flattering. The skirt had a lot of movement. With the proper accessories it can look more formal. You can eat in this dress.

I'm really short so I have problems with bunching with a lot of dresses but this fit like a glove in an XS. I paired it with some pearls and a headband for a 1920s theme party and it was perfect! We ended up dancing and the bottom puffed up and made me feel glamorous.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely beautiful dress! Nice material - great swing in the skirt when dancing!
links_reviews_text: Rented for 8th grade graduation and dance! Perfect fit and true to size! Did not require bra and was lined! Arm hole sizes were nicely fitted! Many many compliments and great pictures!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, but not a good fit for me!
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful, I love the material and the shape. However I don't love wearing very high heels and I feel like this dress needed better heels that I had traveled with for the wedding I was attending. So I opted not to wear this.

Simply beautiful dress - the top is a beautiful portrait cut that you can wear on or off shoulders. If you have great shoulders & back, flaunt them in this beauty with joy. The top is super-fitted and the skirt is cut & architecturally constructed to flair out in sections. It's so simple yet has such an interesting shape that you're sure to draw attention in this elegant black (or is it a blue-black?) dress. The material is thick-ish, somewhat stretchy and will squeeze in your middle sans Spanks(c)! Definitely STEP into it - limited stretch but it's the only way you'll get into it. I usually wear XS or 0 and this 38 (translates to a 2) is very fitted - if I gained 2 #, I couldn't wear it comfortably! The arms holes are a tiny bit more snug than I'd like so I'd say size up if in doubt BUT you definitely want the fit & flare to do its magic. If you want to go for simple with couture impact - go with this gorgeous dress!
There is a fair amount of stretch in this dress which made it easy and comfortable to wear. Overall the dress is a little boring though.

Very comfortable, very versatile dress. I love the fluted skirt look! It's super stretchy and definitely runs a bit smaller in the bust/arm area, so size up for your backup size. I love the material and the ability to just slip it on (there are no zippers). It's also thick enough to wear without a bra, but has enough coverage that any standard bra hides under it. I'd recommend this for a more conservative event. Dress it up with a fun statement necklace or earrings!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! received so many compliments !!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: Not the look I was going for
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 6, 5'8, 140 lbs and the 42 fit well, but the style/fit was a not quite like the picture. It was very much like a 50's dress. It just didn't have a fun party vibe to it. My husband said, it's ok... but is it nice enough. So, I'm returning for another dress.
Flattering construction, length, and color, but runs small.
Runs very small. Very glamorous. Exquisite. I might go a size or two up next time.
Hit my high waist just right and the perfect v-neck for my full bust. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress just need an occasion
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. It fit well and is flattering. Will rent again when i need it for an event.
It fits great, stays in place. The skirt is so full and flowy; it's awesome!
This dress was so comfortable. It looked beautiful on and was perfect for a cocktail style wedding. Would highly recommend it and rent it again.

Okay - this dress is amazing don't get me wrong, but I have thick hips and instead of the fun skirt complimenting/hiding my hips, it just looked like it drew more attention to my hips. If you have any little belly it will show in your silhouette, too. Which I didn't love. Wouldn't rent again, but was cute.

links_reviews_title: I like to dress up every party
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect I got a lot of commented

links_reviews_title: Great quality. Comfortable and hides flaws
links_reviews_text: The quality of this dress is great. It made me feel thin and sexy
Very stretchy but thick enough to cover the body right. Wore it off the shoulder and felt great in the dress!
Super comfortable, and the skirt had just the right amount of flounce.

This dress was comfortable and looked great. The material was stretchy which held everything in place. I got a lot of compliments. However, by the end of the evening I noticed the back seam did not lay flat. Not sure if it was a fit issue or not. Wore it with spanks that covered from bra to mid thigh for a smooth look particularly through the waist and belly. The tight fabric shows every line so a smooth undergarment is needed.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for a cocktail-style gala.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very tight fitting but it was a stretchy material - so even though it felt a bit tight, it loosened throughout the event. And I could wear a regular bra with it. I typically wear a size 4 but the smallest size was size 38 and that fit well.

Brought this on a cruise with me, and wore it out to a fancy dinner and romantic dancing with my boyfriend. He loved it. I wore it with black heels, no spanks, and a strapless bra... Silver jewerly including a statement necklace. You only need to step into this dress and shimmy it on up over your hips. Fit perfectly, though I didn't like the way my arms looked in the photos. But that's my problem, not the dress. The material is heavy. Great dress, I'd rent again if the need for a LBD arises again. Oh one more thing... It was a chilly evening so I draped a pretty scarf over my shoulders. As the night progressed, the scarf slid down to reveal my shoulders better.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress for twirling and spinning!
links_reviews_text: I didn't get to wear the dress, because UPS delivered it to the wrong address :( but when my kind neighbor brought the package over the day after my work's gala, I tried it on anyway. The dress fit like a glove – my housemate even said it looked tailored to fit me. It also felt very elegant. But, my favorite part was how full the skirt was!
Loved this dress- received many complements. Great fabric and feel to the dress. A great dress to dance in. Totally loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: The cut of the dress was beautiful - although at first I was afraid it will be too heavy.
links_reviews_text: went super well with my gold leaf necklace, as this is quite low-cut. Loved how the waist line was tight (but stretchy fabric) so that it my body look like a perfect hourglass shape.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for semi-formals, cocktail parties, and dinner parties. Received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. The fabric was thick with a very nice stretch. Figure flattering! The skirt of the dress had a graceful and pretty flow to it. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Looks like an Audrey Hepbun dress
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and elegant. Amazing fabric

Never wore this one because it was very big on me. I have worn this brand before and am typically a 6/44 but this was huge. Not a flattering shape for me either... Also came down too low past my knees. May look better on a taller girl (I'm 5'5") and size down.
Didn't feel good in this, didn't wear. Thought I looked dowdy in it.

links_reviews_title: Size down two sizes! But amazing!
links_reviews_text: So, I'm a true 4, but read the reviews..... the 8 was almost challenging to zip up. Definitely size up twice. Other than that, once it was zipped it was comfortable and very cute! Perfect for a dinner!

Rented this style for a party, did not wear. Found it to be tight and restricting in the shoulders and hips--probably better suited to a straight-silhouetted woman. Lace looks very pretty. Felt like it ran a bit small for a size 6.
Size up by 2 sizes - normally a 2 and the 6 was perfect (4 wouldn't zip). Otherwise beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and perfect for wedding rehearsal!
links_reviews_text: I listened to what others said and ordered up. I normally wear a 2 or 4 depending on the dress and a 6 fit perfectly. It's conservative but also fun! I would totally rent this again!

Dress was very petty lace with a complimenting nude slip underneath. I ordered a 6 and it was very tight around the top of my rib cage. I could still wear it but would have preferred an 8. I also had a hard time with the zipper.

links_reviews_title: Detailed dress that stood out without being over dressed
links_reviews_text: Definitely thankful for the reviews! I normally wear a 6, but the reviews all said this dress runs small so I ordered an 8 and 10 and wore the 10. The 8 was snug and I have a small chest, while the 10 was just about perfect. The nude lining was slightly longer on the back than the overlay but good tape held it in place. The zipper is near impossible to zip past the ribbon. My husband said it was the toughest one he's zipped for me to date. I received several compliments all evening. This dress was so comfortable yet a great departure from the routine dresses at my work holiday parties. The navy color was muted, but when the light was brighter it was bold.
Nice dress- very pretty color in person- fit like a glove but I had to go up a size...
The dress was classic and figure flattering. It did run small. I wore an 8 and usually wear a 6

links_reviews_title: The lace and details of the dress. I loved the ribbon around the waist.
links_reviews_text: Cons: It ran small and was a little short. The underskirt stuck out a little. Pros: beautiful color, lace and details. Fit my frame and body type well.

links_reviews_title: Size up 2 sizes for the perfect fit
links_reviews_text: Loved this rental for work. Easy to wear alone or with a blazer. I'm normal an 4 and the size 8 fit like a glove. Definitely size up!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, but runs VERY small
links_reviews_text: It's very well made and I received lots of compliments. But it was so tight it was uncomfortable, I even ordered one size larger than I normally wear as the reviews suggested. I would try it again, in 2 sizes larger than my usually size.

links_reviews_title: Didn't fit me so I brought to work for a coworker to wear for the day
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty and zipped, but would burst if I sat down. I gave this to my coworker to wear for the day and she is stunning in it

Dress runs a tad small in the waist and torso. I ordered both an 8 and a 10 and wore the larger size. It fit very well and was quite comfortable. Size up for a backup dress. Well constructed, with built in padding, so no bra is needed. Perfect length. Simple accessories needed for this dress - the lace speaks for itself.
This dress was a replacement for a dress that didn't fit well. It is a very pretty dress and was very comfortable, unfortunately it just wasn't my style.

I didn't actually end up wearing it but would have if I had time! It was a back up I got when one size of my other dress wasn't available and the other dress was great too so I had to make a hard choice! It did seem to run small to me as I usually can wear an 8 or even a six. I could get the 8 on but it was not comfortable and the dress has no give. Great heavier material for fall!

links_reviews_title: The lace on the dress was beautiful and a great fit.
links_reviews_text: Received a lot of compliments although this wasn't the original dress I wanted. I received an email the day before my arrival date saying the dress I requested wasn't coming due to damages. Made for a very stressful day! Luckily, I live in Chicago and was able to go to the Rent The Runway store and find this dress and also was sent a backup in case this one didn't work. Even though a stressful situation, Rent the Runway staff was very helpful and understanding! The dress fit like a glove and I was very happy with it in the end. I wish the store in Chicago had other styles (this was the one and only dress I found that I liked out of all of them, thank goodness it fit!).

Beautiful dress. I'm pear shaped, so the dress fit a little loose on top and snug on the bottom (which is to be expected with a sheath). The natural waist line hit beautifully. I'm 6' tall, and it hit just above my knee. It runs small- I usually wear an 8 and ended up wearing the 12. The 10 fit on top just fine, but was noticeably snug on the bottom, so I went with the 12. Gorgeous dress! Perfect for the early fall vineyard wedding I attended in Virginia.

links_reviews_title: This dress runs a whole size small, maybe closer to two sizes small.
links_reviews_text: Lovely well made dress, but this dress runs small. This dress was sent to me when RTR couldn't send me my original dress in a size 12. I wear a 14 in most of the RTR stuff I order, but still request a 12 back up just in case. The shoulders were tight. The bodice was a little tight and I couldn't get the dress up past my bra strap. The dress neckline was tight as well. The waist if I had a 14 or 16 would have fit better. If you want this dress I highly rec. ordering it a size up an maybe even two sizes up.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and classy choice for a wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely runs small. I tried on an 8 in the Chicago store and it fit really well. However, the 8 that was shipped to me was much smaller, and like another reviewer said, the lining underneath was popping out. I decided to wear the 10 because the fabric laid nicer and didn't have that problem. The 10 wasn't as flattering as the 8, but it was a more comfortable fit. I don't think I'd rent this dress again because of the cost, but I did feel beautiful and classy in it for the evening.

Romantic, lovely lace! This beautiful Catherine Deane is a great go to for a cocktail or black-tie event. There's built in padding so you do not need to wear a bra. It is important to note that it runs VERY small. I could not even zip up the size 2 in the back. I'd recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes. At 5'7" it hit just above my knee. Pair it with neutral heels and delicate jewelry.

This dress is very pretty, elegant and looks as it does on the website. I typically wear a size 6, but Catherine Deane definitely runs small. I could not even zipper the size 6 closed and ended up wearing the back-up size 8, which pretty much fit me like a glove. I loved the look and quality of the dress. The only negative was that the lace seemed to have shrunk up slightly above the lining, which I assume happened from prior dry cleanings, so I had to tug at the lace when I stood up to pull it down and into shape. Regardless, this was my first RTR experience and I look forward to my next rental (arriving this week!). I love the concept of being able to rent a variety of dresses all from my home, while not having to spend time going out shopping for them and then keeping them in my closet! Bravo!

links_reviews_title: Love this brand but this dress runs small.
links_reviews_text: I can usually fit a 4 in this designer, but this dress is very tight around the ribs/chest area. I would have needed a six in this dress.

Gorgeous color, pretty lace pattern. The sizing is so off. I'm normally between a 4 and 6 - I got an 8 and it was still a bit too small to be cute. Ran a hair short for someone tall too. The lining also dipped below the lace - it looked a bit odd.
Loved this dress! It didn't feel too formal for work and was comfortable and unique. Will rent again!
I'm typically size 2 or 4 depending on the brand, but size 4 was too small, couldn't wear it. Love the dress though.
I usually wear a size xs or 0. After reading the reviews, I ordered a size 2, and it's so small that I couldn't even zip up... so recommend 2 sizes up at least!!

I normally wear a size 6. First rented the 6. Could not get the zipper to zip up. Returned it for the size 8. This time I manage to zip it up but the mid section bulged out due to the dress still being too small. Other reviewers said to order at least 2 sizes up. I should have heeded their advice.
This dress runs really small! Size up at least 2 or 3 sizes. I didn't end up wearing it because I couldn't even get it over my head.
Didn't prefer the sleeves and the color was a bit off from the picture. Not quite the midnight blue I was thinking.
Sadly, too small in the bust for me. Rest was perfect. Wish it had been just a bit fuller on top.
I ordered my normal size but couldn't even zip it. Very pretty dress though.

links_reviews_title: Size up 2 sizes from normal size and it's BEAUTIFUL!
links_reviews_text: Someone recommended sizing up 2 sizes and they were correct! Technically, I think 1.5 sizes up would have worked perfect but I don't like it being tight on my tummy. This dress was gorgeous and I received a bunch of compliments.
This dress was sent as my back up was unavailable. The dress is beautiful but runs small, I tried on the 4 and it was too tight in the torso, it was also a little longer than my liking.
Ran a bit large, hung poorly on me in that size

This dress is so delicate and pretty. Much more special in person than in the photos. I would have loved to wear it but I didn't get a back up size. Will try again one size up - I'm just waiting for the right occasion.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but it runs really small. I usually wear a size four and I could zip it up :(
links_reviews_text: Dress runs really small. I'm usually a size 4 in everything but I wasn't able to zip this dress up! I will be reordering in a bigger size because the dress is truly beautiful!

I wore this to a wedding and it was perfect. The slip shows in the front a little so I decided to fashion tape it which worked fine and didn't affect any lines. The material is lace so a little unforgiving, so I am glad I sized up a little for comfort.

This dress was beautiful and garnered many compliments, however the lining would slip out from the lace at times and the lace looked rather worn. Lace dresses are so hard to maintain in great shape! Overall, it was a simple dress with a flattering cut.
Based on the other reviews I went up 2 sizes (a 6 from my usual 2) and it could not have fit better. One of my favorite rentals so far!

Although I wish I could have gone down a size I got this dress the night before my birthday dinner to find it was absolutely perfect. I was hoping to find red dress but was struggling to find something warm enough for the winter. This dress is slimming, long (for tall ppl!) and has gorgeous neck and back details. I highly recommend for any formal event or even dinner with some cute booties.
Dress fit true to size! It's a beautiful color and made for a nice dress for NYE party in my home
This dress is simply stunning. I wore it backward. It can work either way!! I'm a size 4, and the MR was a good fit. Extremely high quality.

links_reviews_title: Nice design - only got wrong size
links_reviews_text: The design is super flattering. Got some compliment at the annual party. However I got the size M which hang lose. Should have gone with a smaller one. Also the neck is super tight it might feeling choking to some of you...as I have a strangely skinny neck and I felt it already lol

Fabulous dress. It's surely tight, but if you like your curves and your hips aren't too big this dress fits great. In looking at the reviews, I'm now thinking that I wore it backwards lol.... but that definitely didn't dawn on me until now. So know that you can sexy it up wearing the v-neck in the front. Color is great for fall and the fabric is thick enough on top to be appropriate in cold weather. The quality warrants the retail price. It's beautifully made and the skirt moves great. This one is fun!

I'm glad I got the medium in this dress, it was still form hugging but not at all tight. I wore it to my sons hs band concert and after sitting for almost 1.5 hours it started to get uncomfortable at the seem where the "see through" fabric attached to the dress. I thought it looked really nice on and was easy and comfortable to move around in.

links_reviews_title: Felt great ! Perfect fall/winter party dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3'' & 175 lbs - wore an XL. Hugs every curve, but i felt confident! The neck piece took a little getting used to, but otherwise i loved it.

Nice concept but it really does show every bump - i am tall but you have to be in a lot better shape than me to really wear this dress properly. A tall athletic figure would kill it in this dress. Also, the choker was pretty tight and got on my nerves pretty quickly. The dress itself was comfortable and the color was flattering. I was suprised that the bottom of the dress wasn't as sheer as it appeared on the model. All in all, I think its a striking look - and I did get a lot of compliments - but not my favorite.
It was hard to get this one over my head...but worth it.
Hugs you inbthe right places. Very classy dress

links_reviews_title: Loved this elegant dress - would buy if I could
links_reviews_text: Sleek, beautiful fabric, made me feel statuesque.
The neck piece is very tight - does not give much at all. I have a small head,and it was tough pulling it over. Color not as vibrant as expected and material does not give at all - uncomfortable.

The fit was pretty great. True to size, but better for an athletic body or hourglass. The material was a bit bulkier than I would've imagined, so probably best for cold weather holiday party, or an event where you will be traveling to and fro in the cold.
A little tight mid thigh.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear due to fit.
links_reviews_text: Well I thought since it's form fitting I should go up a size, I wear a large but ordered the XL The XL fit too loose on me, a Large would have worked best. However I found the turtleneck too wide, which felt uncomfortable to me, not to mention it made my turkey neck more noticeable.
I was not expecting to like this as much as I did. Easier to wear than expected. Needs to be work with spanx and will show every curve but also comfortable.

Loved that this dress covered up everything but was still super sexy. Will say the choker is SUPER tight - and I have a skinny neck - so can see where it will be an issue for many. Definitely needed to bring out the heavy duty spanx with this one to smooth out everything.

Cute dress i rented with unlimited for work. Pros: great color interesting cut, flattering Cons: runs small, neck piece very tight I styled this with nude open toe pumps and big silver earrings and cuff.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't the right dress for me.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress I got for a networking party and needed something fashionable but not too revealing. Unfortunately it does run on the smaller side especially if you are curvy.

Lace, sexy, and not too revealing just how I like it! I have a big bottom which I think made dress shorter so I paired up with tights and thigh high boots. Although dress was short it was not tight at all.. I went with the L size ...very comfortable to wear! I received many compliments ! Thank you RTR!

Nice sexy black dress, cute pattern. Very short and tight if you are in between sizes and get the smaller size. I'm 5'4" about 136 and squeezed into the small. My 34 c chest fit well, but the fabric at the chest kept flipping over to expose the nude underlay. It was fun to wear and hubby loved it but I don't think I'd rent again because I was messing with the chest too much, in fact you can see my bra in the pic actually. Maybe tape would have helped.

Rented for NYE & got so many compliments. It was short, figure flattering and just low enough that I could wear sticky boobs with it. I ordered the XS and the S, and went with the XS because it was tighter and looked better with my small chest. The Small was a little loose on the top (it still looked great though in the small- it was just a bit longer). Would 100% rent again for another night out.

This dress is gorgeous, and so flattering. It feels so soft, especially the lining. The only “negative” I have to say is that, having a smaller bust, I had a hard time filling it out - but with a push-up bra, I was fine. The fit is fairly accurate and the material has a slight stretch to it.

Wore for my 40th birthday. It fit like a glove but it was a little too short for me. The length was better on the small but the deep v on the top was much more revealing. So, I went with the xs. I was constantly tugging at the bottom of the dress to pull it down as I walked.

Sexy classy dress, a few minor issues. 1- the lining kept coming out around the bust area. 2 - I felt like the material caught on everything. Pros - I rented for NYE for a dress to feel good in after my daughter was born in Oct. Did the trick!

I loved this dress. I wore it to a holiday party and got so many compliments. I ended up wearing the size 2 even though it was a little loose in the chest area, because the size 0 was slightly too tight on my hips. Very flattering dress for an hourglass figure.
I love the way this dress fit, but it was short! It was perfect for a date night in Vegas. The wrap of the dress was both flattering and forgiving.
Sexy, tight, short but not too short

I felt so pretty in this dress. The front is a bit low and I'm small chests and didn't fill it out well, so I had to keep checking to make sure everything was put away, but that wouldn't stop me from wearing again. Very sexy dress!

My daughter wore this dress to a HS winter formal. It fit great and was so flattering. It was also comfortable. We did have to pin the top because she’s a teenager and not trying to look 25 :) She said she got so many compliments on the dress!

links_reviews_title: I rented 3 different dresses. I loved them all. Customer Service was excellent.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5" 40C and 160lbs and the Large fit fine. It didn't right up. I love the long sleeves and sexy v front.

Loved this dress, the plunge was low but nothing over the top, I wore tape and it did the trick. No need to wear a bra. The dress is a bit short and it tends to hike up but it wasn't too big of an issue. I had tons of compliments and the dress hugged my curves just right.
Wore this for NYE. Lots of compliments and very form flattering. Wore with a deep plunge bra. True to size.
I wore this for NYE and it was perfect! Length was short but not too short and the v neck would work for a full or little bust. I felt great in it, I will definitely rent again!

Wore this to a party to celebrate my 41st birthday. I got so many compliments on the dress with it being long sleeved and a mini dress all in one. It does ride up a little while dancing, kept pulling it down.
This dress was amazing and so flattering. There's stretch but not too much. I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Playful dress for a winter party
links_reviews_text: I loved the sleeves on this form-fitting, body hugging dress. Great for a winter or holiday party. I'm a little smaller up top so while I felt like a small would have been better for me arm and hem length wise, it would have left me too exposed up top. Very comfortable despite its snugness. Glad I chose it!
Very affordable piece which is classically sexy. Was a short length - perfect for a party or dinner - even though I am petite. Complimented my curves. The nude underlay steps up the wow factor.

links_reviews_title: This dress is flirty and sexy, yet elegant enough for an evening dinner date.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much, that I would consider purchasing it to keep it as a LBD alternative. The fabric is comfortable, the dress is just long enough to keep it appropriate for cocktail evening wear, but still sexy. It is low cut, but I pinned the middle to keep my bra from showing. A low cut bra is ideal to wear with this dress.
I'm 5'5" and the medium was too short on me for a dinner and show date in NYC. I'm also curvy and it was snug around the hips. Did not wear.
Cool style, cute dress but tight in the stomach area, with no breathing room. Also tight in the butt / hip section.

links_reviews_title: I didn't arrive in time to wear it
links_reviews_text: Great fit but didn't get to wear it out because it arrived after my event.

Perfect for a night in Vegas. Wouldn't be so good for a wedding or business function. I'm 5' 8" and it was the perfect length and showed just enough cleavage for Vegas. This dress has seen it's day though. Looks like it's ready to be recycled.

links_reviews_title: Wore for my 30th bday dinner in NYC in January with black tights and booties
links_reviews_text: Had to pin the chest area and use fashion tape, but I am rather flat chested so might work better for larger busts. Overall great dress! Wore for my 30th bday dinner/drinks and got lots of compliments.

Unfortunately I didn't get to wear this out as my plans were cancelled...but I loved it when I tried it out. It's very elegant and sexy without being over the top. It's a little short so I wouldn't wear it dancing. The chest area was a little loose-- I didn't feel like I had to wear a bra, or tape it down...it just wasn't as fitted as I would have preferred around the tatas :)

links_reviews_title: Stretchy and just enough cleavage. Perfect
links_reviews_text: Stretchy and just enough cleavage. Perfect

The dress is very low cut so I had to use fashion tape to close it a bit to make it appropriate for work. The length was shorter than I would normally wear for everyday, but I had the dress on hand so I wore it. Looks great with a blazer to class it up a bit and make it more office friendly. It was tight in the belly area but has some details which help hide the belly bulge. The fabric is nice and stretchy and the details were very nice. Perfect for a date or girls night out! Overall great dress! If you are between sizes, I'd size up. I'm normally a med or large, med worked but would have felt more comfortable in a large.

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress if you have cleavage.
links_reviews_text: I should have ordered an XS. Felt too big on top.

links_reviews_title: Received a ton of compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: 5,4”, 140lbs, pear shaped. Went with the four, it fit like a glove! I could have worn the 6 for some wiggle room. The ties give the dress versatile and allow for plenty of looks.

I rented this dress for my engagement shoot. I ordered 6R+8R and they were both too big for me (I'm 118lb and a 32D, for reference). Thankfully the dress is convertible, so we used the front two pieces to tie it really tight around my waist to hold it up. This worked perfectly for photos but wouldn't work for an event. The dress photographs very well and is flattering, but the quality is not great. We spent a good 15 minutes trying to get the zipper to zip up because it kept getting stuck.

links_reviews_title: This dress is comfortable and so beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Daughter wore it to prom. She received so many compliments. She wore a 2P and is 5' 125 pounds.
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little loose on the top, only because she is very a 32A cup. We YouTubed the dress to see how to pull the sash over the shoulder and tie it (recommended by another user) and it was perfect. She didn't have to worry about it falling down or pulling it up. She loved it, and even danced in it. We are happy and would definitely order again.

I rented this dress for an ROTC Military Ball. This dress was the perfect color to compliment my date's uniform, but the major benefit of this dress was the fact that this dress is convertible. I wasn't sure the style of dress I wanted to wear or what the dress call protocol was so this dress gave me multiple options! I would recommend checking out the Jenny Yoo website or YouTube for inspiration on ways to tie. Only con was that it doesn't have pockets and you may need to find a friend to help you get everything tied -- especially from the back. Overall, I cannot recommend this dress enough. I was so sad when it came time to return it!

Great gown! Fits snug in the waist, but accurate to size. I’m 5’4” and the petite length was perfect with 4” heels. I am larger chested so that was a bit snug, but still fit very well. Darker red than the picture, but very pretty
Rented this for a photoshoot and the red really contrasted against the forest backdrop.

This is my first rental from RTR. I rented this red gown as a first choice for the Marine Corp Ball this year. I am 223lbs and a size 38B chest and typically and 15 in pants. After reading the reviews I sized up, as directed from other people and I was so glad I did! The 18L fit like a glove and I fell beyond beautiful at the ball. I received lots of compliments on the gown and I added a sparkly belt to make it really stand out. Pros: I'm 5'9 so the length just brushed the floor barefoot. Perfect fit. Stunning color. Comfortable all night long. Cons: the dress came with a dark red stain on the left side of the gown, right at him level. The zipper was insanely hard to get up at a spot around the bust due to the fabric in the back of the gown. Once you got past that spot it was smooth sailing. The top of the dress pull down due to the weight of the gown and so the heart shaped bust rolled, revealing the inside stitching of the gown. I was constantly fixing it. Overall: I would still rent this gown despite the cons. I felt beautiful and that's something a mother of two doesn't often say.
Dress was gorgeous but a little snug, especially in the best area... although I am bigger than average there.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful quality dress. This dress can actually be worn several different ways (visit the Jenny Yoo site, Aiden dress tutorials!) and I decided to wear it with one shoulder, as it can look a bit like a bridesmaids dress if just strapless. The color is darker in person, great for fall or winter weddings/events! Length was perfect with 3-4 inch heels. Top has padding, which was nice because it is a bit tight on top - so I wore without a bra to give myself some extra room and worked out perfectly! HIGHLY recommend this one - I may even buy it :-)

The color is true to the photo and the dress is a classic flattering cut. My dress was a little tight but it worked - the wire in the bodice was starting to poke through the fabric at my torso so I was forced to have pretty good posture all night or risk a few pokes. Also to note that the lining in the skirt is much tighter than the outer layers, so if you're pear shaped I would order your normal size, but go up a size as your backup size.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove and it was so enjoyable to wear.
links_reviews_text: The quality of the dress was fantastic. It fit really well on top that I didn't have to worry about it slipping down - it stayed in place all night. It flowed really beautifully too.

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredible. It fit perfectly, I loved every minute of wearing it.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! :)

links_reviews_title: It was a formal event with my fiancé!
links_reviews_text: The 8R fit perfectly the first time I tried it on, but on the day of the event (one day later) it was impossible to zip and had to wear the next size up which was too big. Not sure if was due to the dress having been worn a bunch before or because the zipper is poor quality. Very disappointed I couldn’t wear the red one and wore the same one in the next size in blue instead. Overall the dress is awesome with some many options to tie and great videos on the Jenny Yoo website!
Ended up wearing a different rental but this dress made it a tough decision! Very flattering and fit true to size

links_reviews_title: This Dress Was Perfect For My Fiancè's Military Ball
links_reviews_text: This was actually a backup rush shipped to my hotel when my other dresses didnt work. This fit beautifully (for reference- 5'7", 195 lbs, 38D, 2.5 inch heels and a size 14 dress), and was the best combination of modest and beautiful. The dress so perfectly simple. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Everything went toward a great cause!
links_reviews_text: This one didn’t fit and I was heart broken! Next year this is the dress I will wear and I will be able to fit into it perfectly! It is a gorgeous dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Not the right material for strapless
links_reviews_text: Too have to be held up without straps. Ran small. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Size up a size or two!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, but absolutely size up at least one size! The dress is flowy after your waist, but waist up it is meant to fit snug. Unfortunately I could not wear this because of the incorrect sizing. It does not have a slit and has a zipper directly in the back. It is a deeper rich red.
Too small and normally wear a 12 or 14
Could not zip up the dress. But it felt nice, will try for larger size.

I chose this as a back-up, didn't end up wearing it, but loved all the ways it CAN be worn. (Check out the youtube videos.) If I'd worn it, I definitely would have used one of the alternate ways vs the way it's shown. Deep, gorgeous red. Very comfortable. The petite length was perfect for me (5'4").

links_reviews_title: Good option for my charity gala.
links_reviews_text: The waist is the most fitted (unforgiving) part of the dress and runs true to size. I rented this as a backup dress, and it was a decent option. I got the petite, and it was the perfect length for someone that's 5'4" to wear with flats. Love the petite option!

The dress is a gorgeous color and fit everywhere but the bust. I am a 40 DDD and dress ultimately wouldn't zip up when got to last bit of chest. I actually ordered this size which is a size larger than I wear in Hope's bust wourl work. I was wrong.

links_reviews_title: The dress was pretty and comfortable.
