links_reviews_text: It runs long. I am 5' 5" and had to hold it up all evening even though I was wearing heels. The pads in the bust was all folded up in both sizes I received. There was no way to access the pads to straighten them out, so they were a little lumpy.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - beautiful color, but I was unable to wear because the top was very tight.
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress for smaller top frames. Not ideal for larger busts or larger top frames. There was also some bunching up that has occurred in the padding for the breast area due to washing. not sure if I would of enjoyed wearing it if it did fit because of that.

links_reviews_title: Loved the colour but my husband vetoed it in favour of another option
links_reviews_text: Great versatile dress aside from looking pretty bridesmaidsy. The bust area didn’t fit me quite right

links_reviews_title: The dress was gorgeous and high quality!
links_reviews_text: I am a 6 but I'm small chested, so it didn't stay up as well as it could have

links_reviews_title: I had a nice time and I will def use RTR for my next formal event,
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’1 athletic frame, this dress fit as well as I could hope without needing to be altered ( I have no boobs so always extra space in there) and length was perfect for 2 inch heels

After reading the reviews, I ordered a size up and it was still way too small. Like 4-6 sizes too small. I ordered a 10 (usually wear an 8) and there was no way that thing was zipping. It's a pretty dress but the sizing is way off. My back up of another dress, in size 8, fit perfectly.
too long. i should have ordered the petite

links_reviews_title: The color was perfect for a fall gala -- beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly love the support of the bustier-- very elegant.

links_reviews_title: the dress looked/felt like a heavy curtain after trying it on
links_reviews_text: I have a large bust 38 DD & did not fit. Also the padding in the bust area seemed like sort of heavy do to the thickness.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, just not for me.
links_reviews_text: The liner was incredibly tight. Not meant for women with large bottoms

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, perfectly elegant for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments, very comfortable to wear. There is boning in the bust so no need to wear a bra! Loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Really comfortable but the dress has a lot of material
links_reviews_text: Wore this for an engagement photo shoot. I'm 5'4 and wore 3 inch heels but the dress was still so long that it was impossible to walk. Really flowy fabric, I can see how this would be great for summer
I'm normally a 6 or an 8 and the 10 wouldn't even zip. I ended up wearing an 6 from RTR in another style.

links_reviews_title: Ran way too small and arrived stained
links_reviews_text: Everything fitted perfectly but the bust
Couldn't even zip it halfway. Runs quite small

links_reviews_title: Even when sucking in, the 8 was small and I'm usually a 4/6.
links_reviews_text: Soooo cute and I love the color, but it was so tight! I'm usually a 4/6 and the 8 was still verrrry tight.
I love the fabric and the color but I couldn't get it to zip up around my hips. Would go two sizes up and rent again

links_reviews_title: Not for ladies with thighs and butt
links_reviews_text: This dress was very promising up top but I literally couldn't sit down because of how tight it was on my butt and thighs.
Im usually a size 4 and occasionally a 6; the 4 in this dress was extremely tight, especially in butt and boobs area, so size up! Fabric is super luxurious and gorgeous but has absolutely no stretch.

links_reviews_title: Loved how fast I received my dress!
links_reviews_text: This gown is gorgeous! I'm 5'6 and the length was perfect. How ever the dress doesn't have any stretch to it so it was a bit snug around the waist but made it work (used some shape wear and it was better) I'm usually a 12/14 but had to go up a size. Received many compliments Would rent again
One of my favorite rentals thus far!

Dress was a bit snug on me, but that’s no surprise; I wear a 2 more often than a 0 (see below for my size details). Bust fit quite tightly for me and I could only zip the dress without a bra, but dress didn’t require a bra, so it was fine. Really loved the elegance of this gown. I would’ve preferred to wear the dress in a 2, for my body, but only 0 was available. Height: 5’6” Weight: 120-125 Usual dress size: 2 Bust size: 32D Body type: hourglass

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and comments from everyone!
links_reviews_text: All my family loved it, even got compliments from the grooms family! Plus it really shows off your chest, no bra needed!

The color and silhouette were beautiful and the slit wasn't too high, but I could barely breathe! I normally wear a size 14 and ended up wearing the 16 and it was still way too tight. I couldn't even move enough to put my own shoes on.
Fit was tight and the slit went up way too high. I'm normally an 8/10 but this dress nearly didn't zip.
Fun & beautiful dress, however... GO A SIZE UP!!!!! Def impossible to zip up without taping DOWN my boobs!!

I picked two dress sizes- even went up a size, and neither dress fit. Two sizes that should have fit easily. I could not use either dress for my family member's wedding. Overall very upset with the result.

links_reviews_title: Just starting my Mother of the Groom search
links_reviews_text: True fit and the darts in the dress perfectly draped my hips. Unfortunately the color did nothing paired with my fair skin.
I didn't end up wearing this dress- I sized up a size knowing dresses can run small. It fit well but wasn't very flattering in the waist and the slit just sat kind of weird.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved this super comfortable dress! It was a bit long on me but that's life when you're 5'3".

I wore this for a rehearsal dinner at 33 weeks. I sized up one, and it fit beautifully over the bump. This style of neckline always makes me a bit self-conscious, thanks to a combo of a small bust and less-than-incredibly-toned shoulders, but no complaints about the dress itself!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but I didn't get to wear it!
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress was beautiful and comfortable. However, it was shipped to me after my event so I tried it on for 5 minutes and had to send it right back.

Rented this for a dueling pianos fundraiser. I felt it was true to size, maybe even a tad large. I put it on and felt frumpy until I remembered that it came with a belt! I created an empire waist and immediately get more put together. Thought about buying this dress as it is easy to wear for any occasion!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that is comfortable too!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'1" so the dress is longer than it intended to be but the dress looked great and it didn't drag on the floor. The top is lined so I did not need to wear a strapless bra.

I loved this dress! It was perfect for a warm weather wedding. I wore it for many hours and was very comfortable. Definitely needs the belt and runs a bit large but is very comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great sculptures, wine, food, desserts, and I looked great while taking it all in.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a tad too small in the chest for me, but otherwise it worked well for this art gallery garden party. A larger size would've fit my chest better (34G and chest measures 39.5"), but it was a least minute order and only available in a size 10. I counted on being petite to make it work. I also wasn't finding much else that I liked for this event. It is a beautiful flowy dress and I received many compliments. I wore a sweater to cover the fact that I couldn't make any of my bras work with the halter style and to cover up my psoriasis issues on my elbows. Over all, I would order this dress again if I could go up one size and have a better bra for this style of dress.
This dress was perfect for dancing and fit well! Definitely need a strapless bra for this - any straps will show otherwise. Great pattern- I got lots of compliments!

I rented this for a wedding & loved it! I'm 8.5 months pregnant here & was very comfortable in this dress. The only thing that I didn't like about it (which is only because I'm larger all over at the moment- I'm at 153 in this pic, normally 125lbs) is that my boob/armpit fat showed more than I would've liked. But if I weren't pregnant then that wouldn't have been a problem. Received many compliments & was very comfortable throughout the night. I also liked that the dress was a little longer than expected just because it was cold out (I'm 5'4").
Great for a summer wedding! Dress is light and flowy. Definitely need to wear the belt, otherwise the dress is very wide and doesn't have any shape.

Wore this for my final walk through at my wedding venue on a HOT August day. The fabric is so lightweight and comfortable that I stayed cool all day. Perfect length and great for casual summer events. I recommend adding a belt!

I found that the dress fit true to size. It was easy to dance in and was a unique piece. I wore a jean jacket over it for warmth since this was a fall wedding but once the dancing started it was just perfect.
Comes with tiny belt in separate bag. Very flowy. Not very heavy so it was a little chilly for an outdoor ceremony
Good length for taller girls - midi length on me. Felt too baggy without the belt, but made a huge difference once added! Nice, light material.
The dress was great for an outdoor summer wedding. The dress runs large, and i found the collar uncomfortable at times. I received several compliments, overall I enjoyed my first RTR purchase!

links_reviews_title: The ease of this dress made the night!
links_reviews_text: The style of this dress made me feel like I was dressed up but the ease and comfort of the fit made it easy to enjoy myself with dinner and drinks. The floral print was gorgeous and I received a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: So comfortable for an outdoor wedding sendoff!
links_reviews_text: Many compliments about the color & fit! The touch of pink made it easy to add a pop of color with my shoes.

links_reviews_title: Nice for a summer beach wedding
links_reviews_text: This was a well-fitting, easy to wear dress. I picked it because it was long and partially covered my glamorous ortho boot. But it was still cool and breezy.

links_reviews_title: Stunning and classy dress, perfect for a wedding guest
links_reviews_text: The dress ran a bit large, but after reading the reviews I knew to order my size and then a size down. I ended up wearing the smaller size and it fit perfectly. I received endless compliments on the dress!

This dress was amazing! It was nice and light, which was perfect for the hot July wedding, but it wasn't sheer or see through. I was able to go braless and that went just fine! I loved the length and the colors, I got so many complements all day! I usually wear an 8 but I wore the 6 to the wedding so I would recommend ordering a size down from your usual, as this dress runs large.

I wore this dress to a summer wedding on a very hot day. I was comfortable and received so many compliments! The dress runs a little big but the tie/belt cinches up the waist so it's not a big deal. It hid the mid section/ mommy tummy well too! I wore this dress with a pair of nude heels and it was perfect. I would rent this dress again and loved it!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, cute print, but long and baggy
links_reviews_text: This dress was nice, but not my favorite. It was lightweight which was perfect since I wore it to my sister's graduation and I had to sit outside in the heat for a few hours. It was a bit tight in the neck area for me though. It is also very shapeless, even with the provided belt. I wore an 8 (normally wear a 10) and I think a 6 would have fit me better since the 8 made me look kind of big. Overall I would have liked the dress better if it were a few inches shorter so it wouldn't look as bulky. Regardless, it is a good dress if you have a big chest like me, or if you're pregnant.
Comfortable, loose fitting, flattering

I love this floral maxi dress by Slate + Willow! I do recommend going down a size if possible or I would suggest styling it with a nice gold belt, that would help shape the dress to your figure.I would either wear a strapless bra or no bra since it is very flowy and light weight material. At 5'5'', the length hit mid calf on me. I would pair it with nude of gold heels and linear earrings to complete your outfit!

I work at a High School and ordered this dress to wear to our graduation ceremony, the dress was a great choice for it. I am in the process of losing weight and it was nice to fit the 'in between' stage I am in. It was flowy and comfortable, I am short so it was longer on me than the model, however it worked with some nude heels. I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Great style and comfortable to wear!
links_reviews_text: Rented it for a June bridal shower...was supposed to be warm weather but ended up chilly so I paired it with a denim jacket. Very versatile!

Loved this dress! This was my second time renting it as a maternity style, but the first time I wasn't as pregnant. Since this isn't specifically a maternity dress I was a bit worried about fitting into it but it wasn't an issue even at 34 weeks pregnant. I did get a size larger than my normal because it was the only one available but I think my normal 6 would've worked too. The cut and style are very forgiving even if it's a tad large so size up if you need.
Fit was very forgiving and VERY comfortable! Absolutely loved the cut and fit, wish I could own!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for warm spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress. I received so many compliments on it, even from complete strangers! I am a size 12, and for me, this dress ran true to size, so the 12R is what I wore and it fit perfectly. I loved the fact that it was flowey and not too form fitting. I truly wish I could've kept it!

Even though this dress is not advertised as a maternity dress it definitely makes a great one. I'm 35 weeks pregnant here and it fit perfectly. Got great compliments on it. Would recommend for anyone pregnant or not pregnant!

Wore this dress to a wedding in Hawaii when I was 19 weeks pregnant and it perfectly accommodated my baby bump. The dress is very light and flowy, leaving a lot of flexibility if you aren't sure how big you'll be. I normally am between a 2 and a 4 but rented a 4 and 6 to play it safe. The 4 fit perfectly. Loved how the belt added a bit more definition to the shape. I wore it with a nubra but a regular strapless bra would work too.

This dress was my backup to a destination wedding on the beach and it was perfect! Light material so I wasn't hot in the Florida sun. It was flowy and beachy. It was also still comfortable enough to dance it. All around a great dress! I recommend a strapless bra or something similar.

This dress was really fun to wear to a daytime wedding. I felt beautiful in it. That being said, this dress may be a good maternity option, it would accentuate a bump nicely. Also, I'm 5'8" and a 4 felt almost too long with heels. 34DD fit in the 4 no problem, but it was nearing too tight in the shoulders. When wearing the dress, you can see through the bottom a little so it looks nice and flowy, but in photos you can't see through it so I felt it almost looked kinda frumpy. I still really loved it.
Very comfortable and easy to move in. FYI- the belt is in a seperate bag within the garment bag. The dress did have a small hole in the back bottom of the dress, but the pleating covered it.
The adjustable belt made this dress perfect for a maternity shoot.

I'm normally between a size 10 to 12, athletic build. The 10 was way more flattering than the 12 in this dress. Very comfortable and flowy (and I'm even pregnant in my first trimester), but still good looking around the shoulders and neckline. The 10 was ever so slightly tight in the shoulders but the 12 was frumpy so I went with the 10 for this wedding.
Loved this dress! It was perfect for the wedding I attended !
This way big one me and I needed a belt, but was amazing for a bridal shower! I felt great in it!

Being almost 9 months pregnant its hard to find anything you feel good in, but this dress was perfect. I ordered a size 4 and 2 because im normally size 2 but i gained 40lbs so i wasnt sure what my size was anymore. The 4 ended up being what fit best. I loved how light and airy this dress was and the belt i just tied above my belly instead of where the loops for the belt was.

This dress was great for my growing bump. I wore it to my college graduation. I am 5'7 and about 145 lbs, at 26 weeks pregnant the 4R fit me great. It was flowy and had a bow that you could tie above your waist. I got so many compliments on this dress! The front of the dress hit about mid calf and the back was just above my ankles. Loved the length of this midi dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun Dress, But Designed for Someone Taller Than 5 Feet!
links_reviews_text: This was such a fun dress! The color was great and I loved the bow at the neck and the interesting back. However, the torso must have been designed for someone much taller than me (I'm 5 feet tall) because the straps going up the back were not flush with my skin and gapped terribly (although I was not in danger of exposing myself! The front of the dress held tightly without an issue). But I still wore the dress anyway and had fun with it. If I owed it, I would have those backstraps altered to fit me a little better, but that's the beauty of a rental!
Wore to a September wedding in a vineyard. Bold color with nice bow in back of neck. Open back made it sexy without being too revealing or inappropriate. Very sophisticated and sleek.

links_reviews_title: Runs large, a lot of room in the hips, would be great for true hourglass
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress overall and am going to try and rent one or two sizes down but I had a comical amount of fabric sticking out at the hips. I rented a size 4 and I'm 5'6", 130-135 and about 37-27-37, give or take. I had air pockets at my hips on both sides that could fit an apple but the top and waist were only a little loose. If you're bottom heavy and not too busty this may be for you. I'm a 32DD and this would be fine with a nubra.

links_reviews_title: Didn't have a chance to wear this dress, but it's adorable! will rent again
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size for brand

links_reviews_title: A fail for a spring wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is bright pink, the back makes it so you can't wear a bra but is pretty lose at the best area

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear because of the fit issue
links_reviews_text: The bust is large, so if you are not well endowed, this is going to gap pretty significantly for you.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it -- wasn't flattering around my belly.
links_reviews_text: If you are sensitive about your stomach or back at all, this outfit is not for you.
SO sexy! I wore this dress to a drag show. It was show stopping! I ordered a large based on reviews, a medium would have been fine though. No bra needed. Cute for night out. Super short and tight.

Glad I sized up for this dress, because it had no extra room. Wore it without a bra and it was totally fine, which was great because the back was interestingly strappy. Got lots of compliments. Would rent again!
Form fitting but super comfortable. This dress is perfect for a night out. Unique design and gorgeous details.

This dress was awesome. You don't have to wear a bra, the fabric is nice and thick. I ordered the XS and S and I wore the small, was just a little less tight in the arm area, they both would have worked though. It is a nice fitted dress that is just super comfy. So easy to dance in, I didn't worry about it riding up or anything. Even when we got home with friends, I didn't even change into something more comfy after being in it all night! I got a lot of compliments with how much they liked my dress and how good it fit!
Wore this for a NYE party in SF and got so many compliments! I ordered size S and M but ended up wearing the M because S was a little too tight. Would order this again!!
Wouldn't wear this without tights, as it's pretty short and rode up a lot- I'm 5'5". But loved the fit and how flattering it was!

This dress is super fun and perfect for a bachelorette party, which is why I rented it. Its very tight though. I typically wear a small but absolutely had to wear the medium and I feel like the large probably would have fit too. I still recommend it, just make sure to size up for your backup size.
Felt very comfortable in it. Great cut. I'm 5'4", 135 lbs, 34B bust.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a night out!
links_reviews_text: Was snug, but fit very well considering! No bra necessary for me (32DDD-ish). The back was super cute and i received tons of compliments!

This dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding. I am 5'0, so this dress was perfect in length. I also have a very small bust so no bra was needed. The material was thicker tho so no bra was perfectly fine. The back is super cute also. A perfect touch of sexy yet classy.

links_reviews_title: I LOVE THIS DRESS! I felt so comfortable and sexy all night
links_reviews_text: I went with the medium because the small was a little too short for the occasion. It fit so comfortably, and I love open back dresses. The material is stretchy and it hugs in all the right places. I loved it!
Slim fitting but true to size 4. Open back and shiny black design on the royal blue makes it stand out. Many compliments at my work party.

links_reviews_title: Flattering material, gorgeous color, and cool cutout in the back
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and flattering. The detail in the back is what makes this dress a 10!

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfortable party dress.
links_reviews_text: Cute shape. I didn’t have to wear a bra with it. I definitely looked flat chested but it went well with the style of dress. I wore this to a 1920s themed party. It wasn’t quite flapper but I pulled it off. I got many compliments.
Tight but flattering. Unexpected color. Loved wearing this. Great in pics. Almost kept it. PS: stickies will work but a bra will not as the dress is open back.

Absolutely loved this dress! The color is true to what you see online. I'm 5'6", a B cup, and normally wear a size 4 so I ordered a Small and the Medium as my back up. I tried the small on first and it was tight but not suffocating so I tried the medium and it looked like a potato sack; I wore the small and was comfortable all night. The back of the dress is very open so I opted out of wearing a bra; no one could tell the difference. If you're a size C cup or larger, keep in mind that a larger size may be more comfortable; my chest was pretty squished.

links_reviews_title: Future Forecast: One of my favorite rentals
links_reviews_text: I was going to a concert and wanted to just look super chic with a little edge and this dress fit that to a T. I wore the large because the medium was a little too short for my 5'9 frame but the large fit perfectly. It's runs a little small length wise but just size up and there won't be a huge difference of fit on your waist, chest or hips. I wore spank because I wanted to keep it tight but you really don't have too in this dress. I received a lot of compliments on the dress and am going to be really sad when I give it back but it just enhanced a really fun evening. Great rental, would recommend checking it out!

I love this dress! I got a ton of compliments. It was great for dancing and just to look hot. It fits like a glove. The medium and a large fits almost the same. I went with the large to have a little more wiggle room to dance but the medium fit too. I wore a strapless bra that had the invisible stickies just on the side and it worked great.
Wore it for a Vegas Bach - perf! Danced all night and it didn't ride up or expose too much; so clutch! Wasn't even looking for an outfit; but it whispered to me and I obliged! #Blameitonthemimosas ;)
The dress ran a little small so order one size up in 5'11 and 150 pounds but this dress was awesome for a bachelorette party!
Loved this dress! I got so many compliments! The pattern is gorgeous. It was true to size but kind of short. It was tight enough to be sexy but still comfortable to dance in all night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Bachelorette Party!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a bachelorette party and received lots of compliments. It is definitely fitted and a little short but not too showy!

Great fit with a little bit of stretch to hug your curves. The color is a deep royal blue and the black tribal print has a little bit of sheen to it for some subtle sparkle. Looked great with the "Milky Way Linear Earring" I rented as well. I am 5'1"/115 lbs and the small was perfect, the length hit me about mid-thigh. The open back means going braless but the lining was soft and comfortable. My husband LOVED it and was sad I had to return it!

I wore this dress on New Years and it definitely stands out. The design is beautiful and the hint of shimmer in the black makes it really pop. While most were wearing plain black, the blue in the dress really gives it that color to make it all the more attractive. The open back is a great touch and really flattering. The dress is tight, but in all the right ways to make it sexy, I wasn't uncomfortable once all night. The length hit me at about mid thigh so I didn't find it to be too short. Definitely recommend this dress for a fun party event.
The dress fit great and it was comfortable to wear all evening. Loved the back of the dress. Material was thick enough so wearing no bra wasn't a problem.

links_reviews_title: Dress was fun! Fabulous night out!
links_reviews_text: I had a great time in this dress. I wore the M and the fit was tight but not uncomfortable. Definitely do not need to wear a bra. I am short and the length was perfect. I would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: The back and pattern are to die for!
links_reviews_text: The was my first RTR dress and I have to say I will definitely be renting again! I received so many compliments on this dress, I fell in love with the back and the pattern. I was even able to go bra less which is rare as I'm a full C! I would recommend this dress to anyone!
Love this dress and the back is so cute! I usually wear a 2 and the Small for great

links_reviews_title: Literally every person I talked to complimented me on this dress.
links_reviews_text: I felt extra cool all night. The neckline and back combination makes it more interesting than your typical party dress. It's got enough subtle sparkle to catch people's eyes from across the room. The only issues I had were: the hem kept riding up and the mid-back clasp dug into my skin. But these were minor compared to how great the rest of it was. I rented this with another dress for my birthday weekend and there was a problem with my discount code- it wouldn't go through on the app. I wasn't thrilled with the customer service (they told me what I already knew and didn't address the error message I was getting, despite me attaching three screenshots of the combined information). Eventually I figured it out myself by putting the code in on the computer (it wouldn't work on the app or on mobile), but too much time had gone by to get what I wanted in time and I ended up paying more than what I saved with the discount in shipping. They said I should have called.

Fun, fitted dress with great open back detail! I'm small chested and didn't need to wear a bra with it, but bustier girls might need a backless bra. This dress was great for a nice dinner then a night of dancing in Vegas! My boyfriend didn't want me to give the dress back!

I order the small and got the medium as a back up and I'm so glad I got the medium because the small was way too tight and the medium fit great. The dress is very comfortable and I got tons of compliments

I wore this to a wedding and it was a great dancing dress. It hit lower on my thigh than the model (I'm 5'5) so it was appropriate for a wedding. The halter neckline is flattering and the fabric is thick and stretchy enough to be forgiving on the figure. Loved it overall!
Curve hugging, but comfortable to dance in all night. Fun dress for an out of this world house party!
wore for a friend's bachelorette party in miami- unfortunately I don't have a picture of the back (the best part!) but I received tons of compliments and would definitely order again
I rented this dress because i loved the red one from parker but the material is not as nice and it does not fit as well. It is a tougher and less flattering material that bulges a little.

links_reviews_title: Sexy black dress.. With a little blue!
links_reviews_text: Such a great dress and nice material! The zipper in the back was a little uncomfortable, but I would highly recommend this for any fancy occasion! Loved the colors and fit was perfect!
Super fitted and on the short side, but overall a really fun dress. The material is a little itchy, but it was a good fit. I didn't need to wear a bra with this one. Loved the open back!

I wore this dress to a Las Vegas themed party. The fabric is great and so thick that a bra wasn't needed. I did find myself pulling the skirt down over the course of the night, but that is my only complaint. The back is really fun and I received a lot of compliments. I'm usually a size 6 and the medium was perfect.
Material was thick enough to not need a bra. Loved the open back. I'm 5'0, so I imagine this dress would be really short on someone taller. Didn't need to keep pulling down though.
The XS was a bit too tight, but the S was perfect! It was super comfy and I was able to dance in it all night. I was surrounded by 2,000+ stylish women and got compliments all night!

Gorgeous dress and I received a ton of compliments. Wore this to a Kentucky Derby themed ball and it was perfect. I'm 5'6, 125 lbs. The dress fit perfect but was a bit big in the chest. I'm a bit smaller on top but thought the chest was a bit large for a size 2. You definitely cannot wear a normal bra with this dress (I went without one as the dress provided good support and actually just shoved two bra pads in there for a little extra shape) Pockets were amazing. Would definitely rent again!

The fit of this dress is true to size and it is so stunning when worn. I wore it to a charity Galentine's event. It is very low cut so I added a lace tube top underneath. Petite girls beware it's more like an maxi than a mini on us, but still looked beautiful with heels.
This dress was a bit tight in the ribs so I sized up. I loved the length and the pockets. It is a luxurious heavy material that is incredibly flattering and looks expensive. Lots of compliments!

I absolutely loved this dress - wore it for an early spring wedding. The material is thick but it still worked for the season in my opinion. The pattern and coloring are beautiful! The only issue I encountered is that I was kind of between a size 4 and 6 - I could get the 4 on but it wasn't comfortable so I ended up going with the 6 and it was a little loose, particularly in the chest. That said, still loved it!

I wanted to love this dress and wear it!! Unfortunately, RTR only had a 6 left in size so I took a gamble. The top is definitely too big- I guess I am more in between a 4 and 6. If i could have gotten it tailored at the shoulders, I think it would have been perfect. I will definitely try again in the future to rent this dress in a 4!!!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress for a SoCal wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and comfortable - plus it has pockets! The fit was true to size and the length was perfect. It was super comfortable to dance in as well. Got many compliments!
A little low cut and heavy fabric but well made and has pockets!
Loved! Big pockets.

This dress was pretty much a perfect fit, after I fixed the top with fashion tape. I'm 5'4", so the regular length of this dress was a little long. But other than that, it was incredibly flattering, especially because the big skirt hides any lower stomach or hip areas.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Pattern is beautiful. Perfect for spring/fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! They didn't have the size I needed (4) but the 6 worked with some hem tape. I tend to shy away from v-neck dresses because they don't fit my chest/shoulders super well, but this one was great. The fabric is a little heavier, so might be warm for a summer wedding but perfect for a warm day and cool night wedding! Highly recommend.

This dress was extremely comfortable. The zipper was hard to actually zip once it was on, not from a size perspective but because the fabric was thick in that area. I ended up having to zip it and then pull the sleeves up and over my shoulders. I loved the length, it fell right below my knees since I'm taller, but it was such a great shape. The pockets were lovely and extremely flattering! I didn't need to wear a bra and felt very comfortable.

I rented this for a gala night for our daughter’s school. It was perfect for a cold winter night in Minneapolis. I loved the weight of the fabric and the dress is such a pretty silhouette. Got a ton of compliments all night. Fit true to size. I could have gone without a bra but ended up inserting bra pads and securing with fashion tape. Would definitely recommend this one!!

I wore this for a themed gala where I knew I would be wearing a ridiculous wig, I was concerned the overall pattern would be too much, but the almost watercolor impression of the flowers along with the black main color helped everything work together. I would say it runs true to size, I would have been able to wear either the 0 or the 2, but the top fit better on the 0. Fashion tape would have been needed on the two. Zipper is difficult at the waistband. Length was more ankle than tea as to be expected at 5'2-5'3

links_reviews_title: The dancing! This dress was so comfortable and easy to dance in.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous! The fit on this dress is true to size. I was actually 12 weeks pregnant when I wore it, but in pre-pregnancy size thanks to the style/fit (great for hiding a baby bump, for anyone in that niche market!). Also rented one size up to compare, but preferred how the smaller fit hugged waist and seemed better tailored around the arms and neckline. The fabric and pattern are absolute head turners and the cut is gorgeous. Dream of renting this again one day!

Beautiful dress that fit just how the other reviews said. I'm fairly flat chested so if I didn't stand up straight the dress didn't fit right. To help fill it out some I used dress tape to add in some padded cups. Worked like a charm and there were no slip ups the entire night! I wore this to a black tie wedding and the length was perfect.

This dress is absolutely gorgeous! At 5'2", it was definitely midi length on me which was perfect for a formal evening wedding. It did run TTS for me. The top was tight (I am a 32C) and it is cut very low but I didn't feel uncomfortable. I will definitely be renting this one again!

links_reviews_title: I feel pretty, and comfortable, and I have pockets!
links_reviews_text: I rented a 10 (and an 8 as a totally unrealistic backup) because there was no 12 available. I wasn't optimistic because my wide shoulders, healthy guns and generous back yard don't add up to a size 10. This dress didn't care about my shoulders, biceps, hips or thighs - just rib cage and bust. I'm 33" around the bra-band region and the size 10 fit well. The size 8 fit and zipped also, but smashed my boobs a bit. I bought and wore a torturous sticky bra thing because on me anyway, a regular bra would have shown in both the front and the back. Even though the fabric was thick enough that none of my bits would show through, I'm over 50, and a little lift and shape was in order. I went to a fancy gala with my sophisticated sister. I'm not at all comfortable with "fancy" or "gala" and just the idea of celebrities, wealthy and powerful people, and the outrageously good-looking made me feel like I was going to vomit. This lovely dress made me fit in just fine, and I was comfortable enough to talk to some very smart, interesting (and yes, outrageously good-looking) people. And pockets! In one pocket: my own cell phone, lip balm, hotel key, pair of socks, cash, credit card and charging cable. In the other: my sister's cell phone, lip gloss, and a pair of courtside tickets to a Warriors game won in the charity auction. Apparently, you can't actually fit anything in a Judith Lieber clutch, even if you could remember where you put it.
I am 5'2, 130, size 4 dress usually. Such a fun dress! Lots of compliments. :)

This is my favorite dress of all time. The fabric is scrumptious, the fit is flattering, it has pockets. You cannot wear a bra with this due to the low cut, so I had the little sticky things to cover up but it worked out fine. I am petite but there was no petite size but it still worked well with heels, in fact better, since it was a more formal look. The waist was tight. I am usually a ten so had to size up. I would buy this dress if it was offered!

I wore this to a black tie optional wedding and I was SO happy to be wearing this amazing dress!! Flirty and fun, incredibly comfortable, and easy to dance. Pockets are always a plus. Love, love, love this dress!!

This dress was perfect! Definitely long on me because I'm short (more like mid-shin than knee) but still great. I should have listened to the advice of other reviewers and not worn a bra. As it was, I wore my own regular bra which was almost perfect (just required a few adjustments throughout the night). I got so many compliments on this dress that I'm sure I'll rent it again! Also, pockets!

Loves colors and cut of the dress, pockets are a plus and I didn't even use a clutch . I've been loosing weight so it was a bit loose on the chest area so I had to use a silicone bra to try to fill it up. The wait is the issue. I took this dress to a trip with me so decided not to take the back up and boy did I regret it. My husband was the one who noticed the waist ripped as we got to the church and there was nothing I could do but keep my arm down so it wouldn't show. Other than that the dress was dreamy, just check the dress thoroughly before you get out of the house/hotel. I'm 5'3 , 34B , size 25-26 jeans , XS -Small in tops

links_reviews_title: Loads of compliments at a Spring Wedding
links_reviews_text: I have had my eye on this dress for awhile and finally rented it for a Spring wedding - received tons of compliments and didn't feel overdressed. The front is a little revealing but I think t has just enough to keep it classy.

I LOVED this dress so much, but sadly it didn't love me back. I realllly needed an 8, but the only sizes available were a 10 and a 6 so i took a chance. The 10 "fit", but my boobs would have been 100% visible from the side if anyone looked. The top was just a little too loose for me. My chest is a wide-set 32D (the dumbest bra size...) and if i were a fuller cup, or more rounded i think the 10 would have worked beautifully. The material of this dress is heavy and very beautiful. As others have said, the band around the ribs is snug, but i have a bigger ribcage and the 10 was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, unique dress for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: Great dress overall! Beautiful pattern and a nice dark purple color. It ran a little small.. I'm usually a 2 and the 4 was still a bit tight around the rib cage. You can wear this without a bra if needed.

This might be the best dress I've ever worn. It fit perfectly, was incredibly flattering, and got A LOT of compliments. It's perfect for a wedding-I danced all night and never had to worry about it falling or exposing anything. IT HAS POCKETS!! I couldn't recommend this dress more. No need for a bra!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a wine country wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was so beautiful! It's true to size but runs a little small on the top.

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments on this dress! Would 100% recommend!
links_reviews_text: I'd definitely wear this again. The pockets were great, the skirt was full and beautiful, and I got SO many compliments! There was a ridiculous amount of food at this wedding (at both the cocktail hour and the reception), so take this with a grain of salt, but it felt a little snug around the rib cage anytime I had just eaten. I'm 5'2" and the dress was almost too long to look like the mid-calf dress that it was, but it just worked out with this size 4

links_reviews_title: Good dress for a wedding in Sonoma!
links_reviews_text: Cute dress with pockets. I'm 5'4 and the dress was longer than I had expected, but still worked for the wedding I was attending in Sonoma. The 4 was a bit snug, but the 6 was too big, so I wore the 4. No stretch in this dress and fits tight around the waist. Overall, I'd rent again!

links_reviews_title: Dress was very fitting for a black tie optional wedding at a mansion on the water.
links_reviews_text: Dress ended up being more tea length on me than I had expected at my height. I ended up wearing a strapless bra, pushing it down to not show, and using fashion tape for gaping. It was a beautiful dress, but I was extremely self conscious in it mostly due to my weight gain and feeling even larger with the cut.

LOVED this dress. I'm 5'6" and 154 lbs and wore a size 8 (had a 10 for backup size but it was noticeably too big). It was snug through the rib cage but not uncomfortable. It's a beautiful dress and I loved the pockets! I felt classy and stylish all night...received LOTS of compliments!!

This dress was a DREAM. I wore it to a wedding at the end of June and got a ton of compliments. The skirt was so much fun to dance in and I felt like it really flattered my figure. Also...there's pockets! The only con was that there was absolutely no stretch in the dress. I have a 27" waist and had to wear the size 6 just so I could have a bit more breathing room. I have a small chest, so this made the top a bit roomy, but nothing that was scandalous!

This dress was fun to wear, and even better to dance in. The bottom had lots of material that looked great twirling around in. There were pockets that held my phone so I could take pictures. I received many compliments by both women and men; I wish I this dress was mine! It was slightly roomy in the bust area, but likely not noticeable to anyone other than me. I did have to sit up perfectly straight for that reason. There was a small run on the left breast, but again, not a big deal. The material was heavy, so it was perfect for a May wedding, but not perfect for a hot summer wedding.
Lovely tea length dress. Comfortable to wear. I am a 34C and was fine going without a bra in it. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous! Love the pockets! I felt like a queen and received several compliments. Busty.
links_reviews_text: The material was beautiful, the pockets were practical. It definitely shows off your bust-line so if you are uncomfortable with that, this is not the dress for you.

links_reviews_title: A dress so nice I rented it twice!
links_reviews_text: I am obsessed with this dress. I didnt get a picture in it the first time I wore it and used that as an excuse to wear it again to a different wedding. I got endless compliments both times and felt stunning. I opted for the size 2 the second time wearing it because I prefered the more snug/secure feel, but would say it fits true to size. The fabric is heavier which makes it great for a winter/spring wedding. Plus - pockets and an A+ twirl factor. I'd rent it again if I had an occasion for it!

I wore this for a formal fundraiser and was unsure about the plunging neckline. But the dress has such a timeless silhouette (and pockets!) that the neckline didn't feel inappropriate at all. My chest is on the smaller side (32b) and I didn't need tape or a bra. The bodice is tight but not so tight it was uncomfortable. I would say if you're unsure of sizes tho, size up. There's no forgiveness in the bodice. Overall, loved this rental

so comfortable! i rented for a banquet- there was plenty of room for food and the fit enabled me to run around and help set up without worrying about my dress dragging on the floor or my boobs slipping out. It was a little long and hit just below my calves, but I still received SO many compliments.
One of my favorite rentals so far. Beautiful dress. Great fit. Lots of compliments!

This dress came as a back up as the other dress that I ordered had broken zippers. This dress is a show stopper - women of ALL ages were telling me how much they loved my dress. It is very comfortable and fun to dance in and the POCKETS are amazing! I thought it was a great length, I am 5'2'' and wore this with 4 inch heels. Runs true to size, I opted for the size 0.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and eye-catching dress, but definitely size up
links_reviews_text: This was a replacement when my first two sizes in another dress didn't fit, but I'm so glad I got this one! I'm a comfortable 8 that leans towards a 6, but I'm glad I got this in a 10! I was able to zip it myself, but it was pretty tight, but it was a sexy tight (no weird bulging/bunching). The R length was perfect with 2.5 in heels (I'm 5'4"). The halter/backless look is really lovely and the mermaid look is really sexy, and I didn't have much trouble walking around, though I was attending a gala and didn't have to move around too much. Would definitely recommend if you're looking for something attention-grabbing and form-fitting, but definitely make sure to size up.
This dress is unbelievable. It fits like a glove and I looked amazing. Would definitely recommend. Gets a bit hot during a summer wedding because it's made out of a thick material.

This was my first formal dress rental and I could not have been more pleased. I typically wear a size 6 in Elizabeth and James, but I followed the advice of other reviews and sized up to an 8L. I wore flats, but could have worn a small heel and it would have still been long enough. The material is thick and forms to the body so I went bra-less and still felt supported. I would highly recommend for any formal occasion!

Fits like a glove! Fabric is heavier, but with ample stretch. 36B chest didn't need a bra. I am usually an 8L and the the 10L fit perfect. Was able to wear 1.5in heels even though I am 5'11". And received compliments all night long.

This is a classic black dress. It definitely runs small, I am typically a 0 in most dresses and a 2 was very snug. This dress was not easy to dance in, but was very flattering. I was able to wear a strapless bra with this dress.

links_reviews_title: All the compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flattering! It definitely runs on the small side, however it was comfortable. I would wear this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect hourglass dress for a black tie event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun to wear to a black tie wedding. The shape was very flattering and the material was comfortable. The only con was that the shape made it a little harder to dance, but still definitely worth it.

links_reviews_title: A great dress. Got so many compliments on it for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: It fit more snug than I was expecting but I got the back up size a size larger which was perfect. The Long was perfect for me at 5’9” to wear a small heal.

links_reviews_title: Incredibly supportive, glamorous, and elegant dress.
links_reviews_text: This is without a doubt my favorite rental from RTR. I’m usually a size 0 or 2, but I got a 2R and 4R for the event. This dress was dangerously tight, which I love. Because it is a thicker material, it didn’t feel as if it would rip when I squeezed myself into it with the help of my fiancé. I feel like a 4R is the equivalent of somewhere between a 0 and 2, and it would have fit more smoothly had I not wanted a sleeker feel. This is one of the few dresses that can deliver that without awkward bulges in certain places. I’m 5’6, and I wore the 2R with 2.5 inch heels. I didn’t want to wear higher heels, so I didn’t want to risk getting an L, but with a total height of around 5’8, the 2R was an inch ish too short. It still was, by far, one of my favorite dresses of all time. I was being complimented left and right, and the event photographer followed me for what seemed like half the night at a black tie event full of well dressed guests. Rent this dress. You won’t regret it, and you’ll look and feel like a queen.

Wore this as a bridesmaid dress and absolutely loved it! Usually wear a size 4 or 6, but this runs very small. The 8L fit perfect (5ft7 and wore 2 in heels). I tried on the 8R and it was too short to even wear with sandals. So comfortable and did not require a bra as it was very fitted. Highly recommend!

I loved this dress for being so flattering and classy, but still sexy. It definitely ran small - I could have worn my normal size, but I wouldn’t have been able to go to the bathroom very easily (it was wayyy too tight across my thighs to pull it up to use the bathroom). I’m 5’2 and the normal length wasn’t bad with 4 inch heels. The material was SUPER thick, which is normally appreciated, however on a 100 degree day, it was really hot! My only other complaint - my friend was on the “back” duty all evening. When I sat down, the back slid down a little, it was like pulling up a strapless top. However, I also loved that I could wear a bra with this style.
Slightly snug and the 6L was slightly long but with heels it fit great and was comfortable. The dress is very flattering and elegant. Would recommend for a black tie wedding or formal affair!

I rented this as my bridesmaid dress for a wedding I was in, and it was great! I rented the 0R and 2R, and I ended up wearing the 2R (115lbs, 5'4", 32B). I received several compliments and felt comfortable all night. The length was also perfect for me!

I actually ordered this dress as my backup dress but knew that it was the one as soon as I zipped it up! It has such a great fit that accentuates everything that you want it to! I am a teacher and actually wore this to a prom because I thought it was appropriate without being frumpy. I received so many compliments on it and was extremely happy. Only suggestion- I am 5’7 and ordered the long size according to the size chart. I think I would have liked the dress even more if I had ordered the normal length because it was a little long on me, even with heels. Other than that.. I LOVED it!!

links_reviews_title: Say yes to this dress, but size up!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a wedding I was officiating outside. I read the reviews and so glad I sized up! I usually am a size 6 and there was no way I could get it zipped so I wore my backup size 8R. I did not need a bra, it is a form fitting dress and it was amazingly comfortable. Since the wedding was in grass, I wore flat sandals and the 8R was perfect, had I worn my typical fav 3 or 4 in heel, I would have preferred the 8L. I am 5'6" and 135lbs. It was sexy and sophisticated and perfect for the occasion. I danced in it all night and it was comfortable, the fabric gives and there was no need to make adjustments on it at all. It is difficult navigating the steps because it is tight around the knees but just hike it up. Very flattering, got tons of compliments, just size up!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering cut for those curves!
It was definitely tighter than I normally wear my dresses but I was still comfortable and able to move, sit and dance! I wore my normal size.
Beautiful dress! This was my backup dress and LOVED it! It fit beautiful and was very flattering
This dress fit like a glove and accentuated every curve. So classy and elegant. Would definitely rent again!
Absolutely the perfect dress. Rented for a black tie dinner for work. The fit is tight, ended up wearing a size bigger than I normally do. So many compliments. Felt confident, sexy and appropriate.

While simpler than other formal dresses I've rented, the fit of this dress was really snug, making it feel a little too showy/sexy for the charity gala I was attending. For girls over 5'6", I would definitely recommend the tall size, which was out of stock when I was renting. The fabric of this dress was thick but stretchy.

This dress runs very small. I normall wear a 2 and the 4 was super tight, I wish I had a 6 and I’ve never worn a 6. The dress is a heavy material so maybe not best for any outdoor event in the summer.

links_reviews_title: Fitted and formal long black beauty
links_reviews_text: The fit on this dress was flattering although I found the fit to be on the smaller side all around. It was a little difficult to walk in because of the taper at the knees, but the length was almost perfect (I’m 5’3 and wore a kitten heel with this). This dress is gorgeous, but it wasn’t a knockout.

I am always a 0R or 2R in women’s eveningwear, especially because most designers lean on the bigger and longer side (recognizing that many women get alterations and wear heels- but I digress) and here I would have been happy and comfortable with a 6L. Elizabeth & James is designed by Mary Kate and Ashley- so think of their body type when ordering. The dress in a size 4 was so tight I could not even wear shapewear, and was the perfect length to wear flats. I wore a small heel which lifted the gown from the floor, because this simply wasn’t an occasion I could wear flats to, so there wasn’t much I could do. I am disappointed that this dress was not the fit I wanted, but I did get many compliments about how classy and elegant the dress was.

I rented this dress for a black tie boxing event out of state. I felt so confident in it and received so many compliments. I am 5'1 and usually wear a size 0 in dresses. After reading the reviews I ordered a size 2 and 4. I noticed a big difference in the two sizes (you can see from the pictures). The 2 was a little tight, but the length was perfect (I wore 4.5-inch heels)! The 4 was a little more comfortable, but it dragged and I was nervous I would trip. I ended up wearing the 2 and was very happy with it. The material is thick so it hid anything that would make me feel insecure. I would DEFINITELY rent this dress again!

This dress is beautiful on! I had several compliments all night. I agree with other reviews that it does run a bit small, so I got the next size that I usually wear (usually a 4, so I got the 4 & 6), but ended up still wearing the 4, because overall, the fit looked better - even though the 6 fit as well... 🤷🏼‍♀️ Also, beware that using the restroom in this dress is challenging lol... I had to fully upzip the dress! Other than that, it’s gorgeous!
Everything was great from the delivery, fit and return. Super easy! Will definitely tent again

Va-va-voom!! A beautiful and sexy black dress with mermaid swish. I love the halter neck too! However, this runs small and the fabric has only a little stretch. I could not even zip it up. And it is too short- as I am 5’7” and wearing 4” heels. Definitely get the next size up! But, a gorgeous dress!!

links_reviews_title: Amazing black tie optional wedding in NJ
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for a black tie optional wedding. Look and felt like a million bucks- would definitely wear this again! Fits super snug so don't be afraid to order a size up! (I usually wear a size 4 but couldnt even get it on.) Was very flattering on my pear shaped figure and felt great even while dancing all night!

Rented this dress for a black tie optional wedding and it did not disappoint. Everything about it was perfect. It fit very snug, but perfectly, and had quite a bit of stretch to it. Almost purchased...
Classic black dress for formal wedding.
Wore to my military ball and it was perfect. I loved the flared bottom

links_reviews_title: It was beautiful and so flattering!
links_reviews_text: For sure size up! It was stunning!

links_reviews_title: I felt very comfortable and made me look a little bit taller :p
links_reviews_text: I'm 5.0", dress size 2, the long was perfect with the correct high hill 11 or 12 cm, I'm petite and the dress fit perfectly, a little bit stretch so that helped to walk/sit/dance.

Very sleek gown, figure hugging, but made me feel very elegant. Although I went through hell and back trying to get a gown in the first place. This isn't what I had originally ordered, but it was fantastic gown. Not easy to dance in

links_reviews_title: Super amazing dress for a special night.
links_reviews_text: Fit was amazing. I'm usually a 27 jean and a small top I have an athletic style figure. Love that the dress had a bit of stretch in it with the mermaid bottom. Very flattering.

The 8R was perfect! I'm usually a 6 and this one was snug but flattering. My husband had to help me zip. I didn't need to wear a bra which was awesome and I'm a 36full C/ small D. The fabric was just right! Not shiny and the had a lil stretch to it. The height was perfect and I didn't wear a heel. I'm 5'7, 135lbs. Size up for sure

links_reviews_title: Hugs in all the right places but size up!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was AMAZING! It hugged in all the right places and really showed off my figure. I usually wear a 0 in dresses but could not even get the 2R past my hips so this dress definitely runs small. I rented the 2R and the 4R and wore the 4R. The dress was also too long for my 5'3 frame and needed hemming tape even with 4 inch heels. Going to the bathroom in this dress wasn't the easiest and forget walking fast! Overall, this dress was gorgeous and I recommend it!
Sleek and fitted, perfect for a classy affair. I am short 5'0 and with heels the length on the regular was perfect so if you're tall I would get a long length.

links_reviews_title: Was perfect for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I had read other reviews that it ran small so I ordered my normal size (2) and a larger size (4) just in case, but the 4 ended up fitting perfectly! I wanted something classic to wear to a black tie wedding and got so many compliments. It's the kind of dress that really hugs your body, which I was a little worried about, but the fabric is thick enough so you don't see any bumps. I bought spanx to wear underneath anyway, but you don't need to. Although the regular length didn't hit the floor, I think if I ordered a different length it would've been too long. Overall, I loved wearing this and definitely recommend!

When I put this dress on I immediately loved it! It felt amazing when I put it on and I received compliment after compliment. However; as you walk the lining rides up and I was constantly pulling it down (which requires you putting your hands under the dress and yanking several times). I tried to dance and it was impossible. This dress has zero stretch- especially in the arms. I didn't have an issue with the neck being itchy. Overall it's a beautiful dress just not practical.
This dress was very flattering and forgiving. I also liked the open back; it added drama and made it such a statement piece.

links_reviews_title: Loved the selections without leaving my house
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. Wore it to a bat mitzvah. I actually rented 2 dresses because I wasn't sure which I wanted and rtr was running a great special. I got so many compliments. The dress is tight in the sleeves and from other reviews I did order in my size plus the next one up and ended up wearing the larger size. I was worried about the length because I have short legs but it worked great with a pair of pumps.
Amazing dress! Loved the detail... lace, open back. Was elegant, yet flexible...no issues with busting a move on the dance floor :)
Love this dress! Wore this to my husband's work event and it was perfect. Sleeve's were definitely tight but not uncomfortable. Would rent this dress again!

Loved this dress and got a ton of compliments! It was perfect for a fundraiser. Business in the front, party in the back. I am 5'9" and 140 lbs and would have worn the 6, but the arms were a little tight so I sized up to the 8. The arms were more comfortable but I did have some room in the rest of the dress, but I don't think it was noticeable to anyone except me. Overall a great dress, just be sure you have someone who can hook the back for you as I couldn't do it on my own!
I loved this dress! The fit and hole in back made it a little sexier, but not too much. Perfect for a winter party!

links_reviews_title: this was my first experience with RTR. my friends have always had good experiences and so did I.
links_reviews_text: Classy and sexy. Dress fit great! Arms are tight, so just be aware. I would have liked a tighter fit around the hips. They had hips sewn into the dress and I felt like it made mine look bigger. Received lots of compliments. Wore it for a Christmas party. You need this dress!

The dress ran a little small. The sleeves were strange in that they had a zipper by the cuff. The sleeves were a little too long for my arms, but it worked out. I loved the low cut back. Sorry, I don't have a picture of the back. It's a pretty dress. Not sure I would wear it again. Also, the dress seems to be wearing out, from overuse.
The dress fit like a glove, very form fitting. Received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night time cocktail event !
links_reviews_text: Fit is great, style is sheek, love this dress! The only thing I noticed was that the lining came out a bit in the back with movement. Love it!
This dress fit perfectly and I would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, kept me warm for the outdoor party, lots of compliments! Loved it.
links_reviews_text: Would rent this again...made me feel so sexy, without being revealing! Fit like a glove, comfortable fit, a bit snug around the neck...but bearable.

Very nice for party. Ran a bit small as I remember but I was comfortable. I think the shoulders were a bit tight, and I am small shouldered for my height. You most likely will not need a bra as it has support. Very nice holiday dress. Loved it.
This dress was super flattering and classy. It was comfortable and really stood out. I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: The dress was lovely for a semi-formal wedding.
links_reviews_text: This was a lovely dress for a wedding I attended in the winter. The lace did have some snags in it, but nobody noticed. The dress runs true to size, but the lace sleeves are a tight fit. I would size up if you're worried. If you have a small bust and larger hips, this dress is great. I had the benefit of trying it on at the Georgetown location first. It fit perfectly there. I don't think the lace holds up well to all of the wears. Besides the snags, mine was loose in the back on one side. It was easily fixed with double sided tape, but a minor inconvenience. I'm 5'4" and the dress was a perfect length hitting just below the knee. Overall, the dress was perfect for a semi-formal wedding and I received a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I am a first time renter. I loved this look and received so many compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, very flattering. It had such pretty detail. There were cups sewn in which made it so easy. I wore drop earrings and that was the only jewelry I needed. I would definitely rent this dress again. It was perfect for a winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for NYE in NYC
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 2 and the 4 and wore the 2. The fit was perfect and the dress was comfortable with the exception of the lace at the neck, which was rather itchy.
It was a great fit! Form fitting while still being comfortable. Sewn up cups so no need to wear a bra. Sleeves were a little snug yo put on but not uncompfrtable while wearing.

My first time using RTR! Wore this dress to a New Year's Casino Royale event. I ordered the size I typically wear, size 2, with a size 4 as a backup size just in case. The size 2 fit perfectly everywhere except the arms. The lace arms were so tight that I felt restrained. However, the size 4 was a perfect fit all over. I'll definitely be using RTR again!
Great experience. It was my first time using RTR and i will be using again in the future

Looking for the perfect little black dress that is classy and sexy at the same time? Look no further!! This dress is so unique bc it provides a lot of coverage yet is still sexy with the sheer lace and open back. I should have worn a 6 which is my regular size since the back on this size 8 was a little droopy on me - but it worked out just fine for my hubby's company holiday cocktail party. Black lace + open back = HOT dress!!

Rented this for a Christmas party and received many compliments. I LOVED this dress. It was perfect for a holiday party as it is long-sleeved and has a bit of shimmer. It doesn't have any stretch but I still was able to dance comfortably! I would rent this dress again!
Dress was beautiful. I received a lot of compliments. It was a combination of classy and sexy. I usally wear a size 4 but had to wear the back up size 6.
Fit like a glove, although I thought size 4 would be a better fit. Thank god for a backup 6. The lace made the dress stand out from the crowd and the open back was a major hit as well.

I rented this for a fundraiser event with a rather conservative crowd. This dress was very pretty, classy, and yet sexy... all while covering up most of me. I'm 5'8" tall, 145 pounds and a 36B. The back is all open, which was fine with my smaller bust - I just didn't wear a bra. I didn't feel the need to pump up my girls in this dress, as the focus is on the lace neck and sleeves. Just a really pretty dress. Great for when you need to dress a tad conservatively, yet still want to stand out.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on this dress! It was an elegant and sexy choice.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit tight when I first put the dress on, but they did seem to loosen up as the night went on. Also, it's a good dress to wear in colder weather because it was very warm. I was worried about the neck being too tight, but it did not bother me at all. I feel that it was true to size, but I'd probably get one up as the extra size since the sleeves can run a bit small. It's a great dress for weddings or holiday parties. I definitely recommend this!
Beautiful hour glass fit. Everything about the cut was perfect. I loved the built-in cups so I did not need a bra and it was just enough of a push up. The open back is super sexy.

links_reviews_title: So comfy and lots of compliments!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was fabulous! Hard to snap the next by myself and lace was a little worn, but overall fabulous fit, true to size, and everyone asked where it was from!

Loved wearing this dress and got so many compliments! The 4 was a bit too loose for me so I wore the 2. However the sleeves are super tight and I'm surprised I managed to get my arms through. Of note: my arms are a bit muscular so that could have been the issue.

links_reviews_title: This was a show-stopper. Classy yet sexy.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 but had to size up to a 6 because the lace on the arms has no give and gapped at the armpit. I was a bit disappointed that the lace had been torn at the forearm a bit but the "show must go on" and if anyone noticed, no one said anything. I got several compliments and the cut out on the back of this dress is eye-popping. Overall, loved how I felt and looked in this dress!

For ladies with a larger chest, you'll probably want to go up a size. The size 2 would have been perfect but was so tight around my chest/upper arms that I could barely move. Went with the size 4 and it looked and felt great! A beautiful, classy dress!

links_reviews_title: Definitely a fun dress but runs small
links_reviews_text: I did get a ton of compliments on this but was a bit self-aware of the open back and any slight back fat. My boyfriend insisted it looked fine but worth noting if you are at all self conscious. Agree with other reviews about the arms being on the small side in relation to the size of the dress.

Typically wear a size two, however glad the back up size 4 was included. The lace arms of the size 2 would not pull up my arms (I do not have big arms). The size 4 was comfortable but still needed assistance with hooking the neck part of dress together. Very classy, elegant, yet sexy dress worn at a work awards banquet. Will definitely rent again!
Loved this dress and got SO many compliments on it. Like in previous comments the sleeves do run small, but overall the dress was amazing! I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress! I loved the lace detail, the length, and everything about it.
links_reviews_text: I am not a small woman, I am 5'11" and 185 pounds (the real truth!) This dress was a wonderful length, and I would rent it again. I wore it for NYE and got a ton of compliments. You will not regret this, I wore a size 12 and it was true to size and I had room to sit and move comfortably. I didn't wear a bra because there was a built in, but my girls aren't that big :)

links_reviews_title: It was very body bugging & sexy
links_reviews_text: I did not end up wearing this to my event because I wanted something a little more fun and not so serious.
I wore this out New Years Eve and loved it. The back is super sexy and it really hugs your curves. It fit like a glove.

Wore this for a nye party as my 2nd dress after ball drop! Didn't love it when I initially tried it on but loved it in the light of the party. All my friends liked it better than the "pre midnight" dress. Fit well. Loved the back and the bust lining with slight padding.

links_reviews_title: This dress worked perfect for a work holiday party. I would highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: I got multiple compliments on this dress throughout the night. It fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Dress was comfortable and I had many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress. Hides all the “uncomfortable” spots. Small fit perfectly. I wanted to purchase and keep!

Comfortable dress, flowy and airy. Great for warm spring days. It was good for work and had modern touches like sheer, lacy statement sleeves and cut out shoulders. Love Ramy Brook. You look good and your still comfortable!
Runs big should have gotten the small

Wore this cute dress on a girls night out in Vegas. Super cute. Stretchy waist band, which you can wear higher or lower as your works best for you. It's short but the drape and fabrication help it stay in place. You can wear a regular bra, and no Spanx required!

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this to a donor appreciation party I hosted
links_reviews_text: What a great dress with sleeves!! Finally! I loved this dress and felt so comfortable and confident.
fit perfectly
too short for work

links_reviews_title: This was cute but not what I wore
links_reviews_text: It was my 2nd choice, fit well

links_reviews_title: I love this dress.. 2nd time I've rented it.. super flattering.. sexy but not too revealing
links_reviews_text: so comfy and forgiving

links_reviews_title: Dress worked but wouldn't rent again
links_reviews_text: This dress worked for what I needed (a night out at a bachelorette party during winter), but I didn't love it. I'm 14 weeks pregnant, so I wanted something a bit looser and flowy. I'm not showing yet, but feeling bloated and most of my clothes aren't fitting correctly. It for the bill for that, and even runs a bit big. I'm usually closer to a medium/6 in RTR dresses, but the small was plenty roomy. It was fine, but I just felt a little strange in it all night.
had to send back because the elastic on one wrist was snapped and broken. Hopefully I can get a different one in time for the party!
I can wear either an XS or S in Ramy Brook. I got this in an XS and it fit great. I love the sleeve detail and it's a great length even for taller people (I'm 5'10").
It was a bit short but still acceptable for work setting.

links_reviews_title: Too casual & too baggy. Not flattering.
links_reviews_text: Too casual & too baggy. Not flattering. Didn't wear.
very loose and flowy great everyday item
Love this LBD! You could dress it up or down. I wore it with leggings & boots. It’s very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Just hung off me & was blah.
links_reviews_text: Material was nice but the size was wrong & felt like a blah dress.
I liked this dress. The sleeves are what makes it. I did feel like the cold shoulder was a bit weird on me - almost a little too big of a cut-out. But over all I really like this dress.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress even post partum !
links_reviews_text: Love the way this dress fits and feels. Its soft and flowy and hides my post partum bump im working on getting rid off perfectly. Highly recommend this dress to new moms that want some extra coverage but still look sexy

links_reviews_title: Very comfy dress,wore it multiple times
links_reviews_text: Loose fit , makes it very comfy to wear

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but a little short
links_reviews_text: The dress was cute but a little short. I tried to wear it with stockings but it didn't look as nice so I wore without.
length was perfect, silhouette was very forgiving with a little skin exposure from the cold shoulder

links_reviews_title: Classic look with unique details at Shoulders
links_reviews_text: Fully lined, zipper hook eye closure in back, sexy side details of layered fabric/overlay, and shoulder details, beautiful soft color pink
Loved wearing this dress. I found it on the rack in Chicago and my normal size wasn't in stock. It was a little big but I still felt amazing in it.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my 5th year college reunion and loved it.
links_reviews_text: It's form fitting but comfortable and looks really beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress perfect for bridal shower
links_reviews_text: I started in a 6 (42) and had to go up to a 10 (46) because it was a right fit. Beautiful dress, comfortable and fits nicely once you have the right size

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to host baby shower
links_reviews_text: The dress is comfortable and beautifully elegant.

This dress was all around stunning. It was an extremely flattering dress, and accentuated all of the right curves, was lightweight and really easy to dance in. Highly recommend for spring/summer affairs. You won't regret it!
Pink and perfect

links_reviews_title: Dressed up but ok for work
links_reviews_text: Great fit, curve revealing so I don't recommend taking a small size to work
Really loved this dress. I wore it to church and to work. It is a beautiful, classy dress that can is also comfortable. Love the sleeves and the color is a light pink that is very flattering

I love this dress! I am 5'2 and the dress is at my knee. It was conservative enough for work while still being fitted. Offered a fun and flirty option for a dress to wear to work, I normally wear black every day! I received lots of compliments on this dress and loved the quality of the fabric because I didn't have to worry about undergarments showing through.
Flattering fit but no give in the fabric. I normally wear a 0 at places like banana republic and I wore a 4 and it fit perfectly!
This fit perfect in all the right places. I have zero complaints and highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect, elegant dress for a wedding guest.
links_reviews_text: I am 5' , 102lbs and this fit me perfectly. Would never have chosen this just based on the online pics. I visited the Georgetown RtR showroom and a stylist suggested I try it. So glad she did. It is beautifully made, drapes perfectly, and looks very sophisticated.
Flattering cut, great for work, beautiful blush pink color... loved this dress

Wore this to a conference. Loved this dress - super high quality material and it felt like it was tailored for me. Body skimming but not tight, does not have any stretch. I received so many compliments, def renting this one again!
Comfortable yet felt lux. I wore it for my graduation and paired it with the zac Posen clutch

I absolutely loved this dress!!! I rented it to wear to the broadway, Hamilton, but I ended up keeping it to also wear it to a rehearsal dinner. It was the perfect fit and material. It was a bit too nice to wear to work. I would 100% rent again. It's true to size! If you size up or down you risk of it not fitting right.

links_reviews_title: I had to look perfect for my 20 year high school reunion and this dress did it. I felt beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect, very true to size. It does wrinkle easily though especially after sitting but it did not take away from the beautiful dress.
Ran small I thought. I guessed on size and was wrong. Could not wear.

links_reviews_title: The delivery was quick and easy!
links_reviews_text: WOW. The material on this very luxurious. You can't really tell by the picture but in person, you can tell it's good material. My fiancé even asked about the material. I love that it's made in Italy!

Fit was way off. Zipper was sticky so I gave up trying to even get it on since I was alone. Could tell that it was way too small. Does not fit like a 6 on the hips. Waste of time. So disappointed because I could tell that I would have loved it. Easily could be worn day to night.

links_reviews_title: many compliments on this beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: flattering - the sleeves are a trendy cut but very elegant and flattering, the open sleeve works, and this is rare!

links_reviews_title: This dress was very comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my brothers outdoor wedding on a 90 degree day. It was very comfortable and flattering. Got many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to my birthday dinner
links_reviews_text: I liked this. It fit nicely.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Horrid color for my skin tone. Went back immediately. Wish it worked.
links_reviews_text: nicely tailored. Fit well.
The sleeves were interesting but it was so very comfortable and cute. I would definitely size down.
Runs to small. Fit very snug at the hips.
The sleeves flutter--which was a little awkward, I had to perm press one of the sides so that it wouldn't fold over--but once that was fixed it was very cute! Would rent this again for a wedding!
Pros: cute color Cons: fit

links_reviews_title: Tried it but couldn't wear. Looks like a work dress in photos, but inappropriate for work.
links_reviews_text: Looks like it can be worn to work, but more appropriate for a night out. Didn't wear.

Great fit for a tall person in a short dress. Passed the arm-raise test: hem stayed put. Sleeves are an interesting, sculptural detail, that I didn't find super flattering for my body in photos. Didn't wear as it wasn't right for my event. Would be a fun NYE / party dress!
This definitely runs a little tight. Nothing Spanx couldn't solve though. It's gorgeous and feels expensive, but also wrinkles easily.
