Fit true to size, although is very form fitting and fabric fairly thin, it's less forgiving but looked absolutely fabulous for a graduation at work. Classy and no too revealing, would definitely wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Not a fan of the sleeves
links_reviews_text: Dress color was very pretty & feminine. But the sleeves don't stay on very well so my shoulders stayed constantly out with the two fabrics just hanging on the side. Dress also wrinkles very easily. Had to steam it coming out the bag and not even thru the day yet, and its wrinkled from sitting.
I'm normally a 6 and a size 42 was way too tight, otherwise it would've been a great dress.

links_reviews_title: Too short, too small, sleeves are weird
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear this.
Anything from this designer is so cute in my opinion. This dress fit perfectly. It wasn't too tight or too loose.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: I did not like the color of this dress with my complexion. It made me look washed out.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for Mother's Day and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect and better than the picture.

links_reviews_title: The quality of the dress and fabric is nice but the overall Stryker of the sleeves does not drape.
links_reviews_text: The color is pretty and it's well made but the sleeves are stiff and if adds volume to your upper body so if you are conscious of your upper arms or wider back - it's not that flattering.

links_reviews_title: Ok, made my chest look wide in photos
links_reviews_text: This is comfortable and flattering in person, but unflattering in all of the photos. Would possibly rent again if I lose a little weight.
Everything fit really nicely except for the bust - small cheated so i kept tugging at it a bit, but overall was bearable bc the rest fit really well. Loved the sleeves and neckline

I ended up not wearing this because the cleavage was too much for the company Christmas party. Also, I'm usually a 4, and i had to use shapewear to fit in the 6. However, the zipper was terrible. It kept sticking.

links_reviews_title: Most comfortable formal dress I've worn.
links_reviews_text: The only issue I had was the tag on my side itching me that I couldn't cut out. Dress was soft and comfy. It didn't ride up at all. Fit like a glove and looked great!

links_reviews_title: It fit like a glove. Very feminine. The sweetheart neck line is refreshing.
links_reviews_text: Perfect. I would rent it again!!

links_reviews_title: This dress is simple but stunning and fits like a dream!
links_reviews_text: I have rented this dress twice. Once for a formal charity event and the other an office holiday party. Both times I dressed up this simple dress with some great jewelry and hair. It's conservative enough for a work event, sexy enough to turn heads and comfortable enough to party into the wee hours! A perfect dress!

Dress ran true to size. This dress was a 4 and I am usually a 2, so it was a little bit big, but not obscenely large. Would be great for the office or a casual wedding. Fabric had some stretch to it. Can be worn with standard bra and undergarments. Gave a pretty conservative feel on me but might look different on someone with a larger chest size. Dress appeared fitted throughout. Dress hit right above the knee on me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD for swanky party! Rocked it at the 50's inspired cocktail party we hosted.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits like a glove. It hugs all your curves in the best possible way. Busty gals...if you like showing off the girls, this is the dress for you! The material has a bit of stretch and is so comfortable. Honestly, I would buy this dress in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Very comfortable, but sleek and party-appropriate. Great for tall ladies.
links_reviews_text: I wore it to my work holiday party and absolutely loved it! The detailing was lovely, and made it something other than a plain black dress. The length was great (I'm not into the super short stuff), and the cut was perfect - it hugged my body but wasn't too tight to be uncomfortable. The soft inner lining was a dream. (Sorry; I didn't get a full-body shot.)
This is the 2nd time renting this dress. Classy and beautiful. Fits like a glove. I'd buy it if I could! Perfect for an evening wedding or any other formal event.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress! Perfect for an awards banquet.
links_reviews_text: I needed a cocktail dress for a work awards banquet and thought I'd treat myself to something special. I was worried this one might be too long since I'm short but the length was perfect. The dress is very form fitting so I think if it was shorter, it would have looked a little less classy. I normally wear a 2 or a 0 in mall brands so I ordered a 2 and a 0 here. I probably should have gone with a 2 and a 4. The 2 was a little tight but it fit perfectly with spanx. It was very comfortable and I could wear a regular bra. There were a few little stray threads and snags that needed to be trimmed prior to wearing but otherwise it was in great condition. It was my first "rent the runway" experience and I'll certainly be doing it again.

links_reviews_title: This lace dress doesn't photograph well, but looks spectacular! Comfortable, sexy, easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Wore my own bra (36D) and Spanx. If you are busty, go with a necklace rather than drop earrings (dress is low cut). Good length for tall girls (I'm 5'9). May be too long if you are petite and curvy. I wear a 12 or 14 and went with the 14 (which was loose).

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Form fitting and slimming.
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress! Very from fitting and slimming. I wore it for NYE and it was fabulous! The lace is a great touch on a simple LBD.

Awesome dress! It has a bit of stretch which was nice. I normally have to size up for my chest, but the dress was stretchy enough. The dress hugged all the right places and I got complements all night. The lace is a nice touch and makes it look elegant. This was a dress that was sent to me as a back up. I'm glad it worked but I was worried! The RTR staff were amazing and got it all sorted so that I was dressed for my event. I don't know if I will get the dress again seeing that my boobs were the main focus of the night... But it was a fun dress to wear! (I'm a 34G - I hope that helps!)

Sadly had two funerals within a month of each other so rented again because the fit was perfect. Definitely wore a cardigan over it as the neckline can start dropping low throughout the day & anyone C cup & above will be on display (classy enough display for a wedding, not a funeral). Perfect just barely above the knee.
Good fit but a little low cut for the office
Wish I would have gotten a size bigger
Perfect amount of stretch. Really great looking dress. I wore it on stage and it was a real hit.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, a little revealing in the chest, but i was able to wear a normal bra.
links_reviews_text: Way too formal for work, for me, this is a con. Fortunately i happened to have an event to wear it to. The zipper. It doesn't stick, it digs its heels in and bites down. Good luck.
Thought the dress was a great fit! Loved the details. Zipper was a bit tricky but got it worked out! Much prettier in person.
Dress is true to size and fits like a glove. It's not the most exciting dress in the world but nicely made, comfortable, and versatile. Perfect for work/casual drinks.

Really love the simple elegance of this dress. I'm 5'1" and found the dress just a tad long (hit right at my knee) and the top to be a little low (didn't show too much cleavage or anything, but felt like it would have looked more proportional on a taller girl or someone with a longer torso). Still, would rent this again!
So classy and elegant. Will def rent again.
Spanx or some other undergarment required for this dress. It shows every bulge, bump, etc.
Beautiful dress, way too small for me

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear this item due to fit.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a borderline 8-10. I got a size 8 because a 10 wasn't available, and literally couldn't get it over my hips, which are admittedly a bit curvy. I like the style however, so will eventually try again with a larger size.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't tell how Lacey it was until it arrived. A little too dressy for work conference attire
links_reviews_text: Very fitted. A bit small. Really pretty neckline.

The dress was extremely comfortable and looked elegant without being too over-the-top. I wore it to an evening wedding, mostly indoors. I wore a regular bra without an issue. The dress was thick enough and patterned in such a way that I was able to wear control-top pantyhose without any lines showing. Awesome!

links_reviews_title: Just a little snug and short
links_reviews_text: I love this dress, and wanted to make it work. My event is formal, and it was just a tad too short for me to pull off. I would possibly rent it in the future for a different type of event, as it's more of a cocktail dress.
the dress was too casual for the wedding I was attending, would be great for dinner out/ date
Dress fit very well. I was comfortable and didn't feel restricted. Unfortunately I needed his dress for a funeral. It was Catholic mass and I was able to kneel, stand and sit comfortably.

links_reviews_title: I would wear this every day!
links_reviews_text: This is the most comfortable I've ever been in a stylish dress like this! It has a soft cotton lining that makes it stay in place and feels like butter. The lace is a gorgeous addition to a traditional LBD, and the neckline gives it a very formal edge. I wore it for work but could easily wear it with my hair in an updo for a semi formal event. True to size and fits beautifully.
Comfortable and easy access for nursing my baby! Fit was good and as expected. My zipper was a little sticky, but didn't serve as a huge problem.

links_reviews_title: Very classy / sexy, but runs small
links_reviews_text: I did not realize this dress was lace, or I likely wouldn't have rented. That being said, it looked great on - a very classy/sexy combo. However, runs very small - too tight for work, so sent it back.

The fit of this dress made it the perfect choice for the wedding I attended. Although simple, the quality and fit of the dress made it stand out. I felt comfortable and confident in this dress. I would recommend it as a safe choice for any occasion!
Very true to size
Fit well but could have been a little tighter and was too long for me. I'm 5'1''.
Wore to funeral - not very forgiving around waist area and kind of bunched weird - overall not a fan of this dress
Wore this to a funeral- did the trick.

links_reviews_title: Comfy & Sexy at same time. BF asked me to wear it again to event tomorrow - ha! oh well.
links_reviews_text: beautiful - comfy!

links_reviews_title: Show stopper - great winter wedding gown!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Perfect length. I'm 5'1" and wore with two inch heels and was perfect floor length. By the end of the night, heels off, dance floor - no issue with an overwhelmingly dragging dress. Easy to dance with. Lots of compliments. Beautiful intricate fabric and back!

This dress fit like it was made for me and that is rare! I'm 5'0 and the regular length was perfect with heels! I loved the weight, the way it hugged my curves, the cutout in the back, the lace pattern. I felt sexy and received compliments all night. I'm seriously considering buying the dress!
Overall the dress was great... except the sleeves were a little on the short side.
This dress fit me perfectly, I was able to zip both zippers by myself, length was great with 3 inch heel (didn't drag but hit the ground perfectly) i would definitely rent again.
This dress was perfect. I'm between a 4 and 6 and the 4 fit the best. The fabric was a little heavier than I thought but it was perfect for the evening. Lots of compliments too!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, heavy and great for a formal
links_reviews_text: I got many compliments. It's has a low back and didn't need to wear a bra. Absolutely stunning.

The dress fit well, but I imagine it would be a squeeze for anyone with a larger chest. I didn't have a bra that would work with it, so that was a challenge. It was also too short to wear with any sort of heels. It barely hit the ground and I'm not that tall. My girlfriends loved it, but my husband thought it looked like a funeral dress so I didn't wear it. The material was thick and warm, and the dress was comfortable. The other reviewers are correct though- unless your a yoga pro, you will need someone to help you zip up the top part. The zipper on the bottom part of the dress I got wouldn't go all the way down, but I was able to get it on over my head. I may rent again but I'd have to go to the long length.

I was so worried the 4R would be too long (like all the other dresses I tried on) but it was PERFECT. I am 5'1" so it's hard to find a good length. This hit the floor just right with 3 inch heels. The sleeves were also a perfect length right to my wrists. I would definitely recommend this dress for shorter girls. I am also pretty busty (34DDD) and it was not too tight at all. Loved this dress!
I rented this for a black tie work event and received so many compliments! The top zipper is tricky so make sure you have someone with you to help.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for a winter black tie event! Elegant and classy, plus super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: True to size. I’m petite but wearing the 4R was the perfect length for both the dress itself and the sleeves. I wore 2.5 inch heels and didn’t trip over it all all. You can wear a regular bra and without it peaking out the back and it was easy to dance in!

This was actually my backup replacement dress but i loved it! It's form fitted and was very flattering. It was a tad short...I'm 5'3 and i had trouble finding shoes that worked. I'm barefoot in the picture and it skimmed the floor nicely.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, easy to wear and flattering
links_reviews_text: I am almost 7 months postpartum and have a tough time with the waist on dresses so this was nice to have the cutout back because I felt it gave more room up front. Got tons of compliments! It's a flattering dress. Easy to wear
I wore this dress for NYE. It's a classic dress and I received a lot of compliments on it.

Though I required help to zip the top of the dress due to the open back, the dress was VERY comfortable and flattering. I got tons of compliments and felt the dress was the right amount of fun while work appropriate. Loved the long sleeves!

Loved this gown. It fit super nicely, was slimming, and cozy for my winter event. I'm only 5'2", wore it with 3" heels, and it was the perfect length. So maybe get a long if you're worried about the length.

I wore this dress to my cousin's wedding. I can't tell you how many compliments I received! The material is definitely a little heavy so best for fall/winter. I couldn't have been happier with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, even better customer service!
links_reviews_text: This was my first pick dress. I ordered an 8L and 10L. I wear size 8 pants but know how formal dresses can be smaller so I thought I might need to wear a 10L. The 8 was perfect. I would definitely say this dress is TTS. Victoria was my stylist and she was SO helpful when my original dress I wanted wasnt available any longer. She sent me some beautiful gowns as backups but I ended up going with this one! Great experience with RTR. I will definitely do this again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a formal event. Received so many compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress! Wish I owned it. Very classy , elegant, well made gown. I would rent again for sure. Was able to wear a regular bra. True to size I normally wear a zero and this fit perfectly snug like I wanted it to.
The fit was excellent. The fabric is extremely structured and supportive. I received tons of compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Winter formal!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress and felt great wearing it! I could have gotten away wearing th 6R, but I went with the 8R more for comfort. My only complaint about this dress was that it arrived with a faulty zipper on the top section. Luckily, I had enough room in the 8 I was able to slip the top section on over my head. Other than that, I absolutely loved everything about this dress! I felt gorgeous and received compliments all night long! Don't let the back cut out scare you! This is a fabulous dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for winter event! LOVED the dress and received LOTS of compliments!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to my work Vhristmas banquet! Received compliments all night. Loved the fit on me with size 0R. Didnt have to wear a bra! And the babies looked great !

This dress was amazing! It fit true to size and the regular was long enough to still touch the floor with 4 inch heels. I got so many compliments all night!!! I truly felt beautiful! It is think material but quality material! I will miss this dress!!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Winter Wedding Dress- comfortable and warm. (Plus- open back, but no special bra needed!)
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for a black tie winter wedding. I wanted to look sophisticated- most long sleeves are borderline matronly, Not this dress! It is form fitted, but comfy. The cut outs on the sides are small enough that you don't have to be rail thin to wear, but big enough so the dress feels sexy. Same for the open back (which is amazing because you can still wear a regular supportive bra!) plus, the laser cut lace allowed for a fun floral vs the traditional lace. I typically do not wear a dress this fitted, but I might be a convert after this. (I'm not a thin girl, don't let the picks fool you- the dress and 4 inch heals made me look like I dropped 10lbs) Received so many compliments all night long : ) Specs- sleeves were perfect length, also not too skinny Size was true- maybe a teeny big, dress is stretchy Length was great for 5'3 and 4 inch heals (dress showed just enough of my shoe and I wasn't tripping on the dress)

links_reviews_title: Perfect for black tie winter wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly, the length (I am short 5'2"), 32D chest but atheletic to slim build. I felt beautiful night. It has great structure and feels like great quality. I recently had my second baby, and was so worried about how this would look and fit and I told my husband I haven't felt this pretty in a very long time. As a back story, I was suppose to rent a different dress but it actually never came. Angelika in customer service helped me when I was in a panic. She was such a life saver!! Best customer service ever!

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning - absolutely gorgeous. Highly recommended if you love the classic look.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a stunner. VERY happy with my choice! I'm also glad that I went up a size, as the fabric is sturdy - not restrictive, but very well made, so not a lot of stretch. Because the top and bottom are attached tightly with the cutouts, I needed the extra "length" in the torso from the 8 to be able to move my shoulders comfortably. Also, because I went up a size, that made the sleeves a little more loose. I kind of liked that look. A little nod to the 80's. The cutout in the back was delicious, yet conservative. The slight mermaid at the bottom was very classy, and definitely formalized the dress a little more. Length was perfect, and RTR consultants had been recommending that I go with L sizes in other gowns (my heels were just 2 1/2 inches). If I could wear this gown every day, I'd actually consider it!

This dress is amazing. Fits to your body, but not so tight that you can't enjoy dinner and move freely. The fabric is nice and heavy - perfect for a chilly December night. No bra required thanks to the thick fabric under the lace. So beautiful - demure, but still sexy.

links_reviews_title: I truly felt like a movie star all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fabulous! It was a little heavy, but perfect weight for this time of year! I received compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: Stunning a-line gown that comfortable hugs your curves!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4, 112lbs, 34B, athletic build. I was nervous about the fit with me being a bit on the muscular size, and knowing there's little to no stretch with lace, but it was amazing and so was the length.

links_reviews_title: it was a formal affair for a charity. such a fun night, with great company.
links_reviews_text: I wore 4 inch heels and it was perfect. also not too tight not too loose. only thing was the sleeves were a tad long but other than that great dress, great fit!

This was my back up dress, which should of been my #1 choice. IT WAS BEYOND what I expected! Top does run small but I'm a 32a and it fit like a glove! I'm 5'5 and wore 4 inch heels and I picked a 4L and it just BARELY touched the floor. It also had a mini train on it which made it that much more gorgeous. I got SEVERAL compliments on it. It is a tad heavy and thick but it was perfect for the black tie November wedding we attended. I wish I didn't have to give it back! Thank you RTR xoxo (this is my first time using RTR and won't be my last!!)

Beautiful beyond words! Pictures don't do this gown justice, the lace on this is incredible! The silhouette is so flattering, and the open back adds just enough sex appeal! I could have worn the 0 or the 2 but the 2 had a little more length. It killed me to send this gown back! Might even rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Fit like it was made just for me!
links_reviews_text: Received this gown when my original selection was unavailable. You will definitely need help getting in/out of this as the top back zipper is difficult to reach on your own. I wore an adhesive strapless bra that worked perfectly with the open back. I'm a 34B, and I don't think this would fit someone with a larger chest. As you can see in my picture the dress is completely black, and the underlay is not nude as it appears to be on the model. I'm 5'8" and wore 3-inch heels; the length was perfect. Overall I was really pleased with this dress! Very comfortable and easy to move around in.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress! Looked and felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It was super comfy, the perfect length (although I did manage to trip going up the stairs), and very unique design. It's not lace, it's a cool digital cutout. The sleeves were a bit narrow and a tad on the short side in my opinion, but overall it was an amazing dress. I love that there's that little peekaboo with the cutout back. I would highly recommend this gown!

links_reviews_title: The open back makes the dress!
links_reviews_text: First, the dress is black lace on black not black on nude, but customer service was great and gave me a heads up about it. The dress is thick and heavy and would be good for a winter wedding. Fitted in the chest for sure, so larger busted ladies might be a little uncomfortable. Had to tuck up the sleeves since they were too long but that was easy enough to do! Don't think I could have danced fully in this and just didn't seem flattering on me so I went with my backup instead (otherwise I would have worn the 4R). Overall, a nice dress (loved the back cutout!) but very dark and heavy and didn't do much for me from the front (where all the photos would be taken from).
Cons: Length is not great. Fell at my ankles.

Classy yet sexy with it fitting every curve and the back cut out. It fit snug which I appreciated because I was able to wear without a bra and felt very supported. Perfect length for 4 inch heels. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this on a cold Chicago evening for a winter wedding. I loved how the thick the material was. Not sure if the sleeves are shorter or my arms are long for it, but the sleeves were more like 3/4 length, which was actually perfect to have a bracelet on that shows. The biggest cons of this dress are the top zipper. It's an awkward zipper that you have to almost go in on an angle to get it to zipper. I couldn't do it once it was on, so I had to start the zipper and then put it over my head, which was a bit of a challenge but doable. Other reviews mentioned that you could wear a regular bra with this, so I did that. Then once I had it on, it showed a bit at the bottom. I didn't want to deal with the zipper again, so I left it and sort of pulled the back of my bra up. Really I could have gone braless because the material is thick. I really liked this dress and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect material for a winter wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved trying this dress, but ultimately decided it wasn't right. The dress is true to size. I have larger arms and the sleeves fit perfectly. My waist is small but my hips are large, so the skirt was loose in waist but was just right in my hips. It was a heavy material with a silky lining underneath. This dress would have been great for an east coast December wedding, but I decided on another dress.

links_reviews_title: Not good for big booties and very heavy
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" 140 lbs 34D chest and a booty. This dress is SO heavy and not very flattering in the front, at least on my curvier body. It zipped but was so tight on my butt and again just didn't think the front was flattering at all. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Don't Mind Me, I Just Feel Like A Queen
links_reviews_text: Where can I even begin with this dress? It's was way more stunning in person than in the photos. The material was soft and silky. Felt superbly expensive!! Wore this dress to my husbands birthday dinner and then out to a speak easy. Each place we went, heads were turning. I elected to wear sandals since there was some walking involved. I'm getting super old and my knees just can't handle walking around in heels anymore (::shame::). Thy being said, had I chosen to wear heels the dress would have still been floor length (and I'm 5'7"!).
Loved the colors in this dress, much prettier in person that I thought it was online. Runs small in the chest and rib cage area, other than that it's true to size.

links_reviews_title: I felt so ethereal in this dress.
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a work event and loved it. Felt amazing and light and I didn't have to wear a bra which was fantastic. Held everything right where it should.

I got complimented a lot on this dress and the fit was very flattering. Unfortunately the neckline was SO ITCHY I could barely stand it. I brought a soft scarf to tuck in to the neckline for relief every time we were away from people. It really kept me from being able to focus on the wedding and having a good time, so I wouldn't rent it again.

I wore this to a gala and selected it because it matched the French theme. I was very comfortable to wear and not tight or binding at all. It's very long, but since I'm 5'10" it was fine for me. The back is lace so I didn't wear a bra which was a little weird for me but the ruffles on the side kept any gaping (side boob) to a minimum,

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with a good fit.
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for a wedding reception. It looked great, a bit tight around the waist for me (but I'm a bit wider there). Didn't need to wear a bra with it, which was the best part! Over all this dress was a huge hit.

This fit well, and the opening in the back was high enough to hide spanx. It was flowy, and not hot, despite the length. The cut was fabulous, and even though the lace neck was a little itchy, it wasn't super annoying.

This dress has an effortlessness to it, to feel comfortable and elegant with little to no effort is a feat. This can be dressed up or down, so I wore with summer wedges and felt comfortable and appropriately dressed at the event. I received lots of compliments on the dress. What you don't see on the website is that detail of the fabric which is beautiful. However, I had to safety pin the neck closed because there was nothing for the clasps to hook into. Even at 5' 10" tall with wedges I was still stepping on it a little so keep that in mind when you order the length.

links_reviews_title: Felt comfortable and confident all day/night!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress, wish I could have kept it. Perfect for a formal summer wedding. Fit perfectly. Neckline was a bit itchy but no other complaints.

This dress was incredible. So beautiful and I got tons of compliments on it. The only con was that the lace neck was a bit itchy, but not enough to seriously bother me. It was veeery long on my 5'9 frame so I wore heels most of the night. Definitely a great rental!
Dress was too long for my 5'6" frame even with exceedingly tall heels. Was perfect every other way. Soft. Packable. And transports easily.

This dress fit well and the fabric was lovely. I am 5'8" and had to wear very tall heels and it was still a bit too long. The back detailing was nice. Perfect for an outdoor charity event but great for an impromptu family photo also. :)
I rented this for a wedding and it fit well and was very pretty. I'd rent it again

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my sister's Barn Wedding.
links_reviews_text: Length was good. Looked cute with sowboy boots. Loved the flowy fabric. The dress would have fir better if it was a true halter. The area around the arms is a little awkward and my chest looked even larger than normal in it unfortunately. It did the job though! The back started to get intchy a couple hours into wearing as well. Lovely colors and still a very pretty dress.

This was a cute dress. Very comfortable and free flowing. The only thing I did not like was the appearance of my arms. Bc of the cut, my arms looked huge. I would rent again, bc of the comfort. I also received a lot of compliments.
maybe because of the size, but this ended up looking super matronly. would not rent again.
I am pregnant and got a 6.. I am usually a 4. I should have ordered an 8! Very pretty dress.
Too long for shorties, you will trip. Shame because it's a gorgeous dress!
This dress was sent to me as a replacement. Thank goodness for this dress! It's flattering and so beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. Gave me a really cute shape.. Received so many compliments. The hook and eye closure around the neck popped open a few times. So you just need to check that it's secure.
Such pretty fabric, and likely a very flattering fit for someone thinner and with a larger chest.

links_reviews_title: Wish it had fit! It's stunning.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress - it was HUGE. It was selected by RTR when a dress I ordered became unavailable. I was skeptical when I looked at the photos but when it arrived I was so disappointed that it didn't fit. It's really beautiful and would have been flattering had it been the correct size. I would say it runs large. It was also very long for my 5'3" frame. I may rent this again (in a 10; they sent me a 14) for a future wedding.

I loved the print on the dress. Nice quality but I did think it was starting to show some signs of wear. Also the class in the back was broken upon receipt. I was still able to close it at the neck though. It is a comfortable dress however after wearing it all day I felt it pulling at my neck and shoulders. Great length, I am 5'7 and I wore a 2.5 niche heel which was absolutely perfect.

links_reviews_title: Tight in ribs and itchy around neck.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress on but it was a little tight in my ribs and the lace around the neck was pretty uncomfortable.
I loved the dress and its flow but the lacy neckline was quite uncomfortable and I decided not to wear it.

Loved the fabric and color. Felt hog quality. Back puckered a bit, as other reviewers mentioned. It was also very long. I ended up using pins and tape to hem for a wedding. Got lots of compliments, but was afraid to trip and tear a hem.

links_reviews_title: didn't wear this dress- was too small
links_reviews_text: didn't wear this dress- was too small

Not for short torso! Loved the dress but the back was a hot mess because I have a short torso. The front was pretty but would've had to really pull some magic with the bra situation and the gaping oversized netting in the back. Disappointed. But the dress is beautiful colors.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up going with this particular dress, because the back of it was too loose fitting.
links_reviews_text: I did not end up going with this particular dress, because the back of it was too loose fitting.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer formal affair!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! True to size. I wore the 2R with 3 inch heals and it was still a little too long. Other than that it was perfect for a summer formal affair.
Beautiful dress. It was too long so I couldn't wear it
If you have any skin sensitivity I do not recommend this dress. The neck piece is lace and it is so itchy. I couldn't wear the dress after five minutes. So sad. Super cute but not worth it.
I wore this dress to an outdoor September wedding. It is very slim fitting, which is why I chose to wear the 2 rather than the 0. It is a fun color!
The dress is beautiful. True to size and hugged all of the curves in all of the right places. I wore a strapless bra and spanx. Beautiful color and would definitely rent again
Loved this for a summer Wedding. Not a lot of give to the dress but very pretty
Loved the color and cut but the dress was extremely tight, luckily I sized up the top was looser but it was tighter in the butt and thighs

LOVED this dress. It fit great and wasn't too long (which is usually a problem for my petit frame). The asymmetrical cut was unique and set me apart from other guests. As long as you wear a strapless bra, you're golden.

Fit perfectly, though you do have to be careful about undergarments, as all lines show. Comfortable for long night. Cannot say enough about how amazing the color was and stood out in a sea of black. (Bending over in photo, when standing up straight, the dress is not bunchy at all)
Loved this dress! Got a lot of compliments.

Great dress and i received tons of compliments . One caveat - the sizing is a bit wonky! I always wear a 6 and I couldn’t get it zipped past my rib cage. Ended up earring the size 8 - which was baggy in the waste and hips - . Overall a beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: Fit super well and great color
links_reviews_text: Not too tight, fit was great.
The dress was a perfect fit and fell just at the knee (I'm 5'0). It was a little tight for dancing but I got so many compliments and the beautiful teal color definitely stood out!

links_reviews_title: I received a ton of compliments when I wore this dress to an outdoor, summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: I was hesitant about this dress because I am unused to anything so form-fitting. But with a foundation garment and strapless bra, it fit like a glove and was very flattering. The fabric is heavy enough to provide a bit of structure, but not hot. The color is bright and fun — I paired it with hot pink earrings. I loved the one-shoulder styling, and the thigh slit added a little bit of pizazz. The only iffy thing was the stitching at the slit — seemed a bit bulky. But overall, a really nice dress!

The fit was very snug so please go up a size! Material was such great quality and thick! Not forgiving on the tummy area so wear your spanx! I had SO many compliments and felt so comfortable in this dress! Pictures do not do it justice! Trust me, you will not want to return it

I absolutely loved this dress!!! The color was beautiful and the fit could not have been better. However, like other reviews I would recommend sizing up for your second size choice because it does run on the smaller side.

I got a ton of compliments in this dress, I believe my new sister in law said “you look the best I’ve ever seen you tonight .. SO PRETTY!!” The color is gorgeous. It definitely runs small, I had to squeeze into a size up from my normal dress size and it definitely required shape wear. The material is nice and thick though so that’s a bonus.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress color (the lighter photo is more true to color)
links_reviews_text: I usually can't wear one-shoulder dresses, but this one fit better than others. I'm usually between a 0 or a 2 depending on the dress, and I think either would have worked for this. I love the slit - just enough to make it easier to move around and dance without being super high

Loved the color/fit/overall look of this dress. It was comfortable all night. I wore the size 10. I couldn't have worn the 8, but the 10 looked better as it wasn't so tight. I'm about 5'6" and around 160 lbs. This was a great wedding guest dress. Highly recommend!

Loved this dress! Beautiful color for a summer wedding. Fit like a glove and was able to dance codmfortablebly. The 6 and 8 fit similar, but the strap on the 8 was more loose so I went with the 6. I received compliments all night. I would rent this dress again without a doubt! I also rented the cuff bracelet shown in this photo. Kept it simple :)

Tighter than I anticipated but still comfortable and flattering. I recommend sizing up. Difficult to wear anything underneath without the outline showing. Received lots of compliments and felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: Super fun color! Fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: Runs small so sizing up is wise. I had some issues with the dress: the lining had come unattached to dress and arrived that way. It hung out of the slit on the leg. I was able to secure it with a small safety pin. The shoulder straps for hanging also weren't on the size 12, but I was ok with it as I think they can get in the way anyway. The dress is tight on a curvy gal but also pretty flattering. I rented fushia earrings as well and it was a great color pop. Those colors together are beautiful! The material is thick but not too thick for beach wedding and it does hide lumps and dimples. I had fun wearing the dress and would rent it again.
Beautiful fit and color. I received many compliments on the dress. Perfect for a spring wedding

links_reviews_title: Dress was very cute. I would rent it again . Perfect for a party
links_reviews_text: #seniorball
The color was perfect for the Hawaiian theme. It fit perfect everywhere. Great quality material and it was not too hot! Got complimented often!
Loved loved loved this dress! I wore a sticky bra but could have gone without one.
I liked the color of this dress, but even for being a bustier girl the top was slightly lose. Needed a safety pin to have it fit.

I rented this for a college gala, but didn't end up wearing it. I really loved the dress and will rent it again for a less conservative event. Beware that the dress is very form fitting. Also the slit on the side is rather high. This is a dress to wear when you want to be noticed. For reference I'm 5'6 and 145lbs.

links_reviews_title: Everybody complimented this dress and asked where it was from! It was a hit!
links_reviews_text: Definitely needs spanx underneath. But overall fit true to size and wouldn't need a bra because of the thick dress material!
Thick material and great quality! Very form fitting.

Fit PERFECT. I wore a strapless bra and a sticky thong (google it) to avoid panty lines. It fit great, looked great and I received a TON of compliments. The color is bright and was perfect for a summer wedding. I chose nude heels to add the illusion of longer legs since the dress didn't come in Petite. I would HIGHLY recommend. Added bonus: I was able to dance the night away, the dress didn't ride up and the slit was perfectly placed for movement.

This dress is a beautiful turquoise color and fits like a glove! I received compliments all night, perfect for a December wedding in Florida. I am usually a size 4 but ended up wearing the backup size 6; I have a booty and found that it was too tight on the 4 so it created lines across the front of the dress. The 6 fit much better, highly recommend!

This was my "backup-backup" dress as my original plan B didn't work out. This is not a dress I would have normally picked out, but a stylist sent this my way and I gave it a shot. Looking at the pictures, I felt like I would look chunky in it, but nope! This dress is shaped beautifully. The fabric has just enough stretch to be comfortable, but is thick enough to conceal all of the things that make me feel uncomfortable. I've had two children so my stomach isn't in the best shape - I'm very self-conscious of that area, and the dress smoothed it out well enough. However, I'm pretty flat-chested at a 34C. This dress would look much nicer on someone with a fuller bust as the shoulder was ever-so-slightly too loose on me. I ended up wearing my first choice dress, but would be happy to wear this one out. I felt like it made my figure look very shapely, feminine, and sexy.
Fit was perfect, super comfortable and easy to dance in

links_reviews_title: The girl in the green dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is so simple yet stands out so much! The color is so stunning and it hugs curves in all the right places. Perfect length. You will be "the girl in the green dress" all night!

I love this dress! I usually wear a 4 and ended up in the 6 since the 4 was a bit too tight, though could have worked if necessary. I have an athletic curvy body and this highlighted everything I wanted it to. I had to use fashion tape to hold up the strapless side since it was a little stretched out. Being able to wear a regular strapless bra was a huge plus. Beautiful dress overall!

links_reviews_title: Nice quality of material for a body con dress.
links_reviews_text: Glad to find this dress for an annual fundraiser gala. It was the same color as the organizations brand color! Prefect! It was a little tight around my thighs and hips and I have to fold up my Spanx on one side to accommodate the slit. Has a nice bit of stretch to the fabric but not so much that it shows thigh dimples and rolls. In fact, I probably could have worn it with other Spanx. Overall, great dress.

I loved the slit and the one shoulder. The fabric made everything look great & I didn't have to wear a bra which is always a plus. I went with the 6 over the 4 so it wouldn't be so tight since I was at a wedding with my boyfriends family, but the 4 was super flattering for an event you want to look a little extra for. Rent this dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove and it made me feel thin and sexy.
links_reviews_text: I wore it at a wedding, it was actually my back up dress but i loved the way it fit on me. I received a lot of compliments and it really did make me feel sexy.
Stunning color, beautiful silhouette. Very tight around the hips though! If the 8 was available I probably would have worn that. Loved it though, would love to rent again!

I rented this for my brothers wedding. I'm typically a 4 but the 6 fit fine. The dress appears to have been in "inventory" given the signs of wear on the fabric (zipper buckled in the back, minor snags) but the event was at night so I'm the only one who noticed. Great rental!

links_reviews_title: Great color, but wouldn’t wear again
links_reviews_text: Compliments galore! But fit was too tight in mid-section and hips. A few issues with the larger size (small tear in hip).

This dress fit like a glove and I felt amazing in it. The color is gorgeous and had the material had the perfect amount of stretch. It was so comfortable. I wore a strapless bra as I felt the strap was just a tad loose on me. The dress seemed to have some wash wear but I would assume it’s because it’s a popular rental!
Loved this dress! So cute, flattering and comfy!
Sexy dress. It's a wrap dress where the skirt does fly help/open up so be careful sitting down and walking.
Wore this during my honeymoon in Thailand. Great breezy dress that doesn't wrinkle, but thee v was very low and nearly showed my boob when sitting down.

I wish the top was tighter, made me nervous for a wardrobe malfunction. The length and skirt fit great though. Beautiful material. Not sure if I would rent again though, tough to keep the top in an appropriate position.
This is one of my favorite rentals! The plunge was pretty deep so it required some finessing with tape and a pin to keep everything in place but it was totally worth it!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite dresses ive ever rented.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! Highlighted all the best aspects of my body. The pattern is beautiful as well. Such a fun summer party dress.
Fit was great flowing and cool even in hot weather . The wrap top was gaping. I pinned it and it was perfect. Felt soft next to my skin even in the heat.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty dress for a party or date
links_reviews_text: This wrap dress fit perfectly and is so comfortable. It's very low cut but is perfectly designed to hide your bra. One side of the dress snaps on the inside (with two options for an adjustable size) and the other ties outside. Loved it! You could dress it up for a cocktail party or down like I did in tights and boots.

I wore this dress all day for my husband's graduation, and got lot of compliments! I had to pin the top from draping open too much, but this is a typical issue for me with wrap dresses. I would definitely rent this one again!

Lovely and unexpected, although a bit big. I'm always a 6 and this had extra fabric in the waist that I would have liked to nip in. Still it was comfortable and very flattering, I loved the way it moved when I walked and the length was awesome. Careful with the skirt as it blows up wildly in wind, also you'll have to pin the top to keep the girls in place! It had a few tiny pulls right at the top front of the dress but it's not noticeable when wearing
I wore this dress for my birthday and would love to own it. It is extremely flattering and just the right length to still be classy.
Very lightweight and thin. Lots of cleavage too. Very pretty but needs some tape to keep everything covered.

I almost didn't wear this dress because i needed a camisole underneath for work (which I generally don't like to do!). So glad I did -- this dress felt amazing on -- it was the first true spring-like day this year and this dress just fit the gorgeousness of the day! This dress was very true to size -- however, be prepared to wear a cami if of a certain bra size and wearing somewhere conservative. Tons of compliments. Dress had such a nice flow to it. Not usually a red or floral dress fan -- but this one was a dream to wear!

links_reviews_title: Flirty and Fun with an incredibly flattering cut
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a girls trip to Miami, and it was absolutely gorgeous - sexy yet classy, flowy and fun!

This dress is fun to wear, I got several complements. Paired it with cornflower blue heels and a black bomber for Saturday classes. Wrap dresses are always a flattering choice but do beware of the wind. If I had been wearing it out instead of to work/class I would have opted for an 8.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed! Runs a bit large. Good for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: I'm so in love with this dress. I rented it with my Unlimited subscription in a size 4 and while I liked it a lot, it kept popping open in the chest and showing my bra. It was also a bit looser in the waist than I would have liked. I exchanged the 4 for the size 2 instead and OH MY GOD I am now totally obsessed. It doesn't pop open in the front anymore and it really accentuates my waist. It's a wrap dress so you can adjust the waist a bit with the tie straps and there are also 2 small buttons on the inside that allow you to loosen/tighten it. The 2 is a little shorter than the 4 but still the perfect mid-thigh length without being inappropriate (and I am 5'11 so I have issues with things being too short) It is really well made and perfect for warm weather. I am really debating buying this dress. Can't wait to wear it again!

links_reviews_title: One of the best wrap dresses!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fact there was a snap inside to hold wrap together . Looked great only problem was I had to pin dress in front in 3 spots cause my bra was showing , don't know if it's not for big boobs or if I should've sized down

Love the bright color Very light weight and very comfortable Runs true to size- the poofy sleeves weren't my favorite wish it was more tank top but it definitely dressed it up which was nice The dress is longer in the back.. at my knee maybe a little longer and shorter in the front which adds a sexy touch Overall good quality summery dress !
The material is high quality. I received a ton of compliments. The cut is low in the front so you need to have the correct undergarments. Wore this for a dinner with friends.

I loved the fabric and print, but this is definitely made for someone less busty. I tried it with a camisole but it just looked weird. I don't have a large chest, but this seems to be a recurring issue with this brand.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Fourth of July party. It was super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: The dress is really comfortable. It was very low cut on me--I couldn't wear a bra. Loved the way it looked and loved how flowy it was.

This dress was a dream wot wear in the humid NYC summer. Wore it to work. A few caveats: the skirt flutters easily in the breeze, so you may need to hold it down when walking outside. It does cling to your legs, so a slip is a good idea. Finally, as others have pointed out, a cami of some kind is essential as the neckline falls quite low. The print is lovely and looks better in person than online, IMO.
I didn't want to take this dress off! Very flattering and light. My only concern was the top, which I had to pin to stay closed. When not pinned, my bra would show.
Loved this dress. It's very flattering. The colors are bold and the ruffles make it softer. Fabric is light perfect for hotter days. Would absolutely rent again.

This dress is extremely low cut, particularly if you have a large chest. That being said, I added a cami for work it all was fine. I found this dress to be super comfortable, very figure flattering and forgiving, and perfect for the start of summer. The print has white, tan, grey, black and hints of green - tons of flexibility with accessories. You can't see it but I went with a green pump!

Loved the print on this dress! It definitely runs large, so I would size down. I wore the 0, and still needed to pin it in the front. Very low cut as well. The fabric is thin and wrinkles easily, but it was a great weight for a warm spring day.

links_reviews_title: Bold color with a very comfortable fit.
links_reviews_text: Low on the chest.

Didn't fit me so my sister wore this! She is 5'2" and a 4 as well with a B/C bust. The waist and lengths were flattering and perfect on her. Did have to add a pin at the bust to keep closed for a more conservative event. Colors were fantastic and ruffles were just feminine enough -- she didn't want to take it off!

I love the pattern on this Sachin and Babi dress. This can be worn with a standard bra, however it does tend to get low in the chest area. It runs a little large so I would consider sizing down for a backup. You can wear this dress to a day event or even transform this to a night out with the right accessories.

links_reviews_title: Rented for my trip to Mexico
links_reviews_text: Wayyyyyyy too low cut for me to comfortably wear but truly beautiful
East to wear. The wrap doesn't overlap much, so it was easy to blow wide open.

links_reviews_title: Worn for day time baby shower
links_reviews_text: It is low cut. Material is silky and so comfortable! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Dress print, material and quality were beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Top was waaaay too small for my 36C chest, rest of it fit perfect overall severely disappointing.
Dress is very cute and fun but also very thin and short. Difficult to prevent the Marilyn Monroe flyaway

Didn't feel comfortable posting a pic because the neckline is so low. If you're ok with showing skin below your sternum you'll be fine with this dress but I felt very uncomfortable. For the right occasion it's perfect but def not for places where you'd want to cover up.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress, the colors were perfect for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: Pros- cute, colorful, nice length. cons- revealing due to the top closure not having enough security. I have a small chest and it was hard to keep it covered.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pattern, a little too revealing for work
links_reviews_text: I really liked the pattern of the dress, it was a gorgeous color. The top was very low cut so a tank underneath was definitely necessary for work (and almost for all occasions). The wrap also was very flattering but can be too revealing if the wind hits the wrong way. I would definitely rent again but only for a summer weekend.

From the minute I put this dress on I felt amazingly sexy. I am 6 months postpartum so that doesn't happen too often. I wore a camisole under the dress because the chest is quite open but it worked perfectly. I styled this with tights and boots so it was great for work and then a date with my husband.

links_reviews_title: Versatile dress that can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: True to size, but expect to layer a camisole underneath. One of the best things about the dress is that the cut of the skirt prevents fly-ups, which was FANTASTIC on the windy day I wore it.

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress, wish it ran a tad truer to size
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and was super excited to wear it on vacation- only negative is it does run a little big- I am petite and an xS which is the size I rented... the dress Ran a tad too big and was so open even when tied in together really tight I couldn't wear it without pinning it together - my whole front and my bra were pretty much hanging out. I didn't have a safety pin with me so unfortunately wasn't able to wear it which is a bummer :(

Fits was great except the side bust was a bit too large so there were areas of the dress with gaping openings. I probably could have had the sides cinched in with safety pins and bought a padded push-up bra to help fill out the extra fabric but the 2nd dress I bought seemed to suit my occasion better. Loved this dress- just wished it fit a little better. Next time I will try a size 4R
True size 8 and easy and elegant! Length was good too with approx 3" heels (and I'm 5'6")--- even OK when I took off my heels at the end of the night.
Great form fitting and I'm 5'3 and was perfect length with heels!

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing!!! Totally not my normal style, but it fit perfectly and i felt gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Pros: fantastic for us ladies with curves and accents them perfectly. Honestly my favorite rental to date Cons: need a little support in the chest area, if you dance too hard or turn, a pop out could happen!

links_reviews_title: Black. Tie. Wedding. Enough to strike fear in any tomboy’s heart. This dress was The Bomb!!
links_reviews_text: Very classy, comfortable*, and super stylish. I blended in with some of the finest dressed people on whom I’ve ever laid eyes ... I’m an 8 top, 10 bottom - but thanks to the forgiving nature of the fabric, a pair of Spanx, and five consecutive days of spin classes, the size 8R fit nearly perfectly. A silk scarf to cover my shoulders and exposed back allowed a smooth transition from a gown respectful of their faith at the church ceremony to a dancing queen at the reception. Loved it!! Wish I could own it!!! *This wedding was an ELEVEN HOUR affair, after-party inclusive. Comfort not to be undervalued in importance!!
The rest of the dress fit perfectly but the bust area was too big for my little girls

Loved the color (deep navy blue), the halter front and partially open back. Cons: I'm 5'5 and with heels it barely touched the floor. Also, have a full bust and had some slouch on the top (front and back) remedied with fashion tape! Pros: Form fitting and flattering shape! Beautiful color with good fabric and overall a very comfortable classy gown. Received a lot of compliments!

Perfect for the gala I attended. The dress was true to size in my opinion. The fabric was forgiving. Good length too- I'm 5'4", wore 3" heels and the dress was just slightly above my toes. I'd recommend this dress/ order again.

links_reviews_title: Great form fitting dress. Wore for a black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: Thicker material but was stretchy so it fit well through the hips. I have a small waist but wide hips so can be hard to find a dress that fits both well but this dress was perfect. Perfect length and loved the neckline and back

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful evening and I felt beautiful in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well except in the chest area. I had to pin it up some. But overall I felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable, easy to move in, and dance proof! I loved every minute of wearing it!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 2 in formal dresses, so I thought the fit was a little more on the large size but the 0 was the perfect fit! The length was not an issue for this 5'3" girl. I wore 4" heels but definitely could have gone with lower heels. The built in bust pads were great for avoiding the dreaded sticky boobs. I will definitely order this dress again in the future if it is available!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! Gorgeous
links_reviews_text: This dress was actually my replacement because of my first dress did not fit at all. They were both the eight regular and 10 regular in the eight fit perfectly. If you want to wear heels though I would recommend getting the lawn because they eat regular was perfect for a link with no heels. This dress is absolutely gorgeous the material is a little thicker which I actually loved because it was February . It is extremely flattering and I got many compliments all night long. You will likely have to wear stick On bar because the back is more low cut where you can wear a regular strapless bra. I absolutely loved this dress and would rent it again for a different formal event! I am 5’8 usual size 6-8

Loved wearing this dress! Also, the customer service from RTR is OUTSTANDING. Fit details: I'm 5'3", 117, average/petite build. Normally 34B, slightly larger at the moment due to nursing. I've got two small children, and I no longer have a flat stomach, so I always look for a dress that is forgiving in the midsection. This dress managed to be flattering by having a substantial weight to the material, and a nice cut. Shows off the areas I'm more confident in (back and shoulders). It's definitely a little bigger in the busy area; I am pretty small-chested and the dress would have fit more securely if I was better endowed! But it worked. Has some support in the chest area (if you're big enough), so no bra is needed. Felt appropriate for a charity gala, but still a tad sexy! Just a tiny bit long with 3" heels. This probably wouldn't work for a very tall person.

links_reviews_title: Best Dress but WAIT until you see the back (I didn't take a photo)
links_reviews_text: Fits very well Nice heavier material so you can go braless easily Gorgeous shade of Navy Blue I wore a 4R with 3 inch heels for comfort

links_reviews_title: The military Christmas party was amazing and I recieved soooo many compliments on this lovely dress!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little large in the breast area
Top was a little loose, so I secured it with some clothing tape on the sides. But the hips/waist fit perfectly!

This was a perfect dress for officiating my friends' winter wedding. It is classy, understated, and sexy. I was getting compliments all night! I typically wear a size 2-4 and was pleasantly surprised that the 2 fit perfectly. I'm 5'8" and it was just a tad short, about 1-2" above the ground in heels, but still looked good and was perfect with pointy flats.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detail! The lines are very flattering/sexy. Many went out of their way to complement me.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and length with heels. Was like made for me. Showstopper
Very classy dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a formal fundraiser.
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning! I received so many compliments. I should have ordered this dress one size larger. I had a bit of a problem with the zipper getting stuck, but overall, no problems!

The dress is beautiful! It did a good job hiding my problem stomach area. I was not able to wear a bra since the back is so open; I literally had to duct tape the girls! It worked fine. The sides were a little loose but I was able to use tape in those areas as well.
Casual elegance. Beautiful back. 5'4 and regular length was perfect. Low cut sides and back so I couldn't wear a bra but it wasn't an issue. Fabric is thick.

I wore this to a hospital fundraiser gala. I ordered the size 2 and 4 and wore the 4. The back was a little big but not terrible. Great thick fabric for cool fall night. Length was great w high heels. Many compliments on the color as it was nice to not be in black.

links_reviews_title: High-quality dress in a modest cut
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect if you want to look nice, but without a ton of cleavage! The back is the best part, and I got compliments from people standing behind me all night! It was comfortable to sit in for long periods of time because of the slight stretch in the fabric. The fabric was good quality and fairly heavy - perfect for a chilly night. It probably wasn't the best dress for my body type, since it was a bit tight around the hips, but it was still lovely!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the outdoor black tie optional wedding I wore it to!
links_reviews_text: Wearing 5” platforms the dress was maybe 1.5” off the ground—perfect length. It was slightly looser through the waist and hips than I expected but I doubt a size smaller would’ve fit. The neckline is beautiful and the barely-there back balanced the high neck beautifully.

Great cut especially for someone with a larger chest. Dress fit a little loose even with the smaller back up dress, but not so loose it was noticeable to others nor was it uncomfortable. I wore 3inch heels and the dress was a perfect fit with them. The dress was comfortable to dance and move in. The material was a little bit thicker which was perfect for a wedding in colder temperature (it snowed the day before the wedding!) The dress was overall beautiful and I received lots of complements on the dress all night long. I would absolutely wear it again (in a smaller size) and recommend it to anyone!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful gown for a Black Tie wedding in Nashville!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a black tie wedding in Nashville and I loved it. It was perfect for something classy and had a great back. I ordered both the 10R and 12R. The 10R had a very hard zipper that took an army to zip up so I ended up wearing the 12R. It was rather big in the side boob and I am a DD cup, but with some tape and structure it held up fine. The length was perfect for heels and I'm 5'4. The material was sturdy and was great for hiding the mid section after a night of festivities. The zipper for both were tough but I've found this to be true with many RTR dresses.

This dress, to me, is a hard to find combination of classy and young. The back was a wonderful touch (of course not seen in this pose). The dress is easily worn braless due to its padding and in-seem stickiness, however, I did use some tape to be on the safe side. It was comfortable and the first time I ever felt confident to wear more of a form fitting silhouette. I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing. I wasn’t ready for the back but it made the dress so much better.
links_reviews_text: The zipper is an issue with this dress. I had to get another dress sent to me because I couldnt get the first one zipped up. It fits so well though and the chest is secure and padded. This is a beautiful dress for a winter event.

Material was great and hit in all the right spots. I wore 2 inch heels and the length was perfect. The back was stunning - got compliments all night! I usually like to have more fun w my dresses than just a dark navy, but it was a December black tie wedding...so the back of the dress really made it special!
I loved this dress. It's comfortable, fit is perfect and the material is high quality. I would rent this classic dress again.

Love this dress! It was simple, classy but sexy from the back. I run between a 0-2 and I ended up wearing the 0 because it fit around my bust better (I don't have the largest bust). This dress hugs your figure past your back side and the flares out for dancing room. The fabric has a little stretch and nothing will snag. The back is really the statement piece but you definitely can't wear a traditional strapless bra. The dress has built in cups.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black tie optional wedding and received a ton of compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Condition of the dress was excellent, both the one I wore and the backup had tags still on! I'm 5'8", 140 lbs, 32C, and the 6R was just slightly too big, I unfortunately ordered my backup dress in an 8, but I think the 4 would've been perfect. I wore flats and the dress was the perfect length, and if I were in tall heels I think it would've been to short. There was some gapping in the bust, but easily solved with a little fashion tape. I really loved the shape and the back of the dress, very flattering. Would definitely rent again for a formal event.
Loved the dressed

I sized down for my backup thanks to previous views and my backup size was perfect. It was form fitting without being too snug. Easy to move and dance in. My absolute favorite part was the back which kicked things up a notch!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear because it was too big
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small, especially in the bust. It has a built in bra, the dress has to be snug for the bra to fit.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress. Ended up wearing the smaller of the 2 as it was pretty loose up top. Worked well!
links_reviews_text: Even as a C/D cup, it was really loose up top, causing me to make the smaller of the 2 work.

I was 5’8” 145lb 36B. This dress was big in the chest and body but far too short. I typically can wear a regular length with flats but not this time. The fabric is heavy which is nice if you are hoping to hide some unflattering parts like myself after a baby.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but runs large in the top
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, but runs large in the top
was too loose in neck/chest and back the rest fit

Rented for a Harvest Moon party, it had a fall-western flair without being over the top!! Nice heavy thick fabric and the zipper was still easy enough to pull. It is super low cut, like, no. way. Would I wear this without a bandeau or some other cover. Otherwise-loved everything about wearing this dress. Bonus-pockets!!!

Wore this for a friend's 40th bday dinner. Lots of compliments, felt beautiful in it. It is very low cut so be ready to use some tape to keep everything secured :-) Only con: dress is heavier than you would think. There are a lot of layers

links_reviews_title: Felt amazing in this dress wine tasting in Napa
links_reviews_text: This is an amazing dress, but I would definitely size down. I normally wear a US size 6 which is a UK 10, and I probably should have gone with a UK 8 as it was a little loose (especially in the chest)

links_reviews_title: Loved this way more than I expected
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress much more than I expected. The fit was flattering and I got a ton of compliments. It was a little large in the bust and I couldn't really wear a bra with it. I also needed help zipping it even though it wasn't tight- there's a lot of fabric that comes together in the back and the zipper can be tricky. I'm keeping it to wear to my own wedding rehearsal dinner bc I loved how it fit and looked once it was on though.

links_reviews_title: I dont think I've ever gotten so many compliments. Felt confident and sexy.
links_reviews_text: The straps were loose so I had to sew them to shorten them but other than that LOVED IT
Wore this dress to a wedding and absolutely loved it..received so many compliments. I liked that it's different and loved the flowly feel of the fabric.

This dress is amazing! It runs a little big. I am normally a 6 or an 8, the 6 (British 10) worked perfectly. The fabric is very high quality, also quite thick. I loved the high/low hem. The top offers adequate support, but there is a bit of cleavage. Very lovely for a wine country trip!
Great formal summer dress
This dress was pretty and I liked the weight of it! It was a little big but definitely still a showstopper. Mightve worked better with a sticky bra. Pockets were a plus.

Literally one of the most incredible, flattering dresses I've ever worn. Both sexy and delicate and extremely well made material. Lower cut in the chest. Could be worn for different occasions, both formal and informal.
Wore this for a wedding - I have big boobs and still needed a special bra to keep it up. Great dress though. Very flattering for white.
It was a very pretty dress. I'm usually a size 8 but they didn't have the 8 or 10 available. This size was a bit big so unfortunately I couldn't wear it.

I didn't end up wearing this dress to the event I was going to because I chose another dress in my shipment, but this one was such a close second. It was stunning on and the material was incredible. Definitely runs small so order atleast one size up since it is Euro sizes.
It fit perfect! Get ready to flaunt it!

links_reviews_title: Ended up going with my backup instead
links_reviews_text: It's runs a bit large and you definitely can't wear this if you are busty. It's a very heavy material- I wasn't expecting that. Too heavy for a hot summer occasion in my opinion. It's pretty but also makes you look bigger because there is soooo much material. So don't rent if you want to flatter your figure. More if you are going for a style/look.

links_reviews_title: Don't want to give back! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress/fit is super flattering. Shows a lot of cleavage, so do not recommend for daytime functions. The fabric is heavier than expected.
I'm a small size 12us (sometimes 10) 31 inch waist and the 12UK fit perfectly. The material is very thick and layered. Good boob support. Not as short as the photo.

Thought I might be able to pin it and pull it off for a work event but definitely not. I'm not shy but the cleavage was out of control. Really bummed because it's gorgeous. It's made for smaller chests though for sure.
Fabric is VERY thick and heavy. Combined with the odd cut, it made me appear way bulkier than I am. I would not recommend this piece if you are trying to accentuate your waist.
Beautiful dress, but it was way too big and I couldn't wear it

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and everyone loved the dress -Strangers even came up to me to tell me how much!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2 and 108lb and the 40 fit perfect - very short but showed off my legs. Glad I ordered both the 38 and 40 as I was unable to zip the side zipper on the 38.

links_reviews_title: 42 was to big 40 ran a bit small but was amazing.
links_reviews_text: See other review amazing dress.
Get ready for compliments! This dress is the most unique dress I have ever rented from RTR. Has a really good structure to it!
This dress was flattering, sexy, stylish, well made, well structured, allowed movement & had gorgeous color.

links_reviews_title: Fit so well friends thought it was custom
links_reviews_text: The material is very high quality! The length was perfect. It was a little tough to sip myself but I did it - and I'm very small on top. So many compliments!

I only gave 4 stars because I had to try several of this dress to find one I could get the zipper to slide past the seam at the waist. Otherwise, very quality dress and lots of compliments! Probably could have gone down to a 40, but for a long day of eating and drinking this fit fine and was comfortable.

This dress was wonderful! I got SO many complements on it. While it is a little short, I still felt like it was appropriate in my 5 foot 4 frame. The zipper makes you feel like it might not fit, but once you get it zipped up you have plenty of room to breathe! I would highly recommend if you're looking for a show stopping dress.

The cute sash bumped my legs as I walked...below the knee. The top was too long for me. The skirt was full and short (even on me) especially because of my rear-end. :) Gorgeous fabric! Would be great on an average height gal with a smaller bottom half. Otherwise, prepare to stay sanding!

This dress was perfect for a night at the theater. Beautiful, unique, and just enough flair! The fabric has zero give, and the zipper gets stuck at the waist seams, so even with room to spare it did take some help getting into it. I wore a strapless bra for my comfort, but probably didn't need to. I am broader through the ribcage, so my back-up size (one size up) was the one I went with. As a shorter woman, the side piece fell lower than I had thought, so I did wear some crazy high heels. Another note is the dress needed to be steamed/pressed after receiving.
Really fun but surprisingly thin and short- would not recommend for teens
Perfect for petite women. At 5'2", it was the perfect length on me
Fit well, unique, beautiful and good quality, craftsmanship and design. Wore it both as a normal everyday dress and to a wedding.

This dress was so unique, fun and flirty. I felt amazing! I received so many compliments at the wedding I attended. The material was luxuriously structured and the colors were extraordinary. I paired it with Navy heels and silver accessories. I felt like Royal Barbie!! I sized up after reading reviews. My normal size wouldn't zip past my rib cage. Its definitely short, but I got used to the draft after awhile and thought it elongated my legs nicely. The only negative is that the top was a little big and the pleats didn't lay right at times. I wore a strapless bra to fill it out a little better, but bustier ladies could totally go without a bra. I can't wait for my next rental!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my best friend's wedding in New Orleans. I received soooo many compliments!
links_reviews_text: For me, it runs true to size in the top. But if you have a big butt, the bottom runs small. I love that this dress is different. But the dress is very short.

links_reviews_title: Fun and Flirty! Definitely an eye catching dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Mardi Gras party (I live in South Louisiana) and had such fun it this dress. It is true to size but even on my 5'0" frame it is short and flirty. This dress will accentuate your waste and show off your legs! So many compliments on it! It's a fun dress totally unlike any others!

links_reviews_title: This dress is EXTRA AF and I love it!
links_reviews_text: The fit runs small. Typically, I'm a size 2, but I had to size up for this dress. The details on the dress are gorgeous and definitely a show stopper. I'm small chested and the poffiness of the chest makes wearing a bra completely uncessary without any self consciousness. One fault with this dress is that it's really short. You literally can't do anything but walk and sit down (carefully). It's good for pictures, but I had to change to my back up dress (which I also loved) in order to comfortably dance all night!

links_reviews_title: I want this dress to dinner for my husband's birthday. And it was so stunning and fancy!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so beautiful and Royal. The back was a little short for me but I wouldn't change a thing. It's a one-of-a-kind piece in my opinion. I would love to see more from this designer.

This dress was so unique and such couture quality that it was my most favorite rental ever! The colors, contrasting silver accents and unusual structure made is an exceptional piece. I had so many compliments on it both times I wore it. I am always on the lookout for "special" occasion pieces and this one was certainly that!

links_reviews_title: So unique and fun. I danced easily all night in it
links_reviews_text: Fit great. It is short so be careful getting out of cars and up from your dinner seat.
I wore this to Hamilton and looooooved it! A bit short/drafty but not scandalous. So luxurious and unique!! The fabric is gorgeous.

I selected this dress for the ceremony portion of a black tie wedding. I wore it to church but caution- it is short in the back if you have a bigger bottom, as it will pull the dress up. The 44 fit just right around my rib cage and back (I typically upsize because as a weightlifter, my back is broad) but was a little big around my breasts. Since it was a one-shoulder dress, this wasn't an issue. The material is excellent and I used the asymmetrical piece almost like a blanket when I was sitting in the church to cover my legs. If you don't mind being conscientious about the back and pulling it down when necessary, it's a great, fun, and unique rental with vibrant colors, textures, and patterns.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress in color, style, fabric and fit.
links_reviews_text: You will get guaranteed compliments on this gorgeous dress. I wore it as "festive cocktail attire" to sing for a special performance. Could not have been happier with every detail of this dress. I'm on the tall side, so it did feel a little short to me, but it looked fine. I'm usually either an 8 (44) or a 10 (46) and the 44 fit beautifully. It was also a plus that it arrived brand new with tags still attached. I'm a little fuller in the bust and the fit there was perfect too. Being a new dress, the folds fell exactly as the designer intended.

All night people stopped me to say it was their favorite outfit of the evening. I'm at my heaviest I've ever been and truly don't feel good right now in anything, but in this dress, I actually felt good

links_reviews_title: This dress is so different and fun. I got so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my high school’s prom as a chaperone. It was a little short, but not inappropriate and ran small because it’s European sizing (I took the next size up). Overall, the dress was awesome. Our them was Midnight in Morocco, so the dress was perfect. I got compliments all night by students and coworkers. Even though it was short, the style and fit were really comfortable. I hope I have another even that I can rent this dress for.
I wore this to an Easter dinner banquet.. I got so many compliments.. I felt like a princess 👸

I got this on the day of an event and LOVED wearing it. They didn't have my size (10) so I grabbed the 12 and it worked! The top was a little big so I wore a padded strapless bra to fill it out (otherwise you don't need a bra). But really this dress was SO FUN and I had people coming up to me asking about it all night.
