It's super flirty and a good length for a short gal like me and the side train was a blast to twirl in. Loved this totally unique dress!!
This dress for perfect and stole the show.

OmG!! This dress is so beautiful!! Pictures don't do justice on how gorgeous this piece is! I have soooooo many compliments and lingering looks when I wore this dress! It was perfect for my Hawaiian romantic dinner at azure in waikiki! The fabric is very light and the design is just wow! Even though it ran short on my backside (I have big butt), I didn't care as it was just stunning! Made my legs look long. It was the perfect dress for the occasion! It didnt wrinkle in my luggage but then again i kept it on the plastic and garment bag. For reference I'm 5'4, 34DD (didn't wear a bra), 28, 38. Fits like a glove!!

Such a gorgeous and unique dress. Came new with the tag on. It is a little short but it was cold so i paired it with black tights. Not sure i would have felt comfortable without tights. For reference i am almost 5'5. I sized up from my usual size 4 because it was italian designer and i have a large bust (dd) but the 6 worked. I loved it! So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Unique style, good quality fabric. Very short
links_reviews_text: Different & unique but short

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, but didn't wear-TOO SHORT!
links_reviews_text: Definitely not a dress for a girl with a curvy booty. You CANNOT bend over in this dress.

links_reviews_title: too short and too small in bust
links_reviews_text: I would order three sizes up

This dress is so unique, I got a ton of compliments. Fits fairly true to size, though I had a little room in the chest which never happens since I'm a 36D. It is also very short! I'm 5'3" and I could barely bend over. It is in good shape except the zipper did stick really bad and I had to really work to get it to go past a certain point.

links_reviews_title: Not a great dress for petites
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this dress to a rehearsal dinner. It looks unique and fun in the pictures, but there was way to much of the thick fabric on my smaller frame. My husband said it looked like a tablecloth... likely a better fit for someone taller and/or broader. The dress does look lux.

Um. This dress was gorgeous and fit everywhere else...except that you could see half of my booty. Standing barefoot. So needless to say, while I am sure some people would have appreciated that...I don't really want to parade my behind all throughout town. This dress would work beautifully for someone much much much shorter.
It was shorter than I thought it would be so I had to be careful bending down...

The fit was true to size. Beautifully made dress. Super chic and unique. Got tons of compliments! I would buy this dress if it wasn't so expensive. Would definitely rent again. Like other reviews, renters beware. This dress is super short. At 4'11", this dress was the perfect length for me but will bare my behind if I bend over even slightly. When I sit, my bare ass will touch the chair. However, it is still a lovely dress and I would buy it if I could afford it. :P

This dress was a hit for a friend's wedding. Fit Perfect. Fun dress for dancing as well. Breast area fit perfect as I am larger up top and the waist was perfect (28-29). Husband loved it. Would rent this again. Love!!!!
This dress is GORG just WAY to short. Walking would've shown a lot never mind dancing!
this dress was so awkward when I was putting it on. I ended up finally getting it in all the right places and just wasn't happy with the fit. There is a lot of fabric and a lot going on.
Great fit. Super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! This is such a comfortable, classy, and beautiful dress for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit great

I wore this dress to a summer wedding, and it was a great choice. The look is elegant without being frumpy, and the color is really pretty! I'm usually in between sizes 4 and 6. Both fit, but I ended up wearing the 6 so I could dance in it. Cons; It's not very forgiving in the tummy area, so I recommend wearing it with Spanx! The zipper is a little tricky, so enlist someone to zip you up.

I was able to wear this work and felt great all day. Normally I wouldn't do lace at my office, but the color helped it feel light and not too sexy. This would be a great date or wedding guest look as well. I found it to fit true to size and found it very comfy and soft. Check out all of my rentals and my outfits on my YouTube Channel, I often talk about RTR-related topics! Channel name: Pointe Boutique.
I rented this for a June wedding. I am 5'10", 145lb, and the size 8 fit perfect. The dress was comfortable and breathable. Overall, I loved the dress and the entire RTR experience!
I love this color and the top is beautiful, but the slip underneath the lace is a little short for work
The dress was perfect for my nieces baptism. I wore a size 8 and it was true to size. It was a classy yet fashionable dress. The color was beautiful! I would definitely recommend this dress!

Perfect for Athletic body. The cut is wonderful and is perfect length. Rented for Easter. The peekaboo bottom makes the dress current and stylish. It looks on point fashion wise, not matronly. Rent this al day long for church, brunches, showers, ladies who lunch. Can wear with jacket to work and then take jacket off for cocktails.
Got so many compliments on this dress! Very comfortable and easy to wear. Runs true to size. I would absolutely buy this dress

This color is gorgeous. I loved the lace, and found the dress surprisingly comfortable. I had to sit in it for several hours. It was stretchy and easy to move around in - also didn't wrinkle or bunch up. It's pretty tight through the lower tummy and hips. I'm usually a 4-6 and needed the 8 in this. I also needed Spanx to keep everything smooth. Totally worth it - a beautiful dress!
Loved this dress! Worn to a wedding and received compliments all night. The zipper was a little tricky around the waistband, but it wasn't an issue. One of my friends even said I should buy this one!

links_reviews_title: Great color, flattered curves. Thought it would be a darker green, but was still very pretty.
links_reviews_text: I had rented this same dress in red for my husband's work Christmas Party in December. We had a Gala that we were going to, and I was very undecided on what dress to rent. Originally, I picked something else but kept reading reviews and knew the dress wasn't for me. I then saw that the same red one came in green. I liked how the red fit, was a good length, but still was conservative enough... so I ordered the same sizes (8 and 6). I ended up still wearing the 8, but had to wear spanx underneath (I didn't before, but have gained some weight). The 6 was OK, but too tight for my stomach area (but did fit better for my boobs). I wore a regular nude bra, and had no issues with being able to move. I'd easily rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect fit, tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Dress was beautiful, fit like a glove and received tons of compliments. Looked like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: I loved it except for the chest part!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty and hugged my body so well! I got lots of compliments at the wedding. My theme was Ariel;) Only part I didn't like was the chest part. Chest cut is very low so all my bras were visible and white/beige tops over my bra looked bad. It was hard for me to figure it out. I ran around shops last minute and thank God! I found a bra (more like a thin stocking like sports bra?)that was very close to my skin tone. And it was perfect.(of course you could see it if you look too close) still glad it worked out and I am happy to find a dress that fit my size! #disneybound

links_reviews_title: Lovely feminine dress for outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for an outdoor wedding on St. Patrick's Day weekend. It was feminine and flattering and the green was such a fun color. Very comfortable. Would rent again!

I had to order this dress 3 times. I run between a 6 and an 8. I started with a 6. It was too small, so I returned for an 8. That was STILL too small, so I ordered an 8. It's a great dress, but order up!!

Fits true to size and is comfortable and easy to wear. The color isn't a true Christmas green but it's not quite as light as some of the stock pics appear. I wore for a holiday party and it was perfect, but it would work for warmer times of year, too. The color stands out in a sea of black and the shape and silhouette is elegant. Tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I rented for a holiday party and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I have odd curves so dress shopping is hard for me but I loved this one!

I did not stop receiving compliments all day/night on this dress! Lovely fit, flattering and comfortable. I highly recommend it, and would rent it again in a heartbeat. I am 5'9" and 150. The 6 fit but was a little tight, so I wore the 8.

This dress is well made and fits nicely. The lace is lightweight and soft and the dress did not feel constricting. The parts at the top and bottom that didn't have lining add a tiny bit of sexiness. This dress went past my knee but that's bc I'm short, and the length was still pretty that way. Got several compliments! Beautiful color too
I loved this dress and got a ton of complements! But if you rent make sure you have some belly support, its not that forgiving below the belly button!
Comfortable and fit so well! Was able to wear a nude, regular bra underneath, hallelujah!

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous, classy and comfortable! I received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 6 and would have ordered the 8 as a back up size, but it was unavailable - so I ordered the 10 instead. I ended up just wearing the 10 since it was so comfortable! I don't tend to wear clothes that are tight fitting, so I was completely happy with a looser fit, however it still fit amazingly well! The dress was in great condition, no flaws, and was absolutely perfect for the occasion. 10/10 and would definitely rent again!
I received so many compliments . I felt it ran a little small, but mostly in the bust so I wore an 8 when I am typically a 6. Would rent this again!
Immediately fell in love with this dress. While I could have gone a size down, I never imagined it would be this comfortable. Conservative enough for a family event, but far from frumpy.

I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat. The material is very comfortable and the dress is easy to walk/move/dance in. I have an athletic build (5'5", 140 pounds) broader shoulders for my size and the 6 fit comfortably. I was able to fit in the 4, but there was just not enough breathing room. I typically wear anywhere from a size 2-6 in dresses. Looked great with nude heels.
Got so many compliments on this dress!! It was also very comfortable!! Totally loved everything about this dress!!
The dress was perfect, extremely comfortable and I wore it for about 6-7 hours. Would totally wear again!!

So many compliments and so comfortable. Fit exactly as it should. Little longer because I am 5'2 but it looked right with the peekaboo lace in the bottom below the knee. Wore strapless bra and could move and feel super comfortable all night. Would definitely rent this style and brand again. Best one yet.
Dress runs true to size. Beautiful dress for a cocktail attire wedding.The fabric is a thick lace. Will need to wear a strapless bra due to the sheer lace on top.

This dress was fantastic! It's a beautiful color, and the fit was very comfortable. The classic style was perfect for a spring wedding filled with my husband's co-workers. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a mint green lacey dream
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It's beautiful and classy - perfect for a wedding. The only con is that it runs a little small and doesn't have any stretch (I'm usually an 8/10 and I had to wear the 12).
Loved the fit, the color, and the overall comfort of this dress. The lace at the collar bent in some strange ways, but overall I loved this dress and got so many compliments on it.
Size 8 fit perfect. I am 5'3" and 160 lbs.

I rented this for my event that I co-chair called Parents Prom. My other option was a gold sparkly dress. I ended up wearing the gold one, but absolutely loved this dress. I will rent again for another function. The color and cut is stunning. It was super comfy and very flattering.
Great color, not skin tight, good length.

links_reviews_title: The stunning color got so many compliments! Perfect for spring/summer events.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit beautifully on my mostly athletic with a few post-baby curves body. I have slightly wider hips and the waist of the dress hit a little higher which gave me more give in the hip area. The lace hides a little bit of a tummy, but it is tighter in that area so I would size up if you are self-conscious in that area. The fabric is a beautiful, bright color. I actually ordered this as a backup dress and ended up wearing it to the event because it was so much prettier in person and on than I thought it would be. I can't figure out how to get my about you section to update so in case you need to compare I wore a size 2, I weigh 125, and I'm 5'6".

links_reviews_title: Perfect St Patrick's Day dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove. The only tiny issues were a zipper that was a little hard to get up and down, & the part of the dress by your stomach is a little looser so those with a larger midsection might want to steer clear. It was the perfect green for St Patrick's Day celebrating and I was able to dance all night in it. I'd rent again for sure.

Great for day to night - wore a blazer and scarf during the day at work, then took off for evening. Beautiful dress, I'm 5'8" and thought this was a great length. One downside is that the lace at the neckline looks a little unfinished. It's intentional, but looks a little ragged. Nice spring color though!
I ordered this dress as my backup, and I'm so glad I did! The other dress was too tight, but this one fit well. So comfortable and easy to dance in! I just loved the color!

There was so much to love about this dress. The back is just low enough to be exciting without having to worry about pantyhose lines at the waist. The bodice has the right amount of sparkle, and the fabric in the skirt held its shape beautifully. Did I mention the pocketsss?! Received many compliments, felt very fancy, highly recommend.

Rented this dress for Fundraiser Event for the Animal Shelter I volunteer for, & receptions of compliments. Felt like a movie star walking the red carpet in this dress. Loved the fit and flare cut as it allowed me to not wear Spanx. The sequin work on the top of the dress was amazing. The sizing notes say to size down as your back up. I carry my weight in my hips & mid section which meant I had to wear a size up for the dress to fit perfectly. Would rent again & would buy if I could afford to.
This dress is so fun! It photographs well and has pockets! I always get so many compliments when I wear it. It has become my go to when I'm not sure what to wear!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress. Perfect fit, loved the big pockets! Very elegant!
links_reviews_text: Very classy and fun too! Perfect for cocktail parties, weddings and more

links_reviews_title: This dress was elegant and flattering.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved the fit - the dress was incredibly flattering for my figure. Snug up top, cinched in a little at my waist, and then flared from there. I was easily able to eat a four course meal and drink quite a few drinks without any discomfort. At the gala we did a lot of sitting and standing, and both were easy to do in this dress. The back was my absolute favorite and really showed off my tattoos. Plus, with my bust size I did not need to wear a bra. Another favorite was that the dress had pockets! I got many compliments that night.

This dress really fit great. It was perfectly snug up top, and puffed out on the bottom which made it really comfortable. I ate, drank, and danced all night long and never felt the need to readjust once. The back of the dress has a nice open "V" to show off some skin, but isn't so deep that I couldn't wear a bra. I just loosened the straps and pulled the strap down an inch. And the pockets were key!!
Very pretty and elegant, and it has pockets! A tiny bit snug around my lower rib cage/upper waist but it worked.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a black tie optional masquerade ball.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, could wear with a low back bra strap adjuster. Loved the pockets - they hold a ton - no purse necessary!
I wore this for a date to The Nutcracker and it was perfect! I loved the pockets and neckline. It was a gorgeous dress and was everything I'd hoped it would be!

links_reviews_title: I felt elegant, but comfortable. Appropriate for being around work colleagues, but chic.
links_reviews_text: I usually fit a small (4), but went up a size to 6. The chest area fit great for a B cup. I did not wear a bra but wore petals. I wore tights and heels like shown in the model photo. I loved the pockets so I didn't have to carry a small bag with me to the event. I was very comfortable and got lots of compliments.

I liked the style of this dress a lot, though I did have trouble with the size at first because the band between the top and the skirt cuts tight under the bust. I was able to stretch it out a bit before the event night, but it was still snug. Luckily the skirt hides flaws that the band may accentuate. I wore my normal size because the size up would have been too big in the bust area. Overall the dress was perfect for feeling glamorous and I loved that it had pockets.

This fit a little tight in my natural waist but otherwise was incredibly comfortable. The pockets were fun and the high-lo hemline was a great added touch. It was fun yet elegant. I continue to look for this dress whenever I have a special occasion.
I loved wearing this dress! It was super comfortable and it has pockets!! I had to wear a bra with a lower strap on the back because it's slightly lower cut and my standard bra kept showing.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress - WITH POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my husband's company's holiday party, and I absolutely loved it. It was comfortable and fun to wear. The low cut of the back of the dress just barely covered my bra - it worked, but next time I'd probably do a stick-on bra instead. Overall, this dress was a win - I'd rent again in a heartbeat!
The dress fit great. Not to long on my short little legs and it has pockets!

I loved this dress! I rented it for my husband's work holiday party. You cannot wear a bra with this dress but I found the top to be thick enough that it didn't bother me. Size wise it was around true to size. I can wear anything from a 2-6 in dresses. My measurements are 32-27-39 so I went with the 4 and 2. The 4 was the perfect fit and the waistband was quite short waisted so it was tight on my lower ribs as it didn't lay on my waist. So I would go up a size in your second size.
Pockets are always a win! Super flattering and comfortable. Perfect length, 5'4".
I am 5 3 160 and fit true to size. Got several compliments on it. Worn to a school fundraiser Gala. Loved the pockets. Only complaint I would have is the sequin rubbed on my arm when dancing.

links_reviews_title: Fit very well lots of compliments. Bra needed to be stuck on front things because of low back

links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, true to size

I'm an size 8 in pants and a 29 waist in jeans and couldn't get the size 10 zipped up. Even if I could, the chest area was way too big. So it runs small in the waist and expects you to have a size 10 chest. I had such high hopes.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit and gorgeous in photographs!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream. I am 6 months post partum and still breast feeding, so my body shape is still a little out of whack. The cut of this dress was so flattering. The pockets were a great touch. The dress photographed beautifully. I would highly recommend!
Felt amazing in the dress, but material had no stretch.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, great fit and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wedding and it was perfect. Got compliments all night long and felt comfortable - bonus that I could even wear a normal bra... and it has pockets!!!
Wore this for an evening event. The extra length in the back made me feel glamorous! And the pockets were a delightful surprise.
Wore this dress to a wedding and got tons of compliments. Loved the pockets!

This dress made me feel gorgeous. It was snug but not too tight to be uncomfortable. I didn't wear a bra and actually loved not having to deal with straps or clasps. The fit was very flattering on me and hid my tummy but made my legs look longer. Will definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect party dress - love this neckline!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this dress. Very flattering and fun to dance in.

Beautiful dress! Great for post baby body. I could have worn the 8, but decided not too. The chest area was a little tight, so I sized up. The sequins was slightly uncomfortable on my inner arm but definitely made the dress fun. I was also able to wear a normal bra.

links_reviews_title: Loved the neckline and the pockets!
links_reviews_text: This dress is great for short girls who don't want to risk renting floor length gowns and don't want to risk getting something too short and inappropriate. The high-low cut is beautiful and is the happy medium solution. Pockets were awesome and the neckline is super flattering for a B cup bust. I liked this dress so much, I rented it for two different occasions!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, elegant - perfect for a classy affair
links_reviews_text: The dress definitely runs small. Do not be fooled! It is tight around the waist with no give, I definitely had to be careful about how much food to eat. I am normally a size 2. I weigh 112 lbs, 4'11" 36A, wear a 2P, 26-27 in pants. I usually ordered a size 0 or 2 in dresses. This dress I could have worn in a 6. The 2 was super tight around the waist, and the 4 was only a little bit looser, which made me think I could have gone up higher. I did not wear a bra with the dress, which was fine. The dress is gorgeous, I felt so confident in it all night, nice material, wore it to a summer wedding in a heat wave and was fine walking outside, it's breathable, but I could see this being a great winter dress, too. Unless you have the tiniest waist and never have to worry about fitting in the belly, my advice is order a size up as your small size, and then go one size even higher as the back up.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a wedding in CA.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly. Loved the pockets

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel confident and beautiful all night & got compliments from everyone !
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight underneath the bust area over all it felt comfortable

I absolutely loved this dress! I've rented it twice for two different weddings and both times I got tons of compliments. The dress is super flattering and has pockets, which is always a plus. For reference, I'm 5'2 with a large chest and thought the fit of this dress was amazing. I wore a braza sticky backless bra and had no issues. Would definitely recommend for a formal event!
Slightly tight at the waist as I go between a 6 and 8. Loved having the deep pockets. Bra seemed to show just when I was sitting down.

links_reviews_title: Amazing band, dancing all night, & never had to worry about my things because this dress has pockets
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little small for large bust. Go up a size if you’re larger busted. That made it a little large on the shoulders, but using a strapless bra or tape would make it just fine.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful dress. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: 18 was my back up size and I am so glad I had it. I fit in the 16 fine, but the arm holes were definitely too small & the sequence rubbed me a lot. The 18 was a bit big, but it was super nice to have the extra room to move around easily throughout the whole evening, even after eating. I loved the pockets and the angle of the bottom of the dress. I would highly recommend.

I absolutely LOVED this dress! I'm 4'10" and I usually wear a petite 0-2 so I ordered the 0 and a 2 as my backup size. Unfortunately, the 0 was unavailable to ship so the RTR stylist sent me the 0 in red but my event had a specific color theme so I didn't even try it on. Although the size 2 fit perfectly, I ended up going with another dress as this one wasn't dressy enough for my event. I enjoyed the fact the fact that the hi-low style fit my short stature perfectly and can we talk about the pockets??? GENIUS! I loved that aspect of the dress! I felt that it made my hips look a little bigger than I would've liked but everyone who saw me try it on said it looked great and I was comfortable in it and that's what mattered. I hope I have another event that will give me the opportunity to rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: A special formal event on the National Mall in DC
links_reviews_text: I was carrying about 10 pounds extra so my regular dresses didn't fit and I didn't have time to shop so it was fortunate I ran across Rent the Runway. I ordered an 8 and a 10 and ended up wearing the 10. It seemed pricey but it worked. I received many compliments on this dress! It is definitely a formal, yet fun, look. If you are nearly 60 like me and thick in the waist, go up a size. This dress is tight there, but it has plenty of room above and below that.
Really enjoyed this dress :) super flattering and classy - a great choice for my formal charity event I attended ! The sequins didn't itch, either.

links_reviews_title: The fit of this dress was very flattering and perfect for all the dancing at a friends wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size.

Wore this dress to attend a show in Vegas. Loved the middle cut out covered by lacey fabric. The zipper was a little tough to pull up over the seams but managed. I knocked off a star because where the transparent mesh and fabric met didn't lay flush; it poked up a little bit. Otherwise it's a great dress! Loved the purple color. You can easily wear a strapless bra. Be careful wearing bracelets with this dress - mine got caught a couple times on the lace. It does run a bit small; usually I'm a 4 but went with a 6 (was my second style so had to choose carefully as there was no backup option) after reading the other reviews.
Fit great, good length, comfortable to sit in, did wear a bra, but could wear without!
The dress color is more of a purple hue, very vibrant - I got a lot of compliments on the dress! Perfect for a beach/formal wedding! The size 4 didn't fit my bust so I went with the size 6
Loved this dress! The color is beautiful - more purple than the photo looks. Perfect for an end-of-summer wedding!
This was a knock out! Fit great, awesome color.. stunning! I was worried about the sheer bit around the stomach but it was hardly noticeable.

A tasteful yet still fun dress for a wedding. Definitely way more purple than pink (as shown in the photo) but still a beautiful color, and I loved it. My one criticism is that the zipper on the dress was not very strong and even though the size 8 fit me, my husband had a lot of trouble zipping it up. I'm 5'2" and the 8 came to just above my knees. Not a lot of stretch but I could still sit, move, and dance with no problem.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love, but sizing is off
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress and I wanted to love it, but it runs very small in the bottom. I'm usually a 2-4 in dresses and have a curvier hips/butt. I had to get the 6 in this dress and it was too big in the waist and top and not flattering. I only wore it because I didn't have another option for back to back weddings over Labor Day weekend. Great dress if you don't have hips/butt.
I got really lucky it fit really well and was a hit!

This was a nice dress. Wasn't my favorite but wasn't bad either! I got a lot of compliments on the color. The sheer midsection is not very noticeable, wish it was more! Thicker material so not great if you have an outdoor or warm event. Was able to wear a regular bra, just had to tuck the straps a bit.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, feminine, perfect for various occasions
links_reviews_text: I struggle finding a good fit for my athletic body (lift weights, have muscles and wider back) but this dress was perfect. It doesn't stretch but fit well. I don't have hips but do have a booty so it fit my lower body and my back! 5'4" 125 if that helps. I wear a 0 or 2 in most department/big chain store sizes.
It is DEFINITELY purple in person, but pink in the photos advertised so that was a bit disappointing. Still a vibrant color and flattering fit. Fun to wear and got compliments.

This dress was true to size. It was a little warm for a hot humid July wedding due to the satin lining and thicker lace, but it was so beautiful and I got a lot of compliments. The color is perfect and stands out just enough. I would definitely recommend this dress. There is mesh under the lace cutouts so it doesn't really show skin that much as well.

This was a fun dress to wear! I loved the color and the middle cutout was cute, but still tasteful for a wedding. I wore a strapless bra with it and had no issues. It doesn't have much stretch to it, but I was still able to dance my heart out at the reception. I would rent it again!
The fit of the dress is perfect. You can wear it with strapless or without a bra. Thicker material and lovely detail on the lace. Personally I love this designer..

links_reviews_title: Loved! If between sizes, size up
links_reviews_text: Looooved this dress and wanted to keep it. Loved the color and the fit. I was in between sizes and the size up is what I decided to wear. I'm wearing size 14. I'm 165 pounds, 5'6. Bust - 39" Waist -35" Hips - 40" for reference. One thing to note, the zipper was a BUGGER to get up and down alone....I was a little nervous I wouldn't be able to get it on/off alone without breaking it so if you don't have someone at home to help you, it's something to consider.

Dresses usually are too short on my but this one was the perfect length! I was able to wear a purple bra underneath and not have it show (with straps). Such a great dress. So comfortable. So many compliments. And a color that no one else will be wearing!

links_reviews_title: RTR going above an beyond to ensure I had a dress for my event!
links_reviews_text: Rent the Runway went above and beyond and sent me a new dress to the hotel I was traveling too, because UPS never arrived with the first dress I had rented.
I am typically a 6, the 8 fit but I would honestly have preferred a 10!
Loved how this dress fit. Had enough room to dance and didn't ride up or anything!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful style and color! More purple than pink.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a wedding. I’m a 6 and the 6 fit perfectly. I have a straighter/athletic frame and this dress fit like a glove. I would not recommend for curvier ladies. The lace is gorgeous but does not have any stretch or give. The hips were very snug. The color is closer to purple than the photo of the model suggests. Great dress!

This dress was perfection. It has just enough stretch so I could move and sit with ease but looked structured. I wore it for my daughter's Communion and received so many compliments on it. I'm 5'0" and the length was perfect for me.

Such a pretty color and the fit was good enough, but the shading ending up being a little awkward, and made me look super pregnant. Granted, this is a horrible photo (my husband is the worst at photos) but it shows how the light can play off the dress causing you to look less than attractive. Pretty dress, good fit, but just ended up being a little underwhelming. If you want a show stopper, look elsewhere.
Loved how simple this dress was. Easy to dance in, normal bra, plenty of texture and fun color so accessories aren't really necessary. Great length and stretch.

I wore this for my best friend's beach wedding and I loved it! I got so many compliments and felt beautiful and confident. I normally wear a 10, but I wore the 12 in this because I didn't want to be uncomfortable as the night went on. I loved the lace detailing, and it didn't accentuate problem areas. The few cutouts were tasteful and just made the dress really beautiful. I'd definitely rent this again!
Just what I needed for a party. This dress fit exactly as expected and looked great. Zipper is a little sticky - I needed help.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and fit. Lace detail was beautiful as well
links_reviews_text: Zipper was a little difficult to work but everything else was gorgeous. Lace and sheer was perfect placed. Got a lot of compliments and might buy! Fit was fantastic!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress & figure flattering as long as you are not TOO curvy
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress & figure flattering as long as your are not TOO curvy -if you want to look like the model on the website. Dress is good for many age groups and if you are in decent shape a senior can wear it without looking like she is trying to dress too young. I am 5'2" and 112 pounds and felt I was a little curvy in waist and hips for the dress. Dress is appropriate for girls in their 20's if they do not want to wear something too revealing. The size 4 was more comfortable, however since I am petite (5'2") it was too long in the torso causing the back zipper to buckle - I was able to pull the dress up by the shoulders about 1 inch. The size 2 fit fine in torso but was tight but wearable. Since I could not wear the size 4 and another dress I rented was way too small (they did not have my usual size 4), I had no other options except to wear the size 2 purple dress.

links_reviews_title: Felt super sexy in this dress
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. I wore the bigger size because it felt a little more comfortable to me. It fit well and was very flattering. I had control top stockings on but no spanx. The color was more purple than it looks online but it was still really nice. I wore it to a Saturday night spring wedding.

I wore this to a fundraiser. I received a lot of compliments. It was fun, bright, very pretty and elegant, even with the cutouts. The cutouts were not too revealing because the lace was thick enough to give coverage
Good option for a summer wedding! Nice details and easy to wear and dance in.
This dress was okay for me. The color was great but it fit weird. I think it was too big in the waist and hips.
Loved this dress! I usually wear a size 4 but opted for the size 6 for a better fit. I am 5'9" and the length was perfect. Comfortable for dancing all night.

Not a lot of give in the fabric but comfortable to dance all night long. While the dress was tight the slip underneath was not, so you can see it bunched a bit. Was able to wear a normal bra underneath, but wasn't necessary. The dress was really pretty and perfect for a wedding, but wasn't the standout dress I'm used to from RTR.
Rented this as a backup dress for a wedding and didn't end up wearing it because it was TIGHT. I still think it's a gorgeous dress though, the color is amazing.

I enjoyed wearing this dress. I did have to order a size up to he comfortable, but I could have squeezed into my regular 6 if I had to. It's very flattering on (well, in my opinion) and has beautiful detail. I wore to a cocktail party wedding "welcome" party.

links_reviews_title: A little tight on the bottom for me but still perfect!
links_reviews_text: I have a smaller chest and athletic lower body so it was snugger in the chest area. It definitely was tighter than I preferred but was still able tot dance the whole night and I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit a little snug so I had to go up a size. I loved the color and felt very elegant in it!

This was my first rental and I was very happy! I rented the dresses for Wed-Sat and was expecting them to arrive Wed but they came a whole week earlier than expected so there was plenty of time to find the right accessories and make sure everything fit which was great! I ordered a 4 but got a backup size 6 and ended up wearing the 6 because it fit perfectly. The color looks very pink on the website but is a much richer jewel toned raspberry, it’s much prettier in person! No issues with being stretched out from being previously worn. There is not much stretch in the lace but overall very comfortable. I would rent this dress again, I felt very pretty and got several compliments.
I usually wear a size 6, but in this dress the size 8 fit perfectly. Lots of compliments when out for an anniversary dinner date!
Dress ran large. Looked like a sack. I wasn't able to wear it for work.

links_reviews_title: Didn't like the cut of the neckline
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well, but I didn't like the slanted cut for the neckline for work. I'd prefer something more conservative for work. I wore it once with a blazer and have sent it back for a swap. It worked well for a 29 week belly though!
Flattering!
This was the perfect work dress for my last trimester. It is flattering, comfortable, and professional. I am up 25 pounds at 35 weeks and still felt good in this dress. RENT!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect curve huggin fit for me!!!!
links_reviews_text: Im short and curvy. To find this and it fit some perfectly is a miracle! The zipper is tough but everything else is so perfect. I would purchase this but I'm not ready to spend 200.00 on something so seasonal.
Beautiful color and detail. Tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Structured just right. Fit and flare.
links_reviews_text: Great color
I liked this dress, but it was my lease favorite Draper James dress I've worn. It was a little snug in the stomach for me. I probably won't rent again.
I think the cut of this dress is perfect. I am slightly hourglass with a smaller upper body. If you like the look of it - rent it! Quality piece.
I found the dress sort of stiff and hard to move in, even though it was definitely the right size for me. Not really that flattering.

The fit was true to size if not a little snug through the chest. It was very flattering on as it hugged through the waist. I wore it to work a couple of times and received compliments on it each time especially the color.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for the right coloring
links_reviews_text: It has been raining nonstop this summer so I am a little too pasty to pull off this coloring at the moment. The dress was also a little too snug around the rib cage.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but some fit issues
links_reviews_text: I loved the idea of this dress. It's a great length for tall women. The color is a little closer to neon pink than it appeared in the photo, but still very cute. My concern, and the reason I returned it without wearing it, is that the fabric in the midsection is oddly tight and not at all flattering.

I typically go with size 6 for most of my rentals, but gambled and chose a 4 for this because it looked a little loose on the model. It fit perfectly, so if you bounce between sizes, go with the smaller one, unless you're larger up top than I am.
this is a cute dress that can go to office, happy hour or casual party. if you're "curvy" I recommend ordering a size up as the lower section is definitely form-fitting.
This is a really cute and well-made, detailed dress for everyday events, like brunches or lazy lunches. Fits true to size and is no fuss or muss. Received many compliments on the color and design.
Too tight

This is a beautiful dress. I loved the color, and lines. I ended up not wearing it though because I am 11wks postpartum and didn't feel totally comfortable in how it fit my body. I would rent it again when my body feels back to my normal.
Loved this dress, comfortable and classy!

links_reviews_title: The way my husband dances with me even though he claims to never dance!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, and yet comfortable.
I rented it for my bridal shower and got tons of compliments. Stunning and surprisingly comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Very appropriate for a formal work banquet. Right combo of professional, classy, haute couture, sexy
links_reviews_text: I am about 32" at the bust and 39" at the waist, so I often find something that fits up top and is just way too tight across the hips. This was absolutely perfect - I didn't even take the backup size 4 out - it might have worked but I felt great in the 6. The length is great, too, right around the knees. When I attend work events I prefer that it's not too short, especially where I'll be sitting at a dinner for a large portion of the night. Now, when you sit, the buttons on the side slit will separate and your skin will show. And when you're sitting, that's like up over where your underwear is. I think it's discrete enough that the man next to me didn't notice...and frankly I wasn't too worried about it. But just know that happens. Actually like a hidden sexiness feature of the dress.

I received so many compliments on this dress. It was fun to wear and I felt very professional and sophisticated during the entire day. A button popped off on the front unexpectedly right before I was to go on stage. My colleague figured out how to fix that issue right on the spot! I would recommend this dress to anyone who will be at a work event and would like to add a touch of sophistication to your wardrobe!

links_reviews_title: Standout in a sea of black dresses!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work social function that required a conservative, classy dress. I received so many compliments on the color, cut, and style. I normally wear an 8/10 and since the 6 also fit me, I think it runs just slightly big. I'm 5'6" and the hem hit just below the knee, which was perfect. I loved the fact that the dress met conservative protocol and so classy, yet stylish and accentuated curves nicely! Overall, the dress was beautiful and perfect for the function!
Fit like a glove. I had to take it up because I was only wearing kitten heels.

Rented this for the New York Stock Exchange closing bell ceremony. The red looked fabulous! I got so many compliments about how flattering and appropriate the dress was! Fit PERFECTLY! Would buy the dress and wear it again! It has been my favorite dress I have rented this far!!

links_reviews_title: Most complements ever received on a dress.
links_reviews_text: I wore this at my company conference and had to go on stage. I work for a pretty large company and every single person I talked to complemented this dress. I was getting complements days later! This was the most flattering/beautiful dress I've worn and I feel like the picture doesn't even do it justice. 10/10 would rent again and would buy if it weren't $1000! In love with this dress.
Beautiful fit! I'm 145, 34D, 5'6" and this red dress was the bomb. It was a perfect length for work, right at the knees, snug but not too tight around the middle. I had compliments all day long!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit and sexy button details on the side split.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, a little "showey" when seated due to the slit up to top of thigh.

links_reviews_title: This dress is fabulous! It fit perfectly and was stunning!,
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for slim body. The sleeves and detailing are lovely. Very comfortable

links_reviews_title: I've dress. Very professional. Great length.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a formal work event. Fits wonderful yet thick enough to not show panty or bra lines.

links_reviews_title: So elegant and gorgeous! Lots of compliments!! Very classy but also subtly sexy. Will rent again!!
links_reviews_text: I may just buy this dress. Love it!!!
Fits like a glove and somehow hides all the bumps without being tight. Super sexy and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and fit. Timeless style. It was about one inch too short for my 5'3" height, but higher heels took care of that. This is perfect for work events and presentations. It is wearable year round. Do not hesitate to rent this one.
Loved it from the waist up. But it was too long on me and the buttons on the skirt dressed it down.

links_reviews_title: Chic and sleek, but slit caused some trouble
links_reviews_text: Oh goodness - I wanted to love this dress. And, based off photos and the model, I assumed I would. BUT what I didn't realize (I guess didn't look at others' reviews closely enough) was that, if you've got some thicker thighs, it goes from a potential peek of skin to a VERY high slit. I ended up wearing this dress with a pair of black leggings under, and getting heaps of compliments, but I would NOT have felt appropriate wearing in the office without a second layer. And I am confident that, even if my legs were twiggier, when I sat down the slit would've been DANGEROUS. Loved the sleeves, loved the body, and the length!
This dress is Jackie-O meets Gwen Stefani! Tons of compliments! Only trouble is the buttoned slit in the front is show through, so if looking for more professional must wear a skip.
Larger than expected, not as flattering
I couldnt wear it - too small

I wore this to work and it brightened my day. It was a great material with an amazing fit. The sleeves were fun and very on-trend, I'm seeing these flutter sleeves pop up everywhere. The only downside was the buttons, which gapped a little when sitting. However, considering the length of the dress, it was never really a problem.

The fit is amazing and hugs the curves in all the right spots. I wanted something a little "extra" for a work conference and this was perfect. The sleeves were perfect and the dress was incredibly flattering.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress with lovely sleeves.
links_reviews_text: I agree with prior reviews which suggest that smoothing garments do help it look it's best. I also feel it runs a bit small in the bust relative to the hips. It has a nice modest length. Perfect of my parent's 50th wedding anniversary.
well constructed
I wore this dress for my son's Bar-Mitzvah and it was stunning! Everyone loved it. It is very fitted though. Shows the belly, even with Spanx. You have to be fit and very thin to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for after work event
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. The only con is that it wrinkles easily.
Fit beautifully, very flattering. Received many compliments.

The sleeves of this dress are much larger they appear in this picture. I had thought I could wear it to work, but the size of them made them not very functional. I think it also helps if you are tall. I'm 5'6'' and while length didn't appear too long, it hit just below my knee, I thought a taller person would be better with the cut of the sleeves.

This is a great head-turning dress. It's different enough that people notice it, subtle but sexy - I got compliments everywhere. I feel it runs a little big on my frame, and if I had known that I would have gotten the 0 instead. Overall comfortable, flattering and a statement piece that will get you noticed (and not just because it's bright red).

Loved this one: cool asymmetrical dress, very tight, a bit too long on me but for someone a few inches taller it would be perfect. Caveat: consider starting 2 minutes earlier to figure out where the head goes ;)
Wore this dress to work with black tights as it would have been too short without it. Fits true to size and hugs you on all the right places...beutiful detail on the neck!

Loved the fit, the flare and the sexiness all wrapped up in this cute girl dress. My first time renting from Rent the Runway and I was PLEASED!!!! I rented three dresses for the event, not sure which would fit. And was so pleased this one worked.

Had a little RTR surprise party for a friend who deserved a bit of cheering up and celebration- that is what I rented this dress for! Neck hole was very small but. Not impossible. Overall fit was fine (very stretchy) but this designer tend to run small imo. Styled with a yellow floral RM crossbody bag and yellow manolo blahnik pumps.
Was too tight at top

links_reviews_title: Strangulation by dress: Neck is so small I was choking and couln't get my head out of it.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress a bit larger than I wear. The neck (turtleneck) is so tight I started choking and could not get it off. I considered getting a pair of scissors and cutting my way out of it. The neck opening is not big enough for my arm to get through it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear. Cute but weird shape on my body
links_reviews_text: It was a cute LBD. I just wanted something a little snazzier
I didn't end up wearing this because it was short and flared out too much. Too cute for my taste. I am 5'7 and felt it was more appropriate for someone a bit shorter

links_reviews_title: The dress is super comfortable and flattering. Very elegant and pretty.
links_reviews_text: The top was a little big but everything else fit very well. It is soooooo comfortable.
I wore this to my husband's black-tie Christmas party and loved it. It was a great twist on a LBD! It was comfortable enough to dance and mingle in all night.
Great dress

Fits true to size. It looks a little boring online, but I took a chance and happy I did. The fabric is thick and stretchy with a lot of structure at the bottom hem. The design at the neck is flattering. I wore this to the office with a blazer and out to dinners as well.
This dress was really cool and high quality but the cut of the skirt was not flattering on me so i ultimately did not wear it
SKIP

Unfortunately this dress was shipped to me on pants hangers which damaged the delicate sweater material and made it unwearable. The style is really fun! Would have loved to wear it. If you're between a medium and a large go up a size!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing but loved
links_reviews_text: Fit nicely would work best with spanx
Perfect fit. The neck is different. Good stretch and thick material
Cute and unusual.
The fit was good, however, too short for me.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately, this dress did not arrive at all.
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, this dress did not arrive at all, nor did my other order. I was vacationing and did not pack enough and spent too much time on the phone, emailing, and chatting with Fed Ex and RtR. This is not the first time this has happened. Just a word of warning. RtR did credit my account, though.
This looks super long on the model, but it is not. It comes 2-3 inches above my knees and I am only 5'6. It is such a showstopper for being a simple dress. Absolute perfection!
beautiful and unique neckline. pretty floral print with fun pops of bold color. fitted but forgiving.

The dress is comfortable, can be worn without a bra if you are C cup or less, and can be worn "backwards," as others have noted. But the hemline is odd. I’m not sure why, but there is a square piece that hangs down in front and back, and looks unattractive. I took a photo with an exaggerated stance to demo. It's noticeable when you walk, because the dress has ruffles with contrasting stitching at the bottom. It's not a deal-breaker, but something to be aware of.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for an outdoor ceremony and indoor reception.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size yet had room for comfort. I didn't have to suck anything in! Tons of compliments throughout the evening. The asymmetrical hemline was fun and the neckline very flattering. Lined, breathable, no bra needed, though a strapless would be fine.
This silky fabric is so soft and comfortable. I belted the dress for more of a form fit, but it is also beautiful and comfortable without a belt. The swing of the dress makes it very fun for dancing.

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress for an outdoor summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! I had a hard time finding a dress for my brother’s wedding in May. I tried on dozens, no joke, but all seemed to fall short. So I decided to try rent the runway and picked out this dress. I couldn’t have been happier with the style, quality and fit; the silhouette is forgiving, so easy to wear in whatever size you are. Highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Fun Dress for a Spring Wedding!
links_reviews_text: I liked that it was conservative enough for a wedding and also flowy enough to be comfortable at the outdoor venue and for dancing.
I sized down in this per others' recommendations and it fit perfectly. It was so comfortable. Perfect for an outdoor wedding. Wore with black heels and silver/gold earrings

The satin-like fabric and varied, ruffled hemline made this dress extra special. I received lots of compliments at the vineyard wedding I attended. I wish RTR had included the belt, though, as I think a little more definition might have been nice. Still, it was comfortable and fun to swing in on the dance floor.
I wore it with the belt, but it made to look loose & unpretentious , rich fabric, don't wrinkles, interesting bottom angles, loved it! High heels must!

I love this summer dress by Derek Lam 10 Crosby! Running true to size , I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going down for your back up. This style is loose fitted in and gives you a summer look for any occasion. It works best for all cup sizes and can be worn with a strapless . At 5’2”, the length stops me at tea length and with beige or black color pair of heels and with a nice clutch this will complete your outfit!

This is a $700 dress and it shows, great quality. Beautiful fabric and tailoring. Comfortable. Unique. Good for tall. Images of this dress retail all show it comes with a matching fabric belt. I liked it without though (mine didn't come with belt and it didn't have any belt loops).
Ended up buying this dress for a great price because I enjoy wearing it alone or under a sweater !
Quality of silk was great. It draped beautifully and got lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: I was looking for a dress that was fitted at the top and flowy at the bottom—this dress was it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and flattering. I'm smaller up top and I have hips and I didn't want something too form fitting. It's 100% silk, very well made. It supposedly comes with a tie belt (which I would have liked to at least try, not sure if I would have worn it) but mine didn't. I wore a strapless bra (I wanted the coverage) but I could have gone braless. Rent this dress if you want something that's comfortable, slightly boho, and really fun.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Perfect for summer wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great and hid my flaws. Was very comfortable and flattering. I'm short and had to wear flat sandals because of the venue and the length still worked.
Great dress. Very flowy.

I wore this on a cold evening to go to a concert, then walked around the town afterward to get a drink. I thought it made me look so elegant. It was a fairly cold night (3°C/37.4°F), I wore a warm jacket so I didn't feel too cold in this dress. I think it'll work better for more formal occasions, rather than just a night out, but I thought it worked perfectly for the concert.
The fabric and pattern are beautiful, but I'm a 28" waist and couldn't get the size 4 zipped. Will size up.

This was a nice dress. Ultimately I did not wear it because I found something I liked better, but it would have worked for a wedding or formal affair. Pros: can wear strapless bra, cute cut/detail Cons: not totally flattering since it's a baggier fit
I wore to a charity event and was very comfortable the whole night. It's flattering but also has room. I'm pretty tall so if you're shorter the length might be too long.
loose fit

Really beautiful dress - great, high quality fabric, pretty print, cool details with the hemline. Had planned to wear to a wedding but wound up wearing to a polo match with sandals and belt. Easily transitioned to a more elevated casual look.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress it did not look good
links_reviews_text: did not hang right despite being right size

This is a flattering dress and well-made. Beware that it is long. I wore it on the beach on vacation for dinners out. I was able to wear it with flats but just barely. I am 5'7" and I had to hike it up at times to avoid the surf and to go up and down stairs. I would recommend wearing with heels.
NICE FABRIC, WELL MADE. CUTE NECKLINE.

This was an unlikely fall rental that ended up being perfect. I checked the SF location for a good black dress for this party and this was the best I found. Pro: very comfortable for a food centered event, asymmetry of hemline was fun and chic, bra was optional (strapless); print was beautiful and silk had an interesting texture No cons I styled 2 ways: 1- with neon yellow pumps and matching clutch; 2- with black wedge heels and a black satchel

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress as a back up for a baby shower. I didn't end up wearing it but it is gorgeous
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and fabric is beautiful.
I received a lot of compliments on this dress! Perfect fit and definitely hides body imperfections! Love the neckline. I would rent this again!
This dress is perfect. Well made, beautiful, and really comfortable.

This dress is loose and flowy. It would have been perfect for a vacation dress for a nice dinner out. But, alas I am not on vacation! So, I sent back without wearing. Not appropriate for work, weekend out, or an event I have planned. Also, would have had to wear heels as it was touching the ground at 5'4".

links_reviews_title: looks frumpy on me, better for taller ppl
links_reviews_text: i'm typically a 4, but this designer's shift dresses can run large so i sized down and am glad i did. there is plenty of room all around, but the 2 was a better fit around the bust. at my height the dress was a bit overwhelming and looked frumpy. i wldn't recommend this for ppl my height or if you have a larger bust. pattern is cute and hem is fun. unless you're going for the super casual look, you shld wear heels w this .
Very pretty & comfortable. The only downfall was the collar was not holding up due to the many times it was worn.

I love this dress. The fit is so cute and comfy and the lace adds a little extra. It hugs all the right places and is just gorgeous. Would highly recommend renting this for a wedding or spring/summer event.
The dress was cute and comfortable. Im 5'2 and wore it with 3 inch block heels. It wasn't too short or long. It was perfect. I would totally rent it again.
Fit well. Good length. Girly and fun to wear.

Great dress and great fit! The color wasn't as rich as I thought it would be, but it was still a beautiful dress. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's really short. I do have a larger behind, buuuut, I was definitely surprised at the length. I had to be careful sitting down and moving certain ways. Other than that, it was perfect!

I was a little nervous because I only got one size and the person who rented it previously did not send back the slip that goes underneath. Thankfully I was able to get a nude Spanx slip. RTR did reach out to me before shipping but I was traveling and missed the email. I also rented a backup dress but this one fit best and it's comfortable to dance in. This was for a Quinceañera in August in TX and it was perfect for the occasion. The dress is short which was not an issue for me because I'm 5' but taller ladies might find that they are constantly having to pull down. My Spanx kept riding up while dancing but the dress helped hide that. Overall great!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my engagement photos and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size. I loved the color and quality. I am 5 feet tall and the length was perfect. It would be a short dress on someone taller. The slip was a little low cut on me, but it did not interfere with wearing the dress.

First of all this dress is short. I'm 5'7" and it was riiiiggghhhttt there. Any shorter and we would be boarder line inappropriate. And it's very true to size and slightly unforgiving so either a fit body or Spanx is a necessity. The slip that comes with this dress is a non-stretch silk material. I'm a 4 or 6 depending on the cut and this was a hard 6. With that being said though this dress was a beauty and I felt amazing in it. Some patent nude pumps with a clutch to match and sparkly earring combined with a nude lip and dark eyes made this outfit! 💯

I wore this dress to the office and it was beautiful! The skirt length is a bit short, but my office dress code is relaxed, so that wasn't an issue. I'm 5'2", 115 pounds and the size 4 fit perfectly. I normally wear a 2, so I'd say this runs small. Size up. Lastly, the lace sheath arrived without the paired slip, which was a bit disappointing. However, I had a pale pink slip from Victoria's Secret that was exactly the same length as the sheath, so I was still able to wear the dress! Without the slip, this is unwearable in public.

links_reviews_title: This dress is made for fuuun!!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress!! It's pretty sheer even with the slip...but nothing some well-placed pasties can't fix! Very comfortable & fits great.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for Easter Brunch at our country club. The color is beautiful, the dress fit perfectly
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. I think if you are on the taller side, it might be a little short. I am 5’2” and I prefer dresses to hit above the knee, and this one hit at just the right length for me. I would rent this dress again! It’s a really pretty, soft blush pink color.

I wore this dress for my bridal shower, it was perfect! I typically wear a size 6 dress and ordered a backup size 4. Because the fit but wasn't too clingy, I opted to wear the size 4 shown here. I'm petite, only 5'1'', but the length worked well for me. This dress is feminine, has nice lace, and looks expensive. Would recommend!
This dress was wonderful! It was a little short, but I made it work!
Amazing dress! Just ended up wearing the other color instead! Would definitely rent this one for another event though.
I rented this dress for my bridal shower. It fit perfect! the process was so easy! I got so many compliments! I would definitely rent this dress again!
I️ ordered this dress & my daughter loved! She asked if we can purchase it. The dress was delicate, beautiful & comfortable. Perfect dress for a Supreme Court affair.

links_reviews_title: CUTE for April, not so much October!
links_reviews_text: This dress is really cute, but I let the cuteness overlook the fact that I froze my A$$ in October. :) I will definitely rent again when it's warmer....and I'd size down for sure, it ran large for me.

links_reviews_title: Ethereal, Cute Dress for Spring or Summer
links_reviews_text: My original shipment from RTR was lost in the mail so I went to the location in Topanga to choose a last minute option for my brother's wedding. The bride had a very specific color palette so I was very happy to find something cute that fit her vision! This dress is super comfortable but runs a little small. I'm usually a six so I was suprised that the size eight fit (but they didn't have any smaller sizes for comparison). This dress is really comfortable and beautiful! It's not something I would normally wear but the lace is beautiful, it's not scratchy at all, and the color is really pretty.

This is probably my favorite dress I have ever rented from RTR! I received multiple comments. It was perfect for an outdoor wedding in San Diego. It is pretty short, so don't plan on bending over. The 4 fit perfectly, but I ended up wearing the 6 to get just a bit more length. If you are even thinking about renting this dress, do it!

This dress was a back up but it was so beautiful and easy to wear! It fit perfectly, I was very comfortable. The pink was a lovely color and was perfect for an outdoor bridal shower. Glad I chose this one!!

I rented this dress for family pictures. It was SHORT! I'm 5"8 and I told my photographer to only take pictures from the waist up. There would be no way I could bend or even sit in this dress. The top half was perfect however and achieved just the look I was going for. You will also want to wear a strapless bra with this dress or you will see the strap under the lace.

Yikes. This dress runs small in the mid-section. If you're carrying some leftover baby weight, please size up. I am normally a 4/6, but even the 6 was too snug around my middle. I ended up wearing a dress I already had. Gorgeous, but size up-up :)
This super cute dress is short! Slightly sheer but not too bad- nude undergarments are a must. I felt great in it on my birthday date with my husband.

links_reviews_title: Love the lace, the color, & the neck!
links_reviews_text: It was a little short but I loved everything else!
This dress was great! If it were a couple inches longer, it would've been perfect.

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner - loved the look of this dress! Ended up wearing the size 4.. was a little short but since it had a high neck it worked so I wasn't showing TOO much. I also had to put top stick double sided tape to hold the collar up ... looked kind of floppy without it. The pale pink is pretty see through as well so just need nude undergarments. Overall it was fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Lace was gorgeous- perfect simple classic dress for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2 so it worked- if you're a little taller this might be too short for a formal event.

I was worried this would be too warm with the high neck for a July wedding, but the lace is very light! There is also a separate slip that goes under the dress. It is very sheer, but with the lace piece on top I didn't have any issues. I loved this dress and thought the fit was perfect, not too tight at all. It is short, but I think it is balanced out with the high neck.

links_reviews_title: Perfect combo of sexy & feminine. I received so many compliments on it, especially the color.
links_reviews_text: True to size, only con is the collar detail is supposed to stand up & it doesn't stay.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a Goddess in this dress got many compliments....!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits tight, comes in two pieces and it's short but not too short. The collar needs to be adjusted with double sided tape to stay up but that was an easy fix and it worked, would definitely rent again if not buy!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for hosting a summer bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Fit great. It's classy and sexy without showing too much. A little short, so if you're planning on getting low on a dance floor or bending over a lot, this isn't the dress to wear. It comes in two parts, a slip and lace over lay. As other reviewers mentioned, it is a little see-through, but nothing nude undergarments can't fix. The collar could stand up if I had used some starch, but ran out of time and I don't think anyone noticed. One of my favorite RTR looks, I will rent this again!

I wore this for a formal work event. The dress comes in 2 pieces: a slip and the outer lace shell. I received lots of compliments, especially on the cut of the dress. Be aware the slip is pretty shear so you need to make sure to wear nude under garments.

Very pretty light blush pink color. Lining and lace overlay are separate. The collar doesn't stay straight up. Very comfortable and feminine. Great dress to show off your legs without being too risqué. I got lots of compliments at the wedding rehearsal dinner.

I loved this dress. The A-line cut hid my imperfections and highlighted my strengths. I'm 5'7 1/2 (had to add my half) :) 168 lbs. Received soooo many compliments and felt sexy. My only gripe was the slip underneath is soooo short. It stopped literally right under my cheeks. The front is longer than the back. I ordered a 10 and an 8 and the 8 slip was longer than the 10. I was a little self conscious at first then just made sure not to bend over at all. Lol so recommend getting some nude underwear or getting a size up in hopes of it being longer.
I loved this simple yet elegant lace dress. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding... the dress fit true to size! Lots of compliments!
The dress was very comfortable. It was a little worn at the neck. I would definitely rent another dress from here.

links_reviews_title: Great quality, beautiful color and lace. Perfect for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: Comes in two pieces, slip and lace sheath. I read reviews that it runs short, but since I'm 5 ft the size 4 hit right above the knee . The fit was conservative, and not tight. Only con was that the neck didn't stay up, but didn't deter from loving the dress. Great color and quality!

I wore this dress for a semi-formal alumni reception. I loved the color and lace, but as everyone else had mentioned the dress is very short. I couldn't wear the size 4 because it was too big in the back and waist so I wore the size 2 dress with the size 4 slip. I folded the top of the slip under my bra all around so that the slip was not too long. Gotta do what ya gotta do :). Super pretty dress, just wish it could have been longer.

I loved this dress right when I saw it on RTR, but I loved it even more in person. The fit was cute, and sexy at the same time. The lace is just lovely, and the short hemline made me stand out amongst a crowd of floor-length dresses. Fun to dance in, and super comfortable fabric. They even included a slip dress to wear underneath. Would definitely rent this one again.

Rented this dress for my bridal shower as my first ever RTR experience and it was perfect! I was hesitant at first being that it's lace that would be tight and fitted but that wasn't the case--there was a little wiggle room. I also loved the capped sleeves. Tons of compliments!
Great LBD with a little something extra.
It was a great fit and I got a lot of compliments on it. I went to an outdoor wedding so my only complaint is how thick the material was and with a summer wedding in Florida it was crazy hot.
Thick material, warm enough for Paris in April. Good for day touring and dinner out at night too. Very flattering fit.
Easy to wear. The blue didn't show on the bottom. At. All. Didn't like the armpit fit at the end of the night.
Like other reviews, this is a thick knit dress. The blue is the under side of the knit. Unfort, the blue didnt show up as much as I wanted. Comfortable, but not overly flattering.
Love the fabric and style. I will buy thjs dress. So easy to wear and change up by adding layers.

links_reviews_title: The most comfortable dress I've ever worn to a wedding!
links_reviews_text: On the comfort scale this dress gets a 10/10. It was soft and stretchy enough. The only thing I didn't love about it was the hi-low hem; it would have been more dramatic. I briefly contemplated purchasing this dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for work. It was super comfortable and very pretty!
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed wearing this dress. Typically, you find a dress is either comfortable to wear or really beautiful. This dress was both. I love how stretchy and thick the material is...makes it very very forgiving. Stretchy materials are often thin which means every flaw is visible. Not so with this dress! I liked the little peak-a-boo of blue in the underside as well. This dress could easily be dressed up for an event or occasion. I did have some trouble with the way the dress flared and had to steam it in a certain way to get it to fall right, even then I still had to adjust it throughout the day or it stuck out way too far on the sides and looked almost like I was wearing a tutu underneath. It also creases easily and the lines stay visible even after you've tried to flatten them out. However, the dress is black so this is a minor problem in my opinion. Overall, I think this was a really good rental.

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress to be honored for my accomplishments in the legal community
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an event where I was the honoree. It was perfect for the occasion - comfortable, flattering, but eye-catching with the asymmetrical hem and pop of color. The material is a thick knit, so it was perfect for a late October evening in NYC. I got tons of compliments. I may have to buy this one - highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: This was my first RTR experience and it was so easy!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering and comfortable. The material was thicker than I expected, which was nice for out Fall event.

Loved this dress. It was super comfortable, soft material, and very flattering. The blue that peeked out from the high low style was super cool. It has a lot of stretch so you can easily size down. My only complaint was the fact that it collected lint easily; if you have a dog/cat you will be covered in hair!!!

This was the first RTR experience, so I rented two dresses. I didn't wear this one. Sorry for the terrible photo, but I had no one to help me take the pic. As other reviews have said the fabric is heavy. However, it is still a single woven layer of fabric, so it's not forgiving either. It's fairly tight in the midsection and goes out right at my hips which I didn't like. The arm holes were also quite large on both the M and L and the pit fat wasn't flattering. I haven't worn a high/low before and really wanted to. However at this length, it felt like I had a cape on. Wasn't a fan. If I were to wear it I'd wear the L mostly to be a little less tight in the midsection.
This dress is perfect! The fabric is stretchy, thick and disguises a thousand sins. I'm a size 2 and the small was ideal, but I could have worn the XS too. Highly recommend!

This dress was one of the most relaxed things I have ever worn. The fabric was thicker than I'd been expecting. The dress clings in all the right spots, the skirt has just the right amount of swish to it. I cannot emphasize enough how comfortable you will be and how glad you will be that you chose this dress.

links_reviews_title: Comfort and style at a spring wedding in VT.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. The thicker fabric laid nicely against curves without being heavy. The v-neck was great, even for a small bust! The internal blue of the hi-low was very fun and flirty. Very happy with this choice.

I enjoyed wearing this dress. The blue is not super obvious, but it is a fun feature. The fabric does pill easily, but only noticeable up close. I actually didn't feel there was much difference between a medium and a large. The arm holes seem a bit large. Otherwise I am glad I rented this dress for the event, but I probably wont rent again.
The dress fit perfectly and the material was stretchy so I could fit into the xs. The small would have fit also. The little peep of blue underneath adds some fun to this dress.

This dress was stretchy and I liked it. The blue doesn't show much but then again, I wasn't dancing around in it. The fabric is heavy. I wasn't expecting that but it was good for what I needed it for. Shoulders are almost caps but not really. Recommend getting a coverup if you will be outside or in a chilly area. Got the small and medium. Wore small. I am 5 foot 5 in athletic build 141 lbs 34DD bust Overall, Loved the dress.
Easy to wear and fun. The material is almost sweater-like, but it wasn't too warm. It was fitting but not tight and very flattering!
I really liked this dress. The material is hard to describe. It is a thick and very stretchy fabric. The dress was very fitted but, the thick material hides ahem, "imperfections" well.

This was a great dress. Hit all the right spots. Nice thick fabric. A liiiittle low cut. I'm pretty petite so the ugh low was a little lower than j would like..still pretty though! I would rent again!

I've never given a dress (or for that matter, anything!) five stars before but I love this dress. It was stretchy enough to be comfortable but hugs curves in a flattering way. The blue interior gives it a great pop of color. I wore this to synagogue and out to dinner twice in D.C. and it was perfectly appropriate everywhere. It would also be reversible if you owned it and could cut the tags off. The only minor problem I noted was that the third time I wore it, I noticed a slight pull in the knit on the front.

This dress is so cute for a cocktail event or a dinner out in town! This dress ran small so I would recommend going on size up. The fabric had a little stretch throughout the midsection and came down at a great length, I love the blue under shade of this dress!

links_reviews_title: Basic back dress that did the job.
links_reviews_text: Wore to a big fundraiser event. The blue didn't show much, resulting in the dress looking pretty basic. But it was flattering and comfortable, and I dressed it up with colorful jewelry and shoes.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the rehearsal dinner! I added a wide belt.
links_reviews_text: Was a little bit long, I'm only 5'2.
Love the blue underneath this dress. Cute causal dress.

links_reviews_title: Not a big fan of the lower back of the skirt
links_reviews_text: Stretchy, heavy material
Cute but material picked up lint and everything else

I rented this as an option for a business cocktail reception but ended up wearing to work in the day as I wore something else for the evening and this dress was so comfy (and not too dressy)! Flattering and fun. Highly recommended!

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: I had rented this as a back up luckily since I did not wear it. It ran large and the fabric was way more casual and unflattering.
It fit well, I have a small waist and it could have been a bit tighter or more flattering. Overall, it was comfortable and it was fun to wear.
I love the fabric and the fit but... the high low Thing was an extreme. I wish it had just come to the knee and let the blue be a surprise.

links_reviews_title: Perfect black dress, simple and flattering
links_reviews_text: The fabric of this is perfect. Thick enough to smooth me out and not show bra or underwear lines. I think it could be reversible if you cut out the tags. Not super fancy due to the knot fabric but I love it
It fit beautifully but the fabric was not as formal as I had hoped for.

I ordered this as a backup. When I woke up feeling bloated I was so happy to have this option. The fabric is like a terry cloth-ish material but you can only tell if you're touching it. It was perfect in a formal setting. The dip in the back and pop of blue dresses it up. I got many compliments. I wore this in Dec, it would be hot in the summer time. I Recommend esp if you're not feeling 110% yourself ;)

links_reviews_title: This dress was SOOOOOO comfortable! The fabric has some stretch to it, so it's easy to wear!
