links_reviews_text: Comfortable, true to size, though it is a bit heavy. I was able to wear a standard bra with it, which is always a plus for me.
good fit
The color inside make this simple dress really fun at the bottom. The top is still really simple.

Lots of stretch, yet relatively form fitting. I was 12 weeks pregnant when I rented this for my law school reunion and I needed something not too snug around my newly forming bump. This fit perfectly. Simple, but classic. I wore a blue statement necklace, blue heels with a blue clutch to match the blue portion of the asymmetric back of the dress. Got lots of compliments.
Simple, fun, classy. Runs slightly big. Has stretch so don't be afraid to order small.

links_reviews_title: Sexy but not over the top
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Very form fitting to show off the curves. The side cutout is just the right amount of skin. Was a little short on me (5'11") but was still wearable without tights underneath. Paired with black over the knee boots for valentines date. Husband approved
Fits like a glove, hugs all my curves nicely!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: wore this to a casino but dressed it down with sneakers and a Fanny pack. Got compliments all night. Would recommend, and could see it looking great with a pair of strappy heels.

The color is fantastic! I had originally thought of renting the small with an XS backup but glad I went with the Medium instead. I wore the small but with petals instead of bra. The waist area was really tight to try and pull down over chest. Loved the cutout. The dress arrived with a lingering "food" smell. That was a first in all my RTR experience and the reason for 4 stars instead of 5.

Perfect dress for Valentine's Day dinner or event! It did feel a little tight at the top but wasn't uncomfortable ...just snug, making it hard to get in and out of. The cut out in the side gave it a super sexy vibe. I received lots of complement all night long.

I really like this dress. It's very sexy as well as classy. Only thing I was very conscious of is that it accentuates my not so flat stomach. I had to make sure to suck it in when taking a photo. But all in all, it fits well.

links_reviews_title: Knowing I had a perfect dress for the night and I didn't have to break the bank for it
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress ! I ordered a small and XS and when first seeing the dresses I tried the small on because the dresses looked so tight and small on the hanger. It was a bit too long and bunched in the abdomen area. I tried the XS on and it was perfect. The fit was true to size, and I had no issues with the dress showing off all the lumps and bumps, after reading some reviews that others did. I felt very sexy and sophisticated in this dress. Highly recommend if you want to feel confident and radiant !
Great dress for a Christmas party. It was a little snug across the chest and the material wasn't as thick as I thought, but overall great fit.

The dress could have worked in an xs or s, but I was more comfortable in a small so it didn't pull as much. The fabric is amazing, and feels like you're wearing a sweater dress (but it's not hot -- I was in a crowded 1000+ person ballroom and didn't feel overheated in it). The cut out is JUST ENOUGH to feel sexy but not skanky. I've never worn a more flattering dress in my life, I felt SO CONFIDENT all night. I would DEF rent again. The long sleeves and high neck line are a great balance to the sexiness of the red and tight dress.
nice fit, very perfect color

I like it but the top around the boobs is tighter which makes it harder to feel sexy with the getting the slit to feel right on your stomach. Also, you cannot really wear a bra with it so your nipples will show which is fine by FYI.
So cute! Lots of compliments. Fabric had a little give so I was able to wear the small. If I had wanted it to be less form fitting, the medium would have worked too.
Fit was great and fabric was comfy, totally stand out in the crowd dress, I loved it!
I loved this dress, it was perfect for a night out in Vegas. Curve hugging but very flattering. I did wear Spanx to smooth everything out a little.

Loved this dress for going out in Vegas, hubby also loved! Its short and pretty tight so I'd save for going out/parties. Material was a little worn, but more noticeable to me than anyone else. This dress shows bumps etc so i wore spanks and had to be conscious of them peaking out of the slit in the middle. Regardless, really loved this dress and felt like a star.
Fit like a glove. Felt very sexy yet classy

I ordered this dress for my winter ball and it was great. Fit true to size, very flattering and a gorgeous color. The material was similar to a sweater and I had to put pads in my armpits to avoid seeing my sweat (which you can see in the picture :/ ) but it was super comfortable and I recieved a ton of compliments on it!

I enjoyed this dress so much! The color is the perfect shade of red, not too bright or too dark. The slit in the side adds the perfect amount of umph to spice it up. Best thing is you get to wear a normal bra with it.
Wore this to brunch. Too clingy and short to wear to work- absolutely loved the fit and the sexy cut out in the middle - want to keep this one in my favorites. Very stretchy

Fit like a glove! The dress is a stretchy material, so it was also super comfortable while dancing and having drinks. Would recommend renting your true size and a size smaller. If the dress is too big the slit on the size will not look right.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and classy with a little bit of sass.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, long enough to not be uncomfortable, material is medium thickness so it doesn't hide much. Wore with control top nylons, no show undies, and regular bra. Vibrant red color. Will rent again.
This dress is just HOT! I wore it twice in two weeks.
Fit perfectly, the material was cozy and comfortable. Perfect for a small girl.
Fun dress. I'm a size 2 (usually), 130 lbs, 32DD, and this fit perfectly. Wore in Vegas and got lots of compliments. Comfortable but sexy, and cut out is super flirty and flattering. Form fitting.

I had no reason to wear this so went to a nice dinner after a haircut and yeahhhhh it's pretty sexy. It's not something I'd personally wear to a wedding - a little trashy and the fabric is showing a little wear - but Vegas or night out?! Go for it!! Slimming and hot! Will rent again if I ever have a time machine and can be younger.

This is a very tight fitting dress. I wore smooth Spanx underneath and had to keep pulling it down when I walked. I do have a booty, so I'm not sure if that was a big contributor to it riding up so much. That being said, I felt great in it and am glad I rented it.
I ordered the small and medium, for backup. I was disappointed when I tried on the medium and have a tiny hold on the side seam. :( thankfully the small worked out. Absolutely loved fhe dress!
Loved it! Received so many compliments. Knit fabric with stretch that's very forgiving. The slit is very discreet and doesn't show a lot of skin. Highly recommend
It's hard to find a dress that fits a tall, athletic AND curvy body. This one did just that. The fit was perfect. Modest with just a little cut out. It was a great dress for homecoming.

I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner and it was perfect for the occasion. The fabric wasn't as heavy as the other Elizabeth and James dresses I have rented so the cut-out on the side didn't seem to lay quite right. But overall the dress was still cute.

Definitely ran small so size up one to two sizes. I ordered in a Medium but it wasnt available so wore the large. It worked though so I'm not sure what the medium would have fit like. It is a thinner material than what I typically rent, kind of like a thin sweater dress but flattering and really cute on. Length was perfect for me as I do not like short dresses. I am only 5 foot tall and it hit right above my knee. I have a smaller torso and arms but a bigger butt/thighs/hips and this material worked while still being flattering. Super comfy also.
Perfect for Vegas. I'm 5'7, 120 and the small was perfect

links_reviews_title: Received a significant amount of compliments on my dress
links_reviews_text: It's a sexy dress that's great for a night out on the town. It's also a thicker material, so good for fall/winter.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a bachelorette party in NYC
links_reviews_text: When I wore this dress, I was physically fit but still curvy in the hips and this dress fit like a glove. Very comfortable but still felt sexy.

links_reviews_title: It was just okay. Very tight and flattering if you like super tight. I just don't.
links_reviews_text: Tight tight tight. If that's your thing you will like this. I sized up but would size up twice if you don't want it super tight.
True to size. Love the cutout. Comfortable dress. I would defiantly rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: I loved the look of this dress
links_reviews_text: This fits more like a small to me. Fit perfectly in the top by very tight in the stomach and thigh area

I didn't end up wearing this, but it fit like a beautiful and smolderingly sexy glove. I will absolutely rent again in the future. *I think giving my measurements are the most helpful thing that I can do in order to help you find the right fit. I am just beneath 5’9”, my bust is 38 inches (34DD), my waist 28 inches (and I do have a fairly flat stomach), and my low hip (this measures around the widest portion of my hips and butt) is 42 inches.
Super great fit! Can definitely dress it up if needed.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful in this dress! So flattering and cute!
links_reviews_text: Fits great! Loved it! No complaints!
This was my backup dress and I ended up not wearing it. But I hesitated a lot. Fabric is heavy and is hugging in the right place, very flattering. I will probably rent this another time.

links_reviews_title: Chic silhouette in an "all eyes on me" true red
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful, high quality dress made of a thicker material with rouching at the bodice and shoulder. The dress is definitely better for someone with long limbs or is very tall. The asymmetrical bottom cut of the dress looks better when it hits you around the knee (it hit me mid calf), but was still flattering on a short girl like me.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous poppy red! Loved this dress
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable. Does run large. I’m a 6 right now but ordered down in size based off previous reviews. The size 4 fit perfectly.
This is a beautiful dress and you will receive many compliments wearing it. It's off the shoulder on one side and fits incredibly well. True to size. The color is absolutely fantastic.
Absolutely love Love Love this dress, will rent again. The size, material and look that is gave me was perfect for the roof top event. Received comments all night.

links_reviews_title: A little long for my short 5'4
links_reviews_text: Color pops- details make it look classy - I wore it on a train ride so very comfortable stretch material... it could have been a little more snug- but I just thought it was a little long. Fun piece dressed up or down
couldn't wear it, it came with a damaged button that flew off when I took the dress out of the bag.

links_reviews_title: Didn't hang well on me was more baggy and like a curtain.
links_reviews_text: Heavy thick material hung like a large curtain wasn't flattering or fitted to me at all. Did not wear it out. Disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Not a good dress for large breasts
links_reviews_text: I loved the idea of this dress, and everything from the waist down fit fine, but my larger breasts, though accommodated by the stretchy fabric, didn't fit the cut on the top/shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Very unique color and cut; extremely well made. Just not my style.
links_reviews_text: This piece would be stunning on a different body type. I just did not work well for me.
A bit of stretch but nicely fitted in all the right places. I really liked this dress.

Dress fit great on my pear shape everywhere but the straps. There it looked super tight. Ended up returning it without wearing since the most unique part of the dress not fitting made everything else look off.
very cool dress, modern and unique
This dress is great! The material is thick, but comfortable
Wide in hips
Loved it so much, I bought it.

This dress was an amazing material and fit perfectly. I'm 5'3" and the length was mid-calf. It was great for dancing and I got a ton of compliments. The color was just right for my end of the season tanned-skin.
Hot date here I cone. Looked so good it was hard to keep a straight face.

I really liked how this looked on everyone in the pictures, but it looked kind of costumey/baby doll-ish on me. I ended up returning without wearing. Big, so size down 1 size or even 2 if you're narrow in the waist. I'm normally a size 6 and ordered a 2 and if fit well. Could have probably worn a 4 as well, but 6 would have been too big for sure.

nonstop compliments for color, cut, everything. i'm typically a 4 and this fit true to size. it's a bit difficult to wear a bra because the dress shows EVERYTHING so i wld opt for sticky. i'm typically a 4 and this fit true to size. hit midcalf and a touch lower at the longest because i'm short, looks better w high heels. very comfortable fabric, still easy to move arms. love the shoulder. overall, gorgeous dress. works so well for day to night. rent this!

I Loved this dress!! The material is a thick yet comfortable "neopreneish" fabric. The side gold buttons are such a nice accent. I am petite, so this dress was a little big on me, but I wore it anyways and received so many compliments.

I normally wear a 4, but the 4 was too big, which made it look soo blah. I will try the 2 next time. Otherwise, great color and length. It buttons up the side and has an assymetrical hem, which makes it interesting.
The size 4 was smaller than the size 2. Everyone loved the dress. Put your make up fist and then the dress. I'm 5'6 and 135 lbs,

Huge hit! So comfy, no zipper or buttons, lined, stretchy, forgiving! I absolutely loved wearing this for a holiday party and wish it was available in black; I wear it again! I'm hard to fit around my ribcage/bust----this worked like a dream. Highly recommend!

Wore this to an auction and it was sexy and comfortable. Body hugging fit and the fabric was thick enough for coverage. Nice knee length style and bold dress that stands out. Will need a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Not a lot of give
links_reviews_text: Loved the cut and style. Quality fabric. I am 20 weeks pregnant and typically wear a size 8. Ordered a 10. It was stunning but without any "give" to the fabric it was too tight so ended up not being able to wear.
Company Xmas party. Loved the dress, comfortable to dance and enjoy the evening in style and comfort.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on this dress! I loved the color and how good it made me feel.
links_reviews_text: The fit is tight and the dress material is beautiful-weighted and thick. Even though there are multiple layers this dress still manages to show what's underneath- as long as you've got the right undergarments it's perfect. The color and the fun one shoulder vibe will make you feel sassy and confident!:)
x

I, along with everyone else, love my dress. I had to wear the size larger and could have gone up maybe one more size. It runs small. It doesn't hide much underneath, so a good layer of spandex helped the look.

In love with this red statement dress by Trina Turk! The dress is very fitted in the bust area with a straight loose fit in the hip and midsection area. I recommend going one size up for a backup. At 5'3" the dress fell right at my knees. Pair with a strappy heel and a clutch for a fun classy feel.
This dress got so many compliments. Fit just right in just the right places. Even met a guy and got asked out too. Winner!

This is a lovely dress. Beautiful fabric, cut and color, but VERY form fitting. If you are not feeling "swimsuit ready", you might want to go with another option. On the other hand, if you are in the mood to show off your bod, this is a classy way to do so.

links_reviews_title: Although I didn't choose this dress to wear It's really pretty.
links_reviews_text: A little tight in the arms and bust but overall a really pretty dress.
This dress doesn't have a zipper. It's very form fitting - more than I realized from the pics. The fabric is thick and forgiving. The length was perfect for me and I loved the bright red color.

links_reviews_title: Great color, wasn't a fan of the fabric.
links_reviews_text: I am a loyal RTR member, but this was not a dress for me. I am normally one who loves a thick, stretch fabric, but this fabric was not flattering at all. Also, the inside slip would not line up correctly with the dress and kept showing out the bottom of the dress and you could see the lines from the slip on the sides of the dress.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress, but arms run small
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a work holiday party, so wanted something stylish but not too tight or revealing. This dress was perfect. Overall it runs true to size IMO, but the arm area is a little small/constricting. I felt like it loosened up by the end of the night, but it might be a deal breaker for some people.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small and is fitted.
links_reviews_text: Too small had to rent another dress. This dress did not work for me at all.

links_reviews_title: Super tight and very thin fabric
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a party. Usually I wear a 6 or 8 but I couldn't get either one over my chest!! The fabric is very thin. If you rent this, have some shape wear ready.

links_reviews_title: For a formal work event, this dress was perfect & age appropriate! Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Decided to go up a size so it was less body-con given it was a work event, but the size 2 did fit. Also wore with Spanx - necessary even at the larger size to have that smoothed profile! But I got SO many compliments and the sleeves made the feel covered even given the off shoulder neck line. It fell about 3"-4" below my knees, but kinda gave off the midi-trend look, so I liked it. Would have given 5 stars except the dress was slightly flawed on the right sleeve as a prior user did not use the straps but the clips to hang which left a mark in the fabric.
Really form fitting. Love the off the shoulder

links_reviews_title: Cocktail party was red dress theme. Tons of compliments & won best dress contest!!
links_reviews_text: Body con fit, so chose good undergarments.
Fabric was very stretchy. Should really be worn with a Strapless bra
Great for work. Colorful and fit well. Nice length for a short person.
Length was great and colors were perfect for summer. I liked it more once I received it than I did in the pictures.
I wore this to the Color Factory in NYC and loved it. Perfect for a hot day with a pop of color. Will definitely rent again. :)

Wore this out to dinner on my birthday. Fit perfectly , but maybe a little tight in the chest. However the 6 would be too large. It was a great lightweight fabric. It has pockets big enough for a phone. Not too long or too short. Could have worn to work too

Great little dress for a vacation or kicking around in warm weather. Great quality. Didn't wrinkle. And - it has pockets! Originally I ordered a size 10, but the chest was too tight (I'm a 36DD). So I swapped it out for a size 12 and the chest fit perfectly. It's a bit on the short side, but I didn't feel uncomfortably short. Planning to rent again!
Lightweight material. pockets. Perfect cut for petites. I love you dress. I have worn a 6 and an 8 and they both work

I wore this top out for a dinner on the patio of an Italian restaurant and felt super confident all night. The size 6 fit me like a glove - I was really impressed with the structure and tailoring of this item. It's a beautiful medium hue floral pattern, and the fabric was perfect for being outdoors on a warm summer night!
Very easy to wear. The material is super light which makes it a perfect summer day dress.

I wasn't sure about this at first but ended up really liking it for casual summer daytime wear. It's very lightweight unlined cotton, which was good for hot summer days in the south. Cute small floral pattern. Seemed to run a little big. I would get a 2 next time.

Overall, I absolutely adore the dress! The hem was a bit unraveled but not noticeable when it was being worn. I found the size 10 to be a bit loose in the waist but to be tight in the chest. That may be a result of just my own proportions though. The pockets on this dress are an added bonus! I received a number of compliments and would've happily kept the stress for most of summer on my unlimited subscription.

links_reviews_title: Cute fun dress for outdoor event
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for our last summer concert. It was perfect for the hot weather, lightweight and comfortable. Loved the pockets!

I thought this was red, but it's actually hot pink and navy! Very pretty! I wore this to a very casual party. It was very lightweight and the pockets were awesome! I thought it was very true to size. Tight on my boobs (34ddd) but I got them in there. I received many compliments all day!

The fabric is very lightweight which makes this dress a perfect choice for hot summer days. The floral print is cute and cheerful and would be perfect for daytime or casual events. I love the pleats in the skirt, and it has pockets which is always a plus! The colors are pretty but weren't especially flattering on my fairer skin (not unflattering, but just not quite right) which is the only reason I wasn't totally in love with this one, but it's a great dress overall!
Such a fun dress for Sunday on the boat and brunch

This dress was a little snug in the rib cage, but my husband loved it so much, I wore it on a date night, anyway. Easy to wear & comfortable. Love the pockets! I'll rent this one again this summer in the next size up.

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress for what I needed!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size maybe a little small. I took a 4 and I go between a 2-4. I wore it on an Italy vacation. It did blow up some when it was windy so maybe don't choice for an outdoor event that will be windy. But overall very cute dress.

links_reviews_title: Wearing this dress for the birth of my first nephew! Unforgettable.
links_reviews_text: Little tiny bit short when I jump up-and-down. But this was a special occasion because my nephew was born the day I wore this. Lovely dress and fits well. Perfect for spring or summer day!

links_reviews_title: Would love to have this in my closet!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little bit larger around the waist and bust, but not much. This was a perfect dress for a last-minute dinner invitation. Perfect dress for spring events or everyday.
This dress is so cute! It fits well and would be flattering on all body types. The material is lightweight so it's perfect for those hot summer days. I would recommend sizing up for a backup size.
Great fit wore to a pro baseball game very comfy runs short
I loved the classic look of this dress. It fit perfectly. I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: wore it to work, really cute and comfy too
links_reviews_text: Was a great fit and was really easy to wear!
The dress is very short and a flowy material that blows up if you're not careful. It's a very light material so great for a hot day.
Loved the colors and style

I wore this dress to a casual wedding in Ohio and forgot to take a photo. It was comfortable and looked cute. It's 100% cotton, so watch the wrinkles. Pockets are a nice addition, the full back is nice. Armholes are a little large, so if you're smaller on top it will gap a bit. Good length for shorter folks. Not my favorite ever, but a solid party dress.
This fit perfect in all the right places. I'm a 32a and it fit perfectly. I rented this for work with the intention of going to a work summer party after. Absolutely loved it!
Perfect for everyday!
This dress is better suited for a casual event or day trip in very hot weather. It is very short and the material is thin
It is a great day dress for younger wearers. Adorable but fabric is light and it's short.
This dress is so cute and flattering. True to size (so if you're in between don't go with the smaller size).
I had a wedding at an apple orchard and this was perfect for it. It fit perfectly in every area and I also received a lot of compliments!
so many compliments. fit great. Nice design.
Perfect fit, Nice light weight cotton. Bright happy pattern. Will rent again.
Even as a 34B, it was tight across the bust but definitely still wearable. Super cute for work, party or daytime. Very light fabric was welcome in the summer heat...and pockets are always a plus!
I liked the length (right above knee) and the fit but it needed a belt since where the waist seam hits low it looked odd without a belt.

I didn't end up wearing either sizes of this dress because it was too short. I am 5'7" so not terribly tall but even sitting in this would have been a show. Definitely would be a great dress on someone shorter because the fit is cute and the print is very summery!

Pros: Many! I absolutely loved this dress and wished that I owned it! The quality of the dress is wonderful, and the cut/design was very flattering. I highly recommend this for curvy girls. Cons: None.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress. True size 4 and fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress TWICE because it fit so well! This was great for a spring wedding and then a bridal shower- two very different groups of people so only my mom knew I wore it to both! I loved the fit, the length was perfect with both heels and flats, and it was so cute!

links_reviews_title: Cute Dress, Tight in the Bust
links_reviews_text: Cute dress with pleats (and pockets) that drape well. True to size for waist/hips, but the bust does not stretch so size up if you're on the more well-endowed side. (I'm 32C and had to return because the bust was too tight and smushing me down despite having plenty of room around the chest and shoulders.) Good dress for hiding underarm creases.
Fit well in the bust and waist but was about two inches too short for my comfort level
